[\[1a\]]
[\[1a.1\]]@#/_/mdo sde ra bzhugs so//
[\[1b\]]
[\[1b.1\]]@##/_/'phags pa dam pa'i chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa/_bam po nyer gcig pa/_de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa des dud 
[\[1b.2\]]'gro'i 'jig rten la rtog par byed de/_sems can dmyal ba dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_dud 'gro dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_chu dang /_skam sa dang /_bar snang la rgyu ba'i bya rnams 
[\[1b.3\]]dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]la sogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur la/_ci'i phyir na sems can dmyal ba'i sar sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur snyam nas/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas 
[\[1b.4\]]brtags na/_sems can dmyal ba'i sa na dud 'gro sems can du bgrang ba dang /_sems can du bgrang ba ma yin pa sna tshogs dag mthong ngo /_/der sems can dmyal ba pa de dag 
[\[1b.5\]]skye ba na mes sreg cing bya lus phyin ci log tu 'dug pa gzhan de dag bde bar mthong ste/_de dag 'dir skye bar 'gyur ro snyam du bsams pa dang /_sems bskyed ma thag nyid du bya de 
[\[2a\]]
[\[2a.1\]]rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur te/_ji ltar sems can dmyal ba pa rnams kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa sngar bstan pa de bzhin du bya de rnams la yang 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/sems can du bgrang ba ma yin pa de rnams ni las byas 
[\[2a.2\]]shing bsags pa mi 'dra la sems can dmyal bar gang dang gang dag 'byung ba de dag thams cad 'jigs pa chen por mthong ste/_seng ge dang /_stag dang /_'ug pa dang /_srog chags mar ko ta ka dang /_sbrul dang sbrul chen po 'jigs 'jigs ltar 
[\[2a.3\]]'dug pa chen po dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/sems can dmyal ba pa sems can du bgrang ba la sems can du bgrang ba ma yin pa rnams kyis gnod par byed de/_der sems can du bgrang ba la las kyis bskyed pa'i dud 'gro sems can du bgrang ba ma 
[\[2a.4\]]yin pa gzhan dag gis gnod par byas kyang /_de dag bdag nyid ni sdug bsngal myong bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa des/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi 'jig rten la rtog par byed de/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]lus bkres 
[\[2a.5\]]pa dang skom pas gdungs pa de dag gi 'jig rten na dud 'gro dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na rnam pa sum cu rtsa drug gang yin pa rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/byar gyur pa de dag ni mi 
[\[2a.6\]]yul du byar gyur la de dag gis bya gzhan 'di lta ste/_byan lag dang /_ne'u le dang /_bya rog dang /_bya rgod la sogs pa de dag gis bsad nas za'o/_/de 'chi ba'i dus byas nas srog bcad pa'i rnam par smin pas [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi 'jig rten 
[\[2b\]]
[\[2b.1\]]du byar skye bar 'gyur te/_lus bkres pa dang skom pas gdungs pa'i byar 'gyur ro/_/de dag gi kha zas ni [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams kyi mig phyung nas za la [{]glad pa [,]klad pa [}]yang 'thung ngo /_/gang gi tshe de dag za ba na/_de'i tshe nyes par byas pa'i las kyis rkang dang [{]glad pa [,]klad pa [}]dag shin 
[\[2b.2\]]tu tsha ste/_ba tshwa dang zangs bzhus pa lta bur 'gyur ro/_/de ltar dge slong de [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi 'jig rten na bya 'dug pa dag la brtags nas/_'di ltar rjes su bstan pa tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_las ngan mi dge tsha bas 'dir/_/rnam par smin pa tsha ba ste/_/gnod pa 
[\[2b.3\]]chen po byed pa yin/_/de lta bas na sdig pa spongs/_/ser snas nye bar shin tu nyams/_/nyes byas las ni mi bya'o/_/ser snas nyams pa'i skye bo dag_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dud 'gro rnams su 'gro/_/dud 'gro'i skye gnas bsgrubs nas su/_/gcig la gcig ni khro ba dang /_/
[\[2b.4\]]'ching zhing gsod la za bar byed/_/de lta bas na gti mug spongs/_/gti mug gis ni nyams pa'i sems/_/tshul khrims sbyin pa rnam spong ba/_/byis pa sred pas bslus pa dag_/dud 'gro'i skye gnas dag tu skye/_/rung dang mi rung mi shes la/_/bza' dang mi bza' 
[\[2b.5\]]de bzhin te/_/don dang don min phyi rol gang /_/chos dang chos min 'gal bar byed/_/dbang po lnga ni blun zhing rmongs/_/mi rnams dud 'gro'i skye gnas 'gro/_/de ltar dge slong de dud 'gro'i 'jig rten la [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]rtog par byed de/_de ltar las kyi lu gu rgyud 
[\[2b.6\]]kyis tshe 'bum phrag du mar nye bar sbrel ba dag_/de ltar sdug bsngal 'bum phrag du ma dpag tu med pa'i sdug bsngal gyi klung gis sbrel cing dud 'gror mngon pa'i las du ma dang /_rgyu dang rkyen du ma dag gis bsam pa phan tshun 'brel pa dag ni gang rgya mtsho dpag 
[\[2b.7\]]tshad bcu yod par 'khod de/_nya dang chu srin ma ka ra dang /_nya mid dang /_chu srin na kra dang /_dung gnas pa dag gis de dag phan tshun 'jigs par byed do/_/de dag rmongs pa'i sems kyis 'dod chags spyod par byed de/_rgyu des rung ba dang mi rung ba mngon par 
[\[3a\]]
[\[3a.1\]]mi shes pas/_de'i phyir rgya mtsho'i gnas zab mor skye bar 'gyur la/_ba tshwa'i chu yis bskol ba/_rtag tu skom pas mngon par gdungs pa dag phan tshun gsod pa'i rnam pas 'jigs par 'gyur ro/_/rgya mtsho bar ma na gnas pa gang yin pa de dag 
[\[3a.2\]]ni zhe sdang spyod pa dag yin te/_de dag lhag par zhe sdang gi rgyus rgya mtsho'i bar ma dpag tshad stong yod pa der klu rnams su skye zhing rtag tu gnas so/_/klu de dag phan tshun khro ba dag skyed cing sems khros pas 'khrugs nas phan tshun dug gtong bar byed la/_rtag tu gnod 
[\[3a.3\]]par sems pa yin no/_/de dag gi gnas ni longs spyod ldan zhes bya ste/_de la dpag tshad sum stong yod la/_gnas de klu'i rgyal po rnams kyis shin tu gang ngo /_/gnas de rnams na klu'i rgyal po rnam pa gnyis gnas te/_chos dang ldan pa dang /_chos dang 
[\[3a.4\]]mi ldan pa'o/_/de dag mi'i 'jig rten thams cad la bde bar byed pa dang /_gnod par byed pa yin no/_/gnas de'i klu'i rgyal po chos dang ldan pa rnams gang du gnas pa der klu'i rdul dag mi 'bab bo/_/gang du chos dang mi ldan pa dag gnas pa der klu'i 
[\[3a.5\]]rdul dag 'bab par 'gyur te/_de yang bye ma rab tu 'bar ba 'dra la mgo la 'bab bo/_/des klu'i rgyal po de dag kun gyi gnas rab tu sreg par byed la/_des klu'i bu smad du gtogs pa thams cad kyang sreg par byed de/_de nas yang 'byung bar byed pa 
[\[3a.6\]]mthong ngo /_/de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa des klu rnams kyi klu'i rdul gyi rgyur gyur pa dang /_las la rjes su sems par byed de/_las gang gis klu de dag gi rdul du 'gyur snyam nas/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas 
[\[3a.7\]]brtags na/_khro bas zil gyis non cing bus pa'i blo can nam/_rmongs pa'i blo can gang gis dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang ngam/_grong ngam/_grong khyer ram/_grong rdal mes bsregs na/_de lus dang bral nas sems can dmyal ba'i nang du skye bar 
[\[3b\]]
[\[3b.1\]]'gyur ro/_/de nas thar nas dud 'gro klu rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur te/_de sngon mes bsregs pa'i nyes pa'i rgyu des/_de la 'bab pa'i phyir klu'i rdul 'bab par mthong ngo /_/de nas yang dge slong de klu'i 'jig rten la rtog par byed de/_las gang gis 
[\[3b.2\]]klu rnams la klu'i bye ma mi 'bab cing las gang gis der skye bar 'gyur snyam nas/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/_gang mu stegs su gyur cing 'jig rten pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa'i tshul can yin la/_de sbyin pa tsher ma dang bcas pa yang 
[\[3b.3\]]byin na/_snga ma bzhin tsher ma bdun gyi nang du skyes la/_khros pas kyang bsgribs nas 'di ltar klu rnams kyi nang du skye bar gyur cig ces klu rnams kyi nang du smon lam btab na/_de lus dang bral nas ngan 'gro log par ltung ba longs spyod ldan gyi klu rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur 
[\[3b.4\]]ro/_/der skyes nas kyang ha cang khro ba'i rang bzhin can du mi 'gyur la/_chos dang ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su 'jug par 'gyur te/_de la klu'i rdul de mi 'bab cing mgo la yang mi 'bab bo/_/de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de klu'i 'jig rten 
[\[3b.5\]]la rtog par byed de/_las gang gis klu rnams kyi gnas longs spyod ldan na/_chos dang ldan pa'i klu de dag rnam pa du yod/_chos dang mi ldan pa de dag rnam pa du yod snyam nas/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/_gang du chos dang ldan pa dag gnas pa der 
[\[3b.6\]]ni rin po che'i ra bas bskor cing rin po che sna bdun 'byung la/_kun nas 'od 'byung ste/_lteng ka dang /_'bab chu dang /_ud pa la phun sum tshogs pa ni skye/_bdud rtsi'i kha zas la ni za/_rtag tu bde ba la ni gnas/_lus me tog dang /_phye ma dang /_byug pas ni 
[\[3b.7\]]brgyan/_mgo sbrul du 'dug pa kho nar zad la/_gzhan du na 'dod pa'i gzugs can du 'gyur te/_gang du rab tu 'gro bar 'dod pa dang /_gang du rnam par rgyu bar 'dod pa der so sor gnas par byed do/_/de la klu'i rgyal po 'di rnams ni chos dang ldan pa yin te/_'di 
[\[4a\]]
[\[4a.1\]]lta ste/_mgo bdun pa dang /_glang po'i gdong dang /_klu'i rgyal po nor rgyas kyi bu dang /_de bzhin du klu'i rgyal po 'jog po dang /_klu'i rgyal po bzang ldan dang /_klu'i rgyal po skyed pa dang /_klu'i rgyal po mi 'joms pa dang /_klu'i rgyal po sprin 
[\[4a.2\]]phreng can dang /_klu'i rgyal po 'khyil pa dang /_klu'i rgyal po kun 'gro dang /_klu'i rgyal po rab spro ste/_klu'i rgyal po 'di rnams ni chos dang ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa yin no/_/de rnams ni lo legs par bya ba'i phyir dus su 'bab pa'i char mi nyung bar bde 
[\[4a.3\]]bar 'bebs par byed la/_dus ma yin par 'byung ba'i ser ba dang /_sprin dang /_rlung dag gtong bar mi byed do/_/sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun la dad cing dad pas rjes su 'jug pa yin/_sangs rgyas kyi sku gdung srung la/_klu'i rdul dang bral 
[\[4a.4\]]bas shin tu bde ba yin no/_/de yang mi'i gnas bzhi la 'di lta ste/_'dzam bu'i gling dang /_nub kyi ba lang spyod dang /_shar gyi lus 'phags dang /_byang gi sgra mi snyan rnams su char 'bebs par byed de/_gang gi tshe dge sbyong dang /_bram ze dag chos dang ldan 
[\[4a.5\]]zhing chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i mi 'byung ba de'i tshe/_chos kyi bye brag gis klu'i rgyal po chos dang ldan pa dag stobs rab tu che bar 'gyur te/_de'i tshe char legs par 'bebs par byed cing de'i tshe lo legs par 'gyur la/_dri dang ro kha dog phun sum tshogs par 'gyur/_
[\[4a.6\]]'gro ba dang /_dug dang /_rlung gzhan gyis gnod par byed par mi 'gyur zhing /_'bras bu bzang po 'byung bar 'gyur la/_nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'od dag gis gnod par mi 'gyur/_klu'i rgyal po chos dang ldan pa rnams ni klu'i gdug pa dang rlung dag gtong bar mi byed 
[\[4a.7\]]do/_/'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can rnams kyi srog gi bar chad ni rgyu bzhis byed de/_'di lta ste/_lo nyes dang /_mtshon gyis 'khrugs pa dang /_dug dang /_rlung gis reg pa dang /_chu'i nyes pa'o/_/de la gal te chos dang ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i skye dgu 
[\[4b\]]
[\[4b.1\]]dag 'byung na/_chos dang ldan pa'i klu de dag stobs dang ldan par 'gyur te/_de dag sprin ngan pa dag sprul par mi byed cing /_de dag sprin ngan pa dang 'du bar mi byed la/_rlung ngan pa dag gtong bar mi byed do/_/de chu bo dag la gnod par mi byed cing chu bzang pos 'bru rnams 
[\[4b.2\]]legs par skyed de/_me tog dang 'bras bu dag ro bro ba dang /_mdog bzang ba dang /_dri dang ro phun sum tshogs par 'byung ngo /_/des sems can rnams dga' bar byed la/_nad dag dang bral zhing khams rnams stobs dang ldan par 'gyur/_de dag yang las legs pa dag 
[\[4b.3\]]byed la/_de dag sems can rnams kyi dbang gi 'bras bu yang 'bru rnams phun sum tshogs par byed de/_de ltar rim gyis 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams la/_klu dag gces spras sems par 'gyur ba mthong ngo /_/de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa 
[\[4b.4\]]shes pa des 'dzam bu'i gling so sor shes par byas nas/_nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi gling la rjes su sems par byed de/_chos dang ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa dag ji ltar kun tu srung bar byed cig gu snyam mo/_/gling der mi yid shin tu 'jam pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur la/_
[\[4b.5\]]de dag la bar chad gcig 'byung ba ni 'di lta ste chu rnyog pa can yin te/_des nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi mi rnams dus nye bar 'dums par byed do/_/klu'i rgyal po chos dang ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa de dag sprin ldang bar mi byed cing ngam grog dang /_g.yang sa dang ri bo mi 
[\[4b.6\]]bzad pa rnams la/_de dag chu rnyog pa can mi 'bebs la/_klu rnams kyi mthus chu rnyog pa med par byas pas/_nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi mi rnams bde bar gnas pa mthong ngo /_/de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de shar gyi lus 'phags gling la rtog 
[\[4b.7\]]par byed de/_kye ma chos dang ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i klu dag shar gyi lus 'phags gling bde bar bya ba la ji ltar 'bad snyam nas/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/_shar gyi lus 'phags kyi mi rnams la glog gi 'jigs pa dang /_sgra'i 
[\[5a\]]
[\[5a.1\]]'jigs pas bar chad 'byung bar 'gyur te/_de dag gang gi tshe glog mthong ba dang /_sgra thos pa de'i tshe sems shin tu 'jam pa dag la nad 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/gang gi tshe der chos dang ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i klu'i bdag po dag sgra yang 
[\[5a.2\]]mi 'byin/_glog kyang mi gtong ste/_de'i tshe klu'i bdag po rnams kyis shar gyi lus 'phags kyi mi rnams la nad 'byung bar mi byed pa mthong ngo /_/de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi mi rnams kyi gnod pa la rjes su 
[\[5a.3\]]sems par byed de/_kye ma byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi mi rnams la gnod pa ji ltar 'byung bar 'gyur snyam nas/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/_byang gi sgra mi snyan pa rnams la rlung grang mos gnod par byed de/_sprin nag pos gnod pa dang /_rlung grang mos 
[\[5a.4\]]me tog de dag zhum par 'gyur la/_dri mi zhim par 'gyur/_de nas de dag yid mi dga' ba skye ste/_sprin nag po'i rkyen gyis bya dag skad mi snyan pa 'byin la/_pi bang dang /_rdza rnga'i sgra yang mi snyan par 'gyur ro/_/ri kun tu snang byed la sogs pa la gnas pa 
[\[5a.5\]]rnams la/_de ltar klus byas pa dag gis gnod par byed do/_/gang gi tshe chos dang ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i rgyal po 'byung ba de'i tshe rlung grang mo dag 'byung bar mi 'gyur la/_sprin nag po yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de ltar mi'i gnas bzhi dag la klu'i rgyal 
[\[5a.6\]]po chos dang ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa rnams bde ba sgrub par byed/_phan pa sgrub par byed do/_/de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de/_klu'i 'jig rten la rtog par byed de/_las gang gis chos dang mi ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su 'jug 
[\[5a.7\]]par mi 'gyur snyam nas/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/_ji ltar klu'i gnas longs spyod ldan na/_klu rnams kyi rgyal po chos dang mi ldan pa 'di lta ste/_klu'i rgyal po rab 'joms dang /_klu'i rgyal po bsgyings pa dang /_klu'i rgyal po nag po dang /_klu'i 
[\[5b\]]
[\[5b.1\]]rgyal po hu lu hu lu ste/_de dag rgya mtsho bar ma longs spyod ldan na gnas so/_/chos dang mi ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su 'jug par mi byed pa de dag gi mthu ji lta bu yin snyam nas/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/_gang gi tshe dge sbyong du mi 'dzin pa dang /_bram zer mi 
[\[5b.2\]]'dzin pa'i skye dgu dag 'byung ba de'i tshe/_klu de dag gi dbang du 'gyur ro/_/de'i tshe de dag 'dzam bu'i gling du sems gdug cing lus las dug mang po 'byung bar byed de/_de dag sprin ngan pa'i nang na rgyu zhing dug gi shing ljon pa 'byung bar byed de/_de dag gis rlung ma rung bar byed/_rlung 
[\[5b.3\]]des chu ma rung bar byed/_chu ma rung bar byas pa des/_'bru'i tshogs shin tu ma rung bar byed de/_kha zas de zos pa las nad dag rab tu 'khrug par byed do/_/'bru ma rung bar byas pa des tshe dag thung bar 'gyur te/_de ltar rgyal po nyes pa che zhing sdang bas kyang phan tshun gsod pa dag 
[\[5b.4\]]byed do/_/de nas nyes pa des 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi dag rab tu nyung bar 'gyur te/_rkyen 'dis klu ma rungs pa rnams bar chad byed par 'gyur ba mthong ngo /_/de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de/_klu'i rgyal po la so sor rtog par byed de/_chos dang mi 
[\[5b.5\]]ldan pa'i rgyal po dag nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi mi rnams kyi bar chad ji ltar byed cig gu snyam nas/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/_gang gi tshe mi rnams kyi rgyal po chos dang mi ldan pa de dag 'byung ba de'i tshe/_klu'i rgyal po chos dang mi ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su 
[\[5b.6\]]mi 'jug pa dag nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi ngam grog dang /_g.yang sa dang /_ri bo'i rtse mi bzad pa rnams la char dbyug pa lta bu 'bebs par byed de/_char pa'i chu des chu rnyog pa can du byed do/_/nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi mi rnams de la 'thung bar byed de/_bar chad byed pa'i rgyu 
[\[5b.7\]]ni 'di yin no/_/dge slong de nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi gling la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin so sor brtags nas/_nang gi so sor rig par byed do/_/de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de/_shar gyi lus 'phags gling la rtog par byed de/_des 
[\[6a\]]
[\[6a.1\]]thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/_gang gi tshe chos dang mi ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su mi 'jug pa'i skye dgu dag 'byung ba de'i tshe klu'i bdag po ma rungs pa dag gi stobs rab tu che bar 'gyur ro/_/de dag shar gyi lus 'phags gling du sgra rab tu chen 
[\[6a.2\]]por 'byin te/_'di lta ste/_ri chen po snyil ba na sgra 'byung ba de lta bu de dag thos nas/_shar gyi lus 'phags gling gi mi rnams kyi snying shin tu 'jam par mi 'gyur te/_de dag kha cig nad kyis 'debs so/_/de bzhin du glog kyang 'byin te/_'di ltar phyogs bcu thams 
[\[6a.3\]]cad 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrugs par 'gyur zhing sprin gyi nang du zhugs pa'i klu de dag gzugs 'jigs 'jigs ltar bsgyur ba/_mig ni shing rta'i 'khor lo tsam/_gzugs ni ri nag po 'dra la mgo gsum po las me thams cad gtong zhing khyi'i gzugs dang /_sbrul gyi 
[\[6a.4\]]gzugs te/_gzugs du ma/_gzugs mi bzad pa dag mthong ngo /_/de dag mthong nas shar gyi lus 'phags gling gi mi rnams kyi bar chad du 'gyur ba mthong ngo /_/de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de/_mtho ris las gzhan pa mtho ris 
[\[6a.5\]]kyi 'jig rten gnyis pa lta bu/_byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi gling la rtog par byed de/_klu'i bdag po ma rungs pa dag byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi mi rnams la ji ltar gnod pa skyed par byed snyam nas/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/_ji ltar byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi mi rnams la 
[\[6a.6\]]snga ma bzhin du pad ma dang /_rtag tu me tog rgyas pa dang /_rtag tu dri zhim pa dang /_mchog tu nyams dga' ba dag yin te/_de dag mthong nas byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi mi rnams 'grangs pa dang /_dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/gang gi tshe dge sbyong du mi 'dzin pa dang /_bram zer mi 'dzin 
[\[6a.7\]]pa'i skye dgu dag 'byung ba de'i tshe/_klu ma rungs pa dag gis byang gi sgra mi snyan du sprin stug po ri lta bu dag 'byin par byed de/_de dag byung ma thag tu nyi ma sgrib par byed do/_/des bsgribs pa'i skyon gyis pad ma dag zhum par 'gyur zhing dri mi zhim par 'gyur la nyi ma bzhin du gsal 
[\[6b\]]
[\[6b.1\]]bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de dag zhum pa tsam gyis byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi mi rnams yid dman par 'gyur ro/_/sprin dang rlung yang gtong bar byed la des pi bang dang /_rdza rnga rnams kyi sgra mi snyan par 'gyur te/_de ltar mi'i gnas bzhi la klu rnams bar chad byed pa mthong ngo /_/de nas 
[\[6b.2\]]yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de/_gling bzhi'i nang na bzang ba dang /_bzang ba ma yin pa dag la rtog par byed de/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/_gang byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi ni bde ba mngon du che ba yin la/_mi'i gnas gsum dag ni 
[\[6b.3\]]ma yin no/_/'dzam bu'i gling du ji lta ji ltar chos dang ldan pa dang /_chos dang mi ldan pa'i skye dgu 'byung ba de lta de ltar 'phel ba dang /_'grib pa dang /_bde ba dang /_sdug bsngal ba dag yod de/_gling gsum gyi nang na 'di ni las kyis yin no/_/'dir ni dge 
[\[6b.4\]]ba bcu'i las kyi lam dag sems pa yin zhing /_'dir ni sangs rgyas 'byung ba yin la/_'dir ni mi'i gnas bzhi dag gi rag las pa yin te/_'dir ni dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dag nges par sems shing rnam par dpyod pa yin/_'dir ni tshangs par spyod 
[\[6b.5\]]pa'i gnas yin/_'dir ni 'chi ba dang skye ba sems pa yin/_'dir ni rdo rje las byas pa'i rdo rje'i gdan yod de/_gang 'dzam bu'i gling du dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong 'bigs pa 'khor ba thams cad na med la rdo rje'i gdan zil gyis gnon pa yang med de/_sangs rgyas 
[\[6b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das gang la gnas nas byang chub tu thugs bskyed pa'i rgyu 'dis na 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir 'khrungs te/_rgyu gang dang byang chub thob par byed pa dge ba'i rtsa ba'i grangs kyi rgyun gang yin pa de ni ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyis kyang yang dag par gzung bar mi nus na sa phyogs 
[\[6b.7\]]gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos/_gang gis 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i rgyu ni 'di yin te/_'dir de gnya' shing gi bu gar rus sbal 'jug pa lta bur 'khrung gi_/gling gzhan du ni ma yin te/_de'i rgyu ni de yin rkyen ni de yin no/_/gang mi'i gnas bzhi 
[\[7a\]]
[\[7a.1\]]la kun gyi gtso bo ni 'dzam bu'i gling 'di yin te/_gling gzhan dag ni ma yin no/_/de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de/_klu'i 'jig rten la rtog par byed de/_las gang gis klu'i rgyal po chos dang mi ldan zhing chos dang 'thun 
[\[7a.2\]]par mi byed pa rnams sbal pa za ba dang /_bye ma za ba dang /_rlung za bar 'gyur snyam nas/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/_sngon mir gyur pa'i tshe gang gis bu dang chung ma rnams bkol te/_btsan snogs byed la/_bu smad ni 'gram chu langs te/_re bzhin 
[\[7a.3\]]du lta ba dang /_de bdag gcig pu zas mang po za la/_bu smad la ni kha zas ngan pa sbyin par byed pa las/_de lus dang bral ba'i 'og tu klu'i skye gnas su skye la zas su sbal pa za ba dang /_bye ma za ba dang /_rlung za ba mthong ste/_las dang 'dra bar 'bras bu smin pa'i phyir ro/_/
[\[7a.4\]]de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa des klu'i 'jig rten la rtog par byed de/_las gang gis klu de rnams char 'bebs par byed/_las gang gis ser ba 'bebs par byed cig gu snyam nas/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/_gal te 
[\[7a.5\]]chos dang mi ldan pa'i klu'i rgyal po rnams 'khrugs na gcig la gcig bsnyogs te/_khros pas char sprin bsgrubs nas/_char 'bebs par byed cing gnod pa'i sprin dang rlung dang ser ba dang ldan pa'i char drag po dag 'bebs par byed la/_des na zhing la nas dang 'bras dang 
[\[7a.6\]]'bru thams cad ma rung bar byed de/_de ltar gnod pa'i char 'bebs par byed pa mthong ngo /_/de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa des klu'i 'jig rten la rtog par byed de/_klu rnams 'dzam bu'i gling du rnyed pa dang ldan par bya ba'i phyir bu ram shing 
[\[7a.7\]]gi tshal dang /_zhing la nas dang gro dang /_'bru rnams 'phel bar bya ba'i don du bde bar byed pa'i char ji ltar 'bebs par byed snyam nas/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/_sems can rnams kyi dbang gi 'bras bus skye bo thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i 
[\[7b\]]
[\[7b.1\]]phyir klu'i rgyal po chos dang ldan zhing chos dang 'thun par byed pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te/_de dag gis 'bru mod par bya ba'i phyir char 'bebs pa mthong ngo /_/de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa des/_klu'i 'jig rten la rtog par byed de/_rgya mtsho 
[\[7b.2\]]dang rgya mtsho'i chu lag dag na/_klu ji snyed cig gnas snyam nas/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/_gal te 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i mi rnams phal cher chos dang mi ldan par gyur na/_de'i tshe chos dang mi ldan pa rnams rgya mtsho'i chu lag dag tu klu grangs med par skye bar 
[\[7b.3\]]'gyur ro/_/gal te phal cher chos dang ldan na ni klu bye ba phrag lnga bcu rtsa bdun 'byung bar 'gyur te/_de dag rgya mtsho'i chu lag bzhi po dag tu rgyu bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de klu'i 'jig rten la rtog par byed de/_des rgya mtsho'i 
[\[7b.4\]]chu lag dang bcas pa'i rgya mtsho'i nang gi klu'i grong khyer longs spyod ldan zhes bya ba la brtags nas/_rgya mtsho'i gting gi sa gzhi la rtog par byed de/_rgya mtsho'i gting gi sa gzhi la su dag gnas snyam nas/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/_lha dang 
[\[7b.5\]]'gran pa'i lha ma yin zhes bya ba dag gnas so/_/de dag mdor bsdu na rnam pa gnyis te/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi 'gro bar gtogs pa rnams dang /_dud 'gro'i 'gro bar gtogs pa rnams so/_/de la [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi 'gro bar gtogs pa rnams ni bdud kyi ris kyi [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams dang /_
[\[7b.6\]{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rdzu 'phrul chen po rnams so/_/dud 'gro'i 'gro bar gtogs pa gang yin pa de dag ni rgya mtsho'i gting gi sa gzhi la gnas te/_ri rab kyi rten dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong yod pa'i sa'i 'og na gnas so/_/de dag kyang mdor bsdu na/_sa gzhi bzhi yod do/_/de la 
[\[7b.7\]]sa gzhi dang po la ni dpag tshad nyi khri gcig stong yod de/_sa gzhi de na ni lha ma yin rnams kyi rgyal po sgra gcan zhes bya ba gnas so/_/des ni 'dod pa'i khams su thams cad pas lhag pa'i gzugs sprul nus la mi rnams kyi dge ba dang mi dge ba'i dbang gis de 'di snyam du 
[\[8a\]]
[\[8a.1\]]sems te/_bdag cag lha ma yin rnams kyi 'gran zla ni lha rnams yin gyis/_bdag gis dgra de dag gi tshal dang /_nags tshal dang /_lha'i bu mo gang dag la lha rnams rab tu chags shing dga' bar 'dzin pa de dag blta'o snyam nas/_des de 
[\[8a.2\]]ltar bsams nas bdag nyid kyi lus brgyan te nor bu'i rgyal po mthon ka chen po'am nor bu'i rgyal po pad ma rA ga'am/_gser gyi rgyal po lam mer 'dug pa'am/_dmar lnga'i rgyal po gser ram/_gos kyi rgyal po ma btags pa kha dog sna tshogs sngon po dang /_dmar 
[\[8a.3\]]po dang /_ser po dang /_nag po rnams kyis mdzes par byed cing /_nor bu'i rgyal po gang rgyan du thogs pa de'i kha dog gis sgra gcan de'i lus kyi tshad ni ri rab tsam yod pa de thams cad nor bu'i 'od de kho na dang 'dra bar snang bar 'gyur te/_gal te mthon ka chen po rgyan du thogs 
[\[8a.4\]]na ni de'i lus thams cad mchog tu sngon por snang bar 'gyur ro/_/dmar po yang de dang 'dra'o/_/ser po yang de dang 'dra'o/_/gal te spug rgyan du thogs na ni de'i lus thams cad nor bu de'i kha dog bzhin du snang bar 'gyur ro/_/nor bu gzhan dag rgyan du thogs na yang /_de dang 
[\[8a.5\]]de bzhin du de'i kha dog 'dra bar snang bar 'gyur ro/_/de lha rnams kyi 'gran zla yin la/_lha ma yin gyi bu mo rnams dang /_lha'i bu mo rnams ni rang bzhin gyis chags su rung ba yin te/_de dag la chags par gyur nas/_sgra gcan de phan tshun 'gro ba'i chas su zhugs nas sa gzhi 
[\[8a.6\]]de nas 'byung ngo /_/sgra gcan gyi sa gzhi de na de'i grong khyer 'od can zhes bya ba dpag tshad brgya stong yod pa rin po che sna du ma'i tshal dang /_nags tshal dang /_shing ljon pa dang /_khang khyim dang /_lteng ka dang /_'bab chu dang /_rdzing dang /_chu ka bde ba rnams kyis mdzes par byas pa de'i 
[\[8a.7\]]nang nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po de lus me tog gi phreng ba dang /_phye ma dang /_spos kyi byug pa rnams kyis brgyan te byung nas/_de lha rnams kyi tshal dang /_nags tshal rnams la lta bar byed do/_/de lta zhing 'dug pa na gal te 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams chos ma yin pa la zhugs te/_phar mi 
[\[8b\]]
[\[8b.1\]]'dzin pa dang /_mar mi 'dzin pa dang /_dge sbyong du mi 'dzin pa dang /_bram zer mi 'dzin pa dang /_rang gi pha tshan gyi nang na rgan rabs kyi rim pa med pa dang /_chos la mi rten pa dang /_dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa mi byed pa dang /_dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las la mi lta 
[\[8b.2\]]bar gyur na ni/_de'i tshe sa tha ma la gnas pa rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams mthu chung bar 'gyur te/_gcig gis gcig bsogs nas kye lha rnams seng ge mo'i bu sgra gcan ni bdag cag bsad pa'i phyir btul te byung ngo zhes 'dzer to/_/gang gi tshe 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams 
[\[8b.3\]]chos dang ldan par gyur te/_phar 'dzin pa dang /_mar 'dzin pa dang /_dge sbyong du 'dzin pa dang /_bram zer 'dzin pa dang /_rang gi pha tshan gyi nang na rgan rabs kyi rim pa yod pa dang /_chos la rten pa dang /_dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa byed pa dang /_dge ba dang /_
[\[8b.4\]]mi dge ba'i las la lta bar gyur na ni/_de'i tshe sa tha ma la gnas pa rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis rin po che sna tshogs blangs nas/_lus brgyan/_cha lugs sna tshogs su cha zhing /_lus me tog gi phreng ba dang /_phye ma dang /_spos kyi byug pa rnams kyis 
[\[8b.5\]]brgyan te/_mtshon cha sna tshogs kyi char 'bebs la/_ha ha zhes bya ba'i sgra sgrogs shing ri rab kyi khong na tshal dang /_nags tshal gang na seng ge mo'i bu sgra gcan 'dug pa de dag tu rgyug go/_/de ste de mi rgal na ni ri rab kyi ngos la tshal dang nags tshal 'dug pa dag la nyi 
[\[8b.6\]]ma'i zer gyis phog pa'i 'od zer 'bum phrag mang po de'i gdong du bab ste/_mig la gnod par gyur pa mthong ngo /_/des nyi ma'i zer de mthong nas/_nyi ma'i zer gyis mig 'khrugs te/_nyi ma'i lan gyis lha'i bu mo rnams kyang blta bar ma nus/_lha'i tshal dang /_
[\[8b.7\]]nags tshal rnams dang /_rdzing rnams dang /_lha'i 'byor pa rnams kyang blta bar ma nus snyam nas/_des bsams pa/_kye ma nyi ma'i lan gyis lha'i bu mo rnams bdag gis blta bar ma nus so snyam ste/_khros pas mig rtsa dmar por gyur cing /_lag pas nyi ma'i 
[\[9a\]]
[\[9a.1\]]dkyil 'khor sgrib par byed do/_/des nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor lag pas bsgribs nas/_de bdag gis lha mo rnams dang /_mtho ris blta'o snyam ste/_mdog sdug cing yid du 'ong ba blta ba la rtse tshugs su 'dud do/_/de nas rgya mtshos ni de'i 
[\[9a.2\]]rked par phyin la/_snga ma bzhin du nor bu'i rgyan ji lta bu thogs pa de lta bu'i kha dog gis rked pa yan chad khyab par 'dug ste/_nor bu'i 'od kyis lag pa sngon po'am/_dmar po'am/_ser po'am/_nag por gyur te/_lag pas nyi ma'i zer gyi gnod pa bsgribs pa de bram 
[\[9a.3\]]ze rtog ge pa log pa'i thos pas bslus pa rnams kyis mthong nas/_nyi ma gza' sdig can gyis zin to/_/nyi ma gza' dmar pos zin to/_/nyi ma gza' ser pos zin to/_/nyi ma gza' nag pos zin to zhes zer zhing las dang 'bras bu rgyab tu bor nas de lta bus 'tsho ba tshol ba'i 
[\[9a.4\]]phyir/_'di ltar lo legs par 'gyur ro/_/lo nyes par 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po la rung bar 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po la mi rung bar 'gyur ro/_/ltas bzang ngo /_/ltas ngan par 'gyur ro zhes rtog ge'i rig pas ston par byed do/_/yang dag par na ni des nyi ma lag pas bsgribs 
[\[9a.5\]]nas lha'i 'jig rten tshal dang /_nags tshal dang /_lteng ka dang /_rin po ches mdzes par byas pa dang bcas pa bde blag tu lta bar byed pa yin no/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis de mthong nas lha rnams la nga'i shing rta sngon du thong la/_sgra gcan 'di zlog shig ces bsgo'o/_/
[\[9a.6\]]de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bsgo ba bzhin du lha rnams lus rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan te/_seng ge mo'i bu sgra gcan ga la ba der thab mo bya ba'i phyir rgyug go/_/de nas des lha de rnams mthong nas phyir rang gi gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur ro de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu 
[\[9a.7\]]rnam par smin pa shes pa de zla ba la gza' 'jug pa la rtog par byed de/_zla ba la sgra gcan ji ltar 'dzin snyam nas/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/_sgra gcan gyi g.yog 'khor gang yin pa de dag rtag tu rgya mtsho'i chu'i steng du rgyu ba de dag gis zla ba shar phyogs kyi 
[\[9b\]]
[\[9b.1\]]ri'i rtse mo nas 'dzam bu'i gling du 'ong ba na bai DUr+ya'i 'od kyi dkyil na brgya 'gyur bas kyang mdzes par mthong nas/_sgra gcan gyi g.yog 'khor rnams kyis sgra gcan la bsnyad de/_rgyal po chen po zla ba nya ba de lha'i bu mo'i bzhin kho na ltar 'dug pa 'ong ngo zhes zer ro/_/de nas 
[\[9b.2\]]de dag las thos nas sgra gcan lha'i bu mo la chags pas zla ba la lta 'dod par gyur nas/_sgra gcan rang gi sa gzhi nas byung ste/_lha'i bu mo'i bzhin la reg par 'dod pa'i phyir/_thag ring po nas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la sgrib par byed pa de'i tshe/_rin po che du mas snga ma 
[\[9b.3\]]bzhin du lus brgyan pa de/_'dzam bu'i gling pa'i rtog ge pa rnams kyis mthong nas yul gyi mi rnams la bsnyad de/_gza' nag po zhig go/_/gza' dmar po zhig go/_/gza' ser po zhig go/_/lo legs par 'gyur ro/_/lo nyes par 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po la rung bar 'gyur 
[\[9b.4\]]ro/_/rgyal po la mi rung bar 'gyur ro/_/mtshon gyis 'gyed par 'gyur ro/_/bde bar 'gyur ro zhes zer ro/_/nub kyi ba lang spyod dang /_shar gyi lus 'phags dang /_byang gi sgra mi snyan logs na gza' 'dug ste/_nyi ma dang zla ba la sgrib na ni gling de dag na rtog ge pa dag kyang 
[\[9b.5\]]med/_log par smra ba dag kyang med de/_de ltar na rgyu de lta bus gzas zla ba dang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la sgrib par byed do/_/rtog ge pa rnams ni gnam grum pa yang ston par byed de/_sgra gcan sa'i 'og na 'dug pa la lha ma yin rnams kyis smras pa/_kye ma ji ltar lha'i 
[\[9b.6\]]dbang po kau shi ka ri rab kyi steng na/_grong khyer blta na sdug dang /_lha'i 'dun sa chos bzang na lha'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga 'byor cing ldan par 'dug la bde ba rnams nyams su myong ste/_de ltar lha rnams kyi rgyal po ni kau shi ka lags/_bdag cag gi rgyal po ni khyod lags te/_
[\[9b.7\]]de bas ches mthu che zhing ches rdzu 'phrul che ba lags kyis bdag cag dong la/_dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang g.yul 'gyed par bgyi'o/_/de'i grong khyer yang gzhom par bgyi'o/_/zhes zer ro/_/de ltar lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan/_lha ma yin rnams kyis rbad nas khros te 
[\[10a\]]
[\[10a.1\]]skad 'byin cing grong khyer 'od can de nas rings par byung ste/_gang gi tshe des skad phyung ba de'i tshe/_rtog ge pa rnams na re/_gnam grum pa 'di ni lha'i ltas yin te/_lo legs par 'gyur ro/_/lo nyes par 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po la rung bar 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po 
[\[10a.2\]]la mi rung bar 'gyur ro/_/mtshon gyis 'gyed par 'gyur ro/_/mtshon gyis 'gyed par mi 'gyur ro zhes zer te/_de dag sbyin sreg byed cing zhi ba dang /_bde legs su bya ba dag byed do/_/de nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan 'di snyam du sems te/_ji tsam du grong khyer 'od can na/_
[\[10a.3\]]nor bu rnams 'od gsal bar 'dug pa tsam du bdag gi pho brang 'od can 'od gsal bar 'gyur la/_'od mi gsal na ni de 'od kyang zhan par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/_lha rnams kyi 'od byed pa yang nor bu dang 'dra bar zla ba nya ba dang nyi ma yin gyis/_bdag gis dkyil 'khor de gnyis re re nas 
[\[10a.4\]]bsgrib par bya'o/_/de ltar byas pa dang lha rnams kyi 'od med par 'gyur ro snyam ste/_de blo de lta bus gal te nyin par byung na ni des snga ma bzhin du lag pa ya gcig gis ni nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor sgrib par byed do/_/lag pa ya gcig gis ni ri rab kyi zom la nom par byed do/_/de nas 
[\[10a.5\]]lha rnams kyis de'i lag pa mthong nas/_'thab pa'i phyir cha bar byed do/_/de nas de dud 'gror gtogs pa yin pas snying stobs chung la lha rnams kyi lus rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa gzi brjid kyi lus can dag mthong nas de bag tsha ba skyes te/_phyir sa'i 'og tu grong khyer 'od can du 
[\[10a.6\]]'gro bar 'gyur ba 'di na nyi ma dang /_zla ba la gza' 'jug pa dang /_gnam grum pa'i rgyu gnyis pa yin no/_/de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de/_lha ma yin chen po sgra gcan gyi bde ba la rtog par byed de/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags 
[\[10a.7\]]na/_'di ltar de'i grong khyer ni dpag tshad brgyad stong yod la/_ri rab la rten te/_rin po che sna tshogs kyis mdzes par byas pa/_chu klung dang /_lteng ka dang /_skyed mos tshal dang ldan pa/_sa gzhi gser btso mas brgyan pa/_gser gyi khang khyim byi ru'i shing ljon pas mdzes 
[\[10b\]]
[\[10b.1\]]par byas pa dang ldan pa/_dril bu g.yer ka can gyi shing ljon pas sgra bsgrags pa/_sil snyan dang rol mo'i sgra dang /_glu dbyangs kyis rab tu dga' bar byas pa/_mtshe'u gser gyi pad ma dag gis mdzes par byas pa dang ldan pa/_gser gyi ngang mo dang /_zal mo dang /_
[\[10b.2\]]ngur pa rnams kyis mdzes par byas pa de ni 'di lta ste/_lha yul gyi bya lta bu rma bya blta na sdug pa dag dang /_nor bu'i mchu can lta bu dag dang /_dus thams cad du rab tu dga' bzhin du 'dug pa dag dang /_'gros sdug pa dag dang /_rin po che sna bdun gyi lus can dag dang /_
[\[10b.3\]]bai DUr+ya sngon po'i mdog can dag dang /_mthon ka chen po'i mdog can dag dang /_rab tu dga' zhing khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]rtse mo mdzes par byed pa dag dang /_mig mi 'dzums shing char sprin gyi 'brug sgra lta bu'i sgra skad 'byin pa dag dang /_ltad mo che ba dag dang /_bya'o cog 
[\[10b.4\]]dang 'dra bar ston pa dag dang /_mthong na yid dang 'thad pa dag dang /_mig 'gram ring ba sha stag dang /_bya ag ni tsu Da zhes bya ba/_mig zur byed pa mgo gnyis pa la chung ma gnyis dang lhan cig 'grogs pa dag dang /_me tog gi khu bas myos shing /_ba ku la'i me 
[\[10b.5\]]tog bzhin du lhan cig gtams pa dag dang /_skad kyi gdangs brag ca can gser gyi rwa can dag dang /_bai DUr+ya'i rwa can chu la rtse ba dag dang /_dus tshigs su rgyags pa dang /_rtag tu rgyags shing rab tu dga' ba dag dang /_mig gi mdog snum pa sha stag dang /_bya ka ra da 
[\[10b.6\]]zhes bya ba me'i mdog can rnga sgra lta bu'i gdangs dang ldan pa sha stag dang /_bya pu spad ma zhes bya ba mdog 'jam zhing glog gi kha dog can dag dang /_spu sdug spel ma can nags khrod du rgyu ba dag dang /_sal sul dang /_gshang gshong dag na rgyu ba dag dang /_rtag tu rgyags pa 
[\[10b.7\]]sha stag dang /_bya b+h+ring ga ra dza dang /_hu lu kun da dang /_mu lu kun da dang /_spr-ig ka gan d+ha zhes bya ba khang khyim la gnas pa/_mdog 'ja' tshon ltar 'dug pa dag dang /_me tog gi chun po mchog lta bu dag dang /_mgrin pa mdzes pa dag dang /_mgrin pa dmar ba dag 
[\[11a\]]
[\[11a.1\]]dang /_pad ma lta bu dag dang /_'dab ma 'jam pa dag dang /_'dab ma drag tu bskyod pa dang /_'dab ma kha dog dang dbyibs du ma dang ldan pa dag dang /_mchu ring zhing nor bu dang /_gser las grub pa sha stag dang /_khu byug dang /_bya bang lus 
[\[11a.2\]]mkhregs shing mgrin pa mtho la dri ma med cing 'dab ma'i mdog sdug la gnyis shing nam mkha' la lding ba dang /_gnyis shing chu 'thung ba dang /_gnyis shing thang la 'grogs pa dang /_gar byed bzhin du skad 'byin pa dang /_rgyags shing skad 'byin pa sha stag dang /_shing 
[\[11a.3\]]ljon pa ba ku la la gnas pa'i bya'i rigs rnams skyed mos tshal dang /_nags tshal du bcas pa'i grong khyer de kho ra khor yug na gnas shing skad 'byin pa dang /_grong khyer de na mtsho yod pa rnams pad ma'i tshal rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gang la/_nags tshal gyis 'khor cing mdzes par 
[\[11a.4\]]byas so/_/grong khyer de na gser gyi shing ljon pa'i nags tshal bzhi yod de/_grong khyer de'i nags tshal de dag thams cad kyi tshad ni dpag tshad brgya yod do/_/de na nags tshal gcig gi ming ni rtsed mo can zhes bya'o/_/gcig gi ming ni rgyags pa'i kun dga' ra ba zhes bya'o/_/
[\[11a.5\]]gcig gi ming ni ngang pa'i gnas zhes bya'o/_/gcig gi ming ni khu byug gi kun dga' ra ba zhes bya ste/_nags tshal bzhi po de rnams kyis grong khyer de'i kho ra khor yug nas spa bar byas so/_/nags tshal de na shing ljon pa'i rigs sum stong yod de/_shing ljon pa de dag gi nang na 
[\[11a.6\]]gtso bo ni 'di lta ste/_sprin ltar sgrib pa dang /_yal ga mtho la 'jam pa dang /_bya gnas dang /_rtag tu me tog rgyas dang /_dpag tshad gcig tu ngad ldang ba dang /_bung bas gang ba dang /_sbrang rtsi 'dzag dang /_gser mdog can dang /_chang 'dzag dang /_tsan dan sa mchog 
[\[11a.7\]]pa dang /_sprin nag po'i mdog can dang /_lo ma bdun pa dang /_ke ta ka dang /_shing spr-ig ka dang /_ser bu ngad ldang dang /_a ga ru nag po'i mdog can dang /_kun tu mig ldan dang /_sgron shing dang /_nor bu'i ljon shing dang /_me mdog dang /_mya ngan 'tshang sngon po dang /_mya 
[\[11b\]]
[\[11b.1\]]ngan 'tshang dmar po dang /_ba ku la dang /_ardzu na dang /_ni tsu la dang /_sin du ba ra ti dang /_ti la ka dang /_ni pa zhes bya ba rnams te/_kho ra khor yug nas pad ma'i tshal gyis 'khor ba/_me tog rgyas dang /_ma du ka dang /_na li ke ra dang /_pa na sa dang /_chu shing dang /_ku 
[\[11b.2\]]ba 'phyang dang /_byi du ra dang /_sa 'gebs dang /_gnam 'grib dang /_sprin mdog can dang /_mthong dga' dang /_sprin 'khor dang /_bya [{]mangs [,]mang [}]dang /_bung [{]mangs [,]mang [}]dang /_spos phreng ldan dang /_me tog dri zhim dang /_kha dog sna tshogs can dang /_me tog can dang /_dus tshigs 
[\[11b.3\]]kun dga' dang /_dus tshigs so sor dga' dang /_bud med mthong dga' dang /_bud med sbyin dang /_rgun shing dang /_ka pid tha dang /_pa ru Sha ka dang /_kha dog dang rgyan gyis bklubs pa dang /_'od can dang /_chu 'gram skyes dang /_ri mthongs dga' byed dang /_rgyang ring 
[\[11b.4\]]snang dang /_de lta bu la sogs pa kha cig ni 'dzam bu'i gling na skye ba/_kha cig ni byang gi sgra mi snyan na skye ba/_shing ljon pa kha cig ni lha ma yin gyi grong khyer na skye ba dag yod do/_/lha ma yin gyi grong khyer snang ldan de na shing kha cig ni me tog 'ba' zhig gi shing dang /_kha cig ni 
[\[11b.5\]]me tog dang ldan pa'i shing dang /_kha cig ni 'bras bu'i shing dang /_kha cig ni chang 'byung ba'i shing dag yod do/_/lha ma yin gyi dbang po chen po sgra gcan de'i kho ra khor yug nas lha ma yin gyi bu mo dag gis bskor te/_shin tu gar byed cing dgod la ci mdzes su 'chos te/_
[\[11b.6\]]rab tu rtse zhing rab tu dga' bar byed de/_kun nas nyon mongs pa can ring por mi thogs pa/_mi rtag cing mi brtan pa/_mi bde bar 'gyur ba'i bde ba nyams su myong ngo /_/lha ma yin gyi dbang po de la btsun mo bzhi yod de/_gcig gi ming ni yid bzhin mdzes 'gyur zhes 
[\[11b.7\]]bya/_gcig gi ming ni spos kun ldan zhes bya/_gcig gi ming ni nags tshal mdzes zhes bya/_gcig gi ming ni bkra shis ma zhes bya'o/_/de dag gi g.yog mo yang lha ma yin gyi bu mo khrag khrig phrag bcu gnyis yod de/_de'i nang na de'i kho ra khor yug nas bskor te/_
[\[12a\]]
[\[12a.1\]]'dod pa la sems zhen cing 'dug go/_/de'i tshe ngo mtshar rung ba'i bde ba dang /_yul gyi longs spyod gang yin pa de dag gi ming yang shes par sla ba ma yin no/_/de de na lha ma yin bye ba phrag du mas zhabs 'bring byas te/_khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ka ba stong 
[\[12a.2\]]gis mdzes par byas pa/_dngul las byas pa'i khang bzhag gis dkrigs pa de na/_rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod de/_rang gi las kyi 'bras bu la spyod do/_/de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa des/_sgra gcan gyi las dang chos la 
[\[12a.3\]]brtags te/_las gang gis na lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan 'gro ba de lta bur song shig gu/_'di las ci zhig byas na las de'i rnam par smin pas 'bras bu 'di lta bu myong bar 'gyur snyam mo/_/'di la tshigs su bcad pa dag yod de/_rgyu med par ni bde ba dag_/ji ltar 
[\[12a.4\]]byas kyang myong mi 'gyur/_/'bras bu las dang 'brel pa ste/_/'bras bu sa bon rag las bzhin/_/legs byas 'bras bu dge ba ste/_/lha dang mir ni nges par 'gyur/_/nyes byas ngan song gsum du nges/_/lha min 'jig rten ji lta bur/_/shes rab zhan zhing shes 
[\[12a.5\]]rab 'chal/_/dud 'gro'i skye gnas skyes de dag_/ji ltar bde ba myong ba mthong /_/'di la rgyu zhig yod par 'gyur/_/de ltar dge slong mchog tu yid gzhungs pa dang ldan pa des/_thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis brtags na/_de sngon bram ze rig byed dang /_rig byed kyi yan 
[\[12a.6\]]lag dang /_gtam rgyud lhur byed pa/_sbyin pa la mchog tu dga' ba zhig tu gyur nas/_des nags khung gi lam du zhugs pa rnams la yang btung ba dang /_kha zas dang /_'bras bu dang /_rtsa ba dang /_chu dang /_khyim dang /_mal cha dang /_stan gyi sbyin pa dag byin la/_
[\[12a.7\]]sgo bzhin 'khod pa'i dman pa dang /_long ba dang /_bkren pa dang /_sdug phongs pa rnams la yang zas dang /_skom dang /_mal cha dang /_stan mang po dag byin te/_de'i tshe ni yang dag pa'i lta ba dang ldan par gyur to/_de lan cig gcig na dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag 
[\[12b\]]
[\[12b.1\]]khang mi thi la'i tshal zhes bya ba rgyar dpag tshad nyi shu yod la/_mchod rten 'bum phrag du mas brgyan pa/_gser 'bar bas 'khor ba zhig_/rgyal po ni mi zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgyal po lnga brgyas byas pa yod de/_de'i nang na yang mchod rten 'og gi gdan gser las byas 
[\[12b.2\]]pa/_kho ra khor yug nas gser 'bar bas 'khor ba/_rin po che sna bdun gyis mdzes par byas pa/_'bur rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mdzes par byas pa/_sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i tshig sna tshogs kyis mdzes par byas pa zhig yod la/_mchod rten de la yang tshal dang /_
[\[12b.3\]]nags tshal bris pa dag yod de/_snga ma bzhin no/_/de'i tshe na shing ljon pa gang dag sgra gcan gyi gnas su bris pa de dag thams cad 'dzam bu'i gling na yod de/_ri mo mkhan rnams kyis ji ltar mthong ba bzhin du mchod rten de la bris so/_/rdzing bu mang po byas pa gang ba dag 
[\[12b.4\]]kyang yod de snga ma bzhin no/_de lan [(]cigi [,]cig [)]gcig shing rta bzhi stong dang nags khung der song ste/_'gron po nags khung du dong ba rnams kyi phyir zas dang thug pa dang /_chu dag khyer ro/_/de nas re zhig na mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad gnyis yod la/_chu zheng du rgyang grags lnga 
[\[12b.5\]]yod pa der mi sdig can zhig gis gsar du me btang nas me des mchod rten de tshig la thug ste/_bram ze des me shor ba de mthong nas/_de 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag la 'di'i bsod nams kyang mi dgos/_'di thams cad mkhyen pa'i gnas kyang ma yin mod kyi/_'on kyang 
[\[12b.6\]]'di mdzes pa kho na zhig pas mes tshig na mi rung la/_rgyal pos kyang bdag la bka' gyod smrar med par bya'o snyam ste/_des dad cing gus pa med par shing rta de dag gis chu bskyas nas mchod rten de las me bsad de/_'di ltar des ched cher mi 'dzin par rgod bzhin du/_
[\[12b.7\]]gal te 'di las bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa zhig yod na ni/_de rags pa zhig yin grang gis/_de'i rnam par smin pas/_ci nas kyang 'dod pa'i khams na bdag las lus che ba gzhan med pa tsam du gyur cig ces byas te/_dad pa med pa dang /_sems pa med pa dang /_
[\[13a\]]
[\[13a.1\]]rtag tu 'thab par sems pa'i phyir/_las de'i mthus sems pa med pa'i las de'i 'bras bu zhing dam pa'i bsod nams las lha ma yin gyi dbang por skyes par mthong ngo /_/de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa des sgra 
[\[13a.2\]]gcan gyi yul sa gzhan yang ji tsam zhig yod ces des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pa'am/_lha'i mig gis brtags na/_sa gzhi dpag tshad khri sum stong yod de/_gser gyi sa gzhi la tshal dang /_nags tshal dang /_lteng ka dang /_rdzing dang /_bya dang /_shing ljon 
[\[13a.3\]]pa dang /_khyim dang /_grong khyer dang /_gling dang /_lha ma yin gyi bu mos gang ba dang /_nor bu mang po dang ldan pa'i thang bud med gdu bus brgyan pa bzhin du mdzes pa de na lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan dbang byed cing dgra zla med la/_rang dgar byed cing gar dga' bar 'gro ba 
[\[13a.4\]]dang /_lha ma yin gyi dbang po'i yul sa de na lha ma yin rnams kyi yul bcu gsum yod de/_de na lha ma yin rnams gnas so/_/de rnams kyi ming la 'di lta ste/_za ba po rnams dang /_rab tu rgyug pa rnams dang /_nad gtong ba la dga' ba rnams dang /_nor bu'i 
[\[13a.5\]]do shal thogs pa rnams dang /_bung ba ltar 'khyil pa rnams dang /_mig dmar ba rnams dang /_kun tu rgyug pa rnams dang /_chu na gnas pa rnams dang /_nam mkha' la gnas pa rnams dang /_lhun po'i khang na gnas pa rnams dang /_lteng ka sdug gu rnams 
[\[13a.6\]]dang /_nya gdong po rnams dang /_lam chen ldan rnams so/_/de dag gi 'phel 'grib ni gang gi tshe skye dgu rnams dge sbyong du mi 'dzin/_bram zer mi 'dzin pa de'i tshe ni lha'i phyogs ni 'grib par 'gyur la/_lha ma yin gyi phyogs ni 'phel bar 'gyur te/_de'i tshe 
[\[13a.7\]]chos dang mi ldan pa rnams ni ches mthu che la/_lha rnams ni zhan par 'gyur ro/_/gang gi tshe skye dgu rnams dge sbyong du 'dzin cing bram zer 'dzin pa de'i tshe ni/_lha ma yin gyi phyogs ni 'grib par 'gyur la/_lha'i phyogs ni 'phel bar 'gyur te/_lha dang lha ma yin 
[\[13b\]]
[\[13b.1\]]gnyis kyi 'phel 'grib ni de ltar chos dang chos ma yin pa la rag las so/_/de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de sgra gcan gyi yul na gnas pa'i lha ma yin rnams kyi las dang chos la rtog par byed de/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab 
[\[13b.2\]]kyis brtags na/_gang dag gis dud 'gro rnams la srog gi sbyin pa byas te/_nya rnams gson par bya ba'i phyir/_nya ba'i rgya rnams dral ba dang /_gang dag gis rnyed pa 'dod pa'i phyir ram/_grags pa 'dod pa'i phyir ram/_rgyal pos bka' stsal pa'i phyir ram/_
[\[13b.3\]]rigs kyi chos lugs su yod pa'i phyir srog chags legs par bsrungs la/_lhag ma gzhan ni chos ma yin pa thams cad byed pa de dag lus dang bral ba'i 'og tu ngan song log par ltung ba sgra gcan gyi yul du lha ma yin du skye bar 'gyur te/_de dag gi tshe'i tshad kyi khyad par 
[\[13b.4\]]ni mi rnams kyi lo lnga brgya gang yin pa de de dag gi nyin zhag gcig tu rtsi ba de lta bu'i lo lnga stong thub ste/_bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do/_/rab 'bring du 'gyur ba ni sems la rag las so/_/bong tshod dang kha dog dang mtha' yang las dang chos la rag las te/_sems can rnams 
[\[13b.5\]]kyi sems dang mos pa sna tshogs las 'gyur ro//_//'phags pa dam pa'i chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa/_bam po nyer gnyis pa/_de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de/_rgya mtsho'i gting sgra gcan gyi sa gzhi la rtog par 
[\[13b.6\]]byed de/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pa shin tu gsal zhing rnam par dag pas/_sgra gcan gyi sa gzhi'i 'og na sa gzhi gnyis pa yul sa tha dad pa zla ba'i phreng ba zhes bya ba dpag tshad nyi khri chig stong yod pa ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo /_/de na lha ma yin mgul phreng zhes bya 
[\[13b.7\]]ba gnas pa lha ma yin de rnams kyi bdag po mgul phreng zhes bya ba zhig yod de/_sa gzhi de na gnyis shing rtse ba zhes bya ba'i grong khyer dpag tshad brgyad stong pa tshal dang /_nags tshal dang /_lteng ka dang ldan pa pad ma'i rdzing dang /_'bab chu dang /_ri sul dang /_gser gyi ri bo 
[\[14a\]]
[\[14a.1\]]dang /_gser gyi brag dang /_pha bong dang /_bya skyibs dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang /_bya spu sdug gu rnams kyis mdzes par byas pa/_bai DUr+ya'i sa gzhi dang /_gsing ma mdog sdug gus mdzes par byas pa/_bya sna tshogs skad snyan pa 'byin pa lha ma 
[\[14a.2\]]yin gyi tshogs mang po yul gyi skye bo 'byor pas gang ba kun nas rin po che sna bdun mchog tu yid du 'ong bas brgyan pa/_shing ljon pa dag gis snga ma bzhin du mdzes par byas pa/_klu'i me tog dang /_klu'i shing mya ngan 'tshang dang /_shing d+ha ba dang /_seng ldeng dang /_rgya 
[\[14a.3\]]skyegs kyi shing sna tshogs kyis mdzes par byas pa/_de na shing ljon pa'i sna grangs 'di lta bu dag lhag par mang du yod de 'di lta ste/_ni sha dang /_pra ha sa dang /_i ti ni sha dang /_ba gu dad dang /_ni tan ta dang /_me tog ljid dang /_kun tu dga' dang /_me tog rgyas dang /_
[\[14a.4\]]ljid kyis non dang /_lo lnga zhing me tog 'byung ba dang /_bung ba mngon dga' dang /_sgra 'ur 'ur dang /_bya skad ca co can dang /_dkar por snang dang /_lo mas rgyas rnams te/_gnyis shing rtse ba'i grong khyer de na shing ljon pa'i sna grangs de lta bu de dag lhag par mthong ngo /_/grong 
[\[14a.5\]]khyer de yang gser gyi ri rtse bzhi pa'i dbus na 'dug ste/_'di lta ste/_ri'i rtse mo dga' byed dang /_ri'i rtse mo lhang tsher dang /_ri'i rtse mo rtse mi snang dang /_ri'i rtse mo yid 'ong gser zhes bya ba rnams te/_de dag kyang kun nas 'phang du dpag tshad lnga stong yod do/_/de dag gi 
[\[14a.6\]]tshal rnams kyang 'bab chu dang /_chu bo dang /_chu bsil dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi tshogs kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs can rnams kyis mdzes par byas pa/_skyes pa dang /_bud med kyi tshogs rtag tu dga' ba rnams kyis gang ba/_rin po che'i sgo sna tshogs rnams kyis mdzes par byas 
[\[14a.7\]]pa/_tsan dan sa mchog gi shing ljon pa 'dud pa'i rlung ltar rtag tu bsil zhing dri zhim pa rnams kyis nye bar 'tsho ba/_me tog gi rnam pa dag gis rtag tu brgyan pa/_rma bya 'bum phrag du ma sgra snyan pa 'byin pa/_lha ma yin chen pos bskyangs pa/_grang ba dang tsha bas nyams pa 
[\[14b\]]
[\[14b.1\]]med la/_skye bo rab tu dga' bas rtag tu gang ba/_rol mo'i sgra dang /_glu dang /_bro dang /_dgod pas rtag tu dga' ba yin no/_/lha ma yin gyi grong khyer chen po skur phreng de dag gi dbus na mtsho chen po kun nas chu dang zheng du dpag tshad lnga yod pa/_rab tu dang ba/_ro shin tu zhim 
[\[14b.2\]]pa/_'dam rdzab dang /_rnyog pa med pa/_chu rtag pa/_zla ba gnyis pa ltar rab tu gsal ba yin no/_/skar phreng gi dbus na mtsho yod pa gang yin pa de ni kun mthong zhes bya la/_de'i mthu ni 'di lta bu yin te/_gang gi tshe lha ma yin g.yul 'gyed par byed pa de'i tshe lha ma yin 
[\[14b.3\]]mgul phreng dag mtsho kun mthong der 'gro bar byed do/_/de dag mtshon cha dang /_go mtshon sna tshogs thogs nas g.yul 'gyed pa'i ltas blta ba'i phyir mtsho de yongs su bskor nas 'khod do/_/de dag gi gzugs brnyan de dag ji ltar me long g.ya' med pa'i nang na/_gzugs 
[\[14b.4\]]brnyan snang ba de ltar mtsho de'i nang na snang ngo /_/de dag lha dang lha ma yin gyi g.yul du gal te pham par gyur na/_mtsho de'i nang du rang rang gi gzugs brnyan de dag 'bros par snang ngo /_/gang dag lha dang lha ma yin gyi g.yul 'gyed pa der 'chi bar 'gyur na ni rang rang gi gzugs brnyan 
[\[14b.5\]]mtsho de'i nang na 'chi bar snang ngo /_/lha ma yin rnams kyi bdag po mgul phreng zhes bya ba gang yin pa de dang lha ma yin gyi dbang po lha ma yin gyi grong khyer 'dod pa'i klung zhes bya ba na 'dug pa gang yin pa de 'bros pa dang /_nges par 'chi bar 'gyur ba de ltar mtsho de'i nang du mthong ngo /_/
[\[14b.6\]]de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_gang gis bdag cag kun mthong gi mtsho'i nang du lha rnams las pham zhing nyams par 'gyur ba mthong ba'i rgyu gang yin rkyen gang yin snyam byed do/_/de nas yang de rnams grong khyer de dag tu dong ste/_lo brgya lon nam/_lo lnga brgya lon nam/_de 
[\[14b.7\]]ltar lo bcu lon nam/_de nas yang mtsho kun mthong ga la bar lha ma yin mgul phreng dang /_lha ma yin gyi dbang po brtan pa dang lhan cig dong ste/_de ltar mtshon cha dang /_go mtshon sna tshogs thogs pa/_cha byad dang /_me tog phreng dang /_phye ma dang /_byug pas lus bskus 
[\[15a\]]
[\[15a.1\]]pa de dag mtsho kun mthong de yongs su bskor nas 'khod do/_/de nas yang mtsho yongs su bskor ba de dag nyid kyis mtsho de'i nang du 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi mar 'dzin pa dang /_phar 'dzin pa dang /_dge sbyong du 'dzin pa dang /_chos dang ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su 
[\[15a.2\]]'jug pa/_lha dang 'thun par sgrub pa de dag shi nas lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ba mthong ngo /_/de nas mtsho de'i nang du lha'i phyogs ni rgyal bar 'gyur/_lha ma yin gyi phyogs ni pham par 'gyur ba mthong ba dang /_lha ma yin mgul phreng zhes bya ba dang /_lha ma yin gyi 
[\[15a.3\]]dbang po brtan pa zhes bya ba de dag 'di snyam sems te/_kye ma lha rnams ni mi la rag las/_mi'i kha na las/_mi la rten pa yin te/_bdag cag gis gang mi rnams la mi phan pa dang /_mi bde bar bya ba'i phyir 'bad pa dang /_de dag nyams pas lha rnams kyang thub par 'gyur ro snyam 
[\[15a.4\]]du de ltar bsams nas/_lha ma yin mgul phreng dang /_lha ma yin gyi dbang po brtan pa dag sems par byed de/_'di ltar mi rnams ni kha zas la rag las shing rten pa yin te/_mi de rnams kyi kha zas chud gsan pa la 'bad par bya'o snyam nas/_de dag gis de ltar shes nas rgya 
[\[15a.5\]]mtsho'i nang na klu chos dang mi ldan pa khro ba'i shas che ba/_rtag tu gnod pa'i bsam pa can 'khod pa gang yin pa de dag la smra bar byed de/_'di lta ste/_klu'i rgyal po rab 'joms dang /_klu'i rgyal po nag po dang /_klu'i rgyal po bsgyings pa dang /_klu'i rgyal po hu lu hu lu ste/_de 
[\[15a.6\]]dag la sogs pa chos dang mi ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su mi 'jug pa rnams la/_lha ma yin mgul phreng dag na re/_'di ltar khyed cag la rag las pa'i mi de dag ni lha'i phyogs yin la/_de dag gi srog kyang kha zas kyis 'tsho'o/_/khyed cag la rag las pa kha zas kyis 'tsho ba'i 
[\[15a.7\]]mi de dag ji ltar med par 'gyur ba de ltar gyis shig_/gang gi phyir 'di ltar khyed cag dang /_klu'i rgyal po nor rgyas dang /_'jog po la sogs pa shin tu dgrar gyur pa ltar bdag cag dang lha rnams kyang de lta bu yin te/_khyed cag gis bdag cag gi grogs bya ba de ni 
[\[15b\]]
[\[15b.1\]]rigs pa yin no zhes smras so/_/de nas lha ma yin mgul phreng dang /_lha ma yin gyi dbang po brtan pa dag gi tshig thos nas chos dang mi ldan pa'i klu rnams kyis bdag cag dang khyed cag phyogs 'thun pa yin te/_de ltar bya'o zhes smras nas de dag ni rang gi gnas su 
[\[15b.2\]]dong ngo /_/klu'i rgyal po khro bas gdungs pa rnams kyang gnas su dong nas/_gal te chu dpag tshad brgyar g.yo bar byed de/_gal te dpag tshad nyis brgyar/_gal te dpag tshad sum brgyar g.yo bar byed do/_/chu'i steng na ni sa 'dug ste/_gang gi tshe klu sdang ba rnams kyis 
[\[15b.3\]]chu g.yo bar byed pa de'i tshe chu g.yos pas sa g.yo bar byed la/_phyogs de'i chu'i tshad ji tsam du g.yo bar byed pa de tsam du sa g.yo bar byed de/_klu sdang ba khro bas gdungs pa rnams kyi mthu ni de lta bu yin no/_/de dag bram ze rtog ge pa bstan bcos ngan pas bslus pa rnams 
[\[15b.4\]]kyis tshor nas 'di ltar lo legs par 'gyur ro/_/lo nyes par 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po la rung bar 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po la mi rung bar 'gyur ro/_/mtshon gyis 'khrug par 'gyur ro/_/mtshon gyis 'khrug pa med par 'gyur ro/_/char legs par 'bab par 'gyur 
[\[15b.5\]]ro/_/char legs par 'babs par mi 'gyur ro/_/ba lang dang bram ze 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/ba lang dang bram ze 'grib par 'gyur ro zhes de ltar mi rtog ge pa dag mngon par rjod par byed de de ltar sa g.yo bar 'gyur ro/_/yang rgyu gzhan gyis sa g.yo bar byed pa la de ltar 
[\[15b.6\]]dge slong de thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas rtog par byed de/_sems can rnams kyi dge ba dang mi dge ba'i dbang gis rlung sa 'dzin zhes bya ba g.yo bar byed do/_/de g.yos pas chu g.yo bar byed de/_chu g.yos pas kyang sa g.yo bar byed de/_dpag tshad lnga brgya'am/_dpag 
[\[15b.7\]]tshad brgya'am/_dpag tshad nyis brgya'am/_dpag tshad sum brgya'am/_dpag tshad bzhi brgya'am/_de ltar tshad ji tsam du rlung g.yo bar byed pa'i tshad de tsam du chu g.yo bar byed la/_chu g.yo ba'i tshad kyis sa g.yo bar byed do/_/de la gang rlung dag g.yo ba na chu g.yo bar byed/_
[\[16a\]]
[\[16a.1\]]chu g.yos pas sa g.yo bar byed pa'i rgyu ni gang rkyen ni gang gzhi ni gang yin snyam nas/_dge slong des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pa'am/_lha'i mig gis brtags na/_rlung gis chu 'dzin la/_chu la sa brten te/_rlung de dag g.yos na chu g.yo bar 
[\[16a.2\]]'gyur/_de dag g.yos pas sa g.yo bar 'gyur ro snyam nas de ltar rgyu des na sa g.yo bar 'gyur ro/_/sa g.yo ba de yang dge slong des rnam pa gnyis su mthong ste/_gal te dge ba'i las kyi dbang gis g.yo na ni de dge bar 'gyur te/_sems can rnams kyi bde ba dang lo 
[\[16a.3\]]legs pa yin no/_/gal te mi dge ba'i dbang gis g.yo na ni las kyi mtha' spyad cing gang byas pa'i sems can rnams kyi de mi dge bar 'gyur ro/_/dge ba dang mi dge ba la rag las pa thams cad ni rgyu med pa ma yin/_'dod rgyal las byung ba ma yin/_byed pa pos gnas 
[\[16a.4\]]su byas pa ma yin te/_rgyu dang 'thun par 'bras bu 'byung ngo /_/'bras bu mngon par mi shes pa'i rtog ge pa dag na re/_'di ltar dbang po'i phyogs dag sa g.yo'o/_/rlung gi phyogs dag sa g.yo'o/_/chu lha'i phyogs dag sa g.yo ste/_lo legs par 'gyur ro/_/lo 
[\[16a.5\]]nyes par 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po la rung bar 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po la mi rung bar 'gyur ro/_/char legs par 'bab par 'gyur ro/_/char legs par 'bab par mi 'gyur ro/_/mtshon gyis 'khrug par 'gyur ro/_/mtshon gyis 'khrug pa med par 'gyur ro/_/ba lang dang bram 
[\[16a.6\]]ze 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/ba lang dang bram ze 'grib par 'gyur ro zhes de ltar rtog ge pa dag rtog par byed do/_/de yang gcig cig yin te/_gal te 'dod rgyal ba brgya snyed yod pa de dag gi nang na 'di ltar 'du shes pa 'di kho na nyid gcig yin no zhes de dag rjod par byed do/_/de 
[\[16a.7\]]nas gzhan yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de lha ma yin mgul phreng dang /_lha ma yin gyi dbang po brtan pa dang /_klu'i rgyal po chos dang mi ldan pa rab 'joms la sogs pa 'jig rten la phan par mi byed pa shes nas/_gnyen po chos dang ldan 
[\[16b\]]
[\[16b.1\]]pa la rjes su sems par byed de/_kye ma klu sdang ba de dag dang lha ma yin sdig can 'jig rten la mi phan par byed pa de dag ji ltar pham par 'gyur snyam nas des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/_'di ltar gal te 'dzam bu'i gling du chos dang ldan 
[\[16b.2\]]zhing chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i mi dge sbyong du 'dzin pa dang /_bram zer 'dzin pa dang /_rigs kyi rgan rabs la gus par byed pa'i rgyal po dang blon po chen po 'byung na/_sa bla'i gnod sbyin de dag mthu che bar 'gyur te/_de dag gi klu dang /_lha ma yin sdig can sa'i 
[\[16b.3\]]'og na gnas pa de dag g.yos par mthong nas chos dang ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i sa bla'i gnod sbyin de dag gis bar snang la rgyu ba'i gnod sbyin rnams dang /_klu'i rgyal po 'jog po dang /_nor rgyas kyi bu la sogs pa la yang snga ma bzhin bsnyad do/_/de nas 
[\[16b.4\]]sa bla'i gnod sbyin de dag las thos nas bar snang la spyod pa'i gnod sbyin rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che bar 'gyur te/_rgyal chen bzhi'i lha kun tu rgyu ba rnams la sbran pa'i phyir khro ba'i shugs kyis kha rlangs dag par snang la 'byung zhing 'ong la/_'di ltar lha dag klu sdang ba rnams 
[\[16b.5\]]dang /_lha ma yin sdig can rnams mi chos dang ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa rnams ma rung bar bya ba'i phyir 'jug par byed do zhes bsnyad do/_/gnod sbyin gyi kha rlangs byung ba de rtog ge pa bstan bcos ngan pa la sems rnam par rmongs pa dag gis mthong nas/_'di ltar 
[\[16b.6\]]gshin rje'i bu brgya rtsa gcig gi nang na gshin rje'i bu du ba mjug [{]rings [,]ring [}]'byung ngo zhes brjod de/_gnod sbyin mthu rab tu chen po brgya rtsa gcig gyen du 'gro ba snang ba dang mi snang ba gang yin pa de dag la rtog ge pa dag na re 'di ltar 'di ni gshin rje'i bu brgya rtsa gcig gi nang na mjug 
[\[16b.7\]{]rings [,]ring [}]'byung ngo zhes gzhan du yongs su rtog cing lo legs par 'gyur ro/_/lo nyes par 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po la rung bar 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po la mi rung bar 'gyur ro/_/mtshon gyis 'khrug par 'gyur ro/_/mtshon gyis 'khrug pa med par 'gyur ro/_/ba lang dang bram ze 
[\[17a\]]
[\[17a.1\]]'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/ba lang dang bram ze 'grib par 'gyur ro/_/char legs par 'bab par 'gyur ro/_/char legs par 'bab par mi 'gyur ro/_/yul mi che ge mo zhig la gnod par 'gyur ro/_/yul gyi mi che ge mo zhig la gnod par mi 'gyur ro zhes 
[\[17a.2\]]de dag la log par rtog par byed pa mthong ngo /_/de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de/_klu rnams dang /_lha ma yin sdig can g.yos pa rnams la rtog par byed de/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas 'di ltar gnod sbyin rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu 
[\[17a.3\]]che ba rnams lha kun tu rgyu ba rnams la sgrogs par byed pa sngar bstan pa ji lta ba bzhin mthong ste/_kun tu rgyu ba rgyal chen bzhi pa de rnams kyis kyang 'di ltar lha ma yin gyi phyogs ni 'grib bo/_/bdag cag gi lha'i phyogs kyi stobs ni rab tu che'o/_/'dzam bu'i gling na chos dang ldan 
[\[17a.4\]]zhing chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i mi mar 'dzin pa dang /_phar 'dzin pa dang /_dge sbyong du 'dzin pa dang /_bram zer 'dzin pa dang /_sdom pa blangs pa dang /_rigs kyi rgan rabs la gus par byed pa dag yod pas klu sdang ba dang /_lha ma yin sdig can rnams las bdag cag 
[\[17a.5\]]rgyal bar 'gyur gyis ma 'jigs shig ma 'jigs shig ces sgrogs par byed do/_/gnod sbyin rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba de dag lha kun tu rgyu ba de dag la tshig de thos nas/_lha ma yin du gtogs pa la shin tu khro yang khro la rab tu dga' ba rnams klu'i rgyal po chos dang ldan zhing 
[\[17a.6\]]chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa 'jog po dang /_nor rgyas kyi bu la sogs pa la de dag thams cad snga ma bzhin du bsnyad do/_/lus thams cad rab tu 'bar ba dag gal te nyin par 'ong na de'i tshe nyi ma'i 'od zer rnams zil gyis mnan nas mi mngon no/_/de nas lus thams cad rab tu 
[\[17a.7\]]'bar ba dag klu chos dang ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa rnams la sbran pa'i phyir mtshan mo rgya mtsho'i nang du 'ong na de dag thams cad skye bo kun gyis mthong bar 'gyur la/_de mthong nas rtog ge pa rnams skar mda' ltung bar sems te/_'di ltar skar mda' ltung bas lo legs par 
[\[17b\]]
[\[17b.1\]]'gyur ro/_/lo nyes par 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po la rung bar 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po la mi rung bar 'gyur ro/_/mtshon gyis 'khrug par 'gyur ro/_/mtshon gyis 'khrug pa med par 'gyur ro/_/mi ngas 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/mi ngas 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/ba lang 
[\[17b.2\]]dang bram ze dag 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/ba lang dang bram ze dag 'grib par 'gyur ro zhes de ltar las mngon par mi shes pa dag 'thun par yongs su rtog par byed do/_/de nas yang dge slong de skar mda' ltung ba la rtog par byed de/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas rgyu 
[\[17b.3\]]gzhan gyis skar mda' ltung ba ji ltar ltung ba mthong ste/_lha rnams kyi gzhal med khang mgyogs par nam mkha' la 'gro la/_gzhal med khang phan tshun 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag 'drud pa las me 'byung ba gang yin pa de dag la rtog ge pa dag na re/_'di ltar skar mda' 
[\[17b.4\]]rab tu ltung ba las lo legs par 'gyur ro/_/lo nyes par 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po la rung bar 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po la mi rung bar 'gyur ro/_/bde bar 'gyur ro/_/mi bde bar 'gyur ro/_/ba lang dang bram ze 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/ba lang dang bram ze 'grib par 'gyur ro 
[\[17b.5\]]zhes de ltar rtog ge pa las kyi 'bras bu mngon par mi shes pa dag 'jig rten pa'i mtshan ma'i ltas ston par byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ltar las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa phra mo so sor shes pa gang yin pa ni lha dang bcas pa dang /_bdud dang bcas pa dang /_
[\[17b.6\]]tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang /_dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin rnams kyi nang na de med de/_'di ltar bdag cag gi chos 'dul ba la sems pa ni dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gtso bor byed pa yin no/_/de nas yang dge slong 
[\[17b.7\]]las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de so sor rtog par byed de/_kye ma bar snang la rgyu ba'i gnod sbyin mthu bo che rnams kun tu rgyu ba'i lha rnams kyi drung dang /_rgya mtsho na gnas pa'i klu chos dang ldan pa rnams kyi drung du ji ltar 'gro snyam nas/_des thos pa las byung ba'i 
[\[18a\]]
[\[18a.1\]]shes pas brtags na/_bar snang la rgyu ba'i gnod sbyin rab tu 'bar ba rnams rgya mtshor zhugs te/_klu'i rgyal po chos dang ldan pa nor rgyas kyi bu dang /_'jog po la sogs pa la 'di ltar lha ma yin mgul phreng dang /_lha ma yin gyi dbang po brtan 
[\[18a.2\]]pa de dag mtsho kun mthong du bdag nyid la lta bar byed do zhes snga ma bzhin bar snang la rgyu ba'i gnod sbyin rnams la thos nas klu'i rgyal po longs spyod ldan la gnas pa nor rgyas kyi bu dang /_'jog po la sogs pas bar snang la rgyu ba'i klu rnams la 'di ltar bdag gis chos dang 
[\[18a.3\]]mi ldan pa'i klu de dag mthus phyir bzlog cing bskrad de/_chad pas kyang bcad nas/_'dzam bu'i gling na chos dang ldan pa rnams kyi lo legs par bya ba dang /_char dbab pa dang /_rlung gis gnod pa med par bya ba dang /_'dzam bu'i gling du 'bras sA lu dang /_nas dang /_
[\[18a.4\]]bza' ba dag 'byung bar bya ba dang /_chos dang ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i mi rnams kyi grogs bya'o zhes bsnyad do/_/klu de dag la de skad bsnyad nas sa bla'i gnod sbyin rnams klu chos dang mi ldan pa dag ga la ba der g.yul 'gyed pa'i phyir dong ste/_klu'i rgyal po rab 'joms 
[\[18a.5\]]dang /_klu'i rgyal po bsgyings pa la sogs pa la/_'di ltar khyed ni chos dang mi ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su mi 'jug pa yin la/_nged ni chos dang ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa yin te/_de ltar khyed cag dang nged cag mi 'thun par gyur cing 'gran zlar gyur pas nged cag ni 
[\[18a.6\]]khyed cag la brdeg pa'i phyir 'dir 'ongs so zhes smras so/_/de thos nas klu'i rgyal po rab 'joms dang /_bsgyings pa la sogs pa de dag g.yul 'gyed du lhags te de dag phan tshun glog gi char mang po byung ba na/_de gang gi tshe mar 'dzin pa dang /_phar 'dzin pa dang /_dge 
[\[18a.7\]]sbyong du 'dzin pa dang /_bram zer 'dzin pa'i skye dgu 'byung ba de'i tshe/_klu'i rgyal po nor rgyas kyi bu dang /_'jog po la sogs pa rgyal bar 'gyur la/_klu'i rgyal po rab 'joms la sogs pa pham par 'gyur te/_de ltar 'dzam bu'i gling du char legs par 'bab par 'gyur 
[\[18b\]]
[\[18b.1\]]zhing des na lo legs par 'gyur ro/_/de'i tshe rtog ge pa dag na re 'di ni rgyu skar gyi yon tan yin no/_/'di ni gza'i yon tan yin no/_/'di ni ltas kyi yon tan yin no zhes brjod de char legs par 'bab pa gang dus dus su 'bab pas char dus dang 'thun par rab tu 'bab ste/_ba lang 
[\[18b.2\]]dang bram ze dag kyang de'i 'bras bu yin gyi gzhan gyi ni ma yin no zhe'o/_/gang gi tshe mar mi 'dzin pa dang /_phar mi 'dzin pa dang /_dge sbyong du mi 'dzin pa dang /_bram zer mi 'dzin pa dang /_chos dang mi ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su mi 'jug pa'i skye dgu dag 'byung ba de'i tshe/_klu'i rgyal po 
[\[18b.3\]]chos dang ldan pa nor rgyas kyi bu la sogs pa pham par 'gyur la/_klu'i rgyal po rab 'joms dang /_klu'i rgyal po bsgyings pa la sogs pa rgyal bar 'gyur te/_lo nyes 'byung bar byed/_char 'bab mi mkhas par byed/_char drag rnams kyis lo tog ma rung bar byed/_than pa 
[\[18b.4\]]'byung bar byed pa dang /_bram ze rtog ge pa dag gzhan du sgyur bar byed de/_'di ltar 'di ni rgyu skar gyi nyes pa yin no/_/'di ni gza'i nyes pa yin no/_/'di ni dus kyi nyes pa yin no/_/'di ni ltas kyi nyes pa yin no zhes de ltar rtog ge pa las kyi 'bras bu mngon par mi shes pa dag 
[\[18b.5\]]'di ltar gzhan du sgyur yang de kho na ni mi mthong ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni nga'i nyan thos sam/_nga'i chos 'dul ba 'di thos nas las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa so sor shes pa gtso bor byed pa'am/_'bras bu so sor shes pa ma gtogs par lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig 
[\[18b.6\]]rten dang /_tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang /_dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang /_lha dang mi dang lha ma yin rnams kyi yul gyi 'jug pa ma yin te/_gzhan ma yin par mthong ngo /_/de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de lha ma yin gyi 
[\[18b.7\]]sa la rtog par byed de/_gang gi tshe gang du klu chos dang mi ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su mi 'jug pa rnams klu chos dang ldan pa rnams kyis pham par byas pa de'i tshe/_lha ma yin mgul phreng dag gis shes par 'gyur te/_lha ma yin mgul phreng dag dang /_lha ma yin skar phreng gi grong 
[\[19a\]]
[\[19a.1\]]khyer na gnas pa dang /_gzhan tshal dang nags tshal na gnas pa de dag thams cad yi mug cing byin nyams la bzhin ngo tsha nas khyim du phyir lhags te/_kye e ma lha ma yin bdag cag rnams kyis lha rnams thub par ma nus la byin nyams so/_/gang gi tshe 
[\[19a.2\]]bdag cag gis lha rnams pham par byed nus zhig gu zhes de skad smras nas/_lha ma yin mgul phreng dag gis sgra gcan la/_lha ma yin gyi dbang po 'di ltar slad kyis yun mi ring bar bdag cag gis lha rnams pham par bgyid par rngo thogs kyis nan tan mdzad du gsol zhes smras pa dang /_
[\[19a.3\]]de skad thos nas/_lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan gyis lha ma yin mgul phreng dang /_lha ma yin gyi dbang po brtan pa dag la 'di ltar ngas yun mi ring bar lha dag dbang po dang bcas te/_thub par bya yis snying las chung ngur 'khod cig ces smras so/_/sgra gcan las lha ma yin 
[\[19a.4\]]mgul phreng dag gis de skad thos nas/_de nas yid rab tu dga' ste/_rang gi gnas su zhugs so/_/de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa des lha ma yin gyi grong khyer skar phreng zhes bya ba la brtags nas/_phyi rol la yang so sor rtog par byed de/_mgul 
[\[19a.5\]]phreng zhes bya ba dag gis gzhan phyi rol gyi tshal dang /_nags tshal rnam pa du yod snyam nas/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/_lha ma yin mgul phreng zhes bya ba dag gi tshal dang /_bya rnams dang /_nags tshal dang /_nye ba'i tshal dang /_lteng ka dang /_'bab 
[\[19a.6\]]chu'i dngo dang /_pad ma'i rdzing rnams kyis dpag tshad khri phrag sum stong du gang ba/_bya ngang pa dang /_kA raN+Da ba dang /_ngur pa dag gis mdzes par byas shing nye bar brgyan la kun tu sdug par byas pa/_kun nas nyams dga' ba/_spro zhing rab tu dga' la/_rtag tu mang ba ji ltar 
[\[19a.7\]]'dug pa mthong ste/_de na tshal chen po bdun yod pa la 'di lta ste/_gser gyi 'og phag sprin dang /_rtag tu nyams dga' dang /_skyed mos tshal dga' dang /_'bras bu rtag tu mdzes dang /_rlung bde dang /_tin di kun dga' dang /_spras pa ste/_de dag ni lha ma yin mgul phreng 
[\[19b\]]
[\[19b.1\]]dag gi skye bo gnas pa'i tshal chen po dag yin no/_/sa de dag kyang lha ma yin rtag tu dga' ba rnams kyis gang ba yin te/_lha ma yin las kyi 'bras bu la spyod pa rnams gnas par mthong ngo /_/de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de lha ma yin mgul phreng 
[\[19b.2\]]dag gi las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa la rtog par byed de/_mgul phreng dag las gang gis der skye bar 'gyur snyam nas/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/_phyi rol pa gang gis gtan pa dang bcas pa/_sdig pa dang bcas pa/_skyon dang bcas pas mchod sbyin byas 
[\[19b.3\]]shing bza' ba dang /_bca' ba rab tu mang po dag bshams nas/_tshul khrims dang ldan pa la ma byin/_sems kyis ma bsgoms pa'i sbyin pa ngan pa sbyin pa de byin pa de ni lus dang bral nas ngan 'gro log par ltung ba dud 'gro'i 'gro ba lha ma yin mgul phreng rnams kyi nang du skye bar 
[\[19b.4\]]'gyur la/_sbyin pa tha ma dang /_'bring dang /_mchog rnams kyis bde ba tha ma dang /_'bring dang /_mchog myong bar 'gyur te/_rgyu dang 'thun par 'bras bu 'byung bar 'gyur ba mthong ngo /_/de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de lha ma yin gyi dbang po 
[\[19b.5\]]brtan pa'i las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa la rtog par byed de/_las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa gang gis brtan pa dag lha ma yin rnams kyi rgyal srid byed snyam nas des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/_'di ltar mir gyur pa/_rkun ma gzhan gyi nor rdzas 
[\[19b.6\]]kyis 'tsho ba/_sems pa dang bral ba'i sems kyis phyi rol pa'i 'dod chags dang bral ba gcig la zas kyis tshim par byin pa'i las des lha ma yin rnams kyi rgyal srid byed pa mthong ngo /_/de nas yang dge slong de lha ma yin mgul phreng zhes bya ba'i tshe la rtog par byed de/_lha ma yin 
[\[19b.7\]]mgul phreng gi tshe'i tshad ji srid du thub snyam nas/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pa'am/_lha'i mig gis brtags na/_mi rnams kyi lo drug brgya gang yin pa de dag ni lha ma yin mgul phreng rnams kyis nyin zhag gcig la grangs brtsis pa de'i lo drug stong thub ste/_dus ma yin par 
[\[20a\]]
[\[20a.1\]]'chi ba ni yod do/_/legs par byas pa dang /_nyes par byas pa'i las kyi 'bras bu ni las thams cad la rag las pa yin no/_/des dud 'gro'i 'gro bar bsdus pa lha ma yin gnyis pa dag gi sa la brtags na/_chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas so/_/
[\[20a.2\]]sems can 'khor bar gtogs pa thams cad ni chos la rten pa/_chos kyi 'gro ba chos skyob pa yin te/_legs par byas pas lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du skye la/_nyes par byas pas sems can dmyal ba dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_dud 'gro rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[20a.3\]]de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de rtog par byed de/_ji ltar na lha kun tu rgyu ba rnams gnod sbyin rdzu 'phrul chen po rnams las thos nas/_ci zhig byed cig gu snyam nas/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/_'di ltar lha kun tu 
[\[20a.4\]]rgyu ba rnams rgyal chen bzhi dang lha phreng thogs rnams la 'di ltar lha ma yin chos dang mi ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su mi 'jug pa rnams kyis klu rnams la 'di ltar chos dang ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i mi rgyu gang gis 'chi ba'i dus byas nas/_lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ba 
[\[20a.5\]]rnams la bar chad bya bar 'bod cig_/de dag sbyin pa dang /_tshul khrims dang /_shes pa thams cad kyang kha zas la rag las pa yin la/_de dag kyang kha zas la rten pa yin pas/_'dzam bu'i gling du khyed deng la/_lo tog thams cad dbrog pa dang /_'bru thams cad 
[\[20a.6\]]ma rung bar bya ba'i char phob shig ces rab tu gzengs stod par byed pa de dag bdag cag la bsnyad do/_/chos dang ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa bar snang la rgyu ba'i gnod sbyin gang yin pa de rnams kyis kyang de dag bdag cag la bsnyad la/_bdag cag gis kyang khyed cag la 
[\[20a.7\]]bsnyad pa lags so/_/khyed cag gis kyang nye ba na gnas pa'i lha gang yod pa de dag la bsnyad cing /_lag na yol go thogs pa rnams kyis kyang pi bang can gsum pa rnams la/_pi bang can gsum pa rnams kyis kyang rtag tu myos pa rnams la bsnyad de/_de ltar rgyal chen 
[\[20b\]]
[\[20b.1\]]bzhi pa rnams kyis chos dang mi 'thun pa 'di rgya cher bsnyad do/_/so so'i bye brag ji lta bu yin pa rgyal chen bzhi pa de rnams kyis kyang grong khyer chen po blta na sdug na lha'i 'dun sa chos bzang dag gi 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga 'byor par gyur pa'i lha rnams kyi dbang po kau shi ka la snga ma bzhin rgya 
[\[20b.2\]]cher bsnyad do/_/de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po kau shi kas 'jig rten skyong ba rnams la bsgo ba/_'jig rten skyong ba dag 'dzam bu'i gling na ci sangs rgyas dkon mchog la dad dam/_chos dkon mchog la dad dam/_dge 'dun dkon mchog la dad dam/_dge sbyong du 'dzin tam/_
[\[20b.3\]]bram zer 'dzin tam/_byas pa gzo'am/_byas pa la phan 'dogs sam/_drang ba yin nam/_drang ba'i rang bzhin can yin nam/_mar 'dzin tam/_phar 'dzin tam/_rigs kyi rgan rabs la gus par byed dam/_tshes grangs kyi smyung ba la nye bar gnas sam/_g.yo thabs dang 
[\[20b.4\]]tshul 'chos pa la ma chags sam/_gzhal lugs la g.yo byed cing mi slu'am/_phan tshun gnod pa dag byed dam mi byed/_'dzam bu'i gling du deng la rtogs shig ces bsgo ba dang /_lha de ltar 'tshal lo zhes smras nas/_'jig rten skyong ba dag mi rnams la phan par bya ba'i 
[\[20b.5\]]phyir 'dzam bu'i gling ga la ba der dong ste/_yul nas yul/_ljongs nas ljongs/_grong rdal nas grong rdal/_grong nas grong /_grong khyer nas grong khyer/_tshong rdal nas tshong rdal du de dag rtog par byed de/_'dzam bu'i gling na chos dang ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i mi dag gang 
[\[20b.6\]]gnas pa 'dzam bu'i gling 'di thams cad la snga ma bzhin so sor rtog par byed do/_/'jig rten skyong ba bzhi po de dag gal te/_chos dang ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i skye dgu dag mthong na de ltar rgya mtsho'i nang du zhugs nas longs spyod ldan na gnas pa'i klu nor rgyas kyi bu dang /_
[\[20b.7\]]'jog po la sogs pa la klu dag ma 'jigs shig_/grogs po dag ma 'jigs shig_/dam pa'i chos kyi phyogs ni 'phel lo/_/bdud kyi phyogs ni 'grib bo/_/mun nag mi gsal ba'i phyogs ni sel lo/_/bdud kyi phyogs ni srabs so/_/chos dang ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su 
[\[21a\]]
[\[21a.1\]]'jug pa'i lha dang mi dang klu rnams rab tu dga'o/_/chos kyi rnga ni kun tu brdungs so/_/chos kyi dbyangs rab tu len du bcug ste/_lha'i phyogs ni 'phel lo/_/bdud kyi phyogs ni 'grib bo/_/klu dang lha ma yin chos dang mi ldan pa rnams ni 'grib cing 'dug go 
[\[21a.2\]]zhes bsnyad do/_/de thos nas klu nor rgyas kyi bu dang /_'jog po la sogs pa dga' bar gyur pa rnams kyis 'jig rten skyong ba mgu ba dag la 'di skad ces lha dag bdag cag rab tu dga' ste/_bdag cag dang mi'i 'jig rten na mi rnams la klu dang lha ma yin chos dang mi ldan pa rnams 
[\[21a.3\]]kyis bar chad bya bar mi nus te/_rab tu dga' zhing mchis so zhes de skad lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la gsol cig ces smras pa dang /_de skad thos nas klu rnams kyi drung nas/_'jig rten skyong ba dag lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin ga la ba der dong ste/_snga ma bzhin de skad 
[\[21a.4\]]bsnyad pa dang /_de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin yid rab tu dga' nas/_/'di ltar tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_thub pa de nyid gzigs pa yis/_/khyed la lam btod 'di gsungs la/_/mi gang rab tu gnas pa ni/_/lha yi 'dun sar 'gro bar 'gyur/_/sems can 
[\[21a.5\]]rnams la bden dang de bzhin du/_/sbyin dang byams pa srung zhing tshig snyan smra/_/yang dag lta dang dri ma bral ba'i yid/_/sangs rgyas kyis ni mtho ris lam du gsungs/_/dkar po'i chos dang yang dag ldan/_/dkar po'i chos la rten pa rnams/_/snang las snang ba'i me tog dang /_/sgron 
[\[21a.6\]]las sgron ma gzhan 'byung ltar/_/snang las snang ba'i mchog 'byung zhing /_/bde las shin tu bde bar 'gro/_/de bas skyes bu sgron ma mchog_/ngam grog tu ni ltung mi 'gyur/_/rtag tu nor bu dri med ltar/_/rtag tu gang zhig sems dag pa/_/de ni zhi ste nga med brtan/_/lha rnams kyi ni 
[\[21a.7\]]nang du 'gro/_/bsam gtan tshul khrims ting 'dzin dag_/gang gi sems la shin tu bsgoms/_/brtan po de ni gser 'dra ste/_/lha rnams kyi ni nang du 'gro/_/srog gcod pa dag spangs pa dang /_/sems can kun la snying rje mchog_/brtse ldan drang po zhi ba dag_/lha rnams kyi ni nang du 'gro/_/
[\[21b\]]
[\[21b.1\]]'jig rten kun la tshig 'jam zhing /_/zhe sdang las ni rnam spangs la/_/sdig pa'i chos kyis ma gos pa/_/lha rnams kyi ni nang du 'gro/_/gang la rtswa dang gser mnyam zhing /_/gang gis 'dod pa dug lta bu/_/'dod pa spangs pa'i brtan po de/_/lha rnams kyi ni nang du 'gro/_/'dod 
[\[21b.2\]]chags rgyu ste yid 'ong ba'i/_/yul gyis ma drangs gang yin pa/_/de ni 'jigs pa'i dgon las rgal/_/lha rnams kyi ni nang du 'gro/_/grogs po gnyen bshes rtsa lag dang /_/phan tshun mi 'thun gyur pa la/_/gang zhig shin tu sdums byed pa/_/lha rnams kyi ni nang du 'gro/_/'dod 
[\[21b.3\]]pa'i 'dam las drangs shing skyon bsal ba/_/sems can kun la rtag tu bde 'dod gang /_/de ni dri med zhi ba yid grol zhing /_/de ltar bdud kyi stobs ni 'joms par byed/_/gang zhig dbang la blo gnas shing /_/blo yi dbang du mi 'gro gang /_/de ni dgra las rnam rgyal te/_/lha rnams kyi 
[\[21b.4\]]ni nang du 'gro/_/lus kyi las mtha' dge ba dag_/sdig las bral ba bde ldan gang /_/de ni 'dod spangs bsam gtan pa/_/lha rnams kyi ni nang du 'gro/_/sdig pa'i grogs po rnam spangs shing /_/sred pa'i zhags las rnam grol ba/_/bud med zhags pas ma bcings pa/_/lha rnams 
[\[21b.5\]]kyi ni nang du 'gro/_/gang dag chos la rab 'bad cing /_/sbyin dang tshul khrims ting 'dzin ldan/_/blo gros brtan zhing rtag brtson pa/_/lha rnams kyi ni nang du 'gro/_/ral gris zhags pa bcad pa ltar/_/gang gis 'ching ba bcad pa de/_/rang dbang zhags pa bcad pa yin/_/lha rnams 
[\[21b.6\]]kyi ni nang du 'gro/_/'dod pa'i dri mas ma gos brkam pa med/_/skyon dag spangs shing bcom ste sred dang bral/_/nyes med dri bral sems can brtan pa de/_/rang gi 'bras bu la spyod mtho ris 'gro/_/sems can mir ni gyur pa gang /_/legs par byas pa mang spyad pa/_las kyi rnam 
[\[21b.7\]]smin de yis su/_/lha yi 'jig rten rab tu 'gengs/_/mi yi mthu yis lha 'byung la/_/lha yi mthu yis mi 'byung ste/_/phan tshun mthus 'byung 'di dag ni/_/dam pa'i chos kyi lam du gnas/_/lha yi bde 'gro mi yin la/_/mi yi bde 'gro lha yin te/_/ngan song gsum gyi sa dag ni/_/dge 
[\[22a\]]
