[\[22a.1\]]ba'i las rnams spangs pa yin/_/de ni khyed yin rtag tu brtson/_/legs par mthong ba mchog yin te/_/rtag tu chos spel byed pa gang /_/lha mchog rnams ni rab tu 'bod/_/bde ba thams cad chos la las/_/mya ngan 'das pa chos la las/_/gnyid log 
[\[22a.2\]]rnams la chos ston cig_/'gro ba mchog ni chos yin no/_/de skad ces bsgo nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin 'jig rten skyong ba de dag la yang 'di skad du mi rnams yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir dang /_chos rnams 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir 'bod cig ces bsgo'o/_/de nas yang dge 
[\[22a.3\]]slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa des lha rnams kyi sems kyi rtog pa rig nas nang gi chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas so/_/de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa des lha ma yin rnams kyi sa gnyis pa la brtags nas/_sa gsum pa la 
[\[22a.4\]]rtog par byed de/_lha ma yin rnams kyi sa gsum pa'i rnam pa ji lta bu yin snyam nas/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/_sa gzhi gsum pa gang yin pa ni dpag tshad nyi khri chig stong yod do/_/sa gzhi de yang gnas bzang po zhes bya ste/_tshal dang /_nags tshal dang /_
[\[22a.5\]]lteng ka dang /_'bab chu'i dngo dang /_skye bo 'thun pa sna tshogs kyis gang ba/_rtag tu spro ba dang /_rol mo'i sgra snyan pas gang ngo /_/grong khyer zab pa zhes bya ba dpag tshad brgyad stong pa yod de/_grong khyer de na lha ma yin gyi dbang po me tog phreng zhes bya ba gnas so/_/lha ma yin de rnams 
[\[22a.6\]]kyang rtse ba la gnas pa zhes bya la/_grong khyer zab pa de yang rin po che'i rnam pa du ma dang /_tshal dang /_nags tshal dang /_lteng ka dang /_pad ma'i rdzing rab tu mang po dang ldan pa/_'dam dang rnyog pa dang bral ba'i pad ma skye ba'i rdzing rnams kyis mdzes par byas pa lha ma yin rtse ba'i 
[\[22a.7\]]grogs po dang ldan pa rnams kyis kun nas yongs su bskor ba/_dus tshigs drug nyams dga' ba/_tshal chen po bzhi rnams kyis mdzes par byas pa la 'di lta ste/_dril bu g.yer kha'i phreng ba'i tshal zhes bya ba/_gang du dril bu g.yer kha'i shing ljon pa rtag tu sgra dbyangs snyan pa 'byin pa 
[\[22b\]]
[\[22b.1\]]dang /_'di ltar tshal gnyis pa gser phreng zhes bya ba gang du gser gyi shing ljon pa skye ba dang /_tshal gsum pa me phreng zhes bya ba gang du me lta bu'i shing ljon pa 'bras bu dmar po 'byung ba dang /_tshal bzhi pa 'dres pa zhes bya ba gang du me tog dang 'bras bu 'dres pa rnams kyis mdzes par 
[\[22b.2\]]byas pa yin te/_tshal bzhi po de rnams kyis lha ma yin gyi grong khyer zab pa mdzes par byas so/_/gang na lha ma yin rtse ba'i grogs dang lhan cig gnas pa ni lha dang 'thun par bde bar gnas pa yin te/_de ltar gnas pa de dag ni me tog phreng dang /_phye ma dang /_byug pa rnams 
[\[22b.3\]]kyis lus brgyan pa/_spro ba dang /_dga' ba dang /_rtse ba dang /_rgal ba dang /_dgod pa rnams kyis rtag tu gnas pa/_lha ma yin gyi bu mo 'bum snyed kyis yongs su bskor ba/_lha ma yin gyi dbang po me tog phreng gis bskyangs pa/_skyed mos tshal du rtag tu rtse bar gnas pa/_lus kyi 
[\[22b.4\]]bar bar ni rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa yin te/_lha ma yin gyi dbang po brtan pas gnas gnyis pa na gnas pa/_lha ma yin 'dzam b+ha zhes bya ba/_lha ma yin me tog phreng zhes bya ba'i drung du mngags te/_'di ltar mi'i 'jig rten na mi 'di dag thams cad mar 'dzin pa dang /_
[\[22b.5\]]phar 'dzin pa dang /_dge sbyong du 'dzin pa dang /_bram zer 'dzin pa dang /_byas pa la phan 'dogs pa yin la/_de ltar gnas pa de dag ni mi mthu che ba rnams kyis lha rnams mthu che ba yin te/_des na bdag cag dang klu dang bcas pa rnams kyis nges par lha dang mi rnams kyi dam pa'i chos 
[\[22b.6\]]kyi bar chad bya ba la 'bad par bya'o zhes snga ma bzhin du de dag thos nas/_gnas gsum pa na gnas pa lha ma yin gyi dbang po me tog phreng shin tu mi dga' ste/_bdag cag gi dgra bo lha 'di dag ni mi la rag las pa yin pas/_lha dang mi'i bar chad bya'o zhes smras so/_/de nas lha ma yin 
[\[22b.7\]]rtse zhing gnas pa mtshon dang go cha sna tshogs kyis lus rnam par brgyan pa/_shin tu chas pa rnams klu rnams kyi gnas longs spyod ldan ga la ba der dong ngo /_/de nas lha ma yin gyi sgra de dag thos nas klu'i rgyal po chen po nor rgyas kyi bu dang /_'jog po la sogs pa lus la glog gi phreng ba 
[\[23a\]]
[\[23a.1\]]'bar ba 'byung ba/_shin tu chas pa rnams glog mang po char ltar 'byin pa na rgya mtsho'i dbus nas klu 'bum phrag bye ba du ma dag mngon par 'byung ngo /_/de nas lha ma yin de rnams dang /_klu de rnams rgya mtsho'i dbus su g.yul chen po 'gyed par 'gyur te/_de gang gi tshe 
[\[23a.2\]]chos dang ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i mi 'byung ba de'i tshe lha ma yin rnams pham par 'gyur la/_gal te chos dang mi ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su mi 'jug pa'i skye dgu 'byung na snga ma bzhin de'i tshe lha ma yin gyi phyogs rgyal bar 'gyur te/_klu'i phyogs pham par 'gyur ro/_/de ltar thams cad 
[\[23a.3\]]chos la rag las pa yin te/_de gang gi tshe klu pham par gyur na/_de dag kun tu rgyu ba'i lha rnams la kye grogs po dag 'di ltar lha ma yin rnams kyi mthu la bgegs bya ba'i phyir 'bod cig ces smras so/_/de nas kun tu rgyu ba'i lha khro bas gdungs pa rnams kha rlangs 'byin bzhin du rgyal chen 
[\[23a.4\]]bzhi'i lha rnams la/_kye lha dag 'di ltar lha ma yin gyi phyogs 'di ni mthu che ste/_klu rnams ni pham mo/_/lha ma yin rnams ni rgyal gyis g.yul bsham pa la rab tu 'bod cig ces smras so/_/kun tu rgyu ba'i lha'i bu de dag dang /_kha rlangs de mthong nas kyang rtog ge pa dag na re/_'di ltar du ba 
[\[23a.5\]]mjug [{]rings [,]ring [}]byung ste/_lo legs par 'gyur ro/_/lo nyes par 'gyur ro/_/char legs par 'bab par 'gyur ro/_/char legs par 'bab par mi 'gyur ro zhes snga ma bzhin du sbyar te/_'di ni du ba mjug [{]rings [,]ring [}]ston pa'i rgyu gnyis pa yin no/_/de gang gi tshe lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin 
[\[23a.6\]]dag rgyal bar 'gyur ba de'i tshe/_char legs par 'bab cing lo legs par 'gyur/_/de'i tshe nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing /_mtshon gyis 'khrug par mi 'gyur ba dang /_'di lta ste/_rtog ge pa dag na re 'di ltar gzas char phab bo zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgya cher sbyar ro/_/de nas gang gi 
[\[23a.7\]]tshe chos dang mi ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su mi 'jug pa'i skye dgu 'byung zhing mar mi 'dzin pa dang /_phar mi 'dzin pa dang /_rgan rabs la gus par mi byed pa de'i tshe/_lha ma yin gyi phyogs ni rgyal bar 'gyur te/_char mi 'bab cing chos dang mi ldan pa rnams kyis lo legs par mi 'gyur la/_
[\[23b\]]
[\[23b.1\]]mtshon gyis 'khrug par yang 'gyur ro/_/de la rtog ge pa dag gzhan du sgyur te/_gza'i nyes pas char mi 'bab bo/_/rgyu skar gyi nyes pas lo legs par mi 'gyur ro zhes snga ma bzhin du sbyar te/_de ltar chos dang chos ma yin pa mngon par mi shes pa rtog ge pa dag gzhan du sgyur zhing 
[\[23b.2\]]'jig rten pa la gzhan du sgrogs so/_/de ltar mi shes pas nyams pa thams cad ni mu stegs ya mtshan gyi blor 'gyur ro/_/gang gi tshe lha ma yin rnams kyis klu rnams zil gyis mnan pa de'i tshe/_de nas yang 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dag rgyal chen bzhi pa rnams la 'di ltar sgra sgrogs par 
[\[23b.3\]]byed de/_chos lugs rgyal bar gyur cig chos min rgyal ma gyur/_/bden pa rgyal bar gyur cig [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa rgyal ma gyur/_/lha rnams rgyal bar gyur cig lha min rgyal ma gyur/_/snang ba rgyal bar gyur cig mun pa rgyal ma gyur/_/sbyin pa rgyal bar gyur cig 'jungs pa rgyal ma gyur/_/
[\[23b.4\]]tshul khrims rgyal bar gyur cig gsod pa rgyal ma gyur/_/sangs rgyas rgyal bar gyur cig mu stegs rgyal ma gyur/_/brtan pa rgyal bar gyur cig g.yo ba rgyal ma gyur/_/chos bzhin rgyal bar gyur cig dor sgyu rgyal ma gyur/_/snying rje rgyal bar gyur cig brtse med rgyal ma gyur/_/byams 
[\[23b.5\]]pa rgyal bar gyur cig khro ba rgyal ma gyur/_/brgya byin rgyal bar gyur cig lha min rgyal ma gyur/_/gong ma rgyal bar gyur cig 'og ma rgyal ma gyur/_/'grangs pa rgyal bar gyur cig bkres pa rgyal ma gyur/_/ye shes rgyal bar gyur cig gti mug rgyal ma gyur/_/bya ba rgyal 
[\[23b.6\]]bar gyur cig bya min rgyal ma gyur/_/brtson 'grus rgyal bar gyur cig le lo rgyal ma gyur/_/skyes pa rgyal bar gyur cig bud med rgyal ma gyur/_/rgan rabs rgyal bar gyur cig byis pa rgyal ma gyur/_/bzod pa rgyal bar gyur cig sdang ba rgyal ma gyur/_/mi rnams rgyal bar gyur 
[\[23b.7\]]cig rab 'joms la sogs pa/_/phung bar byed pa'i klu rnams rgyal bar ma gyur cig_/nyin mo rgyal bar gyur cig mtshan mo rgyal ma gyur/_/zla ba rgyal bar gyur cig gza' rnams rgyal ma gyur/_/lo tog rgyal bar gyur cig rtsigs ma rgyal ma gyur/_/bde ba rgyal bar gyur cig 
[\[24a\]]
[\[24a.1\]]bde min rgyal ma gyur/_/nad med rgyal bar gyur cig nad rnams rgya lam gyur/_/'jam po rgyal bar gyur cig rtsub po rgyal ma gyur/_/thar pa rgyal bar gyur cig bcings pa rgyal ma gyur/_/gzhung lugs rgyal bar gyur cig lugs min rgyal ma gyur/_/
[\[24a.2\]]gces pa rnams ni thams cad rab tu rgyal bar shog_/gces min dag ni dus rnams kun tu bcom par shog_/de ltar 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dag rnga bo che thogs nas lha rnams la rgyugs shig rgyugs shig ces smras so/_/de nas lha rnams de dag gis smras pa thos nas mtshon cha dang go cha sna tshogs 
[\[24a.3\]]bgos te/_klu rnams dang /_lha ma yin rnams lhan cig g.yul 'gyed par mig btsums pa tsam gyi tshad du der thams cad phyin to/_/de nas lha ma yin rnams kyis de dag la brtags nas/_'di ltar dge sbyong du 'dzin pa dang /_bram zer 'dzin pa'i skye dgu 'byung ba snga ma bzhin sbyar te/_
[\[24a.4\]]de'i tshe lha ma yin rnams kyis lha de dag mthong nas/_sa'i 'og gzhan ga la bar thams cad du 'jug par byed do/_/gal te dge sbyong du mi 'dzin pa dang /_bram zer mi 'dzin pa'i skye dgu 'byung na/_lha rnams dang de dag lhan cig g.yul 'gyed par shom ste/_de dag yud tsam zhig 
[\[24a.5\]]g.yul bkye nas lha rnams kyis pham par byas nas/_de nas yang lha ma yin gyi dbang po me tog phreng dang /_lha ma yin pham pa rnams dang lhan cig rang rang gi gnas su 'jug pa mthong ngo /_/de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa des lha dang lha ma yin gyi 
[\[24a.6\]]g.yul mthong nas/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas so/_/de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de gnas gsum pa la gnas pa zhes bya ba'i lha ma yin me tog phreng zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i las kyi chos kyi rnam par smin pa 
[\[24a.7\]]la rtog par byed de/_las kyi chos kyi rnam par smin pa gang gis lha ma yin gnas gsum pa gnas bzang du skye bar 'gyur snyam nas/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/_gang gis dus su sbyor ba'i don du gyad dam/_sil khrol ba'am/_du gul la ka ba'am/_bsdus 
[\[24b\]]
[\[24b.1\]]pa'am/_dga' 'dun par gyur pa dag la sbyin pa ngan pa byin pa de sems pa dang mi ldan zhing /_zhing bzang po ma yin pa la byin pa de lus dang bral nas ngan 'gro log par ltung ba gnas gsum pa na gnas pa'i lha ma yin rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de dag ni mi rnams kyi lo bdun 
[\[24b.2\]]brgya gang yin pa de dag gi nyin zhag gcig yin la/_bgrang ba de yi lo bdun stong thub ste/_dus ma yin par 'chi ba ni yod par mthong ngo /_/de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de/_lha ma yin gyi bdag po me tog phreng gi las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa 
[\[24b.3\]]la sems par byed de/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/_'di ltar sems pa dang mi ldan pa gang gis tshul khrims 'chal ba la zan gcig byin na las des lha ma yin gyi gnas zab par lha ma yin gyi bdag po bdud rtsi dri ma can za bar 'gyur ba mthong ngo /_/de nas yang 
[\[24b.4\]]dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de sa gzhan bzhi pa la rtog par byed de/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas 'di ltar dud 'gror gtogs pa lha ma yin gyi gnas gzhan bzhi pa mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba dpag tshad nyi khri chig stong yod pa mthong ngo /_/de'i dbus na grong khyer 
[\[24b.5\]]mdzes pa zhes bya ba dpag tshad brgyad stong pa gcig yod do/_/gnas de yang dpag tshad khri sum stong yod de/_grong khyer de na lha ma yin gyi dbang po rab spro zhes bya ba gnas so/_/gnas de na lha ma yin gnas pa gang yin pa de dag gi ming ni kun spro zhes bya ste/_stobs che ba yin no/_/
[\[24b.6\]]rgyal po de yang lha ma yin de dag pas stobs shin tu che ba yin te/_shin tu bde ba/_shin tu brtan pa/_mthu dang ldan pa/_rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa/_gar yang 'jigs pa med pa/_dbang po dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten yang grangs su mi rtsi ba/_brtson 'grus lhag pas rab tu rgyags pa 
[\[24b.7\]]thams cad sa'i 'og gi gting na gnas pa yin la/_de las 'og tu gyur pa ni gzhan gang yang med de/_de nor bu'i sa gzhi'i steng na gnas so/_/de rtag par yid rab tu dga' zhing rtag tu spro la dga' ba rtag par yid sna tshogs su shin tu phye ba/_yul gyi srid pa sna tshogs la rnam par 
[\[25a\]]
[\[25a.1\]]chags pa dag gnas gzhan bzhi pa grong khyer zab pa na shin tu bde bar gnas so/_/grong khyer de yang kun nas pad ma'i rdzing dang /_lteng ka dang /_'bab chu'i dngo dang /_bskyed pa'i sa dang /_ra bas mdzes par byas pa/_rin po che sna bdun gyi khang pas brgyan pa/_
[\[25a.2\]]'gran zla dang bral ba/_phan tshun bshes gnyen mi 'thun pa dang bral ba/_phan tshun 'khrug pa dang bral ba/_'gran zla'i 'jigs pa dang bral ba/_nam mkha' gnyis pa lta bu yin te/_ji ltar nam mkha' la gza' dang /_rgyu skar dang /_skar ma'i tshogs rnam pa du ma dag gis mdzes par 
[\[25a.3\]]byas pa de ltar grong khyer de yang kun nas rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis brgyan cing mdzes pa yin no/_/'dir tshigs su bcad pa/_byed kun sems la rag las shing /_/'bras bu sems la rag las mthong /_/ji ltar sems ni sna tshogs ltar/_/de lta bur ni 'bras bu'ang 
[\[25a.4\]]mthong /_/'jig rten srid gsum rjes 'gro 'di/_/thams cad sems kyis sna tshogs bris/_/sems kyi dbang du ma gyur gang /_/de yi gnas ni ye med do/_/yid ni thar dang bcings pa yi/_/gnyis kyi gzhi dang rgyu ru 'gyur/_/dge ba yis ni skye bo 'grol/_/mi dges myur du 
[\[25a.5\]]'ching bar byed/_/de ltar sems can sems kyi dbang /_/srid gsum dag na 'khyam par 'gyur/_/sred pas rmongs pa'i sems can rnams/_/sems kyi dbang du gyur nas 'gro/_/dmus long lam bzang mi mthong ltar/_/mya ngan 'das pa thob mi 'gyur/_/ji ltar sems can 
[\[25a.6\]]de rnams kyis yang dag pa'i lam bsgrubs pa de ltar rgyu sna tshogs dang 'thun par gyur pa'i gnas de sna tshogs su snang ngo /_/'di ltar gnas de grong khyer de'i phyi rol na 'dug pa yin te/_shing ljon pa dang /_nye ba'i tshal dang /_lteng ka dang /_grong rdal dang /_pad ma'i rdzing dang /_
[\[25a.7\]]chu bo rnam pa sna tshogs dang /_bya rnam pa brgya snyed kyis mdzes par byas pa yin no/_/de'i gnas bzhi pa de na lha ma yin gnas pa gang yin pa de dag kun spro zhes bya ste/_brtan pa/_bag tsha ba med pa/_cha byad dang rgyan shin tu bzang bas lus brgyan pa rnams gnas pa/_phan tshun 
[\[25b\]]
[\[25b.1\]]yid la cung zad kyang 'khrug par mi byed pa/_rtag tu yid la spro zhing dga' ba dang ldan pa/_bud med cha byad dang rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i tshogs rnams kyis yongs su bskor cing gnas te/_brgya'am yang na stong du dga' bar byed/_rtse bar byed/_yongs su spyod par byed do/_/gnas 
[\[25b.2\]]bzhi pa de yang nor bu thogs pa'i bud med rnams kyis rtag tu brgyan pa/_lha ma yin kun spro rnams rtag tu lha ma yin gyi dbang po rab spro'i bka' shin tu nyan pa/_yid shin tu phye ba/_de la bka' nyan pa'i ngo bo ni rtag tu dbang du gyur par mthong ngo /_/de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras 
[\[25b.3\]]bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de/_lha ma yin gyi dbang po rab spro'i las kyi rnam par smin pa la rtog par byed de/_der las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/_'di ltar 'das pa'i dus na log par lta ba la zhen pa/_las kyi 'bras 
[\[25b.4\]]bu mngon par mi shes pa/_sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun las phyir phyogs par gyur pa gang la re zhig cig na dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan pa/_shin tu brtson 'grus dang ldan pa lam du zhugs par gyur pa zhig gis nan gyis bsod snyoms gcig bslangs pa dang byin 
[\[25b.5\]]no/_/byin nas kyang bdag gis bsod snyoms byin pa'i 'bras bu ni don med cing 'di las bdag gi chos su 'gyur ba yang med la/_log par rab tu byung ba/_dmangs rigs 'di la bdag gis bsod snyoms sbyin pa 'di ni tshwa sgo can la bsod snyoms byin par zad do zhes kyang smra la/_
[\[25b.6\]]zhing 'ba' zhig yon tan dang ldan la/_gzhan gyi ngo chen gyis sbyin pa tsher ma can nyams pa byin pa des lus dang bral nas ngan 'gro log par ltung ba dud 'gro rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur te/_sa gzhi shin tu 'byor pa/_rin po ches brgyan pa/_g.yo ba med pa dag tu zhing shin 
[\[25b.7\]]tu yon tan dang ldan pa dang /_sems pas dngos po ma bzung ba de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas lha ma yin kun spro zhes bya ba rnams kyi bdag po rab spro zhes bya ba so sor 'gran pa lta bu'i bde ba thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur ba mthong ngo //_//'phags pa dam pa'i chos 
[\[26a\]]
[\[26a.1\]]dran pa nye bar gzhag pa/_bam po nyer gsum pa/_de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa des lha ma yin kun spro zhes bya ba rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa la rtog par byed de/_las kyi rnam par smin pa gang gis lha ma yin gyi 
[\[26a.2\]]gnas su lha ma yin kun spro dag ji ltar skye bar 'gyur snyam nas/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/_sred pa'i ro la zhen par gyur pa gang sems can yod pa'i tshal du gnas te/_'di ltar tshal de dag na sems can 'khod pa de rnams sus kyang ma bsdus/_gang 
[\[26a.3\]]gis kyang lhug par ma bkod de/_bdag gis tshal 'dir bsdu bar bya'o snyam nas/_sems can la snying brtse ba'i phyir dang /_bdag nyid kyi 'tsho ba sbrang rtsi dag 'dod pa'i phyir sdud par byed na/_de lus dang bral nas lha ma yin rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur te/_de'i 'tsho ba'i phyir 
[\[26a.4\]]sems can bsrungs pa'i rnam par smin pa'i rgyus/_kun spro rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ba mthong ngo /_/de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa des/_lha dang lha ma yin g.yul 'gyed pa la rtog par byed de/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags 
[\[26a.5\]]na/_'di ltar klu'i gtso bo longs spyod ldan na gnas pa chos dang ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa mgo bdun yod pa 'di lta ste/_klu'i rgyal po nor rgyas kyi bu dang /_klu'i rgyal po 'jog po dang /_klu'i rgyal po bzang po dang /_klu'i rgyal po ro hi na dang /_klu'i rgyal po sprin phreng dang /_
[\[26a.6\]]klu'i rgyal po klong dang /_klu'i rgyal po kun 'gro dang /_klu'i rgyal po rab spro dang /_klu'i rgyal po char 'bebs te/_de dag ni chos dang ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa/_yang dag pa'i lta ba dang /_tshul khrims la zhugs pa yin no/_/snga ma bzhin du sbyar te/_chos dang mi ldan zhing 
[\[26a.7\]]chos kyi rjes su mi 'jug pa la 'di lta ste/_klu'i rgyal po rab 'joms dang /_klu'i rgyal po bsgyings pa dang /_klu'i rgyal po nag po dang /_klu'i rgyal po hu lu hu lu dag pham par gyur pa de'i tshe sa'i 'og na gnas pa dang /_ri rab la rten pa dang /_chu'i nang du zhugs pa ga la ba der rgyug 
[\[26b\]]
[\[26b.1\]]par byed de/_'di lta ste/_gnas dang po la rten pa'i lha ma yin rnams kyis gnyis shing rtse ba zhes bya ba'i lha ma yin de dag la smras pa/_klu'i rgyal po nor rgyas kyi bu dang /_'jog po la sogs pa 'di dag dang rgyal chen bzhi'i lha dang bcas pas bdag cag gtses kyis khyed bdag 
[\[26b.2\]]cag gi grogs su tshur shog rgyug_/de nas de thos nas lha ma yin gnyis shing rtse ba dag lha ma yin gyi grong khyer 'od ldan zhes bya ba gang na lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan gnas pa ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/_lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan la snga ma bzhin du thams cad bsnyad do/_/
[\[26b.3\]]de nas gal te lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan 'di ltar dge sbyong du 'dzin pa dang /_bram zer 'dzin pa dang /_byas pa la phan 'dogs pa dang /_rigs kyi rgan rabs la gus par byed par shes pa de'i tshe lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan klu'i rgyal po rab 'joms la sogs pa la/_'di ltar 
[\[26b.4\]]bdag cag gi gnas gnyis pa na gnas pa'i lha ma yin rnams la 'di ltar lha rnams kyis bdag cag mngon par gtses so zhes sbran par bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar te/_klu'i rgyal po 'jog po la sogs pa de dag nyid khog shig khog shig ces bsgo'o/_/de nas lha ma yin gyi 
[\[26b.5\]]dbang po sgra gcan gnas gnyis pa na gnas pa'i lha ma yin mgul phreng zhes bya ba de dag la 'di ltar klu'i rgyal po rab 'joms la sogs pa/_klu'i rgyal po nor rgyas kyi bu dang /_'jog po la sogs pa dang /_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis mngon par gtses so zhes smras 
[\[26b.6\]]so/_/de nas de thos nas/_lha ma yin mgul phreng dag lha ma yin gyi grong skar phreng zhes bya ba na lha ma yin gyi dbang po 'khod pa gang yin pa de dag la 'di ltar kye rgyal po chen po bdag cag la lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan dang /_klu'i rgyal po rab 'joms la sogs pa na re 'di ltar 
[\[26b.7\]]klu'i rgyal po rab 'joms la sogs pa dag klu'i rgyal po 'jog po dang /_nor rgyas kyi bu la sogs pa dang /_rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams kyis mngon par gtses so zhes mchi'o/_/lha ma yin gyi dbang pos de thos nas/_gal te dge sbyong du 'dzin pa dang /_bram zer 'dzin pa'i skye dgu 
[\[27a\]]
[\[27a.1\]]chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa 'byung ba dang /_bdag nyid kyi stobs che chung mthong ba de'i tshe/_lha ma yin mgul phreng de dag la 'di ltar kye ma 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams chos dang ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su 'jug pas lha rnams stobs rab tu che ste/_'di dag bdag gis gnas 
[\[27a.2\]]gsum pa na gnas pa'i lha ma yin rnams la snga ma bzhin bsnyad par bya'o zhes smras so/_/de nas lha ma yin kun 'gro zhes bya ba la bsnyad do/_/de nas lha ma yin kun 'gro dag gis gang na lha ma yin gyi dbang po me tog phreng zhes bya ba gnas pa'i grong khyer zab pa zhes bya ba ga la ba der dong ste 
[\[27a.3\]]lha ma yin kun 'gros de thams cad snga ma bzhin bsnyad do/_/de nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po me tog phreng zhes bya bas/_gal te chos dang ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa/_dge sbyong du 'dzin pa dang /_bram zer 'dzin pa'i skye dgu mthong na/_des lha ma yin de dag la 'di ltar gnas bzhi pa 
[\[27a.4\]]na gnas pa'i lha ma yin rnams la mngon par bsnyad par bya'o zhes smras so/_/de nas gnas gsum pa na gnas pa'i lha ma yin gyi dbang pos gnas bzhi pa la gnas pa'i lha ma yin rnams 'khod pa ga la ba der dong ste/_'di ltar klu'i rgyal po rab 'joms la sogs pa dag klu'i rgyal po 'jog 
[\[27a.5\]]po dang /_nor rgyas kyi bu la sogs pa rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams kyis mngon par gtses te/_de ltar klu 'di dag ni bdag cag gi phyogs yin pas bdag cag rnams kyis nges par lha rnams kyi bar chad bya ba la 'bad par bya'o zhes smras so/_/de nas gnas bzhi pa la gnas pa'i lha ma yin 
[\[27a.6\]]dpung [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag gis de dag mthong nas/_grong khyer zab pa zhes bya ba gang na lha ma yin gyi dbang po rab spro zhes bya ba ga la ba der dong ngo /_/de nas lha ma yin [{]rings [,]ring [}]thabs su 'ong ba de dag mthong nas/_lha ma yin rnams ci'i phyir [{]rings [,]ring [}]thabs su 'ongs zhes dris so/_/de nas lha ma 
[\[27a.7\]]yin dpung [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag gis lha ma yin gyi dbang po rab spro la snga ma ji lta ba bzhin bsnyad do/_/de nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po rab spros lha ma yin gyi dbang po de dag la 'di skad ces kye ma lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan dag brtson 'grus chung ba yin te/_klu'i rgyal po rab 'joms la sogs 
[\[27b\]]
[\[27b.1\]]pa gnas pa gang yin pa de dag rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams kyis pham par byas te/_de dag la bdag gis dge sbyong du 'dzin pa dang /_bram zer 'dzin pa'i skye dgu rtsis la ma chags pa dang /_chos kyi rjes su chos sgrub pa rtsis la ma chags par bya'o zhes smras so/_/de nas lha ma yin gyi 
[\[27b.2\]]dbang po de rang gi lha ma yin rnams 'khod pa ga la ba der dong ngo /_/de nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po rab spro dpung [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag la 'di ltar bdag ni klu'i rgyal po 'jog po dang /_nor rgyas kyi bu la sogs pa dang /_rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams la bar chad bya ba'i phyir chas te/_lha ma yin 
[\[27b.3\]]rnams kyi dbang po'i brtson 'grus dang /_spro ba dang /_'khor dang bcas pa/_mtshungs pa med pa thams cad lha rnams dang g.yul 'gyed par 'dong gis 'di ltar lha ma yin rnams myur du chos shig myur du chos shig ces bsgo'o/_/de nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po rab spros lha ma yin 
[\[27b.4\]]gyi dbang po gsum dag la gang chos kyi rnam pa 'di lta bu bzod pa khyod la ci brtson 'grus med dam/_rten med dam/_'di ltar bdag ni rang gi lag mthu dang brtson 'grus dang ldan pas cha'o zhes smras so/_/de nas yang lha ma yin gyi dbang po rab dgod ring por ma thogs par rang gi 
[\[27b.5\]]lha ma yin rnams la grogs po dag rings par chos shig rings par chos shig_/ces 'di ltar bdag gis lha ma yin gyi dbang po ma lus pa rnams la yang sbran zin te/_bdag myur du cha yis/_lag tu mtshon cha sna tshogs blangs par shes nas/_lha ma yin gyi g.yul la 
[\[27b.6\]]brtson par gyis shig_/de dag gi blo rig nas bsgrub par bya ba'i chos gang yin pa de dag bsgrub par bya ste/_lha rnams kyis pham par byar mi bzod do zhes smras so/_/de nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po rab dgod kyis de skad smras nas/_rang gi brtson 'grus chen po dang stobs kyis dregs 
[\[27b.7\]]pa/_blo gros shin tu rgya che ba/_rang gi stobs dang gzhan gyi stobs tshad ma grangs su mi rtsi bar rang gi gnas nas chas nas gnas gzhan gsum par 'gro bar byed de/_grong khyer zab pa na lha ma yin gyi bdag po me tog phreng lha ma yin bye ba khrag khrig du ma ga la ba der song ste phyin nas brtsams 
[\[28a\]]
[\[28a.1\]]pa'i yid kyis lha ma yin gyi dbang po me tog phreng la smras pa/_'di ltar klu'i rgyal po 'jog po dang /_nor rgyas kyi bu la sogs pa dang /_lha dang bcas pa dag las rgyal bar bya yis lha ma yin gyi g.yul 'gyed par 'dong 'dong /_de skad smras pa dang /_me tog 
[\[28a.2\]]phreng des smras pa/_'di ltar g.yul 'gyed pa 'di ni bdag cag gi dus ma yin te/_mar 'dzin pa dang /_phar 'dzin pa dang /_rigs kyi rgan rabs la rim gro byed pa dang /_dge sbyong du 'dzin pa dang /_bram zer 'dzin pa dang /_chos la chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa dag yod pas/_lha'i 
[\[28a.3\]]phyogs stobs che ste/_de lta bas na de ring bdag cag gi g.yul 'gyed pa'i dus ma yin no zhes smras so/_/de nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po rab spro de'i tshig ma mnyan par 'di ltar klu dang lha de dag bdag gcig pus pham par bya bar nus na/_khyed dang bcas pas lta smos kyang ci dgos te/_
[\[28a.4\]]pham par bya yis lha ma yin gyi dbang po dag 'dong 'dong zhes smras so/_/de nas me tog phreng zhes bya ba des spro ba bskyed nas/_lha ma yin gyi sde bye ba phrag du ma dang lhan cig gnas gzhan gnyis pa ga la ba der dong ngo /_/de nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan la rab spro dang /_brtan 
[\[28a.5\]]pa dang /_me tog phreng dag gis lha rnams las rgyal bar bya yis/_lha ma yin gyi g.yul 'gyed par 'dong 'dong zhes smras so/_/de nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan gyis de dag la smras pa/_kye ma lha ma yin gyi dbang po dag dus la ma bab ste/_bdag cag gi g.yul 
[\[28a.6\]]'gyed pa'i dus ma yin no/_/'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams chos dang ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su 'jug ste/_mar 'dzin pa dang /_phar 'dzin pa dang /_dge sbyong du 'dzin pa dang /_bram zer 'dzin pa'i skye dgu dag lha yul du skye la/_lha'i phyogs stobs che bas g.yul 'gyed par mi nus 
[\[28a.7\]]te/_lha ma yin gyi dus ma yin no zhes smras so/_/de nas thams cad yid 'thun par lha ma yin sgra gcan de la 'di skad ces 'di ltar bdag cag lha rnams dang g.yul 'gyed par spro yis 'dong 'dong zhes smras so/_/de nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan de dag gi bsam pa dang 'thun 
[\[28b\]]
[\[28b.1\]]par rgya mtsho'i nang nas chas nas klu'i rgyal po rab 'joms la sogs pa ga la ba der song ste/_'di ltar bdag cag lha ma yin gyi dbang po 'di dag thams cad dang 'ongs te/_klu'i rgyal po 'jog po dang /_nor rgyas kyi bu la sogs pa ga la ba der bdag cag g.yul 
[\[28b.2\]]'gyed du 'ong ngo zhes smras so/_/de nas rab 'joms kyis de thos nas yid rab tu dga' ste/_'jog po dang nor rgyas kyi bu la sogs pa ga la ba der g.yul 'gyed pa'i phyir 'khor dang bcas pa dong ngo /_/de nas klu'i bdag po 'jog po dang /_nor rgyas kyi bu la sogs 
[\[28b.3\]]pa yang klu'i rgyal po rab 'joms la sogs pa gang du g.yul bshams par g.yul 'gyed du dong ngo /_/de nas de dag de ltar phan tshun g.yul 'gyed pa dang /_chos dang mi ldan pa'i klu'i bdag po rnams pham par gyur to/_/de ltar de dag pham pa dang /_lha ma yin bye ba 
[\[28b.4\]]phrag du ma dag rgyug par byed do/_/de nas 'jog po dang /_nor rgyas kyi bu la sogs pas de dag mthong nas lha ma yin ga la bar 'khod par g.yul 'gyed du brgyugs so/_/de nas klu rnams dang /_lha ma yin tshad med pa de rnams rgya mtsho'i steng du phan tshun g.yul 'gyed de/_me 
[\[28b.5\]]char ltar 'bab pa dang /_mtshon cha char ltar 'bab pa tshad med pa de dang /_dug nag po rnam par gdungs shing blo dman pa de rnams phan tshun g.yul 'gyed do/_/de gang gi tshe chos dang ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa/_dge sbyong du 'dzin pa dang /_bram zer 'dzin pa'i skye dgu 
[\[28b.6\]]byung na/_de dag klu 'ba' zhig gis lha ma yin rnams pham par byed do/_/gal te shin tu chos dang mi ldan pa'i skye dgu byung na de'i tshe lha ma yin rnams kyis klu rnams pham par byed do/_/gang gi tshe klu rnams pham par 'gyur ba de'i tshe lha kun tu rgyu ba rnams la 'di ltar sa'i 'og na 
[\[28b.7\]]gnas pa 'di dag thams cad kyis bdag cag rnam pa thams cad du gtses te/_de dag dang bdag cag phan tshun g.yul 'gyed par mi nus kyis rgyugs shig rgyugs shig ces smras so/_/de nas lha kun tu rgyu ba rnams mtshon cha dang lag cha sna tshogs thogs te/_lha ma yin 
[\[29a\]]
[\[29a.1\]]ga la 'khod pa der 'dong bar byed do/_/de nas lha kun tu rgyu ba rnams klu'i rgyal po 'jog po dang /_nor rgyas kyi bu la sogs pa ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/_klu rnams la smras pa/_bdag cag rnams lha ma yin tshar gcad pa'i phyir 'ding 'ongs te/_bdag cag 
[\[29a.2\]]khyed kyis bsgrubs pa lha ma yin gzhig pa'i phyir 'di nyid du 'ongs so/_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_de nas yang klu rnams lha dang lhan cig tu lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan ga la ba der dong ngo /_/de nas lha ma yin rnams kyis de dag de ltar mthong nas/_de nas yang lha rnams ga la ba der 
[\[29a.3\]]g.yul 'gyed du dong ngo /_/de nas lha dang lha ma yin rgya mtsho'i nang du g.yul 'gyed par 'gyur te/_gang gi tshe chos dang ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa 'byung ba de'i tshe lha kun tu rgyu ba rnams kyis myur du lha ma yin rnams pham par byed do/_/de nas lha rnams kyis lha ma yin rnams 
[\[29a.4\]]pham par byas nas/_de nas yang lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan gyi gnas ga la ba der dong ngo /_/de nas lha ma yin gnas gzhan gnyis pa na gnas pa de dag rang gi phyogs mngon par bcom pa mngon du mthong nas/_bdag cag 'di na g.yul 'gyed par 'khod na lha ma 
[\[29a.5\]]yin rnams ci'i phyir 'bros/_lha ma yin rnams ci'i phyir 'bros zhes smras so/_/de nas yang lha ma yin rnams g.yul 'gyed du lha rnams ga la ba der rgyug par byed do/_/de nas lha dang lha ma yin rgya mtsho'i dbus su phan tshun mngon par gnod pa'i g.yul chen po 'khrugs pa bkye 
[\[29a.6\]]bar gyur to/_/de nas gang gi tshe lha rnams rgyal ba de'i tshe lha rnams kyis lha ma yin gyi dpung mngon par bcom mo/_/de'i tshe 'jigs pas bskor ba'i sa na gnas pa'i lha ma yin rnams lha rnams ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do/_/de nas lha rnams kyis lha ma yin gyi 
[\[29a.7\]]dpung mi bzad pa de dag mngon par mthong nas 'khod do/_/de nas lha ma yin rnams yang lha rnams ga la ba der g.yul 'gyed du dong ste/_phan tshun g.yul chen po de dag bkye bar gyur to/_/de nas gang gi tshe lha rnams pham par gyur pa de'i tshe 'jig rten skyong ba dag lha lag 
[\[29b\]]
[\[29b.1\]]na yol go thogs pa dag ga la ba der dong ste/_'di ltar lha ma yin rnams kyis bdag cag mngon par gtses kyis rgyugs shig rgyugs shig ces smras so/_/de thos nas lha lag na yol go thogs pa dag lha ma yin ga la ba der g.yul 'gyed du dong ngo /_/de nas lha 
[\[29b.2\]]lag na yol go thogs pa mtshon cha dang /_lag cha sna tshogs can dag lha ma yin ga la ba der dong ngo /_/de nas lha de dag mngon par mthong nas/_yang lha ma yin rnams khros nas brgyugs so/_/de nas lha lag na yol go thogs pa rnams dang /_lha ma yin de rnams 
[\[29b.3\]]phan tshun spu zing zhes byed pa'i g.yul chen po bkye ba dang /_'di ltar lha dang lha ma yin gyi g.yul 'di lta bu mtshungs pa med pa bkye'o zhes de dag mngon par brjod do/_/de dag gang gi tshe chos dang ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i skye dgu dag 'byung ba de'i tshe lha lag 
[\[29b.4\]]na yol go thogs pa rnams kyis lha ma yin rnams pham par byed de/_de'i tshe rgya mtsho'i dbus su lha dang lha ma yin shin tu 'joms pa chos dang chos ma yin pa la rten pa'i rtags can du gyur pa dag na/_gzhan dang mi 'dra ba'i g.yul bkye'o/_/gang gi tshe lha lag na yol go thogs 
[\[29b.5\]]pa de dag pham par gyur pa de'i tshe 'jig rten skyong ba rnams lha phreng thogs dag ga la ba der dong ste/_lha ma yin rnams pham par mdzod cig ces smras pa dang /_lha ma yin de rnams la mngon par brtags nas/_lha phreng thogs rgyug par byed do/_/lha kun tu rgyu ba dang /_lag na yol 
[\[29b.6\]]go thogs pa dang /_lha phreng thogs de rnams kyang phyogs gcig tu gyur cing /_'jog po dang /_nor rgyas kyi bu la sogs pa yang gcig tu 'dus so/_/lha ma yin sgra gcan gyi sa pa dang /_grong khyer 'od ldan na gnas pa dang /_gnyis shing rtse ba dang /_gnas gnyis pa na gnas pa 
[\[29b.7\]]dang /_/mgul phreng dag ste/_bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa du ma phyogs gcig tu gyur pa dang g.yul chen po bkye ste/_gang gi tshe de dag chos dang ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa byung ba de'i tshe/_lha'i phyogs ni rgyal bar 'gyur la/_lha ma yin gyi phyogs ni pham par 'gyur te/_
[\[30a\]]
[\[30a.1\]]chos la rten pa shin tu legs par 'gyur na/_chos la mi rten pa lta ga la zhig 'gyur/_/gang gi tshe de dag chos dang mi ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su mi 'jug pa byung ba de'i tshe lha ma yin gyi phyogs rgyal bar 'gyur ro/_/lha ma yin gyi dpung de dag 'jig rten skyong ba 
[\[30a.2\]]rnams kyis mngon par mthong nas lha rtag tu myos gnas ga la ba der dong ste/_lha dag lha ma yin gyi phyogs rnams rgyal bar gyur gyis rgyugs shig rgyugs shig ces smras so/_/de thos nas lha rtag tu myos gnas dag lha ma yin gyi phyogs ga la ba der mngon par 
[\[30a.3\]]'joms su dong ste/_mtshon cha dang lag cha sna tshogs thogs pa'i tshogs 'bum phrag du ma dag rgya mtsho'i nang na gnas pa ga la ba der lha ma yin rnams pham par bya ba'i phyir ha ha'i sgra phyung nas rings par mngon par 'joms par byed cing /_rnam par 'joms par byed pa 
[\[30a.4\]]gnod pa du ma byed pa de dag phan tshun g.yul mi bzad pa chen po bkye'o/_/de nas gang gi tshe lha rnams kyis lha ma yin rnams pham par byas pa na/_de dag lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan ga la ba der dong ngo /_/de nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan gyis lha ma yin de dag 
[\[30a.5\]]la 'di skad ces khyed cag gi dpung du bdag cag gnas na/_grogs po dag ci ste 'bros/_ci ste 'bros/_lha dag nyung zhing 'di dag khyed cag las lhag pa med la/_'di dag ni brtson 'grus chung ste/_bdag cag gis lha rnams pham par bya yis/_de lta bas na lha ma yin gyi 
[\[30a.6\]]dbang po dag slar log shig ces smras so/_/de nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan las de skad thos nas/_lha ma yin dag lha rnams dang g.yul 'gyed du phyir log go/_/de nas yang lha dang lha ma yin de dag mtshon cha 'debs pa 'khrugs pa'i rnam pa du ma'i g.yul 'gyed 
[\[30a.7\]]par byed de/_de'i tshe lha ma yin gnas gnyis pa na gnas pa gnyis shing rtse ba dang gnas gsum pa na gnas pa mgul phreng gi ris su gtogs pa thams cad lha dang g.yul 'gyed par phyir log go/_/de dag gang gi tshe/_chos dang mi ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su mi 'jug 
[\[30b\]]
[\[30b.1\]]pa'i skye dgu byung ba de'i tshe/_lha ma yin gyi phyogs kyis lha'i phyogs pham par byed do/_/gal te chos dang ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i skye dgu dag byung na/_lha'i phyogs de dag gis lha ma yin gyi phyogs pham par byed de/_de ltar lha rnams ni chos kyi gtso bo//
[\[30b.2\]]chos kyi rgyal mtshan/_chos la gzhol ba yin no/_/lha ma yin de dag thams cad ni chos dang mi ldan pa/_chos ma yin pa la rten pa/_chos kyis skyob pa ma yin no/_/de nas lha rnams 'di snyam du sems te/_kye ma lha ma yin 'di dag gis bdag cag la de ltar gtse bar ci 
[\[30b.3\]]ste gnas/_'di dag ni bdag cag las khyad zhugs pa yang med la/_mtshungs pa yang ma yin no/_/'dzam bu'i gling na yang da dung du mar 'dzin pa dang /_phar 'dzin pa dang /_chos dang ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa dang /_rgan rabs la rim gro byed pa dang /_gso sbyong 
[\[30b.4\]]la nye bar gnas pa dang /_sbyin pa dag kyang sbyin/_bsod nams dag kyang byed/_bag yod pa la bag yod par gnas pa'i mi dag yod de/_de ltar bag yod pa la bag yod par gnas pa de dag 'chi ba'i dus byas nas lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur te/_lha ma yin 
[\[30b.5\]]gyi chos 'phel ba dang /_chos 'byung bar ni mi 'gyur ro snyam mo/_/de dag gis de ltar rig nas kun tu rgyu ba dang /_phreng thogs dang /_kun di pa ka dang /_rtag tu myos pa'i lha rnams chos kyi rgyal mtshan khyer te/_lha ma yin gyi dpung ga la ba der lha de dag thams cad 
[\[30b.6\]]reg ma thogs par rgyug par byed cing 'di ltar lha ma yin rnams sdod cig_/sdod cig_/khyed cag gis nged rnams la ci'i phyir gtse/_nged cag las khyed kyi dpung khyad zhugs pa yang med/_gtso bo yang ma yin/_mtshon cha yang mi mang bas nged cag 'di rnams ni khyed 
[\[30b.7\]]rnams gzhom pa'i phyir lhags pa yin gyis/_yang sa'i 'og tu ma 'gro shig_/mngon par gtse bar byed pa'i blo can chos dang mi ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su mi 'jug pa 'di dag thams cad la bde ba'am mya ngan las 'das pa med do/_/de skad ces smras nas/_klu nor 
[\[31a\]]
[\[31a.1\]]rgyas kyi bu dang /_'jog po la sogs pa dang lhan cig de dag thams cad dang bdag nyid thams cad las mtshon cha dang /_lag cha char ltar 'bebs shing lha ma yin ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do/_/de nas klu rnams kyang me rab tu 'bar ba char ltar 
[\[31a.2\]]'bebs shing lha ma yin ga la ba der rgyug par byed do/_/de nas lha ma yin rnams kyis kyang klu de dag la mngon par brtags nas/_chos dang mi ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su mi 'jug pa'i klu rab 'joms la sogs pa la/_'di ltar khyed kyang bdag cag gi phyogs yin 
[\[31a.3\]]gyis/_klu'i rgyal po nor rgyas kyi bu dang /_'jog po la sogs pa ga la ba der klu rnams dang g.yul 'gyed du rgyugs shig ces bsgo'o/_/de nas de dag thos nas klu rab 'joms la sogs pa/_klu 'jog po dang /_nor rgyas kyi bu la sogs pa ga la ba der me char ltar 
[\[31a.4\]]'bebs pas mngon par 'tshed par byed do/_/klu de dag gis kyang me'i char chen po 'bebs la lha dang lha ma yin rnams kyang g.yul chen po 'gyed de/_de nas yang lha rnams kyis lha ma yin rnams pham par byas so/_/de nas de dag lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan ga 
[\[31a.5\]]la ba der 'dong bar byed do/_/'jigs shing bzhin mog mog por gyur pa skyabs 'dod pa kun lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan ga la ba de nyid du 'dong bar byed do/_/de nas sgra gcan gyis de dag mthong nas yang 'di ltar bdag 'di na gnas na lha ma yin khyed cag rnams 
[\[31a.6\]]la ci zhig gnod/_/bdag gcig pus lha rnams dbang po dang bcas pa bcom ste/_lha'i 'jig rten thams cad bdag cag gir bya na khyed dang 'khod pas lta smos kyang ci dgos/_lha'i dpung 'di dag kyang chen po ma yin na/_grogs po dag ci gnod/_'di ltar bdag gis lha 
[\[31a.7\]]ma yin gyi dbang po brtan pa dang /_me tog phreng dang /_rab dgod dang /_thags [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ris dag la sbran la bdag nyid kyis lha rnams las rgyal bar bya'o zhes smras so/_/de nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan lha ma yin gyi dbang po brtan pa dang /_lha ma yin gyi dbang 
[\[31b\]]
[\[31b.1\]]po me tog phreng dang /_lha ma yin gyi dbang po rab dgod dang /_lha ma yin gyi dbang po thags [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ris ga la ba der rings par song ste phyin nas/_de dag la 'di ltar lha 'di dag thams cad dang /_rgyal chen bzhi pa thams cad bdag cag gi phyir 'ong gis/_lha ma yin gyi 
[\[31b.2\]]dbang po 'di dag kun shes nas lan bya ba gang yin pa la so sor soms shig ces smras so/_/de nas tshig de thos nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po kun gyis sgra gcan de la 'di ltar lha rnams dang g.yul 'gyed du bdag nyid thams cad kyis bdag cag 'di dag 'khod cing bdag 
[\[31b.3\]]cag rtog par byed kyis sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha kau shi ka la sogs pa dang bcas pa la bar chad bya ba dang /_gang gis lha ma yin rnams 'byung bar bya ba'i phyir khyod song shig ces smras so/_/de nas lha ma yin sgra gcan lha dang lha ma yin gyi g.yul ga la ba der bdag nyid 
[\[31b.4\]]g.yul 'gyed du song ste/_de dag mthong nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po de lha ma yin rnams la kye ma lha'i stobs rab tu che'o/_/kye ma lha ma yin rnams lha'i stobs rab tu che ste/_g.yul 'gyed par lha 'khod pa 'di dag la phyir brgal bar mi nus so zhes smras so/_/de nas 
[\[31b.5\]]lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan lha rnams ga la ba der mtshon cha dang lag cha char ltar 'bebs shing g.yul 'gyed du song ngo /_/de nas lha rnams kyis lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan de ltar rgyug pa mngon par mthong nas/_klu de dag yang lhan cig tu me char ltar mngon par 
[\[31b.6\]]'bebs shing lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan ga la ba der sgra gcan gzhom pa'i phyir rgyug par byed do/_/de nas lha dang lha ma yin de dag gi g.yul chen po mtshon cha dang /_lag cha dang /_rdo rje char ltar 'bebs shing mtshungs par g.yul bkye ba dang /_de dag gang gi tshe chos 
[\[31b.7\]]dang ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa/_dge sbyong du 'dzin pa/_bram zer 'dzin pa/_rigs kyi rgan rabs kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i skye dgu dag byung ba de'i tshe lha rnams kyis lha ma yin rnams pham par byed do/_/gal te chos dang mi ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su mi 'jug pa dag 
[\[32a\]]
[\[32a.1\]]byung ba de'i tshe lha ma yin rnams kyis lha rnams pham par byed de/_de ltar lha dang lha ma yin gyi g.yul chen po 'gyed pa ni/_chos dang chos ma yin pa kho na la rag las pa yin no/_/de nas gang gi tshe lha ma yin rgyal zhing lha pham par gyur pa de'i tshe lha rnams phan 
[\[32a.2\]]tshun du lha dag chos la soms shig_/lha dag chos gtso bor gyis shig_/lha rnams ni chos kyis rgyal bar 'gyur ro zhes brjod do/_/de nas chos yid la byas shing chos la dad pa bskyed pa'i lha rnams yang lha ma yin ga la ba der dong ngo /_/de nas chos kyis bskyabs pa'i lha 
[\[32a.3\]]rnams gzi brjid brgya 'gyur du 'byung ste/_de ltar de dag gzi brjid kyis 'bar ba mngon par mthong nas/_lha ma yin shin tu sgyid lug pa rnams la lha ma yin gyi dbang pos 'di skad ces khyed ci ste sgyid lug_/'di dag ni bdag cag las gzi brjid dam/_mtshon cha'am/_
[\[32a.4\]]lag cha'am/_dpung stobs sam/_phal che ba khyad zhugs pa med de/_de dag la khyed ci ste sgyid lug ces smras so/_/de nas de'i tshig de thos nas yang lha ma yin sgra gcan la sogs pa/_lha rnams ga la ba der phyir log ste 'ong ngo /_/de nas lha chos kyis rgyas pa'i lus 
[\[32a.5\]]can de dag thams cad lha ma yin ga la ba der shugs myur bar rgyug par byed de/_lha dang lha ma yin de dag phan tshun 'dres nas g.yul 'gyed do/_/de dag gi nang na sgra gcan stobs chen por gnas te/_ri rab gnyis pa lta bur gnas so/_/de chos nyid kyi mthus lha rnams 
[\[32a.6\]]kyis pham par byed de/_skyob pa rnams kyi nang na chos skyob pa mchog yin no/_/snang ba rnams kyi nang na chos snang ba mchog yin no/_/de nas lha ma yin sgra gcan la sogs pa lha ma yin pham pa rnams mngon par mthong nas/_lha ma yin kun nas sgyid lug pa rnams 
[\[32a.7\]]de nas yang dbugs phyung ste/_'di skad ces lha ma yin dag ci ste 'bros/_lha ma yin 'di dag mi ngan pa'i sar ci ste gnas/_lha ni lha ma yin du ma'i nang na dpa' bo ma yin/_lag cha thogs pa ma yin/_mtshon chas 'jigs pa ma yin gyis phyir log ste 
[\[32b\]]
[\[32b.1\]]'khod cig_/'di dag gis ci ste gnod ces smras so/_/de nas de'i tshe de thos nas yang lha ma yin rnams g.yul 'gyed du phyir log go/_/de nas yang des gzengs bstod cing mgu bar byas pa/_nga rgyal gyis khengs pa rnams/_lha rnams ga la ba der g.yul bkye ba 
[\[32b.2\]]dang /_de nas yang 'bros so/_/de nas sgra gcan ni lha ma yin de dag kun gyi dang po kho na la 'dug ste/_de dang po kho nar 'dug ste/_de la rten/_des skyob/_de la 'khor ba'i lha ma yin de dag thams cad rgyal chen bzhi'i lha ga la ba der sgra gcan gyi mthu la rten pa/_
[\[32b.3\]]stobs skyes pa dag rgyug par byed cing /_'di ltar bdag cag gi lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan 'di dang po kho na la zhugs pas lha rnams dbang po dang bcas pa yang thub par 'gyur na/_rgyal chen bzhi'i lha 'ba' zhig lta smos kyang ci dgos snyam sems so/_/de nas 
[\[32b.4\]]yang phan tshun rtog cing mtshon cha'i tshogs kyi rgyun gcig la gcig 'debs pa na/_sgra gcan yang lha ma yin rnams rgyal bar bya zhing lha rnams pham par bya ba'i phyir lha ga la 'khod pa der rdo ri tsam 'phen cing gnod par byed do/_/de nas sgra gcan de/_de ltar lha rnams 
[\[32b.5\]]la rdo char ltar 'bebs pa/_'jig rten skyong ba dag gis mngon par mthong nas/_lha rnams la sgra gcan 'di ni rdo char ltar 'bebs pas bdag cag la mngon par gnod par byed na/_lha dag mtshon cha dang /_lag cha char ltar dbab pa rnams kyis de bzlog cing /_'di ltar 
[\[32b.6\]]yang lha rnams la gnod pa med par mdzod cig_/de dag la 'jig rten skyong ba dag gis 'di skad smras nas/_lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan ga la ba der sgra gcan pham par bya ba'i phyir khro ba'i shugs kyis rgyug par byed do/_/de nas sgra gcan dang /_'jig 
[\[32b.7\]]rten skyong ba dag shin tu spu zing zhes byed pa/_rdo dang lag char bsres pa'i g.yul bkye'o/_/rdo char ltar 'bebs pa des rgya mtsho kun nas rab tu 'khrug par byed cing /_lha'i rdo char ltar 'bebs pa rnams kyis kyang /_de ltar rgya mtsho na gnas pa'i sems 
[\[33a\]]
[\[33a.1\]]can 'bum phrag du ma dag gsod par byed/_'khrug par byed/_kun nas rgya mtsho'i dpung 'khrug par byed do/_/de nas sgra gcan de dang /_'jig rten skyong ba dag g.yul chen por bkye ba lha dang lha ma yin rnams kyis mngon par mthong nas ngo mtshar 
[\[33a.2\]]cher skyes te/_kye ma g.yul 'gyed pa rnams kyi nang na 'di ni g.yul chen po yin no zhes brjod do/_/de nas gang gi tshe chos dang ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i skye dgu dag byung ba de'i tshe lag cha dang dpung dang 'jigs par bya ba kun med kyis kyang /_lha ma yin gyi 
[\[33a.3\]]dbang po sgra gcan pham par 'gyur/_gal te chos dang mi ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su mi 'jug pa'i skye dgu dag byung ba de'i tshe/_lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan mngon par mtho bar 'gyur te/_lha rnams ni ma yin no/_/de ltar 'di dag thams cad ni chos gtso bo las gyur te/_glo 
[\[33a.4\]]bur pa ni ma yin no/_/de nas gang gi tshe lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan dpung dang mthu rtsal nyams te/_pham par gyur pa de'i tshe lha ma yin shin tu yi chad pa rnams kyis yang smras pa/_lha ma yin 'di dag ci ste 'bros/_rgud pa'i chos mang po sgrub pa ni bdag cag rgud par 
[\[33a.5\]]gyur te/_nyon mongs pa des chog go chog go/_/bdag cag rang gi gnas rnams su yang bde ba'am/_lha ma yin rnams kyi nang du yang yid bde ba'i ngo bor mi nus te/_blo de lta bu ma byed par blo mthu rtsal dang bcas par gyis shig_/rang gi gnas su 'gro ma 'dod par slar log shig 
[\[33a.6\]]slar log shig_/de nas tshig de thos nas yang lha ma yin thams cad 'jig rten skyong ba dag ga la ba der g.yul 'gyed du brgyugs so/_/de nas yang phan tshun lhan cig rdo mtshungs pa med pa char ltar 'bebs shing ri'i rtse mor glog char ltar 'byin te/_yul ngan du byas par spu shin tu 
[\[33a.7\]]zing zhes byed pa'i g.yul bkye'o/_/de nas yang lha'i dpung gis lha ma yin gyi dpung pham par byas so/_/de nas yang lha ma yin de dag thams cad 'di snyam du sems te/_kye ma lha 'di rnams mthu chen po dang ldan pa yin no/_/'di ltar bdag cag rang gi mthu bskyed 
[\[33b\]]
[\[33b.1\]]pa dang /_de bdag cag gi don dang /_bde ba'i phyir dang /_phan par bya ba'i phyir gnas gnyis pa na gnas pa skar phreng gi bdag po lha ma yin gyi dbang po brtan pa la skyabs su dong bar bya'o/_/lha ma yin gyi dbang po brtan pa de ni rang bzhin gyis brtan pa yin te/_lha dang lha 
[\[33b.2\]]ma yin rnams kyi g.yul du dbang po dang bcas par brgya'am/_yang na stong du stobs kyis rgyal ba yin no snyam mo/_/de nas de ltar lha ma yin gyi gtso bo de dag thams cad lha ma yin gyi dbang po brtan pa ga la ba der dong ngo /_/de nas de dag thams cad kyis lha ma yin gyi dbang 
[\[33b.3\]]po brtan pa de la 'di skad smras so/_/kye ma lha ma yin gyi dbang po dag 'di ltar lha'i phyogs stobs rab tu che ste/_lha ma yin sgra gcan dang bcas pa rnams kyis phyir brgal bar mi nus pas/_lha ma yin gyi dbang pos lha ma yin rnams kyi dpung bgyi ba dang /_skyabs bgyi ba dang /_
[\[33b.4\]]pha rol gzhom pa'i phyir de dag nges par bgyi ba'i rigs so/_/khyod kyi lag na mtshon cha yod pas lha dag dbang po dang bcas pa yang bdag cag la phyir rgol bar mi nus te/_khyod kyis lha dang lha ma yin rnams kyi g.yul du rgyal ba mang du brnyes pa lags so/_/lha ma yin gyi 
[\[33b.5\]]dbang po de dag nges par bzlog tu gsol/_lag na mtshon cha chen po thogs pa/_rang gi dpung dang mthu rtsal bskyed cing lha rnams pham par bgyi ba'i phyir bzlog tu gsol/_khyod kyis brgya byin nyid kyang brgya stong du pham par bgyis te/_lha de rnams khyod kyi mthu rtsal gyis pham 
[\[33b.6\]]par bgyis pa lags so/_/de nas brtan pas lha ma yin gyi dbang po de dag las tshig de thos nas/_lha ma yin gyi dbang po me tog phreng ga la ba dang /_thags [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ris dang /_rab dgod ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/_lha ma yin gyi dbang po de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha 
[\[33b.7\]]ma yin gyi dbang po'i phyogs sgra gcan dang bcas pa lha rnams kyis pham par byas te/_lha rnams ni stobs rab tu che'o/_/stobs rab tu che bas bzod par dka' ste/_lha ma yin rnams kyis bzod par mi nus so/_/g.yul 'gyed par rgyal bar bgyi ba'i phyir de gnang bar 
[\[34a\]]
[\[34a.1\]]mdzod cig_/de nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po me tog phreng dang /_thags [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ris dang /_rab dgod kyis lha ma yin gyi dbang po brtan pa de la 'di skad smras so/_/lha ma yin gyi dbang po bdag cag 'di dag khyod kyi grogs su 'khod pa yin gyis khyod song shig 
[\[34a.2\]]khyod song shig_/bdag cag gis grogs byas pas khyod dang sgra gcan dang bcas pas lha thams cad las kyang rgyal bar nus so/_/de nas tshig de thos nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po brtan pa de lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan ga la ba der g.yul 'gyed pa'i phyir song ngo /_/de nas 
[\[34a.3\]]lha ma yin rnams kyis lha ma yin gyi dbang po brtan pa de mthong nas shin tu mgu zhing mthu rtsal skyes pa rnams lha rnams ga la ba der mtshon cha dang /_lag cha dang /_mda' dag 'phen cing 'debs pa na thams cad lha ma yin gyi dbang po gnyis dang lhan cig lha rnams ga la 
[\[34a.4\]]ba der rgyug par byed do/_/de nas lha rnams kyis lha ma yin de dag mthong nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha ma yin dag 'di ltar yang dang yang du bdag cag rnams kyis pham par bya 'dod dam/_de nas yang brtson 'grus la dmigs nas dud 'gro'i 'gro ba ngo bo nyid kyis pham pa 
[\[34a.5\]]rnams yang 'ong bar byed do/_/de nas de ltar rig nas lha shin tu brtson 'grus brtsams pa/_mtshon cha dang lag cha sna tshogs thogs pa de dag thams cad lha ma yin ga la ba de nyid du 'gros shin tu myur bar 'gro bar byed do/_/de nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po brtan pa dang /_sgra gcan 
[\[34a.6\]]gyis 'di skad smras so/_/lha rnams bdag cag gi steng du 'ongs te/_lha rnams g.yul 'gyed du 'ong ngo /_/bdag cag gis de dag nges par g.yul 'di gnyis kyi bar du bcug ste gzhom par bya'o/_/de nas de skad smras ma thag tu lha ma yin gyi dbang po brtan pa dang /_
[\[34a.7\]]sgra gcan phan tshun rgyal bar 'dod pa dag lhan cig tu rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do/_/de nas lha rnams ni nyi ma nub pa'i phyogs su lta/_lha ma yin rnams ni shar ba'i phyogs su lta ste/_de ltar shar ba'i 'od zer gyi mthu des mig rab tu nyams pa dang /_de 
[\[34b\]]
[\[34b.1\]]nas lha ma yin gyi mtshon cha char ltar 'bebs pa rnams kyis/_lha rnams la dbab par ma nus so/_/de nas lha ma yin mig bsgribs pa rnams phan tshun du 'di ltar nyi ma'i 'od zer rnams kyis mig rab tu nyams te/_bdag cag gis lha rnams la brgal bar mi nus 
[\[34b.2\]]so zhes smras so/_/de nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan gyis rang gi lag pas nyi ma sgrib par byed de/_'di yang nyi ma gzas zin pa'i rgyu gsum pa yin no/_/de'i tshe rgyu mi shes pa'i rtog ge pa rnams 'di ltar lo legs par 'gyur ro/_/lo nyes par 'gyur ro/_/char cher 
[\[34b.3\]]legs par 'bab par 'gyur ro/_/char chung ngu 'bab par 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po la rung bar 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po la mi rung bar 'gyur ro/_/skye bo 'jig par 'gyur ro/_/skye bo 'jig par mi 'gyur ro zhes brjod de/_de ltar bstan bcos ngan pas bslus pa rnams 
[\[34b.4\]]gzhan du rtog par byed do/_/de ltar sgra gcan des nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor de bsgribs te/_'od zer yang bzlog nas blta bar bde ba dang /_lha rnams mngon par mthong nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po brtan pa la smras pa/_lha dag bde bar mthong ngo /_/lha ma yin rnams bde bar 
[\[34b.5\]]ma mthong gis pha rol pham par bya ba la 'bod cig_/de nas lha ma yin rnams mtshon cha'i tshogs rnams char ltar mngon par 'bebs shing lha rnams ga la ba der brtan pas sna drangs nas rgyug par byed do/_/lha rnams kyis kyang de dag mthong nas mtshon cha sna tshogs 
[\[34b.6\]]thogs te/_lha ma yin ga la ba der rgyug par byed do/_/de nas phreng thogs kyi lha rnams ga la ba der brtan pa de dag rgyug cing /_de dag mtshon cha sna tshogs kyi char mngon par 'bebs pa na/_phreng thogs kyi lha rnams kyis de dag mngon par mthong nas 'di skad smras so/_/lha 
[\[34b.7\]]ma yin gyi dbang po dag legs so legs so/_/'di ltar khyed lha rnams kyis lan du ma zhig tu pham par byas kyang khyed chos la so sor rig par mi byed dam/_nged ni chos kyi tshul dang ldan/_chos la gzhol/_chos sgrub pa yin te/_nged ni chos ma spangs pas rgyal bar 'dod 
[\[35a\]]
[\[35a.1\]]do/_/khyed ni brnab sems kyis gnod de/_gzhan gyi rdzas la rang gir bya ba'i brnab sems yod do/_/brnab sems mang ba de ni khyed yin te/_chos ma yin pa dang ldan par gyur pas/_dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang yang dag par ldan pa/_chos 
[\[35a.2\]]dang ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i lha rnams ji ltar pham par bya bar 'dod/_mun pas ni snang gsal chen po rnams kyang zil gyis gnon par mi nus so/_/de nas rnam pa 'di dag smras pa na/_brtan pas de dag la 'di skad smras so/_/kye mang du smra ci dgos 
[\[35a.3\]]khyed kyi 'byor pa la nged rnams kyang smon pa med do/_/lha ma yin gyi dbang po thags [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ris dang /_rab dgod la sogs pa bzhi po 'di dag gi dpung bshams pa rnams kyis lha thams cad pham par bya ba'i phyir 'khod de/_nged ni khyod kyi 'byor pa la dga' ba med do/_/
[\[35a.4\]]de skad smras nas/_phreng thogs kyi lha ga la ba der rgyug par byed do/_/de 'ong bar mngon par mthong nas/_ji ltar de'i lus kyi ngo bo shin tu phra ba yang mi mngon pa de ltar mda' sna tshogs char ltar phab bo/_/de ltar brtan pa mtshon cha'i char gyi nang du tshud nas kyang phreng 
[\[35a.5\]]thogs kyi lha rnams kyis 'di skad smras so/_/las kyis bcom zhing sgrub pa brnab sems mang po 'di cir dgos/_chos ma yin pas ni nams kyang chos zil gyis mnan pa med de/_nged ni khyed la [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]kyang 'tshe bar mi byed na/_nged la ci ste gnod pa byed/_de de 
[\[35a.6\]]skad smra ba na/_lha de dag ga la ba der rgyug par byed do/_/de nas phreng thogs kyi lha rnams kyis klu de dag la smras pa/_dpung don med pas khengs pa 'di khyed kyis me'i char mngon par phob shig dang /_'on kyang dpung gi mthu 'di nyams par 'gyur ro/_/de skad smras 
[\[35a.7\]]pa dang /_klu'i rgyal po 'jog pos phyogs gcig tu klu'i rgyal po rab 'joms la me'i char phab pa dang /_brtan pa ga la ba der rgyug par byed de/_me'i char mngon par phab pa na de lha ma yin gyi dbang po brtan pa ga la ba der brgyugs so/_/de nas lha ma yin dang 
[\[35b\]]
[\[35b.1\]]klu de dag me'i char chen po'i nang du chud par gyur to/_/de nas de dag la me'i char mngon par phab pa dang /_lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan ri dpag tshad bcu pa gcig blangs nas/_phreng thogs kyi lha rnams ga la ba der rgyug par byed do/_/de 'ong ba mngon par 
[\[35b.2\]]mthong nas lha lag na yol go thogs pa dag ri bsreg pa'i phyir me'i char mngon par 'bebs shing rgyug par byed do/_/de nas me'i char des ni ri de thams cad bsregs so/_/de ltar de bsregs par rig nas brtan pa de mthu nyams te/_lha de rnams la 'di skad smras so/_/
[\[35b.3\]]'di ltar bdag gis ri rab tu 'bar ba gzhan thams cad steng du dbab bo/_/de nas lha ma yin rnams kyis ri rab tu 'bar ba gzhan zhig de'i drung du khyer ro/_/de nas brtan pa des de khyer nas lha rnams kyi steng du 'phangs so/_/de nas lha de rnams kyis lha ma yin chen po la 
[\[35b.4\]]'di skad smras so/_/chos ma yin pas ni chos las rgyal bar mi nus te/_nged ni chos mdun du byas nas gnas so/_/khyed ni chos ma yin pa la brten nas gnas so/_/de ltar de dag lha rnams kyis spyos pa mthong nas/_lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan gyis lha ma yin 
[\[35b.5\]]thams cad bsdus te lha rnams ga la ba der dong ngo /_/de ltar de dag 'ong ba mngon par mthong nas/_lha rnams kyang lha ma yin dag ga la ba der rgyug par byed de/_lha dang lha ma yin de dag mtshon cha du ma dang ldan pa'i g.yul shin tu mi bzad pa bkye bar gyur to/_/de nas 
[\[35b.6\]]lha rnams kyis chos brjod/_bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs byas/_dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba yid la byas nas/_lha ma yin ga la ba der dong ngo /_/lha de dag mthong ma thag tu lha ma yin gyi dpung de thams cad brgya'am stong du bcom mo/_/de 
[\[35b.7\]]nas lha ma yin de dag thams cad sa'i 'og ga la ba der bros so/_/klu chos dang mi ldan pa rab 'joms la sogs pas lha ma yin de dag la 'di skad smras so/_/lha ma yin dag bdag cag bor nas ci ste 'bros/_klu 'jog po dang /_nor rgyas kyi bu la sogs pa de dag bdag 
[\[36a\]]
[\[36a.1\]]cag gis thub na/_khyed kyis lha 'di dag 'ba' zhig thub par 'gyur ro/_/gang de ltar 'jigs par gnas na/_rang gi dpung nyams drod med par ci'i phyir sa'i 'og nas ldang /_lha rnams dang lhan cig ci'i phyir 'gal bar byed/_'gal ba'i rang bzhin 
[\[36a.2\]]can khyed ni sa'i 'og tu 'dong du yod grang na nged gar 'dong /_'jog po dang nor rgyas kyi bu la sogs pas bcom pa gar 'dong /_lha ma yin de dag gis de skad thos nas/_de nas yang lha rnams ga la ba der g.yul 'gyed du slar log go_/de nas yang thogs pa med 
[\[36a.3\]]pa'i blo can de dag lha ma yin ga la ba der thams cad 'bad de brgyugs so/_/de nas de dag 'ong ba mngon par mthong ste/_lha ma yin rnams kyis bzlog par ma nus so/_/de nas yang lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan lha ma yin gyi dbang po brtan pa dang lhan cig tu 
[\[36a.4\]]sa'i 'og ga la ba der dong ngo /_/de nas lha ma yin gyi dpung de ltar nyams pa mthong nas/_lha ma yin kha cig lha ma yin gyi dbang po gnas gsum pa na gnas pa ga la ba der brgyugs te/_'di ltar rgyal po chen po me tog phreng bzhengs/_lha'i tshogs de dag bzlog 
[\[36a.5\]]tu mi rung la/_lha ma yin thams cad pham par byas te phyogs kun du bkod par gyur to/_/khyod kyis ni lha dang lha ma yin gyi g.yul du mar rnam par rgyal ba brnyes la/_rgyal ba brnyes par 'gyur gyis/_khyod kyis de dag dgongs te bzhengs/_lha'i dbang po bcas 
[\[36a.6\]]pa las rgyal bar spyon cig_/lha ma yin gyi dbang po me tog phreng gis de dag thams cad yid la bzung nas mtshon cha dang lag cha rnam pa sna tshogs thogs/_lha ma yin bye ba du mas yongs su bskor/_nam mkha'i phyogs thams cad sgra rnams kyis yongs su 'gengs 
[\[36a.7\]]shing /_de dag lha dang lha ma yin gyi g.yul ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do/_/lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan gyis stong snyed 'ong ba mngon par mthong nas/_brtan pa la smras pa/_'di dag ni lha ma yin gyi dbang po me tog phreng yin te/_bdag cag gi 'byor par bya 
[\[36b\]]
[\[36b.1\]]ba dang /_lha rnams pham par bya ba'i phyir 'ong gis/_lha ma yin de dag slar zlog shig_/'di ni lha ma yin gyi dbang po bdag cag gi 'byor par bya ba'i phyir 'ong ngo /_/de thos nas lha ma yin dag de nas yang g.yul 'gyed pa'i phyir phyir log go/_/de nas yang de dag rgyal 
[\[36b.2\]]chen bzhi'i lha rnams ga la ba der lhags so/_/de dag lhags pa na lha rnams kyis 'di skad smras so/_/dud 'gro khyed yun ji srid cig tu de skyong bar byed/_gti mug gis bsgribs pa khyed rnams rang gi dpung gzhig par bya ba'i phyir log gam/_de skad smras nas/_de 
[\[36b.3\]]nas yang lha rnams lha ma yin ga la ba der brgyugs so/_/de nas me tog phreng gis lha ma yin de dag la 'di skad smras so/_/lha ma yin rnams bzlums te 'khod pa ci sems lha rnams la gnod pa ci'i phyir mi bya/_so sor mi 'thun par 'khod pa lha rnams pham par mi bya 
[\[36b.4\]]'am/_/'di na bdag gnas pa gcig pus lha thams cad las rgyal bar nus na/_gang lha ma yin gyi dbang po brtan pa dang /_seng ge mo'i bu sgra gcan bdag cag gi grogs su gyur pas smos kyang ci dgos te/_'jigs par ma byed cig_/khyed cag kun kyang 
[\[36b.5\]]thams cad du g.yul gyi 'jigs pa med pa yin na/_sgyid lug pa des ma chog gam/_lha ma yin rnams rgyal bar gyur cig_/lha ma yin rnams mthu rtsal dang bcas pas rnam par rgyal bar gyur cig_/de skad ces smras nas/_de nas yang lha ma yin gyi dbang po 
[\[36b.6\]]me tog phreng dang /_lha ma yin gyi dbang po rnams dang lhan cig lha me tog phreng thogs dang /_rtag tu myos gnas dang /_lag na yol go thogs dang /_pi bang can gsum pa'i lha'i dbang po rnams bai DUr+ya'i ri'i rtse mor 'dzegs te/_'khod cing thams cad du khyab par 
[\[36b.7\]]byas nas sred pa skye ste/_'di ltar sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang brgya byin med kyang bdag cag 'ba' zhig gis lha ma yin rnams chos gcig dang bcas pas lan du mar thub par byas so/_/de dag gis de skad smras pa dang /_lha ma yin rnams kyis rgya 
[\[37a\]]
[\[37a.1\]]mtsho de nyid khyab par byas nas/_de nas yang g.yul 'gyed par byung ngo /_/de nas lha rnams kyis lha ma yin de dag 'ong ba mngon par mthong nas smras pa/_'di ltar lha ma yin bdag nyid thams cad dpung ches 'phel te/_'ong gis 'di dag ni nges par lha 
[\[37a.2\]]ma yin gyi dbang po gsum pa me tog phreng yin te/_de dag 'ong ba lta zhing de dag la de skad smras pa dang /_lha ma yin g.yul 'gyed par mdun nyid na 'khod do/_/de nas lha rnams kyis de dag mthong nas smras pa/_khyed gang gis bslus nas 'ongs/_da dung du chos dang ldan 
[\[37a.3\]]zhing chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i mi mar 'dzin pa/_phar 'dzin pa/_dge sbyong du 'dzin pa/_bram zer 'dzin pa/_dge ba don du gnyer ba/_dge ba la zhugs pa yod de/_de dag shi ba'i dus byas nas lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de ni nged yin te/_khyed 
[\[37a.4\]]pas ches dpung che la ches gtso bo yin no/_/de lta bas na chos bsgrubs pa bdag cag la khyed kyis mngon par ma gtse shig_/bdag cag la khyed kyis ci'i phyir gtse/_de nas de skad smras pa dang /_lha ma yin rnams kyis lha rnams kyi tshig rtsis la ma chags par 
[\[37a.5\]]byas nas/_lha rnams dang g.yul 'gyed pa'i phyir lhags so/_/de nas lha rnams yang lha ma yin rnams ga la ba der nam mkha' bkang nas lha ma yin rnams gzhom pa'i phyir dang /_de dag phan tshun rgyal bar bya ba'i phyir 'dong bar byed do/_/de nas yang de dag 
[\[37a.6\]]g.yul gyi rnam pa de lta bu bkye ste/_sgra gang gis rgya mtsho na gnas pa nya dang /_srog chags dung dang /_chu srin dang /_chu srin byis pa gsod dang /_nya mid dang /_nya mid chen po dang /_chu srin na kra dang /_chu srin du na d+hu gsod mang po rnams kyi snying brgya'am stong du rnam par 
[\[37a.7\]]gas so/_/de dag mtshon cha dpe med pa du ma char gyi rgyun ltar shin tu 'bab pas lha dang lha ma yin g.yul bkye'o/_/lha ma yin gyi dbang po me tog phreng gis lha ma yin de dag bkye nas gcig pu 'dug ste/_lha rnams la 'di skad smra'o/_/nga nyid kyis yun ring du g.yul 'dir 
[\[37b\]]
[\[37b.1\]]ma 'dug ste/_de 'dug na ni rnam par rgyal ba thob pas dang khyed rnams gzhom pa'i phyir dang /_lha ma yin rnams 'byor par bya ba'i phyir 'ongs pa yin no/_/nga 'ba' zhig 'dug pas lha dbang po dang bcas pa yang mdun du 'dug mi nus na/_rgyal chen bzhi'i lha 'ba' zhig 
[\[37b.2\]]lta smos kyang ci dgos te/_ngas pham par bya'o/_/de skad smras nas/_lha rnams ga la ba der 'gro bar byed do/_/lha lag na yol go thogs pa rnams kyis de 'ong bar mngon par mthong nas/_lha ma yin gyi dbang po me tog phreng de gzhom pa'i phyir ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do/_/
[\[37b.3\]]de nas rgya mtsho'i dbus nas ri dpag tshad lnga pa dang /_dpag tshad bzhi pa dang /_dpag tshad gsum pa dang /_dpag tshad gnyis pa dang /_dpag tshad kyi tshad rab tu 'bar ba dag phyung zhing phyung zhing lha lag na yol go thogs pa ga la ba der 'phen par byed do/_/de 'phen pa na 
[\[37b.4\]]lha lag na yol go thogs pa rnams kyis chos rjes su dran par byas/_dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song nas/_mda'i rgyun rnams kyis ri de dag rgya mtsho'i dbus der bye ma chang pa nas gtor ba bzhin du gtor to/_/me tog phreng des las kyi 'bras bu de dag med par 
[\[37b.5\]]mngon par mthong nas lag na dbyug to thogs te/_lha lag na yol go thogs pa ga la ba de'i mdun nyid du 'dug go/_/de dag 'khor dang bcas/_dpung dang /_mthu dang bcas pa 'ong ba mngon par mthong nas char gnam lcags lta bu'i mthu yis dbyug to de gcod par byed cing /_
[\[37b.6\]]lha ma yin de dag nyams smad de de ltar de dag pham par byas so/_/lha ma yin gyi dbang po brtan pa yang lha rtag tu myos gnas ga la ba der g.yul 'gyed pa'i phyir mtshon cha kun 'joms dpag tshad tsam blangs nas 'dong bar byed do/_/de nas lha ma yin gyi rgyal pos lha de dag la 'di 
[\[37b.7\]]skad smras so/_/'di ltar de ring bdag gis thams cad las rgyal bar bya ste/_thams cad mtshon cha kun 'joms gyis gshin rje'i gnas ga la ba der nye bar bkye'o zhes de skad sgra bsgrags nas lha rtag tu myos gnas rnams ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do/_/'jig rten skyong ba rnams kyis 
[\[38a\]]
[\[38a.1\]]de 'ong ba mngon par mthong nas lag stobs kyis mtshon cha phrogs te/_lha ma yin de nyid kyi brang du brgyab bo//_//'phags pa dam pa'i chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa/_bam po nyer bzhi pa/_de mtshon cha des brgyab pa dang nyams nas sa'i 'og 
[\[38a.2\]]ga la ba der 'gro bar byed do/_/de'i 'khor lha ma yin mgul phreng rnams kyis gang gis nyams pa mngon par mthong nas/_nyams pa srog gi lhag ma lus pa de dag thams cad kyang sa'i 'og ga la ba der rgyug par byed do/_/lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan yang 'khor dang bcas te/_lha 
[\[38a.3\]]pi bang can gsum pa ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do/_/rang gi lag mthus dregs pa de dag 'ongs pa mngon par mthong nas lha rnams me char ltar mngon par 'bebs shing /_de dag kyang lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan ga la ba der rgyug par byed do/_/me char ltar phab pa des kun du 
[\[38a.4\]]mngon par sreg pa na 'khor dang bcas par sa'i 'og ga la ba de nyid du rgyug par byed do/_/lha ma yin gyi dbang po gsum po de dag mthong nas lha rnams ni snying rab tu dga' bar gyur/_lha ma yin rnams ni yid dman par gyur te/_mthu rtsal nyams pa/_mgon 'dod pa/_
[\[38a.5\]]skyabs 'dod pa/_dpung gnyen 'dod pa thams cad sa'i 'og gi sgo ga la ba der rgyug par byed do/_/de dag gang gi tshe sa'i 'og gi sgo der lhags pa de'i tshe/_lha rnams yang bai DUr+ya'i ri'i rtse mo de nyid la 'dzegs te 'khod do/_/'di ltar lha ma yin rnams gor ma chag par yang 
[\[38a.6\]]'ong bar 'gyur te/_gang gi phyir thags [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ris dang rab dgod dag da dung du ma 'ongs te/_lha ma yin de dag ni de la srog ltos/_de la rten/_de gtso bor byed pa yin no/_/de las rgyal ba ni/_thams cad las rgyal bar 'gyur la/_de las pham na ni 'di dag thams cad las 
[\[38a.7\]]pham par 'gyur ro zhes de skad smras nas/_lha thams cad dga' ba shin tu skyes/_mthu shin tu skyes te/_de skad brjod cing g.yul 'gyed pa'i phyir nges par gnas par byed do/_/klu'i rgyal po rab 'joms la sogs pa yang longs spyod ldan gyi grong khyer ga la ba de na klu'i rgyal po nor 
[\[38b\]]
[\[38b.1\]]rgyas kyi bu dang /_'jog po la sogs pas dpung gi mthu rtsal lhag ma lus pa rnams bcom mo/_/de dag kyang rab dgod de la shin tu sems shing de'i tshe de la dpung tshol te/_des lha rnams gzhom par nus kyi/_gzhan du na lha ma yin gyi phyogs ni shin tu pham la/_lha'i phyogs 
[\[38b.2\]]ni rab tu 'phel to snyam mo/_/de ltar lha ma yin gyi phyogs klu dang lha ma yin de dag thams cad yid sdug bsngal zhing gnas so/_/de ltar de dag gnas shing lha ma yin rnams kyang yid dman par gnas te/_thags [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ris dang /_rab dgod dag gis 'di ltar lha ma yin 
[\[38b.3\]]gnas gsum pa na gnas pa me tog phreng dang /_brtan pa dang /_sgra gcan yang pham par gyur to zhes thos te/_de ltar mthu med par byas so/_/de ltar spro ba med pa/_dpung dang mthu nyams pa de dag la mgon gzhan med de/_'di ltar lha ma yin gyi dbang po khyod du bas so/_/
[\[38b.4\]]de nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po rab dgod kyis 'di skad smras so/_/lha ma yin rnams lha ma yin gyi dbang po gsum dag ga la gnas rtogs shig rtogs shig_/de skad smras pa dang /_lha ma yin rnams kyis lha ma yin gyi dbang po de la 'di skad smras so/_/'di ltar sa'i 
[\[38b.5\]]'og gi sgo'i tha ma na lha ma yin dpung dang mthu nyams pa thams cad khyod la srog ltos/_khyod la dpung tshol/_khyod la rten cing mchis te/_mtshar kho nar ngo tsha nas sa'i 'og gi nang du yang mchi ba'i rngo ma thogs so/_/de nas thags [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ris dang rab dgod kyis 'di skad smras so/_/
[\[38b.6\]]ci lha de rnams kyi brgya byin 'ongs sam ma 'ongs/_lha ma yin rnams kyis smras pa/_ma mchis so/_/de nas rab dgod khros pa'i mig dmar pos rang gi dpung la lta zhing 'di skad smras so/_/rgyal chen bzhi pa dag nyi tshes gnas gsum du gtogs pa'i lha ma yin rnams 
[\[38b.7\]]pham par byas/_dpung dang mthu nyams par byas/_brtson pa med par byas te/_kye ma lha ma yin rnams lha'i ris nyi tshe gang gis dpung dang mthu nyams par byas pa de'i phyir 'di ltar nga cha ste/_lha thams cad pham par bya'o/_/de skad smras nas/_lha ma yin gyi dbang po 
[\[39a\]]
[\[39a.1\]]de lha ma yin gyi dbang po kun gyi dpung bas lhag par brtson pa gang yin pa des dpon sna thams cad la bsgo ba 'di ltar lha gsad pa dang /_lha gzhom pa dang /_lha rnams la bar chad bya ba'i phyir bdag cha yis rnga bo che rdungs shig rdungs shig_/lha dang brgya byin du 
[\[39a.2\]]bcas pa nga gcig pus thub par bya ste/_nga ni bdag bar ma dor pham par mi 'dod do/_/gang lha'i brtson 'grus dpung dang ldan pa dag lha ma yin gyi bu mo rnams la lta ba dang /_nyug par 'dod pa ci ngas mi shes snyam mam/_de skad smras nas thags [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ris dang /_rab dgod de dag rnga 
[\[39a.3\]]sgra 'byin cing lha ma yin rnams rgyugs shig rgyugs shig_/'di ltar ngas lha thams cad pham par bya ba dang /_lha ma yin thams cad 'byor par bya ba'i phyir bdag nyid cha'o/_/des de skad ces bsgo nas shing rta 'khor lo rtsibs 'bum dang /_lha ma yin gyi 'od nyi ma lta bu bye ba phrag du ma dag 
[\[39a.4\]]chas so/_/de chas pa dang /_ri dang /_chu bo dang /_ri khrad khrod dang /_ri 'or dang /_ri'i rtse mo dang /_ri rab tu bcas pa g.yo ba nas legs mthong gi tshal na lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin lha'i 'dun sa chos bzang na 'dug pa'i stan gyi bar du g.yo ba dang /_de 'di snyam du sems 
[\[39a.5\]]te/_/kye e ma bdag gi stan yang g.yo ba las na gor ma chag par lha dang lha ma yin g.yul 'gyed par 'gyur te/_lha ma yin gyi rgyal po thags [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ris de chas pa ltar/_'di ltar tshal dang /_nags tshal 'di dang /_ri khrad khrod dang /_chu klung dang /_ri ngos dang bcas pa thams 
[\[39a.6\]]cad dang /_ri'i rgyal po ri rab 'di yang rab tu g.yo'o/_/brgya byin des de ltar rig nas/_lha rnams la bsgo ba/_sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams chos shig chos shig_/'di ltar rab dgod dang thags [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ris dag lha rnams pham par bya ba'i phyir cha zhing 'dug go/_/de'i 
[\[39a.7\]]phyir bdag nyid kyang 'di ltar glang po che sa srung gi bu la zhon te/_lha thams cad dang lhan cig tu lha dang lha ma yin gyi g.yul ga la ba der 'dong bar bya'o/_/gang gi phyir rab dgod dang /_thags [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ris kyi g.yul 'gyed pa gang yin pa der lha 'dug pa ni ngas ma mthong ngo /_/
[\[39b\]]
[\[39b.1\]]de skad smras pa dang /_'di ltar lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin de ni dpung gi gtso bo yin te/_lha'i 'dun sa chos bzang dang /_grong khyer blta na sdug na gnas pa rnams la yang bsgo/_bzhi mdo dang bzhi mdo/_/sum mdo dang sum mdo dag tu yang 'di ltar lha rnams kyi dbang 
[\[39b.2\]]po brgya byin de ni lha dang lha ma yin gyi g.yul 'gyed par 'gro ste/_rab dgod dang thags [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ris dag ga la ba de nyid du thams cad 'dong bar bya'o zhes bsgo'o/_/de nas de dag la de skad smras pa dang /_lag cha dang /_mtshon cha sna tshogs kyi gnas su gyur pa/_shing rta 
[\[39b.3\]]sna tshogs kyi tshal du 'dong bar byed de/_mtshon cha thams cad yod pa der lha brgya'am/_stong ngam/_khri'am/_bye ba mtshon cha don du gnyer ba de dag shing rta sna tshogs kyi tshal du 'dong bar byed do/_/de dag rgyug pa na rgya mtsho brug pa lta bu'i sgra byung ste/_lha rnams phan tshun 
[\[39b.4\]]'dong ba shin tu brtul ba'i rdul gang gis nam mkha' yog par gyur pa rnam pa de lta bu byung ngo /_/de ltar de dag mtshon cha rnams blangs nas nam mkha' la rgyu ba rnams ni nam mkha' la/_skam sa la rgyu ba rnams ni skam sa la/_ri'i rtse mo la rgyu ba rnams ni ri'i rtse mo kun du gang nas 
[\[39b.5\]]'dong ngo /_/lha gzhan tshal dang /_nags tshal dag na gnas shing rtser dong ba'i lha gang yin pa de dag kyang rnga sgra thos nas/_shing rta sna tshogs kyi tshal ga la ba der rgyug par byed do/_/sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i 'dod pa kun kyang btang nas/_thams cad rgyug par byed do/_/
[\[39b.6\]]mtshon cha dang /_lag cha dang /_go mtshon rab tu mang po brgya'am/_stong ngam/_bye ba'am/_bye ba brgya phrag stong snyed dag blangs nas/_de dag thams cad brgya byin shin tu mthong bar 'dod cing 'khod do/_/de nas brgya byin gyis de dag gi nyams drod rig nas lha thams cad rab tu 
[\[39b.7\]]dga' bar byed cing shing rta rab tu mang po la zhon te/_shing rta kha cig ni rin po che sna bdun gyis brgyan/_kha cig ni gser gyis brgyan/_kha cig ni dngul gyis brgyan/_kha cig ni bai DUr+yas brgyan/_kha cig ni shel gyis brgyan/_kha cig ni spug la sogs pa'i rin po che chen po 
[\[40a\]]
[\[40a.1\]]rnams kyis brgyan/_kha cig ni nor bu sna tshogs kyis brgyan cing /_dril bu g.yer kha'i dra bas gtibs pa/_kun nas mdzes pa/_las kyi mchog ji lta ba bzhin du thob pa/_rang gi gzi brjid kyis rtag tu mdzes pa na kha cig ni gser gyi ri rab kyi rtse mo 
[\[40a.2\]]dag khyab par gnas so/_/brgya'am stong snyed kha cig ni nam mkha' la dong ste/_lha'i dbang po lha ma yin rnams pham par bya ba'i phyir nam 'gro zhig gu snyam nas/_brgya byin la shin tu lta zhing 'khod do/_/de ltar phan tshun kun nas gtam zer zhing 'khod do/_/'thab pa la 
[\[40a.3\]]yid zhugs pa thams cad 'khod do/_/de dag de ltar 'khod pa dang /_lha'i dbang pos glang po che'i kha lo sgyur ba ma ta li la bsgo ba/_'di ltar bzang po song la nga'i glang po che sa srung gi bu glang po che thams cad kyi yon tan dang ldan pa kha drug yod pa de la zhon nas ngas lha ma yin 
[\[40a.4\]]rnams pham par bya'o zhes sgo shig_/de nas ma ta lis brgya byin gyi bka' mnos nas/_rang gi 'dod pas sprul pa'i pad ma'i tshal na glang po che sa srung gi bu glang po che mang pos yongs su bskor ba ga la ba der song ngo /_/de nas glang po che cang shes de la 'di skad smras so/_/
[\[40a.5\]]'di ltar lha'i dbang po brgya byin de khyod la 'bod de/_lha ma yin gyi g.yul du khyod la zhon nas lha ma yin rnams pham par bya'o zhes gsung ngo /_/de nas glang po che sa srung gi bu ma ta li ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_lha'i 'dun sa chos bzang ga la ba der song ngo /_/der 'ongs 
[\[40a.6\]]pa dang ma ta lis brgya byin la smras pa/_lha'i dbang po 'di ltar glang po che'i mchog de mchis so/_/brgya byin gyi rdzu 'phrul gyis de'i lus de la kha skyon med pa brgya sprul par byed de/_kha re re la so dkar po bcu bcu/_so re re la pad ma'i rdzing bu bcu bcu/_pad ma'i rdzing 
[\[40a.7\]]bu re re la pad ma stong stong /_pad ma re re la ri bo bcu bcu/_ri bo re re la pog ri brgya brgya/_pog ri re re la lha mo brgya brgya/_sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pas glu len bro rdung zhing /_shin tu chags su rung ba gzhan dang mi 'dra ba'i glu dbyangs dang yang dag par ldan 
[\[40b\]]
[\[40b.1\]]pa dag len te/_de ltar glang po'i mchog sa srung gi bu la lha'i dbang po brgya byin sprul pa byed do/_/glang po che'i dbang po de yang lus kun nas dpag tshad stong yod do/_/lha'i dbang po brgya byin lha ma yin rnams pham par bya ba'i phyir sil snyan dang /_rol mo'i sgra dang /_
[\[40b.2\]]glu dang /_ca co dang /_ga zha'i sgra dbyangs 'byin pa rnams kyis rnam par mdzes pa na kun nas rnam pa de lta bu dang ldan pa'i glang po che mchog dkar po de la zhon no/_/de nas de 'gro ba mngon par mthong nas/_lha rnams kyang shing rta kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs la zhon te/_
[\[40b.3\]]mtshon cha sna tshogs ni thogs/_lus la rgyan sna tshogs ni btags/_dgod pa dang /_rtse ba dang /_sgra di ri ri 'don pa dang /_rab tu dga' ba'i yid rnam pa du ma phyir zhing yid rab tu dga' bar gyur to/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin dbus kyi stan la 'dug ste/_bsod nams 
[\[40b.4\]]kyi stobs chen po dang ni ldan/_lha'i mchog mang pos ni yongs su bskor/_gzhan dang mi 'dra bar ni brjid/_lha rnam pa sna tshogs kyis ni yongs su bskor te/_sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i bdag po nyi ma 'bum bas lhag pa'i 'od kyis nam mkha' 'gengs shing /_sil 
[\[40b.5\]]snyan dang /_glu dbyangs rnam pa sna tshogs kyis 'gengs pa na/_nam mkha'i dpag tshad nyi khrir bkang nas lha dang lha ma yin gyi g.yul ga la ba der 'jug par byed do/_/de nas de 'jug pa na/_'jig rten skyong ba rnams bred skad 'byin cing /_brgya byin gyi drung du phyin nas/_'di 
[\[40b.6\]]ltar lha'i dbang po lha rnams pham par bya ba'i phyir rab dgod dang /_thags [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ris dag mchi ste/_'di ltar rgya mtsho thams cad rab tu dkrugs/_ri bor gtogs pa stong rab tu g.yo bar bgyid/_lha ma yin rnams sgra 'jebs par 'byin te/_shin tu 'jigs 
[\[40b.7\]]pa'i sgra thos so/_/gang thos nas rgya mtsho na gnas pa nya dang klu dag kyang mthu chung bar gyur/_srin po dang sha za dag kyang gum par gyur/_klu'i rgyal po chos dang mi ldan pa rab 'joms la sogs pa ni shin tu dga' nas/_'brug sgra 'byin/_klu'i rgyal po chos 
[\[41a\]]
[\[41a.1\]]dang ldan pa 'jog po dang /_nor rgyas kyi bu la sogs pa ni 'di ltar lha ma yin gyi dbang po thags [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ris sa'i 'og nas byung ngo snyam nas/_yid dman par gyur te/_'brug sgra mi sgrogs/_gser gyi ri bo drug khri ri rab dang bcas pa gang yin 
[\[41a.2\]]pa de dag thams cad kyang g.yo bar bgyid/_'byung po thams cad kyang sgyid lug par gyur nas/_phreng thogs dang /_rtag tu myos gnas dang /_lag na yol go thogs pa dang /_pi bang can gsum pa shin tu sgyid lug pa rnams kyis bdag lha'i dbang po'i drung 
[\[41a.3\]]du mngags pa lags na/_lha lan du bgyi ba gang lags pa de bsgrub tu gsol/_'di ltar bdag cag rnams kyis ni gnas gsum du gtogs pa'i lha ma yin gyi dbang po gsum po me tog phreng dang /_sgra gcan dang /_brtan pa dag g.yul du lan brgya 
[\[41a.4\]]'am stong du thub lags so/_/'jig rten skyong ba rnams las de skad thos nas/_lha'i dbang pos de dag la smras pa/_'jig rten skyong ba rnams 'di dag thams cad ji lta ba bzhin bdag gis rig ste/_'di ltar rab dgod dang thags [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ris dag chas pa'i 
[\[41a.5\]]phyir bdag kyang de dag chad pas gcad pa dang /_lha de rnams kyi skyabs dang dpung bya ba'i phyir 'di ltar bdag 'gro bar bya'o/_/bdag ni chos kyi skyabs/_chos kyi dpung gnyen/_chos kyi rten/_chos kyi rgyal mtshan/_chos tshol ba yin te/_bdag ni chos ma yin 
[\[41a.6\]]pa la mi dga' la/_chos ma yin pa la yid kyang mi 'jug go/_/de ltar bdag cag yon tan de lta bu dang ldan pa rnams la nams kyang thub par mi 'gyur gyis/_de dag la ma 'jigs shig ma 'jigs shig_/bdag kyang dpung gi tshogs rab tu mang pos lha ma yin ga 
[\[41a.7\]]la ba der 'gro bar bya yis/_de dag la 'jigs par ma byed cig_/'dzam bu'i gling na da dung du mar 'dzin pa dang /_phar 'dzin pa dang /_dge sbyong du 'dzin pa dang /_bram zer 'dzin pa dang /_byas pa gzo ba dang /_chos dang ldan zhing chos skyong ba dang /_dam pa'i 
[\[41b\]]
[\[41b.1\]]chos la dga' ba dang /_dam pa'i chos dang dge 'dun la gus pa dang /_las dang 'bras bu'i de nyid rig pa dang /_gso sbyong la nye bar gnas pa dang /_sbyin pa dag sbyin par byed/_bsod nams byed pa'i rang bzhin can dag rjes su skyong bar byed/_ye shes la goms par 
[\[41b.2\]]byed/_de la yid zhugs par byed pa dag yod la/_bdag gis kyang chos dang 'thun pa'i chos kyi rang bzhin can bsgrubs te/_de dag dang bdag cag nyung gis kyang lha ma yin du gtogs pa rnams kyis 'jigs pa med do/_/de skad smras nas lha'i dbang po bai DUr+ya'i ri ga la ba 
[\[41b.3\]]dang /_rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams ga la ba der song ste/_de dag mngon par mthong nas lha'i dbang pos smras pa/_'jig rten skyong ba dag rgyal chen bzhi'i lha 'di dag 'khod pa ni lha ma yin rnams pham par bya ba'i phyir 'khod pa yin no/_/lha'i dbang pos de skad smras pa dang /_
[\[41b.4\]]'jig rten skyong ba dag gis slar smras pa/_'di ltar rgyal chen bzhi'i lha 'di dag ni brgya byin khyod la rten/_khyod la skyabs tshol/_khyod la gnas pa kho na lags te/_lha ma yin gyi dbang po tshogs dang bcas pa yang rtsis la ma chags par bgyid do/_/de skad smras pa na sum cu rtsa 
[\[41b.5\]]gsum pa'i lha rnams brgya byin la/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin sngon du 'dren pa dang bcas par rgyal bar spyon cig ces gsong por smra zhing stod par byed do/_/de lha'i tshogs kyis bstod cing rgyal chen bzhi'i lha ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do/_/de nas lha'i dbang po 'khor dang 
[\[41b.6\]]bcas pa shing rta 'bum phrag du ma dang lha'i tshogs kyis ni yongs su bskor/_glang po che sa srung gi bu la ni snga ma bzhin zhon/_rin po che sna bdun gyis ni mdzes par byas/_nam mkha' ltar rtag tu lus 'od kyis ni gsal bar byas/_phyogs bcur rol mo'i sgra dang /_
[\[41b.7\]]sil snyan gyi sgra du mas ni bkang /_lha yid rab tu dga' ba 'bum phrag du mas ni yongs su bskor/_ri rab thams cad la gnas pa'i dri za rnams kyis ni mdzes par byas/_lha dang drang srong gi tshogs rnams kyis ni mngon par bstod de/_bde ba dpe med pa 
[\[42a\]]
[\[42a.1\]]nyams su myong zhing las kyi 'bras bu shin tu legs pa la spyod pa 'ong ba dag mthong nas rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams yid rab tu dga' bar gyur to/_/de nas de dag mngon par mthong nas smras pa/_'di ltar nga ni lha ma yin pham par bya ba'i phyir nga dpung
