[\[42a.2\]]chen po dang lhags pa yin gyis ma 'jigs shig ma 'jigs shig_/de thos nas rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams yid rab tu dga' ste 'di skad smras so/_/lha'i dbang po 'di ltar lha ma yin 'di dag bdag cag 'ba' zhig gis kyang pham par bgyi ba'i slad du mchis pa 
[\[42a.3\]]lags na/_lha'i dbang po dang bcas pas lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/_khyod kyi dpung gis bdag cag bskyabs pas na/_lha ma yin du gtogs pa'i 'jigs pa [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]kyang ma mchis so/_/de skad smras nas lha ma yin lta ba kho nar 'dod pa de la mngon du phyogs 
[\[42a.4\]]pa lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin de ga la ba der yongs su bskor te/_'khod pa rnams 'di ltar lha ma yin gyi dbang po thags [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ris de lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan dang /_brtan pa dang /_me tog phreng dang /_lhan cig dus ji srid cig na 'ong bar 'gyur 
[\[42a.5\]]snyam mo/_/de ltar lcags kyi ya lad mi phyed pa bgos pa/_lag na mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs pa/_lha ma yin pham par bya ba'i phyir g.yul du chas pa/_yid gcig tu gyur pa dag rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mdzes par byas pa'i shing rta la zhon pa rnams 'khod 
[\[42a.6\]]do/_/de ltar chos dang ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i klu 'jog po dang /_nor rgyas kyi bu la sogs pa g.yul 'gyed par shin tu chas pa/_brgya byin la lta zhing bka' gus par nod pa dag_/brgya byin gyis bka' ci zhig stsol bar 'gyur snyam zhing 'khod de/_
[\[42a.7\]]de ltar sa'i 'og mtha' dag kun la mngon par rtog par 'dod pa rnams la ji ltar lha ma yin gyi dbang po bzhi lha ma yin 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad kyis yongs su bskor ba/_lag na mtshon cha dang /_lag cha sna tshogs bye ba phrag du ma thogs pa lag par shin tu bsdus 
[\[42b\]]
[\[42b.1\]]pa/_lag pa'i sor mos 'dzin pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor ba dag rnam pa du mas cha bar byed do/_/de dag gi phyi bzhin du yang 'bum phrag bye ba du ma dag gis yongs su bskor cing /_ri rab thams cad mthu chen pos sgul bar byed pa/_lha ma yin de dag thams cad dang bcas 
[\[42b.2\]]pa/_dpung dang brtson 'grus lhag par che ba/_mtshon cha dpag tu med pa la mkhas pa/_ri rab gnyis lta bur cha ba na/_klu'i rgyal po chos dang mi ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su mi 'jug pa rab 'joms la sogs pas sa'i 'og gi bdag po thags [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ris dang /_rab dgod 
[\[42b.3\]]yongs su bskor to/_/de nas de ltar lha dang lha ma yin 'khod pa dag lha rnams kyis ni nam mkha' bkang nas 'khod/_lha ma yin rnams kyis kyang rgya mtsho khebs par 'khod de/_ngo mtshar gyi yid kyis phan tshun 'thab pa la shin tu mos pa/_phan tshun du 'thab par 'dod 
[\[42b.4\]]pa na/_de ltar klu'i rgyal po 'jog po dang /_nor rgyas kyi bu la sogs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba de dag dang lhan cig 'khod pa rnams 'di ltar lha'i dbang pos bdag cag gi mdun na lha ma yin de ltar 'khod pa 'di dag la/_lha ma yin dang bdag cag 'thab mo gyis 
[\[42b.5\]]shig ces ji ste bka' mi stsol zhes brjod do/_/de nas lha'i dbang pos de dag la 'di skad smras so/_/'di ltar 'jig rten skyong ba dag 'dzam bu'i gling du rings par mngag par bya ste/_kye 'dzam bu'i gling na mar 'dzin pa/_phar 'dzin pa/_chos dang ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su 'jug 
[\[42b.6\]]pa'i mi dag ci yod dam med/_de ltar brtags nas lha ma yin rnams pham par bya'o/_/lha dag ni chos skyob pa yin/_chos kyi gnas yin te/_chos 'phel ba na lha rnams 'phel bar 'gyur la/_chos 'grib pa na lha rnams 'grib par 'gyur ro/_/de ltar 'jig rten skyong ba dag mi yul 
[\[42b.7\]]'dzam bu'i gling du bdag gis mngag par bya'o/_/de skad smras nas/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'jig rten skyong ba rnams la bsgo ba/_khyed 'dzam bu'i gling du myur du deng la/_'di ltar chos dang ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa/_mar 'dzin pa/_phar 'dzin pa/_
[\[43a\]]
[\[43a.1\]]rigs kyi gtso bo'i rjes su 'jug pa/_gso sbyong la nye bar gnas pa/_sbyin pa gtong ba/_tshul khrims srung ba/_bag yod pa rnams bag yod par gnas pa/_rang gi chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa dag la so sor rtogs shig_/de skad bsgo ba dang /_'jig rten 
[\[43a.2\]]skyong ba bzhi mda' 'phangs pa ltar shin tu mgyogs par 'dzam bu'i gling du dong ngo /_/dong nas gnas nas gnas/_grong nas grong /_grong khyer nas grong khyer/_grong rdal nas grong rdal/_bzhi mdo nas bzhi mdo/_yul nas yul/_ljongs nas ljongs/_thams cad du so sor 
[\[43a.3\]]rtog par byed de/_kye 'di dag na mar 'dzin pa/_phar 'dzin pa/_dge sbyong du 'dzin pa/_bram zer 'dzin pa dag su yod/_rigs kyi rgan rabs rjes su skyong ba dag su yod ces de ltar 'dzam bu'i gling 'di ma lus par so sor rtog par byed do/_/de dag gis 'dzam bu'i gling 
[\[43a.4\]]na chos dang ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i mi/_mar 'dzin pa/_phar 'dzin pa/_dge sbyong du 'dzin pa/_bram zer 'dzin pa/_rigs kyi rgan rabs rjes su skyong ste/_'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams chos thams cad dang ldan par mthong ngo /_/de dag gis de ltar rig 
[\[43a.5\]]nas yid dga' ste/_mda' 'phangs pa ltar shin tu mgyogs par lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin ga la ba der 'ongs nas yid shin tu dga' ba de dag gis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad smras so/_/lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dgyes par mdzad du gsol/_'dzam 
[\[43a.6\]]bu'i gling na chos dang ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa mi mar 'dzin pa/_phar 'dzin pa/_dge sbyong du 'dzin pa/_bram zer 'dzin pa/_rigs kyi rgan rabs rjes su skyong ba/_sbyin pa gtong ba/_bsod nams bgyid pa dag mchis te/_lha'i phyogs ni rab tu 'phel bar 
[\[43a.7\]]bgyid la/_lha ma yin gyi phyogs ni yongs su 'grib par bgyid lags so/_/de skad smras pa dang /_lha'i dbang po brgya byin yid rab tu dga' nas/_'jig rten skyong ba dag la smras pa/_'di ltar 'dzam bu'i gling na chos dang ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i mi dag yod 
[\[43b\]]
[\[43b.1\]]pas na/_bdag cag gis lha ma yin gyi phyogs pham par bya yis lha khyod kun yid dga' bar gyis shig_/de skad thos nas lha rnams yid rab tu dga' ba skyes te/_yid dga' ba bcu 'gyur du skyes pa'i stobs kyis brgya byin la smras pa/_lha'i dbang po ci la gzhes ci la 
[\[43b.2\]]gzhes dgra las rgyal bar spyon cig_/khyod kyi bka' drin la bdag cag gis lha ma yin rnams pham par bgyi'o/_/de skad smras pa dang /_lha'i dbang pos klu'i rgyal po nor rgyas kyi bu dang /_'jog po la sogs pa la 'di skad smras so/_/chos dang mi ldan pa klu rab 
[\[43b.3\]]'joms la sogs pa dang /_lha ma yin thags [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ris dang /_rab dgod la sogs pa thams cad gzhom pa'i phyir khyed rgyugs shig rgyugs shig_/de skad smras pa dang /_klu'i bdag po 'jog po dang /_nor rgyas kyi bu la sogs pa klu'i bdag po chos dang mi 
[\[43b.4\]]ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su mi 'jug pa lha ma yin gyi phyogs su gnas pa rab 'joms la sogs pa ga la ba de dag gi drung du khros pa'i shugs kyis me char ltar 'bebs shing rgyug go/_/de nas rab 'joms yang thags [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ris dang rab dgod kyis bsgo ba dang /_de dag 'ong ba 
[\[43b.5\]]mngon par mthong nas glog char ltar mngon par 'bebs so/_/de rab tu 'bar ba de dag thams cad tsha ba'i sdug bsngal mngon par myong zhing de nas yang pham pa dag lha ma yin gyi dpung ga la ba der rgyug par byed do/_/dpung dang mthu nyams pa de lha ma yin gyi nang du song nas 'di 
[\[43b.6\]]skad smras so/_/nyams pa bdag cag gis rgyal bar dka' ste/_bdag cag 'dus na ni bsgrim mi dgos par lha rnams las rgyal bar nus so/_/de skad smras nas/_de nas yang klu'i rgyal po 'jog po dang /_nor rgyas kyi bu la sogs pa ga la ba der dong ba dang /_de dag 
[\[43b.7\]]'ong ba 'jog po dang /_nor rgyas kyi bu des mthong nas smras pa/_'di ltar rab 'joms bdag cag gi drung du 'ong ba chad pa drag pos gcad par bya'o/_/gzhan du na de yang dang yang du bdag cag la 'tshe bar byed do/_/de skad smras nas/_klu'i rgyal po rab 'joms la sogs 
[\[44a\]]
[\[44a.1\]]pa ga la ba der brgyugs nas/_'jog po des rab 'joms de bzung nas steng du me'i char phab bo/_/de me'i char des ri dang bcas pa rab tu sreg pa na/_srog 'dod pa lha ma yin gyi phyogs ga la ba der rgyug par byed do/_/de ltar de 'ongs pa mngon par 
[\[44a.2\]]mthong nas/_lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan gyis lha ma yin gyi dbang po de dag la smras pa/_'di ltar klu pham pa de dag la khyed kyi yid drang por ltos shig_/de skad smras nas/_bdag dang bcas pa'i dpung des brgyugs so/_/de 'ong ba mthong nas lha lag na yol 
[\[44a.3\]]go thogs pa rnams kyis kyang brgyugs te/_de ltar de dag phan tshun 'ong ba na/_rgya mtsho'i dbus su lha dang lha ma yin ri'i rtse mo mi bzad pa 'phen pa/_shin tu 'jigs su rung ba/_shin tu bzod par dka' ba'i g.yul bkye'o/_/lha dang lha ma yin rnam par 'khrugs 
[\[44a.4\]]pa des lha ma yin rgya mtsho na rgyu ba 'bum phrag du ma dag las kha cig ni 'on par gyur/_kha cig ni srog dang bral lo/_/lha dang lha ma yin de dag rnam par 'khrugs pas/_mtshon cha 'bum phrag nyam nga ba char ltar bab pa'i g.yul bkye'o/_/de nas khyad par 
[\[44a.5\]]ni 'di yod de/_lha gang gi rkang pa bcad na slar nad med par skye bar 'gyur/_lag pa bcad na yang nad med par skye bar 'gyur/_de ltar yan lag dang nying lag thams cad bcad cing gtubs kyang skye bar 'gyur te/_nad med pa dang /_gnod pa med pa dang /_mdog 
[\[44a.6\]]nyams par mi 'gyur la/_de'i tshe skye zhing 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/mgo bcad pa ni ma gtogs te/_lha rnams kyi dgra yang zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/lha ma yin rnams kyang ji ltar mi rnams la mtshon chas btab na gnod pa de ltar lha ma yin rnams la yang de bzhin du 'byung ste/_
[\[44a.7\]]lha dang lha ma yin dag nang gi khyad par ni de lta bu yin te/_de ltar lha lag na yol go thogs pa rnams dang /_lha ma yin sgra gcan gyi sar gtogs pa rnams kyi khyad par ni de lta bu yin no/_/de nas lha lag na yol go thogs pa rnams kyis ri rtse mo can du ma blangs nas 
[\[44b\]]
[\[44b.1\]]lha ma yin ga la ba der brgyugs te/_ri char ltar 'bebs pa des lha ma yin de dag gi dpung brgya'am/_stong du bcom mo/_/de bcom pa mngon par mthong nas/_sgra gcan gyis ri dpag tshad gsum pa blangs nas brgyugs so/_/lha lag na yol go thogs pa rnams 
[\[44b.2\]]kyis de ltar 'ong ba mngon par mthong nas/_mtshon cha dang lag cha thogs te/_lha ma yin ga la ba der brgyugs so/_/ri de mtshon cha char ltar phab pa des ji ltar bye ma bzhin de ltar zhib mor brlags nas rgya mtsho'i nang du gtor to/_/de 'ong ba mngon par mthong nas dud 
[\[44b.3\]]'gro'i ngo bo sems can gyi tha ma sgra gcan de yongs su yi chad do/_/mtshon cha char ltar 'bab pa na lha ma yin gyi dpung ga la ba der brgyugs so/_/lha ma yin gyi dbang po brtan pas de 'ong ba mngon par mthong nas/_rang gi 'khor rnams la smras pa/_ri rab gnyis kyi 
[\[44b.4\]]tshad ltar 'dug pa chas pa 'di gcig pus lha 'di dag thams cad chad pas gcad par nus su gsha' gsha' lta zhig na/_'di ltar bong tshod 'ba' zhig cher zad de mthu chung nas lha rnams kyis bsngags pa dang /_mgon 'dod pa/_skyabs 'dod pa/_dpung gnyen 
[\[44b.5\]]'dod pa/_lha ma yin ga la ba der rgyug par byed pa/_lha ma yin phal pa dang mtshungs pa 'di ni mthu dman pa yin la smad pa nyid yin no/_/'di'i mdun na 'thab par gnas pa lha lag na yol go thogs pa gang yin pa 'di dag ni snying stobs che ba yin no/_/de 
[\[44b.6\]]skad smras nas/_lha ma yin gyi dbang po brtan pa rang gi 'khor dang yang lhan cig lha ma yin mchog tu rgya che ba mgul phreng dang yang lhan cig tu g.yul 'gyed pa'i phyir lha lag na yol go thogs pa ga la ba der rgyug par byed do/_/lha rnams kyis brtan pa dang de dag lhan 
[\[44b.7\]]cig 'ong ba mthong nas lha phreng thogs rnams la smras so/_/'di ltar brtan pa bdag nyid thams cad lha lag na yol go thogs pa rnams kyi drung du rgyug gis lha rnams kyang rgyugs shig rgyugs shig_/de skad smras nas de nas yang lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan dang /_
[\[45a\]]
[\[45a.1\]]brtan pa ga la ba der dong ngo /_/de nas yang sgra gcan de brtan pas phyir bzlog ste/_khong brta brta nas de nas yang phan tshun 'dus te/_lus kyi mthu dang dpung tshol bar 'dod pa 'dus pa dag lha ga la ba der phyir log pa dang /_lha lag na yol go 
[\[45a.2\]]thogs pa dang /_lha ma yin sgra gcan gyi sar gtogs pa mgul phreng de dag dang phan tshun dgrar gyur pa/_phan tshun mi bzod pa/_so so'i dpung chen po'i g.yul 'gyed de/_ri'i rtse mo rnams dang /_brag gi rtse mo rnams dang /_mda' char ltar 'bab pa rnams dang /_mtshon char ltar 
[\[45a.3\]]'bab pa rnams dang /_shing ljon pa char ltar 'bab pa rnams kyis rtag tu nam mkha' phan tshun mun pa thibs po ltar gsal bar mi mngon te bar chad byed pa bye ba 'bum phrag du ma'i g.yul dpe med pa 'gyed do/_/de ltar lha rnams kyi yan lag dang nying lag bcad cing 
[\[45a.4\]]gtubs pa dag ni de nas yang snga ma bzhin slar skye'o/_/lha ma yin rnams kyi yan lag dang nying lag du ma bcad pa dag ni nad dang bcas par 'gyur la/_skye bar yang mi 'gyur ro/_/mgo bcad pa rnams kyang mi dang 'dra bar mi skye'o/_/lha rnams kyang mgo bcad 
[\[45a.5\]]pa dang /_rked pa bcad pa yang 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/de ltar lha ma yin ji lta ba de ltar lha rnams zad par mi 'gyur ro/_/de nas lha dang lha ma yin rnam par nyams pa na lha ma yin rnams shin tu zad pa de ltar lha rnams ni ma yin no/_/de nas lhag ma phyed tsam lus 
[\[45a.6\]]pa lha rnams kyis bcom pa/_skyabs 'dod pa/_dpung gnyen 'dod pa dag sa'i 'og gi sgo ga la ba der rgyug par byed de/_sgra ha ha 'byin pa'i lha rnams kyis nye bar bcom pa/_brtson 'grus chung ba/_skyabs zhan pa/_srog dman pa dag lha ma yin gyi dbang 
[\[45a.7\]]po brtan pa dang yang lhan cig sgra gcan dang yang lhan cig tu bros so/_/lha ma yin gyi dbang po de gnyis mthu nyams shing gnas nyams pa dag me tog phreng gis mthong nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po gsum pa la smras pa/_'di ltar bdag cag gi lha ma yin ga 
[\[45b\]]
[\[45b.1\]]la ba der 'dong gis rgyugs shig_/brtson 'grus chung ba'i lha rnams bdag cag gi dpung dang /_brtson 'grus dang 'thun pas pham par bya'o/_/des de skad smras pa dang /_de nas me tog phreng lha rnams ga la ba der rgyug par byed do/_/de nas de dag 'ong ba mthong 
[\[45b.2\]]nas dpung chen pos de nas yang bcom pa'i lhag ma phan tshun gyi brtson 'grus dang /_phan tshun gyi dpung gis 'dus pa bdag nyid dang 'khor mang po dang bcas pa phyir log ste phan tshun 'di skad smra'o/_/'di ltar lha ma yin zhes ming du btags pa 'di ci 'bros pa kho 
[\[45b.3\]]nar gyur tam/_brtson pa la mi gnas sam/_mtshon cha la mi rten pa lta zhig ste/_rang gi gnas su yongs su nyams par 'gyur la/_chung ma de dag gi nang du yongs su nyams par 'gyur ro/_/de skad smras nas/_de nas yang dpung dang mthu rgyas pa mtshon cha sna 
[\[45b.4\]]tshogs thogs pa dag lha ga la ba der rgyug par byed de/_ri'i rtse mo 'tsher ba lta bu dang rlung gi shugs ltar mngon par mgyogs pa de dag g.yul 'gyed pa'i phyir yang log go/_/de nas lha kun du rgyu ba dang /_lha phreng thogs dang /_lha rtag tu myos gnas dang /_lha 
[\[45b.5\]]lag na yol go thogs pa thams cad phan tshun du 'di ltar kye ma lha ma yin 'dus pa 'di dag thams cad ni blo gros mi brtan pa yin te/_kye ma lha ma yin rnams gang gis bdag nyid dang /_bdag cag gi dpung gi khyad par khong du chud kyang de dag rgyug par byed do zhes brjod do/_/
[\[45b.6\]]de dag gis de skad smras nas/_lha rnams kyang lha ma yin dag ga la ba der rgyug par byed do/_/phan tshun rgyal ba brtod pa na lha dang lha ma yin de dag gzhan dang mi 'dra ba'i g.yul bkye ste/_phan tshun ri bo char ltar 'bebs pa dang /_me char ltar 'bebs pa dang /_rdo char 
[\[45b.7\]]ltar 'bebs pa dang /_mtshon cha char ltar 'bebs pa dang /_dpung gi tshogs rnam par 'joms pas mngon par bcom mo/_/de dag mtshon cha du ma dang /_rnam par 'joms pa du ma dang /_nyam nga ba du ma dang /_de ltar srog gcod pa du ma dag gis g.yul dpe 
[\[46a\]]
[\[46a.1\]]med pa bkye ste/_de dag rgya mtsho kun nas bar med par 'khod nas g.yul bkye'o/_/'di ltar de gzhan dang mi 'dra ba'i phyir de ni dpe bya bar yang mi nus te/_de dag g.yul rnam pa du ma bkye'o/_/klu rnams kyang klu rnams dang lhan cig g.yul dpe 
[\[46a.2\]]med pa bkye'o/_/de ltar g.yul rnam pa du ma de dag lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis mthong nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams la smras pa/_'di ltar rab dgod ni da dung 'dug ste/_ma gtogs par lha ma yin de dag thams cad rgyug par byed kyis khyed chos shig 
[\[46a.3\]]chos shig_/de dag chas pa'i phyir bdag kyang glang po che sa srung gi bu la zhon te cha'o/_/de nas brgya byin gyis lha rnams la de skad smras nas yid rtse gcig gis glang po che sa srung gi bu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/glang po che'i rgyab tu zhon te/_ngas lha ma yin gyi 
[\[46a.4\]]lhag ma lus pa thags [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ris dang /_rab dgod kho na dang /_lha ma yin de dag gi lhag ma thams cad las rnam par rgyal bar bya'o/_/de skad smras nas/_de rdo rje gsor te lha ma yin gyi dpung la kun du lta zhing 'dug go/_/de nas lha dang lha ma yin g.yul shin tu mi bzad 
[\[46a.5\]]par 'jug pa na/_lha ma yin rnams ni yongs su nyams/_lha rnams ni rgyal te shin tu dga' nas/_lha ma yin rnams kyi drung du rgyug par byed do/_/lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin yang 'dzum rangs te/_lha ma yin thams cad kyi dpung 'joms su chas pa na rab dgod 
[\[46a.6\]]'di snyam du sems te/_kye ma 'di ltar lha ma yin gyi dbang po gsum po dang /_gnas gsum na 'khod pa'i lha ma yin bye ba phrag du ma mthu nyams par byas pa 'di dag ni ji ltar sngar mtsho kun mthong du mthong ba de ltar 'di dag gyur te/_kye ma mtsho der mthong ba ni ma nor ba yin 
[\[46a.7\]]no/_/'di ltar brgya byin pham par bya ba dang /_lha thams cad kyang gzhom par bya ba'i phyir bdag cha ste/_kye ma lha de dag dang bdag khyad par cang med do snyam mo/_/blo de lta bu bskyed nas g.yul du rings par 'jug par bya ba'i phyir sa'i 'og gi sgor 'khod do/_/rab dgod 
[\[46b\]]
[\[46b.1\]]dang thags [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ris khros pas gzir ba de nyid du 'khod pa dang ri kun ni g.yos/_rgya mtsho yang rlabs rnams kyis kun tu 'khrugs par byed/_nyi ma'i 'od zer dmar po thams cad kyang ri la shar te/_'khor dang bcas pa sa'i 'og gi sgo de nyid du 'khod pa dang /_de nas lha 
[\[46b.2\]]rnams kyis lha ma yin sgra gcan la sogs pa pham par byas shing nyams par byas pa rnams sa'i 'og gi sgo ga la ba der rgyug cing spro ba med pa/_mgon med pa/_kun nas gnod pa/_ha ha'i sgra rnams kyis sems dkrugs pa/_kun nas zhum pa/_mgon med par gyur pa 
[\[46b.3\]]rnams de skad phan tshun rjod pa na lha ma yin gzhan kha cig gis smras pa/_lha ma yin dag ma 'bros ma 'bros/_ci ste byol/_ci ste bros/_slar log slar log_/de skad smra zhing phan tshun de skad brjod pa'i lha ma yin rnams ri rtse mo can char ltar phab pas kun du btags 
[\[46b.4\]]pa na/_lha yid rab tu dga' ba rnams lha ma yin chos dang mi ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su mi 'jug pa dag zung shig gtogs shig_/bdag cag la dud 'gro 'di dag glo bur du khro bar byed kyang g.yul la 'jigs pa med de/_lha ngan pa 'di dag gi g.yul la 'jigs pa med do/_/
[\[46b.5\]]mtshon cha dang /_lag cha la mkhas pa yang ma yin te/_'di dag ni ji ltar slar ldog par mi 'gyur ba de ltar rgyal bar bya ste/_kye ma dus ma yin pa'i g.yul 'gyed par rtag tu 'dod pa 'di dag ni ji ltar phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba de ltar rgyal bar bya'o/_/de ltar phan tshun spro ba bskyed nas/_lha 
[\[46b.6\]]ma yin rnams shin tu gzhom par yid zhugs pa khros pa mig shin tu dmar ba dag lha ma yin ga la ba der dong nas ral gri dang /_mtshon cha kun nas char ltar 'bebs te/_ji ltar char gyi rgyun 'bab pa ltar 'bebs shing /_de ltar me yang char ltar 'bebs so/_/de nas de ltar lha ma 
[\[46b.7\]]yin blong blong por 'khod pa shing rta 'bum snyed la zhon pa/_lha ma yin du mas yongs su bskor ba dag sa'i 'og gi sgor 'khod de/_lha rnams ga la ba der mtshon cha sna tshogs char ltar 'bebs la/_ri dpag tshad gsum dang /_bzhi dang /_lnga'i tshad tsam 'phen par byed do/_/de lta bu char 
[\[47a\]]
[\[47a.1\]]ltar mngon par 'bebs pa dang /_rnam pa de lta bur chas pa de dag lha ma yin rnams kyis kyang mngon par mthong nas/_de nas yang dbugs phyin te/_g.yul 'gyed par phyir log nas/_rab dgod dang lha ma yin de dag nyid la spro ba skyed par byed de/_'di ltar bdag ni 
[\[47a.2\]]lha thams cad gzhom pa'i phyir chas pa yin gyis lha ma yin dag slar log slar log_/lha ma yin gyi dbang po dag ci ste 'bros ci ste 'bros/_ma la khyim du bud med dag gi ngor yang ji skad smra/_'di ltar skyes pa ni bdag cag yin na skyes pa'i ming yang med de/_skyes pa zhes bya 
[\[47a.3\]]ba don med par 'gyur ro/_/de skad smras pa dang /_rab dgod lha rnams ga la ba der rgyug par byed do/_/de rgyug pa mngon par mthong nas lha rnams kyang de dang g.yul 'gyed par rab dgod ga la ba der brgyugs so/_/lha dang lha ma yin de dag phan tshun g.yul 'dres par bkye 
[\[47a.4\]]ste/_sgra byung ba gang yin pa des ri'i lcong dang ri rab thams cad kyang kun du gang ngo /_/sgra gcan 'ba' zhig lam du zhugs nas lha lag na yol go thogs pa dag ga la ba der brgyugs so/_/lha ma yin gyi dbang po brtan pa lag na dbyug to thogs pa yang lha phreng thogs 
[\[47a.5\]]dag ga la ba der brgyugs so/_/lha ma yin gyi dbang po me tog phreng yang ri dpag tshad gsum pa tsam cig blangs nas/_lha pi bang can gsum pa dang /_lha kun du rgyu ba dag ga la ba der brgyugs te/_phan tshun g.yul chen po bkye ba na gtam du brjod na sems 
[\[47a.6\]]can thams cad kyi spu zing zhes byed na/_gang mngon du mthong ba'am/_thos pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/_lha ma yin gyi dbang po rab dgod kyang rlung gis nam mkha'i sprin ltar lha rnams mngon par 'joms te/_shin tu brtson 'grus dang ldan pa de la lha gang gis kyang phyir 
[\[47a.7\]]brgal bar mi nus so/_/de nas de ltar rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams la mngon par 'tshe ba na sum cu rtsa gsum gyi bdag po brgya byin gyis sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams la 'di skad smras so/_/lha ma yin 'ba' zhig gis lha 'di dag la mngon par 'tshe zhing 'dug na/_dpung phyi 
[\[47b\]]
[\[47b.1\]]ma pa'i lha de dag ci ste mi rgyug_/lha ma yin gyi dpung gis lha rnams yongs su nyams shing bcom pa dag ci khyed pham par dga' 'am/_gang lha'i 'dun sa chos bzang na 'khod pa dag ma gtogs par sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams rgyugs shig_/ma lus par rgyugs 
[\[47b.2\]]shig_/de skad bsgo nas rab dgod dang thags [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ris ga la ba der brgyugs so/_/rab dgod kyi steng du sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i mda'i tshogs rnams dang /_ri bo char ltar bar mtshams med pas nam mkha' bkang nas mngon par 'bebs la/_rab dgod kyang ri bo char ltar 
[\[47b.3\]]mngon par 'bebs shing sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do/_/nam mkha' thams cad sgras kun du 'gengs shing lha dang lha ma yin phan tshun rgyal ba la rtod pa de dag dpung gi tshogs ma lus pa thams cad kyis g.yul 'gyed do/_/de ltar g.yul 
[\[47b.4\]]'gyed pa na/_gser gyi ri bo 'bum snyed phan tshun 'drud pa'i bur ma lhung ba'i rdul gyis nam mkha' khebs te/_nam mkha' kun nas bar mtshams med par dpag tshad stong tsam gser gyi rdul gyis khebs so/_/rdul gyi bar de dag na yang ji ltar char gyi rgyun rgyun mi 
[\[47b.5\]]'chad par 'bab pa ltar rnam pa de lta bu'i mda'i tshogs phan tshun char ltar 'bebs so/_/de bzhin du phan tshun ri bo char ltar mngon par 'bebs shing lha ma yin bye ba du ma de dag 'joms par byed pa'i g.yul bkye'o/_/lha stong phrag du ma rnams kyang gzhom par bya ba'i 
[\[47b.6\]]phyir g.yul shin tu mi bzad pa bkye'o/_/bkye nas lha ma yin snying stobs chung ba pham par gyur pa shir dogs pa gang yin pa de dag sa'i 'og tu zhugs so/_/ma lus par bcom pa zhugs pa de dag la lha ma yin gyi bu mo dag gis smras pa/_kye ma lhag mar gyur pa bdag 
[\[47b.7\]]cag gi khyim thab de dag ga re/_de skad 'dri ba de dag la lha ma yin rnams kyis smras pa/_de dag ni 'di ltar lha dang lha ma yin gyi g.yul las rgyal ba thob ste/_'dir 'ong ngo /_/de nas lha ma yin gyi bu mo dag mtsho kun mthong ba ga la ba der dong ba dang /_de dag thams cad mthong 
[\[48a\]]
[\[48a.1\]]ste/_ji ltar lha rnams kyis lha ma yin rnams btags shing bcom ste/_de ltar lan brgya'am stong du pham par byas pa de dag de bzhin mthong nas/_khyim thab bsad pa'i phyir nyon mongs shin tu yi chad de sa'i steng du 'dug nas ngu bar byed/_smre sngags 
[\[48a.2\]]'don/_rab tu sdug bsngal ba kun mtsho de yongs su bskor nas 'khod la brang rdung bar byed/_skra 'bal bar byed/_lus la 'brad par byed/_mchi mas gdong gsher bar byed do/_/de ltar mtsho'i nang na khyim thab dag pham ste/_bsad par mthong nas/_smre sngags 'don 
[\[48a.3\]]to/_/de nas lha dang lha ma yin gyi g.yul shin tu mi bzad par 'jug pa na lha ma yin gyi dbang po rab dgod lha ma yin bye ba snyed kyis yongs su bskor nas/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin ga la ba der 'gro bar byed do/_/de dag nyid 'ong ba mngon par mthong nas lha rnams la bsgo 
[\[48a.4\]]ba/_'di ltar lha ma yin 'di dag ni g.yul 'gyed du bdag cag ga la ba der 'ong ste/_dpung chung ngu gdul bar dka' ba de dag ni ji ltar 'od kyis mun pa bsal ba de ltar grogs chos kyis rgyal bar bya'o/_/des lha rnams la de skad bsgo nas/_glang po che'i rgyal po sa 
[\[48a.5\]]srung gi bu la zhon te/_lcags kyi mda' 'phangs pa bzhin du rab dgod ga la ba der brgyugs so/_/de rgyug pa na lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'dun sa chos bzang na gnas pa'i lha rnams kyis yongs su bskor nas/_rdo dang shing gis 'gyed pa dag lha ma yin gyi dpung 
[\[48a.6\]]ga la ba der brgyugs so/_/kha cig ni mda' char ltar mngon par 'bebs shing rab dgod ga la ba der rgyug par byed do/_/rab dgod kyang brgya byin ga la ba der shing rta sgyur bar byed cing 'di ltar brgya byin pas bdag rgyal bar bya'o zhes zer ro/_/de nas brgya byin gyis rab 
[\[48a.7\]]dgod de la 'di skad smras so/_/chos ma yin pa'i lam la gnas pa'i dud 'gro da gar 'gro/_/'di ltar nga ni khyod pham par bya ba'i phyir 'ongs te/_'di ltar ngas khyod rgyags pa dang phral nas/_de nas yang sa'i 'og tu gtang bar bya'o/_/de nas thags [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ris dang /_
[\[48b\]]
[\[48b.1\]]rab dgod kyis brgya byin la smras pa/_'di ltar nga yang brgya byin khyod dang lha thams cad chad pas gcad par bya ba'i phyir 'ongs pa yin no/_/de nas thags [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ris dang rab dgod kyis gser gyi ri dpag tshad lnga pa gcig 'phangs so/_/'phangs pa de mngon par 
[\[48b.2\]]mthong nas glang po che sa srung gi bu'i kha nas dbugs phyung bas ri de bye ma chang pa nas gtor ba bzhin phyir bzlog nas rgya mtshor lhung ngo /_/ri phye mar brlags shing gtor ba de mngon par mthong nas/_de nas yang lha ma yin dag gis ri bo rdo rje'i lte ba can dpag tshad lnga pa gcig 
[\[48b.3\]]blangs nas brgya byin ga la ba der 'phangs so/_/'phangs pa de mngon par mthong nas sa srung gi bu'i sna'i thor tos bzung ste/_slar lha ma yin gyi dbang po la 'phangs te/_glang po che 'di ni cang shes pa yin no/_/rang gi ri 'phangs pa des de'i brang du brgyab pa dang /_rab 
[\[48b.4\]]dgod de brgyab pa des nyams nas stan de las lhung zhing /_slar 'khod de brgyab pa des rab tu nyams so/_/de mthong nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa dag sgra chen pos nam mkha' bkang nas/_'di ltar lha'i dbang pos dud 'gro de pham par byas te/_'dir re zhig glang po che'i 
[\[48b.5\]]mchog 'dis 'phangs pa'i shugs kyis mngon par nyams shing g.yos na gal te rdo rjes brgyab par gyur na lta smos kyang ci dgos/_de skad smras nas/_lha ma yin ga la ba der brgyugs te/_la la ni rdo dang shing gis 'gyed/_la la ni ri bos 'gyed/_la la ni rtse gsum kha 
[\[48b.6\]]gdeng gis 'gyed/_la la ni ste'u khas 'gyed/_la la ni glog 'byung bas 'gyed/_la la ni thong gshol gyis 'gyed/_la la ni stobs kyis 'gyed/_la la ni 'khor los 'gyed/_la la ni ral gris 'gyed/_la la ni nam mkha' la 'gro bas 'gyed/_la la ni sna tshogs pas 'gyed/_
[\[48b.7\]]la la ni tho bas 'gyed/_la la ni mtshon cha mchog tu gdams pas 'gyed/_la la ni mtshon cha dri ma med pas 'gyed/_la la ni mtshon cha rab byed kyis 'gyed/_la la ni mtshon cha byi bdar byed kyis 'gyed/_la la ni mtshon cha brtsegs pas 'gyed/_la la ni mes 'gyed/_
[\[49a\]]
[\[49a.1\]]la la ni chus 'gyed/_la la ni chu 'bebs pas 'gyed/_la la ni thams cad kyis 'gyed/_la la ni mtshon cha nag pos 'gyed/_la la ni sgyu mas 'gyed/_la la ni 'dud pas 'gyed/_la la ni sen mos 'gyed/_la la ni sgras 'gyed de/_sgra'i shugs gang 
[\[49a.2\]]mnyan par yang mi nus so/_/la la ni rdog pa rdeg pas 'gyed de/_rnam pa de lta bu'i go mtshon sna tshogs kyis lus shin tu bsrungs pa rnams kyis lha ma yin rnams pham par bya ba'i phyir brgya byin lha thams cad kyi mdun du bzhag go/_/de nas mog mog por gyur pa de 
[\[49a.3\]]mngon par mthong nas/_lha ma yin gyi dbang po thags [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ris la sogs pa lag na mtshon cha sna tshogs pa rnams rab dgod kyi dpung bya ba dang /_brgya byin gtag pa'i phyir brgya byin ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do/_/de nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po bzhi po dag brgya byin kho 
[\[49a.4\]]na la 'gyed du 'ong ba mngon par mthong nas/_lha rnams brgya byin gyi dpung gi rim gro bya ba dang /_rang gi rtsal ston cing brgya byin ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do/_/de nas brgya byin gyis 'ong ba de dag mngon par mthong nas shin tu khros te chas nas smras pa dud 'gro khyed ci ste 
[\[49a.5\]]shin tu rmongs/_gang khyed kyi dpung rnam pa 'di lta bu ni re zhig lha ma yin thams cad la bdog par gyur kyang de dag nga 'ba' zhig gis pham par bya bar nus so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di dag gi dpung ni chos yin te/_lha rnams kyi dpung ni chos yin no/_/lha ma yin rnams 
[\[49a.6\]]kyi dpung ni chos ma yin no/_/chos dang chos ma yin pa'i khyad par ni che ste/_gang khyad par ni mun pa dang nyi ma ltar che'o/_/gang khyad par ni bden pa dang [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa ltar che'o/_/gang khyad par ni ri rab dang yungs 'bru ltar che'o/_/gang khyad par ni thar pa dang bcings 
[\[49a.7\]]pa ltar che'o/_/gang khyad par ni bzar rung ba dang bzar mi rung ba ltar che'o/_/gang khyad par ni bdud rtsi dang dug ltar che'o/_/gang khyad par ni mtshan mo dang nyin par ltar che'o/_/gang khyad par ni nor bu mching bu dang /_rin po che ltar che'o/_/gang khyad par 
[\[49b\]]
[\[49b.1\]]ni dbul ba dang phyug pa ltar che'o/_/gang khyad par ni bya ba dang mi bya ba ltar che'o/_/gang khyad par ni nyi ma dang srin bu me khyer ltar che'o/_/gang khyad par ni khro ba la rlung dang srin bu mang ku ltar che'o/_/gang khyad par ni mthong ba dang /_mi mthong ba ltar che'o/_/gang khyad 
[\[49b.2\]]par ni yang dag pa'i lam dang /_yang dag pa ma yin pa'i lam ltar che'o/_/gang khyad par ni sangs rgyas dang gzhan mu stegs pa ltar che'o/_/gang khyad par ni gnam dang sa ltar che'o/_/gang khyad par ni bskal pa dang skad cig ma ltar che ste/_nga dang khyed ni khyad par de 
[\[49b.3\]]ltar che'o/_/khyed ni chos ma yin pa la gtso bor byed la/_nged ni chos gtso bor byed do/_/khyod ni shes rab dman pa yin la/_lha rnams ni shes rab dang bcas pa yin no/_/khyed ni brtson pa med pa yin la/_lha rnams ni brtson pa dang bcas pa yin no/_/khyed ni 
[\[49b.4\]]dud 'gro yin la lha rnams ni lha yin te/_lha de dag ni de lta bu yin par khong du chud nas khyed nged kyi drung du mngon par rgyug pa ni mi rigs so/_/de skad smras nas/_glang po che sa srung gi bu kha lo bsgyur te/_'di ltar tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang smras nas/_lha ma yin gyi 
[\[49b.5\]]dbang po ga la ba der rgyug par byed do/_/chos kyis chos min pham par byas/_bden pas [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa pham par byas/_/shes pas gti mug pham par byas/_/lha yis lha min pham par byas/_/des de skad smras nas/_glang po che sa srung gi bu kha lo bsgyur te/_sprul 
[\[49b.6\]]pa yang snga ma bzhin byas nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po bzhi po de dag thams cad ga la ba der lha'i dbang po brgya byin rdo rje rtse mo stong yod pa ni thogs/_bsdigs pa'i mtshan ma tsam sems kyis gsad cing bcing bar lhag par mos pa'i sems ni med pas/_rlung gi shugs pas 
[\[49b.7\]]ches mgyogs par rab tu rgyug par byed do/_/lha ma yin de dag mngon par rgyug pa dang /_de dag 'ong ba mngon par mthong nas/_rgyal chen bzhi dang sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyang rgyug par byed do/_/lha dang lha ma yin de dag phan tshun rnam par 'joms pa na so 
[\[50a\]]
[\[50a.1\]]sor rgyal bar 'dod pa/_gcig la gcig mngon par 'debs pa/_mog mog por gyur pa/_lha ma yin kha cig ni srog dang bral bar gyur/_de bzhin du lha ma yin kha cig ni sdug bsngal gyis nyam thag ste/_phyir log_/kha cig ni yi chad nas 
[\[50a.2\]]phyir log_/kha cig ni mig tshugs su lta zhing 'khod/_kha cig ni rang gi gnas su 'gro bar sems shing 'khod/_kha cig ni zhe sdang gis nyam thag_/kha cig ni gti mug gis sems bsgribs/_kha cig ni yongs su nyams shing yid dman par gnas te de ltar gnas 
[\[50a.3\]]pa rnams la sa srung gi bu'i steng na 'dug pa lha'i dbang po sprul pa byed do/_/de nas glang po che sa srung gi bu kha re re la pad ma re re/_pad ma re re la dbang po lag na rdo rje thogs pa mtshon cha dang go mtshon bgos pa rnams sngar bstan pa bzhin lha ma yin gyi dbang pos 
[\[50a.4\]]mthong ste/_de dag kyang dbang po'i glang po che sa srung gi bu kha stong yod pa/_kha re re la pad ma'i rdzing bu stong yod do/_/pad ma'i rdzing re re la pad ma stong yod do/_/pad ma re re la 'dab ma stong yod do/_/pad ma re re la snying po brgya yod do/_/de dag kyang sa srung gi 
[\[50a.5\]]bu'i kha nas byung ste/_'dab ma de dag dang snying po de dag thams cad la dbang po rtag tu lag na rdo rje dang /_mtshon cha dang /_lag cha thogs pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma 'khod par mthong ngo /_/de nas sprul pa de lta bu mngon par mthong nas/_lha ma yin rnams 
[\[50a.6\]]skrag 'khrugs te/_dbang po go mtshon dang cha byad sna tshogs thogs pa rnams kyis de rtag tu gang zhing dpung dang mthu dpe med pa rnams kyis nam mkha' 'di bar mtshams med par byas so/_/mtshon cha'i tshogs kyis phyogs dang phyogs mtshams thams cad bar 
[\[50a.7\]]mtshams med par gang bar byas so/_/dbang po rnams kyis sa'i 'og gang yin pa de dang /_de yang bar mtshams med par byas par dogs so zhes de skad lha ma yin shin tu skrag pa de rnams phan tshun smra'o/_/de skad smra ba de rnams la rab dgod kyis smra ba/_lha 
[\[50b\]]
[\[50b.1\]]ma yin dag ngas dbang po sa srung gi bu dang bcas te phyir bzlog par byas/_ma 'jigs shig ma 'jigs shig_/de skad smras nas glang po che'i rgyal po sa srung gi bu ga la ba der brgyugs so//_//'phags pa dam pa'i chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa/_bam po 
[\[50b.2\]]nyer lnga pa/_de 'ong ba mngon par mthong nas/_sa srung gi bu'i sna'i thor tos bzung ste/_nam mkha' la gsob bzhin skor bar byed do/_/de bskor ba na srog gi lhag ma [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]cig lus nas btang ngo /_/de btang ba dang de nas yang 'du shes rnyed nas lha ma yin de dag la 'di 
[\[50b.3\]]skad smra'o/_/ci dpung 'di gcig pu dpa' ba yin nam/_lha ma yin gyi dbang po khyed kun lha'i dbang po la rgol mi nus sam/_de nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po bsdus pa de dag thams cad de nas yang sa srung gi bu ga la ba der brgyugs so/_/de dag 'ong ba mngon par mthong nas/_
[\[50b.4\]]dbang pos de dag gi srog gcad par bya ba'i phyir ni ma yin gyi/_pha rol pham pa kho nar bya ba'i phyir sgyu ma'i ser ba rdo rje lta bu rnam pa du ma phab bo/_/de nas yang dbang po ga la ba der ri char ltar 'bebs shing lha'i dbang po de'i steng du mtshon cha rnam pa sna tshogs 'phen to/_/
[\[50b.5\]]de la ri bo de char ltar 'bebs pa na/_char gyi rgyun dus su 'bab pa ltar ri bo char ltar 'bab pa rnams kyang mdzes pa yin te/_de ltar lha dang lha ma yin gyi g.yul dpe med pa rnam pa sna tshogs bkye'o/_/de nas lha rnams kyis lha ma yin de dag mngon par mthong nas/_
[\[50b.6\]]de nas yang lha rnams lha ma yin gyi dpung ga la ba der brgyugs so/_/de nas lha ma yin yang g.yul 'gyed pa'i phyir/_lha rnams ga la ba der brgyugs so/_/de nas rnam pa du mar 'khrugs shing skrag par byed pa rnam pa du ma byung ste/_de ltar lha dang lha ma 
[\[50b.7\]]yin rnams kyang g.yul gsal bar bkye'o/_/de ltar dbang po dang lha ma yin rnams mtshon cha dang rdo rjes 'joms pa lta bu'i g.yul chen po gzhan dang mi 'dra ba mang po bkye'o/_/lha ma yin rnam pa du ma dag mngon par mthong nas brgya byin gyis lha ma yin 
[\[51a\]]
[\[51a.1\]]gyi dbang po dag srog dang bral bar ni mi byed la/_pham pa kho nar bya ba'i phyir ched du gnas so/_/de nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po de dag thams cad kyang lha ma yin gyi dbang po rab dgod dang thags [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ris de dag dang bcas pa ma lus par pham pa nyid du 
[\[51a.2\]]gyur te/_mgon 'dod pa/_skyabs 'dod pa/_gnas 'dod pa/_spro ba med pa dag sa'i 'og gi sgo ga la ba de dang der 'bros par byed do/_/rab dgod de shin tu 'bros pa ni/_lha ma yin gyi dbang po gzhan gsum po 'khor 'bum snyed dang ldan pa rnams kyis mdun na skad ngan 
[\[51a.3\]]thon cing kun nas mngon par gnod pa rnams kyis 'bros pa na brgya byin gyis sa srung gi bu la smras pa/_glang po che'i dbang po rab dgod dang thags [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ris kyi brtson 'grus ni shor/_shing rta ni chag kyang ngas de dag gsad par mi nus te/_drang srong chen pos mya 
[\[51a.4\]]ngan las 'das par 'gro ba'i gzhi ni srog gcod pa spangs pa yin no zhes gsungs te/_'di ni sems can thams cad la slu ba med pa'i gzhi yin no/_/de rang gi srog dang lhan cig song yang blas/_de'i shing rta brgya'am stong du gzhom par bya ba la khyod [{]rings [,]ring [}]
[\[51a.5\]]par chos shig_/des de skad bsgo nas brgya byin des sprul pa byas pa dang /_glang po che'i dbang po dang lhan cig sa'i 'og gi sgo ga la ba der rlung gi shugs ltar brgyugs so/_/de 'ong ba mngon par mthong nas/_rab dgod dang thags [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ris shin tu skrag 
[\[51a.6\]]ste/_mthu med pa dag sa'i 'og gi sgo ga la ba der rings par rgyug go/_/de nas mgyogs par song nas/_sa srung gi bu'i stobs kyis shing rta de las rab dgod de phab nas shing rta dang phral lo/_/de nas shing rta de sna'i thor tos de'i mig sngar rtswa bzhin du brgya 
[\[51a.7\]]'am stong du bcom mo/_/me tog phreng yang dpung dang mthu nyams nas/_sa'i 'og gi sgo ga la ba der 'bros par byed de/_srog la bsam pa bsdus pa/_brtson 'grus nyams pa/_spro ba med pa/_rang gi bu dang chung ma snying la bsams nas/_sa'i 
[\[51b\]]
[\[51b.1\]]'og gi sgo ga la ba der rgyug go/_/lha ma yin gyi dbang po brtan pa yang gson par 'dod de/_rang gi khyim du phyogs nas sa'i 'og gi sgo ga la ba der rgyug go_/lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan gson par 'dod pa lus bong che ba 'ba' zhig tu 'dug pa yang sa'i 'og 
[\[51b.2\]]gi sgo ga la ba der rgyug go/_/de ltar lha ma yin gyi dbang po 'khor dang bcas pa de dag thams cad nyams pa dang /_lha rnams shin tu dga' nas/_'di skad smras so/_/lha ma yin rnams kyis mi 'thun pa'i mtha' las 'bras bu nyams pa'i lhag ma thob ste/_'bros khung 
[\[51b.3\]]tshol bar gyur pa rnams nged chos la lta zhing sa'i 'og gi sgo gzung bar bya'o zhes smras nas/_lha shin tu dga' ba de dag rlung gis sprin kun du gtor ba ltar lha ma yin rnams la rlung gi shugs lta bus kun du 'tshe bar byed do/_/de nas dbang pos lha de dag la smras 
[\[51b.4\]]pa/_gang rang gi lus med par bya ba'i phyir dang lha ma yin mang po 'di rnams srog dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir don med pa/_'khon zhugs pa/_nyes pa'i gnas 'di dag ci'i phyir byas/_lha rnams kyi rgyal ba dang pham pa ni mi la rag las pa yin la/_da dung du mi'i 'jig rten 
[\[51b.5\]]na skyes bu chos dang ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa thams cad brtan pa dag yod na/_khyed kyis yul dang dus de dag shes bzhin du bdag nyid gsod pa'i dgra don med pa 'di dag byas so/_/de nas yang lha ma yin nyams pa srog gi skyabs tshol ba rnams sa'i 
[\[51b.6\]]'og gi sgo ga la ba de nyid du rgyug go/_/de nas dbang pos lha rnams la bsgo ba/_lha dag slar log slar log_/phyis pham par 'gyur ba'i srog dang ldan pa rnams rang gi gnas su thong shig_/de nas dbang po la lha rnams kyis smras pa/_'di ltar lha ma yin khengs 
[\[51b.7\]]pa 'di dag ni bdag nyid dang gzhan gyi dpung khong du ma chud pa lags te/_'di dag ni bdag cag gis nges par ji ltar slar ldog par mi 'gyur ba de ltar dgra bsal bar bgyi'o/_/bdag cag ni 'di dag la gnod pa mi bgyid de/_'di ltar bdag cag mtho ris na rang 
[\[52a\]]
[\[52a.1\]]gi las kyi 'bras bu la spyod cing mchis na/_'di dag gis mi'i 'jig rten na bdag cag gi chos dang ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i mi rnams la ci ste bar chad bgyi bar 'bad/_dgra 'di dag ma bsal bar bdag cag slar mi mchi'o/_/de dag 
[\[52a.2\]]gis de skad smras nas/_de nas yang lag cha dang /_mtshon cha dang /_go mtshon sna tshogs bgos te/_'di ltar lha ma yin 'di dag nges par shin tu tshar gcad par bya'o snyam pa'i blo des lha ma yin rnams gzhom pa'i phyir shugs dang ldan pas brgyugs so/_/de 
[\[52a.3\]]ltar yid la byed pa de lta bu dang 'bad pa de lta bu dag la/_de nas yang lha'i dbang po'i yid snying rjes brlan pas smras pa/_lha ma yin rab dgod la sogs pa btag pa khyed kyi snying la brtse ba med dam/_de skad smras nas/_lha'i 'dun sa chos bzang na lha 'khod 
[\[52a.4\]]pa gang yin pa de dag bsdus nas slar log go/_/de nas lha'i dbang po slar log pa mthong nas/_rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams kyis sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams la smras pa/_'di ltar lha'i dbang po de slar gshegs so/_/lha'i dbang po de slar gshegs kyis 
[\[52a.5\]]khyed kyang ma lus par slar gshegs shig ces smras nas/_rgyal ba thob pa'i lha rnams slar log ste/_de nas yang phan tshun dga' ba'i yid kyis rang gi gnas su dong ngo /_/lha'i dbang po brgya byin yang sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams kyis mngon par bstod cing 
[\[52a.6\]]sa srung gi bu la zhon te/_yid dga' bas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i 'dun sa chos bzang ga la ba der 'dzegs te dong ngo /_/lha rnams kyang rang rang gnas su dong nas/_de nas yang go mtshon dang /_lag cha rnams shing rta sna tshogs kyi tshal du bzhag go/_/
[\[52a.7\]]glang po che sa srung gi bu yang sprul pa de dag bsdus nas tha mal par gnas te/_rang gi rdzing bu pad ma dang /_ud pa las khebs par zhugs so/_/de ltar lha rnams lha'i 'jig rten du dong nas/_gzugs dang /_sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro yid du 'ong ba la nye 
[\[52b\]]
[\[52b.1\]]bar spyod de/_lha'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga 'byor cing ldan par gyur pa rnams kyi gnas so/_/klu'i rgyal po/_'jog po dang /_nor rgyas kyi bu la sogs pa rgyal ba thob pa rnams kyang snying rab tu dga' ste/_rang gi gnas longs spyod ldan ga la ba der dong ngo /_/
[\[52b.2\]]lha ma yin btag btag ste nyams pa'i lhag ma lus shig shig por gyur pa nyams rab tu nyams pa'i sems can ngo tsha nas mgo smad pa rnams kyang /_bud med rab tu ngu zhing yid dman pa rnams kyis mdun nas bsu ba na/_sgra gcan gyis lha ma yin gyi dbang po snying 
[\[52b.3\]]stobs nyams pa de dag la smras pa/_da ltar 'thab pa'i dus la ma bab bo zhes ngas sngar ma byas sam/_da dung du mi'i 'jig rten na chos dang ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i mi mar 'dzin pa/_phar 'dzin pa/_dge sbyong du 'dzin pa/_bram zer 'dzin pa/_rigs kyi 
[\[52b.4\]]rgan rabs kyi rjes su 'jug pa dag yod pas lha'i phyogs ni rab tu 'phel la/_bdag cag gi phyogs ni 'grib po zhes bdag gis sngar bsgo na/_de yang khyed kyis ma mnyan te/_bdag gi tshig de ltar ma byas pas 'di ni de'i 'bras bu yin no/_/lha rnams kyis lha ma yin 
[\[52b.5\]]nyams par byas pa 'bum phrag du ma gang yin pa dag la sgra gcan gyis de skad smras pa dang /_lha ma yin gzhan zhig gis kyang smras pa/_'di ltar g.yul 'gyed pa'i dus la ma bab bo zhes smras pa/_ma mnyan pa'i 'bras bu ni 'di yin no/_/lha ma yin mgul phreng 
[\[52b.6\]]gis kyang smras pa/_'di ltar gang gis mi bya bar bya ba de dag gi ngo bo med pa la blo gros ngan pa 'di skyes pa nye bar gnas so/_/de dag thams cad phan tshun de skad smre zhing rang rang gi gnas ga la ba der dong ngo /_/thags [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ris kyang gnas gzhan bzhi par 
[\[52b.7\]]ngo tsha nas mgo smad de zhugs pa dang /_lha ma yin gyi bu mo nyams pa rab tu ngu zhing ngom zum gnag pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor nas rang gi gnas su dong ngo /_/klu rab 'joms la sogs pa chos dang mi ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su mi 'jug pa/_snying stobs rab 
[\[53a\]]
[\[53a.1\]]tu nyams pa rnams kyang klu'i gnas longs spyod ldan ga la ba der dong ngo /_/de ltar sred pa'i dug gis nyams pa'i sems can phan tshun rab tu nyams pa dag 'khor ba na 'khor zhing 'khyam yang bde ba mi mthong ngo /_/de dag rjes su mthong nas 'phags 
[\[53a.2\]]pa nyan thos 'dod pa dag gi 'dod chags dang bral lo/_/de nas gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa la 'di ltar dge slong 'di ni sa gzhan bcu bdun pa la zhugs te/_de kho na nyid la blo shin tu zhen to/_/de thos nas sa bla'i 
[\[53a.3\]]gnod sbyin shin tu dga' nas bar snang la rgyu ba'i gnod sbyin rnams la sbran to/_/de dag gis kyang 'jig rten skyong ba rnams la snga ma bzhin sbyar te/_chung dge'i bar du yang de bzhin du sbran te/_'di ltar 'dzam bu'i gling na rigs kyi bu che ge mo zhig_/grang mang 
[\[53a.4\]]ge mo zhig_/grang rdal ga ge mo zhig tu ming che ge mo zhes bya ba skra dang kha spu bregs/_gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste/_de bdud kyi yul gyi dngos po ni mi 'dod/_nyon mongs pa'i dngos po rnams dang yang lhan cig gnas 
[\[53a.5\]]par mi byed la/_'khor ba las shin tu 'dod chags dang bral te/_de ltar 'bad pas kun du khyab nas/_sa gzhan bcu bdun pa la zhugs so/_/de thos nas lha rnams shin tu dga' nas bstod de/_'di ltar gang bdud kyi phyogs ni 'grib la/_dam pa'i chos kyi phyogs 
[\[53a.6\]]'phel ba ni bdag cag dga'o/_/dud 'gro'i le'u rdzogs so//_//de nas gzhan yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa des/_sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]nyes par byas pa rnams kyi las kyi 'bras bu 
[\[53a.7\]]rnam par smin pa shin tu phra ba thams cad kyang ji lta ba bzhin brtags shing shes te/_yid la bzung nas legs par byas pa'i las rnams la yang las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa la rtog par byed de/_'di ltar sems can thams cad ni sdug bsngal 
[\[53b\]]
[\[53b.1\]]dang mi 'thun pa bde ba 'dod pa yin la/_lha rnams ni bde ba bsags pa la dga' ba yin te/_de rnams kyi las kyi chos dang /_rnam par smin pa dang /_skye ba dang /_'chi ba shin tu phra ba dag la yang rtog par byed do/_/las dge ba byas shing bsags pa so 
[\[53b.2\]]sor yang dag par myong bar 'gyur ba ni las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba so sor yang dag par myong bar 'gyur bar so sor rig par bya'o/_/de la tshul khrims rnam pa bdun gyis mtho ris su skye bar 'gyur te/_lus kyi gsum 
[\[53b.3\]]dang /_ngag gi bzhi kun du bsten cing bsgoms te/_mang du byas pas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha drug gi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/chung ngu dang /_'bring dang /_chen pos 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha drug dag_/chung ngu dang /_'bring dang /_chen po'i 'gro ba 'thob 
[\[53b.4\]]ste/_tshe thung ngu dang /_'bring dang /_ring po dang /_kha zas ngan pa dang /_'bring dang /_bzang po dang /_gzugs ngan pa dang /_'bring dang /_bzang po dang /_brtson 'grus chung ngu dang /_'bring dang /_chen po dang /_bde ba chung ngu dang /_'bring dang /_chen 
[\[53b.5\]]por 'gyur ro/_/de la lha'i ris gnyis ni ri rab la gnas so/_/bzhi ni sprin gyi phung po ltar nam mkha' la gnas so/_/de la lha'i ris dang po ni mdor bsdu na rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams so/_/de dag gi gnas dang po ni phreng thogs rnams te/_de dag 
[\[53b.6\]]kun nas ri rab kyi phyogs bzhi la rten cing gnas so/_/de la phreng thogs de rnams kyi bye brag dang po nyid du 'byung ba ni 'di lta bu yin la/_phyogs phyogs de rnams kyi bye brag kyang ming dang las kyis 'gyur te/_de ltar las du mas bskyed pa'i tshe de la gnas pa bde ba 
[\[53b.7\]]nyams su myong bar 'gyur la/_gzugs dang lang tsho dang g.yo ba rnam pa du mar 'gyur ro/_las kyi dra ba kun ni rgya'i 'bur ltar 'byung ste/_rgyu med pa ma yin/_'dod rgyal las ma byung /_las gzhan gyis bskyed pa ma yin no/_/de lta bas na skyes bu gang bdag skyid par 
[\[54a\]]
[\[54a.1\]]'dod na dge ba'i chos rnams la 'bad par bya'o/_/sems can rnams kyi las dge ba dang mi dge ba dang /_lung du ma bstan pa'i las kyi dra ba ni thog ma med pa'i dus nas zhugs pa yin te/_las kyi dra ba gang gis sbrel ba'i sems can rnams ni zo chun rgyud 
[\[54a.2\]]mo ltar sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /_mi'i 'jig rten gyi 'khor bar yongs su 'khyam mo/_/srog chags rnams ni kun nas gar gyi ltad mo pa lta bu yin te/_dge ba'i las kyi mtha' spyad pa ni lha'i 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de la lha rnams gnas pa ri'i 
[\[54a.3\]]rgyal po ri rab ni ri bo khri phrag drug cus yongs su bskor ba yin la/_rin po che sna tshogs 'bar ba'i phreng ba'i 'od kyis gsal bar byas pa/_steng na 'bab chu dang /_lteng ka dang /_pad mo'i rdzing rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mdzes par byas pa/_'phang du dpag tshad brgyad khri 
[\[54a.4\]]bzhi stong yod pa/_ngos bzhi rin po che las byas pa/_las legs par byas pa'i lha rnams kyis yongs su bskor ba/_sa bde ba 'bar ba du mas gsal zhing dga' ba yin te/_de la 'di ltar dge slong de thog ma kho nar sa'i cha rnam par 'byed do/_/de la gnas dang po ni lha 
[\[54a.5\]]phreng thogs rnams kyi yin la/_de dag gi gnas bcu yod de/_'di lta ste/_zur la gnas pa dang /_mtha' la gnas pa dang /_'bras bus nye bar 'tsho ba dang /_yon tan dkar po spyod pa dang /_thams cad rab tu dga' bar gnas pa dang /_'gro mgyogs pa dang /_
[\[54a.6\]]yul la chags pa dang /_'dod pa la chags pa dang /_yid g.yo ba dang /_tshal dang nye ba'i tshal na gnas pa yin te/_de ltar gnas rab tu dbye ba ni bcu yod do/_/ri rab kyi ngos 'dzam bu'i gling logs su lta ba gang yin pa de na ni/_zur na gnas pa zhes bya bar ming 
[\[54a.7\]]btags so/_/de'i 'og tu gnas pa de dang de gang nye ba na mtha' la gnas pa zhes bya bar ming btags so/_/nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi phyogs gang yin pa de na 'bras bus nye bar 'tsho ba zhes bya bar ming btags so/_/de dang nye ba na yon tan dkar po spyod pa gnas 
[\[54b\]]
[\[54b.1\]]so/_/shar gyi lus 'phags kyi phyogs gang yin pa de na thams cad rab tu dga' bar gnas pa zhes bya ba gnas so/_/de dang nye ba na 'gro mgyogs gnas so/_/byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi gling gi phyogs gang yin pa de na yul la chags pa gnas so/_/de dang nye 
[\[54b.2\]]ba na 'dod pa la chags pa dang /_de dang nye ba na yid g.yo ba dang /_de dang nye ba na tshal dang nye ba'i tshal na gnas pa zhes bya ba gnas te/_de dag gi gnas so so kun la dpag tshad stong stong yod do/_/de dag gi dang po ni rgya mtsho'i nang gi steng yin te/_de dag gi tshe ni mi 
[\[54b.3\]]rnams kyi lo lnga bcu gang yin pa de'i nyin zhag gcig yin no/_/de ltar bsgyur ba'i lo lnga brgya thub ste/_dus su 'chi ba yang yod/_dus ma yin par 'chi ba yang yod do/_/de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de/_gnas de dag gi 
[\[54b.4\]]dga' ba la rtog par byed de/_las gang gis gnas der skye bar 'gyur snyam nas/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/_gang gis legs par byas pa'i las 'di byas na skye bar 'gyur te/_de ni 'di ltar shin tu dang ba'i sems de la yid zhugs pa 
[\[54b.5\]]gzhan du ma g.yengs pa'i yid gsal bas sangs rgyas sam/_chos sam/_dge 'dun la skyabs su song na/_de 'chi ba'i dus byas nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten zur na gnas pa zhes bya ba der shin tu dang ba'i sems de skyabs su song ba'i rgyus skye bar 'gyur ro/_/der 
[\[54b.6\]]skyes nas kyang de'i lus gzi brjid dang ldan zhing lus rang gi 'od kyis brgyan la bde bar gnas par 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste/[ {]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]cig dpe bya na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i bde ba gang yin pa de ni lha gnas pa gcig gi bcu drug gi char yang mi phod do/_/gnas 
[\[54b.7\]]de dag ni chu'i nang na mu tig gi bye ma yod la/_de'i ming ni 'di yin te/_'di lta ste/_'dod pa 'byung zhes bya'o/_/de'i mthu ni 'di lta bu yin te/_'di lta ste/_mtha' la gnas pa dang /_zur la gnas pa'i lha'i yid la bsams pa gang yin pa de dag chu'i rnam pa 
[\[55a\]]
[\[55a.1\]]chu bo de las 'thob bo/_/gzhan yang chu bo mu tig dang /_byi ru 'bab pa zhes bya ba yod de/_lha mo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba yin no/_/de na yang rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs 'bab ste/_'di lta ste/_bai DUr+ya'i thur ma dang /_rdo rje'i dum bu 
[\[55a.2\]]dang /_nor bu mthon ka dang /_mthon ka chen po dang /_spug me mdog rnam pa du ma ste/_gzhan yang zur na gnas pa'i lha de dag brgyan par bya ba'i phyir rnam pa de lta bu dag 'byung ngo /_/de dag gi sems la brgyan par 'dod pa'i rgyan gang yin pa dag de la 'thob 
[\[55a.3\]]par 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang chu bo spos chu zhes bya ba 'bab ste/_de na yang bya ngang pa dang /_kA raN+Da ba dang /_ngur pas brgyan la/_'gram gnyi ga shing ljon pa dang /_gser gyi shing ljon pa dbyibs dang kha dog sna tshogs dang ldan pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor 
[\[55a.4\]]cing bya rnams kyis kyang yongs su bskor ba yin no/_/'di ltar lha rnams kyis dri bsnams na yid rab tu dga' la/_de ltar yang dang yang rtag tu de la snas bsnams nas dri tshor ba dang /_snom pa po brgya 'gyur du yid dga' bar 'gyur te/_de dag gzhan yang 
[\[55a.5\]]'dod pa'i yon tan lnga 'byor cing ldan par gyur pa rnams kyis dga' bar byed do/_/shing rnams kyi rnam pa ni 'di lta bu yin te/_'di lta ste/_yal ga dmar la lo ma ljang khur 'dug pa dang /_yal ga ljang khu la lo ma dmar por 'dug pa dag go/_/lo ma'i kha dog 
[\[55a.6\]]lnga la 'di lta ste/_sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_ljang khu dang /_nag po dang /_dkar po dang /_bung ba kha dog sna tshogs dang ldan pa rnams kyis mdzes par byas pa sgra 'byin pa rnams kyis rtag tu yid dga' ba yin te/_de ltar legs par byas pa'i las kyi 
[\[55a.7\]]'bras bu dag la rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_yongs su spyod par byed do/_/ri rab dag la rin po che sna tshogs kyi rtse mo dang /_gad kha dang /_bu ga dag kyang yod de/_de la ri 'di lta bu dag yod de/_'di lta ste mtho zhing bkra ba/_'bab chu sna tshogs bsil 
[\[55b\]]
[\[55b.1\]]ba/_bya skad snyan pa 'byin pa/_spos kyis bsgos pa/_dus tshigs dang rtag tu ldan pa yin te/_rin po che sna bdun gyis brgyan pa'i ri rnam pa de lta bu la zur na gnas pa'i lha rnams dga' bar byed/_yongs su spyod par byed cing bde ba sna tshogs kyis ni myos/_lha 
[\[55b.2\]]mo rnam pa sna tshogs kyis ni yongs su bskor/_dgod pa dang /_'gying ba dang /_rtsed mo ni byed de/_ji srid du gsum la skyabs su song ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa las byung ba 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba zad par ma gyur pa de srid du 'dod pa'i yon 
[\[55b.3\]]tan lnga rnams kyis dga' bar byed la/_phyis kyang mya ngan las 'das pa'i mtha' 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/gal te mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mir skyes na/_las de dang rgyu 'thun par de rtag tu dga' la mchog tu bde ba dang ldan par spyod pa dang /_nor rdzas 
[\[55b.4\]]dang ldan par 'gyur ba mthong ngo /_/de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de lha'i 'jig rten la rtog par byed de/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas lha phreng thogs rnams kyi gnas gzhan mtha' la gnas pa zhes bya ba mthong ngo /_/lha'i 
[\[55b.5\]]'jig rten der las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/_tshul khrims dang ldan pa gang gis tshul khrims dang ldan pa dag la tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin no snyam yid la byas nas/_chu bo las bsgral ba'i phyir stegs 
[\[55b.6\]]btsugs sam gru byin te/_chu bo chen po skye bo mi bde ba las sgrol bar byed cing sdig pa la yang mi 'jug na/_de lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris lha'i 'jig rten mtha' la gnas pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/der skyes nas kyang legs par byas 
[\[55b.7\]]pa'i las kyi mtha' spyad pa de/_lha'i ris der bde ba sna tshogs la gnas shing lha'i 'jig rten de pad ma'i rdzing gis yongs su bskor ba yin no/_/de nas pad ma'i rdzing bsil la shin tu dang ba ro dang /_dri dang mdog skyon med pas gang ba yin la/_lha mo'i tshogs 
[\[56a\]]
[\[56a.1\]]rtag tu dgod pa dang /_ldem pa dang /_rtse ba dang /_yongs su spyod pa rnams kyis gang ba yin no/_/de na de lha mo'i tshogs mang po dag gis shin tu mchod la/_lus rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan to/_/rna bar sil snyan rnam pa lnga dang ldan la/_lha 
[\[56a.2\]]mo de rnams kyis nye bar rtsen te/_bde bar gnas pa/_tshal dang /_nye ba'i tshal dang /_lteng ka dang /_kun dga' ra ba rnams su bde ba myong bar byed do/_/de na lteng ka yod pa dag ni 'di lta ste/_'bab bde dang /_bud med sdug dang /_mthong dga' dang /_kun dga' 
[\[56a.3\]]dang /_sprin phreng dang /_lteng ka phreng dang /_yid bzhin sna tshogs dang /_dus mi mthong ngo /_/tshal dag kyang yod de/_mthong na nyams dga' dang /_mthong na yid 'thun dang /_rlung legs par mngon ldang dag go_/me tog gi rnam pas mdzes pa bzhi yod de/_
[\[56a.4\]]'di lta ste/_spos 'byung dang /_sna tshogs dang /_bung ba mngon dga' dang /_rtag tu nyams dga' ste/_tshal de rnams su lha de lha mo rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis yongs su bskor cing 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la sems chags pa bde ba myong bar byed do/_/rin po che sna 
[\[56a.5\]]tshogs kyis lus brgyan pa de thogs pa med pa'i 'gros dang /_nyams pa med pa'i 'gros kyis gang dga' bar 'gro zhing gar dga' bar byed do/_/yul lnga la chags pa de ri las chu bo 'bab pa ltar nyin gcig bzhin bde ba 'phel te/_dbang po lnga po chu lta bu 'dod 
[\[56a.6\]]pa rlabs lta bu dag la rtse zhing skyed mos tshal nas skyed mos tshal/_nags tshal nas nags tshal/_lteng ka nas lteng ka_/gser gyi ri'i rtse mo rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa nas/_ri'i rtse mo gzhan dag la 'gro bar byed do/_/rtse bar byed pa lha mo yid du 'ong zhing 
[\[56a.7\]]dga' ba me tog phreng bzang po dpe med pa thogs pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor cing bza' ba dang /_btung ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyis lus shin tu tshim pa yin te/_de ltar de ji srid du de'i 'dod pa sdug pa/_yid du 'ong ba legs par byas pa'i las kyi sprul pa 
[\[56b\]]
[\[56b.1\]]dpe med pa legs par byas pa'i rgyu las byung ba zad par ma gyur pa de srid du bde ba de myong bar byed do/_/de las de zad nas de nas shi ste/_gal te mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mir skyes nas/_las de dang rgyu 'thun par de drang dkan che la 'byor pa dang ldan zhing rgyal 
[\[56b.2\]]po'i mdzod kyi spyan du yang 'gyur bar mthong ngo /_/de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de/_lha phreng thogs rnams kyi gnas la rtog par byed de/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/_lha phreng thogs rnams kyi gnas gsum 
[\[56b.3\]]pa 'bras bus nye bar 'tsho ba zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo /_/der legs par byas pa'i las gang gis lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur snyam nas/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/_tshul khrims dang ldan pa lus dang /_ngag dang /_yid rab tu zhi ba/_
[\[56b.4\]]byams pa bsgoms pa'i sems gang gis lo nyes mi bzad pa phal cher byung ba'i yul rnams su/_'di ltar lam du zhugs pa bkres par gyur pa gang yin pa de dag 'bras bu de rnams kyis shin tu tshim zhing bde bar gnas par bya'o snyam nas/_sems can rnams la phan pa dang 
[\[56b.5\]]bde bar bya ba'i phyir 'bras bu'i shing ngam/_kun dga' ra ba dag bskyed cing byas la/_de dag kyang de ltar shin tu bde bar gyur na de lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris lha'i 'jig rten 'bras bu nye bar 'tsho ba zhes bya ba'i lha de rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/der skyes 
[\[56b.6\]]nas kyang de lha mo gzugs dang lang tsho dpe med pa dang ldan pa/_bde bar gnas pa mtshungs pa med pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro/_/tshal dang nye ba'i tshal dang /_lha'i me tog dang 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa dang /_gser gyi byi ru'i dra ba 'phyang ba dang /_
[\[56b.7\]]dril bu g.yer ka'i sgra bsgrags pa de dag shin tu dga' bar byed de/_bde ba la chags pa'i dbang po lnga shin tu bde ba dang ldan no/_/de na tshal dang dga' bar 'gyur ba 'di lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/_'di lta ste/_'bras bu kun phyed ces bya ba'i tshal dang /_kun dga' 
[\[57a\]]
[\[57a.1\]]gzhi zhes bya ba'i tshal dang /_dma' ba dang mtho ba zhes bya ba'i tshal dang /_kun nas bde ba zhes bya ba'i tshal dang /_rtag tu dga' ba zhes bya ba'i tshal dang /_bung ba rtag myos zhes bya ba'i tshal dang /_gser gyi grib ma zhes bya ba'i tshal te/_tshal 
[\[57a.2\]]de rnams su lha mo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor nas dga' bar byed la/_pad ma'i tshal dang /_lteng ka dang /_'bab chu sgra lhung lhung 'bab pa'i tshal rab tu mang po dag na yang dga' bar byed do/_/rang gi 'od dang shing ljon pa rab tu 'bar zhing gsal ba dang /_
[\[57a.3\]]bya rtag tu myos shing sgra 'byin pa dang /_kha zas mang po bzas mi lang ba dang /_rin po che sna bdun gyis mdzes par byas pa ri bo'i rtse mo rnam pa sna tshogs dag na yang mngon par dga' bar byed do/_/de na ri rab kyi rtse mo'i ming 'di lta bu dag yod de/_'di lta ste/_ri'i 'od 
[\[57a.4\]]kyi phreng ba zhes bya ba dang /_'dzam bu'i tshal dang /_chu dkar dang /_dgod phreng dang /_rtag dga' ste/_ri bo'i rtse mo de dag na legs par byas pa'i las kyi mtha' spyad pa dag mngon par dga' bar byed do/_/rang gis legs par byas pa'i las kyis bsgyur te/_gnas 
[\[57a.5\]]pa rtag tu yul la dga' ste/_ji skad bstan pa'i gnas de dag na/_lha mo brgya phrag du mas yongs su bskor ba dang lhan cig dga' bar byed/_yongs su spyod par byed do/_/'dir tshigs su bcad pa/_mtho ris thams cad 'dod pa ni/_/rgyu chung ba yis thob par 
[\[57a.6\]]'gyur/_/de bas nyes par spyad spangs te/_/rtag tu legs par spyad la spyod/_/sbyin pa sems la goms pa dang /_/tshul khrims yongs su bsrungs pa ni/_/'dod pa'i yon tan lnga 'byor pa/_/lha yi gnas su 'gro bar byed/_/ji ltar tshul khrims legs 
[\[57a.7\]]bsrungs pa/_/pha ma don dang bshes grogs dang /_/gnyen 'dun dag gi bde ba yang /_/de lta bur ni myong mi 'gyur/_/tshul khrims 'di dang pha rol skyob/_/tshul khrims 'di yi rten gyi mchog_/tshul khrims rtag tu ldan pa'i mi/_/bde las bde ba 'thob 
[\[57b\]]
[\[57b.1\]]par 'gyur/_/rang gi las kyis bsgyur ba dag_/sbyin dang tshul khrims yang dag spyod/_/mi gang gtsang mar spyod pa rnams/_/de dag lha yi gnas su 'gro/_/tshul khrims gter ni zad mi shes/_/tshul khrims bde ba mtha' yas te/_/tshul khrims lhag 
[\[57b.2\]]par srung ba'i mi/_/rtag tu bde bar gnas pa yin/_/bsngags pa dang ni nor 'dod dang /_/pha rol mtho ris dag la dga'/_/bde gsum tshol bar 'dod pa yi/_/blo dang ldan pas tshul khrims srungs/_/mi gang tshul khrims ldan pa ni/_/tshul khrims nyid 
[\[57b.3\]]la rten par byed/_/gang la 'chi ba med pa yi/_/bde las de ni mya ngan 'da'/_/thog ma med pa'i 'khor ba nas/_/'dod chags gti mug la sogs bsgribs/_/snang byed mchog ni tshul khrims te/_/de bas tshul khrims yang dag spyod/_/tshul khrims 
[\[57b.4\]]mtsho ltar rnyog med pa/_/tshul khrims de ni bsngags pa yin/_/rgyal po chom rkun me dang chus/_/tshul khrims nor la 'phrogs mi nus/_/de bas tshul khrims rtag tu brten/_/tshul khrims 'chal pa rnam par smad/_/tshul la mngon par dga' ba'i 
[\[57b.5\]]mi/_/de ni mya ngan 'das dang nye/_/skyes bu tshul khrims ldan pa bsngags/_/tshul khrims ldan pa'ang sten par byed/_/tshul khrims nyi ma lta bur mdzes/_/tshul khrims 'chal pa rnam par smad/_/dri ma med cing gnod pa med/_/rims nad med cing mya ngan 
[\[57b.6\]]med/_/rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis tshul khrims bsngags/_/mya ngan 'das pa'i grong khyer nye/_/rtag tu tshul khrims ldan pa yi/_/mi dag nges par kun tu 'gengs/_/tshul khrims yongs su bsrungs pa ni/_/'chi ba'i tshe na mi 'jigs so/_/tshul khrims thog 
[\[57b.7\]]ma tha mar dge_/bde ba thams cad rab tu 'jug_/skyes bu tshul khrims ldan pa bsngags/_/tshul 'chal dga' ba ba lang yin/_/tshul khrims 'chal pa'i mi dag ni/_/dud 'gro rnams dang mtshungs pa yin/_/bya dang mi bya mi shes te/_/de bas tshul khrims 
[\[58a\]]
[\[58a.1\]]yang dag spyod/_/tshul khrims gos kyis gang g.yogs pa/_/skyes bu de ni g.yogs pa yin/_/tshul khrims spangs pa gang yin pa/_/gcer bu de ni phyugs dang mtshungs/_/skyes bu tshul khrims ldan pa ni/_/rang gi skyed tshal 'gro ba bzhin/_/
[\[58a.2\]]tshul khrims ldan pa 'dir 'ongs pa/_/der ni gnyen ltar sems par byed/_/tshul khrims gtsang ma yang dag spyod/_/dge ba'i las dang ldan pa yi/_/skye bo bya ba legs byas pa/_/de ni lha yi 'jig rten 'gro/_/skyes bu tshul khrims rtag ldan pa/_/'dod pa 
[\[58a.3\]]gang dang gang tshol ba/_/de dag de yi so sor 'grub/_/tshul khrims kyis ni yongs su 'phel/_/'jig rten 'di dang pha rol tu/_/tshul khrims grogs kyi mchog yin no/_/de bas grogs po yon tan mchog_/tshul khrims nyid la rtag tu spyod/_/bkres skom 
[\[58a.4\]]'jigs pa mi bzad pa/_/nyam ngar skyob pa mchog yin te/_/tshul khrims gnas shing bsgoms pa bstod/_/'jig rten pha rol nye bar 'gro/_/gang zhig tshul 'bras 'di lta bur/_/gal te tshul ldan rab shes na/_/de ni mtshon rnon thogs nas 'dir/_/
[\[58a.5\]]bdag nyid mgul gcod la sogs byed/_/dpe med bshad du med pa ste/_/shin tu dge dang yang dag ldan/_/tshul khrims 'bras bu dri ma med/_/bde bar gshegs pas rab tu bstan/_/dang po de bzhin bar du dge/_/de bzhin tha mar dge ba yin/_/tshul khrims 
[\[58a.6\]]'bras bu dri ma med/_/de ni dge las bde chen thob/_/de bas de yis de'i yon tan/_/rig nas tshul nyid rtag tu spyod/_/'di dang gzhan du skyob byed pa/_/tshul khrims lta bu gang yang med/_/de ltar dge slong tshul khrims kyi yon tan gyi de kho na nyid la sems pa 
[\[58a.7\]]de/_tshul khrims la ni stod par byed la/_tshul khrims 'chal pa la ni rtag tu smod par byed do/_/de ltar de lha'i gnas na 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga 'byor pas bde ste/_der ji srid du dge ba'i tshul khrims de so so yang dag par ldan par 'gyur ba de srid du dga' bar 
[\[58b\]]
[\[58b.1\]]byed do/_/de dag zad nas shi ste/_/gal te mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mir skyes na/_las de dang rgyu 'thun par rdzu 'phrul dang ldan zhing gzugs shin tu blta na sdug pa dang /_gnas dang nye ba'i tshal gyi bar dag tu skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras 
[\[58b.2\]]bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de lha phreng thogs kyi gnas la rtog par byed de/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas lha phreng thogs rnams kyi gnas bzhi pa gang na lha dag dga' bar byed pa/_yon tan dkar po spyod pa zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo /_/der sems can 
[\[58b.3\]]dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na me tog phreng bas 'tsho ba blo zhan pa yid dang bas sems [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]bskyed pa/_zhing dang dngos po kho na yon tan dang ldan la sems yon tan dang ldan pa ma yin pa lam du 
[\[58b.4\]]zhugs pa gang gis sangs rgyas sam/_mchod rten dag la me tog snyim pa gang zhig phul na/_de lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten yon tan dkar po spyod pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/der skyes nas kyang de'i lus yon tan dkar 
[\[58b.5\]]po'i phreng ba btags so/_/gnas de yang kun nas bai DUr+ya bas lhag pa'i rin po che sna bdun gyi rdo rnams kyis mdzes pa yin no/_/gnas de rin po che sna bdun gyis spras pa'i bya skad snyan pa 'byin pa rnams kyis kyang yongs su bskor ba kun nas gsal ba yin 
[\[58b.6\]]te/_de nas yang brgya 'gyur du shin tu gsal bas mdzes pa yin no/_/de ltar gnas de rnam pa du mas brgyan cing shing ljon pa rnams kyis kyang mdzes pa yin te/_'di lta ste 'gram na pad ma skye ba dang /_rgyan du bya bar blo yod pa lta bu'i shing ljon pa dag la gos 
[\[58b.7\]]spos kyis bsgos pa'i dri rnams kyis dpag tshad du khyab la/_me tog rtag tu 'byung ba dang /_'bras bu rtag tu 'byung ba yin te/_gnas de rnam pa de dag dang /_gzhan de dag gis mdzes pa yin no/_/de na bde ba la gnas pa de dag kun dga' ra ba dang /_chu bo dang 
[\[59a\]]
[\[59a.1\]]lha mo'i tshogs sna tshogs glu len cing yul nas yul dang /_gnas nas gnas dang /_skyed mos tshal nas skyed mos tshal du yongs su rgyu ba na bde ba dag myong bar byed la/_bgad pa dang rtses pa dang /_dga' ba dang /_dga' dgur spyad de bde bar gnas 
[\[59a.2\]]pa dga' dgur spyod pa spyad cing bde ba dpe med pa dag myong bar byed do/_/gnas de dma' ba dang /_mtho bar yang 'gyur te/_mar sar ltar 'jam pa rkang pa bzhag na nems zhes byed la/_rkang pa bteg na par ces byed do/_/gnas de phyogs gzhan dag tu shing bal 
[\[59a.3\]]ltar yang 'jam par 'gyur te/_nems zhes byed pa dang /_par ces byed pa ni snga ma bzhin no/_/shing thams cad kyang rang las 'od 'byung ste/_nyi ma'i 'od ltar bde ba yin la/_gser gyi shing ljon pa de rnams ni gnas kyang lo ma rnyis par mi 'gyur/_me tog rnyis 
[\[59a.4\]]par mi 'gyur te/_de ltar las las skyes pa'i tshul khrims kyi dbang gis yongs su sbrel la/_legs par byas pa'i las kyis mngon sum du gyur pa rgya'i 'bur lta bur lha'i bde ba dpe med pa dag myong ngo /_/rnam pa de lta bur nyams dga' ba skyed mos tshal dang /_nags 
[\[59a.5\]]tshal dang /_lteng ka de dag tu rang gi las ngan pa dang /_'bring dang /_bzang po rnams kyis lha dag rtse bar byed cing dga' dgur spyod do/_/rang gi las kyis lus brgyan pa rnams rang las 'od 'byung la gzugs dang /_sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya dag myong zhing de 
[\[59a.6\]]dag gi lus nams kyang nyams par mi 'gyur la/_bkres pa dang /_skom pa yang med do/_/sgra dang ro dang gzugs dang dri zhim pa rnams kyis tshim pa med pa'i lha sred pa la sems chags pa dag gang dang gang 'dod pa de dang de nyid lha rnams la 'grub la/_gang dang gang 
[\[59a.7\]]'grub pa de dang de dag gzhan gyis nyams par mi byed do/_/lha rang dgar spyod cing rtag tu mgu ba/_rtag tu yid rab tu dga' ba/_gar dga' dgur rab tu 'gro ba'i lha sprul pa dag rang dgar rnam par rgyu la/_lus sbom pa'i lha dag ni lus yang bar 'gyur ro/_/mig 
[\[59b\]]
[\[59b.1\]]'dzums pa dang phye ste 'gro ba'i lha dag ni mig 'dzums pa dang phye bas dpag tshad bye ba bye bar 'gro yang ngal ba med la yang bar 'gyur ro/_/dper na nam mkha' la rlung ngal bar mi 'gyur la/_de bzhin du lha rnams la yang ngal ba'i skyon med par 'gyur ro/_/yid 
[\[59b.2\]]gsal ba'i lha rnams kyi lus ni yang la dri ma dang bral ba yin no/_/thams cad du 'gro bar nus pa dag ni gzugs ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du 'gyur la/_lha dang lha mo rab tu dga' bas kun tu gang ba/_lha'i na chung thams cad tshal dang nye ba'i tshal dag na 'khod pa/_lha dang 
[\[59b.3\]]lha mo rnams lhan cig 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga 'dod pa myong bar bya ba/_sdug pa myong bar bya ba/_yid du 'ong ba myong bar bya ba dang /_bde bar gnas pa myong bar bya ba rnams kyis dga' bar byed do/_/de ltar phan tshun gnas pa mtho ris kyi gnas ri brags dang /_tshal 
[\[59b.4\]]dang nye ba'i tshal gyi bar sna tshogs dag na 'bral ba'i sdug bsngal rtsis la ma chags par yul mi brtan pa rnams kyis nyin gcig bzhin myos pa na bag med par gnas pa dga' ba'i 'dod chags kyi mod las byung ba'i sred pas bslus pa rnams/_ji srid du de'i 
[\[59b.5\]]'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba'i las mtho ris su skye ba'i rgyu las byung ba/_byas shing bsags pa zad par ma gyur pa de srid du dga' bar byed do/_/de phyis de nas 'chi bar 'gyur te/_shi nas kyang rang gi las nye bar 'gro ba ji lta ba bzhin sems can dmyal ba dang /_
[\[59b.6\]{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_dud 'gro'i nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te yang legs par byas pa'i las kyis mi dang so so yang dag par myong bar 'gyur ba'i mi rnams kyi nang du skyes na/_las de dang rgyu 'thun par de grong khyer gyi dpon po'am yul gyi dpon por 'gyur te/_skye bo 
[\[59b.7\]]rtag tu dga' ba rnams kyis gang ba'i yul du skye bar 'gyur la/_nad med pa dang /_gzugs bzang po dang ldan par 'gyur ba mthong ngo /_/de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de/_lha phreng thogs kyi gnas la rtog par byed de/_des thos 
[\[60a\]]
[\[60a.1\]]pa las byung ba'i shes pas lha phreng thogs rnams kyi gnas thams cad dga' bar gnas zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo /_/der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/_tshul 
[\[60a.2\]]khrims dang ldan pa'i sems pa gang gis gzhan la mi gnod par me tog bskyed nas sam/_tshong zong gis nyos nas btogs te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la phul na/_de lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten thams cad dga' bar gnas 
[\[60a.3\]]pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/der skyes nas kyang de bde ba rnam pa bzhi myong bar 'gyur te/_'di lta ste/_'gran zla med pa dang /_gar dga' dgur 'gro ba dang /_lha gzhan gyi zil gyis mi non pa dang /_lha mo yang lha gzhan la mi rten pa dang /_sil 
[\[60a.4\]]snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pas skyid par byed/_yongs su spyod par byed/_rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_yang dag par dga' bar byed cing gnas so/_/rtse ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyis rtse bar byed de/_'di lta ste/_chu na rtse ba dang /_pad ma'i rdzing la rtse ba dang /_me 
[\[60a.5\]]tog la rtse ba dang /_'bras bu la rtse ba dang /_spos la rtse ba dang /_bya la rtse ba dang /_tshal gyi nang na rgyu zhing rtse ba dang /_bung ba sgra 'byin pas rtse la phan tshun lta bas mi ngoms pa'i lha mo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba dag dga' bar byed do/_/lha dang lha mo phan tshun du 
[\[60a.6\]]phrag dog byed pa'i sdug bsngal spangs pa dag dri shin tu zhim pos legs par bde ba dang ldan no/_/gnas de na pad ma'i rdzing rnams kyis kyang yongs su bskor ba yin te/_/'di lta ste/_pad ma'i rdzing shin tu dri zhim pa dang /_pad ma ma rnyis pa'i pad ma'i rdzing dang /_
[\[60a.7\]]pad ma dang /_ud pa lar 'dres pa dang ldan pa'i pad ma'i rdzing dang de dang gzhan dag gis kyang rtag tu gang ba'i pad ma'i rdzing dag yod de/_rnam pa de lta bu'i pad ma rnam pa du ma dag gis pad ma'i rdzing de kun nas khebs pa yin no/_/de rnams su lha dga' ba la gnas 
[\[60b\]]
[\[60b.1\]]pa dag shin tu nyams dga' ba dang /_mchog tu bde bar byed pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi bde ba myong ngo /_/tshal gser gyi lo ma can bung bas 'khrigs pa'i tshal gyi bar bar dag na yang dga' bar byed do/_/spos sna tshogs dang ldan pa dag na bya sgra snyan pa 'byin 
[\[60b.2\]]pa dag kyang thos te/_de'i khyad par ni mi'i sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pa dag gis bcu drug gi char yang mi phod do/_/de ltar de dag gi mig kyang gzugs rnams kyis yang dag par tshim par byed/_rna ba yang rol mo sna tshogs dang glu rnam pa sna tshogs kyis snyan 
[\[60b.3\]]par byed/_pags pa yang gos thags su ma btags pa rnams kyis 'jam par byed/_sna yang lha'i dri rnam pa du mas zhim par byed de/_de ltar yul lnga la chags pa de dga' ba rnam pa du ma dang /_gzugs rgyun mi 'chad pa gzhan gyis mi 'phrogs pa 
[\[60b.4\]]gzhan gyis bskrun du med pa'i bde ba du ma dang /_lha'i bza' ba dang btung ba mdog bzang ba dri dang ro zhim pa du ma dag kyang myong ngo /_/de gar dga' bar yang 'gro ste/_rang gi las dang 'thun par gar dga' bar 'gro'o/_/de ltar de tshal nas tshal dang /_
[\[60b.5\]]pad ma'i rdzing nas pad ma'i rdzing dang /_nye ba'i tshal nas nye ba'i tshal dag tu lha mo'i tshogs du mas yongs su bskor te yongs su rgyu bar byed cing bde ba sna tshogs dag la gnas so/_/de 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba'i las kyi 'bras bu la nye bar spyod pa na/_
[\[60b.6\]]shing ljon pa rang gi 'od dang ldan pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor ba/_gser gyi bya'i tshogs kyi sgra thos na yid dga' bar byed pa rnams kyis rna bar snyan par byed de/_de ltar de lha'i gzugs kyi bde ba dpe med pa du mas gzhan gyis mi 'phrogs pa de ji srid 
[\[60b.7\]]du de'i 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba/_zhing dam pas bskyed pa/_mthar mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba'i las zad par ma gyur pa de srid du myong bar byed do/_/gang gi tshe zad par gyur te phyis lha'i 'jig rten de nas 'chi bar 'gyur te/_shi nas kyang rang gi 
[\[61a\]]
[\[61a.1\]]las nye bar 'gro ba ji lta ba bzhin sems can dmyal ba dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_dud 'gro rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te mi dang so so yang dag par myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyis mi rnams kyi nang du skyes na/_de grong khyer ram grong khyer chung ngur dbang byed 
[\[61a.2\]]par 'gyur/_'byor pa mang ba dang /_blo rgya che ba dang /_bran khol du ma dang ldan pa dang /_shin tu bde ba dang ldan pa dang /_zhing bzang po la legs par byas pa'i las des mthar mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba mthong ngo /_/de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de/_
[\[61a.3\]]lha phreng thogs kyi gnas la rtog par byed de/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas lha'i 'jig rten gyi gnas dag na lha'i gnas 'gro mgyogs zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo /_/der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas/_des thos 
[\[61a.4\]]pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/_tshul khrims dang ldan par gyur pa gang gis tshal mes bsregs pa'i gsab gseb tu srog chags dag sreg pa na/_chus gtor te thar bar byas pa dang /_skad cig de la shi ba la thug pa rnams kyi 'jigs pa bskyabs na/_de 
[\[61a.5\]]lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten lha phreng thogs rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/der skyes nas kyang mi 'jigs pa sbyin par byed pa/_mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i tshul khrims kyi rgyu las byung ba de lha'i bde ba dpe med pa de myong bar 'gyur ro/_/de'i gzugs 
[\[61a.6\]]dang /_sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya bde ba dag 'thob la/_lha mo'i tshogs brgya phrag du ma dag gis yongs su bskor cing sil snyan dang /_bro gar dang /_dga' dgur spyod pa'i tshogs mang po brgya snyed kyis yongs su bskor to/_/gzhal med khang chen po 
[\[61a.7\]]gser gyi lan kan ni bres/_dril bu g.yer ka'i sgra ni drag tu 'khrol/_mu tig gi dra bas ni skar khung g.yogs/_nor bu sngon po brgya snyed kyis brgyan pa dag na/_lha mo'i tshogs du mas yongs su bskor cing dga' bar byed do/_/lha mo gang dang gang mthong ba de 
[\[61b\]]
[\[61b.1\]]dang de dag gi rjes su yid chags shing /_de dag la dga' ba bskyed/_de dag la mig chags de dag la rjes su chags la/_de bde ba la mngon par rtog pa na/_rgyan dang cha byad sna tshogs 'bum snyed kyis brgyan pa/_lus rtag tu spos kyis byugs pa/_rtag 
[\[61b.2\]]par rab tu dga' ba rnams kyis yongs su bskor ba yin te/_de ltar tshul dang 'thun pa rnams mthong nas/_shin tu dga' bar byed do/_/rna bas sgra mnyan par bya ba yang 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba rnam pa du ma dag thos te/_'di lta ste/_gser gyi bya rkang 
[\[61b.3\]]pa dang mchu byi ru ltar dmar ba/_ri dang 'bab chu dang /_gsab gseb na 'khod pa sna tshogs dag gi sgra rnams thos so/_/gang dag dpe bya bar yang mi nus pa de dag kha cig ni ril dong ste/_mngon par dga' bar byed do/_/kha cig ni ri'i gseb tu dong /_kha 
[\[61b.4\]]cig ni me tog gi gseb tu dong /_kha cig ni chu'i nang na rgyu/_kha cig ni nam mkha' la dong /_kha cig ni gad kha dang sman ljongs su dong /_/kha cig ni gser gyi ri'i phug tu dong nas sgra snyan pa 'byin te/_de ltar rna bas kyang 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba thos so/_/
[\[61b.5\]]snas kyang shin tu dri zhim pa myong ste/_'di lta ste/_me tog dri'i ngad dang ldan pa dpe med pa du ma bsnams na bde ba dang /_lha mo dri bsung dang ldan pa dang /_gzhan yang dri zhim po rnam pa sna tshogs dag la snom par byed de/_de ltar snas kyang dri 'dod pa sdug pa 
[\[61b.6\]]yid du 'ong ba dag la snom par byed do/_/lces kyang ro myong bar byed de/_'di lta ste/_bdud rtsi rnam pa du ma dag gi khyad par gang yin pa dag ni mi'i sbrang chang dang sbyar ba'i chang gis 'bum gyi char yang mi phod do/_/de ni [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]cig dper bya ba yin no/_/lus 
[\[61b.7\]]kyis kyang gang dang gang la reg pa thags su ma btags pa'i gos nyid la reg par byed de/_de dag kyang 'jam zhing nem la srab pa/_reg na bde zhing dga' ba rnam pa du ma dag gyon no/_/yid kyis gang dang gang bsams pa de dang de nyid la 'grub par 'gyur te/_
[\[62a\]]
[\[62a.1\]]'grub pa gang yin pa de ni 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba gzhan dang thun mong ma yin pa 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/de ltar sred pa drug po rnam pa du ma dag la blo rnam par chags pa de bde ba du ma 'byor cing ldan par gyur nas pad ma'i tshal du ma'i nang na 
[\[62a.2\]]mngon par dga' bar byed do/_/de bzhin du byi ru dang gser btso ma'i tshal du ma dang /_bya sgra snyan pa 'byin pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi nang na mngon par dga' bar byed do/_/de bzhin du lha mo'i nang du song nas dga' bar byed do/_/de bzhin du nor bu'i gzhal med khang 
[\[62a.3\]]gi nang na dga' bar byed do/_/de bzhin du lha'i pad ma'i rdzing gis yongs su bskor ba/_chu bo dang /_'bab chu'i phyogs bkra shis pa rnams su dga' bar byed do/_/de ltar rnam par smin pa sred pa sna tshogs de dge slong des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas mngon par 
[\[62a.4\]]brtags nas 'di ltar tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_dbang po drug las byung ba yi/_/yul gyi bud shing sreg byed pa/_/sred pa'i me yis lha rnams sreg_/shing mes de ltar ga la sreg_/bde bas yongs su bslus pa rnams/_/bde la dga' zhing bde bas bsgribs/_/
[\[62a.5\]]sred pas yongs su bslus pa rnams/_/ltung bar 'gyur ba mi shes so/_/bde kun zad pa'i mthar 'gyur te/_/bde ba la ni rtag pa med/_/lha dag lha yi 'jig rten nas/_/'chi ba'i sdug bsngal gang yin dang /_/dmyal bar sdug bsngal gang 'byung dang /_/bral 
[\[62a.6\]]ba sngon du 'dren byed pas/_/gal te bdag nyid bde 'dod na/_/de phyir de la chags mi bya//_//'phags pa dam pa'i chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa/_bam po nyer drug pa/_dge slong des de ltar rjes su bsams nas 'jig rten du gtogs 
[\[62a.7\]]pa'i bde ba rang dbang med cing mi brtan pa mthar ltung bar 'gyur ba de dag la yang mngon par brtags te/_kye ma sems can 'di dag ni sred pas yongs su bslus nas ltung bar 'gyur ba khong du ma chud do snyam nas/_de mtho ris la yang sems 'dod chags dang bral 
[\[62b\]]
[\[62b.1\]]lo/_/de ltar lha de lha'i 'jig rten de na ji srid du de'i 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba byas shing bsags pa zad par ma gyur pa de srid du lha mo de dag dang dga' bar byed yongs su spyod par byed do/_/de phyis de nas 'chi bar 'gyur te/_shi nas kyang las nye bar 
[\[62b.2\]]'gro ba ji lta ba bzhin sems can dmyal ba dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_dud 'gro'i nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mi'i nang du skyes na/_de las de dang rgyu 'thun par shin tu bde ba dang ldan zhing rtag tu 'jigs pa med pa dang /_skye bo 
[\[62b.3\]]thams cad dga' ba dang /_rgyal pos bkur ba dang /_ji srid 'tsho'i bar du gnod pa med la mi 'jigs pa byin pa de phyis mthar mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba mthong ngo /_/de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de/_lha phreng thogs kyi 
[\[62b.4\]]gnas la rtog par byed de/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas lha phreng thogs rnams kyi gnas yul la chags pa zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo /_/der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags 
[\[62b.5\]]na/_legs par byas pa'i las kyi mtha' spyad pa/_phan par 'dod pa'i sems dang ldan pa gang gis mdza' bshes dang /_gnyen 'dab dang /_rtsa lag dag so sor phye ste/_gcig la gcig gnod par byed pa'i blo can dag bsdum byas na/_de lus dang bral nas bde 
[\[62b.6\]]'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten yul la chags pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/der skyes nas kyang legs par byas pa'i las kyi mtha' spyad pa de/_gnas der bsam pa dga' dgur 'grub ste/_gang dang gang bsams pa de dang de dag de nas 'thob par
