[\[62b.7\]]'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste/_rgyan dang bgo ba sna tshogs dang /_de bzhin du rna cha gdub kor dang /_dpung rgyan de dag mtho ris dang 'thun par 'thob bo/_/chu bo dang 'bab chu dang sal sul dang /_glu dang rol mo'i sgra dbyangs sna tshogs 'byung ba dang /_'di lta ste/_bya tan 
[\[63a\]]
[\[63a.1\]]da pa'i sgra rnams kyi nang na dga' bar byed/_lha mo'i glu dbyangs snyan pa brag ca 'byin pas kyang dga' bar byed de/_de rtag tu yid dga' ba yin no/_/ngang pa'i shing rta rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/_rin po che sna bdun gyis spras pa rnams 
[\[63a.2\]]kyis/_tshal dang nye ba'i tshal dang /_'bab chu dang /_pad ma'i tshal rnams su rgyu bar byed do/_/lha mo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing tshal dang nye ba'i tshal bzang pos 'tsho la/_gser gyi pad ma rnams kyi nang na mngon par dga' bar byed do/_/de na tshal 'di lta bu 
[\[63a.3\]]dag yod de/_'di lta ste/_byi ru'i tshal dang /_bai DUr+ya'i tshal dang /_shing ta la ba tin tu ka'i tshal dang /_bya myos pa'i tshal dang /_pad ma dang ldan pa'i tshal dang /_bya tan da pa'i tshal dang /_khu byug gi tshal te/_tshal de rnams su legs par byas pa'i las kyi 
[\[63a.4\]]sa bon grogs su gyur pa dga' bar byed do/_/chu bo yang lha'i chu bo dang ba dag yod de/_'di lta ste/_'bab chu dang /_pad ma dang /_nye ba'i tshal dang /_lteng ka nor bus brgyan pa dang /_yid la ji ltar 'dod pa'i chu sgra yid du 'ong ba dang /_bya'i sgra myur bar 'byung ste/_
[\[63a.5\]]chu bo de dag gis gnas gang yin pa rtag tu brgyan pa yin no/_/'di lta ste/_gang na chu bo 'bab pa med pa na/_gzugs dang /_sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro rnam pa sna tshogs dang /_bud med gzugs sna tshogs dang ldan yang /_gang yon tan dang mi ldan pa'am/_sbrum 
[\[63a.6\]]ma lta bur mi mdzes la/_de bzhin du mtho ris kyi gnas der dga' bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de lta bas na lha'i 'jig rten na chu gtso bo yin te/_chu las skye ba 'byung /_chus mngon par dga' bar byed la/_kun nas nyon mongs pa rnams kyi ro dang /_nye ba'i tshal du 
[\[63a.7\]]bgrod pa de'i nang na/_'di lta ste/_chu 'di ni ro'i mchog yin no/_/de lta bas na lha dang /_mi rnams kyi rgyan du gyur pa dang /_yo byad du gyur pa ni chu yin la/_lha dang mi kun gyi bya ba 'am/_don ni de la rag las pa yin no/_/chu yon tan de lta bu dang ldan par rig nas/_
[\[63b\]]
[\[63b.1\]]chu la mngon par dga' ba'i lha de dag mngon par dga' bar byed/_yongs su spyod par byed la/_chu sgra lhung lhung por 'bab pa de dag tu dga' bar byed do/_/de chu bo'i 'gram de dag tu mngon par rtses nas/_chu me long ltar gsal ba ga la ba der 'gro bar byed do/_/de lha'i tshal 
[\[63b.2\]]lha'i bde ba phun sum tshogs pa de na shing ljon pa me long ltar gsal ba mthong ngo /_/shing ljon pa de dag gi sdong po me long ltar gsal la/_de dag gi nang du gang gis legs par byas pa'i las nges par myong bar 'gyur ba byas pa dag thams cad nas thams cad du snang 
[\[63b.3\]]ngo /_/legs par byas pa'i las de dag gi mthus shing de dag gam/_tshal gyi bar gyi sa gzhi gsal ba de dag tu'am/_gser gyi sa gzhi me long lta bur gsal ba'am/_tshal gyi bar gyi sa gzhi bsil ba rnams su gang dang gang legs par byas pa dang /_nyes par 
[\[63b.4\]]byas pa de dang de'i legs par byas pa'i las kyi mthus gnas de rnams su mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/shing ljon pa de dag la'am/_tshal gyi bar gyi sa gzhi de dag tu'am/_sa gzhi bsil ba de dag tu las legs par byas pa'i bde ba dang /_tshe rabs brgya snyed nas bsags 
[\[63b.5\]]pa'i nyes par byas pa de dag kyang mthong ngo /_/de legs par byas pa'i las kyis bsgrubs pa mthong ba dang /_sa de rnams dang gzhan dag la yang snga ma bzhin du dga' bar byed do/_/des ji ltar sngon skye ba dang /_'chi ba'i las kyi 'bras bu byas shing /_'gro ba lngar 
[\[63b.6\]]gtogs pa'i bde ba dang /_sdug bsngal bsgrubs pa'i las de dag ji lta ba bzhin mthong ste/_des gal te sems can dmyal ba'i las mi gtsang bar byas na des de bzhin du mthong ngo /_/sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang /_thig nag dang /_bsdus gzhom dang /_
[\[63b.7\]]ngu 'bod dang /_ngu 'bod chen po la sogs par sems can dmyal ba'i gnod pa gang 'byung ba de dag thams cad snga ma bzhin du mthong ste/_sems can dmyal ba rnams su 'byung ba yan chad snga ma bzhin du mthong ngo /_/ji ltar lha rnams kyi bde ba dpe med pa de 
[\[64a\]]
[\[64a.1\]]ltar sems can dmyal ba pa rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnam pa du ma yang mthong ste/_de sems can [(]dmyal [,]dmyal ba [)]der gtogs pa'i sdug bsngal las ches sdug bsngal ba mngon par mthong ngo /_/bdag gcig pus mthong ba dang /_gang lha'i 'jig rten du gtogs 
[\[64a.2\]]pa dang /_lha'i bde ba yul gyi rnam pa de ltar byung ba de dag kyang ji ltar tshe rabs gzhan du nye bar spyad pa de ltar ma brjed de des mthong ngo /_/shin tu mi 'thun par gyur pa sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal rnam pa mang po de dag des mthong nas/_bde ba de thams cad bde bar tshor 
[\[64a.3\]]ba med de/_'di lta ste/_chu bo gang gA'i nang du lan tshwa srang gcig btab pa mi tshor ba de bzhin du/_de'i yid las byung ba nges par myong bar 'gyur ba'i lha'i bde ba de dag tshor ba med do/_/glu dbyangs dang /_sil snyan gyi dbyangs la dga' ba dang /_bya'i sgra di ri ri 'don pa 
[\[64a.4\]]yang bdag nyid kyi gnas skabs de dag dran nas/_tshal gyi bar gyi sa gzhi dag la bde ba so sor myong ba med do/_/de gal te lha'i bde ba des sems g.yengs nas brjed pa dang /_yang de phyogs gzhan zhig gi shing ljon pa'i sdong po dag la bdag nyid [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]su gyur nas 
[\[64a.5\]]sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gzir cing lus bkres pa dang skom pas gdungs par mthong ngo /_/nges par myong bar 'gyur ba'i las des bskul ba de/_bdag nyid de ltar mthong nas de nas yang 'jigs pa skyes te/_des lha gzhan dag la 'di skad smras so/_/
[\[64a.6\]]grogs po dag shing ljon pa rnams la mi sdug pa 'di dag mthong ngam/_ji ltar bdag gis mthong ba ltar ci khyed kyis mthong ngam/_de dag gis 'di skad smras so/_/bdag cag gis ma mthong ste/_gang gis nges par myong bar 'gyur ba'i las ma byas pa de dag gis ni de nyid mi 
[\[64a.7\]]mthong la/_gang gis byas pa des ni mthong ngo /_/bdag nyid [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi 'jig rten du 'gro ba des lha de dag la smras pa/_grogs po dag khyed kyis mthong ngam/_des smras pa/_mthong ngo /_/de gnyis [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi 'gro ba der sdug bsngal chen po mthong nas ji ltar tshe 
[\[64b\]]
[\[64b.1\]]rabs stong du gyur pa de ltar lha'i bde ba de dag brjed de/_de shin tu yi chad nas de nas yang yul de nas 'pho bar byed do/_/de nas yang lha'i bde ba'i dbang du gyur nas/_de gzugs dang /_sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya yid du 'ong ba la ni chags/_tshal dang /_nye ba'i 
[\[64b.2\]]tshal dang /_pad ma'i rdzing gi 'gram rnam pa sna tshogs dang /_bya sgra sna tshogs 'byin pa dang /_tshal gyi bar bar dag na dga' bar byed la/_lha mo cha byad sna tshogs thogs pa dang yang lhan cig dga' bar byed do/_/de nas yang sred pas bdas pa na/_yang skabs shig tu/_
[\[64b.3\]]me long lta bu'i tshal du song ba dang /_de nas yang nges par myong ba'i las kyi skul bas bskul ba bdag nyid dud 'gror song nas gcig la gcig za ba de mthong ste/_gzhan gyis kyang de la za la des kyang gzhan la za ba dud 'gro phan tshun za ba'i sdug bsngal chen po ji ltar sngon 
[\[64b.4\]]des byas pa bdag nyid kyis mthong ngo /_/des bdag nyid de lta bur gyur pa mthong nas de nas yang mi dga' ba chen po skyes te/_bdag nyid kyi gzugs che la mi sdug pa sdug bsngal gyi rnam pa mang po du ma ci ste mthong zhig gu snyam nas des yang gzhan dag la yang snga ma bzhin 
[\[64b.5\]]du smras so/_/de nas yang yul la sems rnam par chags pa/_yul gzugs dang /_sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya sdug pa rnams kyi dbang du gyur pa dag de ltar 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyi phyang mo la nyug go/_/de nas yang me long lta bu'i tshal de nyid du mir skyes pa 
[\[64b.6\]]mthong ste/_ji ltar mdza' bshes dang /_gnyen 'dun dang /_rtsa lag phan tshun kho na byung ste/_bye ba dag sdud cing bsdum byas pa'i tshul khrims kyi las dang ldan pa thams cad des mthong ba dang /_bdag ni rgyu de dang /_rkyen de dang /_gzhi des lus dang bral nas bde 
[\[64b.7\]]'gro lha'i nang 'dir skyes pa lta snyam nas/_de las bdag gir bya ba dang /_las kyi bgo skal la spyod par bdag nyid kyis mthong ngo /_/des de dag mthong nas de nas yang mi dga' ba skyes so/_/de nas yang sems mi brtan pa lha'i bde ba'i dbang du gyur pa de/_
[\[65a\]]
[\[65a.1\]]gzugs dang /_sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya bde ba dag la spyod par byed do/_/de ltar sems rab tu myos pa de/_de nas yang bde ba'i myos pas sems g.yengs pa rab tu myos shing bag med pa la gnas pa dag dge ba'i las kyi 'bras bu de nyid la spyod 
[\[65a.2\]]par byed do/_/des bdag nyid lha'i 'jig rten de nas shi ste/_gzhan du skye la/_de nas yang sems can dmyal ba dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_dud 'gro'i nang du skye bar mthong ngo /_/de nas bdag nyid de lta bur 'gyur ba mthong ba dang /_shin tu mi dga' ba skyes nas/_gnas 'di 
[\[65a.3\]]ni mi rtag pa/_mi brtan pa/_'gyur ba'i chos can yin te/_de lta bas na 'di nas bdag nyid 'chi bar 'gyur zhing /_lha mo 'di dag la yang bdag dbang bar mi 'gyur te/_kye ma chos thams cad ni 'bral ba dang /_'dus byas kyi chos rnams ni mi brtan la gnod pa dang 
[\[65a.4\]]bcas pas rtab rtab por 'dug pa yin te/_bdag cag ni phan tshun 'bral ba yin no snyam mo/_/de de ltar sems pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba dag gis lha'i 'jig rten la smras pa/_da khyed cag thugs dgyes par mdzod cig_/'dzam bu'i gling na da dung du chos dang ldan 
[\[65a.5\]]zhing chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i mi mar 'dzin pa/_phar 'dzin pa/_dge sbyong du 'dzin pa/_bram zer 'dzin pa dag yod pas lha'i phyogs ni 'phel lo/_/bdud kyi phyogs ni 'grib po/_/'jig rten na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar 
[\[65a.6\]]gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_bla na med pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba byung ste/_de chos 'chad pa/_thog mar dge ba/_bar du dge ba/_tha mar dge ba/_don bzang po/_tshig 'bru bzang po/_ma 'dres pa/_yongs su rdzogs pa/_yongs su dag pa/_
[\[65a.7\]]yongs su byang ba bde ba thams cad dang ldan pa/_zhi ba'i chos 'di lta ste/_'di ni gzugs/_gzugs 'di ni kun 'byung ba/_gzugs 'di ni 'gog pa/_gzugs 'di ni 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam yin no zhes 'chad do/_/de thos nas me long lta bu'i tshal de na 'khod pa 
[\[65b\]]
[\[65b.1\]]gang yin pa bdag nyid kyi las kyi 'bras bu'i rnam pa mthong ba des/_'jig rten skyong ba de dag la smras pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ba dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig 
[\[65b.2\]]rten mkhyen pa/_bla na med pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_de su zhig yin/_de nas 'jig rten skyong ba de dag gis slar smras pa/_'dzam bu'i gling du byung ba 'di ni sems can thams cad la chos ston pa yin no/_/de nas lha de 'jig rten skyong ba dag las de skad thos nas 
[\[65b.3\]]'dzam bu'i gling ga la ba der 'gro bar byed de/_lha de lha'i 'jig rten nas 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal gyis 'jigs skrag_/mi'i 'jig rten nas 'chi bas 'jigs skrag_/dud 'gro'i 'jig rten na/_gcig la gcig za bas 'jigs skrag_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi 'jig rten na bkres 
[\[65b.4\]]pa dang /_skom pa'i sdug bsngal gyis 'jigs skrag_/sems can dmyal ba dag na gnod pas 'jigs skrag ste/_de ltar 'gro ba lnga rnams na 'jigs pa lnga yod par mthong nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du song ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das mdzes pa/_gsal ba/_dbang 
[\[65b.5\]]po zhi ba/_thugs zhi ba/_dul ba dang zhi gnas mchog brnyes pa/_dul ba dang zhi gnas dam pa brnyes pa/_skyes bu glang po/_skyes bu cang mkhyen pa/_gser gyi phung po ltar gzi brjid 'bar ba/_nyi ma gnyis pa ltar 'od gsal ba/_ri rab ltar brtan pa/_mtsho ltar zab pa/_gser 
[\[65b.6\]]gyi ri bo lta bu shing ljon pa'i drung na bzhugs pa des rgyang ring po nas mthong ngo /_/lha'i yang lha rnams de lta bu de mthong nas dad pa skyes pa'i lha bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs te phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug ste/_lhas 
[\[65b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gang rtag pa brtan pa ther zug 'gyur ba ma mchis pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i gnas lta mchis lags sam/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha dag la 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i gtam de dag bstan to/_/de 
[\[66a\]]
[\[66a.1\]]nas lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das las gtam de dag thos nas ji lta ba bzhin sems la bzung ste/_de nas yang lha'i 'jig rten ga la ba der dong ngo /_/der dong nas kyang de nas yang lha'i bde ba rnam pa lnga dang ldan pa rnams ji srid du de'i 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong 
[\[66a.2\]]ba byas shing bsags pa zad par ma gyur pa de srid du dga' bar byed do/_/de phyis lha'i 'jig rten de nas 'chi bar 'gyur te/_shi nas kyang las nye bar 'gro ba ji lta ba bzhin sems can dmyal ba dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_dud 'gro rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te mi 
[\[66a.3\]]rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mi rnams kyi nang du skyes na/_las de dang rgyu 'thun par de kho na nyid mthong bar mi 'gyur la/_de rtag tu mdza' bshes dang /_gnyen 'dab dang /_rtsa lag shin tu mi phyed pa dang ldan zhing nor bzang po dang ldan par 'gyur ba mthong ngo /_/de nas yang dge 
[\[66a.4\]]slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de/_lha phreng thogs kyi gnas la rtog par byed de/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas lha'i 'jig rten na 'dod pa la chags pa zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo /_/der sems can gang dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur 
[\[66a.5\]]snyam nas/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/_gang gis chos mnyan par byas na lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten yul la chags pa zhes bya ba'i gnas kyi pha rol na 'dod pa la chags pa zhes bya ba gnas pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[66a.6\]]der skyes nas kyang des legs par byas pa'i las kyi 'bras bu 'byung ba ni 'di lta ste/_dngul gyi khang pa na 'dug pa ltar rin po che sna bdun gyi gzhal med khang yangs pa gser gyi stegs bu can lha'i bya rnams kyis yongs su bskor ba dag 'byung ste/_'di lta ste/_bya yid du 
[\[66a.7\]]'thad pa dang /_sgra kun 'byin pa dang /_chu na rgyu ba dang /_gser lta bu dag ste/_bya de lta bu dag gis kun tu gang ba yin no/_/sa phyogs de na chu bo dang /_'bab chu dang /_lteng ka dang /_nye ba'i tshal dang yang ldan pa yin no/_/phyogs de na bya'i rnam pa 'bum snyed kyis kyang 
[\[66b\]]
[\[66b.1\]]kun tu gang ba yin te/_de na lha rnams 'dod pa'i yon tan bzhi dang /_kha cig 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga 'byor cing ldan par gyur pa rnams kyis dga' bar byed do/_/lha'i mig gis gzugs gang dang gang mthong ba de dang de dag 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba mthong ngo /_/rna bas sgra 
[\[66b.2\]]gang dang gang thos pa de dag kyang 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba thos so/_/snas dri gang dang gang bsnams pa de dang de dag kun kyang 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba la snom mo/_/lces ro gang dang gang myong bar byed pa de dang de dag kyang 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba myong ngo /_/lus 
[\[66b.3\]]kyis gang dang gang la reg pa de dang de dag kyang 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba la reg par byed do/_/yid kyis gang dang gang la sems pa de dang de dag kyang 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba la sems shing 'grub par gyur te/_'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la sems chags pa de shin tu bde 
[\[66b.4\]]ba dang ldan par gnas so/_/'dod pa la chags pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas ni gzhan dang mi 'dra bar lha'i gnas dang ldan te/_bde ba dag myong ba na ji srid du de'i 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba/_bde bar byas pa shin tu nyams dga' ba/_'jig rten 'di dang 'jig rten pha rol la 
[\[66b.5\]]phan pa/_tshul khrims kyi las byas pa ma zad kyi bar du de de na bde ba myong ngo /_/de phyis 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba'i gnas de nas 'chi bar 'gyur te/_shi nas kyang las nye bar 'gro ba ji lta ba bzhin sems can dmyal ba dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_dud 'gro'i nang du skye 
[\[66b.6\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyis mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mi'i nang du skyes na de las de dang rgyu 'thun par yul chen po shin tu 'byor pa dang ldan pa dag tu skye bar 'gyur te/_'di lta ste/_ka shi ka dang /_ko sa la dag tu rgyal 
[\[66b.7\]]rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu dang /_bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bur skye bar 'gyur ba mthong ngo /_/de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de/_lha'i 'jig rten la rtog par byed de/_legs par byas pa'i las kyi mtha' spyad pa gang gis phreng 
[\[67a\]]
[\[67a.1\]]thogs kyi gnas yid g.yo ba'i lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur snyam nas/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na tshul khrims dang ldan par gyur pa sems pa yod pa yid gsal bas zhing bzang po mngon par shes pa gus shing sems dang ba gang 
[\[67a.2\]]gis sangs rgyas sam/_mchod rten nam/_dge 'dun gyi gnas phyag dar legs par byas na/_de lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten yid g.yo ba'i lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/der skyes nas kyang de'i lus sha dang /_rus pa dang /_chu ser dang bral ba 
[\[67a.3\]]las dri bsung dpag tshad brgyar 'byung la/_ji ltar me long shin tu g.ya' med pa'i nang du thams cad snang ba de ltar lha'i lus de la lha'i ris de na nye bar gnas pa gang yin pa thams cad snang ste/_de ltar legs par byas pa'i las kyi 'bras bu la nye bar spyod do/_/gnas de 
[\[67a.4\]]dag na lha'i tshal bzhi yod de/_'di lta ste/_skyon med pa'i tshal dang /_gsal ba'i tshal dang /_dri zhim pa'i tshal dang /_me tog man dA ra ba'i tshal te/_mang po de dag na sdong bu ni bai DUr+ya/_ze ba ni dngul las byas pa'i pad ma'i rdzing yod la/_bya ngang pa dang /_kA raN+Da pa dang /_
[\[67a.5\]]ngur pa sgra 'byin pas gang ba/_me tog mdog dang dri sna tshogs dang ldan pa rnams kyis khebs pa 'dam rdzab kyi skyon dang bral ba/_chu rnyog pa dang bral ba/_nya lcibs dang bral ba/_chu rtag tu dri zhim pas gang ba yin no/_/tshal de dag na dus tshigs rab tu dga' bar byed pa drug 
[\[67a.6\]]yod la/_bya dag bya mo dang lhan cig 'khod pa yang snang ste/_rdzing du dong nas dga' bar byed cing rang gis byas pa'i las la spyod do/_/shing ljon pa de dag kyang dus tshigs thams cad du rtag tu me tog gis rgyas la rnyis pa'i skyon dang bral ba phan tshun 'gran pa ltar dus thams 
[\[67a.7\]]cad du me tog rgyas so/_/de ltar legs par byas pa'i las kyi mtha' spyad pa de/_tshal dang nye ba'i tshal de rnams su lha mo yid du 'ong ba rgyan dang cha byad dang /_spud pa sna tshogs thogs pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor nas 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba'i bde ba dag myong bar 
[\[67b\]]
[\[67b.1\]]byed do/_/sred pa'i yul la rnam par chags shing dga' ba/_yul drug la blo shin tu chags pa de/_chu'i nang na nya rgya'i gseb tu nya chud de nya rgyas bsdus pa ltar bde bas nam [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]kyang skyo bar mi byed de/_de ji srid du de'i 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba'i las ma zad 
[\[67b.2\]]pa de srid du de na lha'i bde ba rnam pa du ma la spyod do/_/de phyis lha'i 'jig rten de nas 'chi bar 'gyur te/_shi nas kyang las nye bar 'gro ba ji lta ba bzhin sems can dmyal ba dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_dud 'gro'i nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te lan grangs gzhan la 
[\[67b.3\]]myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyis mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mi'i nang du skyes na/_de rang gi las dang rgyu 'thun par ded dpon chen por gyur te/_shin tu 'byor pa dang ldan pa dang rgyal pos kyang bkur bar 'gyur ba mthong ngo /_/de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa 
[\[67b.4\]]shes pa de/_lha phreng thogs kyi gnas la rtog par byed de/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas lha phreng thogs rnams kyi gnas gang na lha 'khod pa tshal dang nye ba'i tshal na gnas pa zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo /_/de dag las gang gis der skye bar 'gyur snyam nas/_
[\[67b.5\]]des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/_tshul khrims dang ldan par gyur pa/_sems dang ba/_dge 'dun la zhing du shes pa gang gis chos gos bya ba'i phyir se 'bru gcig phul la/_phul nas kyang yang dang yang du sems kyis yongs su spel bar byed/_rjes su 
[\[67b.6\]]dga' bar byed/_bdag nyid la bdag nyid rab tu dga' bar byed na/_de lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten tshal dang nye ba'i tshal gyi nang na gnas pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/der skyes nas de lha'i tshal dang nye ba'i tshal na ni gnas/_bdag nyid 
[\[67b.7\]]gar dga' dgur ni 'chag cing 'gro/_chu la yang mi nub par 'gro ste/_'di lta ste/_thang la 'gro ba bzhin du 'gro la/_de bzhin du bar snang la yang thogs pa med par 'gro'o/_/de ji skad bstan pa'i gnas rnams su lha'i phreng ba dang /_gos ni gyon/_shin tu bde ba dang ni 
[\[68a\]]
[\[68a.1\]]ldan/_rang dga' nyams bag tu gnas shing dga' bar ni byed/_tshal dang nye ba'i tshal dang /_'bab chu dang /_lteng ka nyams dga' zhing shin tu dri zhim pa sna tshogs kyi nang na lha mo'i tshogs kyis ni yongs su bskor/_nyi ma gnyis pa ltar rang gi gzi brjid 
[\[68a.2\]]kyis 'bar zhing lha'i bde ba rang gis byas pa'i rgyu las byung ba/_rgyu'i stobs dang 'brel pa la nye bar spyod par byed de/_gzhan gyis byas la gzhan spyod pa ni med do/_/rang gis byas pa'i las kyi 'bras bu la spyod pa/_las kyis nges par 'byung ba'i srog chags rnams legs 
[\[68a.3\]]par byas pas ni lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur la nyes par byas pas ni/_sems can dmyal ba dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_dud 'gro rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/legs par byas pa'i las kyis der skyes pa de ji srid du legs par byas pa'i las zad par ma 
[\[68a.4\]]gyur pa de srid du de na bde ba la spyod par byed do/_/de phyis de nas 'chi bar 'gyur te/_shi nas kyang las nye bar 'gro ba ji lta ba bzhin sems can dmyal ba dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_dud 'gro'i nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las 
[\[68a.5\]]kyis mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mi'i nang du skyes na/_de las de dang rgyu 'thun par skye bo tshal na gnas pa rnams kyi nang na 'byor pa dang ldan zhing gzhan gyis gnod pa med la rang dgar longs spyod par 'gyur ba mthong ngo /_/de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par 
[\[68a.6\]]smin pa shes pa de/_lha phreng thogs rnams kyi gnas bcu ma lus par brtags nas/_lha gzhan lag na yol go thogs zhes bya ba dag la rtog par byed do/_/lha de rnams kyi gnas gang na gnas pa rang dga' zhing rang gi yid dang 'thun par 'dod pa ji tsam yod snyam nas/_des 
[\[68a.7\]]thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/_'di ltar lha lag na yol go thogs pa rnams kyi gnas kyang bcu yod de/_'di lta ste/_pad ma'i nang na rgyu ba dang /_bung ba'i sgra snyan pa dang /_sgra la chags pa dang /_dris dregs dga' dang /_rlung la spyod pa dang /_me tog 
[\[68b\]]
[\[68b.1\]]phreng dga' dang /_kun tu lta ba dang /_rtag tu dga' ba dang /_dri la chags pa dang /_spyi gtsug thar te/_lha lag na yol go thogs pa rnams kyi gnas ni bcu po 'di dag yin no/_/sa de rnams na lha dag las so sor byas pa gang gis lha'i 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur snyam nas 
[\[68b.2\]]des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/_tshul khrims dang ldan par gyur cing legs par byas pa'i las kyi mtha' spyad pa sems bsgoms pa'i yid dang ldan pa gang gis sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo zhes lan gsum brjod na/_de der mthar 
[\[68b.3\]]shin tu mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba'i las skyed pa yin te/_mi'i gnas skabs kyi rnam par smin pa gang yin pa de nam 'chi ba'i dus byas nas lus dang bral na bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten lha lag na yol go thogs pa rnams kyi gnas pad ma'i nang na rgyu ba zhes bya ba der skye 
[\[68b.4\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/der skyes nas kyang de'i gnas de ni yon tan lnga dang ldan pa'i ro shin tu zhim pa la chags pa'i mig mi 'dzums pa/_lus nyi ma ltar gsal ba/_lha'i 'dod pa dang sdug pa dang yid du 'ong ba la mngon par dga' ba/_bya chu skyar gyi mdog lta bu'i pad ma kun gyis 
[\[68b.5\]]mdzes par byas la/_pad ma de dag nams kyang zhum par mi 'gyur ba dang /_pad ma re re las kyang lha'i dri dpag tshad tsam du 'byung ste/_des lha'i dri de dag thams cad dang /_gzhan yang me tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyi dri rnams zil gyis gnon par byed pa dang /_bung ba kha dog sna tshogs 
[\[68b.6\]]can kha cig gser gyi bya lta bur 'dug la/_kha cig ma he'i mig gi mdog lta bu dang /_kha cig bai DUr+ya'i mdog lta bur 'dug pa dag sgra rnam pa sna tshogs 'byin te/_de'i khyad par ni mi rnams kyis legs par bslabs pa'i pi bang gi sgra 'byin pa na/_shin tu snyan cing lhag par 
[\[68b.7\]]dga' bar byed pa'i sgra kun du gang bar 'byung ba dag 'bum gyi char yang mi phod do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_lha'i 'dod pa la mi yis dper byar med pa'i phyir te/_mi gang gis kyang lha'i sgra mnyan par mi nus so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'khor los sgyur ba dang /_'dod chags dang 
[\[69a\]]
[\[69a.1\]]bral ba ma gtogs par de la mi'i 'jug pa'i yul ma yin no/_/'di ltar 'khor los sgyur ba ni stobs dang ldan la dbang po rnams kyang stobs dang ldan pas lha dang mi'i 'dod pa la spyod par nus so/_/'di ltar 'dod chags dang bral ba ni de'i dbang po dga' bar 
[\[69a.2\]]'gyur ba yang med la g.yo ba yang med de/_de ltar de na bung ba'i sgra 'byung ba dag des mnyan par nus so/_/dud 'gror gyur pa sems rmongs par gyur pa rnams kyi sgra yang de lta bu yin na/_'dod pa la sems chags pa'i lha'i tshogs rnams kyi glu dbyangs dang sgra lta smos kyang ci dgos te/_
[\[69a.3\]]dpe med pa yin la/_'di ltar sgra la chags par byed pa la yang skyo bar mi 'gyur zhing /_gzugs dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya rnams kyis kyang de dang mi 'thun par skyo bar mi byed do/_/de ltar de sgo du ma de dang /_sred pa'i sgo'i thabs du ma'i bde ba de dag la ji srid du de'i 'dod 
[\[69a.4\]]pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba'i las mtho ris su skyes pa zad par ma gyur pa de srid du spyod par byed do/_/de phyis de nas 'chi bar 'gyur te/_shi nas kyang gal te lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyis sems can dmyal ba dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_dud 'gro'i nang du ma skyes la/_mi rnams 
[\[69a.5\]]dang skal ba mnyam par mi'i nang du skyes na/_de las de dang rgyu 'thun par grong khyer du grong gi bdag po shin tu 'byor pa dang ldan pa'am tshong dpon du 'gyur la gzhan du yang rgyu dang rkyen de dang gzhi des mthar mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ba mthong ngo /_/de nas yang dge slong las kyi 
[\[69a.6\]]'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de/_lha lag na yol go thogs pa rnams kyi gnas la rtog par byed de/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas lha rnams kyi gnas bung ba sgra snyan zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo /_/der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas/_
[\[69a.7\]]des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na tshul khrims dang ldan zhing shes rab dang ldan pa sems pas bsgoms pa'i snying dang /_snying rjes brlan pa'i yid sems can la phan par zhugs pas mchod rten la rol mo'i sgra dang dris mchod na/_de lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris 
[\[69b\]]
[\[69b.1\]]kyi 'jig rten lha lag na yol go thogs pa rnams kyi gnas bung ba'i sgra snyan du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/der skyes nas kyang rang gi las kyi 'bras bu la gnas pa de sil snyan dang /_glu dbyangs dang /_bro gar dang /_dgod pa dang /_'jo ba dang /_nyams dga' ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyi bde 
[\[69b.2\]]ba la spyod pa pad ma'i dris myos pa'i lha mo glu dbyangs thos na yid 'phrog par byed pa'i dbyangs la ni nyan/_bde bar gnas pa'i kun dga' ra ba na nye bar spyod pa'i lha mo'i tshogs du ma dag ni dbyangs kyi sgra 'byin/_me tog rnam pa sna tshogs 'dres pa'i dri'i ngad kyis ni lus la reg cing 
[\[69b.3\]]rin po che du mas mdzes par byas pa'i ri rab kyi rtse mo rnams la sdug pa thos na shin tu dga' bar byed pa rnams dang lhan cig rnam par rgyu zhing gnas la dga' bar byed do/_/de ltar legs par byas pa'i las kyi 'bras bu la nye bar spyod pa mngon par mthong nas/_dge slong dge 
[\[69b.4\]]ba'i las la stod cing 'di ltar tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_las 'di dag ni lha yi yul/_/gsum gyi them pa'i skas su gyur/_/de la 'dzeg pa'i mi rnams ni/_/lha yul bde ba 'byung bar 'gro/_/ngag la rnam pa bzhi bsdams te/_/lus las byung ba rnam gsum mo/_/
[\[69b.5\]]them skas bdun la 'dzegs nas su/_/lha yul gsum du 'gro bar byed/_/tshul khrims spyod pa shin tu bde/_/nor spyod de ltar bde ba min/_/nor gyis mi ni 'grib byed la/_/tshul khrims kyis ni 'grib mi byed/_/des ni mi dag legs par byed/_/so so dag tu'ang de mdzes 
[\[69b.6\]]so/_/de bas mtho ris 'gro ba la/_/thub mchog rnams kyis dge bar bsngags/_/skyes bu dge ba spyod pa rnams/_/skyed mos tshal du 'gro ba bzhin/_/lha yi 'jig rten du mar de/_/bde ba rnams kyi 'byung khung mchog_/rang gi lus las byung ba yi/_/'od kyis de 
[\[69b.7\]]dag 'bar ba na/_/rang gi las kyis bskul ba rnams/_/mtho ris gnas na dga' bar byed/_/rtag tu dga' bar gnas pa dang /_/rtag tu bde bar gnas pa yi/_/lha gang yin pa lha yi gnas/_/de na tshul khrims byed rgyu yin/_/tshul ldan de yi tshul khrims ni/_/du ma'ang 
[\[70a\]]
[\[70a.1\]]legs par bsrungs pa yi/_/'bras bu mtho ris smin par 'gyur/_/de bas tshul khrims rtag tu spyod/_/tshul khrims mtho ris skas yin la/_/bde rgyu 'byung ba'i gnas yin no/_/tshul khrims spangs pa'i mi dag ni/_/gang du'ang bde ba mi 
[\[70a.2\]]'thob bo/_/tshul khrims chu ni dang ba dang /_/kun du rnam par gang ba yis/_/khrus byas mi dag lha yi gnas/_/lha yi 'jig rten 'gro bar 'gyur/_/lha yi phreng ba rgyan rnams dang /_/lha yi bde ba ldan pa gang /_/de kun dge ba'i rgyu las byung /_/lha yi gnas na dga' bar 
[\[70a.3\]]byed/_/gang zhig lha mos yongs bskor dang /_/gang zhig nyi zla 'dra ba rnams/_/de kun dge ba'i rgyu las byung /_/lha dag lha yi nang na dga'/_/gang zhig bsams na 'byung byed pa/_/byung nas kyang ni 'grib med cing /_/dge ba rtag tu 'phel 'gyur ba/_/de kun dge 
[\[70a.4\]]ba'i rgyu las byung /_/gang zhig tshul khrims rjes su 'jug_/bde ba dag ni grangs med la/_/thams cad du ni 'phel byed la/_/mi yis thams cad 'thob par 'gyur/_/rtag tu dge ba spyod pa'i mi/_/rgyal pos kyang ni rtag tu bkur/_/dge bas mi ni dge bar 'gyur/_/
[\[70a.5\]]de bas tshul khrims rtag tu spyod/_/dge ba spyod pa rtag tu dul/_/'byung po kun la snying brtse mchog_/rtag tu sbyin dang byams ldan pa/_/lha dag 'du ba'i gnas su 'gro/_/srog gcod pa las ldog pa dang /_/sems can kun la snying brtse mchog_/yang dag las kyi 
[\[70a.6\]]mtha' ldan pa/_/lha dag 'du ba'i gnas su 'gro/_/ma byin [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]len mi byed/_/sbyin la'ang de ni rtag tu dga'/_/blo ldan blo gros dbang po zhi/_/lha dag 'du ba'i gnas su 'gro/_/gang zhig log par g.yem dang bral/_/yang dag lam la rtag tu dga'/_/mya 
[\[70a.7\]]ngan 'das la som nyi med/_/lha rnams kyi ni nang du 'gro/_/gang zhig 'thungs na skyes bu dag_/yid la mi dga' mang byed pa/_/chang spangs shin tu brtan pa dag_/lha rnams kyi ni nang du 'gro/_/bde ba du ma skyed byed cing /_/thams cad dbugs ni 'byin byed pa/_/tshul 
[\[70b\]]
[\[70b.1\]]khrims legs par spyad bya zhing /_/nyes pa byas pa'ang rnam par spongs/_/de ltar dge slong des bde ba 'byung ba rnam pa du ma dag mngon par mthong nas bung ba sgra snyan gyi lha rnams la mngon par bstod do/_/de ltar lha de dag lha'i 'jig rten du gtogs pa'i bung ba mang po rnams kyis 
[\[70b.2\]]sgra snyan pa 'byin pa na/_ji srid du de'i 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba'i las byas shing bsags pa zad par ma gyur pa de srid du sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya khyad par du sdug pa dag myong bar byed do/_/de phyis lha'i 'jig rten de nas 'chi bar 'gyur te/_shi nas kyang 
[\[70b.3\]]gal te lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyis sems can dmyal ba dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_dud 'gro'i nang du ma skyes la/_mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mi'i nang du skyes na/_de las de dang rgyu 'thun par me tog gi phreng ba bzang po thogs shing rtag tu bde ba dang 
[\[70b.4\]]ldan pa dang /_gnod pa med par gnas pa dang /_yun ring du 'tsho ba dang /_longs spyod dang ldan par 'gyur ba mthong ngo /_/de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de lha lag na yol go thogs pa rnams kyi gnas la rtog par byed de/_des thos pa las byung 
[\[70b.5\]]ba'i shes pas lha lag na yol go thogs pa rnams kyi gnas sgra la chags pa zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo /_/der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/_tshul khrims dang ldan par gyur 
[\[70b.6\]]cing sems shin tu bsgoms pa gang gis sangs rgyas gzi byin dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa la gdugs phul na/_de lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten sgra la chags pa zhes bya ba'i lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/der skyes nas kyang lha'i bde ba dang ldan pa 
[\[70b.7\]]de gser dang /_dngul dang /_bai DUr+ya'i ri rnam pa sna tshogs la rgyu ba dag la bde ba rnam pa sna tshogs 'byung ste/_lha mo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba 'khor dang bcas pa dag rin po che sna bdun gyi ri'i rtse mo rnams su rgyu zhing rol mo'i tshal zhes bya ba'i tshal der 'jug 
[\[71a\]]
[\[71a.1\]]par byed do/_/lha'i phreng ba dang /_gos gyon pa me tog gi phreng ba dang /_phye ma dang /_byug pa dang lhan cig skyes pa'i dris rnam par brgyan pa de res 'ga' spos kyi tshal zhes bya ba shing ljon pa sna tshogs kyis mdzes par byas pa'i tshal du yang 'jug par byed do/_/tshal 
[\[71a.2\]]de na chu bo dang /_'bab chu dang /_lteng ka dang /_pad ma'i rdzing dang /_shing ljon pas mdzes par byas pa yin te/_rnam pa ji tsam du bya 'dab chags kyis mdzes par byas pa'i rnam pa de tsam du 'od gang gis sdug pa lta bur lha'i 'od stong dang /_'od kyi rnam pa gzhan yang sngon 
[\[71a.3\]]po dang /_ser po dang /_btsod ka'i mdog tu 'byung ste/_tshal de kha dog bzang po yin no/_/las kyi mtha' spyad pa la zhugs pa'i tshal de na me tog du mas bsgos pa dri shin tu zhim pa'i dri ngad dang po'i rdzi 'byung ste/_gang gi tshe rdzi des lo ma de dag la phog par gyur pa de'i tshe rdzis 
[\[71a.4\]]phog pa'i lo ma phan tshun reg pa las rol mo'i sgra 'byung ste/_de'i khyad par ni lha ma yin gyi gnas na spyod pa'i rol mo dag gis bcu drug gi char yang mi phod pa'i rnam pa de lta bu dag 'byung ngo /_/gang gi tshe lo ma re re la phog pa de'i tshe yang rol mo'i sgra shin tu chags su rung ba dag 
[\[71a.5\]]'byung ste/_de sil snyan yan lag lnga 'byor cing ldan par gyur la/_yul shin tu nyams dga' zhing yid du 'ong ba rnams kyis myos so/_/de nas yang lo ma'i rol mo'i sgra des sred pa la chags shing dga' ba bag med pa brgya snyed la gnas par byed do/_/sgra la chags pa/_
[\[71a.6\]]sgra la zhen pa/_sgras bslus pa de/_ji srid du de'i 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba'i las byas shing bsags pa zad par ma gyur pa de srid du/_sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya khyad par du sdug pa dag myong bar byed do/_/de phyis lha'i ris de nas 'chi bar 'gyur te/_shi nas 
[\[71a.7\]]kyang gal te lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyis sems can dmyal ba dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_dud 'gro'i nang du ma skyes la/_mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mi'i nang du skyes na/_de las de dang rgyu 'thun par rol mo la mngon par dga' bar 'gyur 
[\[71b\]]
[\[71b.1\]]zhing nor dang /_'bru dang /_khyim dang chung ma shin tu 'byor ba dang /_yun ring du 'tsho ba dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang du yang bkur bar 'gyur ba mthong ngo /_/de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de lha lag na yol go thogs pa rnams kyi gnas la rtog 
[\[71b.2\]]par byed de/_der lha dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur ming ni ci zhes bya snyam nas des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na lha'i 'jig rten na lha rnams kyi gnas dris dregs dga' zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo /_/der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 
[\[71b.3\]]'gyur snyam nas/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/_sems shin tu tshul khrims dang ldan pa/_sems yongs su bsgoms pa gang gis mchod rten gyi bum pa'am gdugs la dri chab phul na/_de lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten dris 
[\[71b.4\]]dregs dga'i lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/der skyes nas kyang lha'i bde ba dang ni ldan/_bde ba dpe med pa'i kha zas la ni rten/_lha'i bdud rtsi'i zas kyis ni tshim/_lus dang yid kyi gdung ba dang ni bral/_lha'i phreng ba dang /_gos gyon pa rtag tu sil snyan 
[\[71b.5\]]yan lag lngas rtsen cing /_dgod pa dang /_dga' ba dang /_rtse ba'i grogs dang ldan pa lha mo'i tshogs rnams ni glu dbyangs len/_nyin gcig gcig bzhin rgyun mi chad par ri sul las chu'i shugs 'bab pa ltar bde ba rnams ni 'phel/_nor bu mthon ka dang /_spug 
[\[71b.6\]]dang /_dngul gyi ri'i rtse mo rnams su dga' bar byed cing /_chu bo dang /_'bab chu dang /_lteng ka rnam pa sna tshogs ni mthong /_tshal gyi nang na gnas pa bya dang khu byug rnams kyang mthong ste/_lta ba du ma'i zi lang bar lta ba/_tshal dang nags tshal yid du 'ong ba 
[\[71b.7\]]rnams su lta bar byed kyang /_sems tshim pa med pa dag lha'i 'jig rten de na gnas so/_/chu bo dang /_'bab chu dang /_lteng ka dang /_tshal dang nye ba'i tshal rnams na mtho ris kyi chu'i ro gang dang gang 'byung ba dag ni 'di ltar 'dzam bu'i gling na legs par byas pa'i 
[\[72a\]]
[\[72a.1\]]las kyis dgun chang dang sbyar ba'i chang dang /_sha kha ra'i chang gi ro 'byung ba rnam pa de lta bur 'byung ngo /_/de ltar legs par byas pa'i las kyi mtha' spyad pa de/_lha'i 'jig rten de na ji srid du de'i legs par byas pa'i las zad par ma gyur pa de srid du lha mo'i 
[\[72a.2\]]tshogs du mas yongs su bskor ba dag dang dga' bar byed do/_/de phyis de nas 'chi bar 'gyur te shi nas kyang gal te lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyis sems can dmyal ba dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_dud 'gro'i nang du ma skyes la mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam 
[\[72a.3\]]par mi'i nang du skyes na/_de las de dang rgyu 'thun par bran khyim bdog cing nor dang 'bru mang po kun nas gang bar 'gyur bar mthong ngo /_/de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de/_lha lag na yol go thogs pa rnams kyi gnas la rtog par byed de/_
[\[72a.4\]]des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas lha lag na yol go thogs pa rnams kyi gnas rlung gi rgyu zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo /_/der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/_tshul khrims dang ldan 
[\[72a.5\]]par gyur cing /_sems yongs su bsgoms pa'i snying dang ldan pa gang gis tsha bas gdungs pa'i dge slong rnams la rlung yab kyis rlung g.yabs te/_gang gis rlung 'byung ba reg na bde ba ku shi ra'i dri dang 'dres pas dge slong shin tu tsha bas gdungs pa de rnams rlung des 
[\[72a.6\]]bsam gtan dang /_kha ton 'don pa dang 'jug par bya ba dag byed par nus na/_sbyin bdag de las byas pa'i rkyen des lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten rlung la spyod pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/der skyes nas kyang legs par byas pa'i 
[\[72a.7\]]las kyi mtha' spyad pa de la rlung dri zhim pa dpe med pa ldang ngo /_/gang rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams kyi rlung dpe med pa ldang ba 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi/_lha'i ris gzhan nas rlung langs pa'i dri 'bum 'gyur du zhim la/_shin tu bsil bar yang ldang ste/_rnam par smin pa 
[\[72b\]]
[\[72b.1\]]bzang po gcig dang /_gnyis dang /_gsum dang /_bzhi dang /_lnga 'gyur du 'byung ngo /_/der rgyal chen bzhi pa rnams kyi rlung ni nyis 'gyur du 'byung ngo /_/rgyal chen bzhi pa rnams las lhag par sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams kyi sum 'gyur du 'byung ngo /_/sum cu 
[\[72b.2\]]rtsa gsum pa rnams las lhag par 'thab bral ba rnams kyi bzhi 'gyur du 'byung ngo /_/'thab bral ba rnams las lhag par dga' ldan pa rnams kyi lnga 'gyur du 'byung ngo /_/dga' ldan pa rnams las lhag par 'phrul dga' ba rnams kyi drug 'gyur du 'byung 
[\[72b.3\]]ngo /_/de dag pas kyang lhag par gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams kyi yang 'byung ste/_de ltar sems can rnams kyi las kyi bye brag las 'gro ba'i ris kyi bye brag tu 'gyur ro/_/las byas pa de dag mngon par mthong nas/_legs par byas pa'i las des rlung 
[\[72b.4\]]la spyod pa'i lha de rnams la/_lha'i ris drug na rlung langs pa dpe med pa dri zhim pa bde ba gang yin pa de dag ldang ngo /_/rlung de dag gi mthu gcig cig bshad par bya ste/_'di ltar de'i mthu thams cad ni bshad par mi nus so/_/lha de rnams kyi rlung dga' dgur byed 
[\[72b.5\]]pa ldang ste/_de ni gang gi tshe rol mo'i sgra 'byung bar 'dod na de'i tshe rlung de ri dang nags tshal gyi gseb tu song nas ji ltar de lha mos rol mo byas pa [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]kyang snyan par mi 'gyur ba de lta bur ldang ngo /_/gal te shin tu dri zhim par 'dod na de gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi 
[\[72b.6\]]lha'i ris man chad kyi mdog dpe med pa dang ldan pa dag las langs nas lha de rnams kyi drung du ldang bar byed do/_/gal te bsil ba 'dod na de ji ltar de dag gi lus la bzod pa rnam pa de lta bu'i bsil ba ldang ngo /_/gal te yul gzhan du 'gro bar 'dod dam/_de bzhin 
[\[72b.7\]]du bai DUr+ya'i ri rab kyi rtse mo lta bar 'dod dam/_de bzhin du dngul gyi'am/_de bzhin du 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser gyi'am/_de bzhin du shel gyi'am/_de bzhin du me tog dang /_'bras bu dang /_chu bo dang /_'bab chu dang /_lteng ka dang /_tshal dang /_nye ba'i tshal bya 
[\[73a\]]
[\[73a.1\]]dang me tog nyams dga' ba'i yul sna tshogs lta bar 'dod pa dang /_lha mo sna tshogs kyis yongs su bskor te 'gro bar 'dod pa'i lha rnams la rlung sgra dang /_dri dang /_bde ba rnam pa du ma dang ldan pa de dag ldang bar byed do/_/tshal dang nye ba'i tshal dang /_dka' 
[\[73a.2\]]thub kyi tshal dang /_ri khrod rnam pa sna tshogs su snga ma bzhin khyer bar yang byed de/_de ltar rlung 'ong ba dang 'gro ba dag 'dod pa lnga la dga' ba'i lha rnams dang lhan cig dga' bar byed/_rtse bar byed/_yongs su spyod par byed do/_/phrag dog dang 'thab mo dag gis skyo 
[\[73a.3\]]ba med pa/_phan tshun grogs su gyur pa/_phan tshun gnod pa med pa rnams yid gcugs shing gnas de dag la yid zhugs pa/_rang gi las kyis bsgyur ba rnams dga' bar byed do/_/lha'i 'jig rten na lha rang gi las tha ma dang 'bring dang bzang po rnams kyis rgya'i 
[\[73a.4\]]'bur lta bur las kyi 'bras bu 'byung ba ni/_ji ltar rlung phrag dog dang ser sna dang bral ba'i shugs 'byung la/_shugs zad nas sa la 'bab pa de ltar ji srid du las kyi rnam pa tha ma dang /_'bring dang /_bzang po legs par byas pa'i rnam pa de srid du 'byung ba'i shugs 
[\[73a.5\]]spyad la/_de nas yang legs par byas pa'i las zad nas lha'i 'jig rten de nas 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/sems can rnams ni las kyi skye gnas las skye zhing las la rton pa yin la/_ji ltar las byas pa de ltar 'gro bar 'gyur te/_sems can rnams kyi skye ba ni rgyu med 
[\[73a.6\]]pa las byung ba ma yin no/_/dge slong des las de dag mthong nas 'di ltar tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_ji ltar nyi ma'i rjes su dus 'gyur zhing /_/ji ltar dus kyi rjes su zhing rnams skye/_/de ltar las kyi rjes su skye ba 'byung /_/rgyu med pa las skye ba 'byung mi 'gyur/_/
[\[73a.7\]]gang gis lus can bcings pa rnams/_/tshe rabs gzhan ni stong dag tu/_/rnam par chags pa mang po'i las/_/rnam gsum lu gu rgyud kyis bcings/_/ji ltar sbrang rtsi dug dang zas/_/'dres pa yongs su spong bar byed/_/de ltar lha yi bder gtogs pa/_/
[\[73b\]]
[\[73b.1\]]mthar ni ltung ba rnam par spongs/_/gang zhig sdug bsngal 'chi ba na/_/bsod nams zad de dman pa ni/_/rang gi chung ma rnams kyis spangs/_/de 'dra ba ni dpe med do/_/legs byas zad de dman pa ni/_/sgron ma 'bar ba zad pa ltar/_/lha khyod gang du 'gro 
[\[73b.2\]]'gyur zhes/_/sdug bsngal chen po rab tu skyed/_/sred pa'i dug gis rnam bsregs shing /_/mya ngan gyis ni sems nyams te/_lus dang ngag gi spyod dman pa/_/lha ni ltung ba dag gis 'jigs/_/'dod rnams shin tu slu byed de/_/ji lta ji ltar bde myangs 
[\[73b.3\]]pa/_/de lta de ltar yongs su gtong /_/de dag sdug bsngal rab tu che/_/lha yi yul nas ltung ba na/_/sdug bsngal rab tu skye ba gang /_/de yi khyad par sems can dmyal/_/bcu drug char yang mi phod do/_/sred pas 'khor ba kun byas pa/_/'bar 
[\[73b.4\]]ba'i phreng ba rnams kyis dkrugs/_/srid pa'i sgrog gis bcings pa yi/_/sems can rnams ni ngan 'gror 'gro/_/lha yi 'jig rten 'chi ba'i mtha'/_/de bzhin sa steng 'chi ba'i mtha'/_/'khor ba las ni mi 'byung bas/_/sdug bsngal mthong nas rnam 
[\[73b.5\]]par spongs/_/skye bo bag med dga' ba gang /_/de ni thar pa mi 'thob ste/_/bag med dug gis rmongs pa ni/_/de la mya ngan 'das pa ring /_/bag med dgra yi mchog yin pas/_/bag med rnams la chags ma byed/_/shin tu bag med lha rnams ni/_/yang 
[\[73b.6\]]dang yang du dmyal bar ltung /_/gnas gsum 'khrul 'khor 'khor ba ltar/_/'khrul 'khor las kyis 'khyam par byed/_/de bas sred pa'i chags pa spongs/_/'dod chags bral ba zhi ba'i gnas/_/de ltar dge slong des lha'i 'jig rten gyi mtha' ltung bar 
[\[73b.7\]]mthong nas 'dod pa la 'dod chags dang bral lo/_/rlung la spyod pa'i lha de rnams kyi mi rtag pa dang /_bde ba de dag la las kyi rgyus bskyed cing mi rtag pa nyid dang 'brel ba yin pa lta zhes rnam par dpyod par byed do/_/lha de rnams kyang ji srid du de'i legs par byas 
[\[74a\]]
[\[74a.1\]]pa'i las zad par ma gyur pa de srid du de na dga' bar byed do/_/de phyis de nas 'chi bar 'gyur te/_ji ltar dus ji srid du legs par byas pa'i las yod pa dang 'od gsal ba 'byung ba'i dus de srid du lha rnams lha'i 'jig rten na spyod do/_/de zad nas lhung 
[\[74a.2\]]bar 'gyur la/_/lhung nas kyang yang sems can dmyal ba dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_dud 'gro'i nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mi'i nang du skyes na/_de las de dang rgyu 'thun par rlung gis bdas nas/_'gro ba rgya mtshor spyod cing 'tsho 
[\[74a.3\]]ba'i ded dpon du 'gyur ba mthong ngo //_//'phags pa dam pa'i chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa/_bam po nyer bdun pa/_de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de lha lag na yol go thogs pa rnams kyi gnas la rtog par byed de/_des thos 
[\[74a.4\]]pa las byung ba'i shes pas lha lag na yol go thogs pa rnams kyi gnas me tog phreng dga' zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo /_/der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/_tshul khrims dang ldan par 
[\[74a.5\]]gyur cing lus dang ngag gi las kyi mtha' yang dag pa sems pas yongs su bsgoms pa'i sems dang ldan pa gang gis tsha ba'i dus su dge 'dun la chu ril ba gang phul ba'am/_lam du zhugs pa'am/_'brog dgon par zhugs pa dag la yang chu ril ba gang byin na/_
[\[74a.6\]]de lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten me tog phreng dga' ba'i lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/der skyes nas kyang de'i lus bde ba dang sgeg pa sna tshogs su ni spyod/_lha mo'i sil snyan gyi sgra 'byin cing dgon pa sna tshogs kyi nang du ni zhugs/_bai DUr+ya 
[\[74a.7\]]dang /_gser dang /_dngul gyi ri rab kyi gshong na rtsen pa dag dang lhan cig ni gnas/_ri khrod rnam pa sna tshogs na lha mo dang ni lhan cig 'khod/_rlung dri zhim pos reg pa'i lus me tog phreng ba thogs pa/_'bab chu dang /_lteng kas brgyan pa'i yul rnams na dga' 
[\[74b\]]
[\[74b.1\]]bar byed cing lha mo mang po'i nang na spyod pa na lo 'bum phrag du ma song ngo /_/de ltar gnas pa de res 'ga' tshal 'bab chu zhes bya ba na gnas te tshal de na dga' bar byed do/_/tshal de ni bai DUr+ya'i shing ljon pa la gser gyi 'dab ma yod pa dang /_gser gyi shing la 
[\[74b.2\]]bai DUr+ya'i 'dab ma yod pa dang /_dngul gyi shing la gser gyi 'dab ma dag yod de/_tshal de'i nang du zhugs pa de rtag par yid rab tu dga' la/_lus rang gi 'od dang ldan pa yin no/_/de'i legs par byas pa'i las des shing de dag brtol ba las mtho ris dang 'thun 
[\[74b.3\]]pa'i skom 'byung ste/_skom de'i khyad par ni mi'i rgun chang dang sbyar ba'i chang dang /_sha kha ra'i chang dag 'bras bu pi tsu man da'i ro dang mtshungs te/_skom de ni lha'i ro dang mdog dang stobs dang ldan pa yin no/_/de'i dri dpag tshad du yang 'byung ste bya'i tshogs lus 
[\[74b.4\]]gser dang dngul gyi mdog lta bu yid rab tu dga' ba kun gyis skom de 'thungs nas tshal de na sgra yid du 'ong ba 'byin cing kun du 'gengs so/_/shing de dag gi sdong po brtol nas skom 'byung ba de la bung ba'i tshogs 'ub 'ub 'du ste/_skom kha cig gi mdog ni gser lta bu 
[\[74b.5\]]yin/_kha cig gi mdog ni bai DUr+ya lta bu yin/_kha cig gi mdog ni spug lta bu yin/_kha cig gi mdog ni pad ma rA ga lta bu yin/_kha cig gi mdog ni ma rgad lta bu yin te/_skom de dag kun nas byung nas brug pa chu bo ltar 'bab bo/_/skom gyi chu bo de'i ming 
[\[74b.6\]]yang mtha' med 'bab ces bya ste/_chu bo'i rgyar dpag tshad gnyis yod pa'i 'gram gnyi ga nyams dga' la/_'gram gnyi ga lha dang lha mo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing glu len la gser gyi pad mas khebs pa 'bab bo/_/de nas lha mo'i tshogs kyis 
[\[74b.7\]]'thungs pa dang yid rab tu dga' ste/_dgod par byed/_rtse bar byed/_phan tshun gser gyi pad ma'i sdong bu bai DUr+ya rnams kyis sgeg par byed/_rtse bar byed/_dgod par byed do/_/shing rta sna tshogs la zhon pa rnams rgyug par byed cing dgod par byed la/_lha'i chu yan 
[\[75a\]]
[\[75a.1\]]lag brgyad dang ldan pas phan tshun 'thor bar byed do/_/lha de rnams kyi pad ma'i rdzing yod pa de ni kun nas bsten pa zhes bya la gzhan dang mi 'dra ba dpe med pa yin te/_legs par byas pa'i las kyis bsgyur ba'i lha de rnams ji srid du de'i 'dod pa sdug 
[\[75a.2\]]pa yid du 'ong ba'i las zad par ma gyur pa de srid du gnas so/_/de phyis lha'i 'jig rten de nas 'chi bar 'gyur te/_shi nas kyang gal te lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyis sems can dmyal ba dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_dud 'gro'i nang du ma skyes la/_
[\[75a.3\]]mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mi'i nang du skyes na/_de las de dang rgyu 'thun par bkres pa dang skom pa yong ye med cing 'byor pa dang ldan pa'i yul du skye la/_nor dang shin tu ldan pa dang skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ba mthong ngo /_/de nas yang dge slong las kyi 
[\[75a.4\]]'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de/_lha lag na yol go thogs pa rnams kyi gnas la rtog par byed de/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na lha lag na yol go thogs pa rnams kyi gnas kun tu lta ba zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo /_/der sems 
[\[75a.5\]]can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/_tshul khrims dang ldan par gyur cing legs par byas pa'i las kyi mtha' spyad par gyur pa/_sems pas yongs su bsgoms pa'i snying gis brlan pa/_
[\[75a.6\]]skyo ba med cing shin tu dga' ba'i sems pa gang bdag la phan pa med kyang /_tshul khrims 'chal pa'i nad pa'i rim gro byed na de lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten kun tu lta ba'i lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/der skyes nas kyang lha'i phreng ba 
[\[75a.7\]]dang /_gos gyon pa rab tu dga' ste lha'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga 'byor pa'i bde ba dang ni ldan/_yid rtag tu dga' ba lha'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams dang ldan pa dag skyed mos tshal nas skyed mos tshal du ni rgyu/_dga' dgur gnas pa grogs sdug gu lha mo'i tshogs 
[\[75b\]]
[\[75b.1\]]du mas bskor cing yongs su spyod par ni byed/_nyi ma'i 'od ltar ni gsal/_dge ba ni rgya cher 'phel/_lha'i tshogs thams cad kyis ni mchod/_ri rab rin po che du ma'i 'od kyis gsal bar byas shing rab tu 'bar ba dag la ni gnas/_gos tshon can rnam pa sna 
[\[75b.2\]]tshogs ni bgos/_mtho ris dang 'thun pa'i rin po che du ma dag gi rgyan gdags par bya ba ni btags/_tshal na rnam par rgyu ba'i lhas bsams pa'i tshal dkrigs pa sna tshogs dag na ni gnas/_pad ma'i rdzing dang /_lteng ka dang /_chu'i dngo dang /_'bab chu dang /_
[\[75b.3\]]chu bo dang /_'bab chu'i rgyun dang /_stegs sna tshogs dag la rnam par rgyu ba na/_rang gi las rnams las kyi bya ba byed do/_/de ltar de yongs su rgyu ba na/_phyogs gzhan zhig na tshal dril bu g.yer ka'i dra bas gtibs shing gser gyi lan kan bres pa zhig des 
[\[75b.4\]]mthong ste/_bya rnam pa sna tshogs gnas pa/_bya'i tshogs skad snyan cing 'jebs pa 'byin pa rnams kyis ni kun tu gang /_rlung gis phog nas rab tu g.yos pa'i dril bu g.yer ka'i sgra ni drag tu 'khrol/_nyi ma 'bum snyed kyi 'od dang ni ldan/_ri rab las byung ba gser 
[\[75b.5\]]gyi ri bdun la 'di lta ste/_shin tu mtho dang /_rab sbyor dang /_char dga' dang /_klus brtol dang /_rab chags gsal dang /_rin chen char 'bebs dang /_rgyu skar phreng gis yongs su bskor ba/_dril bu g.yer ka'i dra bas gtibs pa'i tshal der 'jug par 
[\[75b.6\]]byed do/_/rnam pa de lta bu'i tshal lha'i phreng ba la sogs pas rnam par brgyan pa de na/_lha mo tshal gyi gsab gseb na rgyu zhing rtse ba gang yin pa de dag 'od zer 'bum snyed 'byung ba ltar tshal de na snang ngo /_/shing ljon pa'i bar bar na 'khod pa'i lha de dag gis de 
[\[75b.7\]]rnams mthong nas/_de nas yang 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la blo rnam par chags pa dag blta ba'i phyir de'i drung du 'dong zhing shin tu rgyug par byed de/_gser gyi pad ma rnams kyis de dag dang rtse bar byed/_yongs su spyod par byed/_dgod par byed/_sgeg par byed la/_
[\[76a\]]
[\[76a.1\]]rol mo'i sgra rnams kyis kyang shin tu dga' bar byed do/_/de ltar 'dod pa la blo rnam par chags pa de mig lha'i gzugs yid du 'ong ba rnams kyis chog mi shes so/_/rna ba sgra snyan pa gsal ba yid du 'ong ba rnams kyis chog mi shes so/_/
[\[76a.2\]]sna dri zhim pa bsung che ba yid du 'ong ba rnams kyis chog mi shes so/_/lce ro zhim pa bro ba mang la yid du 'ong ba rnams kyis chog mi shes so/_/pags pa reg bya bde ba 'jam pa yang ba yid du 'ong ba rnams kyis chog mi shes te/_sred pa drug gi mes yongs su 
[\[76a.3\]]bskor ba de kun nas sreg par byed do/_/de ltar chog mi shes pa de dge slong des mngon par mthong nas 'di ltar tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_lha yi 'jig rten kun nas su/_/sred pa'i me yis yongs su bskor/_/rmongs pa 'dod pa'i dbang song ba/_/chags 
[\[76a.4\]]pa dbang med sred par byed/_/ji lta ji ltar shing rnyed na/_/de lta de ltar sreg pa 'phel/_/ji lta ji ltar bde thob na/_/de lta de ltar sred me 'phel/_/shing mes sreg pa'i nyes pa rnams/_/mi yis yongs su spang nus kyi/_/'jig rten sred mes 
[\[76a.5\]]sreg pa ni/_/yongs su spang bar mi nus so/_/chu bo chen po rgal 'dod la/_/chu srin gyis ni 'jigs pa gang /_/de dag bde ba'i mthar phyin na/_/sred pas de la gnod mi 'gyur/_/sred pa'i zhags las rnam grol zhing /_/'dod chags zhe sdang spong 
[\[76a.6\]]ba po/_/nyes sdig las ni grol ba gang /_/mkhas pa de ni mya ngan bral/_/gang zhig tshul khrims srung ba nyid/_/mtho ris de la yid zhugs na/_/de dag tshul khrims sdig dang bcas/_/zas dang dug ni 'dres pa bzhin/_/bskal pa bye ba stong rnams 
[\[76a.7\]]su/_/sred pas bslus pa'i mi rnams ni/_/shin tu rmongs pas de mi gtong /_/yid ni gti mug dbang du song /_/skom gyis gdungs pa'i khur tsa ba/_/lan tshwa'i chu ni 'thungs pa ltar/_/sred pas bslus pa'i sems can rnams/_/sred pa nyid kyi rjes 
[\[76b\]]
[\[76b.1\]]su 'brang /_/skye bo skad cig tshim byed la/_/skad cig gis ni skom byed pa/_/skyes bu tha ma sred pa yis/_/gdungs pa lam gol tshol ba bzhin/_/de bas sred pa bsten mi bya/_/sred pa de ni bsten par dka'/_/sred pa'i dbang du song ba'i mi/_/'khor 
[\[76b.2\]]ba las ni 'grol mi 'gyur/_/gang zhig bde ba bla na med/_/bsam gtan skyed mos tshal la dga'/_/mya ngan 'das pa'i grong ston pa/_/de dag bde ba de bzhin 'gyur/_/bde ba bla na med pa rnams/_/lha yul spyod pa'i skye bo dag_/sred pa'i zhags 
[\[76b.3\]]pas drangs nas su/_/yang dang yang du dmyal bar ltung /_/'chi mtha' dang por dge ba smin/_/yang dag lam ni ston mdzad pas/_/sred la rtag tu sten byed pa/_/'di yis sdug bsngal tsha zhes gsungs/_/de ltar dge slong des lha'i 'jig rten 'dod pa'i 
[\[76b.4\]]dba' rlabs kyis bdas shing 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal mngon par mthong nas 'khor ba la yid byung ngo /_/de ltar lha'i de ji srid du 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba byas shing bsags pa'i las de zad par ma gyur pa de srid du gnas kun tu lta ba dag la dga' bar byed 
[\[76b.5\]]do/_/de phyis lha'i 'jig rten de nas 'chi bar 'gyur te/_shi nas kyang gal te lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyis sems can dmyal ba dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_dud 'gro'i nang du ma skyes la/_mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mi'i nang du skyes 
[\[76b.6\]]na/_las de dang rgyu 'thun par bu dang /_chung ma dang /_bran pho dang /_bran mo dang /_las byed pa dang /_zho shas 'tsho ba dang /_rtag tu ldan zhing shin tu 'byor bar 'gyur ba mthong ngo /_/de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa des/_lha lag 
[\[76b.7\]]na yol go thogs pa rnams kyi gnas la rtog par byed de/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/_lha lag na yol go thogs pa rnams kyi gnas rtag tu dga' ba zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo /_/der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur 
[\[77a\]]
[\[77a.1\]]snyam nas/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/_tshul khrims dang ldan par gyur cing sems pa gsal ba'i snying dang ldan pa gang gis rgyal pos gsad par bya ba btson ra'i nang du bcug pa las nor rdzas thams cad phul nas/_
[\[77a.2\]]de thar bar byas sam/_de bzhin du rgyal po'i bu'am/_de dang 'thun pa dag la phul nas de thar bar byas la/_de las nor rdzas sna 'ga' yang len par mi byed de/_snying rjes brlan pa'i snying gis sems can rnams la phan pa kho na byed cing legs par byas na/_
[\[77a.3\]]de lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten rtag tu dga' ba'i lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/der skyes nas kyang lha de rnams ngo bo nyid kyis yid rab tu dga' ba yin la/_de dag pas kyang de brgya 'gyur du yid rab tu dga' bar 'gyur te/_las 
[\[77a.4\]]de dang rgyu 'thun par 'bras bu 'brel pas rgyu dang 'thun par 'bras bu 'byung ngo /_/lha'i 'jig rten der skyes pa de lha mo'i tshogs mang pos ni yongs su bskor/_glu dbyangs dang /_bro gar dang /_bzhad gad dang /_rtsed mo dang /_dga' dgur spyod pa'i lha mo rnams kyis 
[\[77a.5\]]ni mtha' 'khor te/_nye bar spyod cing ri rab dang /_ri dang /_ri phug dang /_ri khrod rnams su ni rgyu/_de bai DUr+ya'i rdo leb bzang po reg na shin tu bde ba rnams kyi steng na rang dgar ni spyod/_chu bo dang /_'bab chu dang /_lteng ka dang /_tshal dang /_nye ba'i tshal rnams 
[\[77a.6\]]su shin tu bde ba dang ldan pa dag dga' bar byed/_bde ba de'i khyad par ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i bde bas 'bum gyi char yang mi phod do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_ris 'thun pa de dang /_sha dang /_rus pa dang /_chu ser dang bral ba de'i phyir bde'o/_/lha'i rin po 
[\[77a.7\]]che'i phreng ba dang /_gos du ma gyon pa me tog brgyus pa dang /_bgo ba sna tshogs kyis lus brgyan pa de/_ri rab kyi drung dag na rgyu bar byed de/_gal te gser gyi ri zom la 'dzegs na gser de'i mthus de gser lta bur 'gyur ro/_/gal te bai DUr+ya'i ri zom 
[\[77b\]]
[\[77b.1\]]la 'dzegs na bai DUr+ya de'i mthus bai DUr+ya'i mdog lta bur 'gyur te/_bdag nyid mtsho'i nang du zhugs pa ltar gyur kyang 'dam rdzab kyis gos pa lta bur ni mi 'gyur ro/_/gal te shel gyi ri zom la 'dzegs na shel gyi 'od des de zla ba gnyis pa lta bur 'gyur ro/_/gal 
[\[77b.2\]]te dngul gyi ri zom la 'dzegs na dngul de'i mthus de'i yan lag dang nying lag thams cad kha ba dang me tog ku mu da ltar 'gyur te/_de ltar lha mo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba de/_sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i tshal dang /_nye ba'i tshal rnams su dga' 
[\[77b.3\]]bar byed/_yongs su spyod par byed cing /_lha'i bde ba dpe med pa dag myong bar byed do/_/de ltar de rnam par spyod pa na shing ljon pa du mas mdzes par byas pa/_lha'i nyams dga' bar byed pa'i tshal zhes bya ba zhig rgyang ring po nas mthong ba dang /_der lha de dag 
[\[77b.4\]]'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser gyi shing rta la zhon nas 'gro bar byed do/_/tshal de yang bya rnam pa sna tshogs sgra 'byin cing tshal gyi lcug ma gzhon nu 'phyang ba dag tu shing rtas phyin pa dang /_bya lha'i skad du rtse ba zhes bya ba lha rnams dang smra ba 'thun pa dag lha de'i dge ba'i las 
[\[77b.5\]]kyi mthus bskul ba dang /_'di ltar tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_dga' bar byed pa'i las rnams dag_/skyes bu gang zhig 'dir byed pa/_/de yi las kyi rnam smin ni/_/legs par yongs su smin par 'gyur/_/bde ba thob pa'i lha de dag_/bag med pa la ma bsten 
[\[77b.6\]]na/_/de ni bde las bde thob cing /_/mya ngan 'das pa'i rjes su 'gro/_/bde ba'i mtha' de zad 'gyur zhing /_/'di la rtag dang ther zug med/_/de thob gzhal med khang rnams la/_/skyes bu mchog rnams chags ma byed/_/bde mtha' rtag tu lhung 'gyur zhing /_/
[\[77b.7\]]bde la rtag pa nyid med de/_/rgyu de thams cad rig nas su/_/yid la nges par legs par byos/_/bsags pa thams cad tha mar zad/_/mtho ba'i mtha' ni tha mar rnyil/_/'du ba'i mtha' ni tha mar 'bral/_/'tsho ba'i mtha' ni tha mar 'chi/_/skyes pa rtag tu 
[\[78a\]]
[\[78a.1\]]'chi 'gyur zhing /_/de la rtag pa nyid med de/_/khams gsum dag tu sngon byung zhe'am/_/phyi nas 'byung ba nyid med do/_/ji ltar nyi ma 'char ba dang /_/nub par 'gyur ba rab tu mngon/_/de ltar skyes pa thams cad kyi/_/tha mar 'chi ba 
[\[78a.2\]]gnas pa yin/_/chos rnams kyi ni ngo bo nyid/_/skye dang 'jig pa 'di shes nas/_/bag med yid la ma byed cig_/bag med dug gi mchog yin no/_/bag yod 'chi med gnas yin la/_/bag med 'chi ba'i gnas yin no/_/bag yod 'chi bar mi 
[\[78a.3\]]'gyur la/_/bag med rnams ni rtag tu 'chi/_/ji ltar dug dang ji ltar me/_/srog chags bag med de bzhin te/_/bag med myos pa'i sems can rnams/_/sdug las sdug bsngal de 'gro'o/_/rtag tu bag yod mi rnams ni/_/'jig rten kun gyis phyag 
[\[78a.4\]]byas shing /_/gang na bag med mi gnas pa/_/zhi ba mchog tu 'gro bar byed/_/de kun mtha' ni zad 'gyur te/_/rmongs pa gang zhig mi rig pa/_/de ni phyi nas 'chi 'gyur te/_/ma byas don med gdung bar byed/_/rtag tu bdag nyid dga' 'dod na/_/'chi ba'i 
[\[78a.5\]]bar du dge ba byos/_/chos spyod bde ba yin no zhes/_/mkhas pa rnams kyis gdams pa yin/_/rgyu yi de nyid rnam ston pa/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyis 'khor ba kun/_/rtag tu mi rtag mi brtan la/_/'gyur zhing tsha bar rtag tu gsungs/_/de nas lha des bya de 
[\[78a.6\]]rnams kyi tshig thos nas/_yang dag par bsams te yid la yang dga' ba bskyed pa dang /_/sngon gyi tshe'i 'bras bu dran nas yud tsam zhig bag med pa la ma zhugs so/_/mos pa'i srab skyogs kyis yid de 'dzin par byed de/_gzugs dang /_sgra dang /_
[\[78a.7\]]dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya yid du 'ong ba rnams la bag med pa ma skyes so/_/de nas yang yid mi brtan pa de lha'i bde ba'i dbang du gyur te/_ji srid du 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba de ma zad kyi bar du/_de yul sdug pa de rnams la spyod par byed de/_de phyis lha yul de 
[\[78b\]]
[\[78b.1\]]nas 'chi bar 'gyur te/_shi nas kyang gal te lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyis sems can dmyal ba dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_dud 'gro'i nang du ma skyes la/_mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mi'i nang du skyes na/_de las de dang rgyu 'thun par 
[\[78b.2\]]nams kyang bcings par mi 'gyur zhing /_rtag tu bde ba dang ldan la nyam nga ba rnams las thar par 'gyur ba mthong ngo /_/de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de/_lha lag na yol go thogs pa rnams kyi gnas la rtog par byed de/_des 
[\[78b.3\]]thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/_lha lag na yol go thogs pa rnams kyi gnas dri la chags pa zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo /_/der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags 
[\[78b.4\]]na/_skyes bu tshul khrims dang ldan pa sems pas yongs su bsgoms pa'i snying dang yid shin tu dang ba/_sems rnyog pa med par gyur pa/_gzhan la gnod pa med pa gang gis sangs rgyas sam/_chos sam dge 'dun la zhing chen por shes nas/_gos 
[\[78b.5\]]shin tu dri zhim pa rnams kyis mchod pa byas la legs par byas so snyam du yang sems na/_de lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten dri la chags pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/der skyes nas kyang shin tu bde ba dang /_rang gi 'od dang 
[\[78b.6\]]ldan pa dang /_sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pas yid rab tu dga' zhing dga' dgur spyod pa de dus ring mo zhig 'das so/_/dus ring po 'das pa de yang yul gyi bde ba des lha de dag gis mi rig ste/_gang bdag gi dus 'di 'das so zhes dbang po dang bde ba 
[\[78b.7\]]mi brtan pa thog ma med pa'i dus nas zhugs pa'i yul rnams la chog mi shes pa rnams kyis mi rig go/_/de ltar snying la chags pa'i me tog gi phreng ba dang phye ma dang /_byug pas lus bskus pa de/_tshal gyi bar bar dag na rgyu bar byed la/_shing ljon pa mang 
[\[79a\]]
[\[79a.1\]]po'i 'od kyis brgyan pa/_chu bo dang /_stegs dang /_tshal dang /_skyed mos tshal dag gis brgyan pa'i yul nyams dga' ba'i tshal rnams la sten par byed pa/_'dod pa mang po la snying chags pa dag yul gyi bde ba des lha'i 'jig rten gyi mtha' 
[\[79a.2\]]'di ltung bar khong du mi chud do/_/de ltar yul gyi sred pas yongs su bslus pa de/_ji srid du 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba byas shing bsags pa'i las de zad par ma gyur pa de srid du lha'i 'jig rten de dag na dga' bar byed/_yongs su spyod par byed do/_/de phyis lha'i 
[\[79a.3\]]'jig rten de nas 'chi bar 'gyur te/_shi nas kyang gal te lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyis sems can dmyal ba dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_dud 'gro'i nang du ma skyes la/_mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mi'i nang du skyes na/_de las de dang rgyu 'thun 
[\[79a.4\]]par yul rtag tu bsil bar skye bar 'gyur te/_yul gnod pa med pa dang /_mtshon cha dang /_dgon pa dang /_lo nyes 'byung ba dang bral ba'i yul rnams su skye la/_skye bo kun gyis mchod par 'gyur ba mthong ngo /_/de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin 
[\[79a.5\]]pa shes pa de/_lha lag na yol go thogs pa rnams kyi gnas la rtog par byed de/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pa'am lha'i mig gis lha lag na yol go thogs pa rnams kyi gnas spyi gtsug thar ces bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo /_/der sems can dag las gang 
[\[79a.6\]]gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/_rgyal po la gnod pa byed pa'i mi spyi gtsug nas bzung ste spyangs pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba las gang gis de thar bar byas na/_de lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten spyi gtsug 
[\[79a.7\]]thar zhes bya ba'i lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/rgyal chen bzhi'i gnas gsum gyi nang na de'i nyams dga' ba/_shin tu yid du 'ong ba/_'dod pa la rten pa/_de'i ngo bo 'dod pa/_'dod pa nye bar mchod pa/_'dod pa rgyun chad pa med pa gang yin pa bsdus pa de dag 
[\[79b\]]
[\[79b.1\]]thams cad 'byung la/_bde ba'i gnas de na bde ba des mngon par 'dod pa/_ji srid du 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba byas shing bsags pa'i las de zad par ma gyur pa de srid du de na lha mo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba de sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan zhing yul 
[\[79b.2\]]gyi bde ba dang /_nyams bde ba des dga' bar byed do/_/de phyis lha'i 'jig rten de nas 'chi bar 'gyur te/_shi nas kyang gal te lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyis sems can dmyal ba dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_dud 'gro'i nang du ma skyes la/_mi 
[\[79b.3\]]rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mi'i nang du skyes na/_de las de dang rgyu 'thun par mya ngan dang /_'jigs pa dang /_gnod pa dang bral bar 'gyur la/_skyon med pa dang /_gzugs bzang ba dang /_skye bo thams cad dga' ba dang /_shin tu 'byor pa dang ldan pa dang /_dus dang 
[\[79b.4\]]'thun pa'i gzugs bzang ba dang /_tshe'i bar chad med par 'chi bar 'gyur ba mthong ngo /_/de nas yang dge slong de gnas bcu mthar chags su rtog par byed de/_lha lag na yol go thogs pa rnams kyi gnas de tsam du zad dam zhes rtog par byed do/_/des gnas bcu 
[\[79b.5\]]las gnas gzhan bcu gcig pa med de/_lha lag na yol go thogs pa rnams kyi gnas bcu ni de dag nyid yin par mthong ngo /_/des lha lag na yol go thogs pa rnams kyi gnas bcu ma lus par brtags nas/_rgyal chen bzhi'i nang na che ba gnas gsum pa rtag 
[\[79b.6\]]tu myos gnas zhes bya ba thams cad la rtog par byed de/_lha rtag tu myos gnas de dag gi gnas ji tsam zhig yod zhig gu snyam nas/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/_rtag tu myos gnas de dag gi gnas kyang bcu yod de/_'di lta ste/_lhag par 
[\[79b.7\]]dga' ba dang /_ud pa la'i mdog dang /_pad ma dkar spyod dang /_grong khyer dmar gnas dang /_sna tshogs dang /_mtho bar gnas dang /_rgun chang myos gnas dang /_yul la 'dod pa dang /_chu bsil gnas dang /_brtan dga' ste/_lha rtag tu myos gnas 
[\[80a\]]
[\[80a.1\]]rnams kyi gnas ni bcu po 'di dag yin no/_/sa gzhan gang zhig tu las gang gis gang du skye bar 'gyur snyam nas/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/_sems shin tu dang zhing rnying la rnyog pa med pa dang /_sems bzang po yang dag pa'i lta ba dang 
[\[80a.2\]]ldan pa gang gis shing ljon pa chen po gang la [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dag gnas pa'i shing ljon pa de/_gcod pa na yongs su skyob par byed la/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po de dag gnas dang bral bas 'tshe bar mi byed/_de'i mthus bde 
[\[80a.3\]]bar gnas na de lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi gnas/_lhag par dga' ba'i lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/der skyes nas kyang de gnas gzhan de na chu bsil ba zhes bya ba'i rdzing bu yangs pa gser gyi mdog dang ldan pa/_bya ngang pa dang /_kA raN+Da 
[\[80a.4\]]ba dang /_ngur pa lus gser gyi kha dog can sgra 'byin pa rnams kyis mdzes par byas pa/_rin po che sna bdun gyi pad ma rab tu mang po rnams kyis mdzes par byas pa yin no/_/pad ma'i rdzing chu bsil ba de dag na yang kun nas gser gyi tshal zhes bya ba yod de/_
[\[80a.5\]]pad ma'i rdzing de gser dang dngul gyi shing ljon pa rnams kyis kun nas dkrigs shing bskor nas skye'o/_/shing de rnams kyang pad ma'i rdzing gi chu de'i nang na/_de rnams kyi grib ma 'bab pa'i gzugs du ma gzugs brnyan lta bur snang la/_pad 
[\[80a.6\]]ma'i rdzing de yang chu'i nang du shing ljon pa'i grib ma de rnams kyi gzugs brnyan lta bur snang ngo /_/de yang pad ma dang /_me tog ud pal dang /_ku mu das mdzes par byas pa dag ni/_ji ltar brgya byin yang der rtse ba'i blo skye ba de ltar mdzes pa 
[\[80a.7\]]yin no/_/gang gi tshe lha dang lha ma yin g.yul 'gyed par 'babs pa na nyi ma shar ba'i mdog lta bu'i pad ma 'bum phrag du mas mdzes par byas pa de rnams mthong ste/_brtags nas lha rnams la smras pa/_kye ma 'di ltar chu bsil ba'i rdzing bu skyon med 
[\[80b\]]
[\[80b.1\]]pa 'di nyid shin tu nyams dga' ba yin no/_/de nas yon tan de lta bu dang ldan pa'i rdzing bu de rnams su yid rtag tu dga' zhing rdzing bu'i 'gram du yid rab tu mgu ba'i lha dang /_lha mo'i tshogs dang bcas pas sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan zhing bde ba dpe med pa dang 
[\[80b.2\]]ldan pa ci dga' dgur byed pa'i lha mo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_shin tu bde ba dang ldan pa/_kha zas dang /_gnas dang /_rang dgar za zhing 'khod pa rnams dga' bar byed/_yongs su spyod par byed do/_/de nas yang byung nas gal te gnas gzhan du 'gro bar 
[\[80b.3\]]'dod na/_lus dang sems gdung ba rnams dang bral ba/_sems shin tu dga' ba bde ba shin tu rgya che zhing 'dod pa dang ldan pa rnams lha dang lha mo'i tshogs dgod cing glu dbyangs len la/_bro gar byed pa dang ldan pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor cing rtag tu rtse ba na/_lha'i 
[\[80b.4\]]lus dang yid la bde ba gang dang gang dag 'dod pa de dang de dag nyon mongs pa med cing shin tu rgyas pa dang /_tshegs chung ngus 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/dbang po lnga yul lnga dag la spyod pa yang bde ba la gnas pa des tshim mi myong bar 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sred pa me lta 
[\[80b.5\]]bu dag la spyod pa de yul gang gis kyang tshim par mi 'gyur ro/_/de ltar ri dang skyed mos tshal dang /_chu bo dang /_gzhal med khang dang /_lteng ka dang /_chu dngo rnam pa sna tshogs dang /_rin po che sna tshogs dang /_rin po che sna bdun gyis mdzes par byas pa/_bya rnam pa sna 
[\[80b.6\]]tshogs sgra snyan pa 'byin cing 'don pa rnams su lha de grogs dang lhan cig bde ba du ma la gnas shing bai DUr+ya'i tshal gyi grib mas mdzes par byas pa dag na bya rnam pa sna tshogs sgra 'byin cing 'don pa'i tshal dang nye ba'i tshal rnams na dga' bar byed/_rtse bar byed/_mgu 
[\[80b.7\]]bar byed/_dga' dgur spyod par byed do/_/bai DUr+ya dang /_gser dang /_dngul dang /_byi ru'i ri rab kyi zom la rang dgar 'khod pa/_kha cig ni nyi ma ltar gzi che/_kha cig ni zla ba ltar mdangs gsal/_kha cig ni gzugs dpe med pa dang ldan te/_
[\[81a\]]
[\[81a.1\]]ji ltar legs par byas pa'i las de rnams kyis lus mngon par bsgrubs pa de ltar lha yul du yang rnam par mdzes pa yin no/_/rgyu rkyen dang 'thun par spyod pa de ji srid du 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba byas shing bsags pa'i las de zad par ma 
[\[81a.2\]]gyur pa de srid du lha'i 'jig rten de na sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pas dga' bar byed/_rtse bar byed/_dga' dgur spyod par byed do/_/de phyis lha'i 'jig rten de nas 'chi bar 'gyur te/_shi nas kyang gal te lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyis 
[\[81a.3\]]sems can dmyal ba dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_dud 'gro'i nang du ma skyes la/_mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mi'i nang du skyes na/_de las de dang rgyu 'thun par shin tu nyams dga' ba'i yul lo legs shing bde bar skye la/_shin tu 'byor pa dang ldan zhing /_mchog tu 
[\[81a.4\]]bde bar 'gyur ba mthong ngo /_/de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de/_lha rtag tu myos gnas kyi gnas la rtog par byed de/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas/_lha rtag tu myos gnas rnams kyi gnas ud pa la mdog ces bya ba ji ltar 
[\[81a.5\]]gnas pa mthong ngo /_/der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/_chos dang ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa/_tshul khrims dang ldan pa gang gis 'di ltar me tog ud pa la bskyed pa 'dis 
[\[81a.6\]]sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang dge 'dun rnams kyi longs spyod bya'o snyam du bsams nas bskyed la/_de yang 'bul bar byed cing de sems la dga' bar yang 'dzin na/_de lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten ud pa la mdog gi lha rnams kyi nang du skye 
[\[81a.7\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/der skyes nas kyang lha yul du rtse ba'i skye bo dang /_dga' dgur spyad pa de dga' ya yar rtse ba dang /_dga' ba dang /_steg pa dang /_'jo ba dang /_rol mo'i sgra dang /_glu dbyangs dang /_bro gar byed pa dang ni ldan/_bde ba du ma la ni gnas/_
[\[81b\]]
[\[81b.1\]]tshal nas tshal dang /_bai DUr+ya'i tshal gyi grib ma mdzes pa dang /_gser btso ma dang /_byi ru lta bu'i sa gzhi bde ba mthon dman ran pa rnams su ni rgyu/_lha mo'i tshogs du mas ni yongs su bskor/_kha zas zhim po ni za/_ci dga' dgur 'dod pa thams cad bsam 
[\[81b.2\]]pa tsam gyis ni 'grub/_ngo bo nyid kyi ri du ma la ni gnas/_bde ba las mchog tu bde ba ni thob/_dbang po lnga yul lnga la chags shing dga' ba ni nyin gcig bzhin nyams dga' bar byed/_ud pa la sngon po dang /_bai DUr+ya'i mdog lta bu'i lus ni ud pa la'i tshal nas ud 
[\[81b.3\]]pa la'i tshal du rgyu/_ud pa la'i dri gang yin pa de dpag tshad brgyar ni ldang /_ud pa la'i dri zhim po des lha'i me tog gi dri zhim po gzhan thams cad zil gyis mnan nas rgyal po bzhin du ni mdzes/_rgyu dang 'thun par 'brel pa'i rim gyis rgyu dang 'thun par 'bras 
[\[81b.4\]]bu 'byung bar yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs te/_de mtho ris su phyin nas kyang me tog ud pa la de rnams las dga' ba rnam pa mang po du ma 'thob bo/_/de nas de ltar spyod cing bde ba la gnas pa'i dbang po drug nges par 'byung ba la 
[\[81b.5\]]dga' ba/_ji srid du 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba byas shing bsags pa'i las de zad par ma gyur pa de srid du de na dga' bar byed do/_/de phyis lha'i 'jig rten de nas 'chi bar 'gyur te/_shi nas kyang gal te lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyis 
[\[81b.6\]]sems can dmyal ba dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_dud 'gro'i nang du ma skyes la/_mi rnams dang /_skal ba mnyam par mi'i nang du skyes na/_de las de dang rgyu 'thun par me tog mang po bskyed cing 'byor pa'i yul rnams su skye bar 'gyur la/_shin tu rgya che ba dang ldan pa 
[\[81b.7\]]dang /_mchog tu bde ba dang ldan pa dang /_gnod pa med par 'gyur ba mthong ngo /_/de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de/_lha rtag tu myos gnas rnams kyi gnas la rtog par byed de/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas/_lha 
[\[82a\]]
[\[82a.1\]]yul na rtag tu myos gnas rnams kyi gnas/_pad ma dkar spyod ces bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo /_/der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/_tshul khrims dang ldan par gyur 
[\[82a.2\]]cing /_lus ngag gi dri ma dang bral ba sems pas yongs su bsgoms pa'i snying dang ldan pa gang gis sangs rgyas sam/_chos sam/_dge 'dun la me tog dbul ba'i don du pad ma'i tshal bskyed cing /_sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun la yang sems dad 
[\[82a.3\]]pa dang ldan par gyur na/_de lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi gnas pad ma dkar spyod kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/der skyes nas kyang legs par byas pa'i las kyi 'bras bu la spyod de/_'di lta ste/_rgyan dang /_rin po che dang /_'od sna tshogs 
[\[82a.4\]]kyis ni lus brgyan/_lha'i tshogs thams cad kyis ni mchod/_lha mo'i tshogs me tog phreng ba thogs pa rnams kyis ni yongs su bskor/_rdo rje dang /_mthon ka dang /_ma rgad dang /_spug dang /_'phyang 'phrul gyi 'od kyis ni lus brgyan/_dga' ya yar rab tu 
[\[82a.5\]]dga' zhing rtse bar ni gnas/_mtho ris dang 'thun pa'i kun dga'i ra bar gnas shing bde ba rtag tu myong ste/_ji srid du 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba'i las byas shing bsags pa'i las de zad par ma gyur pa de srid du de bde ba dpe med pa rnam pa du ma yon tan shin tu che 
[\[82a.6\]]ba dang ldan pa/_skye bo thams cad dang lhan cig gzhan la gnod pa med cing kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa rnam pa sna tshogs de dang de dag myong bar byed do/_/de phyis lha'i 'jig rten de nas 'chi bar 'gyur te/_shi nas kyang gal te lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 
[\[82a.7\]]'gyur ba'i las kyis sems can dmyal ba dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_dud 'gro'i nang du ma skyes la/_mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mi rnams kyi nang du skyes na/_de las de dang rgyu 'thun par nor gyi bdag po shin tu bde ba dang ldan zhing bu dang dbang phyug dang 
[\[82b\]]
[\[82b.1\]]ldan pa dang /_rgyal pos kyang bkur bar 'gyur ba mthong ngo /_/de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de/_lha rtag tu myos gnas rnams kyi gnas la rtog par byed de/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas lha rtag tu myos 
[\[82b.2\]]gnas rnams kyi gnas grong khyer dmar gnas zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo /_/gnas der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/_sems pa dang ldan pa phan par 'dod pa gus pa'i snying 
[\[82b.3\]]dang ldan pa gang yin pa des/_dge slong yang dag par rab tu byung ba'i chos gos shing byis pa la'i shun pas kha dog dmar por bsgyur tam/_gur gum mam/_btsod dam/_mtshal lam/_skyu ru ra'am/_btsag gam/_bab la'am/_ldong ros sam/_me 
[\[82b.4\]]tog ban du sa tshur dang bcas pas kha dog dmar por bsgyur na/_de lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten grong khyer dmar gnas kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/der skyes nas kyang phreng ba dang gos dmar po gyon pa de'i gnas de ni 'od kyis brgyan 
[\[82b.5\]]pa'i lus kyis rtag tu gsal bar byas pa yin la/_lha de dag thams cad kyang ci dga' dgur spyod pa yin te/_de rnams kyi mthus gnas de dag thams cad rnam pa de lta bur dmar bar 'gyur ro/_/ji ltar pad ma rA ga'i 'od de gos pa med pa ltar lha de rnams kyang de 
[\[82b.6\]]ltar dmar por snang bar 'gyur ro/_/rgyan gyi kha dog sngon po dang /_ser por 'dres shing rin po ches bklubs pa gzhan gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang dmar por 'gyur te/_legs par byas pa'i las des de'i gos gsal ba rnams kyis dmar por 'gyur ro/_/gang gi 
[\[82b.7\]]tshe de rtse zhing gzhal med khang dang pad ma'i tshal dang /_lteng ka dang /_tshal dang /_nye ba'i tshal sna tshogs dang /_lha mo cha byad dang rgyan dmar po sna tshogs thogs pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor ba dag yul du mar 'gro ba na/_de'i tshe de dag gi rgyan rnams kyi tshon rtsi gsal 
[\[83a\]]
[\[83a.1\]]ba dang /_kha dog thams cad kyang gsal bar snang ngo /_/rin po che'i 'od sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/_lha'i bu de tshal nas tshal dang /_ri'i zom nas ri'i zom dang /_pad ma'i tshal nas pad ma'i tshal dang /_chu bo dang /_'bab chu dang /_lteng ka dang /_nye ba'i 
[\[83a.2\]]tshal nas chu bo dang /_'bab chu dang /_lteng ka dang /_nye ba'i tshal du 'gro bar byed do/_/sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i glu dbyangs nye bar len cing phan tshun grogs su gyur pa/_so sor chags pa'i snying gis dga' bar byed/_rtse bar byed/_dga' dgur spyod 
[\[83a.3\]]par byed do/_/sred pa'i tshogs drug gis yid rab tu dga' ba dag bdud rtsi'i zas bzang po la ni za/_myos pa'i skyon dang bral ba'i btung ba zhim po ni tshim par 'thung ste/_ji srid du tshogs chen pos yongs su bskor nas dga' ba sna tshogs byed do/_/de ltar de dag 
[\[83a.4\]]rtse ba sna tshogs dge slong des mngon par mthong nas/_'di ltar tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_mtho bas mtho ba'i ri rab na/_/de bas mtho ba rtag tu dge/_lha mchog rnams kyi 'og min du/_/dge bas skye bo khrid par byed/_/rnam pa sna tshogs du ma yi/_/tshul khrims 
[\[83a.5\]]dag kyang bsrungs na ni/_/dge ba'i las kyi rnam smin 'di/_/lha rnams nang du smin par 'gyur/_/tshul khrims chu ni shin tu dang /_/rab tu gang bar kun nas su/_/khrus byas mi ni lha rnams kyi/_/bde ba'i drung du 'gro bar 'gyur/_/sbyin dang tshul khrims rtag 
[\[83a.6\]]tu dul/_/'byung po kun la phan par dga'/_/ye shes brtson la byams sems ldan/_/lha yi 'dun sar 'gro bar 'gyur/_/nyes bcom byed dang ldan pa dang /_/tshul khrims rin po che yis brgyan/_/sems can kun la brtse ldan pa/_/lha yul 
[\[83a.7\]]rnams na de dag mkhas/_/drang po rnams ni gser 'dra ste/_/dri ma dang ni sdig rnams sbyangs/_/yang dag las kyi mtha' brtson pa/_/lha yul rnams na de dag mkhas/_/sems can kun la brtse ldan zhing /_/sems can kun la phan 'dod la/_/sdig kun rnam 
[\[83b\]]
[\[83b.1\]]par spangs pa gang /_/de dag lha yi gnas na gnas/_/legs par rtog pa nyin gcig bzhin/_/tshul khrims srung bar byed pa gang /_/nyin gcig bzhin du de rnams kyi/_/bde ba du ma de dag myong /_/skyes bu de nyid sems pa po/_/tshul khrims rta la zhon nas su/_/
