[\[83b.2\]]rtsen pa du ma ldan pa dag_/lha yi gnas su 'gro bar byed/_/gang zhig lha yi gnas na rtse/_/gang zhig bde ba bla na med/_/de dag 'thun par tshul khrims kyi/_/'bras bur de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs/_/gang zhig lha yi phreng rgyan dang /_/lha yi phreng bas bklubs pa 
[\[83b.3\]]dang /_/lha rnams mtho ris rtse ba ni/_/de kun dge ba'i rgyu las byung /_/pad ma ud pal nyams dga'i tshal/_/tshal dang nags tshal brgyan pa dang /_/mtho ris lha rnams dga' ba gang /_/de kun dge las skyes pa'i 'bras/_/nam mkha' gzhal med khang 
[\[83b.4\]]gnas dang /_/lha yi rin chen brgyan pa dang /_/lha rnams dri med gsal ba gang /_/de dag tshul khrims 'bras bu yin/_/gser dang me tog sna tshogs dang /_/kun nas ri bo'i steng rnams su/_/lha rnams dga' byed gang yin de/_/tshul khrims las byung 'bras 
[\[83b.5\]]bu yin/_/ji ltar mi dag rang khyim du/_/zhugs nas 'jigs pa med par 'gyur/_/de bzhin tshul khrims yang dag spyod/_/mi rnams lha yi gnas su 'gro/_/'di ltar lha yi nang du 'gro ba'i dri/_/bla med tshul khrims ldan pa dri zhim pa/_/me tog ke ta ka dang ma 
[\[83b.6\]]lu ka/_/tsam pa ka yi dri dang mtshungs pa min/_/tshul khrims yongs su srung ba gang /_/de dag 'tsho ba'i phul yin no/_/gang zhig tshul khrims yongs spong ba/_/'chi ba'i nang na mi bzad 'chi/_/bdag la rtag tu byams 'dod pa'ang /_/yon tan 'di dag rig nas 
[\[83b.7\]]su/_/tshul khrims legs par bsrung bya zhing /_/tshul khrims 'chal pa rnam par spong /_/tshul khrims srung ba rtag tu dul/_/bzod pa ldan zhing blta na sdug_/them skas lta bur 'dzegs nas su/_/lha yi 'dun sar 'gro bar byed/_/de ltar dge slong des 
[\[84a\]]
[\[84a.1\]]rang gi las la spyod pa'i lha rnams kyang mthong /_las kyi 'bras bu sna tshogs kyang mthong nas 'khor ba las 'dod chags dang bral lo/_/grong khyer dmar po na gnas pa'i lha de dag kyang ji srid du 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba legs par byas shing bsags 
[\[84a.2\]]pa'i las de zad par ma gyur pa de srid du de na dga' bar byed/_/rtse bar byed/_dga' dgur spyod par byed do/_/de phyis lha'i ris de nas 'chi bar 'gyur te/_shi nas kyang gal te lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyis sems can dmyal ba dang /_yi 
[\[84a.3\]]dgas dang /_dud 'gro'i nang du ma skyes la/_mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mi'i nang du skyes na/_de las de dang rgyu 'thun par 'jig rten pa thams cad dga' zhing nor mang po dang ldan pa dang /_lho phyogs su gnod pa med par skye bar 'gyur bar mthong ngo /_/
[\[84a.4\]]de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de/_lha rtag tu myos gnas rnams kyi gnas la rtog par byed de/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas/_lha rtag tu myos gnas rnams kyi gnas sna tshogs zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo /_/der 
[\[84a.5\]]sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na 'di ltar sems pa dang ldan par gyur cing sems pas brlan pa'i snying dang ldan pa gang gis sems can tshul khrims dang ldan pa rnams la bza' ba dang /_
[\[84a.6\]]btung ba dang /_bza' bca' dang /_tshod ma sna tshogs dag byin na/_de lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten sna tshogs kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/las sna tshogs kyis bskyed pa/_bde ba sna tshogs la ni spyod/_g.yog pa dang mal 
[\[84a.7\]]stan sna tshogs kyi nang na ni 'gre/_bde bar gnas pa'i kun dga' ra ba dang /_rtse ba dang /_'gros sna tshogs ni byed/_tshal dang skyed mos tshal sna tshogs su ni 'gro/_lha mo'i tshogs cha byad sna tshogs thogs pa ni phyi bzhin 'brang /_tshal dang /_nags tshal 
[\[84b\]]
[\[84b.1\]]dang /_ri bo sna tshogs dang /_chu bo dang /_pad ma'i tshal dang /_ud pal dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu'i skyed mos tshal sna tshogs dag na ni gnas/_bgo ba dang /_mal cha dang /_sgeg pa'i tshal sna tshogs na ni spyod/_ga zha'i gtam brjod cing 'du 'dzi 
[\[84b.2\]]la dga' la/_shin tu chags pa'i sems sna tshogs kyis ni 'tsho/_rtog pas bskyed pa la dga' zhing /_blo rnam par chags pa rab tu myos pa yin te/_de ltar las sna tshogs byas nas rgyu sna tshogs byed pa de tshal sna tshogs rnams su bde ba sna tshogs dag myong bar byed do/_/
[\[84b.3\]]de nas dge slong de shin tu dga' nas 'di ltar tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_ri mo mkhan gyi ri mo rnams/_/de ni sna tshogs 'dri ma yin/_/gang zhig las kyi ri mo mkhan/_/mtho ris su ni mang du 'dri/_/tshon rtsis bris pa bris mi 'gyur/_/de ni bgrang bar grangs yod kyi/_/
[\[84b.4\]]las kyis bris pa grangs med de/_/de ni sems kyis 'dri bar byed/_/rtsig pa zhig na nges par yang /_/ri mo ma lus 'jig par 'gyur/_/las kyis bris pa lus zhig kyang /_/'jig pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro/_/ji ltar ri mo mkhan gcig cig_/ri mo sna tshogs 
[\[84b.5\]]'dri ba dag_/de bzhin sems ni gcig pu yis/_/las rnams sna tshogs byed par 'gyur/_/ji ltar tshon rtsi gsal ba lngas/_/bris pa snang la stod par byed/_/de ltar dbang po lnga rnams kyi/_/las kyis 'khor bar 'khor bar 'dri/_/ri mo mkhan gyi mi dag ni/_/
[\[84b.6\]]du ma dag tu snang 'gyur gyi/_/ri mo mkhan de sems phra bas/_/thams cad du ni mi mthong ngo /_/ri mo legs shing legs pa dag_/ji ltar rtsig ngos rnams la 'dri/_/las rnams legs shing legs pa dag_/de ltar sems la 'dri bar byed/_/ji ltar nyin dang 
[\[84b.7\]]mtshan rnams su/_/sems rgyun 'byung la sems gnas 'gyur/_/de ltar nyin dang mtshan rnams su/_/de bzhin las kyi rjes su 'jug_/ji ltar rlung dang dud pa rdul/_/gdung ba rnams kyis ri mo 'jig_/de ltar dge dang mi dge ba/_/spangs na las kyi ri 
[\[85a\]]
[\[85a.1\]]mo 'jig_/de ltar dge slong des sems ri mo mkhan lta bu la rag las pa mngon par mthong nas/_las kyi de nyid rnam par mthong ba 'khor ba las yid byung ngo /_/lha sna tshogs de dag gi las sna tshogs de dag kyang ji srid du 'dod pa sdug pa yid 
[\[85a.2\]]du 'ong ba'i las byas shing bsags pa bde 'gro nges par myong bar 'gyur ba de zad par ma gyur pa de srid du myong bar byed do/_/de phyis lha'i 'jig rten de nas 'chi bar 'gyur te/_shi nas kyang gal te lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyis sems can 
[\[85a.3\]]dmyal ba dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_dud 'gro'i nang du ma skyes la/_mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mi'i nang du skyes na/_de las de dang rgyu 'thun par rtag tu rgyu zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul che ba dang /_nor dang ldan pa dang /_dpon sna byed pas 'tsho bar 'gyur bar mthong 
[\[85a.4\]]ngo /_de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de/_lha rtag tu myos gnas rnams kyi gnas la rtog par byed de/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/_lha rtag tu myos gnas rnams kyi gnas mtho bar gnas zhes bya ba ji 
[\[85a.5\]]ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo /_/der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/_legs par spyad pa'i las mngon par shes pas/_sems pas yongs su bsgoms pa'i sems dang ldan pa gang gis sems can 
[\[85a.6\]]rnams kyi grang ba dang tsha ba yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir bsod nams kyi gnas mal byas na/_de lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten mtho bar gnas pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/der skyes nas kyang reg pa las bde bar gnas pa de dbang po 
[\[85a.7\]]lnga'i yul gyi bde ba rnam pa du ma rnam pa mang po dag myong bar 'gyur ro/_/lha'i ris de na tshal dang nye ba'i tshal dag yod de/_'di lta ste/_me tog man dA ra ba la rtse ba dang /_stug po sbyor gnas dang /_ngal bso bde dang /_rtse dang sgra 'byin ldan dang /_sgyu ma kun dga' 
[\[85b\]]
[\[85b.1\]]dang 'jigs med de/_tshal dang nye ba'i tshal de dag tu lha de lha mo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba dang bcas pa dag dga' bar byed/_dgod par byed/_rtse bar byed/_sgeg par byed do/_/sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pas dga' bar byed cing blo rang dgar gnas 
[\[85b.2\]]pa bdag nyid chen po ci dgar sgrogs pa/_bde ba mchog dang ldan pa skyid par gnas pa rnams pad ma'i tshal nas pad ma'i tshal du 'dong bar byed de/_mtho ris dang 'thun pa'i rin po che'i snying po rab tu mang pos rnam par brgyan pa/_rtag tu bag tsha ba med par spyod pa 
[\[85b.3\]]rnams yul mtho ba nas yul mtho ba dang /_gser gyi ri rab 'bar ba'i phreng ba'i 'od rnams kyis gsal bar byas pa de dag la lus nad med pa rnams yongs su rgyu bar byed cing rtag tu bde bas myos par gnas pa/_legs par byas pa mang po 'dod par byas pa'i 
[\[85b.4\]]las kyis der skyes pa rnams dga' bar byed/_rtse bar byed/_dga' dgur spyod par byed do/_/chu bo dang /_'bab chu dang /_lteng kas brgyan pa'i mtho ris kyi yul rnams na/_ji srid du 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba'i las de zad par ma gyur pa de srid du de na dga' 
[\[85b.5\]]bar byed do/_/de phyis lha'i 'jig rten de nas 'chi bar 'gyur te/_shi nas kyang gal te lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyis sems can dmyal ba dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_dud 'gro'i nang du ma skyes la/_mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mi'i 
[\[85b.6\]]nang du skyes na/_de las de dang rgyu 'thun par rgyal po chos sems pa chen por 'gyur zhing 'jig rten thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ba mthong ngo //_//'phags pa dam pa'i chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa/_bam po nyer brgyad pa/_de nas yang dge slong las kyi 
[\[85b.7\]]'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de/_lha rtag tu myos gnas rnams kyi gnas la rtog par byed de/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/_lha rtag tu myos gnas rnams kyi gnas rgun chang myos gnas zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo /_/der sems 
[\[86a\]]
[\[86a.1\]]can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/_legs par byas pa'i las kyi mtha' spyad pa/_tshul khrims dang ldan par gyur pa/_phan par 'dod pa/_'jam pa'i snying rje dang /_rang bzhin 
[\[86a.2\]]gyis ngang 'jam pa/_drang ba/_g.yo med pa/_gzhan la gnod pa med pa gang gis phyogs bzhi'i dge sbyong dang bram ze nyon mongs pa mgon med pa rnams la nyin gcig gam/_gnyis sam/_gsum mam/_bzhi lta smos kyang ci dgos te/_de ltar rim gyis rgya cher 
[\[86a.3\]]rtag res 'khor byin na de lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten lha rtag tu myos gnas rnams kyi gnas rgun chang myos gnas rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ba mthong ngo /_/der skyes nas kyang mtho ris kyi skyed mos tshal na bde bar gnas pa de gser gyi dril bu g.yer ka'i 
[\[86a.4\]]dra bas bres pa/_sgra mang po 'byin pa dang ldan pa'i tshal rnams kyi nang na lha mo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing /_'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba'i yul la chags pa dag dga' dgur spyod par byed do/_/lha gzhon nu gzhan rab tu mang po rnams kyis mngon par mchod cing 
[\[86a.5\]]lha'i bdud rtsi'i skom mang pos ni myos/_me tog man dA ra ba'i phreng bas ni mgo brgyan/_pad ma'i tshal gyi gsab gseb na ni gnas/_gser dang /_bai DUr+ya dang /_shel dang /_dngul gyi ri dag la ni 'dzeg_/bung ba sgra skad snyan pa 'byin pa'i pad ma'i tshal rnams kyi nang na 
[\[86a.6\]]rnam par rgyu bar ni byed/_lha mo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing nyi ma 'bum so so na 'gran pa lta bu'i me tog man dA ra ba dang /_pad ma'i tshal rnams kyi nang na/_gser gyi bya sgra 'byin pa thos na rnar snyan pa dang /_rol mo yan lag lnga dang ldan pa thos na snyan cing bde ba 
[\[86a.7\]]rnams kyi nang na mngon par dga' bar byed do/_/gser dang /_bai DUr+ya'i rdo leb kyis sa gzhi legs par bsnyams pa dang /_mu tig gi bye mas gzhi bsnyams pa'i mtsho lha'i chu yon tan yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa rnams kyi nang na dga' bar byed do/_/rang gis byas 
[\[86b\]]
[\[86b.1\]]pa'i bsod nams kyis sprul pa'i lhun po dag la/_gser dang /_bai DUr+ya dang /_dngul dang /_shel gyi rdo yis mdzes par byas pa'i ri bzang po'i rtse mo dag na mngon par dga' bar byed de/_dga' ba dang skyid pa sna tshogs la gnas pa/_lha dang lha mos dkrigs 
[\[86b.2\]]pa'i nang na dgod cing rtse la g.yer ba/_lha dang lha mo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba de ji srid du 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba rang gis byas shing bsags pa'i las de zad par ma gyur pa de srid du rang gis legs par byas pa'i las kyi 'bras bu la nye bar spyod par 
[\[86b.3\]]byed do/_/gang gi tshe las zad par gyur pa dang /_de phyis lha'i ris de nas 'chi bar 'gyur te/_shi nas kyang gal te lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyis sems can dmyal ba dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_dud 'gro'i nang du ma skyes la/_mi rnams dang skal 
[\[86b.4\]]ba mnyam par mi'i nang du skyes na/_de las de dang rgyu 'thun par rtag tu bde ba dang ldan zhing ri 'bigs byed kyi sman ljongs dag tu gnas pa dang /_rgyal po'i yid ches par 'gyur ba mthong ngo /_/de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de/_lha rtag tu 
[\[86b.5\]]myos gnas rnams kyi gnas la rtog par byed de/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas/_lha rtag tu myos gnas rnams kyi gnas yul la 'dod pa zhes bya ba mthong ngo /_/der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas/_des thos pa las byung ba'i 
[\[86b.6\]]shes pas brtags na/_sems dang ldan par gyur pa gang gis tshul khrims dang ldan yang rung /_mi ldan yang rung /_lta ba log kyang rung /_ma log kyang rung ba zhig nad kyis thebs pa la/_nad rkyen dang sman dang nad g.yog dag byin la/_de yang nad 
[\[86b.7\]]sos par gyur na/_de lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten yul la dga' ba'i lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/der skyes nas kyang 'jigs pa thams cad dang bral bar shes pa de/_lha'i gnas gzhan dag tu mchod cing las 'phel 
[\[87a\]]
[\[87a.1\]]ba las bde ba 'phel bar 'gyur te/_ji ltar mar me 'bar ba las 'od 'byung ba de ltar las 'phel ba las bde ba 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/de ltar lha rnams lha'i 'jig rten na las kyi 'bras bu de la spyod pa rnam par smin pa shin tu nyams dga' 
[\[87a.2\]]ba/_dpe med pa thun mong ma yin pa dag 'byung ngo /_/legs par byas pa'i las des der skyes pa de bai DUr+ya dang /_nor bu dang /_dngul gyi lhun po gsal ba'i rtse mo mthon po rnams na shin tu bde bar gnas pa'i kun dga'i ra ba dag yod de/_skyed mos tshal dang /_stegs 
[\[87a.3\]]du mas brgyan pa'i sa dag la gnas shing tshal dang nye ba'i tshal rin po che sna bdun gyis brgyan pa/_'od sna tshogs kyis yun ring du nyams dga' bar byed pa rnams kyi nang na lha mo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor te/_de dag gis rtsed mo byed pa na/_de ltar dbang 
[\[87a.4\]]po lnga dang /_blo yul la chags pa de ci dga' dgur bde ba la gnas te/_ji srid du 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba byas shing bsags pa'i las de zad par ma gyur pa de srid du lha yul lha'i gnas de na 'dod pa thams cad la blo rnam par chags pa de/_dga' bar 
[\[87a.5\]]byed/_gnas par byed/_dga' dgur spyod par byed de/_las de zad nas de nas yang las kyi 'bras bu la spyod pa ji lta ba bzhin sems can dmyal ba dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_dud 'gro'i nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_gal te mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mi'i 
[\[87a.6\]]nang du skyes na/_de las de dang rgyu 'thun par byed gzugs bzang po dang ldan zhing gar yang 'jigs pa med pa dang /_nor bzang po dang ldan pa dang /_rgyal po'i 'khor gyis mchod pa dang /_tshe ring ba dang /_yul bzang por skye ste/_dus kyang chos bzang po la dga' 
[\[87a.7\]]ba'i dus su skye bar 'gyur bar mthong ngo /_/de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa des/_lha rtag tu myos gnas rnams kyi gnas la rtog par byed de/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas/_lha rtag tu myos gnas rnams kyi gnas chu bsil 
[\[87b\]]
[\[87b.1\]]gnas zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo /_/der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/_snying rje can sems pas yongs su bsgoms pa'i snying dang ldan pa gang gis sems can gzhan 
[\[87b.2\]]'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe/_skom gyis gdungs pa'i skom pa bsal bar bya ba'i phyir ram/_gshin rje'i mi yis 'jigs pa bstan nas 'khrugs par gyur pa la bu ram chu'am/_chu grang mo blud na de legs par byas pa'i las kyi mthu des gang gi tshe 'chi bar 
[\[87b.3\]]'gyur ba de'i tshe/_lha rtag tu myos gnas rnams kyi gnas chu bsil bar gnas zhes bya ba'i lha de dag gi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/der skyes nas kyang chu bsil ba'i tshogs 'bab chu dang /_chu bo phun sum tshogs pa'i sa phyogs dag na de dga' bar byed 
[\[87b.4\]]do/_/de lha'i btung ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/_'di lta ste mthong na myos pa skyed pa dang /_dris myos pa skyed pa dang /_reg pas myos pa skyed pa dang /_sgra thos na myos pa skyed par byed pa/_myos pa'i skyon dang bral zhing snying dga' 
[\[87b.5\]]bar byed pa yin no/_/yon tan lnga dang ldan pa'i btung ba dag kyang 'byung ste/_'di lta ste/_btung ba de dag 'thungs nas lha rnams lha'i stobs bcu 'gyur du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/ji ltar nam mkha' la 'gro ba nyams par yang mi 'gyur zhing ltung bar yang 
[\[87b.6\]]mi 'gyur la/_de bzhin du sa la yang 'bying bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de'i brtson 'grus yongs su nyams pa yang med la ca co dang /_ga zha'i sgra la mngon par dga' zhing yid shin tu dga' ba de rab tu dga' ba brgya 'gyur du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de'i rna ba yang mnyan par 
[\[87b.7\]]bya ba la thogs pa med de/_shin tu bde ba yang dag par 'byung bar 'gyur ba/_mtho ris dang 'thun par gnas pa/_yul gyi bde ba nyams dga' ba dag myong bar 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/rin po che sna bdun gyi shing ljon pa'i tshal 'di lta bu dag kyang yod de/_'di 
[\[88a\]]
[\[88a.1\]]lta ste/_tshal g.yer byed dang /_tshal kun dga' dang /_tshal dga' bder gnas dang /_tshal yid tshim dang /_tshal rlung bde dang /_tshal sgra lnga 'byin dang /_tshal 'bab zer sgra rol mo dang /_tshal yid 'thun dang /_tshal bde bar gnas 
[\[88a.2\]]pa de rnams kyi nang na mngon par dga' bar byed do/_/mig gis kyang gzugs 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba dag mthong ngo /_/rna bas kyang sgra snyan pa rnar 'thad pa yid du 'ong ba dag thos so/_/snas kyang dri zhim pa bsung che ba yid du 'ong ba dag snom mo/_/de ltar 
[\[88a.3\]]lces kyang ro zhim pa bro che ba yid du 'ong ba dag myong ste/_de ltar rnam pa de lta bus yid tshim par byas pa'i snying dang dbang po lnga yul la chags pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba dag myong bar byed do/_/de ltar de sred pa'i tshogs drug gi mes nyin gcig bzhin sreg par byed la/_
[\[88a.4\]]'dod chags kyi mes kyang nyin gcig bzhin yongs su sreg ste/_'dod chags kyi me dang /_bag med pa'i me lce drug shin tu stobs che bar gyur kyang de dag des mi rig go/_/bag med pa des yid phrogs shing bag med pa'i gnas su skyes pa/_bag med pa des 
[\[88a.5\]]nyams pa/_legs par byas pa'i las des yul gyi bde ba la lhag par dga' ba zad pa med pa de ni ji srid du 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba byas shing bsags pa'i las de zad par ma gyur pa de srid du de nas bde ba myong bar byed do/_/gang gi tshe las zad par 
[\[88a.6\]]gyur pa dang /_de phyis lha'i 'jig rten de nas 'chi bar 'gyur te/_shi nas kyang gal te lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyis sems can dmyal ba dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_dud 'gro'i nang du ma skyes la/_mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mi'i 
[\[88a.7\]]nang du skyes na/_de las de dang rgyu 'thun par bkres pa dang /_skom pa dang /_ngal ba dang /_lo nyes 'byung ba'i 'jigs pa yang mi 'byung la/_rtag par shin tu bde bar gnas pa dang /_yul ma mthong ba rnams su 'ongs na yang dga' ba dang mgu bar 'gyur ba 
[\[88b\]]
[\[88b.1\]]dang /_de la bya ba med bzhin du yang mal stan dang /_na ba'i gsos sman gyi rkyen gyis yo byad mang po dag sbyin pa byed pa mthong ngo /_/de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de/_lha rtag tu myos gnas rnams kyi gnas la rtog par byed de/_
[\[88b.2\]]des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas lha rtag tu myos gnas rnams kyi gnas brtan dga' zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo /_/der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/_gang gis 
[\[88b.3\]]spong ba'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i dge slong yid skyo bar bya ba'i phyir mi ro'am mi ro lta bur bris pa zhig bzhag na/_de bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten brtan dga'i lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/der skyes nas kyang rtag tu brtan dga' de bai DUr+ya 
[\[88b.4\]]dang /_gser dang /_byi ru dang /_an da rnyil dang /_ma rgad lta bu'i mtho ris kyi gnas dag na yang dang yang du dga' bar byed cing nyin gcig bzhin du bde ba bar chad med pa 'bum snyed dag myong bar byed do/_/rol mo mang po du ma 'bum snyed dag mang du thos na bar 
[\[88b.5\]]chad med par dga' ba lhag par chags te/_kun nas nyon mongs pa 'byung ba gang yin pa de ni dper byar yang med la/_mtho ris su zas dang /_skom dang /_gos dang /_me tog dang /_dris myos shing dga' ba mang po du ma 'byung ngo /_/der dga' ba 'di lta bu dag 'byung ste/_
[\[88b.6\]]'di lta ste/_tshal mthong na dga' ba dang /_bya sna tshogs sgra 'byin na dga' ba dang /_rol mos dga' ba dang /_lha mo mthong na dga' ba dang /_rgyags par gnas na dga' ba dang /_dri zhim pos dga' ba dang /_thags su ma btags pa'i gos gyon na dga' ba dang /_
[\[88b.7\]]spos sna tshogs kyis phog na dga' ba dang /_bza' ba dang /_btung ba tshogs na dga' ba dang /_rtsen pas dga' ba dang /_nam mkha' la 'gro bas dga' ba dang /_snying du sdug pa'i lha mthong na dga' ba dang /_rin po che'i ri'i rtse mo nas ri'i rtse mo blta na dga' 
[\[89a\]]
[\[89a.1\]]ste/_de dag la sogs pas mngon par dga' la/_dga' ba du ma gzhan rnams la yang shin tu chags te/_bde ba shin tu yid du 'ong ba'i kun dga' ra ba dang /_sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i glu dbyangs len pa dang /_rang gis byas 
[\[89a.2\]]pa'i bde ba la gnas pa lha'i bde ba rnam pa du ma de dag ji srid du 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba legs par byas pa'i las de zad par ma gyur pa de srid du myong bar byed do/_/las de zad nas de nas yang lha'i 'jig rten de nas 'chi bar 'gyur te/_shi nas kyang gal te 
[\[89a.3\]]lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyis sems can dmyal ba dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_dud 'gro'i nang du ma skyes la/_mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mi'i nang du skyes na/_de las de dang rgyu 'thun par skyed mos tshal sna tshogs kyi nang na gnas shing shin tu 
[\[89a.4\]]bde ba dang ldan pa dang /_bgo ba'i gos sna tshogs dang /_dga' gtam sna tshogs dang /_spyod pa sna tshogs dang /_blta bar bya ba sna tshogs mthong bar 'gyur ba mthong ngo /_/de nas yang dge slong des rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams kyi gnas gsum dang /_las kyi 
[\[89a.5\]]'bras bu rnam par smin pa dang bcas pa rnam par phye nas gnas bzhi pa la rtog par byed de/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas pi bang can gsum pa zhes bya ba'i lha rnams mthong ngo /_/de rnams kyi gnas bcu po yang 'di lta ste/_dri dga' dang /_sgra snyan pa 
[\[89a.6\]]dang /_de la chags dang /_skyor chu skyes dang /_lus dkar dang /_phan tshun dga' dang /_yang dag chags spyod dang /_'khor dang /_rnam spyod dang /_skyil mo krung gi steng du skye ba dang ldan par gnas pa dag ste/_lha pi bang can gsum pa rnams 
[\[89a.7\]]kyi gnas ni bcu po de dag yin no/_/dge slong de de rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa rnam par 'byed par byed de/_gnas de rnams su lha dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur zhig gu snyam nas/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/_'di ltar las 
[\[89b\]]
[\[89b.1\]]de dag byed na de ltar de dang 'thun par skye bar 'gyur la/_las de dang 'thun par rnam par smin pa 'byung ngo /_/de la rgyal chen bzhi'i gnas dang po dri dga' zhes bya ba der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes 
[\[89b.2\]]pas brtags na/_sems pa dang ldan par gyur cing /_des sems bsgoms pa des lus bsgoms pa gang gis bsod nams bsags par bya ba'i phyir/_dge 'dun dag la kun dga' ra ba'i sa'am/_bu ram shing gi ra ba'am/_'bra go'i ra ba'am/_shing 
[\[89b.3\]]a mra'i ra ba phul la/_de yang yongs su spyod par byed na/_de lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten dri dga'i lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/der skyes nas kyang bde ba du ma thob cing spyod pa de/_lha'i tsan dan dang /_tsan dan sa mchog gi byug pas lus 
[\[89b.4\]]byugs pa/_lha mo'i tshogs du mas yongs su bskor ba/_gzugs dang cha byad sna tshogs dang ldan pa dgod pa dang /_rtse ba dang /_sgeg chos la mkhas pa rnams dang /_lhan cig pad ma'i tshal dang /_lteng ka dang /_nags tshal gyi bar dag na me tog gi phreng ba 
[\[89b.5\]]dang /_gos gyon pa/_yid rab tu dga' ba rnams dga' bar byed/_dga' dgur spyod par byed do/_/de'i lha'i dri rnam pa du ma dag pad ma'i tshal de dag dang /_lha'i me tog de dag brtol nas dpag tshad brgyar bsung stobs cher 'byung ngo /_/dri snoms pa'i lha mo 
[\[89b.6\]]gang yin pa de dag thams cad dri shin tu nyams dga' zhing mchog tu yid du 'ong ba rnam pa du mas myos pa rnams/_yang lha'i dri des brgya 'gyur du myos par 'gyur ro/_/shin tu myos pa'i lha'i ris de dag nyid la sems chags pa rnams lha de dag nyid dang /_rnam pa du ma brgya 
[\[89b.7\]]'gyur du dga' dgur spyod par byed la/_de rnams lhan cig chu bo'i drung du 'gro bar byed do/_/chu bo de dag gi ming ni 'di lta ste/_rin chen 'bab ces bya ba dang /_rin po che'i dum bu 'bab dang /_gser 'bab dang /_chang 'bab chu bo dang /_sbrang rtsi 'bab pa'i chu bo dang /_
[\[90a\]]
[\[90a.1\]]dbu ba rog rog 'bab pa dag ste/_chu bo de dag thams cad kyi 'gram na/_bya ngang pa dang /_kA raN+Da ba dang /_ngur pa'i tshogs kyis brgyan pa bya sgra 'byin pa rnams dang /_shing ljon pas mtha' khebs pa yin la/_shing de dag kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi bya 
[\[90a.2\]]rnams kyis kun nas dkrigs shing sgra yid du 'ong ba 'byin pa dag yin te/_lha mo'i tshogs glu snyan pa len pa la mkhas pa gang yin pa de dag kyang bya'i sgra dbyangs 'byin pa thos nas/_tshal gyi nang na rgyu ba'i bya gzhan sgra 'byin pa lha'i rnar snyan pa de dag la shin tu 
[\[90a.3\]]nyan par byed do/_/yul gyi 'dod pa la sems rnam par chags shing bya'i sgra 'byin pa de la snying shin tu chags pa de dag gis bde ba de thams cad bor nas bya'i sgra de la nyan par byed de/_bya'i sgra yid du 'ong ba sna tshogs dag thos na bde ba rnam pa du ma sna tshogs dang /_
[\[90a.4\]]sgra dbyangs bdun dang ldan zhing rgyun mi drag pa 'byin pa la nyan par byed do/_/chu bo gzhan dag tu sgra 'byin par lha mo rnams dga' bar byed/_glu dbyangs len/_dgod par byed la/_lha'i chang myos pa'i skyon dang bral ba dag la 'thung bar byed do/_/de dag de rnams kyis 
[\[90a.5\]]mthong nas kyang de rnams dang lhan cig dga' bar byed la/_bai DUr+ya dang /_dngul dang /_shel dang /_gser gyi ri bo gzhan dag gi rtse mo dang /_chu bo dang /_'bab chu dang /_lteng ka dang /_nags tshal mdzes pa dang /_pad ma'i tshal bya'i tshogs sna tshogs kyis 
[\[90a.6\]]brgyan pa rnams su lha mo de rnams dang lhan cig dga' bar byed do/_/gzhan yang phyogs gzhan dag na bai DUr+ya sngon po'i dum bu lta bu dang /_me tog sna tshogs kyis khebs pa'i sa phyogs dag na dga' bar byed de/_de ltar de legs par byas pa'i las de dang rgyu 'thun 
[\[90a.7\]]par sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pas mtho ris kyi bde ba yid du 'ong ba rnam pa du ma dag myong ngo /_/lha'i bde ba de yang dge slong des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas rtogs nas 'di ltar tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_rnam par chags pa'i dbang po lnga/_/de ltar yul 
[\[90b\]]
[\[90b.1\]]rnams lnga la chags/_/'dod chags skad cig mi 'byung ba'ang /_/yul gyis tshim par mi byed do/_/yul rnams kun gyi nang na gcig_/'dir ni bud med kho na lta/_/yul kun zil gyis mnan nas su/_/'dod chags me ni chen por 'bar/_/tshogs pa dang 
[\[90b.2\]]ni ma tshogs dang /_/'chi ba dang ni gtam brjod pa'ang /_/bud med rgyu las kun 'byung ste/_/me yis mi 'di sreg par byed/_/me ni tshogs dang 'bar 'gyur gyi/_/ma tshogs 'bar bar mi 'gyur la/_/tshogs na'ang 'bar la ma tshogs kyang /_/lha rnams 'dod 
[\[90b.3\]]chags me 'bar ro/_/me de'i yul de med pa dang /_/rgyang ring na go sreg mi byed/_/'dod chags me ni nye ring 'dra/_/mi bzad dga' bas sreg par byed/_/kun du rtog pa'i shing skam 'byung /_/dga' ba ya yo'i shugs dang ldan/_/sreg pa'i mar la smyugs 
[\[90b.4\]]pa 'di/_/'dod chags me yis dga' bas sreg_/'di ltar me yis lus gcig ni/_/bsregs nas rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/_/ming dang gzugs dang ma bral ba'i/_/'dod chags me ni zhi mi 'gyur/_/sreg byed mi bzad me la ni/_/'byung po dga' bar mi byed 
[\[90b.5\]]la/_/'dod chags me ni rab rno yang /_/mi rnams yid ni 'byung mi byed/_/dbang po lnga las byung ba yi/_/'di ni yul rnams lnga yis bsgribs/_/sred pa rlung gi stobs dang mtshungs/_/'dod chags me yis skye dgu sreg_/rtog pa'i gtsub shing las byung ba'i/_/
[\[90b.6\]]yul rnams kyis ni yongs su spel/_/lus ni shing ltar sreg byed kyang /_/de ni skye bos mi mthong ngo /_/ji lta ji ltar 'dod chags me/_/rab tu 'bar bas sreg byed pa/_/de lta de ltar 'dod chags dri/_/bde ba bzhin du yongs su bsten/_/me ni rab tu gsal 'gyur 
[\[90b.7\]]la/_/'dod chags me ni mun pas bsgribs/_/de bas dug dang dgra lta bu/_/brtan pos 'dod chags me spongs shig_/de ltar dge slong des de dag mthong nas 'dod chags kyi mes sreg pa'i lha la snying brtse bar byed la/_lha'i srid par gtogs pa dag la yang skyon de 
[\[91a\]]
[\[91a.1\]]dag rtogs nas/_sred par mi byed do/_/de ltar dri dga'i sa phyogs na bde ba rnam pa du ma dag ji srid du 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba legs par byas pa'i las de zad par ma gyur pa de srid du myong bar byed do/_/de phyis lha'i 'jig rten de nas 'chi 
[\[91a.2\]]bar 'gyur te/_shi nas kyang gal te lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyis sems can dmyal ba dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_dud 'gro'i nang du ma skyes la/_mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mi'i nang du skyes na/_de las de dang rgyu 'thun par rtag tu sa 
[\[91a.3\]]phyogs bde ba thob cing shin tu 'byor pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba mthong ngo /_/de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de/_lha pi bang can gsum pa rnams kyi gnas la rtog par byed de/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas/_lha rnams kyi 
[\[91a.4\]]gnas sgra snyan pa zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo /_/der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/_legs par byas pa'i las spyad cing /_sems pa dang /_yang dag pa'i lta ba dang ldan par gyur pa 
[\[91a.5\]]gang gis lta ba log par zhugs pa dag la tshigs bcad gcig bstan la/_de dag kyang sems yud tsam zhig sangs rgyas la dad pa skyes na/_de lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten sgra snyan pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/der skyes nas kyang 
[\[91a.6\]]dbang po yul la dga' zhing bde ba de lha'i mtsho 'gram na rtse ba la ni dga'/_pad ma'i tshal gyi phreng ba dang /_gser gyi ri la gnas shing lha'i rol mo byed pa la ni dga'/_lha mo gzugs dang /_rnam pa sna tshogs thogs pa/_'dzum zhing 'jo sgeg la mngon par dga' 
[\[91a.7\]]ba/_byad bzhin gyi mdangs sdug cing dbang phyug mtshungs pa med pa la dga' ba rnams kyis ni yongs su bskor/_rtag tu nyin gcig bzhin bde ba la gnas pa rab tu 'phel zhing bai DUr+ya'i ri'i rtse mo dag na gnas la/_bde ba sna tshogs spyod pa me tog gi phreng ba dang /_phye ma dang /_
[\[91b\]]
[\[91b.1\]]byug pas lus brgyan pa dag de na dga' bar byed do/_/yul gyi rnam pa mang po la dga' ba/_ri rab dang ri khrod yangs pa na gnas pa dag gser gyi ri dang tshal rnams kyi nang na dga' bar byed de/_de na gser gyi ri 'di lta bu dag yod de/_'di lta ste/_ri mkha' thug 
[\[91b.2\]]ces bya ba dang /_ri grib med ces bya ba dang /_ri thams cad dga' zhes bya ba dang /_ri yid bzhin sprul ces bya ba dag ste/_ri de dag ni rin po ches rnam par phye zhing mdzes la/_gser gyi tshal gyis mdzes par byas pa/_ri'i rtse mo rnams na lha'i tshogs snying rab tu 
[\[91b.3\]]dga' ba rnams rtag tu glu dbyangs kyi sgra ni 'byin/_chu dang zhing bsil la gtsang ba'i rgyun dag dang /_pad ma'i rdzing rnams kyis ni rtag tu mdzes par byas/_bya rtag tu myos shing rnar snyan pa/_sgra 'byin pa rnams ni nye ba na 'khod/_mig tu shin tu sdug pa'i ri'i 
[\[91b.4\]]sa phyogs kyi sman ljongs de rnams na rang gi las la spyod pa'i lha de dag dga' bar byed/_rgyu bar byed/_rtse bar byed/_dga' dgur spyod par byed do/_/lha mo bzang mo rnams kyis yongs su bskor cing /_bya myos pa sgra 'byin pa dang /_gser gyi bung ba myos 
[\[91b.5\]]pa mang po rnams kyis yongs su bskor ba'i lha de dag thams cad reg na bde ba'i lha'i lcug ma'i khyim rnams su 'khor dang lhan cig dga' bar byed do/_/de ltar de na gnas pa de ni/_ji srid du 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba lha las ldog par mi 'gyur ba'i las de zad par 
[\[91b.6\]]ma gyur pa de srid du dga' bar byed do/_/gang gi tshe zad par gyur pa dang /_de lha'i ris de nas 'chi bar 'gyur te/_shi nas kyang las nye bar 'gro ba ji lta ba bzhin sems can dmyal ba dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_dud 'gro rnams kyi 'khor bar yongs su 'khyam par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[91b.7\]]gal te mi rnams kyi nang du skal ba mnyam par mi'i nang du skyes na/_de las de dang rgyu 'thun par rtag tu rigs shin tu che ba'i nang du skye zhing shin tu 'byor pa dang ldan pa dang /_skye bo kun gyis mchod pa dang /_ris 'thun pa'i gzugs bzang po dang ldan pa dang /_ris 'thun pa'i 
[\[92a\]]
[\[92a.1\]]skal ba dang ldan pa dang /_skyon med pa dang /_bran pho dang /_bran mo dang /_skye bo dang ldan par 'gyur ba mthong ngo /_/de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de/_lha pi bang can gsum pa rnams kyi gnas la rtog par byed de/_des 
[\[92a.2\]]thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas lha rnams kyi lha'i gnas de la chags pa zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo /_/der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/_legs par byas pa'i las kyi mtha' 
[\[92a.3\]]spyad par gyur pa/_de la rab tu chags pa'i yid sems pa dang ldan par gyur pa gang gis grogs po la skom phor gang tsam blud pa'am/_'gron po rnams la srog chags lu ta dang /_ki ta dang /_sbrang bu mchu [{]rings [,]ring [}]dag gis 'jigs pa las bde bar bya ba'i phyir 
[\[92a.4\]]khron pa dag 'gebs par byed de/_'di ltar srog chags dug dang 'dres pa 'di dag gi dug chu'i nang du song na/_de las 'gron po lam du zhugs pa rnams kyi srog gi bar chad du 'gyur ro snyam nas bya ba ci yang med kyis kyang /_byams sems kyis khron pa la 'thung 
[\[92a.5\]]ba'i skye bo gzhan la phan par bya ba'i phyir gzhi de las de g.yog par byed na/_skyes bu dge ba de lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten lha pi bang thogs pa rnams kyi gnas de la chags pa zhes bya bar skye bar 'gyur ro/_/der skyes nas kyang de'i lus ni nyi ma 
[\[92a.6\]]gnyis pa lta bur gzi che ste/_legs par byas pa'i las rnams kyis lus thams cad ni brgyan/_ri dang /_ri bo dang /_ri sul dang /_'bab chu na gnas pa rnams de dang spyod pa'i ngang tshul 'thun pa'i lha mo'i tshogs gzugs dang /_lang tsho dang /_rgyan rnam pa sna 
[\[92a.7\]]tshogs thogs pa rnams kyis ni yongs su bskor/_gzugs dang /_sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya sdug pa du ma la rab tu chags shing mchog tu bde ba dang ldan pa yin no/_/gnas de dag na rin po che sna bdun gyi shing ljon pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor ba'i ri dang 
[\[92b\]]
[\[92b.1\]]tshal 'di lta bu dag yod de/_'di lta ste/_rnyis pa med pa'i tshal de na me tog rnams kyang rnyis pa med cing /_dri dang yang bral ba med pa dang /_gser gyi grib ma'i tshal zhes bya ba gser gyi lcug mas dra bar bris shing /_bai DUr+ya'i bung ba rnams kyis mdzes par byas la/_
[\[92b.2\]]rma bya dang khu byug sgra 'byin to/_/bya de dag kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi sgro gshog dang ldan la/_sgra snyan cing 'jebs par 'byin pa yin te/_tshal de na shin tu nyams dga' bar yang bdag nyid kyis mthong nas shin tu bde bar gyur to/_/de na bya 'di lta bu dag yod de bkra ba dang 
[\[92b.3\]]sgro gshog bkra ba dang /_lha rnams kyi snying la 'dod pa skyed pa gang yin pa de dag des sgra 'byin par byed de/_de thos nas lha rnams kyang ngo mtshar cher skyes la/_'di ltar bya 'di dag ni lha dang 'thun par mthong ste/_gang bdag cag gi yid la 'dod pa de dag bya de rnams sgra 
[\[92b.4\]]'byin par byed do snyam mo/_/bya chu zhim gnas zhes bya ba de dag gi kha nas chang ro dang dri'i ngo bo gtsang ba phun sum tshogs pa 'byung ngo /_/kha nas byung ba'i chang de la yang bya gzhan rnams 'thung bar byed de/_de 'thungs nas bya de dag bcu 'gyur du myos shing yid rab tu dga' 
[\[92b.5\]]nas brgya 'gyur du sgra 'byin par byed do/_/lha de dag gi nang na glu dbyangs phan tshun 'dres pa brgya 'gyur du snyan pa yin te/_bya de dag gi sgra dang /_lha mo de dag gi glu dbyangs thos nas 'dod pa la chags pa'i lha yid shin tu bde ba rnams brgya 'gyur du dga' ba skye zhing 
[\[92b.6\]]de dag gi glu dbyangs dang sgra la chags par byed do/_/bya mchu sgyur 'gro zhes bya ba gang dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba sgra 'khrol ba'i gsab gseb na dga' bar byed pa la 'di ltar ci 'di na bya'i sgra 'byin nam/_ci dril bu g.yer ka'i sgra 'byin ces gsal bar mi mngon 
[\[92b.7\]]pa de ltar de dag dang lhan cig sgra 'byin te/_phan tshun 'dres pa nyis 'gyur du yang snyan pa yin no/_/bya 'gram gyi mtha' na spyod pa zhes bya ba gang chang rtag tu chu bo ltar 'bab pa'i 'gram dang gser gyi pad ma'i bar bar dag na gnas so/_/bya grib ma'i nang na rgyu ba 
[\[93a\]]
[\[93a.1\]]zhes bya ba gang ji tsam du sred pa'i rnam pa dang 'dres na gzugs kyi rnam pa de tsam 'gyur te/_rnam pa de srid du gnas so/_/bya chags pa zhes bya ba gang gal te lha shin tu nyams dga' ba rnams dang nye bar lha mo de dag gnas na brgya 'gyur du mdzes te tshal 
[\[93a.2\]]dang /_nags tshal du ma rnams kyi nang na yang rtag tu bde bar gnas pa dag dga' bar byed do/_/yid la bsams pa gang yin pa de dang de dag nyid 'grub par 'gyur te/_shin tu rgya che bar gyur cing /_dga' ba dang /_sdug pa dang /_yid du 'ong ba skye'o/_/lha mo'i 
[\[93a.3\]]tshogs du mas yongs su bskor ba'i lha de tshal dang /_nye ba'i tshal de rnams kyi nang na dga' bar byed de/_gser dang /_dngul dang /_bai DUr+ya'i ri'i rtse mo gzhan dang /_gzhan dag la bai DUr+ya'i pad ma'i rdzing gis yongs su bskor cing /_bya ngang pa dang /_kA raN+Da bas 
[\[93a.4\]]kyang bskor ba/_bai DUr+ya sngon po lta bu'i chu shin tu dri zhim pas gang ba/_chang du ma 'byung ba/_bai DUr+ya dang /_gser dang /_dngul gyi shing ljon pa shin tu dri zhim pa rnam pa du mas gtibs pa/_kun nas ri 'di lta bu kun yod de/_bsams na sna tshogs 'byung dang /_sa 
[\[93a.5\]]stengs yangs dang /_sa phyogs mtho dma' dang /_gzhi mnyam stengs dga' ste/_de rnams su lha mo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba'i lha thams cad nam mkha' las 'gro zhing 'bab la/_kun nas dga' bar byed cing dga' dgur spyod par byed do/_/gzugs 
[\[93a.6\]]sdug pa 'bum phrag du ma dag la lta bar byed de/_sgra snyan pa 'jebs pa yid du 'ong ba 'bum phrag du ma la nyan par byed do/_/dri zhim pa bro che ba yid du 'ong ba 'bum phrag du ma dag la snom par byed do/_/de bzhin du reg pas reg par bya ba dag la reg par byed do/_/
[\[93a.7\]]de ltar dbang po thams cad yul la myong bar byed de/_rang gis byas pa de ji srid du 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba'i las de zad par ma gyur pa de srid du gnas de dag na dga' bar byed do/_/de phyis lha'i 'jig rten de nas 'chi bar 'gyur te/_shi nas kyang las nye bar 
[\[93b\]]
[\[93b.1\]]'gro ba ji lta ba bzhin sems can dmyal ba dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_dud 'gro'i nang du 'khor bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyis mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mi'i nang du skyes na/_de las de dang rgyu 'thun par rtag par 
[\[93b.2\]]rgyun du bde ba dang ldan zhing kun dga'i ra bar bde bar gnas pa dang /_rgyal po byams pa dang skye bo thams cad la sdug par 'gyur ba mthong ngo /_/de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de/_lha pi bang can gsum pa'i gnas la rtog par byed de/_des thos 
[\[93b.3\]]pa las byung ba'i shes pas lha rnams kyi gnas skyor chus skyes zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo /_/der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/_legs par byas pa'i las kyi mtha' spyad pa/_sems 
[\[93b.4\]]pas yongs su bsgoms pa'i snying dang /_snying rjes brlan pa'i sems dang ldan pa gang gis sems can 'chi bar 'gyur ba skom gyis gdungs te/_mgul sgra ngar ngar por bgags shing srog [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]yod pa la skom blud dam/_de bzhin du gang gis de'i srog bde bar 'gyur 
[\[93b.5\]]bar bya ba'i phyir sman dag byin na de lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten pi bang can gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nang skyor chus skyes pa'i gnas su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/der skyes nas kyang de lha'i dbang po'i lus dang mtshungs shing lha mo'i tshogs kyis kun nas 
[\[93b.6\]]bskor te/_bde ba rgyun mi 'chad la rtag tu gnas pa yin no/_/de ltar rang gi las la spyod pa de tshal du ma dang /_chu bo dang /_'bab chu du ma dag kyang rab tu mthong ste/_de res 'ga' lha mo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor nas/_tshal phreng zhes bya ba der 'dong bar byed do/_/
[\[93b.7\]]tshal de yang chu bo dang /_lteng ka dang /_pad ma'i tshal du ma dag gis brgyan cing lha'i rol mo'i sgra dag gis mdzes par byas la lha dang lha mo'i tshogs rab tu dga' ba rnams kyis gang ba yin no/_/tshal de na shing ljon pa me tog dang 'bras bu du mas brgyan pa/_lha'i rol mo'i 
[\[94a\]]
[\[94a.1\]]sgra 'byin pa/_bya'i sgra ca co snyan pa 'byin pa yin no/_/tshal de ni rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing ljon pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor ba yin te/_'di lta ste/_rtag tu dga' ba dang /_yang dag par dga' bar byed pa'i me tog man dA ra ba dang /_pad 
[\[94a.2\]]ma dang /_dri ji ltar dga' ba rnams kyis bskor ba yin no/_/me tog de dag gi dri'i mthu ni 'di lta bu yin te/_lha rnams dri ji lta ji ltar 'dod pa de lta de ltar me tog de dag las 'byung la/_me tog gcig gis me tog de thams cad kyi dri'i bya ba byed do/_/tshal phreng ba 
[\[94a.3\]]de nyid na lha rab tu dga' zhing bro gar byed pa phan tshun grogs su gyur pa rnams tshal me tog lnga pa zhes bya bar 'dong bar byed do/_/de na yang bya dus su dran par byed pa zhes bya ba yod de/_des lha de dag mthong nas 'di ltar tshig 'brel ba'i tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_bsod nams 
[\[94a.4\]]dag ni nyams dga' la/_/de dag 'bras bu mchog tu dge/_/bsod nams lta bur sgrol ba med/_/de lta bas na bsod nams byos/_/bsod nams gnyen gyi mchog yin te/_/bsod nams gter ni zad mi shes/_/bsod nams mar me lta bu yin/_/de bzhin pha dang 
[\[94a.5\]]ma dang mtshungs/_/bsod nams byas na 'gro ba'i lha/_/bsod nams kyis ni bzang 'gror 'khrid/_/mi yul bsod nams byas pa ni/_/de dag lha yul dga' bar byed/_/'di ltar bsod nams che ba'i mi/_/rtag tu bde dang ldan par 'gyur/_/bsod nams lta bu'i 
[\[94a.6\]]bde ba med/_/de lta bas na bsod nams kyis/_/'jig rten gnyis la phan byed cing /_/dga' dang nor gyi rgyur gyur pa/_/bsod nams yin par rtag tu mthong /_/de ltar bsod nams bde mchog ldan/_/rtag tu bsod nams rjes 'brang ste/_/de ni grib ma bzhin du 'brang /_/
[\[94a.7\]]de bas bsod nams bde mchog ste/_/bsod nams lta bu'i bde ba med/_/bsod nams zad pa'i lha rnams ni/_/rang gis byas pa'i rjes su ltung /_/'jig rten dge dang mi dge'i 'bras/_/de bas bsod nams yang dag spyod/_/lha yi yul du bdag cag gang /_/dud 'gro'i 
[\[94b\]]
[\[94b.1\]]skye gnas 'thun par gnas/_/bsod nams ma yin rgyur gyur pa/_/rang gis byas pas sems rmongs so/_/gang zhig bsod nams dman pa ni/_/gdul dka' rtag tu ngan 'gror 'gro/_/bye ma la ni mar med ltar/_/de la bde ba ga la yod/_/sems kyis bslus 
[\[94b.2\]]pa'i rmongs pa rnams/_/bsod nams kyis ni yongs su spangs/_/de dag la ni bde med cing /_/de dag sdug bsngal mtha' med do/_/yang dang yang du skye 'gyur zhing /_/yang dang yang du 'chi 'gyur ba/_/lha dag bde bas myos pa gang /_/de dag la ni bde rtag med/_/las 
[\[94b.3\]]kyis rgyar ni bcug gyur cing /_/gti mug gis ni bslus pa rnams/_/'khor ba thog ma med pa nas/_/'khrul 'khor bzhin du 'khyam par byed/_/lha dag lha yi 'jig rten nas/_/'chi bar 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal gang /_/de ni dmyal las dmyal ba ru/_/de yi 
[\[94b.4\]]dpe byar yod med do/_/bde mtha' rtag tu ltung bar go/_/'di dag ci zhig mi shes sam/_/lha rnams 'chi med yul lta bur/_/bde bas rmongs rnams lta bar byed/_/skye dang 'chi ba'i 'jig rten ni/_/grangs su bgrang du yod med kyang /_/sred pas yongs su 
[\[94b.5\]]bslus pa yi/_/mi rnams yid ni 'byung mi byed/_/de nas lha de rnams lha'i bya de'i sgra de thos nas/[ {]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]cig yid la byed pa dang /_yang bag med pa de nyid kyi dbang du gyur te/_sred pas srid par spyod pa de dag thams cad ni sems la rtag tu rag las pa yin no/_/
[\[94b.6\]]phreng ba'i tshal de na bde ba las bde bar gnas pa de dag sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pas bro gar byed/_dgod par byed do/_/yul bud shing lta bur gyur pa la/_bag med pa me lta bus rgyun mi 'chad par sreg pa na yul nas yul dang /_nye ba'i tshal nas nye ba'i tshal 
[\[94b.7\]]dang /_ri'i steng nas ri'i steng dang /_gzhal med khang nas gzhal med khang dang /_pad ma'i tshal nas pad ma'i tshal dang /_rin po che'i ri'i rtse mo nas rin po che'i ri'i rtse mor rgyu ste/_de ltar lha mo dang lhan cig yul gyi sred pas bdas pas na/_lha de rnams ji srid 
[\[95a\]]
[\[95a.1\]]du 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba'i las de zad par ma gyur pa de srid du lha'i 'jig rten de na dga' bar byed do/_/de zad nas de nas yang ltung bar 'gyur te/_lhung nas kyang las nye bar 'gro ba ji lta ba bzhin sems can dmyal ba dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_
[\[95a.2\]]dud 'gro'i 'khor bar yongs su 'khyam mo/_/gal te mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mi'i nang du skyes na de las de dang rgyu 'thun par tshe rabs tshe rabs su nad med par 'gyur zhing nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_skye bo dam pa kun gyi yid du 'ong ba dang /_bkres pa dang /_
[\[95a.3\]]skom pa dang bral ba'i yul bzang por skye ba dang /_me tog gis brgyan par 'gyur ba mthong ngo /_/de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de/_lha pi bang can gsum pa rnams kyi gnas la rtog par byed de/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas 
[\[95a.4\]]lha pi bang can gsum pa rnams kyi gnas lus dkar zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo /_/der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/_zhing dang zhing ma yin pa'i rnam pa shes shing yid shin tu 
[\[95a.5\]]dad pa dang /_sems pas yongs su bsgoms pa'i snying dang ldan pa dang /_der yid zhugs shing sems g.yeng ba med pa las kyi 'bras bu mngon par shes pa gang gis mchod rten nam/_dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang gi skyong nul rlung ngam/_nyi ma'am/_char pas zad pa slar skyong 
[\[95a.6\]]nul byugs la/_de ltar byas nas de rjes su dga' zhing gzhan dag kyang de nyid la dga' bar byed du 'jug la/_lugs bzhin du byed du 'jug ste de ltar byed na de lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten lus dkar gyi lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/der skyes nas kyang de dag thams cad dkar po kho 
[\[95a.7\]]nar snang ste/_de'i khyad par ni dung dang /_kha ba dang /_me tog ku mu da dang /_'o ma dang bcas pa dag gis ni bcu drug gi char yang mi phod do/_/de ltar rnam pa de lta bu'i gzhal med khang dang /_shing rta dang gnas dag dang gzhan dag kyang kun nas dkar zhing mchog tu dkar por 
[\[95b\]]
[\[95b.1\]]snang bar 'gyur te/_'di ltar lus kyang mchog tu dkar ba nyid du 'gyur ro/_/dga' bar byed pa'i ngang tshul can de dag skyed mos tshal du dga' ston byed du 'dong ste/_'di ltar byi ru'i tshal zhes bya ba gnas de dag tu sil snyan dang glu dbyangs sna tshogs kyi sgra 'byin cing dgod 
[\[95b.2\]]pa dang /_shin tu yid dga' ba'i grogs po rnams dang lhan cig tshal der 'dong bar byed do/_/de ltar de dag byi ru'i tshal gyi nang du 'dong ste/_gang gi tshe zhugs pa dang bya sna tshogs sgra 'byin cing gser btso ma'i shing ljon pas mdzes pa yin no/_/shing ljon pa'i nye ba'i tshal 
[\[95b.3\]]gyis mdzes par byas pa'i byi ru'i tshal de'i mthu ni 'di lta bu yin te/_ji ltar kha dog dmar po gzhan dang mi 'thun par 'byung ba de ltar shing ljon pa'i 'od dmar po rnam pa de lta bu 'byung ngo /_/lha de dag thams cad tshal de'i mthus dkar po de rnams dang bral nas kha dog 
[\[95b.4\]]shin tu dmar por gyur pa dang /_phan tshun gtam du bdag cag gi lus lhan cig skyes pa'i mdzes pa gang yin pa de dag tshal gyi kha dog gi mthus mi snang bar gyur to/_/shing ljon pa de dag kun nas kha dog dmar po kho na yin te/_bdag cag ni tshal gzhan du 'dong bar 
[\[95b.5\]]bya'o zhes brjod do/_/de nas lha de rnams lha mo de dag dang lhan cig bai DUr+ya'i tshal ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do/_/tshal de yang bai DUr+ya'i mdog des ji ltar 'dzam bu'i gling gi gnam ltar kun nas sngo ba yin no/_/de nas lha rnams tshal der yang kha dog dkar po gang yin pa de dag 
[\[95b.6\]]bai DUr+ya'i shing ljon pa'i dbyibs de rnams kyis kyang zil gyis mnan te/_shing de rnams la bya gnas pa gang yin pa de dag kyang kha dog sngon por gyur la/_pad ma gang yin pa de dag kyang sngon por gyur te/_de ltar bai DUr+ya'i tshal de dag thams cad sngon po nyid yin no/_/de nas 
[\[95b.7\]]lus dkar ba lha mo'i tshogs mang pos yongs su bskor ba lha'i rol mo'i sgra dang /_dri dang glu dbyangs dang bcas pa rnams tshal de na yun ring du dga' bar byed/_rtse bar byed/_dga' dgur spyod par byed cing /_lha'i bde ba 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga myong bar byed do/_/de nas 
[\[96a\]]
[\[96a.1\]]yun ring zhig lon nas lha lus dkar po rnams rtse ba'i don du dngul gyi shing ljon pa'i tshal du 'dong bar byed do/_/dngul gyi tshal de ni kun nas kha dog dkar por snang zhing tshal de na gang ci yod pa de thams cad dkar ba yin la/_tshal de na pad ma yang 
[\[96a.2\]]dngul gyi pad ma shin tu nyams dga' ba yin no/_/bya rnams kyang dngul gyi bya yin te/_de ltar lha lus dkar po dang ldan pa de dag thams cad tshal de'i nang du zhugs pa ji ltar 'o ma'i nang na zla ba'i gzugs brnyan snang ba de ltar mdzes pa yin no/_/tshal de na lha rnams 
[\[96a.3\]]yun ring du dga' bar byed/_dga' dgur spyod par byed cing lha'i dpe med pa 'dod pa'i bde ba yan lag lnga dang ldan pas bde ba myong bar byed do/_/de dag der yang dga' bar byas nas tshal sna tshogs ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do/_/tshal de yang shing ljon pa sna tshogs kyis 
[\[96a.4\]]mdzes par byas shing gser gyi shing ljon pa rnams kyis kyang mdzes par byas pa yin te/_/de bzhin du dngul gyi shing ljon pa rnams dang /_de bzhin du bai DUr+ya'i shing ljon pa rnams dang /_de bzhin du lo ma sna tshogs rnams kyis mdzes par byas pa yin no/_/shing de 
[\[96a.5\]]rnams kyang kha dog sna tshogs kyi lo ma dang /_mdog sna tshogs kyis mdzes pa yin la/_tshal de'i nang na lha de rnams de dag nyid kyis lus rnams rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan par gyur to/_/tshal de na yang lha de rnams yun ring du dga' bar byed/_dga' dgur spyod par byed de/_
[\[96a.6\]]lha mo'i tshogs kyi nang na 'khod pa rnams de dag gis glu dbyangs nye bar len cing de na yang de rnams yun ring du rtses nas kun du mthong ba'i gser gyi rig la ba der 'dong bar byed do/_/de yang rin po che sna bdun gyis brgyan pa yin te/_lha de dag gis ri kun tu mthong /_chu bo 
[\[96a.7\]]dang /_'bab chu dang /_lteng ka mang pos brgyan pa/_tshal dang /_nags tshal dang ldan pa/_pad ma'i rdzing bu du mas 'khor ba/_bya'i tshogs mang po'i sgra 'byin pa'i ri bo de la 'dzegs nas ri'i rgyal po ri rab drug khris bskor ba de rnams kyi dbus na ri'i rgyal po ri rab 
[\[96b\]]
[\[96b.1\]]'dug pa de dag thams cad mthong ngo /_/de nas lha lus dkar po rnams kun nas mthong ba'i ri bo de la lha mo dang lhan cig yun ring du rtse bar byed/_dga' dgur spyod par byed do/_/de nas yang de rnams de las babs nas ri bo phyogs gtsang ma zhes bya ba ga la ba der 'dzeg par 
[\[96b.2\]]byed de/_ri bo de la yang gnas gzhan dag nas skyes pa'i lha rnams dga' ba'i mthus ri bo de la 'ongs nas dga' bar byed do/_/lha gzhan de rnams dang lha lus dkar po de rnams dang yang phan tshun lhan cig sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pas dga' bar byed cing dga' dgur 
[\[96b.3\]]spyod par byed do/_/de nas lha yul gyi phyogs cha dga' ba de rnams su lha de dag yun ring du dga' bar byas nas/_mar zad nas mar me 'chi bar 'gyur zhing nyin par gyi mtha' zad na nyi ma nub par 'gyur ba de ltar lha de rnams legs par byas pa'i las zad nas mar me ltar lha'i 
[\[96b.4\]]'jig rten de nas 'chi bar 'gyur te/_shi nas kyang las nye bar 'gro ba ji lta ba bzhin sems can dmyal ba dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_dud 'gro'i nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mi'i nang du skyes na/_de las de dang rgyu 'thun par pad ma'i 
[\[96b.5\]]rtsa lag lta bur mdog dkar sham bzang por 'gyur zhing stod phyogs sam rgya yul la sogs par skye bar 'gyur la/_rtag tu bde ba dang ldan pa dang /_mi'i gtso bo chen po'i yid gcugs par 'gyur ba mthong ngo /_/de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de 
[\[96b.6\]]lha pi bang can gsum pa rnams kyi gnas su rtog par byed de/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/_lha'i 'jig rten na lha phan tshun dga' ba zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo /_/gnas der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas des thos 
[\[96b.7\]]pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/_sems can dge ba phan tshun grogs su gyur pa/_sems pa dang tshul khrims dang ldan pa/_grol ba'i dge 'dun gyi gtso bor gyur pa gang dag gis sbyin pa byin/_tshul khrims bsrungs na de dag thams cad rgyu de dang rkyen de las 
[\[97a\]]
[\[97a.1\]]lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten phan tshun dga' ba'i lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/der skyes nas kyang phan tshun bde ba skyed cing sems 'thun par bskyed pa de rnams bsod nams kyi tshogs de smin par 'gyur ro/_/de na lha'i 
[\[97a.2\]]pad ma'i rdzing na gnas shing kha zas la dga' ba de yul nyams dga' zhing bde ba dag myong bar byed de/_sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pas yid rab tu dga' ba dag dgod par byed/_dga' bar byed/_rtse bar byed/_dga' dgur spyod par byed la/_lha mo'i tshogs 
[\[97a.3\]]gzugs dang cha byad sna tshogs dang ldan pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor nas gser dang rin po che sna tshogs kyis gzhi dang /_ri de rnams la dga' bar byed do/_/de ltar rang gi las kyi 'bras bu la spyod cing dga' ba de rnams su chu bo'i 'gram bai DUr+ya dang /_nor 
[\[97a.4\]]bu'i lan kan bres pa dang /_gser gyi rnam pa'i bya ngang pa dang /_ngur pa rnams kyis mdzes par byas pa/_'gram na shing ljon pa skyes pa rnams kyi sdug gur brgyan pa'i sman ljongs dag na lha mo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba rnams dga' bar byed do/_/der de dag 
[\[97a.5\]]dga' bar byas nas mu tig 'bab par byed pa zhes bya ba'i chu bo ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do/_/chu bo de dag na chu gang yin pa de dag ni chang ro rnam pa du ma dang ldan pa rnyog pa med pa 'bab bo/_/bye ma gang yin pa de dag ni mu tig yin la/_'dam rdzab gang yin pa de dag 
[\[97a.6\]]ni gser yin te/_chu bo de nor bu kha dog bzang po du mas brgyan pa nya rnams kyis shin tu mdzes pa yin no/_/de'i ngos gnyi ga na gser gyi shing ljon pa rnams la 'dab ma ni bai DUr+ya/_bai DUr+ya'i shing ljon pa rnams la gser gyi 'dab ma yod de/_'dab ma yod pa de dag 
[\[97a.7\]]thams cad la dus tshigs thams cad kyi 'bras bu dang me tog bzang dgus khebs pa yin no/_/bya'i tshogs rtag par rab tu dga' ba rnams kyis kun du gang la thos na yid 'phrog pa'i sgra 'byin pa yin te/_bya'i tshogs mthong na dga' ba rnam pa de lta bu dag dang /_rtag tu kun 
[\[97b\]]
[\[97b.1\]]nas dga' ba'i lha de rnams dang /_lhan cig byed pa lta bur dus thams cad du dga' bar byed do/_/der de rnams kyis yang dag par dga' bar byas nas phyogs gzhan snyan pa spyod pa zhes bya ba ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do/_/phyogs de na lcug mas g.yogs pa'i khyim yod de/_rin po 
[\[97b.2\]]che ma rgad kyi dum bu ring po skyon med pas phye ba/_sa phyogs kyi rim pa mtho dma' dang ldan zhing pad ma'i tshal gyis brgyan pa/_sa phyogs shin tu rnam par phye ba rin po che sna tshogs kyi bya rnams kyis mdzes par byas pa/_la la dag na yang gser gyi sa gzhi'i phyogs nyams dga' 
[\[97b.3\]]bar bai DUr+ya'i lcug ma'i dra bas gtibs pa/_bung ba dang me tog gis kun tu gang ba/_lha dang lha mo'i tshogs rtag tu dga' ya ya ste/_rab tu dga' ba rnams kyis kun du gang ba/_legs par byas pa'i las la spyod pa'i lha de rnams kun du dga' bar byed do/_/de nas 
[\[97b.4\]]kyang phyogs gzhan zhig na/_chu dang /_lteng ka dang /_tshal dang /_'bab stegs mang po yod par 'dong bar byed do/_/'bab stegs dang /_tshal de dag na chu na rgyu ba'i bya mdog bzang po gang yin pa de rnams kyis nam mkha'i phyogs de dag thams cad bar mtshams med 
[\[97b.5\]]par kun du bkang nas sgra 'byin to/_/chang chu bo ltar 'bab pa rnyog pa med pa rnam pa du ma dag 'bab ste/_gser gyi rdo las dba' rlabs kyi sgra 'byung zhing dbu ba 'khrugs pa'i sgra khro lo lo 'byung la/_bya rab tu dga' ba'i sgra 'byin pa long long po rnams dang chu bo de rnams kyi 
[\[97b.6\]]ngos gnyi ga na 'khod pa'i lha mo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba rnams dang dga' bar byed rtse bar byed do/_/lag na gser gyi pad ma thogs pa rnams phan tshun rdeg pa na de ltar phan tshun yid gcugs pa lhan cig rtse ba de rnams kyis dus ring du 'das so//_//
[\[97b.7\]]'phags pa dam pa'i chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa/_bam po nyer dgu pa/_phyogs de nas kyang myos byed tshal zhes bya ba der lha thams cad rtse ba'i grogs dang lhan cig 'dong bar byed do/_/tshal de na sems kyi rnam pa thams cad myos byed kyis mun par gyur te/_bya de dag ni 
[\[98a\]]
[\[98a.1\]]'bras bu'i ro rnams kyis myos/_bai DUr+ya'i bung ba dag ni me tog gi ro rnams kyis myos/_khu byug dag ni dpyid mthong nas myos/_'gram na rgyu ba'i bya dag ni chang gi ro rnams kyis myos/_de bzhin du lha rnams ni lha'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams kyis myos/_de bzhin du 
[\[98a.2\]]lha mo rnams kyang lha'i tshogs dang lhan cig 'dod pa'i ros myos te/_de ltar 'dod pa'i ros myos pa'i bud med rnams ni gzhan gyis myos par mi 'gyur gyi/_'di ltar bud med thams cad ni 'dod pa lhur len pa yin la/_de la sems zhugs/_de la gzhol/_de la gnas/_de'i rang bzhin 
[\[98a.3\]]yin no/_/lha de dag kyang myos byed mthong nas brgya 'gyur du myos pa rnams de na dga' bar byed do/_/de ltar lha de rnams ji srid du 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba'i las zad par ma gyur pa de srid du de na dga' bar byed do/_/de las de zad nas lha'i ris de nas kyang 'chi bar 'gyur te/_
[\[98a.4\]]shi nas kyang las nye bar 'gro ba ji lta ba bzhin sems can dmyal ba dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_dud 'gro'i nang du 'khor bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mi'i nang du skyes na/_bsod nams gcig pa de dag thams cad yul dang ljongs dang grong khyer gcig tu skye 
[\[98a.5\]]bar 'gyur zhing thams cad 'byor pa phun sum tshogs pa dang /_thams cad rigs che zhing btsun par skye ba dang /_thams cad phan tshun dga' zhing bya ba gcig pa dang /_dge ba'i nang du skye bar 'gyur ba mthong ste de dag las de dang rgyu 'thun par dge ba'am mi dge ba gang yin pa de dag 
[\[98a.6\]]thams cad kun la 'byung gi so so la ni ma yin no/_/de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de/_lha pi bang can gsum pa'i gnas la rtog par byed de/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas/_lha pi bang can gsum pa rnams kyi gnas yang dag chags 
[\[98a.7\]]spyod ces bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo /_/der sems can dag las gang gis ka skye bar 'gyur snyam nas/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/_zhal ta pa tshul khrims dang ldan par gyur pa gang gis khyim pa gzhan dag dga' bar byas/_gzengs bstod mgu bar byas/_
[\[98b\]]
[\[98b.1\]]dad par byas nas sems yongs su bsgoms pa de/_zhing yon tan dang ldan pa la sbyin pa sbyin du bcug cing tshul khrims kyang srung du bcug na/_de lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten yang dag chags spyod kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/der skyes nas kyang 
[\[98b.2\]]rang gi mthu 'di lta bu 'byung bar 'gyur te/_las gang gis bdag cag 'dir skyes zhig gu snyam nas/_de dag mir skyes pa yang dag par dran no/_/'di ni mi'i 'jig rten na bdag gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen du gyur pa yin te/_'di'i sbyin bdag ni bdag yin no/_/rgyu de dang 
[\[98b.3\]]rkyen de dang gzhi des de dang bdag bsod nams 'thun par gyur nas/_'dir 'ongs pa lta zhig gu snyam mo/_/de bzhin du dge ba'i bshes gnyen nyan thos de yang skye ba dran te/_'di ltar 'di ni bdag gi sems dang bas sbyin pa sbyin du bcug pa yin te/_rgyu de dang rkyen de dang gzhi 
[\[98b.4\]]des de nas bdag lha'i 'jig rten 'dir sems dang ldan par skyes pa lta snyam nas/_de ltar yang dag chags spyod kyi lha rnams kyi gnas su skyes so/_/de nas gzhan du gyur te/_pad ma'i tshogs lta bu'i lha mo mang po byad gzugs dang mdog dang lang tsho dang sdug pa so so du 
[\[98b.5\]]mas brgyan pa mthong ngo /_/lha mo de dag mthong nas lha de rnams kyis mthong ma thag tu ji ltar tshe rabs snga ma la byas pa shin tu phra mo yang mi dran zhing yul la sems rnam par chags pa/_bag med pa'i gnas su skyes pa/_yul gyi bde bas sems phrogs pa de ltar 'dod 
[\[98b.6\]]pa rnams kyis 'phangs pa'i yid skye bar byed do/_/de nas yang dag chags spyod kyi lha rnams kyis/_lha mo'i tshogs 'bum phrag du ma byad gzugs dpe med pa dang ldan pa de dag mthong nas/_thog ma med pa'i dus nas zhugs pa'i 'dod chags kyi mes yid rab tu bsregs 
[\[98b.7\]]pa ni/_ji ltar mes bud shing skam po yun ring du sreg par byed pa de ltar lha de rnams kyi yid de dag rab tu sreg par byed do/_/lha mo de dag ga la ba der 'gro bar byed la lha mo rtag tu 'dod pa la don gcig tu byed pa yang kha rlangs dri zhim pos nam mkha' 'gengs shing lha'i cha byad 
[\[99a\]]
[\[99a.1\]]du ma thogs la lag na pad ma khyer te/_lha ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do/_/de nas lha de rnams dang lha mo de rnams lha'i 'dod pa bde ba rnam pa du ma de dag myong bar byed do/_/de nas bag med pa de lta bur rig nas dge slong de 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal nyam nga ba du ma las yid 
[\[99a.2\]]byung nas 'di ltar tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_nyin mo gsar du byung ba yis/_/rnying pa med par byed pa ltar/_/bde dang sdug bsngal sar pa yis/_/rnying pa nye bar rjed par byed/_/de ltar lha yi 'jig rten du/_/bde ba 'dzin pa'i skye bo dag_/'tsho ba'i mtha' ni 'chi ba dang /_/ji ste 
[\[99a.3\]]'bral ba'i mtha' mi rig_/ji ltar shing dang sbrang rtsir bsres/_/ji ltar dug dang zas bsres pa/_/de ltar bde ba 'di kun gyi/_/mtha' mi bde ba ma rig go/_/lha yul du ni lhag par yang /_/yul rnams lta la ga la ngoms/_/sred pas ngoms pa med pa de/_/khyad par 
[\[99a.4\]]du yang ga la bde/_/shin tu bde ba'i stobs las ni/_/lha yul rnams su ye nas sred/_/sred mes yongs su gdung rnams kyi/_/bde ba nye bar ma dmigs so/_/gcig tu bde spyod sred bral zhing /_/nga med re ba med pa dang /_/mya ngan 'das grong 'gro ba ni/_/bde gang 
[\[99a.5\]]yin pa de 'thob bo/_/gang dag sred pa'i bag la nyal/_/yang ye sems la mi 'jog pa/_/de dag thog mtha'i dri ma bral/_/bde ba'i nang na'ang de bde'o/_/sems ni shin tu bsdus pa dang /_/thams cad du ni re med dang /_/bya dang mi bya ma rmongs pa/_bde ba rtag tu nye bar 
[\[99a.6\]]gnas/_/gang gis 'khor ba'i rgyur gyur pa/_/dga' bcas 'byung ba bcom pa dag_/brtan po gtso de pha rol 'gro/_/bde ldan mya ngan 'das la gnas/_/gang zhig 'dod chags zhe sdang ldan/_/sred bcas de la bde ba med/_/gang zhig 'dod chags me las grol/_/
[\[99a.7\]]de ni dri med bde bar 'dod/_/de ltar dge slong des bag med pa la gnas pa'i lha de rnams nyin gcig bzhin du sred pa'i me rab tu 'phel bar byed pa'i bag med pa rnams mthong nas snying rje bar byed do/_/de nas lha de rnams kyang lha mo'i tshogs dang lhan cig tu tshal du bas 'khrigs 
[\[99b\]]
[\[99b.1\]]pa zhes bya ba ga la ba der lha mo'i tshogs g.yer ba rol mo dang /_glu dbyangs dang /_gad mo sna tshogs 'don pas yongs su bskor ba bde bar gnas pa rnams skyed mos tshal du dga' spyod byed du dong ste/_kha cig ni lha mo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor nas nam mkha' la bya bzhin 
[\[99b.2\]]du 'gro/_kha cig ni gzhal med khang bya ngang pas bteg pa rnams kyis 'gro/_kha cig ni grogs dang ldan pa'i gzhal med khang rnams kyis 'gro/_kha cig ni lha mo'i tshogs de dag nyid kyis bskor nas rkang pas 'gro ste/_bde bar gnas pa de rnams glu dbyangs len zhing lus ngal ba med 
[\[99b.3\]]pa de thams cad tshal du bas 'khrigs pa zhes bya ba ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do/_/de nas tshal de na lha gzhan sngar 'ongs pa gang yin pa de rnams kyis lha gzhan de dag mthong nas de nas yang rab tu dga' ste/_yid shin tu mgu bar gyur to/_/de nas lha gsar du 'ongs pa rnams dang /_
[\[99b.4\]]lha rnying pa rnams phan tshun 'dres nas ca co dang rol mo'i sgra skyes te/_rab tu dga' zhing nyams dga' ba skyes so/_/du bas 'khrigs pa'i tshal de kun sgra rnam pa du mas kun du gang ste/_'di lta ste/_gling bu'i sgra dang /_pi bang gi sgra dang /_rdza rnga'i sgra dang /_khar rnga'i sgra dang /_lha mo rgyan 
[\[99b.5\]]gyis brgyan pa'i sgra dang /_de bzhin du de na glu dbyangs dang dgod pa'i sgra dang /_chu bo dang /_mtsho dang /_chu mang po rnam pa sna tshogs 'bab pa'i sgra dang /_rin po che'i bya kha dog dang /_dbyibs rnam pa sna tshogs su 'dug pa'i sgra dang /_lha rnams kyi glu dbyangs kyi sgra thos na snyan pa dag ste/_
[\[99b.6\]]de ltar tshal de sgra snyan pa kun gyis gang ba yin no/_/tshal de na lha'i sman dang /_bya dang /_klung dang /_lteng ka dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa dang /_lha'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga 'byor pa dag gis lha rnams skyed mos tshal gyi dga' spyod byas nas bde ba nyams su 
[\[99b.7\]]myong ngo /_/de rnams tshal de nas byung nas yang lhun po so sor snang ba zhes bya ba'i ri'i rtse mo ga la ba der lha mo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor nas 'dong bar byed de/_lha de rnams der 'dong ba na so sor snang ba'i ri'i rtse mo der lhags so/_/lha'i pad ma'i rdzing dang lteng ka dang nye ba'i tshal 
[\[100a\]]
[\[100a.1\]]phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa'i lhun po so sor snang ba'i ri'i rtse mo de na rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po lha mo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba gnas te/_'jig rten thams cad kyi don sgrub cing mi'i 'jig rten na chos dang chos kyis bskyed pa'i mi chos dang ldan pa 
[\[100a.2\]]ni ji tsam zhig yod/_chos dang mi ldan pa ni ji tsam zhig yod/_'jig rten la phan par sgrub pa ni ji tsam zhig yod/_phan par mi sgrub pa ni ji tsam zhig yod/_dam pa'i chos kyi mthu che'am chos ma yin pa mthu che/_bdud kyi phyogs lha ma yin brtan pa dang /_klu rab 'joms la 
[\[100a.3\]]sogs pa mthu che'am mi che zhes rtog par byed de/_de ltar skye dgu rnams skyong ba de ri kun snang de la gnas so/_/ri'i rtse mo de dang ha cang mi nye ba ri rab kyi ngos la nyi ma 'khor bar byed de/_de'i 'od la rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po de chos dang ldan pa'i chos kyi bye brag gis 
[\[100a.4\]]mi'i 'jig rten du nyi ma'i 'od ji ltar gtong zhig gu zhes dpyod par byed do/_/nyi ma 'khor ba'i gzhi la mkhas pa de nyi ma la rtog par byed de/_gal te chos dang ldan pa'i mi chos rjes su skyong ba byung ba de'i tshe/_de bzhin du nyi ma chos kyis yongs su rgyas pa yin te/_de ltar mdog 
[\[100a.5\]]gsal ba nyid dang /_dus dang 'thun par lhan ner 'char la/_de las mi rnams kyi lus la ni nad mi 'byung zhing 'bru rnams la yang nad mi 'byung ngo /_/gal te chos dang mi ldan pa'i chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa byung na/_de'i tshe nyi ma'i 'od chos ma yin pa dang 'thun par lhan ner mi 
[\[100a.6\]]'char te/_de las chos ma yin pa'i mthu des 'bru rnams mi skye zhing nyams par 'gyur ro/_/de ltar 'di dag thams cad ni chos dang chos ma yin pa byas pa'i dbang gi 'bras bu yin te/_rgyu med pa las ni ma byung ngo /_/ri de yang nyi ma'i 'od dang 'thun pas so sor snang ba zhes ming 
[\[100a.7\]]du btags te/_rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po de la gnas nas 'jig rten la rtog par byed do/_/yang dag chags spyod kyi lha de rnams so sor snang ba'i ri'i rtse mor dong nas yid rab tu dga' la gsal ba de mthong nas kyang brgya 'gyur du yid rab tu dga' ba skyes so/_/
[\[100b\]]
[\[100b.1\]]'phags skyes pos 'jig rten de dag mngon par brtags shing rang gis byas pa'i las des lha dang lha mo de dag thams cad kun nas brgya 'gyur du gzi brjid 'bar bar mthong ba dang /_'jig rten skyong ba 'phags skyes po de yid rab tu dga' nas 'di ltar tshigs su bcad de 
[\[100b.2\]]smras pa/_rgyu gsum rnam gsum las byung ba/_/legs byas rnam gsum byas pas na/_/'bras bu che gsum yon tan gsum/_/gsum gnas sa ni gsum du gnas/_/khyed rnams chos la mchog tu gzhol/_/'tshe ba med pa'i sbyin mchog dang /_/bden dang bzod dang 
[\[100b.3\]]dul dang ldan/_/thams cad mtho ris gnas su lhags/_/lha yi gnas na lha gang dag_/lha yi rgyan dang lha yi phreng /_/phun sum tshogs pas brgyan pa rnams/_/dga' bar byed pa 'di dag dge/_bag med dga' ba'i skye bo gang /_/dge ba spyod par mi byed pa/_/chos 
[\[100b.4\]]la rnam par rmongs pa de/_/mtho ris dag tu ga la skye/_/legs par byas pas mi dag 'dir/_/lus can rnams ni skyes gyur te/_/las kyi rnam smin de yis na/_/lha yi yul du de dag skyes/_/gang zhig bdag nyid dga' 'gyur zhing /_/gang zhig blo gros bder 
[\[100b.5\]]gnas pa/_/lha yi yul du skye 'gyur ba/_/de ni bsod nams chen po byed/_/chung dang 'bring dang bder gnas pa/_/lha rnams kyi ni bde chen gang /_/'di ni chung dang 'bring dang che'i/_/bsod nams kyi ni 'bras bur mngon/_/lus can gang gis ji tsam du/_/bsod 
[\[100b.6\]]nams kyi ni rnam pa byas/_/rnam pa de tsam de'i bde ba/_/lha yi 'jig rten rnams su smin/_/kha de ltar 'phags skyes po des lha de dag mthong ste/_tshigs su bcad pa smras nas de dag nyid dang lhan cig 'thun par dga' bar byed de/_ri dang /_nags tshal dang /_
[\[100b.7\]]lteng ka dang /_tshal dang /_lha'i me tog dang /_'bras bur ldan pa'i sa phyogs dang /_bya sna tshogs sgra 'byin pa dang /_kun nas lha dang lha mo'i tshogs kyis gang ba dang /_ri mthong na nyams dga' ba dang /_dbang po drug bde bar byed pa rnams su/_dbang po drug don la 
[\[101a\]]
[\[101a.1\]]chags pa bag med par gnas pa'i lha de rnams sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pas kha mngon par dga' bar byed cing /_pad ma'i tshal dang /_skyed mos tshal dang /_chang chu ltar 'bab pa dang /_bai DUr+ya'i tshal dang /_lteng ka dang /_chu mig gis brgyan pa 
[\[101a.2\]]phan tshun grogs su gyur pa rnams/_ji srid du 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba legs par byas pa'i las de zad par ma gyur pa de srid du dga' bar byed do/_/de zad nas de nas yang lha'i ris de nas 'chi bar 'gyur te/_shi nas kyang las nye bar 'gro ba ji lta ba bzhin sems can 
[\[101a.3\]]dmyal ba dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_dud 'gro'i nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyis mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mi'i nang du skyes na/_de las de dang rgyu 'thun par mang du smra ba nor mang ba ded dpon chen por 'gyur ba 
[\[101a.4\]]mthong ngo /_/de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de/_lha pi bang can gsum pa rnams kyi gnas la rtog par byed de/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas/_de dag gi gnas 'khor dang spyod pa zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo /_/der 
[\[101a.5\]]sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/_tshul khrims dang ldan par gyur cing /_sems kyi rgyud sems pas bsgoms pa gang gis sbyin pa sbyin/_tshul khrims bsrungs/_chos mnyan par byas pa'i 
[\[101a.6\]]sbyin bdag de la la gnas sbyin pa po grogs su gyur pa gzhan zhig_/des snying brlan cing dge ba'i sems dang ldan pa/_dad pas sems brlan pa/_'di ltar yang sems la rtog par byed de/_sbyin bdag 'di ni bsod nams dang ldan pa zhig go/_/da bdag la yang rdzas kyi 
[\[101a.7\]]rnam pa de snyed yod na/_de ltar bdag gis kyang gzhan dag la sbyin par bya'o snyam sems na sbyin pa la sems dang ba des lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten 'khor dang spyod pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/der skyes nas kyang yul du mas snying 
[\[101b\]]
[\[101b.1\]]rab tu myos pa rnams rtag tu ldan par gyur te/_sil snyan sna tshogs sgra 'byin pa'i nye ba'i tshal dang /_bai DUr+ya dang /_nor bu'i lan kan bres pa'i rdzing rnams na gser gyi pad ma sa khebs pa dang /_bya'i tshogs kyi rnam pa sgra 'byin pa'i tshal dang /_nye ba'i tshal de rnams na/_
[\[101b.2\]]bya myos pa sgra 'byin pa nyams dga' bar byed pa dag na dga' bar byed la/_kha cig ni shing ljon pa tshang tshing dag gi nang na khu byug dang /_rma bya sgra snyan pa chags su rung ba 'byin pa rnams na lha mo dag dang lhan cig dga' bar byed do/_/kha cig ni pad ma'i tshal sdong bu ni bai DUr+ya 
[\[101b.3\]]'dab ma ni gser/_ze ba rdo rjer 'dug pa rnams kyi nang na dga' bar byed do/_/kha cig ni rgun chang gi tshal rnams na 'bras bu nye phan gyis myos pa'i lha mo yul la rnam par chags pa rnams dang lhan cig rgun chang 'thung bar byed do/_/kha cig ni ri'i zom bai DUr+ya'i rdos 
[\[101b.4\]]gcal bkram pas rnam par phye ba'i sa phyogs rnams na dga' bar byed do/_/kha cig ni ri'i zom mu men gyis gtams pa'i chu gtsang ma dri ma med pa 'bab pa'i chu bo rnams kyi nang na sdug pa dag dang lhan cig dga' bar byed do/_/kha cig ni 'bab stegs dang sa gzhi mu tig gi 
[\[101b.5\]]bye ma bdal ba dag na chu bsil la dang zhing gtsang ste dri ma med pa rnams kyi nang na dga' bar byed do/_/kha cig ni rin po che sna bdun gyis brgyan pa'i yang thog nam mkha' la thug pa rnams kyi nang na dga' bar byed do/_/kha cig ni lha mo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor nas/_
[\[101b.6\]]sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pas dga' bar byed do/_/kha cig ni dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pa la dril bu g.yer ka'i sgra drag tu 'khrol bas mdzes pa rnams kyi nang na dga' bar byed do/_/kha cig ni dus tshigs drug gi tshal shing ljon pa dag dang nye ba/_rtag tu dga' ya 
[\[101b.7\]]yar gyur pa rnams kyi nang na snying du sdug cing 'dod pa rnams dang lhan cig dga' bar byed do/_/kha cig ni sa phyogs gser btso mas brgyan pa dang /_ri bo'i zom gyi steng du 'dzegs nas sa phyogs kyi chu bo rnams la yang lta bar byed de/_de ltar rang gi las kyis sprul sprul pa'i 
[\[102a\]]
[\[102a.1\]]lha'i bde ba dpe med pa rnam pa sna tshogs myong ngo /_/de ltar sred pa la rnam par chags pa'i lha rnams kyi mig gzugs dang kha dog 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba rnam pa du ma dag gis chog mi shes so/_/rna ba yang yul bde ba sgra snyan pa gsal ba yid 
[\[102a.2\]]du 'ong ba rnam pa du ma dag gis chog mi shes so/_/sna yang yul bde ba dri zhim pa bsung che ba yid du 'ong ba rnam pa du ma dag gis chog mi shes so/_/lce yang yul bde ba ro zhim pa bro che ba yid du 'ong ba rnam pa du ma dag gis chog mi shes so/_/lus kyang yul bde ba reg bya 
[\[102a.3\]]'dod pa 'jam pa yid du 'ong ba rnam pa du ma dag gis chog mi shes so/_/yid kyang yul rnyog pa med pa 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba rnam pa du ma dag gis chog mi shes te/_de ltar dbang po drug yul la chags pa'i lha rnams chog mi shes pa yin no/_/ji ltar yul 
[\[102a.4\]]rnams kyis sred pa spel ba de ltar 'phel bar 'gyur te/_me 'bar ba bzhin la de yang yul gyi bde ba ji ltar dmigs pa de ltar rnam pa du mar 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/sred pa des bsgribs pa'i lha chog mi shes par gyur pa rnams shin tu bde ba'i mtha' dmigs su 
[\[102a.5\]]med de/_de ltar ji srid du 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba legs par byas pa'i las de zad par ma gyur pa de srid du/_lha'i bde ba dpe med pa rnam pa du ma myong ngo /_/de phyis lha'i 'jig rten de nas 'chi bar 'gyur te/_shi nas kyang rang gis byas pa'i las kyis sems can dmyal 
[\[102a.6\]]ba dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_dud 'gro'i nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mi'i nang du skyes na/_de las de dang rgyu 'thun par tshogs gcig tu spyod pa rgya mtsho'i tshong pa'am/_tshong rdal du gnas pa'am/_ri bo'i bar na gnas par 
[\[102a.7\]]'gyur la gnyen che ba dang 'brel pa dang rang dgar gnas pa dang /_rgyal po la rag las par mi 'gyur ba dang /_shin tu 'byor pa dang /_rang dbang du 'gyur ba mthong ngo /_/de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de/_lha pi bang can gsum 
[\[102b\]]
[\[102b.1\]]pa'i gnas la rtog par byed de/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas lha de rnams kyi gnas skyil mo krung gi steng du skyes zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo /_/der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/_
[\[102b.2\]]snying rje dam pa dang ldan pa gang gis sems can chus khyer ba'am/_lo nyes byung nas ltogs te srog chad la thug pa la byams pas brlan pa'i yid kyis bu bzhin skyong bar byed cing dgos pa med kyang sems pas bsgoms pa'i snying kho nas yang dag par bskyabs na/_de lus dang bral 
[\[102b.3\]]nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten skyil mo krung du gnas pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de na lha dang lha mo gnas la/_lha gzhan yang phyogs gzhan na lhan cig nye bar gnas te/_lha'i bu de lha'i skyil mo krung bcas pa'i steng du skyes so/_/de la lha 
[\[102b.4\]]de bu'i blo skye la lha mo de yang de bzhin du bu'i blo skye'o/_/de nas lha'i bu de yang de gnyis la pha ma'i blo skye'o/_/de dag dang lha'i bu de nyid dang rtse bar byed de/_ji ltar 'dzam bu'i gling na mi shin tu dga' ba rtse ba de ltar de dag kyang lha'i 'jig rten na lha dang skyil mo krung gi steng na 
[\[102b.5\]]gnas pa de dang rtse bar byed do/_/'di ltar bu khyod bdag cag gi bur gyur pa ni 'bras bu dang bcas pa yin te/_khyod bdag cag gis lha'i tshal dang nye ba'i tshal dang /_lteng ka thams cad du bde ba bskyed par bya'o/_/ri'i zom dang gser gyi lcug ma'i dra bas bres pa dang /_
[\[102b.6\]]mtshe'u dang 'bab chu phun sum tshogs pa dang /_lcug ma'i khyim phun sum tshogs pa dang /_pad ma'i rdzing rnams na gser gyi pad mas khebs shing bung bas mdzes pa dang /_chu dang ba ldan pa dang /_chang chu bo ltar 'bab pa dang /_rgun chang ro zhim po sna tshogs kyi rgyags 
[\[102b.7\]]pa skyed par byed pa'i mtho ris thams cad du khyod dang lhan cig dga' bar bya ste/_der khyod dang bdag cag lhan cig dga' bar bya'o/_/de nas lha'i bu des pha ma de gnyis la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bdag la yab yum gyis rnam pa 'di lta bu stsal ba gang lags pa de 
[\[103a\]]
[\[103a.1\]]ni bdag bde 'gror skyes pa 'bras bu mchis so/_/bdag kyang yab yum la gus par bgyid pa dang gus par mnyan par bgyi'o/_/de nas lha de yid rab tu dga' nas lha'i bu de blangs te/_lha mo dang lhan cig 'dzam bu nad char 'bebs zhes bya ba'i tshal der 
[\[103a.2\]]'dong bar byed do/_/lha de yang lha mos bskor cing /_lha'i bu de yang de dag thams cad dang 'dzam bu nad char 'bebs kyi tshal der dong ba dang /_tshal de 'dzam bu na da'i shing ljon pa thams cad dang /_me tog gi tshogs 'phyang ba dang /_kha cig 'bras bu'i tshogs 'phyang ba 
[\[103a.3\]]rnams kyis khebs pa yin no/_/me tog gi shing ljon pa gang yin pa de dag ni shin tu dri zhim pa dpag tshad lngar 'byung ba'i me tog kha dog dang dbyibs sna tshogs dag 'thor bar byed de/_'di lta ste sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_ljang gu dang /_dmar po dang /_btsod ka dag go/_/
[\[103a.4\]]dbyibs sna tshogs pa dag ni 'jog po ltar zlum pa dang /_ring po dang /_gru bzhi dang /_lha'i dga' ba dang 'thun pa'i rna ba'i gong rgyan dang /_gdub kor 'gran pa lta bur gyur pa mthong ngo /_/de nas lha des lha'i bu de la 'di skad smras so/_/bu 'di ni 'dzam bu chu bo char 'bebs 
[\[103a.5\]]zhes bya ba'i tshal yin la/_tshal 'di ni dga' dga' ltar me tog rgyas pa yin te/_shing ljon pa phan tshun rlung gi shugs kyis bskyod pa dang /_lha'i tshogs thams cad la 'thor bar byed do/_/bu der khyod dang bdag cag lhan cig dga' bar byos shig_/rtses shig_/dga' dgur 
[\[103a.6\]]spyad par gyis shig_/bu khyod kyang lha mo'i tshogs snying du sdug cing mdzes pa dang ldan pa rtag tu yid du 'thad pa rnams dang dga' dgur spyod par 'gyur ro/_/de skad smras nas tshal der yang thams cad rtse ba'i don du 'jug par byed de/_tshal de na lha'i bya 'bod pa zhes bya bas lha'i 
[\[103a.7\]]bu gang yin pa de dag la 'di ltar tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_bzang po khyod ni legs par byon/_/khyod kyis legs byas byas dang ldan/_/tshul khrims rnam pa bdun bsrungs pa/_/de yi 'bras bu 'dir 'ongs so/_/tshul khrims 'bras bu bde ba ni/_/lha yi 
[\[103b\]]
[\[103b.1\]]'jig rten rnams su smin/_/sgrol bar byed pa'i tshul khrims kyis/_/'khor ba 'di las sgrol bar byed/_/tshul khrims chu ni rnam dag pas/_/sems brtan gang zhig 'khru byed pa/_/'dzam bu gser gyi me tog gis/_/lha yi yul du de 'khru'o/_/tshul khrims sa bon 
[\[103b.2\]]bskyed nas su/_/tshul khrims sna tshogs rnams la ni/_/'di ltar lha yi yul rnams kyis/_/khyod ni rtse zhing spyod par byed/_/mi gang rtag tu yid dul zhing /_/tshul khrims kyis ni brgyan pa rnams/_/gang na bde ba mtha' yas pa/_/lha yi gnas su de 'gro'o/_/
[\[103b.3\]]legs par bya ba byas pa'i mi/_/bde las bde ba mchog tu 'gro/_/tshul khrims kyis ni yongs spel rnams/_/lha yi gnas na rtse bar byed/_/tshul khrims skas la 'dzegs pa yi/_/mi rnams bde 'gror rab tu 'gro/_/shes pas yongs su spel ba rnams/_/ye 
[\[103b.4\]]shes kyis ni mkha' la gzhol/_/de bas tshul khrims rtag srung zhing /_/sbyin shes dka' thub nor rnams kyis/_/dug dang mtshon dang me lta bu'i/_/tshul khrims 'chal pa rtag tu spongs/_/de ltar tshul khrims legs bsrungs pa/_/mi ni bzang 'gror khrid 
[\[103b.5\]]par byed/_/bde gnas thob par bya ba la/_/tshul khrims lta bu gang yang med/_/de ltar bya 'bod pa po de rnams kyis lha'i bu de'i sems la gzung du rung ba'i tshigs su bcad pa rnams kyis mngon par dga' bar byas shing rjes su dga' bar byas pa dang /_lha'i bu des bya'i 
[\[103b.6\]]sgra dbyangs de dag yid la bzung nas rjes su dga' bar byed do/_/de rjes su dga' bar byas nas/_de nas yang pha de dang lhan cig tshal der 'jug par byed do/_/de nas dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pa rnams kyis mdzes par byas pa'i tshal de nyi ma ltar gsal zhing rnam 
[\[103b.7\]]par mdzes pa 'bum phrag du ma'i tshogs dang ldan pa de na 'bab chu dang lteng kas brgyan pa/_bai DUr+ya dang dngul gyi shing ljon pa rnams kyis kyang nye bar mdzes par byas pa nyams dga' ba rnam pa du ma de dag mthong nas lha'i bu skyes nas yun ring du ma lon pa de shin tu dga' 
[\[104a\]]
[\[104a.1\]]ba dpe med pa thob bo/_/de nas de'i bar skabs su tshal de na rnam par rgyu ba na lha mo khyim thab shi ste yun ring du ma lon pa gzhan dag gis mthong ngo /_/de nas lha mo'i tshogs de dag gis lha'i bu gsar du byung ba 'di la chung ma med par yang rig_/de byad gzugs 
[\[104a.2\]]dang ldan par mthong nas/_dgod par byed/_rtse bar byed/_sgeg par byed/_bro gar byed cing rol mo'i sgra dang /_sil snyan dang bcas pa thams cad lha'i bu de'i drung du rgyug par byed do/_/lha'i bu yang pha ma dag bor 'dod pas bsgribs pa'i yid kyis lha mo de dag ga la 'khod pa
