[\[104a.3\]]der rgyug par byed do/_/de nas de dag phan tshun mthong nas/_lha de dag lha mo de dag dga' ba skyes shing bde ba dpe med pa nye bar skyes so/_/phan tshun dga' ba skyes pa de rnams kyang sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pas ji ltar bde ba sna tshogs la gnas pa'i lha gzhan dag dga' 
[\[104a.4\]]bar byed pa de ltar dga' bar byed de/_ri dang /_nags tshal dang /_lteng ka dang /_gser dang /_dngul dang /_spug dang /_gser btso ma'i ri'i zom dang /_mu tig gi bye ma bad la ba dang /_dngul gyi rdo dang /_lha'i pad mas rdzing khebs pa dang /_bya sna tshogs sgra snyan 
[\[104a.5\]]pa 'byin pa dang /_chu bo dang /_'bab chu dang /_lteng kas brgyan pa rnams su lha mo de rnams dang lhan cig dga' bar byed do/_/lha'i bde ba dang ldan pa de ri nas ri dang skyed mos tshal nas skyed mos tshal du 'gro bar byed do/_/de ltar ngo mtshar gyi sems bsgribs pa de 
[\[104a.6\]]lha'i 'jig rten rmad du byung ba mthong nas/_ji srid du 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba byas shing bsags pa'i las de zad par ma gyur pa de srid du de dag dang lhan cig dga' bar byed do/_/de nas de'i tshe zad pa dang /_lha'i 'jig rten de nas 'chi bar 'gyur te/_shi nas kyang las nye 
[\[104a.7\]]bar 'gro ba ji lta ba bzhin sems can dmyal ba dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_dud 'gro'i nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mi'i nang du skyes na/_de las de dang rgyu 'thun par rgyal po'am blon po chen por 'gyur la/_skye bo thams cad dga' ba 
[\[104b\]]
[\[104b.1\]]dang /_byad gzugs bzang po dang ldan pa dang /_yon tan dang ldan par 'gyur ba mthong ngo /_/de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de/_lha pi bang can gsum pa'i gnas la rtog par byed de/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/_
[\[104b.2\]]lha pi bang can gsum pa'i gnas spyod pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo /_/der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/_legs par byas pa'i las ji ltar yod pa bzhin spyod pa/_
[\[104b.3\]]sems can dag 'dzings te 'thab pa'am tshal khung stug po'i nang du song nas/_srog la the tshom za ba 'chi ba la thug pa dag thar par byas shing /_sems can la phan pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang /_shin tu bsdams pa dang /_lus dang /_ngag dang /_yid kyi tshul 
[\[104b.4\]]khrims spyod na/_de lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten spyod pa dang ldan par gnas pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/der skyes nas kyang zla ba'i 'od dang mtshungs pa de kun nas gzi brjid ni 'bar/_dbang po dul ba'i bde ba dang ni ldan/_'dod pa'i yon 
[\[104b.5\]]tan lnga rnams kyis nyin gcig bzhin du ni rtse/_lha mo'i tshogs du ma dang ni nye bar spyod/_lha'i phreng ba dang gos ni gyon/_yang dang yang du 'jo sgeg ni byed/_tshal dang nye ba'i tshal dang 'bab chu'i dngo mang po rnams su ni rtse ste/_de ltar de rtse ba na shel gyi tshal zhes bya ba der 'gro bar 
[\[104b.6\]]byed do/_/tshal de na shel gyi shing ljon pa thams cad kyis kun nas gsal ba yin la shing ljon pa me tog dang 'bras bus khebs pa de dag gi me tog dang lo ma phun sum tshogs pa rnams kyang ji ltar lhang tsher ltar gsal ba'am me long ltar gsal ba yin no/_/'bras bu 
[\[104b.7\]]rnams kyang gru bzhi dang zlum por skyes te/_me long bzhin du gsal ba yin no/_/de nas lha de gang gi tshe tshal de'i nang du zhugs pa dang /_de'i tshe rang gi lus kyi gzugs brnyan 'bum snyed 'byung ba mthong ngo /_/des gzugs brnyan shin tu rgya che ba me tog phreng ba dang /_byug 
[\[105a\]]
[\[105a.1\]]pas rnam par brgyan pa phun sum tshogs pa de dag mthong nas de brgya 'gyur du dregs pa skye ste/_kye e ma bdag gi gzugs brnyan gyi rnam pa ji snyed 'byung ba 'di dag lha gzhan rnams la rnam pa de lta bu mi 'byung ngo snyam mo/_/'jig rten skyong ba mig mi bzang de tshal de'i 
[\[105a.2\]]nang du zhugs nas/_'jig rten gyi bya ba dag la rtog par byed do/_/tshal de'i mthu ni 'di lta bu yin te/_gal te sa dang bar snang la rgyu ba'i gnod sbyin dag gis 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can rnams kyi dbang gi 'bras bus chos dang chos ma yin pa byas pa de dag rings par ma sbran 
[\[105a.3\]]na ji ltar mi chos dang ldan pa'am/_mi chos dang mi ldan pa byung ba de ltar shel gyi shing ljon pa rnams kyi tshal de'i nang du mthong la/_phyis gnod sbyin dag rgyal po chen po la mi'i bya ba'i rnam pa sbron par byed do/_/de nas mig mi bzang de mir gtogs pa'i mi chos dang chos ma yin pa byas 
[\[105a.4\]]pa thams cad mthong nas tshal de la mgu'o/_/gal te mi chos dang mi ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su mi 'jug pa dag byung na/_dge ba dang mi dge ba dag de bzhin du brgya byin la sbron par byed do/_/de ltar tshal de'i mthu mthong nas/_de nas lha de tshal de na gzugs dang /_sgra dang /_dri 
[\[105a.5\]]dang /_ro dang /_reg bya 'dod pa sna tshogs kyis myos te/_ci srid du 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba byas shing bsags pa'i las de zad par ma gyur pa de srid du de na dga' bar byed do/_/de phyis lha'i 'jig rten de nas 'chi bar 'gyur te/_shi nas kyang las nye bar 'gro ba ji lta ba bzhin 'khor 
[\[105a.6\]]ba na sems can dmyal ba dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_dud 'gro'i nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mi'i nang du skyes na/_de las de dang rgyu 'thun par rtag tu yang dag pa'i lta ba dang ldan la/_chos kyi gnas la 'byor cing 'grub pa chen por 'gyur ba mthong ngo /_/
[\[105a.7\]]de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de/_lha pi bang can gsum pa'i gnas la rtog par byed de/_des de dag gi gnas gzhan bcu gcig pa ni ma mthong ngo /_/rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams kyi gnas rnam pa bzhi po kun tu rgyu zhes bya ba kho nar zad de/_gang de dag ni ri'i 
[\[105b\]]
[\[105b.1\]]rgyal po ri rab kyi ngos la 'khor ro/_/gzhal med khang dang ldan pa'i lha gang yin pa de dag la mu stegs pa gzhan dag gza' dang /_skar ma dang /_rgyu skar dag yin par 'du shes te/_de rnams kyi rags pa bgrangs na bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug yod do/_/de nas las gang gis 
[\[105b.2\]]der skye bar 'gyur snyam nas/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/_der yang lus dang ngag gi tshul khrims bdun po rnam pa sna tshogs kyis der skye'o/_/de la lus kyi rnam pa gsum dang /_ngag gi rnam pa bzhi ste/_mdor bsdu na/_sems can rnams las kyi 
[\[105b.3\]]dbang gi 'bras bu rnam pa du mas der skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de'i phyir sems can rnams kyi las dge ba dang /_mi dge ba byas pa'i rkyen gyi bye brag gis shes par byed do/_/nyi ma dang zla ba de yang lha kun du rgyu ba de rnams ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi ngos la 'khor ba'i sar 'khor bar byed 
[\[105b.4\]]de/_rlung 'khor los bskor ba zhes bya ba gang gis byas pa des/_lha de dag thams cad ri'i rgyal po ri rab de la 'khor bar byed do/_/de dag gi bar yangs pa na 'jig rten skyong ba yul 'khor skyong dang ku be ra gnyis gnas te/_lha de rnams rgyal po chen po de dag dang lhan 
[\[105b.5\]]cig gling bzhi rnams su kun du rgyu'o/_/nor bu sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_ljang gu sna tshogs kyi gzhal med khang rnams kyi nang na snga ma bzhin du sbyar te/_de dag ji srid du 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba byas shing bsags pa'i las de zad par ma gyur pa de srid du/_kun tu rgyu ba de 
[\[105b.6\]]dag na 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga ji ltar 'dod pa rnams kyis dga' bar byed do/_/de'i las zad nas de nas yang las nye bar 'gro ba ji lta ba bzhin sems can dmyal ba dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang dud 'gro'i nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mi'i nang du skyes na/_de 
[\[105b.7\]]las de dang rgyu 'thun par rtag tu yul nas yul du 'gro ba'i ngang du 'gyur te/_'di ltar tshul khrims kyi rgyu des bde yang rung /_mi bde yang rung glo bur du yul gzhan kun tu 'gro bar 'gyur ba mthong ngo /_/de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de/_rgyal chen 
[\[106a\]]
[\[106a.1\]]bzhi'i lha rnams kyi gnas la rtog par byed de/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/_gnas skabs gzhan gcig kyang shes par ma nus la/_gnas skabs gzhan gcig kyang mthong bar ma gyur nas/_de 'di snyam du sems te/_rgyal chen bzhi'i 
[\[106a.2\]]lha rnams ni mtha' yas te/_de ltar mtha' med do snyam mo/_/rang gi las kyis ri rab la tshal dang /_nye ba'i tshal bzhi dag tu dga' bar byed cing skor bar byed do/_/ri rab kyi ngos gang la nyi ma 'khor ba'i ngos de dang des mi'i gnas gang du ri rab kyi grib ma de 'bab ste/_de ltar 
[\[106a.3\]]de 'dzam bu'i gling du mtshan mor 'gyur ro/_/byang phyogs na rlung 'khor lo'i gzugs zhes bya ba yongs su 'khor zhing /_des byang phyogs kyi skar ma gang yin pa de dag thams cad 'char du mi ster la/_nub tu yang mi ster te/_de ltar rlung gi dbang gis phyogs su 'khor zhing 'dug 
[\[106a.4\]]go/_/mu stegs pa gzhan de nyid ma mthong zhing skar ma'i dpyad mngon par mi shes la phyogs gcig tu lta ba'i mu stegs pa de dag gis mthong nas/_'di ltar de ni chu srin byis pa gsod yin te/_nub tu mi ster la/_drang srong bdun dag gis 'jig rten 'dzin to snyam mo/_/
[\[106a.5\]]de ltar des rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams ma lus par mthong zhing sa dang bcas pa la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin mthong nas 'khor ba la yid byung ngo /_/de ltar de dag mthong nas lha rnams kyi ltung ba'i sdug bsngal mngon par brtags nas yid byung ste/_'khor ba na gnas su rung ba rtag 
[\[106a.6\]]pa'am/_brtan pa'am/_ther zug pa'am/_mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gang yang med la/_'du ba dang 'bral ba'i bgo skal la spyod pa/_las kyi bgo skal la spyod pa/_las kyi skye gnas pa/_las la rton par mi byed pa med de/_de ltar dge slong des thos pa las byung ba'i shes 
[\[106a.7\]]pas brtags so/_/de nas yang rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas so/_/de ltar dge slong de byis pa so so'i skye bo kun gang la dga' ba de la rag las par 'gyur te/_sred pa'i rgyu bskyed pa de dag 'di ltar bdag cag mtho ris su skye bar 'gyur zhing der 
[\[106b\]]
[\[106b.1\]]bdag cag bde bar gyur cig snyam nas tshangs par spyad pa spyod do/_/de ltar spyod pa de la yang dge slong de lha'i bde ba rnam pa gzhan dag la yang dmigs shing thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas mthong nas dga' bar mi byed/_chags par mi byed/_ro myong bar mi byed la/_bdud dang lhan 
[\[106b.2\]]cig 'gyed par nus shing 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las rgal ba'i bsam pa can yin te/_de ltar dge slong de sa gzhan bcu bdun pa la zhugs so/_/sa bla'i gnod sbyin dag gis de thos nas dga' ste/_bar snang la spyod pa'i gnod sbyin rnams la mngon par bsnyad do/_/de dag gis kyang rgyal 
[\[106b.3\]]chen bzhi pa rnams la bsnyad la/_snga ma bzhin tshad med 'od kyi lha rnams kyi bar la gcig nas gcig tu bsnyad do/_/'di ltar lha dag 'dzam bu'i gling na rigs kyi bu grong che ge mo zhig dang /_grong rdal mang ge mo zhig dang /_rigs ga ge mo zhig dang /_yul che ge mo zhig nas mi 
[\[106b.4\]]mang ge mo zhes bya ba skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te/_dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo /_/dge slong de bdud dang lhan cig 'gyed par 'bad cing brtson la srid pa nyam nga ba las rgal ba'i bsam pa yod do/_/de ltar tshad med 'od kyi lha rnams kyis thos nas 
[\[106b.5\]]yid mchog tu dga' zhing de dag la lha bdag cag ni dga' ste/_gang mi'i 'jig rten du mi chos dang ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa dag nges par 'byung la/_ye shes rtsom pa goms par byed/_yongs su spyod par byed/_bdud dang lhan cig 'gyed par byed de/_bdud kyi phyogs 
[\[106b.6\]]ni dma'o/_/dam pa'i chos kyi phyogs ni mtho'o/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyis bshad pa'i dam pa'i chos ni 'phel lo zhes lha de dag la bsnyad do/_/de nas yang dge slong de tshul khrims la rab tu rnam par dpyod par byed de/_tshul khrims med pa'am shes pa med pa ni mtho ris kyi 'jig 
[\[106b.7\]]rten du lhar skye ba med do snyam nas/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/_tshul khrims tsam gyis ni mtho ris su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/sbyin pas ni der skye bar mi 'gyur zhing longs spyod shin tu che bar 'gyur la/_shes pas ni de nas shi nas ngan song du 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro/_/
[\[107a\]]
[\[107a.1\]]de la tshul khrims gang dang rnam pa dus lha'i 'jig rten gang du skye bar 'gyur snyam nas/_des brtags na tshul khrims rnam pa bdun gyis lha'i ris drug rnams kyi nang du tha ma dang 'bring dang mchog tu skye bar 'gyur te/_srog gcod pa spangs pa'i tshul khrims kyis rgyal chen 
[\[107a.2\]]bzhi pa rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/srog gcod pa dang /_ma byin par len pa spangs pas sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_srog gcod pa dang /_ma byin par len pa dang /_'dod pas log par g.yem pa spangs pas 'thab bral ba rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur 
[\[107a.3\]]ro/_/sdom pa blangs te srog gcod pa dang /_ma byin par len pa dang /_'dod pas log par g.yem pa spangs shing [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]dang phra ma dang /_tshig rtsub po dang /_ngag kyal pa spangs pas dga' ldan pa rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten pa'i sdom pa blangs te/_sangs rgyas 
[\[107a.4\]]'ba' zhig la dad la/_srog gcod pa dang /_ma byin par len pa dang /_'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang /[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]dang /_phra ma dang /_tshig rtsub po spangs pas 'phrul dga' ba rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du srog gcod pa dang /_ma byin par len pa dang /_'dod pas 
[\[107a.5\]]log par g.yem pa dang /[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]dang /_phra ma dang /_tshig rtsub po dang /_ngag kyal pa spangs pas gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de ltar dge slong de las dang tshul khrims su 'brel pa rnams lha'i 'jig rten du skye ba la rjes su sems te/_sdom pa blangs pa'i 
[\[107a.6\]]gang zag gang du ji ltar skye bar 'gyur snyam nas/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags nas/_srog gcod pa spangs pa'i sdom pa blangs pa ni de rgyal chen bzhi pa rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur te/_srog gcod pa spangs pa snga ma bas/_bong tshod dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_kha dog 
[\[107a.7\]]dang /_dbang phyug dang /_tshe dag ches ring bar 'gyur ro/_/srog gcod pa dang /_ma byin par len pa dag spangs pa'i sdom pa blangs pa ni sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur te/_spangs pa de dag pas bong tshod dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_spro ba dang /_gzugs dang /_stobs 
[\[107b\]]
[\[107b.1\]]dang /_dbang phyug dang /_tshe dag mchog tu ring bar 'gyur ro/_/srog gcod pa dang /_ma byin par len pa dang /_'dod pas log par g.yem pa spang ba kun tu bsten cing bsgoms te mang du byas pas 'thab bral ba rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur te/_spangs pa de dag pas de bong tshod 
[\[107b.2\]]dang /_kha dog dang /_dbang phyug dang /_tshe dang /_gzugs la sogs pa ches bzang bar 'gyur ro/_/dga' ldan pa rnams kyi nang du sems dang shes pa gnyis kyi khyad par gyis bong tshod dang /_kha dog dang /_dbang phyug dang /_dad pa dang /_bde ba khyad par can du 'gyur ro/_/
[\[107b.3\]]srog gcod pa dang /_ma byin par len pa dang /_'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang /[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]dang /_phra ma spangs pa'i sdom pa la gnas pa ni 'phrul dga' ba rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur te/_spangs pa de dag pas de bong tshod dang /_dbang phyug dang /_bde ba dang tshe ring ba dag ches 
[\[107b.4\]]mchog tu 'gyur ro/_/srog gcod pa dang /_ma byin par len pa dang /_'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang /[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]dang /_phra ma dang /_tshig kyal pa spangs pa'i sdom pa la gnas pa ni gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur te/_spangs pa de dag pas de bong tshod 
[\[107b.5\]]dang /_dbang phyug dang /_bde ba dang /_mthu dang /_gzugs dang /_tshe dag ches lhag par 'gyur zhing bdud sdig can gyi tshig nyan par mi 'gyur la/_de des thub par mi 'gyur ba mthong ngo /_/de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de/_tshul 
[\[107b.6\]]khrims mtho ris su skye ba'i sa bon du ji ltar 'gyur snyam nas shin tu zhib mor dpyod de/_des brtags na sems dang sems las byung ba chen pos tshul khrims chung ngu dang 'bring dang chen por 'gyur/_'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha drug rnams kyi nang du sems kyi khyad par gyis sems las 
[\[107b.7\]]byung ba khyad par du 'gyur la/_sems las byung ba'i tshul khrims kyi khyad par gyis skye ba khyad par du 'gyur ba mthong ngo /_/de nas yang dge slong de tshul khrims la dpyod par byed de tshul khrims rnam pa du yod snyam nas/_des brtags na tshul khrims rnam pa gnyis te/_'jig 
[\[108a\]]
[\[108a.1\]]rten pa lhan cig skyes pa dang /_'du ba byas pa'o/_/de la lhan cig skyes pa ni bcos ma ma byas pa'o/_/'du ba ni bcos ma byas pa'o/_/yang tshul khrims rnam pa gnyis te/_khyim na gnas pa'i spyod pa dang /_khyim na mi gnas pa'i spyod pa'o/_/de la khyim na 
[\[108a.2\]]gnas pa'i spyod pa ni bslab pa'i gzhi lnga'o/_/khyim na mi gnas pa'i spyod pa ni bslab pa'i gzhi so so thar pas rab tu byung ba rnams kyi'o/_/'o/_/'phags pa dam pa'i tshos dran pa ce bar gzhag pa/_yang tshul khrims rnam pa gnyis te/_sna gcig spyod pa dang /_du ma spyod pa'o/_/de la sna gcig spyod pa ni bslab pa'i gzhi gcig 'dzin 
[\[108a.3\]]pa'o/_/du ma spyod pa ni gnyis sam/_gsum 'dzin pa'o/_/yang rnam pa gnyis te/_skye mched dang /_skye mched ma yin pa'o/_/de la skye mched ni tshe rabs thams cad du bslab pa'i gzhi 'dzin pa'o/_/skye mched ma yin pa ni 'di ltar sems kyi khyad par gyis sam/_spro ba'i 
[\[108a.4\]]khyad par gyis bslab pa'i gzhi 'dzin pa'o/_/yang rnam pa gnyis te/_rnyog pa dang bcas pa dang /_rnyog pa med pa'o/_/de la rnyog pa dang bcas pa ni mtho ris su skye bar 'dod pa'i sems so/_/rnyog pa med pa ni mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gro bar 'dod pa'o/_/yang rnam pa gnyis 
[\[108a.5\]]te/_'jig rten pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'o/_/de la 'jig rten pa ni zag pa dang bcas pa'o/_/'jig rten las 'das pa ni zag pa med pa'o/_/yang rnam pa gnyis te/_bdag 'dzin pa dang /_gzhan 'dzin pa'o/_/de la bdag 'dzin pa ni bdag nyid kyis tshul khrims 'dzin 
[\[108a.6\]]pa'o/_/gzhan 'dzin pa ni gzhan yang rigs pa'i tshul khrims la 'jog par byed pa'o/_/yang rnam pa gnyis te/_'jug pa dang /_ldog pa'o/_/de la 'jug pa ni 'khor bar 'jug par byed pa'o/_/ldog pa ni ye shes kyi rgyu ste mi slob pa'i ye shes la dmigs pa'o/_/yang rnam 
[\[108a.7\]]pa gnyis te/_ye shes dang ldan pa dang /_sbyin pa dang ldan pa'o/_/de la sbyin pa dang ldan pa ni longs spyod chen po thob pa'o/_/ye shes dang ldan pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa'o/_/yang rnam pa gnyis te/_phyi rol du spyod pa 'jug pa dang /_nang du spyod pa 'jug pa'o/_/de la phyi 
[\[108b\]]
[\[108b.1\]]rol du spyod pa 'jug pa ni lus la rten pa'o/_/nang du spyod pa 'jug pa ni sems rab tu dad pas byas pa'i sems dang ngag go/_/yang rnam pa gnyis te/_goms pa dang /_ma goms pa'o/_/de la goms pa ni tshe rabs du ma dag tu goms pa'o/_/ma goms pa ni tshe gcig tu goms pa 
[\[108b.2\]]ste/_de ltar dge slong de rnam pa du mas tshul khrims rnam pa gnyis gnyis la dpyod par byed do/_/de nas yang dge slong de shin tu zhi ba por tshul khrims rab tu rnam par 'byed par byed de/_tshul khrims sna tshogs du yod/_rnam pa du yod snyam nas des brtags na/_tshul khrims rnam pa gsum 
[\[108b.3\]]ste/_phyogs gcig pa dang /_phyogs gcig pa ma yin pa dang /_mtho ris su 'gro ba'o/_/de la phyogs gcig pa ni bslab pa'i gzhi gcig 'dzin pa'o/_/phyogs gcig pa ma yin pa ni bslab pa'i gzhi gnyis sam gsum 'dzin pa'o/_/mtho ris su 'gro ba ni bslab pa'i 
[\[108b.4\]]gzhi tshogs par 'dzin pa'o/_/yang rnam pa gsum ste/_nor la sred par byas pa dang /_nor la sred par ma byas pa dang /_lhan cig skyes pa'o/_/de la nor la sred par byas pa ni stobs 'gyed pas 'tsho ba'o/_/nor la sred par ma byas pa ni na dbu can rnams kyi'o/_/lhan cig skyes pa 
[\[108b.5\]]ni mya ngan chen pos thebs pa yin te 'di ni chung ngo /_/yang rnam pa gsum ste/_bsam gtan dang lhan cig spyod pa dang /_bsam gtan ma yin pa dang lhan cig spyod pa dang /_langs nas lhan cig spyod pa'o/_/de la bsam gtan dang lhan cig spyod pa ni 'jig rten pa rnams kyi rkyen 
[\[108b.6\]]med pa'i bar gyis 'dod chags la sogs pa skyed par mi byed pa'o/_/bsam gtan ma yin pa dang lhan cig spyod pa ni phyi rol pa rnams kyi bsam gtan med kyang de ltar tshul khrims su 'gyur ba yin no/_/yang langs nas lhan cig spyod pa ni skyon gang dmigs nas de dag des yongs su spong 
[\[108b.7\]]bar byed pa yin te/_ji ltar chang gis myos nas mi gtsang ba kun tu spyod do/_/des chang de so sor gcod par byed pa bzhin no/_/yang rnam pa gsum ste/_ngan g.yo byed pas srung ba dang /_ngan g.yo byed pa ma yin pas srung ba dang /_lhan cig skyes pa'o/_/de la ngan g.yo byed pas srung 
[\[109a\]]
[\[109a.1\]]ba ni nyon mongs shing 'bras bu chung ba'o/_/ngan g.yo byed pa ma yin pas srung ba ni 'bras bu che ba'o/_/lhan cig skyes pa ni sems las byung ba'i bye brag gis 'bras bu che ba'am/_/'bras bu chung bar 'gyur ba'o/_/yang rnam pa gsum ste/_rkyen gyis 'dzin pa dang /_rkyen 
[\[109a.2\]]med pas 'dzin pa dang /_bya ba ma yin pa'o/_/de la rkyen gyis 'dzin pa ni bslab pa'i gzhi tshul khrims yang dag par blangs pa de rkyen rnyed nas srung ba yin te/_bslab pa'i gzhi bsdus nas 'dzin pa'o/_/rkyen med pas 'dzin pa ni gang rkyen med pa des srung ba'o/_/bya ba ma yin pa zhes bya ba ni rigs chen 
[\[109a.3\]]por skyes pa rnams kyi bya ba ma yin pa sdig pa mi byed pa'o/_/de la rkyen gyis 'dzin pa ni sems las byung ba'i bye brag gis 'dzin te 'bras bu che ba yin no/_/rkyen med pas 'dzin pa ni de rnam par mi shes te 'bras bu chung ba yin no/_/bya ba ma yin pas byas pa ni 'jig rten 'dir legs par byed pa yin 
[\[109a.4\]]te/_'bras bu che ba'am/_slar chung bar 'gyur ro/_/yang rnam pa gsum ste/_bla mas 'jigs pa dang /_bla ma ma yin pas 'jigs pa dang /_ngan song du 'gro bas 'jigs pa'o/_/de la gang bla mas 'jigs nas tshul khrims len pa de ni chung ba yin no/_/gang bla ma ma yin pas 
[\[109a.5\]]'jigs nas len pa de ni 'bring yin no/_/gang ngan song du 'gro bas 'jigs nas len pa de ni chen po yin no/_/yang rnam pa gsum ste/_bdag nyid tshul khrims dang ldan par byed pa dang /_gzhan tshul khrims la 'jog par byed pa dang /_gzhan la btang snyoms su gnas pa'o/_/yang tshul 
[\[109a.6\]]khrims rnam pa gsum ste/_gags dang bcas pa dang /_gags med pa dang /_gags thams cad pa'o/_/de la gags dang bcas pa ni gang sngon tshul khrims dang ldan la/_phyis tshul khrims 'chal pa yin te/_gags dang bcas pa'i tshul khrims ni de yin no/_/gags med pa ni rtag par tshe 
[\[109a.7\]]rabs su thog ma dang bar dang tha ma'i mthar tshul khrims dang ldan pa nyid yin no/_/gags thams cad pa zhes bya ba ni lta ba log pas srog gcod pa la sogs pa'i mchod sbyin byed pa'i tshul khrims yin no/_/de nas yang dge slong de tshul khrims rnam pa bzhi rnam par 'byed cing rtog par byed de/_ngag 
[\[109b\]]
[\[109b.1\]]gi [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]dang phra ma dang tshig rtsub po dang tshig kyal pa ste/_de dag dang 'bral bar byed do/_/yang tshul khrims rnam pa lnga ste/_yul lnga spangs pa bskyed pa'o/_/yang tshul khrims rnam pa drug ste/_bar chad byed pa dang bar chad byed pa med pa dang /_rgyal po'i chad pas 'jigs nas blangs pa dang /_
[\[109b.2\]]'brel pas blangs pa dang rtog pa med pa dang lhan cig skyes pa'o/_/yang tshul khrims rnam pa bdun te/_lus dang ngag gi'o/_/de ltar dge slong de tshul khrims rnam pa du ma la rab tu spyod par byed de/_gang gis sems can rnams ngan 'gro'i 'jigs pa las grol bar byed pa de ni mdor na rnam pa 
[\[109b.3\]]gnyis te/_'jig rten pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa yin no snyam mo//_//'phags pa dam pa'i chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa/_bam po sum cu pa/_de nas rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams mthong nas/_sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i gnas dang /_las rnams la rtog par byed de/_
[\[109b.4\]]legs par byas pa'i las dang /_legs par ma byas pa'i las kyi rjes su spyad pa gang gis/_sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur snyam nas/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/_sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams ji ltar 'dug pa ni 'di lta ste/_chos 
[\[109b.5\]]bzang na gnas pa dang /_mtho ba na gnas pa dang /_ri rtse na gnas pa dang /_legs mthong na gnas pa dang /_phyogs gcig na gnas pa dang /_shing gseb na gnas pa dang /_shing rta sna tshogs na gnas pa dang /_dga' byed na gnas pa dang /_rnam mdzes na gnas pa dang /_yongs 
[\[109b.6\]]'du na gnas pa dang /_'dres pa'i 'gram na gnas pa dang /_tshang tshing gi 'gram na gnas pa dang /_nor bu'i snying po na gnas pa dang /_kun du gsal bar spyod pa dang /_gser phug gi khang pa dang /_phreng ba'i grib ma dang /_dma' ba dang mtho ba na rgyu ba dang /_bkra ba sna tshogs kyis phye ba/_
[\[109b.7\]]sbyor ba la 'jug pa dang /_zhib tu spyod pa dang /_glu'i sgra la shin tu dga' zhing mngon par chags pa dang /_gzi brjid 'bar ba dang /_zla ba'i gnas ltar nya ba dang /_shing sA la zung dang /_mig phye zhing 'gro ba dang /_btsums nas 'gro ba dang /_lus kyi mdog bzang zhing che ba dang /_nor bu 'phyang 
[\[110a\]]
[\[110a.1\]]ba dang /_ris 'thun pa dang /_'khor na gnas pa dang /_mtho bar spyod pa dang /_gzi brjid mchog dang /_gzi brjid phreng dang /_ma 'dres pa dag ste/_de ltar sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha de rnams ni gnas sum cu rtsa gsum na 'khod do/_/de la dge slong las kyi chos kyi 'bras bu 
[\[110a.2\]]rnam par smin pa dang /_tshul khrims zhib tu khong du chud pa de/_de ltar na lha rnams kyi legs par byas pa'i las dag la rtog par byed de/_las byas shing bsags pa gang gis bde 'gro skyed pa 'dod pa dang sdug pa'i rnam par smin pa bde bas rnam par smin pa bde zhing skye bo yongs su smra ba bsdus 
[\[110a.3\]]pa/_sgra dang /_reg pa dang /_ro dang /_rnam par smin pa bde bskyed pa rnams kyis gang du skye bar 'gyur snyam nas des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/_ya mtshan can gyi mthong ba dang thos pa kun nas dgos pa gzhan ma yin pa sangs rgyas kyi bstan pas lha rnams kyi skye ba 
[\[110a.4\]]dga' zhing bde bar gnas pa dpe med pa dag mthong ste/_lha'i 'dun sa chos bzang gang du lha'i rgyal po kau shi kas chos dang 'thun par skyong ngo /_/phyi rol gyi 'du shes rnyed pas lha rnams kyi gnas pa dang por byas nas/_de ltar sa kun gyi ris rnam par 'byed par byed de/_dge slong de tshul 
[\[110a.5\]]khrims shin tu bsgoms pa rnam pa gang gis lha'i 'dun sa chos bzang du skye bar 'gyur snyam nas/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na gang tshul khrims rnam pa bdun bsrungs te/_de ma nyams pa dang /_ma ral ba dang /_ma zhig pa dang /_dam zhing gzhan dang mi 'dra bar rab tu 
[\[110a.6\]]spyod la/_sems las byung bas yongs su bsgoms pa'i sbyin pa dus la bab pa yang byin cing yon tan du gyur pa yang 'di lta ste dgra bcom pa'am/_pha ma nad pa'am/_phyir mi 'ong ba'am/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'am/_rgyun du zhugs pa'am/_'gog pa las langs pa'am/_lam la 
[\[110a.7\]]zhugs pa'am/_byams pa dang /_snying rje dang /_dga' ba dang /_btang snyoms bsgoms pa'am/_'chi bas 'jigs shing nyen pa la srog byin na/_lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten lha'i 'dun sa chos bzang du lha'i bdag por 'gyur la/_brgya byin kau shi ka lha'i 'dun sa chos 
[\[110b\]]
[\[110b.1\]]bzang na gnas te lha mo sdug pa yid du 'ong ba bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgus yongs su bskor ba'i nang na yongs su dga' bar byed cing lha mo de dag gis kyang de la rim gro byed de/_ji ltar skyes pa gcig la bud med gcig gis rim gro byed pa de bzhin du de dag thams cad de la rim gro byed do/_/de dag 
[\[110b.2\]]gi nang na sdug cing yid du 'ong ba sems gcig pa'i btsun mo dam pa la lha mo de dag rim gro byed de/_de yang de dag la gus par byed do/_/lha'i 'dun sa chos bzang de yang dpag tshad lnga brgya yod de/_kha khyer ni nor bu bai DUr+ya/_ka ba ni byi rus shin tu mdzes par byas pa lan kan ni shel las byas shing 
[\[110b.3\]]spug gis ni brgyan/_rtsig pa ni gser btso ma las byas shing rdo rjes brgyan te/_nor bus dga' bar byed pa khri ni pad ma rA ga dang /_an da rnyil gyis mdzes par spras pa/_la la kha cig tu pad ma 'dab ma ni bai DUr+ya/_ze ba ni rdo rje'i myu gu/_sdong bu ni 'dam rdza ba med pa'i thang las skyes pa gser 
[\[110b.4\]]lta bus mdzes par brgyan to/_/rdzing bu'i bar kha cig na bya 'khod pa yang sgro ni bai DUr+ya/_mchu ni pad ma rA ga_/lus ni mthon ka lta bu rnams kyis pad ma'i rdzing de gang ngo /_/kha cig tu nor bu'i bya rnam pa gzhan gyis rdzing de kun du gang ste/_'di lta ste/_rkang pa ni bai DUr+ya/_sgro ni mthon ka/_mchu ni spug_/
[\[110b.5\]]mig ni byi ru lta bu rnams kyis rdzing gi bar dag kun du gang ngo /_/kha cig tu yang rdzing de rnam pa gzhan gyis mdzes par byas pa yin te/_'di lta ste/_lus thams cad ni 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser/_sgro ni byi ru/_mig ni shin tu 'jam pa/_rkang pa ni mu tig gi kha dog lta bu yin no/_/pad ma'i rdzing kha 
[\[110b.6\]]cig dag tu yang bung ba myos pa bai DUr+ya'i mdog lta bu rnams kyis pad ma'i rdzing chen po bcu mdzes par byas pas/_lha'i 'dun sa chos bzang mdzes par byas pa yin te/_'di lta ste/_dga' 'byung dang /_pad ma che 'byung dang /_rab tu dga' ba dang /_rab dga' chen po dang /_rtse dga' dang /_bsams 'gro 
[\[110b.7\]]dang /_shing rta kun 'gro dang /_kun rtog rgyu dang /_dpag bsam gyi shing la spyod pa dang /_dben 'gro dbang po'i 'od de mtsho de rnams kyis lha'i 'dun sa chos bzang de brgyan to/_/yang pad ma'i tshal rnam pa gzhan dag yod de/_pad ma'i tshal de dag gi sdong bu ni dngul/_ze ba ni gser/_'dab ma ni 
[\[111a\]]
[\[111a.1\]]bai DUr+ya/_snying po ni 'dam rdzab med pa nas skyes pa rdo rje'i mdog lta bu yin no/_/yang pad ma rnam pa gzhan dag ni 'di lta bu yin te/_'di lta ste/_sdong bu ni rdo rje'i mdog lta bu/_'dab ma phan tshun 'dres pa ni 'di ltar pad ma rA ga dang /_'dab ma kha cig ni bai DUr+ya/_'dab ma kha 
[\[111a.2\]]cig ni spug rgyan gyi mdog_/'dab ma kha cig ni gser lta bu yin te/_de ltar pad ma de dag gi kha dog 'dres pa yin no/_/lha'i rgyal po brgya byin gyi pad ma ni 'dab ma brgya pa dang /_la la ni 'dab ma nyis brgya pa/_la la 'dab ma sum brgya pa/_la la 'dab ma bzhi brgya pa/_la la 
[\[111a.3\]]'dab ma lnga brgya pa/_la la 'dab ma drug brgya pa/_la la 'dab ma bdun brgya pa/_la la 'dab ma brgyad brgya pa/_la la 'dab ma dgu brgya pa/_la la 'dab ma stong yod de/_kha dog sna tshogs dang /_kha dog gcig pa dang /_rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba dag brgya byin gyi gnas lha'i 'dun sa chos bzang du 
[\[111a.4\]]'byung ngo /_/yang pad ma'i nang de dag nyid du lha'i bya 'jug pa dang /_gsab gseb kyi nang na gnas pa rnams kyis kun tu gang ba ni 'di lta ste/_gang dus tshigs thams cad du rgyags pa/_'gram pa rdul cing rol mo'i sgras rtag tu gar byed pa dag yin te/_de dag gang gi tshe brgya byin rdzing de dag tu 
[\[111a.5\]]lha mo'i tshogs kyis lhan cig yongs su bskor nas rtse ba de'i tshe bya de dag de bzhin dga' bar byed de/_ji ltar yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i sil snyan gyi sgra de bzhin du bya de dag kyang sgra 'byin la/_rgyags pas myos pa zhes bya ba'i bya rab tu gar byed pa dag byung ngo /_/gang gi tshe brgya byin gang rdzing de dag tu 
[\[111a.6\]]dga' bar byed pa de'i tshe de dag kyang de bzhin du gar byed de/_ji ltar lha mo dag byed pa de bzhin no/_/bya khor yug ces bya ba gser gyi mdog can me tog gi phreng ba mchu la 'phyang ba dag 'byung ste/_gang rdzing de dag gi 'gram gyi nang phan tshun kun nas rdzing de dag tu gnas nas gar byed cing sgra 'byin 
[\[111a.7\]]par byed de/_lha'i rgyal po brgya byin gyi rdzing ni de lta bu yin par mthong ngo /_/de nas yang dge slong de brgya byin gyi lha'i 'dun sa chos bzang legs par byas pa'i las kyis sprul pa la rtog par byed de/_des brtags na rdzing gi bar na gnas pa'i nya rnams kha cig ni gser gyi mdog can/_kha cig 
[\[111b\]]
[\[111b.1\]]ni dngul gyi mdog can/_kha cig ni bai DUr+ya'i mdog can la/_'dab ma ni pad ma rA ga'i mdog_/mig ni spug lta bu/_lto ni pad ma'i mdog_/kha cig gi rgyab ni rin po che sna tshogs kyi thig le bkra ba dag gis brgyan/_kha cig gi 'dab ma ni rin po che rnam pa sna bdun gyi mdog tu 'dug 
[\[111b.2\]]ste/_pad ma'i rdzing de rnams su dga' bar byed do/_/de nas yang dge slong de brgya byin gyi pad ma'i rdzing rnam pa gzhan de dag nyid la rtog par byed de/_gang gis rdzing de dag gi ris nyid rnam pa du yod cig gu snyam nas des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/_sa de dag gi ris kha cig dag bye 
[\[111b.3\]]ma bdal ba lta bur mu tig bkram pa/_kha cig dngul gyi phye ma/_kha cig gser gyi phye ma/_kha cig nor bu bai DUr+ya bkram ste/_de ltar brgya byin gyi legs par byas pa'i las kyi sprul pas de dag gi ris bkra ba dag mthong ngo /_/de nas yang dge slong de gnas de dag gi ris nyid la rtog par byed de/_
[\[111b.4\]]des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/_'di ltar rdzing de dag nyid kyi 'gram de kun nas kha cig gi kha khyer gser las byas pa dag gis yongs su bskor/_kha cig gi kha khyer nor bu bai DUr+ya/_kha cig ni dngul las byas/_kha cig gser dag las byas la/_mu tig gi dra bas kun 
[\[111b.5\]]nas bres pa yin te/_de ltar bya'i tshogs kha dog sna tshogs dga' ba'i sgra dang 'gro ba rnams kyis pad ma'i rdzing gi 'gram de dag kun du gang bar mthong ngo /_/de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de lha'i 'dun sa chos bzang la rtog par byed de/_pad ma'i rdzing gi 
[\[111b.6\]]pad ma de dag gi nang na rgyu ba bung ba'i tshogs kyi mdog dang kha dog sna tshogs la 'di lta ste/_gser gyi mdog can rnams kyi nang du bung ba dngul gyi mdog can/_'dab ma rdo rje'i myu gu lta bu reg na bde ba dag rgyu la dngul gyi pad ma rnams kyi nang du bung ba gser gyi mdog can dag rgyu ste/_de ltar sna tshogs dag 
[\[111b.7\]]pad ma sna tshogs rnams kyi nang na rgyu'o/_/de ltar las dge bas 'bras bu sna tshogs dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba mthong ngo /_/de nas yang dge slong de lha'i 'dun sa chos bzang de nyid la thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas rtog cing de'i tshal dag la yang rab tu dpyod par byed de/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi tshal dag 
[\[112a\]]
[\[112a.1\]]rnam pa du yod snyam nas des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/_'di ltar lha'i 'dun sa chos bzang dag na tshal yod la/_de ltar tshal de re re la rab tu dpyod par byed de/_de'i tshal bud med dga' ba zhes bya ba dang /_kun dga' zhes bya ba dang /_dpe med pa zhes bya 
[\[112a.2\]]ba dang /_bkra ba zhes bya ba tshal bzhi po de dag ni lha'i 'dun sa chos bzang dag na yod do/_/de ltar de tshal re re dag la rab tu dpyod par byed de/_tshal gang du lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin lha mo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing /_lha'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la gzugs dang /_sgra dang /_dri dang /_
[\[112a.3\]]ro dang /_reg pa rnams kyis dga' zhing mgu la rtse zhing yongs su spyod pa'i tshal ni gang yin/_dga' bar spyod pa'i rnam pa ni du zhig yod cig gu snyam nas/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/_bud med dga' ba zhes bya ba'i tshal yod de/_tshal de ni lha'i shing ljon pa dang /_me 
[\[112a.4\]]tog dang 'bras bus ni brgyan/_bya'i tshogs kyis ni yongs su bskor/_shing de dpag bsam gyi shing zhes bya la/_de ltar de dag ni ji ltar 'dod pa zhes bya bar 'gyur te/_gang sum cu rtsa gsum dag yid la sems par byed pa de tshal de dag las rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/de dag gang gi tshe rtse ba'i 
[\[112a.5\]]phyir tshal der nye bar 'gro bar byed na de'i tshe shing ljon pa de dag gi me tog shin tu bzang po rab tu rgyas shing me tog kha phye bar 'gyur ro/_/gang gi tshe bud med dag tshal de dag gi nang du zhugs la shing ljon pa'i drung du nye bar song ste/_shing ljon pa dag las me tog rnams len par 'dod pa de'i tshe ji 
[\[112a.6\]]ltar bud med kyis slebs tsam du shing ljon pa de dag 'phyang bar 'gyur ro/_/yang de ltar me tog gi rnam pa de dag blangs pa dang /_me tog gi rnam pa gzhan dang /_kha dog gzhan dang /_dri gzhan dang /_dbyibs gzhan dang /_rnam pa gzhan dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/_lha mo de dag gis ji lta ji 
[\[112a.7\]]ltar bsams pa bzhin dpag bsam gyi shing de dag gi don du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/yang dpag bsam gyi shing de dag rnam pa gzhan du ston te/_rol mo'i sgra'i rnam pa thos na nyams dga' ba rnam pa lnga'i bar dag 'byung ba ni/_rgyud can dang /_rnga dang /_sil dkrol dang /_gling bu dang /_sgra 
[\[112b\]]
[\[112b.1\]]snyan pa dag lha mo de dag gi yid kyis bsams shing /_de bzhin du dbyangs kyi rnam pa mnyan par bya'o snyam mo/_/de nas sems bskyed ma thag tu shing ljon pa'i lo ma rnams kyi nang du dge ba'i las kyis bskyed pa'i rlung de dag rab tu ldang ngo /_/rlung gang gis lo ma de dag la de bzhin phog 
[\[112b.2\]]pa dang /_de ltar rnam pa ji snyed yod pa'i lo ma de dag rnam pa de snyed du de ltar sgra 'byin par byed de/_ji ltar yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i sil snyan chags par 'os pa'i rgyud can dang /_rnga dang /_sil dkrol dang /_gling bu dang /_sgra snyan pa'i rnam pa de dag lo ma de dag las 'byung ste/_de bas na dpag bsam 
[\[112b.3\]]gyi shing zhes bya'o/_/yang dpag bsam gyi shing rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur te/_ji ltar lha mo 'dod 'gro dag sems dang 'thun pa'i rgyan dang /_gos dang 'bras bu'i rnam pa ji lta ba bzhin lha mo'i yid la 'dod na/_de sems bskyed ma thag tu dpag bsam gyi shing de dag las 'byung zhing /_de nas yang 
[\[112b.4\]]de mdzes par 'dug ste/_de bas na dpag bsam gyi shing zhes bya'o/_/de dag kyang kha cig bai DUr+ya'i mdog la gser gyi lo ma dang /_kha cig sdong po gser la dngul gyi yal ga dang /_bai DUr+ya'i 'dab ma dang /_ke ra Ta ka'i lo ma dang /_kha cig lo ma rin po che sna bdun lta bu las rnam pa du ma ro bro ba 
[\[112b.5\]]dang /_'bras bu du ma dag thob par byed do/_/yang dpag bsam gyi shing rnam pa gzhan du bstan pa de gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_lha mo gang dag brgya byin la lta bar spro na/_brgya byin de'i dge ba'i las kyis sprul pa sgyu ma byas pa'i dbang po de mthong bar 'gyur te/_de dag dang lha mo dag lhan cig dga' 
[\[112b.6\]]bar byed cing yongs su spyod par byed do/_/de ltar dbang po de dbang po bye ba de snyed sprul par byed de/_shing ljon pa de dag gi drung du lha mo bye ba dgu bcu rtsa dgu re re dang /_dbang po de dag dang /_lhan cig rtse zhing yongs su spyod pa na/_lha mo de dag gcig la gcig ni mi mthong ngo /_/gang dang gang gi tshe lha 
[\[112b.7\]]mo dag ji tsam du brgya byin gyi cha byad dang /_rgyan gyi rnam pa dag yid la sems pa de srid du cha byad dang rgyan gyi rnam pa nyid mthong nas gnyis sprod par byed la/_de srid du tshal gyi nang du rnam pa du mar dga' bar byed cing yongs su sprod par byed de/_de bas na dpag bsam gyi shing zhes bya'o/_de dag gal 
[\[113a\]]
[\[113a.1\]]te rab tu 'byed pa na/_tshal de'i nang na ri yod pa ri rtse ba zhes bya ba mthong ste/_ri de yang rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin yin zhing /_rdo rje myu gu'i rdo rje bkram pa gser gyi lcug ma tshang tshing 'dres pas khyim byas pa/_gser dang dngul mthon ka lta bu'i [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]rnams kyis mdzes par byas 
[\[113a.2\]]pa bya sna tshogs skad 'byin pa/_dga' ba'i ri de la khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]rgyal ba mchog 'gro zhes bya ba ka ba stong yod de/_gser dang /_bai DUr+ya dang /_mthon ka'i ka ba 'dres pa rnams kyis mdzes par byas pa/_kun nas rdo rje dang /_mu tig rags pa rnams kyis spras pa/_'ja' lta bu'i rnam pa khri snyed 
[\[113a.3\]]kyis sdug par byas pa/_bai DUr+ya'i seng ge'i khri la stan khra bos g.yogs shing /_steng du gding ba 'jam po bting ba/_khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]de na bai DUr+ya'i stan stong gis mdzes par byas pa/_brgya byin lha dang lha ma yin du g.yul bkye ba las rnam par rgyal nas mdzes par byas pa de sum cu rtsa gsum gyi sar 
[\[113a.4\]]song nas/_lha thams cad kyi rang bzhin lha rnams dang lhan cig rab tu dga'o/_/de nas lha mo de dag khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]der song nas rtse bar byed/_glu len par byed/_bro rdung bar byed/_yongs su spyod par byed/_phan tshun rtsed mo dag byed pa na/_rang gi las ngan pa dang bzang po dang 'bring po rnams 
[\[113a.5\]]kyis dga' bar byed do/_/de dag res 'ga' khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]rgyal ba mchog 'gro de nas babs nas/_de nas yang ri rtse ba de nyid la gnas par byed cing der 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems kyis 'dod chags gcig pu don du byed pa dag phan tshun dga' bar byed do/_/'di ltar bud med thams cad ni 
[\[113a.6\]]'dod chags kyi tshogs dang ldan pa yin la/_mtho ris na khyad par du lha'i yul dag na che ba yin no/_/de dag gal te yongs su rgyu ba na ri de la bza' ba dang btung ba yod pa'i sar nye bar 'gro bar byed de/_de yang gzugs dang /_kha dog dang /_dri dang /_ro sna tshogs yod la btung ba myos par byed 
[\[113a.7\]]pa/_lha'i gzugs dang /_dri dang /_ro phun sum tshogs pa rnams kyis gang ba yin no/_/de la btung ba'i rnam pa de dag ni ra ro ba'i skyon dang bral ba yin te/_'di lta ste/_dga' bar byed pa'i btung ba gang 'thungs na lha mo dag shin tu dga' bar 'gyur ba dang /_mthong bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i btung ba 
[\[113b\]]
[\[113b.1\]]gang 'thungs na/_mtho ris kyi tshal dang /_nye ba'i tshal thams cad ri gzhan du mas chod kyang mthong bar 'gyur ba dang /_ro rab tu mang po zhes bya ba'i btung ba ro mang po'i 'dod pa gang 'thungs na spro ba dang /_kha dog dang /_gzugs dang /_stobs brgya 'gyur du 'gyur ba'i btung ba de dag lha 
[\[113b.2\]]mos 'thungs nas/_yang zas kyi don du zas yod pa dag tu 'gro bar byed do/_/de'i zas dag rang gi las dang rjes su 'thun pa yin te/_ngan pa dang /_'bring dang /_bzang po yin la/_ro dang /_kha dog dang /_dri dang /_reg pa'i rnam pa las kyis bsgrubs pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no/_/de 
[\[113b.3\]]bzhin du btung ba dag kyang rang gi las kyis bsgrubs pa'i ngo bo so sor bstan pa yin te/_de dag gis btung ba de 'thungs shing zas bdud rtsi de yang zos nas/_rtse ba'i ri de la rol mo'i sa ga la ba der 'dong ngo /_/sa de dag na pi bang khog pa ni bai DUr+ya gser gyi 'dab mas ni brgyan/_
[\[113b.4\]]gser skud ring pos ni rgyud byas pa dang /_gser las byas pa'i rnga dag las sgra snyan pa dag 'byung ngo /_/de bzhin du smyug ma'i nang 'dres pa'i sbu gu rnam pa du ma dag kyang lha mo de dag gis mthong ste/_de ltar sil dkrol dang /_gling bu dang /_sgra snyan pa la sogs pa rol mo'i rgyu du ma dag 
[\[113b.5\]]gis yang de dag gi yid rab tu dga' bar byed do/_/thams cad rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa de rnams rol mo'i rgyu de dag blangs nas/_phan tshun yang dag par dga' bar bya ba dang /_'dod chags sna tshogs skyed pa dang /_chags pa mnyam pa dang /_tshang tshing na gnas pa myog ces byed pa dang /_
[\[113b.6\]]shin tu 'dod chags skyed pa phun sum tshogs pa bya ba'i phyir rol mo dag byed do/_/de nas yang de dag gis rol mo de byas nas dril bu g.yer ka yod pa'i sa ga la ba der 'dong ngo /_/sa de dag na dril bu g.yer ka sgra mang po'i tshogs dag 'khrol te/_gang dag rlung gis bskyod pa'i sgra rnam pa brgya 
[\[113b.7\]]phrag du ma dag grag go/_/de dag gis sgra de thos nas yang cha byad dang /_gzugs dang rgyan sna tshogs thogs pa rnams shin tu dga' ste/_bro gar byed/_dgod par byed/_glu len no/_/sgra des tshim nas yang de nas babs te/_ngang pa dang /_ngur pas mdzes par byas pa'i rdzing ga la ba der 'dong bar byed 
[\[114a\]]
[\[114a.1\]]de/_bya ngang pa dang /_kA raN+Da ba dang /_ngur pa dang /_gser dang /_dngul gyi mdog lta bu'i bya'i tshogs gzhan rnams kyis kyang rdzing mdzes par byas pa de dang de dag tu chu la rtse ba'i phyir zhugs so/_/ser sna dang phrag dog dang bral ba de dag thams cad der babs nas/_pad ma'i sdong bu gser 
[\[114a.2\]]dang dngul dang bai DUr+ya lta bu rnams kyis phan tshun rdeg par byed la/_de dag yun ring du ca co'i sgra dang /_chu yan lag brgyad dang ldan zhing yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa la yun ring du rtses/_bya'i tshogs rnams dang yang lhan cig rtses nas/_de nas yang rgyags pa du ma byed pa rgyags pa la dga' ba/_
[\[114a.3\]]rgyags pa don du gnyer ba/_rgyags pa'i ngo bo rgyags pas ngoms mi myong ba/_yul la brkam pa dag sa ris gzhan dag tu 'dong bar byed de/_tshal me long tshal zhes bya ba der dong ngo /_/der bdag nyid kyi gzugs brnyan cha byad dang /_rgyan bzang pos brgyan par gyur pa mthong ste/_bdag nyid 
[\[114a.4\]]kyi gzugs brnyan yon tan sna tshogs phun sum tshogs pa de nye bar mthong zhing me long gi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs su rang gi yon tan phun sum tshogs pa dang /_cha byad dang /_rgyan phun sum tshogs pa mthong ngo /_/der mthong nas de nas yang gzugs kyis rgyags pa bcu 'gyur du 'jug ste/_
[\[114a.5\]]gang gi phyir bud med rgyags pas myos pa ni rnam pa gsum ste/_'di lta ste/_gzugs kyis rgyags pa dang /_skyes pas rgyags pa dang /_nga rgyal gyis rgyags pa'o/_/de dag rang gi gzugs rgyags pas myos pa mthong nas/_gzhan dag la bud med kyi grangs su [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]kyang mi rtsi'o/_/de nas 
[\[114a.6\]]yang me long gi sa de las gzhan pa dus tshigs thams cad ces bya ba'i tshal du 'dong bar byed de/_tshal de na dus tshigs drug rtag tu yod la 'khor lo bzhin yongs su 'khor ba yin te/_'di lta ste/_dgun dang /_dgun smad dang /_dpyid dang /_sos ka dang /_dbyar dang /_ston to/_/tshal de 
[\[114a.7\]]kun nas dus tshigs dang 'thun par sa ris dang /_tshal gyi bya kha dog bzang po du ma rnams dang dus tshigs dang 'thun par 'gro ba rnams kyis sdug par byas pa'i tshal der bde bar gnas par bya ba'i phyir dong ngo /_/phan tshun grogs byed pa/_phan tshun thab mo dang phrag dog gis mi dga' 
[\[114b\]]
[\[114b.1\]]ba med pa/_phan tshun 'dzem pa med pa phan tshun sdug cing byams pa/_de rnams tshal de mthong nas dus tshigs gang yin pa dang 'dod pa gang yin pa'i tshal der de rnams dong ste/_tshal de na dus tshigs dang 'thun par rtse dga' bar byed do/_/dus tshigs kun so sor byung ba'i tshal na dus tshigs 
[\[114b.2\]]sna tshogs su byung ba rnams kyis yid la rtse ba'i rnam pa skyes pa lha mo de dag dang bya'i tshogs dang lhan cig ji srid gzhan du spro ba ma skyes pa de srid du dga' bar byed rtse bar byed do/_/de nas yang rtse zhing gnas pa yid rab tu dga' ba de dag yang lha'i rgyal po brgya byin ga la ba der dong ste khyim thab de 
[\[114b.3\]]mngon par mthong nas cho ga sna tshogs la mkhas pa'i lha mo de rnams kyis kun nas yongs su bskor te/_bro gar byed/_dgod par byed/_glu dbyangs len to/_/de ltar lha'i rgyal po brgya byin gyi tshal gcig la yon tan gyi rnam pa phun sum tshogs pa yin te/_lha'i rgyal po brgya byin 
[\[114b.4\]]gyi tshal gcig ni de lta bu yin no/_/de nas yang dge slong de lha'i rgyal po brgya byin gyi tshal gnyis pa la rtog par byed de/_tshal de rnam pa ni du yod/_ming ni ji skad btags zhig gu snyam nas/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/_tshal kun dga' zhes bya ba yod de/_
[\[114b.5\]]tshal de na yon tan du yod cig gu snyam nas des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/_'di ltar tshal de ni ngo bo nyid kyis kun dga' ba yin te/_tshal de na lha dang lha mo'i tshogs rab tu dga' bas ni kun du gang /_thams cad nas rtag tu dog cing phan tshun gyi gdong 
[\[114b.6\]]mthon po gzhan dang gzhan 'byes pa skyed par lha'i rgyal po brgya byin lha'i bu mo 'bum gyis yongs su bskor te/_dga' spyod la gnas par bya ba'i phyir 'gro bar byed do/_/lha'i dbang po brgya byin de 'gro ba na skyed mos tshal du 'gro ba'i shing rta brgyad khri bzhi stong gi rgyu bai DUr+ya las 
[\[114b.7\]]byas shing dril bu g.yer ka mang po 'phyang ba kha cig rta mgo bo 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser gyis brgyan cing /_rtsib logs dngul gyis gtams la rin po che sna bdun gyis mdzes par byas pas khrid/_kha cig ni ngang pas khrid/_kha cig ni nam mkha' la 'gro/_kha cig ni sa la 'gro la/_glu 
[\[115a\]]
[\[115a.1\]]dbyangs dang /_sil snyan dang /_rol mo rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bskor ba'i lha'i gtso bo dag zhugs te/_brgya byin gyi 'khor byas nas dong ngo /_/bal glang brgyad khri bzhi stong gi lus gser gyi dra bas g.yogs shing /_lus la dril bu g.yer ka ni 'phyang /_lus la stan 
[\[115a.2\]]khra bo dang gding bas ni g.yogs/_'gram pa la dngul gyi thig le gsal ba ni 'dzag_/lha'i rol mo'i glu dbyangs dag len pa na/_lha'i gtso bo dag zhon te/_brgya byin gyi ngo 'ba' zhig tu lta bas brgya byin yongs su bskor nas skyed mos tshal du 'dong ngo /_/lha mo brgyad khri bzhi stong cha 
[\[115a.3\]]byad dang rgyan sna tshogs thogs shing kha dog dang /_gzugs sna tshogs su 'dug pa dag brgya byin 'ba' zhig lta la/_kha cig ni bro gar byed/_kha cig ni glu len/_de dag gi nang na kha cig ni yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i rol mo byed/_kha cig ni rtsed mo sna tshogs byed cing skyed mos tshal du dga' 
[\[115a.4\]]spyod byed du 'dong ngo /_/bro gar mkhan cha byad rnam bzhi dang /_gzugs dang /_cha byad sna tshogs dang ldan pa dag kyang bro gar byed/_rtsed mo byed yongs su spyod par byed pa dag brgya byin gyi ngo 'ba' zhig tu lta zhing skyed mos tshal ga la ba der dga' spyod byed du 'dong ste/_lha'i dbang po brgya 
[\[115a.5\]]byin bde sogs dang lhan cig de dag gi nang du zhugs nas/_shing rta rtsibs brgya pa bai DUr+ya dang /_gser dang /_spug dang /_pad ma rA ga dang /_an da rnyil dang /_mthon ka chen pos brgyan pa'i shing rta gang yin pa de/_ngang pa'i lus ni 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser rkang pa ni byi ru/_mig ni rin 
[\[115a.6\]]po che ke ke ru/_lus ni pad ma rA ga_/mchu ni byi ru/_sgro ni mu tig gi mdog lta bu stong phrag brgya snyed kyis shing rta de 'dren par byed de/_brgya byin gyi yid la 'dod pa bzhin du 'gro bar byed do/_/shing rta mchog de'i nang na brgya byin lha'i rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan cing /_nyi ma brgya bas lhag pa'i 
[\[115a.7\]]gzi dang ldan pa bde sogs dang lhan cig tu skyed mos tshal ga la ba der 'dong ngo /_/lha mo thams cad kyi nang na bde sogs gzugs dang cha byad dang /_rgyan brgya 'gyur gyis phun sum tshogs la de rin po ches brgyan te/_brgya byin gyi stan phyed la 'dug nas/_skyed mos tshal ga la ba der 'dong ngo /_/sum 
[\[115b\]]
[\[115b.1\]]cu rtsa gsum gyi lha de dag thams cad de ltar lha'i bde ba dang ni ldan/_lha'i sgra dang /_reg pa dang /_ro dang /_gzugs dang /_dri'i reg pas myos shing lha'i dbang po brgya byin lha kun gyis yongs su bskor te/_tshal dang nye ba'i tshal dag yang dag par lta bar byed la gser gyi shing rta'i nang du zhugs te/_
[\[115b.2\]]bde sogs dang lhan cig snga ma bzhin du kun dga'i tshal ga la ba der 'dong ngo /_/lha'i bdag po de bde ba rnam pa brgya stong phrag du ma dag nye bar spyod pa na/_shing rta dang /_glang po che dang /_lha dang /_lha'i blon po glu dang /_sil snyan dang /_dbyangs dang /_rol mo'i sgra rnams kyis mngon par mchod cing 
[\[115b.3\]]kun dga'i tshal ga la ba der gnas par bya ba'i don du 'dong ngo /_brgya byin de ltar 'gro ba na gang de'i tshal de na lha mo sgeg mo 'khod pa de dag gis glu dang /_rol mo'i sgra dang /_sil snyan sna tshogs thos pa de dag lha gzhan rnams dang lhan cig tu de thos te yid rab tu dga' nas rgyug par byed do/_/de dag lag 
[\[115b.4\]]na pad ma thogs shing sil snyan sna tshogs dang /_glu dbyangs nye bar len la tshal de nas 'byung bar byed do/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis de dag mthong nas rang gi lha dag la smras pa/_kye lha rnams lha mo 'di dag ni kun dga'i tshal nas nga mthong ste bsur 'ongs la/_sil snyan dang /_
[\[115b.5\]]rol mo'i sgra byung ba dang /_gzhan yang rin po che'i cha byad dang /_gzugs rnam pa du ma yod pa de dag la lha rnams ltos/_gang lha mo de dag dang bdag cag lhan cig lha'i tshal skyed mos tshal du rtse zhing dga' spyod byed du 'dong ngo /_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi tshig de thos nas lha rnams 
[\[115b.6\]]kyis tshig 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha'i dbang po lha mo 'di dag thams cad ni khyod kyi lags te/_skyabs khyod lags/_rten khyod lags/_mgon khyod lags so/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis tshig 'di skad ces smras so/_/'di dag gi gtso bo ni nga ma yin te/_rten nga ma yin/_skyabs 
[\[115b.7\]]nga ma yin/_'di dag ni nga'i ma yin no/_/'di dag las kyi mthus rab tu rgyug pa yin te/_bdag po las yin/_rten las yin/_rton pa las yin te/_las ngan pa dang /_'bring dang /_bzang po gang yin pa de dag gis de ltar 'gyur la/_las kyi dbang de dag gis ngan pa dang /_
[\[116a\]]
[\[116a.1\]]'bring dang /_bzang por byas pa yin gyi nga'i mthu ni ma yin no/_/de nas de'i tshe 'di ltar lha rnams kyi dbang pos tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_las ngan pas ni lus can rnams/_/'gro ba dag ni ngan par 'gyur/_/'bring dag gis ni 'bring du mthong /_/de bas bzang ba mi 
[\[116a.2\]]rnams so/_/gang gis gang du gang gi tshe/_/gang byas las ni rjes myong ba/_/de yis der ni de yi tshe/_/las de lus la rnam smin 'gyur/_/lha khang 'od kyi phreng ba can/_/bde ba'i rnam pas rtse byed pa/_/de ni dge ba'i 'bras bur mthong /_/khyad par du ni dri ma med/_/mi ni las 
[\[116a.3\]]dag gang byed pa/_/dge 'am yang na mi dge byed/_/de yi 'bras bu de tshe mthong /_/bde 'am yang na mi bder 'gyur/_/bde ba'i rnam pa 'di rnams kyis/_/lha dag du mar rtse ba gang /_/de rgyu nga yi ma yin te/_/rgyu de sngon ni byas pa yin/_/de nas lha de rnams kyis brgya byin de'i kha 
[\[116a.4\]]nas tshigs bcad de dag thos te rjes su yi rang la spyi bos blangs nas/_yang skyed mos tshal du gnas par bya ba'i phyir/_skyed mos tshal ga la ba der 'dong ngo /_/de nas lha mo stong ngam/_stong phrag brgya de dag so so'i lag pa pad mas brel cing /_cha byad dang /_gzugs dang /_rgyan sna tshogs 
[\[116a.5\]]thogs pa yin te/_'di ltar lha mo de dag phan tshun so so na cha byad dang /_gzugs dang /_'gros dang /_glu dbyangs dang /_rol mo byed pa dag mi 'dra ba yin no/_/de ltar dge ba'i las du mas sprul pa'i lha mo brgya 'am stong de dag shin tu mkhas pas sprul pa yin no/_/de nas de dag thams 
[\[116a.6\]]cad lha'i dbang po brgya byin ga la ba de logs su phyogs shing bro gar byed la/_kun dga'i tshal de ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do/_/tshal der sngar 'jug pa na dngul gyi shing ljon pa rnams dang /_dngul gyi 'dab ma dang /_dngul gyi sa gzhi dang /_dngul gyi mdog lta bu rnams kyis mdzes 
[\[116a.7\]]par byas pa/_bya thams cad kyang dngul gyi bya ste/_bya'i tshogs kyi rnam pas kun du gang la/_sgra rnam pa sna tshogs 'byin pas mdzes par byas pa dang po nyid du lha'i dbang po brgya byin zhabs 'bring ba dang /_lhan cig 'jug par byed do/_/de 'jug pa na rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyis 
[\[116b\]]
[\[116b.1\]]brgyan pa'i 'od dang /_tshal dngul gyis brgyan pa'i 'od gang yin pa'i 'od gnyis po de dag phan tshun 'khril ba lta bur 'byung zhing 'od dag gis nam mkha' brgyan pa lta bur yang 'byung ngo /_/brgya byin de yang yid rab tu dga' la/_lha mo de dag so so'i glu shin tu snyan cing snyoms pa len 
[\[116b.2\]]te/_sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pa phyad par byed do/_/shing rta brgyad khri bzhi stong dang /_de bzhin du glang po che brgyad khri bzhi stong rnams kyang snga ma bzhin te/_nor bu dang /_dril bu g.yer ka dang /_gling bu'i sgra rnams thos nas/_lha mo stong phrag du ma rnams kyis bstod cing 
[\[116b.3\]]lha mo 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgus yongs su bskor ba yin te/_sum cu rtsa gsum gyi dbang phyug gi lus dang sems kyi bde ba gang yin pa de ni dpe bya bar sla ba ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sum cu rtsa gsum gyi dbang phyug gi lha'i gnas pa dang /_kha zas kyi bde ba de ni gzhan 
[\[116b.4\]]dang mi 'dra'o/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin lha'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga 'byor pa dngul gyi tshal de'i nang du zhugs nas/_lha'i tshogs dang lha mo'i tshogs thams cad dang bcas pa yun ring du rtse bar byed/_yongs su spyod par byed de/_yul gyi bde ba des mchog tu bde'o/_/
[\[116b.5\]]de nas yang lha'i dbang po brgya byin rtse zhing gnas pa'i don du yang lha mo'i tshogs thams cad dang /_shing rta dang /_glang po che rnams dang bcas pa snga ma bzhin tshal de ga la ba der 'dong ngo /_/der phyin nas gser gyi tshal gnyis pa gser btso ma'i kha dog lta bu dang de bzhin du 'bras 
[\[116b.6\]]bu rnams kyis mdzes par byas pa mthong ngo /_/mi lnga'i zheng gi tshad tsam gyi 'bras bu ro sbrang rtsi ltar mngar la dri'i rnam pa phun sum tshogs pa'i 'bras bu de gang zos na/_shin tu dregs pa skye bar 'gyur ba mthong nas yal ga bkug ste 'bras bu de dag glang po che rnams kyis za bar 
[\[116b.7\]]byed do/_/de nas 'bras bu zos pa'i glang po che de dag myos te 'gying zhing 'gro ba rnams/_ji ltar lha rnams kyang /_kye e ma glang po che myos shing 'gying la 'gro ba rnams 'bras bu'i ro thams cad zos nas myos te/_rab tu gar byed pa ngo mtshar du byed pa de ltar sil snyan gyi sgra des lhan cig 
[\[117a\]]
[\[117a.1\]]gar byed do/_/de bzhin du gser gyi tshal de na bya'i tshogs du ma sgra 'byin la/_tshal de na bya dngul gyi kha dog can de dag de rnams la chags shing 'dug pas shin tu mdzes par byas so/_/lha'i dbang po brgya byin yang lha mo de dag dang /_lhan cig lha de dag dang yang 
[\[117a.2\]]lhan cig lha'i bu mo bde sogs dang yang bdag nyid lhan cig tu dga' bar byed/_yongs su spyod par byed rtse bar byed tshim par byed do/_/lha de dag kyang rang gi slas rnams kyi nang na dga' bar byed/_yongs su spyod par byed/_glu dbyangs len/_bro gar byed/_dgod par byed de/_
[\[117a.3\]]legs pa byas pa'i lha rnams phan tshun phrag dog dang /_ser sna dag med par rtsed mo byed do/_/de nas gser gyi tshal de'i nang na chu bsil ba zhes bya ba'i rdzing bu gnyis pa yod de/_de yang gser dang bai DUr+ya'i pad ma rnams kyis bkra bar brgyan pa yin la/_sum cu rtsa gsum na gnas 
[\[117a.4\]]pa'i lha rnams dang /_lha'i 'dun sa chos bzang na gnas pa brgya byin gyi sngon du 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag gis yongs su bskor te/_rdzing de dag gi 'gram na lha mo'i tshogs rnams dang lhan cig sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pa rnams kyis rtse bar byed de/_yongs su spyod par 
[\[117a.5\]]byed do/_/de nas yang khang pa chos bzang gi nang na lha 'khod pa de dag tshal kun dga' ga la ba der 'dong ngo /_/tshal de'i nang na bai DUr+ya'i shing ljon pas mdzes par byas shing /_gser gyi mdog gi 'bras bus brgyan pa yin la/_lha'i 'bras bu de dag gi nang du khu ba zhim 
[\[117a.6\]]pos ji ltar gang ba ni 'dzam bu'i gling na nA Di ke r+ya dang /_pa nas bzhin no/_/shun pa sra ba'i nang na 'bras bu mngar ba zhes bya ba dri zhim la/_mdog bzang po mang ba yod de/_de nas lha de dag gis 'bras bu de blangs nas gshags te 'thung ngo /_/sbrang rtsi bas lhag pa'i 
[\[117a.7\]]ro yod pa 'thungs nas kyang myos pa'i nyes pa dang /_'brel bas myos so/_/de nas lha dag myos pa rnam pa gsum gyis myos par 'gyur te/_'di lta ste/_bud med kyis myos pa dang /_'bras bu'i khu bas myos pa dang /_lha'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams kyis 
[\[117b\]]
[\[117b.1\]]myos pa yin te/_de ltar lha rnams lha mo'i tshogs dag dang lhan cig myos pa rnam pa gsum gyis myos so/_/lha'i dbang po brgya byin yang brgya byin gyi 'dun sar 'gro ba dang lhan cig bdud rtsi la za ste/_rang gi las kyi 'bras bu tshong pa lta bus bsgrubs pa'i bdud rtsi de blangs nas za 
[\[117b.2\]]bar byed do/_/brgya byin lha'i tshogs dang bcas pa thams cad kyis yongs su bskor nas yul nas yul/_gnas nas gnas su song ste/_dga' bar byed/_rtse bar byed/_yongs su spyod par byed do/_/bai DUr+ya'i tshal de dag thams cad bya dang /_bung ba dang /_dril 
[\[117b.3\]]bu g.yer ka dang /_ro sna tshogs dag gis nyams dga' ba yin te/_tshal der yun ring du dga' bar byas so/_/de nas yang lha'i dbang po brgya byin lha'i tshogs de dag nyid dang /_lha'i 'dun sa chos bzang du 'jug par byed do/_/de nas yang lha'i 'dun sa chos bzang na lha'i 
[\[117b.4\]]tshal gsum pa dpe med pa zhes bya ba yod de/_tshal ngo bo nyid kyis dpe med pa gang yin pa der lha'i rgyal po brgya byin gyi bu lnga brgya rang gi slas kyis yongs su bskor nas rtse bar byed/_yongs su spyod par byed de/_'di dag ni 'byor pa yin no/_/de'i 'og tu rgyas pa ni 'di 
[\[117b.5\]]lta ste/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi bu de dag 'di lta bu yin te/_thams cad chos dang ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa thams cad yang dag pa'i lta ba dang ldan pa/_yang dag pa'i lta ba sngar blangs pa'i lha rnams lha dang lha ma yin las rnam par rgyal ba 'thob pa thams cad 
[\[117b.6\]]mar 'dzin pa/_phar 'dzin pa/_dge sbyong du 'dzin pa/_bram zer 'dzin pa/_phan tshun kun yid 'thun par gyur pa yin la de dag res 'ga' 'di snyam du 'di ltar bdag cag nges par skyed mos tshal dpe med pa zhes bya ba der dga' spyod byed du bdag cag lha mo'i tshogs dang bcas 
[\[117b.7\]]pas yongs su bskor te 'dong bar bya'o snyam mo/_/de ltar de dag thams cad bsams nas skyed mos tshal dpe med pa ga la ba der 'dong ngo /_/de ltar lha'i bu re re dag gi lha mo bye ba yod pa de dag gzugs dang /_lang tsho phun sum tshogs pa'i phan tshun gyi bya ba gcig pu 
[\[118a\]]
[\[118a.1\]]ni rgyags par gnas pa/_rgyags pa lhur byed pa rtag tu 'thun pa yin te/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin ga la ba der dong nas lha 'di ltar bdag cag skyed mos tshal der gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du skyed mos tshal dpe ma mchis par mchi bar bgyi'o/_/lha skyed 
[\[118a.2\]]mos tshal dpe ma mchis pa der bdag cag dang lhan cig gnas par mdzad pa'i slad du gshegs pa ni 'os pa lags na dgongs su gsol/_brgya byin gyis smras pa/_de lta ma yin no/_/skyed mos tshal gyi dga' spyod ni ngas byas zin te/_chos kyi rjes su chos bsgrubs 
[\[118a.3\]]pa dang /_'dun pa sngon du btang ba'i phyir bdag cag gi don rjes su bsgrub par bya'o/_/ngas ni lha rnams kyi bag yod pas skyed mos tshal du dga' spyod byas nas slar 'ongs pa yin no/_/lha rnams ni bag med pa'i nyes pas nyon mongs pa yin te/_de ltar bag 
[\[118a.4\]]yod par bya zhing de lta bas na bag med pa'i nyes pa'i dug mi bzad pa spongs shig ces smras so/_/'dir tshigs su bcad pa/_bag yod bdud rtsi'i gnas yin te/_/bag med 'chi ba'i gnas yin no/_/bag yod 'chi bar mi 'gyur te/_/bag med pa ni rtag tu 
[\[118a.5\]]'chi/_/bag yod 'chi med gzhi yin te/_/bag med pa ni 'chi ba'i gzhi/_/bu dag bdag ni bag yod pas/_/lha rnams kyi ni gtso bor gyur/_/de ni bdag ste bde gshegs bka'/_/bu dag bdag gis bsgrub par bya/_/bdag gis sdom brtson can gyi bka'/_/nams 
[\[118a.6\]]kyang 'da' ba mi bya ste/_/thub pa'i bka' las 'da' ba gang /_/'dod pa yis ni rmongs pa yin/_/sdug bsngal de las thar med de/_/rtag tu sdug bsngal rjes su 'gro/_/de ltar lha'i dbang po des bu de dag la bsgo nas/_rang gi gnas lha'i 'dun sa chos bzang 
[\[118a.7\]]du zhugs so/_/de nas brgya byin gyi bu yid rab tu dga' zhing phan tshun nang 'thun pa rnams rang gi gnas lha'i gser bzang po las byas shing rgyan gyis brgyan pa/_glu dbyangs dang /_rol mo'i sgra 'byin pa/_rnam pa sna tshogs phan tshun brgyan pa'i brgya byin gyi gnas ga 
[\[118b\]]
[\[118b.1\]]la ba der 'jug go/_/zhugs nas kyang 'di ltar bdag cag ni skyed mos tshal du dga' spyod bya ba'i phyir/_skyed mos tshal dpe med par dga' spyod byed du 'dong ngo zhes smras so/_/de nas lha'i bu gzhon nu bdun khri dag kha cig ni gser gyi shing rta la zhon/_kha cig ni lha'i bya'i steng 
[\[118b.2\]]du zhon/_lha mo dag rjes su 'gro zhing lha mo kha cig nam mkha' la 'gro kha cig lha mo dang lha'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor te/_pad ma mchog gi nang nas 'gro la/_bde ba mchog rjes su myong zhing /_rol mo dang /_glu dbyangs len pa dag dang lhan cig tshal dpe med pa ga la ba der 'dong 
[\[118b.3\]]bar byed do/_/de nas brgya byin gyi bu de rnams kyi lus lha'i phreng bas brgyan cing lha'i tsan dan gyis bskus te/_rang gi 'od kha cig ni nyi ma'i 'od dang 'dra/_kha cig ni zla ba'i 'od dang 'dra/_kha cig gza' dang skar ma'i 'od dang 'dra ste/_ji ltar las dag byas pa bzhin mdzes shing /_skyed 
[\[118b.4\]]mos tshal shin tu gang ba dpe med pa ga la ba der 'dong bar byed de/_gcig la gcig legs par bya ba la gzhol zhing sdug pa lha'i yul dag nye bar spyod bzhin du tshal der zhugs so/_/tshal de yang ngo bo nyid kyis dpe med pa yin te/_de'i phyogs 'ga' kho na zhig dper gzung zhing bya na 
[\[118b.5\]]tshal der zhugs na de'i tshe dri'i rnam pa dpe med pa rab tu ldang ste/_gang tsan dan sa mchog gi dri gzhan bcu drug gi char yang mi phod do/_/de ltar dri de yid du 'ong ste/_snoms pa gang yin pa de yang bde ba dang ldan pa'i rnam pa de lta bu yin no/_/der de dag phan tshun ngo mtshar skye bar 'gyur te/_
[\[118b.6\]]bdag cag gi bde ba ma yin no snyam nas/_skom 'thungs te tshal der zhugs so/_/de nas zhugs pa dang tshal de dag gi dang po bstan pa ni dge ba'i las 'bad pa dag gis bskyed pa'i shing ljon pa'i cha sdug pa yin te/_tshal de na shing ljon pa'i sdong po rnams kyi cha sdug par byas pa yin no/_/
[\[118b.7\]]de dag brgya tsam ni bai DUr+ya las byas/_brgya tsam ni gser las byas/_brgya tsam ni dngul las byas/_brgya tsam ni shel las byas pa yin te/_de ltar de'i tshe shing ljon pa rnams kyi sdong po sna tshogs yin no/_/'di lta ste dper na 'dzam bu'i gling na ri mo bris pa'i ngos sdug pa de bzhin du 
[\[119a\]]
[\[119a.1\]]shing ljon pa sna tshogs de dag sdug pa yin no/_/shing ljon pa sdug pa de rnams kyi rnam pa du ma dang /_kha dog du ma dang /_gzugs du ma dang /_dbyibs du ma yod pa de dag lha'i bu me long gi ngos ltar dri ma med pa de dag gis mthong nas/_de nas yang lta ba skyed cing kun du 
[\[119a.2\]]rgyu ba 'bum phrag du ma dag kun nas rab tu dga' zhing lha mo'i tshogs kyis gang ba/_rol mo dang /_sil snyan gyi sgra 'byin pa'i rnam pa rab tu dga' ba'i yid kyis skyed mos tshal du yun ring du bde bar bya ba'i phyir/_tshal dpe med pa de ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do/_/de ltar der zhugs 
[\[119a.3\]]pa dang lha'i bya'i tshogs de dag sgro ni gser/_lto ni bai DUr+ya/_rkang pa ni byi ru/_rgyab ni dngul/_mig ni rin po che ke ke ru ste/_shin tu rnar snyan pa'i rnam pa de dag gi sgra 'byin par byed do/_/de nas lha'i bu rnams kyis bya'i tshogs de rnams kyang mthong ngo /_/sgra mchog tu snyan cing 'jebs 
[\[119a.4\]]pa 'byin pa yang rnar thos shing /_bya de dag mthong nas/_lha'i bu de rnams rang gi bya dag la phan tshun smod par byed de/_'di ltar khyed kun gson cig_/bya sgra 'byin pa rnam pa du ma dang /_kha dog dang ldan pa du ma dang /_sgra rnam pa du mas lha mo'i tshogs de rnams kyi glu dbyangs 
[\[119a.5\]]de dag thams cad kun nas mi mngon pa de ltar zil gyis non to/_/de nas bya de dag gi sgra thos nas de nas yang de'i 'og tu skyed mos tshal du rtse bar bya ba'i phyir tshal du 'dong bar byed do/_/de nas pad ma'i rdzing pad ma'i nyi ma'i 'od lta bu zhes bya ba thams cad mthong ste/_pad ma'i 'dab ma nyi ma 
[\[119a.6\]]lta bu stong gis yongs su bskor ba de dag la mngon par brtags nas/_lha'i bu cha byad dang /_gzugs sna tshogs 'chang ba de dag snga ma bzhin pad ma'i rdzing de ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do/_/de nas lha'i bu de dag lha mo'i tshogs dang bcas pas yongs su bskor cing pad ma'i rdzing de bskor 
[\[119a.7\]]nas/_bro rdung bar byed/_glu dbyangs len/_dgod par byed/_rtsed mo byed/_yongs su spyod par byed de/_lha'i bu de dag bde ba sna tshogs kyi rgyags pas myos so/_/de nas yang pad ma'i tshal gyi phyogs de nas de dag phan tshun lhan cig tu lha'i rgyags pas myos shing /_lha yul gyi gnas chen 
[\[119b\]]
[\[119b.1\]]po tshal de'i nang ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do/_/de nas lha mo'i tshogs gar byed cing /_lus la cha byad dang /_rgyan sna tshogs thogs pa de dag thams cad chu bo 'bab pa'i tshal dga' ba ga la ba der 'dong bar byed de/_tshal de na yang chu bo 'bab pa'i chu'i rnam pa ni 'di lta ste/_'o ma'i chu dang /_
[\[119b.2\]]chang gi ro'i chu dang /_sbrang rtsi'i chu dang /_rgun chang gi chu dang /_lha'i btung ba'i chu dang /_bung bas khebs pa dang /_bya'i tshogs brgyas yongs su bskor ba dang /_gser gyi rdo dang /_byi ru'i rdo dang /_dngul gyi rdo dang /_rdo sna tshogs 'bab pa dag mthong ngo /_/de nas lha'i bu lha mo'i tshogs kyis yongs 
[\[119b.3\]]su bskor ba de dag der rtses nas/_tshal ga la ba der lha mo rnams dang lhan cig yun ring du dga' bar byed yongs su spyod par byed do/_/de nas chu bo 'bab pa'i phyogs de nas kyang lha'i me tog gi tshal ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do/_/de na lha'i me tog ma rnyis pa dpag tshad bcur dri rgya cher 'byung ba dag yod 
[\[119b.4\]]de/_'di lta ste/_me tog zla ba'i 'od ces bya ba zla ba'i mdog lta bu dang /_me tog nyi ma'i 'od ces bya ba nyi ma'i mdog lta bu yin yang 'od tsha ba med pa dang /_gza' dang skar ma lta bu'i 'bras bu'i tshal thams cad du lha'i bu de dag 'dong bar byed do/_/tshal der 'bras bu 'byung ba dag ni 'di lta ste/_
[\[119b.5\]]sbrang rtsi gong bu'i 'bras bu dang /_'bras bu rno ba dang /_'jam pa zhu ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dri'i 'bras bu ste/_dri gang shin tu tshim par byed pa nyid dang /_ro drug pa'i 'bras bu dang /_ji ltar ro 'dod pa'i 'bras bu dang /_ro mi ngoms pa'i 'bras bu ste/_'bras bu'i rnam pa de dag ni lha rnams 
[\[119b.6\]]kyis legs par byas pa'i las kyi sprul pa'i 'bras bu yin te/_tshal dpe med pa der 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/tshal der yang lha rnams dga' bar byed/_rtse bar byed/_yongs su spyod par byed/_za bar byed/_'cha' bar byed/_'thog par byed/_'thung bar byed/_'jib par byed/_de dag 
[\[119b.7\]]der dga' bar byas nas/_tshal bya bro gar byed pa zhes bya ba'i phyogs ga la ba der 'dong bar byed de/_tshal de na bya'i tshogs skad 'byin pa dag mthong zhing glu dbyangs kyi sgra gzhan 'byin pa dang /_gar gzhan byed pa dang /_sgra snyan pa gzhan gyis rna lam yongs su gang ste/_de rnams kyis der sgra snyan 
[\[120a\]]
[\[120a.1\]]pa yid du 'ong ba de dag thos nas kyang rtse bar byed do/_/de nas 'dres pa'i tshal gzhan du 'dong bar byed de/_tshal de thams cad 'dres pa 'di lta bu yin te/_ji ltar thams cad sngar bstan pa bzhin du tshal 'bras bu dang /_me tog dang /_chu bo dang /_shing ljon pa dang /_bya'i 
[\[120a.2\]]tshogs phun sum tshogs pa yod de/_des na 'dres pa'i tshal zhes bya'o/_/de dag kyang 'dres pa'i tshal der lha'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dag 'byor cing ldan par gyur pas rtse zhing 'ong ba'i sgras dga' bar byed de/_de nas de dag de na gnas shing shin tu yun ring bar rtse bar byed do/_/de nas lha'i 
[\[120a.3\]]rgyal po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te lha'i bu bag med pa la gnas pa de dag gang yin bde ba 'di thams cad kyi mtha' zad par 'gyur ba khong du ma chud do snyam mo/_/de nas lha'i bu de dag thams cad kyis lha'i rgyal po brgya byin gyi bsam pa shes nas/_ji ltar dong dong ba'i lam de nyid nas de ltar 
[\[120a.4\]]slar 'gro ste/_'di ltar lha'i rgyal po brgya byin ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do/_/de nas lha mo de dag kyang 'gros myur bar lha'i 'dun sa chos bzang ga la ba der rtse ba'i don du 'jug par byed do/_/de nas brgya byin gyis lha'i bu de rnams la mngon par brtags nas 'di ltar tshigs su bcad de smras 
[\[120a.5\]]pa/_sred dang bcas pa'i yul rnams la/_/ngoms pa dag tu ga la 'gyur/_/ngoms pa sred bral gang yin pa/_/lus can de ni mya ngan bral/_/skye bo yul la mngon dga' ba/_/nams kyang bde bar mi 'gyur te/_/yul ni dug dang 'dra bar mthong /_/yongs su gyur pa mi bzad do/_/'dir ni yul 
[\[120a.6\]]la 'jug byed pa/_/thog ma bar dang tha ma med/_/'jig rten 'di min pha rol min/_/bde ba byed pa gal yod/_/skye ba rtag pa shin tu zad/_/lang tsho dag ni rings par 'gro/_/'du ba dang ni 'bral ba dang /_/lhan cig skye bar yongs su mthong /_/rab tu bslus pa du ma dag_/bde dang sdug pas 
[\[120a.7\]]rtag bsgribs kyang /_/srog chags rmongs pas bslus pa dag_/yid ni 'byung bar mi byed do/_/'di ltar byis pa thams cad ni/_/sred pa dag la rtse bar byed/_/ji ltar shing la me 'bar bzhin/_/yul rnams la ni ngoms pa med/_/skye bo ngoms med 'di dag kun/_/yul rnams kyis 
[\[120b\]]
[\[120b.1\]]ni yongs su bslus/_/'chi dang nye bar 'gro byed kyang /_/gzugs rnams dang ni 'bral mi byed/_/lam rgyags dag ni ma bsags pa/_/yul rnams kyis ni yongs su bslus/_/sred pas yongs su rmongs pa yi/_/lha dag dbang med 'chi bar 'gyur/_/'dod pas rmongs pa khyed kun la/_/
[\[120b.2\]]nga yis rjes su bstan pa yin/_/'di ltar chos gnas dam pa ste/_/bdag la phan pa rtag tu gyis/_/chos la spyod pa'i mi dag ni/_/bde las bde ba 'thob 'gyur te/_/mya ngan 'das dang gzhan zhi ba/_/myur ba nyid du shin tu 'gro/_/de lta bas na pha rol gyi/_/bsod nams dag gi phung po gyis/_/
[\[120b.3\]]rtag tu bsod nams byed pa ni/_/dul zhing zag med gnas su 'gro/_/de nas brgya byin tshig thos nas/_/sems byung bzang ba zhi dang dul/_/brgya byin bu ste de dag kun/_/pha yis rjes su bstan pa yin/_/de nas lha'i rgyal po brgya byin legs par bya ba'i las byed pa ngan song gi sgo bcad 
[\[120b.4\]]pas bu de dag la mngon par gtam des lam bzang po la yang dag par btsud nas tshal sna tshogs ga la ba der bdag nyid bde bar gnas pa dang /_dge ba bya ba'i phyir 'gro bar byed de/_de nas legs par byas pa'i las sna tshogs byas pa'i tshal sna tshogs na lha'i rgyal po brgya byin gyi khang pa 
[\[120b.5\]]brtsegs pa sna tshogs la 'di lta ste/_shel las byas pa dang /_byi ru las byas pa dang /_gser las byas pa dang /_dngul las byas pa dang /_mthon ka las byas pa dang /_mthon ka chen po las byas pa dang /_gser btso ma las byas pa lnga brgya snyed yod do/_/de nas brgya byin gyi tshal sna 
[\[120b.6\]]tshogs de shing ljon pa 'bum phrag du ma snyed kyis mdzes shing /_/pad ma nyi ma 'char ba'i mdog lta bu rnams kyis mdzes par byas pa de la mngon par brtags nas/_'di ltar tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_bsod nams dag gis dga' 'gyur te/_/brgya stong dag tu bya ba yin/_/bsod nams sna 
[\[120b.7\]]tshogs byas pa yis/_/kun nas sna tshogs smin par 'gyur/_/legs byas las ni ma byas pa/_/sems kyi bran du song ba'i mi/_/sems kyi dgra yis yongs bslus pa/_/dbang med ngan song rnams su ltung /_/khang pa brtsegs pa thams cad dag_/kun tu sna tshogs las yin te/_/lha rnams 
[\[121a\]]
[\[121a.1\]]nang du lha spyod pa/_/legs par byas pas mang por 'phel/_/de nas lha'i rgyal po brgya byin gyis tshigs su bcad pa de dag smras nas khang pa brtsegs pa gzhan ga la ba der 'gro bar byed do/_/legs par byas pa'i las kyis sprul pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa der stan khra bo 'jam zhing 'phar la lhod 
[\[121a.2\]]pa dag ni bting /_rin po che las byas pa'i stan du mas ni mdzes par byas/_'od kyi phreng ba rnam pa du ma yod pa de dag la mngon par brtags nas lha'i rgyal po brgya byin nang du zhugs so/_/zhugs nas de na dga' bar byed/_yongs su spyod par byed do/_/nang du zhugs pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa de rin po che las 
[\[121a.3\]]byas pa yin te/_rin po che 'bar ba du mas rnam par brgyan pa/_'od du ma 'byung ba/_me tog rnam pa du mas mdzes par byas pa/_de'i nang du zhugs nas kyang lha mo'i tshogs du mas yongs su bskor te/_de ltar de rnams glu dbyangs len bzhin du tshal de na rtse bar byed/_yongs su spyod par byed do/_/tshal de na 
[\[121a.4\]]yang mtho zhing dma' ba'i sa ris legs par rnam par phye ba dang /_me tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyis khebs pa'i sa ris legs par rnam par phye ba dang /_gser gyi bya rnam pa sna tshogs skad 'byin pa'i sa ris legs par rnam par phye ba dang /_la la dag tu yang rin po che sna bdun gyi shing ljon pa 
[\[121a.5\]]rnams kyis mdzes par byas pa bya dang bung ba sna tshogs sgra skad snyan pa 'byin cing /_kha cig dag na yang dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pa'i sa ris legs par rnam par phye ba dag la lha'i dbang po brgya byin de kun du mig gis rtog par byed cing /_lha'i tshogs kyis gang ba zla ba dang nyi ma bas lhag 
[\[121a.6\]]pa'i 'od dag gi gzi brjid 'bar bas dga' bar byed do/_/gser gyi shing ljon pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor cing /_bai DUr+ya'i khang [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]dkrigs pa/_kun nas gser dang /_dngul gyi ka ba zung rnams kyis mdzes par byas shing /_bai DUr+ya sngon po'i pad ma'i mtsho rnams kyis mdzes par byas pa 
[\[121a.7\]]de mthong ngo /_/de nas lha'i rgyal po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/_khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]'dir bdag gnas par bya ba'i phyir 'jug par bya'o snyam mo/_/de nas lha rnams kyang 'di snyam du sems te/_da ni lha'i rgyal po brgya byin khang pa brtsegs pa 'dir 'jug par 'gyur te/_der bdag cag rang gi 'khor gyis yongs su bskor cing 
[\[121b\]]
[\[121b.1\]]lha mo'i tshogs kyis nye bar glu len pa dang /_tshal dang nye ba'i tshal du 'chag cing rtsed mo bya zhing glu dag blangs te bde ba nyams su myong bar bya'o snyam mo/_/de nas brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/_gal te lha dang lha mo dag gis skabs phye na/_bdag khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]'dir 'jug par bya'o snyam mo/_/de nas lha dag gis 'phral la 'di 
[\[121b.2\]]skad ces smras so/_/khyod rang gi skyed mos tshal dag tu gshegs la dgyes pa mdzad du gsol/_de nas brgya byin gyis tshig de thos nas lha de dag rang gi tshal dang /_nye ba'i tshal dang skyed mos tshal dang /_pad ma'i rdzing dang /_mtshe'u dang /_rang gi slas ga la yod pa der rtse ba'i phyir 'gro bar byed do/_/de nas lha'i rgyal po dbang 
[\[121b.3\]]po khang pa brtsegs pa ga la ba der 'gro bar byed de/_bai DUr+ya'i tshal dri ma med pa der zhugs nas thags su btags pa ma yin pa'i lha'i stan khra bo bting ba'i steng du 'dug go/_/'dug nas de'i legs par byas pa'i las dang /_dge ba'i las des bskul nas/_rtsig ngos shin tu gsal ba la rtog par byed de/_brgya byin gang tshe 
[\[121b.4\]]'phos pa ri mor bris pa lta bu de dag sa der mthong ngo /_/de dag gi ming der bris pa rnams la yang rtog par byed de der dbang po tshe 'phos pa ni 'di rnams yin no/_/'di lta ste/_legs 'byor zhes bya ba dang /_'byor pa zhes bya ba dang /_legs spyod ldan zhes bya ba dang /_dkar po zhes bya ba dang /_blo gros bzang zhes bya ba dang /_kun 
[\[121b.5\]]bde zhes bya ba dang /_brtan pa zhes bya ba dang /_kun tu mig ces bya ba dang /_mig stong zhes bya ba dang /_thams cad dga' zhes bya ba dang /_stong snang zhes bya ba dang /_gzi brjid phreng ldan zhes bya ba dang /_dpal 'dzin ces bya ba dang /_mdog sngon zhes bya ba dang /_mi 'chi zhes bya ba dang /_mi 'gyur zhes bya ba dang /_bde byed ces bya 
[\[121b.6\]]ba dang /_mchog sbyin 'dzin ces bya ba dang /_bkra shis 'dzin ces bya ba dang /_kun dga' zhes bya ba dang /_brgya byin zhes bya ba la sogs dbang po sum cu lha'i 'jig rten nas tshe 'phos pa dang /_dge ba'i las kyis der skyes pa dang /_de'i dge ba'i las zad nas lha'i dbang po'i gnas de nas tshe 'phos te/_de nas yang 
[\[121b.7\]]sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams kyi nang du skyes pa mthong zhing lus sdug bsngal du mas mngon par nyams pa dag mthong ngo /_/tshe rabs de dag gi nang du skyes pa de dag shin tu sdug bsngal zhing sdug bsngal gyis gnod pa de rnams gzugs brnyan lta bur gyur pa mthong ngo //_//_
[\[122a\]]
[\[122a.1\]]'phags pa dam pa'i chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa/_bam po sum cu gcig pa/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams kyi nang du skyes pa dag_/lus bkres pa dang /_skom pas gdungs shing lus pags pa dang /_rus pa dang /_rgyus pas sbrel ba lta bu gang yin pa de dag dang /_dud 
[\[122a.2\]]'gro rnams kyi nang du skyes pa/_phan tshun lus la za ba'i sdug bsngal gyis gdungs shing za ba gang yin pa de dag dang /_mi rnams kyi nang du skyes pa tshol ba'i sdug bsngal gyis mngon par gdungs pa gang yin pa de dag kyang mthong ste/_de ltar de dag mthong nas 'khor ba mi bzad par 
[\[122a.3\]]byas pa la bde ba 'byung ba med cing /_kye ma 'khor ba 'di kun ni gnod pa phal che zhing mang ba yin/_kun nas snying po med pa yin/_'khor ba 'di la gang rtag pa'am/_brtan pa'am/_ther zug gam/_mi 'gyur ba'i chos can skra'i rtse mo tsam yang med do/_/kye ma dbang po 'di dag rang 
[\[122a.4\]]gi las kyi 'bras bu la longs spyad nas 'di nas tshe 'phos te/_sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams kyi nang du skyes pa rnams bde ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu'i mtha' sdug bsngal gyi rnam pa de lta bu sten par ga la nus/_kye ma 'khor ba 'di ni shin tu mi bzad pa yin zhing /_
[\[122a.5\]]shin tu 'jigs pa yin la/_mchog tu mi dga' bar byed pa yin no/_/sum cu rtsa gsum gyi dbang phyug ces bya ba shin tu bde ba'i skal ba can gang yin pa de dag kyang mchog tu mi bzad pa'i gnas skabs 'di dag tu song ba lta zhig snyam sems so/_/de ltar de yid byung nas bdag nyid la 
[\[122a.6\]]rtog par byed de/_de bdag nyid kyi ngan song gi 'gro ba ni bcad/_lha dag las mi rnams kyi nang du skye zhing /_mi dag las tshe 'phos nas de nas yang lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ba mthong ngo /_/gang gi tshe mi rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ba de'i tshe yul bzang po shin tu rgyas pa'i 
[\[122a.7\]]ljongs dang /_grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_rigs bzang po dang /_spyod pa bzang zhing yon tan phun sum tshogs pa dang /_lta ba log pa dang /_khengs pa dang /_rgyags pa dang /_nga rgyal dang bral ba'i rigs bzang por skye bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te yang bdag nyid mi rnams kyi 
[\[122b\]]
[\[122b.1\]]nang du skyes na yang de rgyal po'i rigs sam/_gal te blon po rtag tu spyod pa gtsang zhing yon tan phun sum tshogs pa dbang phyug dam pa mthu chen por 'gyur ba mthong ngo /_/'di ltar bdag mi yul de nas shi nas yang gar skye bar 'gyur zhig gu snyam mo/_/de bdag nyid lha rnams kyi nang 
[\[122b.2\]]du skyes te/_mchog tu rdzu 'phrul che zhing shin tu mthu che ba dang /_ngo tsha'i kha na las pa med par 'gyur ba mthong ngo /_/lha gzhan rnams kha zas za ba'i dus de'i tshe lha rnams bdag nyid kyis sdig pa dang 'dres pa'i zas kyi las ngan pa bskyed pa des shin tu ngo tsha bar 'gyur ro/_/gang gi ji 
[\[122b.3\]]srid du las kyi rnam pa byas pa de srid du de'i zas kyi rnam pa de lta bu 'byung bar 'gyur te/_zas de mngon par mthong nas lha rnams shin tu ngo tsha bar 'gyur ro/_/de ltar bdag gi zas shin tu che ba mchog tu zhim pa/_rab tu mang ba de dag bdag nyid kyis mthong nas de 'di snyam du sems te/_
[\[122b.4\]]bdag tshe rabs ji snyed cig tu 'di ltar 'gyur snyam nas des khang pa brtsegs pa'i rtsig pa de nyid la brtags na/_dge ba'i las des bdag lha rnams kyi nang du lan bdun mi rnams kyi nang du lan bdun phan tshun tshe 'pho ba lan bdun mthong nas/_bdag gi tshe 'pho ba brgyad pa lha rnams dang /_
[\[122b.5\]]mi rnams dang /_sems can dmyal ba rnams dang /_dud 'gro rnams dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams kyi nang du skye ba ma mthong nas/_de 'di snyam du sems te/_'di dag gang du yang bdag nyid ma mthong ste/_bdag gang du ji ltar skye bar 'gyur zhig gu snyam mo/_/de bdag nyid gang du yang 
[\[122b.6\]]ma mthong nas/_de shin tu ngo mtshar cher skyes te/_kye ma bdag gi tshe brgyad pa ma mthong ngo snyam nas de sems shing 'dug 'dug pa las yun ring zhig lon pa dang dran pa rnyed de/_bdag gis bcom ldan 'das las bdag tshe rabs bdun rjes nas rgyun du zhugs par 'gyur la/_phyis 
[\[122b.7\]]phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i dbyings la 'jug par 'gyur ro zhes thos so/_/da ni bdag skal ba de lta bu dang ldan par 'gyur ro snyam ste/_de ltar brtags nas/_de nas yang bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal bar byed de/_yid shin tu dang zhing rnyog pa med pas bcom ldan 'das la 
[\[123a\]]
[\[123a.1\]]phyag 'tshal bar byed do/_/yid rab tu dga' bas phyag byas nas/_de nas yang gding ba shin tu 'byor pa btags pa las byas pa ma yin pa phun sum tshogs pa dang /_'dzam bu chu bo'i gser bzang po'i stan de nyid la 'dug pa dang /_brgya byin gyi gzugs de nyid rtsig
