[\[123a.2\]]pa'i nang na snang ba mthong ngo /_/de nas lha'i rgyal po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/_'di ltar bdag yang lha'i 'dun sa chos bzang du lha rnams yang dag par blta bar bya ba'i phyir 'jug par bya'o snyam mo/_/de nas lha'i rgyal po brgya byin stan de las langs nas tshal sna tshogs kyi phyogs 
[\[123a.3\]]ga la ba der 'gro bar byed de/_der yang lha dang lha mo'i nang na dga' bar byed/_dga' dgur spyod par byed la/_lha'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams 'byor cing ldan par gyur pas dga' bar byed/_yongs su spyod par byed do/_/bya dang /_shing ljon pa dang /_pad ma'i rdzing dang /_lteng 
[\[123a.4\]]ka dang /_nye ba'i tshal gyi rnam pas mdzes par byas pa'i tshal sna tshogs su de dag gis lha'i rgyal po brgya byin de mngon par mthong nas/_de dag thams cad kyis sil snyan dang /_rol mo rnam pa sna tshogs dag blangs te/_lha'i rgyal po brgya byin ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do/_/
[\[123a.5\]]dong nas kyang brgya byin la gsong por smras shing brgya byin yongs su bskor nas/_lha'i tshogs thams cad bro rdung bar byed/_glu dbyangs len/_dgod par byed do/_/brgya byin sngar 'gro la/_lha mo cha byad dang /_gzugs sna tshogs dang ldan pa dag phyi bzhin 'brang zhing rol mo'i sgra sna 
[\[123a.6\]]tshogs kyis lha'i 'dun sa chos bzang der 'gro bar byed do/_/de dag thams cad yid rab tu dga' bas sil snyan dang /_rol mo sna tshogs dang /_gar byas/_gad mo bgad/_dga' bar byas/_rtsed mo rtses nas lhan cig tu 'dong bar byed do/_/de nas chos bzang na gnas pa'i 
[\[123a.7\]]lha brgya byin la rim gro byed par 'dod pa rnams kyang lha'i rgyal po brgya byin ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do/_/de nas sil snyan dang /_glu dbyangs kyi sgra sna tshogs 'byin pa'i lha de rnams kyang phyir byung nas de dag phan tshun 'dus so/_/lha'i tshogs 'dus shing yang dag par dga' la/_
[\[123b\]]
[\[123b.1\]]mngon par mthong ba de rnams kyi bro gar dang /_glu'i sgra shin tu snyan pa sred pa kun du ston pa'i sgra des lha'i 'jig rten dang bcas pa thams cad kun du gang ngo /_/sgra de dag thos nas lha gang tshal dang /_nye ba'i tshal gzhan rnams kyi nang na 'khod pa dag lha'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams 
[\[123b.2\]]'byor cing ldan par gyur pas dga' bar byed/_rtse bar byed/_dga' dgur spyod par byed do/_/de dag kyang lha'i 'dun sa chos bzang ga la ba der 'dong bar byed de/_dong nas kyang brgya byin la gsong por smras shing rgyal bar spyon cig ces brjod nas/_'bum phrag du mar yongs su bskor 
[\[123b.3\]]te lha'i 'dun sa chos bzang ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do/_/dge ba'i las sna tshogs kyis glu len/_bro rdung zhing cha byad dang /_rgyan rnam pa bzhi thogs pa der skyes pa dag ni tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa legs par bsrungs shing bsgoms pa de'i 'bras bu'i rnam pa yin te/_de la 
[\[123b.4\]]nye bar spyod par byed do/_/lha'i tshogs thams cad chos bzang du zhugs te/_brgya byin gyi gnas dpag tshad lnga brgyar rgya che zhing gser btso mas rnam par brgyan pa/_bai DUr+ya'i shing ljon pas nye bar mdzes par byas pa/_shing ljon pa gzhan rnams kyis kyang mdzes par byas pa/_me 
[\[123b.5\]]tog 'jam pos rgyas pa/_shin tu dri zhim zhing dpag tshad lnga'i bar du dri rab tu 'byung bar byed pa/_yid du 'ong ba dga' bar byed la/_sdug cing yid du 'thad pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa dag yod de/_de dag thams cad kyang lha'i 'dun sar brgya byin gyis yongs su bskyangs pa yin 
[\[123b.6\]]no/_/de dag lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang bcas shing lha mo'i tshogs bye ba phrag dgu bcu rnams dang lhan cig tu 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po de rnams kyis dga' bar byed/_rtse bar byed do/_/der zhugs nas khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]rab tu dga' bar gnas pa zhes bya ba de'i nang du 'dong bar byed 
[\[123b.7\]]do/_/bai DUr+ya dang /_gser dang /_dngul dang /_spug las byas pa'i ka ba rnams dang /_gser las byas pa'i stan rnams kyis nye bar mdzes par byas pa/_thags su btags pa ma yin pa'i stan khra bo 'jam la nems zhes byed cing 'phar la lhod pa rnams bting ba/_steng du gding 
[\[124a\]]
[\[124a.1\]]ba yon tan phun sum tshogs pa'i stan rnams la lha'i tshogs thams cad brgya byin gyis gnang nas 'khod do/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis lha rnams la 'di skad smras so/_/bdag cag legs par byas pa'i las des lha'i 'jig rten 'dir skyes la/_de zad nas ltung 
[\[124a.2\]]ba ni gdon mi za'o/_/bdag cag thams cad las kyi 'bras bu'i bgo skal la ji ltar spyod pa bzhin bdag cag lha rnams kyi nang du 'ong la/_de nas yang bdag cag ltung ba'i mthar 'gyur te/_de lta bas na lha dag sdug bsngal de dag thams cad mngon par shes par byos la dge ba 
[\[124a.3\]]la 'bad par gyis shig_/de nas brgya byin gyi tshig de thos nas/_de dag kun gyis brgya byin la 'di skad smras so/_/brgya byin khyod kyis de ji ltar thugs su chud pa de bzhin lags te/_bdag cag kun de ltar rang gi las kyi 'bras bu la nye bar spyod pa lha'i dga' ba dang bde ba de 
[\[124a.4\]]las ltung bar 'gyur na/_de las gzhan pa bdag cag rgyu gang gis ltung bar mi 'gyur ba bstan du gsol/_de nas brgya byin gyis lha de rnams la 'di skad smras so/_/gang 'dus byas kyi rnam pa 'jig pa'i mtha' can rtag par 'gyur ba'am/_ther zug tu 'gyur ba'am/_mi 'gyur 
[\[124a.5\]]ba'i chos can gyi gnas de ni 'og gam/_thad ka'am/_dbus sam/_steng na yang med do/_/kun nas nyon mongs pa la rtag tu chags pa'i blo des ni cho ga 'grangs te/_sdug bsngal la mtha' med cing legs pa med/_bde ba'i rang bzhin ma yin/_rgyu dang rkyen khong du chud pa 
[\[124a.6\]]skyed pa ma yin/_yang dag par skyed pa yin/_sdug bsngal gyi mtha' 'di lta bu la rtog par mi byed de/_khyed cag phal cher mtho ris nas tshe 'phos te/_sems can dmyal ba dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang dud 'gro rnams kyi nang du skye'o/_/de nas yang legs par byas pa'i las kyis 
[\[124a.7\]]'dir skyes pa rnams rang gi las kyi 'bras bu'i bgo skal la spyod pa mtho ris na lha'i bde ba dag myong bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas yang las kyis gzings pa rnams ltung bar 'gyur te/_sems can dmyal ba dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_dud 'gro rnams kyi nang du nye bar spyod par 'gyur gyis lha 
[\[124b\]]
[\[124b.1\]]rnams de la shin tu bag yod par gyis shig_/'di ltar bdag gis gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas rnams kyis mdor bsdus te gsungs pa'i chos de kho na dang /_gzhan gang gis 'khor ba las thar bar 'gyur ba bshad par bya'o/_/'di lta ste/_ma rig pa'i rkyen 
[\[124b.2\]]gyis 'du byed rnams/_'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa/_rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs/_ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug_/skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa/_reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/_tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa/_sred 
[\[124b.3\]]pa'i rkyen gyis len pa/_len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa/_srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba/_skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te/_de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung 
[\[124b.4\]]po chen po 'di 'ba' zhig 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/yang ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag par 'gyur la/_'du byed 'gags pas rnam par shes pa 'gag_/rnam par shes pa 'gags pas ming dang gzugs 'gag_/ming dang gzugs 'gags pas skye mched drug 
[\[124b.5\]]'gag_/skye mched drug 'gags pas reg pa 'gag_/reg pa 'gags pas tshor ba 'gag_/tshor ba 'gags pas sred pa 'gag_/sred pa 'gags pas len pa 'gag_/len pa 'gags pas srid pa 'gag_/srid pa 'gags pas skye ba 'gag_/skye ba 'gags 
[\[124b.6\]]pas rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa rnams 'gag par 'gyur te/_de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'di 'ba' zhig 'gag par 'gyur ro/_/de ltar lha dag 'khor ba 
[\[124b.7\]]'di'i 'jug pa dang /_ldog pa zhes bya ba mthong zhing shes na nyon mongs pa zad nas thar bar 'gyur te/_mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba/_'jig pa med pa/_rtag pa/_rga ba med pa/_'chi ba med pa/_zag pa med pa 'thob ste/_de ltar lha dag srog chags rnams 
[\[125a\]]
[\[125a.1\]]'khor ba 'di las thar bar 'gyur ro/_/gang 'dus byas kyi rnam pa 'jig pa med pa'i mtha' 'am/_zad pa med pa'i mtha' 'am/_chud za ba med pa'i mtha' 'am/_tshe rabs su 'gag pa med pa'i chos zhes bya ba'i gnas gzhan 'khor ba na med do/_/gang na 
[\[125a.2\]]gtan du bde bar 'gyur ba dang /_ltung ba'i mtha' med pa dang /_zad pa dang 'jig pa'i mtha' med pa dang /_'byung ba dang 'jig par 'gyur ba'i chos can ma yin pa med do/_/de nas brgya byin gyi kha nas tshig de dag thos nas/_lha gang tshe rabs gzhan dag tu 
[\[125a.3\]]sems bsgoms pa dam pa'i chos la mngon par dga' zhing /_blo shin tu zhan pa de dag ni yid la bag yod par 'gyur zhing /_sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun rnams la gcig tu dad la/_mya ngan las 'das pa'i sa bon bde ba'i las 'phen par byed do/_/
[\[125a.4\]]yid ma bsgoms pa gang yin pa de dag ni/_de nas yang bag med cing sems 'khrugs par 'gyur la/_sred pas bslus pa rnams lha'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams 'byor cing ldan par gyur pas dga' bar byed do/_/de nas yang des bslus pa rnams rtse ba don du byed cing /_
[\[125a.5\]]dga' bar byed de/_de ltar de dag gi 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal mtha' med par 'gyur ro/_/de ltar lha'i rgyal po brgya byin des chos bshad pa na/_'jig rten skyong ba bzhi rnams lha'i 'dun sa chos bzang dag tu so sor 'khod de/_'di ltar lha'i rgyal po brgya byin lha rnams 
[\[125a.6\]]dang lhan cig gang na bzhugs zhes dpyod par byed do/_/de nas de ltar brgya byin lha'i stan la 'dug cing /_lha'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor la gzi brjid 'bar ba na/_lha yul gyi bde ba dpe med pa du ma dang ldan pa rgyang ring po nas mthong ngo /_/de mthong nas 'jig rten 
[\[125a.7\]]skyong ba bzhi rnams brgya byin ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do/_/dong nas brgya byin la gsong por smra ste/_lha'i stan mchog tu nyams dga' ba bzang po la phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/de nas yang stan mchog tu nyams dga' ba bzang po de dag las langs te/_brgya byin 
[\[125b\]]
[\[125b.1\]]ga la ba de logs su phyogs nas 'dug ste/_brgya byin la 'di skad smras so/_/lha'i dbang po 'di ltar 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams ni dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la mngon par brtson zhing chos la dga' ba/_mar 'dzin pa dang /_phar 'dzin pa dang /_dge sbyong du 'dzin pa 
[\[125b.2\]]dang /_bram zer 'dzin pa dang /_rigs kyi rgan rabs la gus par bgyid kyis/_lha'i dbang po khyod dgyes par mdzad du gsol/_de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis tshig de dag thos nas 'di skad smras so/_/lha dag bdag ni dga'o/_/rgyal po chen po khyed cag 
[\[125b.3\]]ni 'jig rten skyong zhing /_'jig rten la phan par 'dod pa phan gdags par rab tu zhugs pa yin te/_bdag gi dga' ba yang thos nas/_khyed bde legs su gyur cig_/de nas 'dzam bu'i gling du chos dang mi ldan zhing /_chos ma yin pa'i rjes su zhugs pa'i mi de dag 
[\[125b.4\]]de bzhin du 'jig rten skyong ba rnams brgya byin la smra bar byed de/_'dzam bu'i gling na mi chos dang mi ldan zhing /_chos ma yin pa'i rjes su 'jug pa/_mar mi 'dzin pa dang /_phar mi 'dzin pa dang /_dge sbyong du mi 'dzin pa dang /_bram zer mi 'dzin pa dang /_rigs kyi rgan 
[\[125b.5\]]rabs kyi rjes su mi 'jug pa dag mchis te/_bdud kyi phyogs ni 'phel lo/_/dam pa'i chos kyi phyogs ni 'grib po zhes bsnyad do/_/lha'i rgyal po brgya byin gyis de thos nas rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum pa ji ltar phyogs pa rnams la bos nas smras pa/_lha 
[\[125b.6\]]ma yin brtan pa dang /_rab spro la sogs pa/_klu chos ma yin pa dang ldan pa rab 'joms la sogs pa sa'i 'og nas langs te/_bdag cag la g.yul 'gyed du 'ong gis/_lha khyed rnams chos shig_/de nas brgya byin gyi bka' de mnos nas/_gang rgyal chen bzhi'i 
[\[125b.7\]]lha rnams brgya byin gyi bkas shin tu rings par lag cha dang /_mtshon cha sna tshogs snga ma bzhin thogs te/_ri bo zla ba zhes bya ba'i ri ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do/_/de nas 'jig rten skyong ba de rnams dong ba dang /_lha'i dbang po brgya byin yang lha'i tshogs sna tshogs 
[\[126a\]]
[\[126a.1\]]kyis ni bskor/_lha'i phreng ba dang gos ni gyon/_lang tsho la bab pa'i gzugs rgyan sna tshogs kyis ni brgyan/_lha mo rnams ni rjes su 'brang zhing /_lha'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba dang lhan cig thams cad mngon par 'byor ces bya ba ga la ba der 
[\[126a.2\]]'dong bar byed de/_skyed mos tshal gang yin pa de ri rab dang skra lta bur [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]'dra ba'i dper bya na/_'di ltar/_zla ba rgyu skar gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba lta bu dang /_nyi ma gza'i tshogs kyis bskor ba mi 'thun par mthong ba lta bu dang /_ri rab gser gyi ri stong 
[\[126a.3\]]gis bskor ba lta bu dang /_shing ljon pa lha'i gser dang /_dngul dang /_bai DUr+ya dang /_mthon ka dang /_pad ma rA ga'i mdog lta bu rnams kyis nye bar mdzes par byas pa'i skyed mos tshal de lha'i me tog gis mdzes par byas shing /_bya'i tshogs kyis yongs su 
[\[126a.4\]]bskor la sgra skad snyan pa 'byin pa/_lha'i pad ma'i rdzing rnams kyis mdzes par byas pa yin no/_/lha'i rgyal po brgya byin gyi glang po che'i rgyal po sa srung gi bu zhes bya ba skyed mos tshal chen po de na rdzing de dag snga ma bzhin yod pa'i nang na bal glang mo dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/_
[\[126a.5\]]gser dang /_bai DUr+ya'i pad ma'i 'dam bu'i nang na bal glang mo dang lhan cig rtse zhing yul der 'gro bar byed do/_/lha'i rgyal po brgya byin lha'i tshogs dang /_lha mo'i tshogs sna tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba ltar/_glang po che'i rgyal po de yang de lta bu yin la/_pad ma 
[\[126a.6\]]gser btso ma lta bu dang /_nam mkha' la nyi ma 'bum phrag 'char ba/_de lta bu'i 'od bzang po 'char ba dang ldan pa rnams kyis mdzes par byas pa der de dga' bar byed/_yongs su spyod par byed/_rtsed mo byed/_dud 'gror gyur kyang lha'i bde ba myong ba 
[\[126a.7\]]yin no/_/de nas lha'i rgyal po brgya byin der song nas/_lag pa gnyis kyis byugs shing phyi bdar byed la/_kye bdag gi glang po che'i rgyal po 'di ni g.yul 'gyed pa la dgos pa yin te/_lha dang lha ma yin 'thab pa'i tshe/_'di'i steng nas bdag rgyal ba thob 
[\[126b\]]
[\[126b.1\]]bo/_/de nas glang po che mchog phyi bdar byas nas/_skyed mos tshal thams cad 'byor ldan na khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]mya ngan bral zhes bya ba ga la ba der 'gro bar byed de/_chu'i zam pa lta bu'i skas de las 'dzegs nas/_der lha dang lha mo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor te 
[\[126b.2\]]'jug par byed do/_/der zhugs nas lha'i rgyal po de lha mo bye ba phrag dgu'i mdun na rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed do/_/lha'i rgyal po de rnams dang lhan cig lha'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams 'byor cing ldan par gyur pas rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_yongs 
[\[126b.3\]]su spyod par byed do/_/lha'i rgyal po rang gi las dang 'thun par longs spyod 'byor te/_lha de dag dang lha'i rgyal po de ji srid du 'dod pa sdug pa/_yid du 'ong ba byas shing bsags pa dang /_so so yang dag par myong bar 'gyur ba bde ba'i rnam par smin pa/_bde ba so 
[\[126b.4\]]sor yang dag par myong bar 'gyur ba'i las zad par ma gyur pa de srid du 'di ltar/_skyed mos tshal brgya snyed kyis brgyan pa'i lha'i 'dun sa chos bzang gi skyed mos tshal de na bde ba kun dang ldan zhing /_lha'i tshogs thams cad dang bcas pas yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i 
[\[126b.5\]]rol mo rnams kyis rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed do/_/de dag phyis lha'i 'dun sa chos bzang nas 'chi bar 'gyur te/_shi nas kyang ji ltar las de dang nye bar 'gro zhing /_myong bar 'gyur ba bzhin sems can dmyal ba dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_dud 'gro rnams kyi 
[\[126b.6\]]nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mi'i nang du skyes na/_de las de dang rgyu 'thun par mchog tu bde ba dang /_rig pa'i blo dri ma med pa dang /_phan tshun gyi gtso bo'am/_grong gi gtso bo'am/_yul gyi gtso bo'am/_grong khyer 
[\[126b.7\]]gyi gtso bo'am/_phan tshun gyi gnyen 'dab dang /_rtsa lag dang /_bde bar lhan cig 'khod par 'gyur ro/_/lha'i rgyal po de ni ngan song gi sgo bcad pa yin te/_lha de dag gi 'chi 'pho ba la mngon par brtags nas 'di ltar tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_sa gang 
[\[127a\]]
[\[127a.1\]]yin pa de dag gi/_/tshal ni pad ma sna tshogs dang /_/rtse mo mchog ste nyams dga' dang /_/rin po che dang ldan pa dang /_/mtsho dang 'bab chu rin po che'i/_/rdo ba sna tshogs rnams kyis brgyan/_/ljon shing me tog sna tshogs dang /_/bya ni sna tshogs dag 
[\[127a.2\]]gis khebs/_/gser las byas pa'i dpag bsam shing /_/kha cig dri med bai DUr+ya/_/dngul dang gser ni btso ma yin/_/tshal ni rnam par 'dres pa bskyed/_/bung ba rnams ni sgra 'byin pas/_/pad ma'i rdzing ni rnam par mdzes/_/khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]mchog ni nyams 
[\[127a.3\]]dga' zhing /_/rin po che ni che dang ldan/_/rnam par brgyan pa nyams dga' ste/_/lha la 'os pa thams cad yod/_/de dag thams cad de bzhin 'jug_/skye bo rnams ni yongs su 'gyur/_/kye ma sred pas bslus pa yi/_/lha rnams kun gyi bde ba ni/_/sgyu ma chu bur 
[\[127a.4\]]dbu ba dang /_/dri za'i grong khyer lta bu yin/_/sred pa dug dang me 'dra ba/_/'jig rten 'jig pa'i phyir gnas te/_/sred pa'i mtshor ni 'khyam byed cing /_/skye bo de kun 'jig par byed/_/'dod pa longs pas chog mi shes/_/bde ba 'dod pas chog mi shes/_/
[\[127a.5\]]'chi ba'i me yis rnam bsregs pa/_/lha tshogs de dag ga las 'ongs/_/sred 'dis 'jig rten gzengs pa rnams/_/ye nas ngan te 'phags pa min/_/gang gis rnam par rmongs pa'i lha/_/'chi ba yi ni dbang du song /_/lha dang mi dang lha ma yin/_/gnod sbyin sems can 
[\[127a.6\]]dmyal ba klu/_/'chi ba'i zhags pa mi bzad pas/_/thams cad dbang med 'gro bar 'gyur/_/khams gsum pa ste 'di dag kun/_/'chi ba'i zhags pas sbrel gyur kyang /_/sred pa'i rmongs pas rmongs pa rnams/_/dbang med mthong bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de ltar brgya byin 
[\[127a.7\]]gyis rtag tu lha de rnams kyi skye ba dang /_gzhan mi rtag pa 'chi ba dag mthong nas/_lha dag shin tu go bar bya ba'i tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_'byung po kun la phan bzhed pa/_/bcom ldan de la phyag 'tshal lo/_/gang gis sred pa dug 'dra 'di/_/'jig rten pa 
[\[127b\]]
[\[127b.1\]]la mang du gsungs/_/mdor na shes dang shes bya dag_/de yis 'di kun thugs su chud/_/shes dang shes bya ma gtogs par/_/gsum pa dmigs par mi 'gyur ro/_/'di ni mi rtag sdug bsngal stong /_/byed pa po yang spangs pa yin/_/de nyid lam ni rnam 
[\[127b.2\]]ston pa/_/sangs rgyas kyis ni 'khor bar gsungs/_/de ltar dbang po de phyag rgya 'dis btab pa'i yid dri ma med pas bcom ldan 'das la bstod do/_/bstod nas de nas yang lha'i bde ba yang nyams su myong bar byed de/_de ltar de lha'i bde ba thams cad myong ba yin no/_/
[\[127b.3\]]de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa des sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas la rtog par byed de/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas mtho ba na gnas pa zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo /_/sems 
[\[127b.4\]]can dag las gang gis der skye bar 'gyur snyam nas/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na 'di ltar gang gzhan gyis gsod pa po dag nyi ma gcig tsam du srog gcod pa spong ba'i tshul khrims srung du bcug la/_'khor ba las thar pa 'dod pa rnams ma byin 
[\[127b.5\]]par len pa dang /_rgyal po'i chad pas 'jigs nas 'bras bu chung ngur 'gyur ba yang spong du 'jug na/_de lus dang bral nas bde 'gro sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nang na mtho ba'i gnas su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/gnas mtho ba de yang ri rab kyi steng na mtho ba yin 
[\[127b.6\]]la/_khyed cag gi las sna tshogs snang ba bzhin gser dang dngul gyi bkra bas phye ba yin no/_/lha rnams mtho ba'i gnas der 'dzegs nas/_ri rab kyi drung thams cad lta bar byed de/_gser dang dngul las byas shing /_bai DUr+ya bkra bas rnam par phye ba rnam pa du 
[\[127b.7\]]ma la lta bar byed do/_/lha'i phreng ba dang gos gyon pa rnams gser gyis brgyan pa'i sa gzhi rnams la dga' bar byed/_yongs su spyod par byed la/_lha mo'i tshogs sna tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing sdug pa dang /_lhan cig bai DUr+ya'i tshal dang nye ba'i tshal rnams su 
[\[128a\]]
[\[128a.1\]]dga' bar byed/_yongs su spyod par byed do/_/der de dag gi rtag tu bza' ba dang /_btung ba chu bo ltar 'bab ste/_'di lta ste/_chu bo ro zhim zhes bya ba dang /_chu bo shugs chen 'bab ces bya ba dang /_chu bo dga' bcas zhes bya ba dang /_chu bo 
[\[128a.2\]]dga' bcas che zhes bya ba dang /_chu bo brtsegs 'bab ces bya ba dang /_chu bo shugs phreng zhes bya ba dang /_chu bo stong 'bab ces bya ba dang /_chu bo gar dgar 'bab ces bya ba ste/_chu bo de dag ni myos pa'i skyon dang bral zhing /_btung ba rnam pa sna tshogs thams cad rab 
[\[128a.3\]]tu 'bab pa yin no/_/ro sna tshogs dang mdog sna tshogs yod pa yin te/_'di lta ste/_'o ma'i mdog dang /_pad ma rA ga'i mdog dang /_an da rnyil gyi mdog dang 'thun pa dang /_bai DUr+ya'i mdog dang /_gser gyi mdog ltar ser ba dang /_kha cig mdog 
[\[128a.4\]]'dres pa dang /_chu shin tu dri zhim zhing brtan pa dag tu khyad par 'phags pa yang 'bab bo/_/gzhan yang bza' ba ro dang /_dri dang mdog sna tshogs su 'byung ste/_'di lta ste/_ro sha kha ra 'dra ba dang /_lha'i dri dang /_mdog dang mdog skya bo dang /_ro ji ltar 'dod 
[\[128a.5\]]pa dag ste/_lha rnams ji ltar 'dod pa de bzhin du bza' ba rnams kyi ro de dag kyang de ltar 'gyur ro/_/tshal dang nags tshal sna tshogs dag me tog dri zhim po rnams kyis nye bar mdzes par byas shing /_bya kha dog sna tshogs dang /_rnam pa sna tshogs rnams kyis mdzes par byas 
[\[128a.6\]]pa yin te/_de dag sa'i phyogs nyams dga' ba der lha dang lha mo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor nas sil snyan dang /_glu dbyangs dang /_bro gar sna tshogs kyis rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_yongs su spyod par byed do/_/der tshal 'di dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/_'di 
[\[128a.7\]]lta ste/_shing sA la'i tshal dang /_shing sA la chen po'i tshal dang /_ji ltar 'dod pa'i shing ljon pa'i tshal dang /_me tog rtag tu yod pa'i tshal dang /_rlung ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin bde bar 'bab pa'i tshal te/_tshal dga' ba de rnams na gser gyi lcug ma 'phyangs pas 
[\[128b\]]
[\[128b.1\]]ni mdzes/_dril bu g.yer ka'i dra bas ni dkrigs/_bya 'bum snyed sgra 'byin pa dga' ba lha'i dbang po 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga'i bde ba dag gis lha rnams nye bar 'tsho bar byed do/_/phan tshun grogs su gyur cing phan tshun longs spyod pa gcig pu don du byed pa/_nad dang mya ngan 
[\[128b.2\]]dang bral ba/_bkres pa dang skom pa dang bral ba/_lus ngal ba dang bral ba/_tshol ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bral ba/_ci dgar spyod pa la brtson pa/_ci dgar rgyu ba/_ci dgar gnas pa dag tshal gyi nang dang /_skyed mos tshal dang /_pad ma'i tshal dang /_mthong na yid 
[\[128b.3\]]'phrog rnams su dga' bar byed do/_/mtho ba na gnas pa 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas tshim pa'i lha rnams 'od ni rang gi 'od la lus ni ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin/_phra ba dang /_sbom pa dang /_yang bar sgyur ba/_ci dgar 'gro ba/_gar dgar 'gro ba/_rang dgar 'gro ba/_gang 
[\[128b.4\]]thob par 'dod pa de thob par 'gyur zhing /_thob nas sus kyang mi 'phrogs la thob nas de'i dbang du 'gyur ro/_/mtho ba'i gnas na gnas par gyur pa'i lha de rnams la bde ba'i rnam pa gzhan yang yod de/_rang gis legs par byas pa'i las rgyu dang 'bras bus kun nas bslang 
[\[128b.5\]]bas/_ji srid du 'dod cing sdug la yid du 'ong ba legs par bsrungs pa'i tshul khrims srog gcod pa dang /_ma byin par len pa spangs pa zad par ma gyur pa de srid du lha mo'i tshogs rnams dang dga' bar byed/_dga' dgur spyod par byed do/_/der las zad nas lha'i ris 
[\[128b.6\]]de nas 'chi bar 'gyur te/_shi nas las kyis 'gro ba ji lta ba dang las la rton pa dang /_'gro ba ji lta ba bzhin skye bar 'gyur te/_sems can dmyal ba dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_dud 'gro rnams kyi nang na skye bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mi'i nang 
[\[128b.7\]]du skyes na/_de las de dang rgyu 'thun par ri la gnas pa rtag tu bde bar 'gyur zhing /_nor dang shin tu ldan pa dang /_rab tu bde ba dang /_mchog tu gzugs bzang ba dang /_'jig rten gyi bar bzang por dro ba dang /_bsil ba'i nye ba'i tshal rnams kyi nang du skye bar 
[\[129a\]]
[\[129a.1\]]'gyur ba mthong ngo /_/de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas la rtog par byed de/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas lha rnams kyi gnas ri rtse na gnas pa zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa 
[\[129a.2\]]mthong ngo /_/der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/_gang gis lus kyi tshul khrims rnam gnyis bsrungs pa yin te/_srog chags gsad par chad pa dang /_bcings pa thar bar byas 
[\[129a.3\]]shing /_mthu rab tu che bar gyur la nus par ldan pa zhig lam du zhugs te/_bkres shing skom bzhin du bu ram shing ngam/_ldum ra 'am/_rdzi'u'i grong dag tu ba'i bcud dam/_bu ram shing gi bcud ma byin par ma blangs/_sems can gsad par bya ba dang /_ma 
[\[129a.4\]]byin par blangs nas 'jigs te 'gro ba thar bar byas pa'i skyes bu dam pa de lus dang bral nas/_bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten sum cu rtsa gsum gyi gnas/_ri rtser gnas pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/der skyes nas kyang de bde ba'i longs spyod du ma dang 
[\[129a.5\]]ldan zhing /_de yul chu bo lta bu du mas bdas pa yin la/_de yang 'dod chags chu bo lta bu yin/_'di lta ste/_'dod chags kyi chu bo dang /_rgyags pa'i glong dang /_mgu ba'i gling du chags pa dang /_kun dga'i chu mig dang /_kun du rtog pa'i rlabs dang /_
[\[129a.6\]]gzugs dang /_sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya sdug pa'i bya dang /_lta ba chu srin 'dzin khri kun du 'khrugs pa dang /_rab tu thogs pa du ma ya yor 'gro ba dang /_tshal dang /_nye ba'i tshal chu yis bar bur ded pa dang /_phra dog gi nya dang /_spro ba chu las 
[\[129a.7\]]brgal ba dang /_yul du ma'i ri khrod nas chu 'bab ste/_sred pa'i chu bo 'dam rdzab la sogs pa rnam pa de lta bu dag las lha rnams 'byung bar mi nus so/_/gzhan yang chu bo gang gA'i pha rol gyi 'gram gyi rlabs mi mngon pa ltar/_thog ma med pa'i dus nas rgyun du shin tu 
[\[129b\]]
[\[129b.1\]]zab mor rab tu zhugs pa/_'dod pa dang /_gzugs dang /_gzugs med pa'i khams na skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa rlabs lta bus khyab cing /_
[\[129b.2\]]myur du 'gro ba'i sred pa chu klung lta bu de sems can dmyal ba'i rgyu yang yin la/_mi rnams kyis kyang chog par 'dzin mi nus te/_de ltar sred pa'i rnam pa chu bo lta bus ri rtse na gnas pa'i lha rnams rab tu bdas so/_/der lha de dag lha mo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor te/_
[\[129b.3\]]lha'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams 'byor cing ldan par gyur pas dga' bar byed/_rtse bar byed/_dga' dgur spyod par byed do/_/der tshal 'di lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/_'di lta ste/_tshal rtag tu rab dga' zhes bya ba dang /_tshal rtag tu mngon dga' zhes bya ba 
[\[129b.4\]]dang /_tshal sprin ltar dkar brtsegs zhes bya ba dang /_tshal kun nas mngon dga' zhes bya ba dang /_tshal zla ba 'dra zhes bya ba dang /_tshal gang gA'i steng du rgyu zhes bya ba ste/_tshal 'di dag ni ri rtse na gnas pa'i lha rnams kyi yin no/_/tshal de rnams kyi nang du lha 
[\[129b.5\]]dag bde ba du ma dang ldan zhing /_bud med kyi dga' ba rnams dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/_dga' dgur spyod par byed do/_/btung ba'i chu bo rnams kyang 'di lta ste/_chu bo sna tshogs zhes bya ba dang /_chu bo lag mthil gyis byug cing reg pa zhes bya ba dang /_chu bo 
[\[129b.6\]]ngoms mi myong zhes bya ba dang /_chu bo me tog ku mu da dang /_ud pa la skye zhes bya ba ste/_chu bo de dag gi 'gram gnyi ga ril khebs pa yin no/_/dngul dang /_shel dang /_gser gyi shing ljon pa 'bras bu dang ldan zhing /_me tog dang ldan pa rnams kyis lha'i sa 
[\[129b.7\]]gzhi de dag nyams dga' bar brgyan pa'i sa gzhi der dge ba'i las sna tshogs dang /_las byas pa sna tshogs kun nas bslang ba rnams kyis tshal de dag dang /_chu bo de dag dang /_sa gzhi de dag dang /_zas dang skom chu bo ltar 'bab pa de dag tu/_lha de rnams 
[\[130a\]]
[\[130a.1\]]lha'i rol mo dang /_lha'i gnas chen po dang /_thags su btags pa ma yin pa'i lha'i gos rnams kyis dga' bar byed do/_/lha de rnams rang las 'od 'byung la/_sha dang /_rus pa dang /_rnag khrag dang bral ba/_lus dang /_ngag dang /_yid ngal ba 
[\[130a.2\]]dang bral ba/_lus dang yid rtag tu kun nas dga' ba rnams ji srid du lus dang ngag gi 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba shin tu bsil ba/_rnam par smin pa mchog tu bde ba/_mtho ris su skye ba nges par myong bar 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i las ma zad pa de srid du 'gros 'chos shing 
[\[130a.3\]]dga' bar byed/_rtse bar byed/_yongs su spyod par byed do/_/de dag las zad de lha'i 'jig rten de nas 'chi bar 'gyur la shi nas kyang las ji ltar byas pa bzhin sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te lan grangs 
[\[130a.4\]]gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba mir 'grub pa'i las kyis mi rnams kyi nang du skyes na/_de las de dang rgyu 'thun par de rtag tu longs spyod can du 'gyur zhing rtag tu shes pa la dga' ba/_yid la dgod pa dang /_rtsed mo dang /_rtse ba dang /_yul bzang por skye bar 'gyur ba mthong ngo /_/
[\[130a.5\]]de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de/_sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas la rtog par byed de/_sum cu rtsa gsum na lha rnams kyi gnas gzhan gang zhig yod snyam nas/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/_blta na sdug pa 
[\[130a.6\]]gnas pa zhes bya ba'i gnas ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo /_/der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas/_des brtags na gang tshul khrims dang ldan pa'am/_sems can gzhan chus khyer ba'am/_mtshon gyis gsad par bya ba srog phyung zhing /_nor rdzas 
[\[130a.7\]]sam/_bdag nyid la mi lta bar chu nas phyung ba dang /_bkres bzhin du lam du 'gro ba na gzhan gyis ma byin par blang ba la rab tu spro ba bskyed kyang len par mi byed/_gzhan yang phyogs dben par phyin la 'tsho ba nyam nga bar gyur kyang 'bras bu dang rtsa ba dag ma byin par len par 
[\[130b\]]
[\[130b.1\]]mi byed cing /_tshul khrims dang ldan pa ma gus par bslab pa'i gzhi rdul phra mo tsam ral ba la yang 'jigs par lta na/_de lus dang bral nas bde 'gro grong khyer chen po blta na sdug tu skye bar 'gyur ro/_/grong khyer de yang dpag tshad khri yod la/_khyams khris legs par rnam par 
[\[130b.2\]]phye ba yin no/_/grong khyer de'i sa gzhi 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser las byas la/_kun nas khang pa chen po bai DUr+ya las byas pa dang /_gzhan yang dngul las byas pa dang /_gzhan yang 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser las byas pa dang /_mthon ka sna tshogs las byas pa dang /_gzhan yang 
[\[130b.3\]]rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i khri dag gis bkra bar phye ba yin no/_/de dag gi srang yang kun nas shin tu rnam par phye ba yin la/_bzhi mdo dang /_ba gam dang /_sgo dang /_pu shu'i rtse mo dang /_khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]ris shin tu rnam par phye ba yin no/_/khang pa de dag kyang nyi 
[\[130b.4\]]ma gang med kyang sgron ma lta bur 'gyur te/_ji ltar nyi ma med na sgron ma gsal bar byed pa de ltar nyi ma med kyang khang pa'i mchog de rnams las de ltar 'od 'byung ngo /_/grong khyer de dag kun nas tshal dang /_nye ba'i tshal de rnams kyis mdzes par byas pa yin te/_tshal dang nye ba'i tshal 
[\[130b.5\]]kha cig bai DUr+ya las byas pa dag la mu tig gi dra bas bres/_kha cig gser gyi shing ljon pa dag la dngul gyi dra bas bres/_kha cig dngul gyi shing ljon pa dag la gser gyi dril bu g.yer ka'i sgra 'byin/_kha cig ni rin po che sna bdun gyi shing ljon pa'i skyed mos tshal bkra ba yin 
[\[130b.6\]]la/_kha cig dpag bsam gyi shing yin te/_lha gang dag gi yid la bsams pa de tshal de dag las thob par 'gyur ro/_/tshal kha cig an da rnyil dang /_bai DUr+ya las byas pa yin te/_de na gser gyi bya rnams sgra snyan pa sna tshogs 'byin la/_gser gyi tshal gang yin 
[\[130b.7\]]pa de na dngul gyi bya rnams skad snyan pa 'byin cing rtse/_mthon ka'i tshal gang yin pa de na bya pad ma rA ga'i mdog tu 'dug pa rnams skad snyan pa 'byin cing rtse/_gser gyi tshal gang yin pa de na bya lus sna tshogs 'dres pa rnams skad snyan pa 'byin cing rtse ste/_de ltar grong khyer 
[\[131a\]]
[\[131a.1\]]chen po legs par mthong na nye ba'i tshal du gyur pa rnams mdzes pa yin no/_/srang dang gser gyi khang pa mdzes par byas pa gang yin pa de dag la dngul gyi ka ba dang /_bai DUr+ya'i shing ljon pa rnams kyis mdzes par byas pa yin/_gser gyi srang gang yin pa de dag la 
[\[131a.2\]]bai DUr+ya'i ka ba btsugs shing gser gyi shing ljon pa dang khang pas brgyan/_srang dang /_khyim 'dres pas mdzes par byas pa gang yin pa de na bya gser gyi mdog can yod de/_grong khyer blta na sdug gang dang gang du snang ba/_de dang de dpe med par mthong ngo /_/grong khyer de yang 
[\[131a.3\]]kun nas tshal chen po bzhi rnams kyis mdzes par byas pa yin te/_'di lta ste/_dra ba'i phreng ba dang /_shing chen po dang /_'od gsal ba dang /_mthong na dga' bas so/_/tshal thams cad dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu yod de/_tshal de thams cad na chu bo chen po khri yod pa gser 
[\[131a.4\]]gyi pad mas khebs pa yin no/_/chu bo de dag shin tu nyams dga' ba yin zhing 'gram gnyi ga zhig pa med la/_de dag gser dang /_dngul dang /_shel dang /_an da rnyil dang /_shing ljon pa rnams kyis mdzes par byas pa yin no/_/tshal chen po de dag bung ba 'dab ma bai DUr+ya la 
[\[131a.5\]]lus dngul du 'dug pa'i tshogs rnams kyis mdzes par byas pa yin te/_gang bung ba rnams kyi sgra snyan pa'i drung na mi'i gling bu'i sgras bcu drug gi char yang mi phod do/_/bai DUr+ya'i shing ljon pa rnams la 'bras bu gser gyi mdog can shin tu dri zhim zhing khar snyi ba bas ches lhag pa'i ro 
[\[131a.6\]]dag yod la/_'bras bu rnams kyi dri gang yin pa dpag tshad du 'byung ngo /_/bya rnams ngo bo nyid kyis rgyags pa yin la/_de nas yang dri gang yin pa des brgya 'gyur du shin tu rgyags par 'gyur ro/_/gser gyi shing ljon pa gang yin pa de rnams la dngul gyi 'bras bu lha'i dri dang /_
[\[131a.7\]]mdog dang /_ro lnga dang ldan pa dag 'byung /_shing ljon pa bai DUr+ya'i sdong po dang gser gyi 'dab ma yod pa gang yin pa de rnams la 'bras bu kha dog sna tshogs yod pa dag 'byung ste/_de ltar tshal kha dog rnam pa du ma/_rnam pa sna tshogs dpe med pa gzhan dang mi 'dra bas/_grong 
[\[131b\]]
[\[131b.1\]]khyer chen po blta na sdug yongs su bskor nas rnam par gnas so/_/kun du rtog pa'i ri mo bris pa ltar lha'i las rnam pa du ma byas shing las rnam pa du ma sna tshogs byas pa rnams kyis de rnams kyang sna tshogs su byung ba yin te/_de ltar 'bras bu rgyu dang 'thun par rgyu'i 'bras bu yin no/_/
[\[131b.2\]]ji ltar sa bon gyi rnam pa ji srid yod pa de srid du 'bras bu'i rnam pa yang 'byung bar 'gyur te/_de ltar grong khyer blta na sdug na gnas pa'i lha rnams bde ba mang po du ma dag gis phrogs pa yin no/_/grong khyer de ngo bo nyid kyis legs mthong nyid yin te/_tshal khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]gser 
[\[131b.3\]]dang /_byi ru dang /_spug dag gis brgyan cing mdzes par byas pa/_dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba sna tshogs kyis dkrigs pa/_gser gyi dril bu g.yer ka sgra snyan pa 'byin pas mdzes par byas pa/_tshal dang nye ba'i tshal dang /_skyed mos tshal de dag tu blta na sdug na gnas pa'i 
[\[131b.4\]]lha rnams 'khod do/_/lha'i grong khyer na gnas rgyan dang /_rol mo dang /_sil snyan rtag tu sgra 'byin pa rab tu 'byin cing /_lha dang lha mo'i tshogs rnams kyis kun du gang ba de na btung ba dang phreng ba dag gis mdzes par byas pa/_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan bye ba 'bum phrag du 
[\[131b.5\]]ma dag rlung gis rab tu bskyod do/_/yang ri rab kyi steng gi grong khyer du lha'i tshogs bye ba phrag brgya stong du ma dag gis kun du gang zhing las chen po rnams kyis mdzes par byas pa de na/_'di ltar lha mthu rab tu che ba mchod par 'os pa chen po/_rdzu 'phrul che ba/_skyed mos tshal gyi dga' 
[\[131b.6\]]spyod la rtag tu yid mi dga' ba/_lha dang lha mo'i tshogs 'bum phrag du mas kun du gang ba sa ya phrag 'bum 'khod pa rnams brgya byin gyis ma lus par yongs su shes so/_/gang gi tshe lha de rnams gal te lha'i grong khyer chen po skyed mos tshal gyi dga' spyod de nas skyed mos tshal du 
[\[131b.7\]]dga' spyod byed du 'gro ba de'i tshe lha rnams shing rta 'bum phrag du ma rnams dang 'gro ste/_lha de rnams 'gro ba na rgyal mtshan dang /_ru mtshon sdug gu rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mdzes par byas pa'i shing rta rnam pa sna tshogs dang /_kha dog sdug gu rnam pa sna tshogs dang /_dbyibs sna 
[\[132a\]]
[\[132a.1\]]tshogs su 'dug pa bye ba phrag stong dkrigs pa dag byung ngo /_/'di lta ste/_an da rnyil las byas pa'i gzhal med khang gang yin pa de la shing rta'i mda' pad ma rA ga las byas shing /_de la shing rta'i steng gi khang pa rin po che las byas/_nang ni spug las byas/_
[\[132a.2\]]phyi rol ni bai DUr+ya las byas/_sa ris ni gser las byas la/_kun nas dril bu g.yer ka 'khrigs pa'i sgra 'byin pa yin no/_/de nas yang lha rnams gzhal med khang rnam pa sna tshogs gzhan gyis 'gro bar byed de/_'di lta ste/_shing rta'i mda' ni gser las byas/_shing rta'i 
[\[132a.3\]]steng gi khang pa ni bai DUr+ya las byas/_sa ris ni spug las byas/_mu tig gi dra bas ni g.yogs/_phyi rol ni rin po che ma rgad lta bu las byas/_ngos ni byi ru las byas/_srog shing ni dngul las byas pa yin no/_/kha cig shing rta'i mchog rnam pa gzhan gyis 'gro bar byed 
[\[132a.4\]]de/_'di lta ste/_kun nas shing rta'i mda' ni gser las byas/_ngos ni mu tig gis g.yogs/_sa ris ni pad ma rA gas shin tu rnam par phye/_srog shing ni dngul las byas/_kun nas byi rus ni mdzes par byas pa yin te/_shing rta 'bum phrag mang po gsal ba 
[\[132a.5\]]mtshan nyid dpe med pa de dag lha'i tshogs rnams kyis kun nas yongs su bskor te/_'bum phrag rnam pa du ma de rnams la lha dag nyid zhon nas tshal chen po de rnams ga la ba der 'dong bar byed de/_rgyal mtshan la la bai DUr+ya las byas/_rgyal mtshan la la gser las byas/_
[\[132a.6\]]yu ba la la dngul las byas/_rgyal mtshan la la'i yu ba pad ma rA ga las byas/_rgyal mtshan dang ru mtshon la la'i mdog du ma yod pa dag gis nam mkha' bar med par byas nas/_skyed mos tshal du gnas par bya ba'i phyir/_yid rab tu dga' bas tshal chen po bzhi po 
[\[132a.7\]]ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do/_/de ltar lha de rnams 'dong ba na sil snyan bye ba 'bum phrag du ma sgra 'byin cing /_rol mo'i sgra snyan pa sna tshogs phan tshun rdob par zhugs pa dag yod de/_shin tu bzang zhing nyams dga' ba'i khyad par che ba yin no/_/ji ltar las byas pa ngan pa dang /_
[\[132b\]]
[\[132b.1\]]'bring dang /_chen po byas pa bzhin las bde ba rnams kyi rjes su 'jug pa na 'dong bar byed de/_lha de rnams so so la lha mo'i tshogs brgya'am/_stong ngam/_'bum rnams gar byed/_glu len/_rab tu dgod cing yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i rol mo snyan pa dang bcas pa rdob pa zhes bya ba 
[\[132b.2\]]kun du gang zhing byed la tshal chen po zhes bya ba ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do/_/lha'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams 'byor cing ldan par gyur pa'i lha mo de dag thams cad lha de rnams dang so sor phrad nas de ltar bro gar byed/_dgod par byed/_rtsed mo byed do/_/'di ltar lha de rnams 'dod 
[\[132b.3\]]pa la rnam par zhen pa zhes bya bas dga' bar byed de/_lha'i sgra snyan pa tshang tshing gi nang na lha'i sgra snyan pa de dang /_gar dga' dgur 'gro ba'i lha de rnams lha'i 'dod pa'i rnam pa gang yin pa de nyid kyis der skyed mos tshal du 'gro bar byed de/_la la nam mkha' la sprin nag po 'gro ba 
[\[132b.4\]]lta bu bai DUr+ya'i mdog can de rnams 'gro bar byed/_lha'i mchog de dag kha cig ni 'di ltar rgyan sna tshogs dang /_gos sna tshogs dang /_cha byad sna tshogs dang /_dga' ba'i gtam sna tshogs kyis dga' gtam smra zhing nam mkha' khyab par byas nas tshal chen po ga la ba der 'dong 
[\[132b.5\]]bar byed do/_/lha'i mchog gzhan kha cig ni gser gyi sa gzhi'i lam nas rab tu 'gro la/_'gro ba de rnams kyi shing rta 'bum phrag du ma'i mu khyud kyis gser gyi rdul bslang ste nam mkha' khyab par byas nas 'dug go/_/gang gis nam mkha' de skya bor byed kyang /_lha rnams la 
[\[132b.6\]]'go bar mi byed la/_lha gang 'chi ba dang nye bar 'gyur ba de rnams kyi gdong ngam/_gos de la ni 'go bar byed do/_/lha gang gzhan dag gis rdul de mthong zhing 'chi ba'i ltas mthong la/_de 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal mtha' med par 'gyur ba mngon par mthong nas/_de snying rje rje lta bur 
[\[132b.7\]]gyur pa'i sems kyis 'di ltar tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_bud shing lta bu'i yul 'byung dang /_/mes bsregs lta bu'i 'chi 'gyur ba/_/lam 'di nas ni lha rnams dag_/brgya'am yang na stong du 'dir/_/'chi ba gzhan gyis mthong 'gyur la/_/bdag nyid kyis ni mi mthong ste/_/phyi 
[\[133a\]]
[\[133a.1\]]nas nyon mongs phrad pa dang /_/bdag nyid kyis ni sdug bsngal rig_/bag med pa dang 'dres pa'i sems/_/yul la rtag tu mngon par dga'/_/lus can lhan cig skyes gnas pa/_/'chi ba brtan pa mi rig go/_/bag med pa la mngon dga' zhing /_/bde ba nyams 
[\[133a.2\]]dga' byed pa na/_/'chi bdag sde yis 'di drangs pa/_/rab tu 'joms te dug dang 'dra/_/'chi ba'i zhags pas bzung ba yi/_/khyod la skyob pa byed med de/_/sman dang sngags dang las mi skyob/_/de bzhin lha min lha mi skyob/_/rdul rnams kyis ni gdong g.yogs pa/_/bdag nyid 
[\[133a.3\]]kyis ni mi rig ste/_/'di ni 'chi ba'i pho nya yin/_/shi ba phyi nas thob par 'ong /_/gang zhig bde ba'i don ma mthong /_/skye ba rtag tu brkam chags shing /_/sred pas ngoms ni mi myong ba/_/glo bur du ni 'chi bar 'gyur/_/'chi bas btang ba chen po 'di/_/khyod kyi pho nya dang po ste/_/'di 
[\[133a.4\]]yi 'og tu 'chi ba yang /_/shin tu mi bzad 'byung bar 'gyur/_/tshal dang nye ba'i tshal brgyan pa/_/rang gi las kyi 'bras bu spyad/_/sems can ri bo mchog de nas/_/dbang med bcings te khrid par 'gyur/_/myos pas rtse bar gnas pa dag_/bde bas ngoms ni mi myong zhing /_/
[\[133a.5\]]rmongs pa sred pas ma ngoms pa/_/dbang med sa steng ltung bar 'gyur/_/ji ltar rtag tu me dag las/_/du ba sngar ni 'byung 'gyur ba/_/de ltar 'chi ba'i rtags byung ste/_/phyi nas 'chi ba gnas par 'gyur/_/de ltar lha de dag bag med pa chung ba la gnas shing /_sems sngon 
[\[133a.6\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba spyad pa la goms pa yin la/_lha de'i bar chad de mthong nas bdag nyid dang lha de rjes su ston par byed do/_/de ltar lha de'i gtam smra ba na/_shing rta la zhon pa/_shing rta sna tshogs la zhon zhing /_shing rta'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dra bas dkrigs pa/_lus cha byad du 
[\[133a.7\]]mas 'bar ba/_mig rgyas pa lta bur 'dug pa/_lha'i phreng ba dang gos gyon pa/_gser btso mas rnam par brgyan pa/_gang ri rab kyi ri'i rtse mo stong snyed du phye mar rlog cing 'ong ngo /_/de nas lha de lha'i tshogs de rnams rtog cing 'ong ba na/_de bzhin du la la ni nam mkha' la/_
[\[133b\]]
[\[133b.1\]]la la ni sa la/_la la ni bya'i shing rta rnams kyis/_la la ni lha mo dang lhan cig glu len/_bro rdung zhing 'ong ste/_tshal dang nye ba'i tshal de dag lha'i pad ma dang /_shing ljon pa dang /_chu bo dang /_bya dang /_'bras bu dang /_me tog dang /_rin po che sna tshogs dang /_kun 
[\[133b.2\]]nas mchog tu nyams dga' ba'i tshal dang /_nye ba'i tshal gyi phyogs ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do/_/blta na sdug na gnas pa'i lha de rnams shing rta'i mchog de dag la zhon nas/_gser gyi shing ljon pa nyi ma lta bu yod pa ga la ba der dong ngo /_/gang gzhan bar snang la rgyu ba de dag 
[\[133b.3\]]kyang bar snang de las babs nas skyed mos tshal ga la ba der dong ngo /_/de ltar lha'i tshogs de dag thams cad 'dus nas sil snyan gyi sgra dang /_glu dbyangs kyi sgra rnam pa sna tshogs kyis dga' bar byed/_yongs su spyod par byed de/_phan tshun grogs su gyur cing phan tshun 'gyed pa dang /_
[\[133b.4\]]phrag dog la skyo ba med pa rnams bro gar byed/_dgod par byed/_dga' dgur spyod par byed do/_/sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pa la 'di lta ste/_rgyud dang /_rnga dang /_sil dkrol dang /_gling bu'i sgra dang /_glu ste rnam pa 'di lngas kha zas chu bo ltar 'bab pa dang /_btung ba chu 
[\[133b.5\]]bo ltar 'bab pa'i ngogs su lha dang lha mo'i tshogs de dag phan tshun dga' zhing lhan cig tu skyed mos tshal der rtses nas/_gang na bai DUr+ya dang gser gyi 'bras bu yod pa/_'bras bu mdog dang dri zhim pa ro mngar ba/_sbrang rtsi lta bu rnams kyis mdzes par byas pa yin te/_de shing 
[\[133b.6\]]ljon pa'i drung de dag tu yang 'dod pa nyams dga' ba'i lha mo gzugs mi mdzes pa med pa'i gzugs rnams dang lhan cig 'bras bu'i ros myos nas yun ring du dga' bar byed do/_/de nas de ltar bde ba la gnas shing rgyags pas myos pa'i lha dang lha mo'i tshogs de rnams bro 
[\[133b.7\]]gar dang /_glu dbyangs dang /_dgod pa'i sgra de dag thos shing /_gang lha'i rgyal po brgya byin gyi rjes su 'gro la phyi bzhin du 'brang ba de rnams sgra de dag thos nas/_lha'i rgyal po brgya byin ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do/_/de ltar de dag thams cad brgya byin gyi drung du dong nas/_brgya 
[\[134a\]]
[\[134a.1\]]byin la gsong por smras shing thal mo sbyar nas mgo bo gtugs te/_brgya byin la bsnyad pa/_lha'i dbang po 'di ltar blta na sdug na gnas pa'i lha'i tshogs de dag thams cad skyed mos tshal du dga' spyod bgyid du mchi na/_lha'i dbang po de dag mkhyen par mdzod cig_/de 
[\[134a.2\]]nas brgya byin de dag las tshig de thos nas/_lha rnams la 'di ltar blta na sdug na gnas pa'i lha dag gang nas dong ba'i skyed mos tshal du bdag cag kun 'dong gis khyed rnams 'dong bar shoms shig ces bsgo'o/_/de nas brgya byin gyis tshig de thos nas chos bzang na gnas pa'i lha 
[\[134a.3\]]rnams kyang shing rta rgyal mtshan sna tshogs can la zhon/_la la gser gyi shing rta srog shing bai DUr+ya las byas pa ba dan btags pa rnams la zhon/_la la bai DUr+ya'i shing rta srog shing gser las byas pa rnams la zhon/_la la ni rin po che sna bdun bkra zhing ba dan sna tshogs kyis 
[\[134a.4\]]mdzes par byas pa rnams la zhon/_la la gser gyi bya sgra snyan cing shin tu mdzes par 'byung ba'i bya'i shing rta rnams la zhon/_la la rta khra bo 'gros 'cham zhing bde ba dag la shing rtas blangs nas/_shing rta de rnams rta de rnams la btags te/_rta'i shing rtas 'gro bar byed/_de ltar 
[\[134a.5\]]gzhan yang gser gyi bya ngang pa rkang pa ni bai DUr+ya/_sgro ni pad ma rA ga'i mdog lta bu rnams kyi steng du zhon nas/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang lhan cig tu blta na sdug gi grong khyer chen po ga la ba dang /_skyed mos tshal ga la ba yod pa der 'dong bar byed do/_/yang lha gzhan dag rin 
[\[134a.6\]]po che sna bdun gyi rma bya'i gzugs dang ldan zhing /_mdongs kyi tshogs kyis khebs pa gang mi'i 'jig rten na yang gzugs phun sum tshogs pa yin la lha'i 'jig rten na lha gzhan dang mi 'dra ba legs par byas pa'i las rnams kyis mngon par brgyan pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/_de 
[\[134a.7\]]dag gi mdog sdug cing dbyibs legs pa dpe bya bar yang mi nus pa'i steng du zhon no/_/rnam pa de lta bu dang ldan pa de dag la gzhan dag zhon nas blta na sdug gi skyed mos tshal dang /_nye ba'i tshal ga la ba der 'dong bar byed de/_lha'i tshogs de rnams rol mo'i sgra dang /_glu dbyangs sna 
[\[134b\]]
[\[134b.1\]]tshogs kyis dgod cing rtse la yongs su spyod pa dang /_lha gzhan myos shing 'khod pa rnams skyed mos tshal ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do/_/lha'i rgyal po brgya byin gyi shing rta bzhi yang 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang legs par ldan pa/_shing rta rin po che sna bdun las byas pa yin te/_'di 
[\[134b.2\]]lta ste/_an da rnyil dang /_pad ma rA ga dang /_spug shin tu gsal ba dang /_bai DUr+ya dang /_byi ru dang /_rdo rje dang /_shel la gser gyi khye'u rnams kyis mngon par brgyan pa/_shing rta'i mchog de la brgya byin zhon nas/_rin po che sna bdun gyi bya ngang pa gser gyi pad ma ltar rgyas 
[\[134b.3\]]shing /_dbyibs dang /_cha byad sna tshogs dang ldan pa sgra che zhing gdangs snyan pa 'byin pa de'i drung na lha mo'i dbyangs kyang snyan par mi 'gyur ba stong gis khrid de/_brgya byin gyi shing rta rnam pa de lta bu dang ldan pa ngang pa rnams kyis khrid par byed do/_/shing rta de la yang tshon rtsi sna 
[\[134b.4\]]tshogs kyis bsgyur ba'i 'phan lnga brgya/_'phan shing bai DUr+ya dang /_gser dang dngul las byas pa la btags so/_/'phan gyi kha dog ni 'di lta ste/_sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_btsod ka dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar pos mdzes par byas pa yin la/_shing rta de la lha'i 
[\[134b.5\]]rgyal po de zhon nas/_lha mo'i tshogs du ma ni nye ba na glu dbyangs len/_lha 'bum phrag du ma yang mdun du song nas glu dbyangs len cing nam mkha' la ni yang dang yang du 'gro/_sa la ni yang dang yang du 'gro ste/_gar dga' bar 'gro ba/_ci dgar byed pa/_lha'i bde ba de la nye bar 
[\[134b.6\]]spyod cing sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pas nyams dga' bzhin du grong khyer blta na sdug dang /_skyed mos tshal ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do/_/der 'dong ba na lha'i tshogs gzhan dag gis mthong nas bro gar byed/_gad mo dgod/_rtsed mo rtse/_rol mo byed cing pad ma sna 
[\[134b.7\]]tshogs sdong bu bai DUr+ya las byas pa dag lag tu khyer nas/_lha'i rgyal po brgya byin lha rnams dang lhan cig gang nas mngon du 'ong ba der blta na sdug pa na gnas pa'i lha de rnams kyis kyang skyed mos tshal nas byung nas 'ong ngo /_/de nas brgya byin gyis bdag cag gi drung 'dir 'ong gis khyed 
[\[135a\]]
[\[135a.1\]]kyis 'di dag dang rtse ba de bya ba'i rigs so zhes kyang bsgo'o/_/de nas brgya byin gyi kha nas tshig thos pa spyi bos blangs nas/_blta na sdug na gnas pa'i lha ga la ba der chu blang ba'i phyir brgyugs so/_/lha mo'i nang nas lha mo de dag kyang blta na sdug pa'i gnas pa'i nang du chu 
[\[135a.2\]]blang ba'i phyir brgyugs so/_/blta na sdug na gnas pa'i lha mo dang /_chos bzang na gnas pa'i lha mo dag kyang gang de nas phan tshun rgyug go/_/de ltar lha rnams phan tshun du gser gyi pad ma'i 'dab ma dag blangs nas skyed mos tshal ga la ba der rgyug la/_de dag phan tshun lhan cig tu dgod 
[\[135a.3\]]cing rtse la rgyu'o/_/lha'i dbang po brgya byin bar snang la rgyu zhing 'dug pas kyang lha dang lha mo rnams me tog ku mu das rtse ba de dag mthong ngo /_/lha de rnams chu la yun ring du rtse ba de byas nas/_de nas yang mchog ste/_pad ma la rtse ba rtsom par byed do/_/lha dang lha mo de dag phan tshun 
[\[135a.4\]]pad ma la rtse bar byed de/_la la gser gyi pad ma rnams kyis/_la la bai DUr+ya dang gser gyi sdong bu rnams kyis/_la la sdong bu sna tshogs rnams kyis rtse ste de ltar phan tshun rtsed mo byed do/_/de ltar phan tshun yun ring du bstegs shing rtses nas/_'bras bu'i tshal ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do/_/
[\[135a.5\]]de dag gis 'bras bu snyi ba rnams blangs nas/_phan tshun steg 'dod pa 'phen par byed do/_/'bras bu la rtse ba de yang byas nas chang gi tshal ga la yod pa der 'dong bar byed do/_/tshal der song nas myos pa'i skyon dang bral zhing 'khrug pa med pa ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin ro zhim pa las ji ltar 
[\[135a.6\]]byas pa bzhin du zhim pa dag la 'thung bar byed do/_/lha'i rgyal po brgya byin yang shing rta'i mchog de las babs nas lha'i kun dga' ra ba ga la ba der song ste/_de dag gi nang du 'dug go/_/lha'i rgyal po de rnams kyis mthong nas phan tshun kun yid dga' ste lha'i rgyal po la mchod pa 
[\[135a.7\]]byed do//_//'phags pa dam pa'i chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa/_bam po sum cu gnyis pa/_de ltar kun gyis thal mo spyi bor sbyar te mchod pa byas nas/_'di ltar lha'i dbang po bzhugs pa bdag cag gi srog gi 'bras bu mchis pa lags te/_lha'i rgyal po brgya 
[\[135b\]]
[\[135b.1\]]byin ni gang bdag cag gi pha ma dag pas lhag par srog stsol ba lags so zhes smras nas/_de ltar brgya byin de la de rnams kyis legs par mchod do/_/de nas yang lha de dag la 'di skad ces khyed ni bdag gi bu dang 'dra/_spun dang 'dra zhes smras nas de ltar de dag phan tshun legs 
[\[135b.2\]]par mchod pa byas te/_de nas yang bag med pa'i sar zhugs nas/_bag med pa de nyid la gnas so/_/de nas yang tshal dang nye ba'i tshal dag bya'i tshogs rnams kyis sgra 'byin pa/_'bab chu dang /_klung dang /_tshang tshing sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/_gser gyi chu bo pad ma'i tshal dang nye 
[\[135b.3\]]ba'i tshal mdzes par byas pa/_sa gzhi mnyam zhing 'jam la mi rtsub pa/_mtho dman gyis brgyan pa/_bai DUr+ya dang gser dang dngul dang shel gyi shing ljon pas brgyan pa/_bza' ba dang btung ba chu bo ltar 'bab cing 'bras bu sna tshogs dang ldan pa/_me tog man dA ra dang pad ma la sogs 
[\[135b.4\]]pa me tog chen po rnams kyis mdzes par byas pa/_tshang tshing rnams kyi nang na lha'i mi dang bud med dgod dgod/_rtse rtse rgal rgal yongs su spyad pas bsten pa'i tshang tshing gi tshal dang skyed mos tshal rnams su lha'i sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pa dang lha'i kha zas dang /_lha'i yul lnga 
[\[135b.5\]]'byor cing ldan par gyur pa rnams kyis kyang dga' bar byed do/_/de nas yang blta na sdug pa na gnas pa dang chos bzang na gnas pa dga' bar byed pa/_rang gi gnas gnas su zhugs so/_/de dag der zhugs nas kyang ji srid du 'dod pa yid du 'ong ba byas shing bsags pa'i las de 
[\[135b.6\]]zad par ma gyur pa de srid du dga' bar byed do/_/de dag phyis lha'i ris de nas 'chi bar 'gyur te shi nas kyang las nye bar 'gro ba ji lta ba bzhin/_sems can dmyal ba dang [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang dud 'gro rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyis 
[\[135b.7\]]mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mi'i nang du skyes na/_las de dang rgyu 'thun par de rtag tu shin tu bde bar 'gyur zhing /_rig pa'i blo dri ma med pa dang /_rol mo la dga' ba ste/_bro gar dang glu dbyangs dang dgod pa dang rtse ba la dga'/_rtag tu spro ba la dga' zhing bza' ba dang btung ba dang /_
[\[136a\]]
[\[136a.1\]]bca' ba dang bza' bar bya ba mang po la dga' ba dang yams kyi nad med cing /_rims nad med la mya ngan dang bral bar 'gyur ba mthong ngo /_/de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de/_sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas la rtog par byed 
[\[136a.2\]]de/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas lha rnams kyi gnas phyogs gcig na gnas pa zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo /_/der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/_tshul khrims dang ldan pa/_'byor pa 
[\[136a.3\]]yang shin tu chung zhing dman par gyur pa gang gis gzhan dag las nor rdzas kyi rnam pa'am/_kha zas dag blangs te/_shin tu sdug bsngal yang bu dang chung ma 'ba' zhig la mi sbyor bar sems yongs su bsgoms pa'i yid kyis nor rdzas sam/_kha zas de dag gzhan sdug bsngal zhing 
[\[136a.4\]]pha rol gzhan dag nyon mongs pa dang long ba dang dbul ba dang mgon med pa rnams la bgo bsha' byas nas sbyin par byed pa dang srog chags gzhan gyi chung ma la 'khrig pa'i dga' bas rab tu chags pa dag_/gzhi des mngon par bzung ste/_srog chad pa'i nyon mongs pa 'thob cing 
[\[136a.5\]]gshed ma'i lag tu bskur ba/_lho phyogs kyi sgo nas khrid de srog gcod par 'gyur ba/_nyon mongs pa'i rnam pa de lta bu'i nang du chud pa las thar bar byas na/_de lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten phyogs gcig na gnas pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[136a.6\]]der skyes nas kyang legs par bya ba byas pa/_dge ba'i las shin tu rgya che ba byas shing yang dag par spyad pa de rang gi lus las kun nas 'od 'byung ste/_dper na nyi ma'i 'od 'byung ba bzhin no/_/yang 'od de dag gi kha dog sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_btsod ka dang /_ljang gu dang /_
[\[136a.7\]]dkar por 'byung ste/_lha de'i 'od des lha'i 'jig rten gyi 'od gsal ba de dag thams cad de nas yang bcu 'gyur bas lhag par gsal bar byed do/_/dper na gza' dang skar ma'i 'od kyis 'dzam bu'i gling gsal bar byed la/_de nas yang zla ba'i 'od kyis gsal bar byed pa de 
[\[136b\]]
[\[136b.1\]]bzhin du/_lha de'i rang gi lus kyi 'od kyis lha'i gnas de dag thams cad brgyan pa bzhin rnam par gsal bar byed do/_/'od des gzugs phun sum tshogs pa de dag thams cad dang ldan pa'i lha de la/_lha de dag gis mngon par brtags te/_rnam pa de lta bu'i khyad par gang gi 
[\[136b.2\]]drung na lha gzhan de dag srin bu me khyer bzhin gsal ba med do/_/lha'i ris der lha de skyes ma thag tu lha mo de dag thams cad lha de ga la ba der rgyug cing skyes ma thag tu rgyan thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur te/_'di lta ste gang gi gtsug gi nor bu mthon ka chen po'i 'od kyis dpag tshad 
[\[136b.3\]]dag tu 'od snang bar byed pa bzhin du/_'od gang gis gzhan mtho ris na gnas pa'i 'od de dag thams cad dang phyi rol gyi nor bu de dag thams cad de ltar zil gyis gnon par byed do/_/ji ltar nyi ma shar bas srin bu me khyer rnams kyi 'od zil gyis gnon par byed pa de bzhin du lha de dag 
[\[136b.4\]]zil gyis gnon par byed do/_/de nas skyes ma thag tu rin po che sna bdun gyi cod pan dpag tshad brgyar 'od 'phro ba 'byung bar 'gyur te/_'od kun gyis brgyan cing 'od zer 'byung la gang gis 'od sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_btsod ka dang /_ljang gu dang /_dkar po dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[136b.5\]]de'i 'og tu rin po che sna bdun gyi mgul rgyan dpag tshad brgyar 'od 'phro ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de ltar de'i 'og tu rin po che sna bdun gyi rgyan phreng 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de'i 'og tu phreng ba 'phyang ba rdo rjes brgyan pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de'i 'og tu de'i rked pa'i phreng rgyan ji ltar 'ja'i 
[\[136b.6\]]kha dog lta bur skye zhing 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de'i 'og tu de'i lham rin po che sna bdun gyis spras pa/_'od sna tshogs dang ldan pa 'byung bar 'gyur te/_shugs gang gis rim pa 'di ltar 'gro ba ni/_gang gi tshe lha de 'di snyam du 'di ltar bdag che ge mo zhig tu nam mkha' 
[\[136b.7\]]las 'gro'o snyam du bsams na sems bskyed ma thag tu lha yul du 'byung ba'i lham des lha de bteg ste nam mkha' la khyer nas gnas der 'gro ste/_lus ngal ba med cing gnod pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/gang de'i 'og tu de'i gos thags su btags pa ma yin pa rin 
[\[137a\]]
[\[137a.1\]]po che sna tshogs las byas pa 'od gsal ba 'byung bar 'gyur te/_gang gi 'od kyis lha'i ris nyams dga' ba de/_de nas yang shin tu nyams dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/lha de skyes ma thag tu 'di snyam du sems te/_las byas pa gang gis bdag 'dir skyes shig 
[\[137a.2\]]gu snyam nas/_des brtags na las legs par byas pa dang nyes par byas pa'i gzhi 'dzam bu gling de nas bdag shi ste/_der gang bya ba legs par bya ba'am/_nyes par byas pa de 'dir nye bar spyod par 'gyur te/_der bdag gis legs par byas pa'i las kyi rgyu des bdag 'dir 
[\[137a.3\]]skyes te/_rgyu med pas ni ma yin no snyam mo/_/de de ltar bsams pa dang thang cig tu lha mo gzugs dang lang tsho phun sum tshogs pa ji snyed pa thams cad nye bar 'ong bar byed de/_de dag gi rgyan gyi sgra ji ltar mi yul na sil snyan yan lag lnga dang shin tu ldan pa de dag gi sgra 'byung ba de 
[\[137a.4\]]ltar de rnams kyi sgra 'byung bar byed do/_/de dag gi dri yang dpag tshad gnyis su gang bar 'gyur te/_dri gang gis me tog thams cad kyi dri zil gyis gnon par 'gyur/_de dag gi gzugs dang lang tsho sngon ma byung ba 'byung bar 'gyur zhing tshim pa dang dga' ba 'byung bar 'gyur la/_sngon 
[\[137a.5\]]gyi gos kyi yon tan rnams kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/lha de'i legs par byas pa'i las des 'di lta ste/_nyi ma shar ba'i nyi ma'i 'od kyis me tog thams cad rab tu rgyas par 'gyur ba de ltar lha de'i 'od byung bas lha mo de dag thams cad kyi gzugs rab tu rgyas par 'gyur te/_de 
[\[137a.6\]]dag dang de phrad nas 'dzum zhing dga' ba dag gis rtsed mo byed do/_/de dag gis de pang du blangs te tshal dang nye ba'i tshal ga la ba de nyid du 'gros sdug gus khyer zhing lha de'i mdun du sil snyan sna tshogs dang dgod pa'i sgras dga' bar byed pa de dag lha la lta zhing tshal dang nye ba'i tshal 
[\[137a.7\]]de dag ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do/_/lha de'i gnas su tshal 'di dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/_'di lta ste/_pad ma rmad byung gi tshal yod de/_tshal de na gang gi tshe/_lha de 'jug pa de'i tshe/_gom pa 'dor ba'i sa dag la pad ma sdong bu ni bai DUr+ya/_myu gu ni rdo rje/_snying po ni 
[\[137b\]]
[\[137b.1\]]gser/_lo ma 'jam zhing 'dab ma 'jam pa dang bung ba'i tshogs kyis mdzes par byed pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur la/_de dag la lha de'i rkang pa gnyis 'jog par byed do/_/de nas rkang pa bteg pa dang pad ma gzhan dag 'byung bar 'gyur zhing snga ma zhum par 'gyur ro/_/de pad 
[\[137b.2\]]ma'i tshal de nas sbrang rtsi'i chu'i tshal zhes bya ba sbrang rtsi'i chu'i tshal ga la ba der 'dong bar byed de/_tshal de na lha'i shing ljon pa gser las byas pa de dag thams cad las lha'i rgun chang 'dzag ste/_lha'i ro dang dri dang ldan pa'i rgun chang de dag la lha'i mchog de 'thung bar byed de/_myos 
[\[137b.3\]]pa'i skyon dang bral ba'i sbrang rtsi de dag la lha de rnams 'thung bar byed do/_/dri dang ro sngon ma byung ba de dag la 'thungs nas kyang tshal gsum mdzes zhes bya ba ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do/_/der gsum mdzes dpe med pa 'byung ste/_'di lta ste/_bya dang bung ba'i tshogs sgra 'byin pa dang /_
[\[137b.4\]]gzhan dang mi 'dra ba'i sgra dang lha mo rol mo byed pa 'byung ngo /_/lha'i mchog de tshal gsum mdzes de na skyed mos tshal nas skyed mos tshal dang nye ba'i tshal nas nye ba'i tshal dang /_pad ma'i rdzing nas pad ma'i rdzing dang /_lteng ka nas lteng kar dga' bar byed/_rtse bar byed/_dga' 
[\[137b.5\]]dgur spyod par byed do/_/bya sgra sna tshogs 'byin pa la nyan cing dbang po lnga yul lnga la tshim pa med pa'i yid sred pa'i mes sreg pa na/_ji srid du de'i legs par byas pa'i las ma zad pa de srid du dga' bar byed do/_/de las de zad nas de nas yang lha'i ris de nas 'chi bar 'gyur 
[\[137b.6\]]te/_shi nas kyang las kyi thag pas bcings pa rang gis byas pa'i las rnams kyis sems can dmyal ba dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_dud 'gro rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te mi'i so so yang dag par myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyis mi rnams kyi nang du skyes na/_las de dang 
[\[137b.7\]]rgyu 'thun par de gzugs dang rigs dang yon tan phun sum tshogs shing kun nas mchog tu bde ba dang ldan pa dang rang dang 'brel ba las 'tsho zhing gzhan la rag ma lus pa dang rang 'dod pa bzhin spyod cing nad med pa dang gnod pa med pa dang tsher ma med pa dang shin tu 'byor pa dang de 
[\[138a\]]
[\[138a.1\]]bzhin du gsum ldan gyi dus su'am de bzhin du gtso bo'i nang du'am/_de bzhin du rgyal srid phyed la dbang ba'am/_rgyal tshab bam/_tshong pa 'byor pa'i mchog nor dang 'bru dang gser dngul thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur ba mthong ngo /_/de nas yang dge slong las kyi 
[\[138a.2\]]'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas la rtog par byed de/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas shing gseb na gnas pa zhes ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo /_/der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 
[\[138a.3\]]'gyur snyam nas/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/_gang gis rkun po chad pas bcad par 'os pa bzung ba/_gang 'jig rten pha rol la 'jigs pa'i bsam pas/_de la chad pas mi gcod cing gnod par mi byed pa dang pha rol gzhan gyis rkun po bzung ba de yang 
[\[138a.4\]]sems can la phan par 'dod pa/_byams par gzhol ba'i sems dang ldan pa'i bsam pas thar bar byed pa dang /_ma la yang mal cha dang na ba'i rkyen gyi gso sman dang /_yo byad sbyin par byed cing gong ma'i rdzas bsgrubs pa de dag rku ba'i sems kyis mi rku ba dang /_tshig 'jam zhing tshig 
[\[138a.5\]]nyung la phan par smra ba dang /_nyin gcig bzhin sangs rgyas la gus par phyag 'tshal zhing /_sangs rgyas la spos sam me tog gam bdug pa dag phul te phyag 'tshal la/_de'i yon tan yang rjes su dran pa dang /_bla ma la lus kyis kyang gus par byed cing myur du ldang ba dang /_
[\[138a.6\]]gus par phyag 'tshal ba dang /_rtag tu snyan par smra ba dang /_sdig pa'i grogs po mthong na shin tu 'dre bar mi byed la/_de dag dang lhan cig dga' ba dang 'gro ba dang phrad pa dang mngon par smra bar mi byed/_mi nyon mongs pa'i sems dang ldan pa/_'phags pa ma yin pa/_'jig 
[\[138a.7\]]rten pas spangs pa rnams dang lhan cig dga' bar mi byed la/_thad kar lta zhing 'dug par mi byed pa dang /_rgan po la legs par lta ste rgan po shes pa dang ldan pa/_sems can la byams shing pha rol gdung bar mi byed pa/_'jig rten kun gyis bkur ba/_snyan par smra ba/_'jam 
[\[138b\]]
[\[138b.1\]]por smra ba dag la bsnyen bkur byed cing /_yang dag par rnam par 'byed pa'i tshul khrims kyang yod pa dang /_bran pho dang /_bran mo dang /_las byed pa dang /_zho shas 'tsho ba rnams la rgyu med par 'tshe bar mi byed pa dang /_bza' ba mang du mi za ba dang /_'dod dgur 'gro ba'i tshul du mi byed pa dang /_
[\[138b.2\]]gnod pa'i tshul med pa dang /_glo bur du mi 'khrug pa dang /_shan pa dang /_nyo tshong dang /_khyi yis 'tsho ba dang /_rnyis 'tsho ba dri ma dang bcas pa la sogs pa dang /_nyo tshong la sogs pa chos ma yin pa dang yang dag par 'brel bar mi byed pa dang /_chang 'tshong gi khyim du dga' ba med pa dang /_
[\[138b.3\]]bud med la rag las shing sdig pa byed pa dang /_spyod pa nyams pa dang /_rtab rtab por mi 'gro ba dang /_smra ba na gzhan gyi gsang mi shor ba dang /_grogs po rnams la glags lta zhing gsang ste dgra mi byed pa dang /_gnad btsal te rgyal po la mi smra ba dang /_gzhan gyi zhing rnams la skye 
[\[138b.4\]]ba'i ldum ra mthong na bdag nyid kyir mi byed pa dang /_yul mi'i dpya na ra ma drug cha gcig 'bul ba las lhag par mi 'bebs pa dang /_gzhan gyi zhing dang /_chu dang /_skal ba byin pa mi 'phrog pa dang /_mtshan mo'am nyin mo gzhan gyi 'bras bu mi 'phrog pa dang /_rku sems thams cad 
[\[138b.5\]]dang bral ba'am/_re re dang bral ba'am/_nyung ngur bral ba yin te/_ji ltar na nyung ngur bral ba yin zhe na/_las kyi nyer bsdogs mi byed pa dang /_las bar ma dang bral ba yin te/_gang byas pa 'chags par byed cing skyon du rtsi la mi byed pa dang chen po dang bral ba yin te/_las kyi nyer 
[\[138b.6\]]bsdogs mi byed pa dang de bzhin byed du mi 'jug cing /_gzhan gyis byas nas kyang 'chags su 'jug pa dang /_so sor rjes su yi rang bar mi byed pa dang mi ngan pa de rnam par spong bar byed la/_chung ngu dang 'bring dang chen po byed pa de chung ngu dang 'bring dang chen po'i 'bras bu la spyod pa 
[\[138b.7\]]yin te/_de ltar legs par byas pa'i las kyi mtha' spyod pa/_nyes par byed pa rnam par spangs pa de lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten shing gseb na gnas pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de der skyes nas kyang lha'i lus sha dang rus pa dang rnag khrag 
[\[139a\]]
[\[139a.1\]]dang bral ba yin te/_gang bde ba myong bar 'gyur ba de'i dpe bya bar yang sla ba ma yin mod kyi/_cung zad cig dper bya na 'di lta ste/_sems can gang sems can dmyal ba yang sos su skye ba dang gang gser gyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i khyad par gang yin pa 
[\[139a.2\]]dang lha'i bde ba myong ba'i mi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po gling bzhi pa'i rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa'i khyad par gang yin pa'i khyad par de ni shing gseb na gnas pa'i lha de'i dper cung zad bya ba yin no/_/shing gseb na gnas pa'i lha de ri rab kyi steng dpag tshad sum stong yod 
[\[139a.3\]]par dpal dang ldan pa rin po che sna bdun gyi lha'i shing ljon pa dang chu bos mdzes par byas pa lta bur/_phyogs de na tshal kun spyod ces bya ba gser gyi shing ljon pa yod pa der 'di ltar lha rnams kyi sems la gang du bdag cag 'gro bar bya ba der shing ljon pa dag bdag cag gi phyi bzhin 
[\[139a.4\]]du de ltar 'ong bar shog shig snyam mo/_/de sems bskyed ma thag nyid du shing gseb na gnas pa'i lha rnams gar 'gro ba de dag gi phyi bzhin du de ltar 'ong ste/_dper na/_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po sems bskyed ma thag nyid du 'khor lo nam mkha' la 'gro ba de ltar lha 
[\[139a.5\]]rnams kyi sems bskyed ma thag nyid du shing ljon pa dag nam mkha' las 'ong ngo /_/lha rnams gar 'dod pa der yang sa'i steng du 'bab par 'gyur te/_dper na bya dag sa'i phyogs gang dang gang du 'gro zhing gnas pa de dang de nyid du gnas par 'gyur ba de bzhin du shing ljon pa de dag 
[\[139a.6\]]thams cad de ltar 'gyur te/_'di ni shing gseb na gnas pa'i lha rnams kyi rang gis byas pa'i las kyi mthu gcig yin no/_/de nas yang mthu 'byung ste/_de ltar legs par byas pa'i las de dag gi mthu ni lha rnams gang du 'dong ba der bya dag sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pa lta 
[\[139a.7\]]bu'i sgra 'byin bzhin du phyi bzhin 'brang zhing 'dong ngo /_/de nas gzhan yang legs par byas pa'i las rnams kyi mthu ni lha rnams nam mkha' la 'dod pa dang bcas par 'gro ba'i lha dag pad ma'i rdzing na bung ba myos pa'i sgra 'byin pa dang gser gyi bya ngang pas mdzes par byas shing /_bya kA 
[\[139b\]]
[\[139b.1\]]raN+Da ba dang ngur pa rnams kyis mdzes par byas pa ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do/_/de nas gzhan yang shing gseb na gnas pa'i lha rnams kyis legs par byas pa'i mthu ni lha/_lha'i phreng ba dang gos gyon pa dag nam mkha' gang la 'gro ba'i nam mkha' der/_lha'i pad ma sdong bu 
[\[139b.2\]]bai DUr+ya las byas pa'i gnas dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/_'dab ma stong yod pa'i 'dab ma de re re la lha mo 'khod nas/_lha ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do/_/de nas yang shing gseb na gnas pa'i legs par byas pa rnams kyi las kyi mthu ni lha dag lha'i pad ma la 'dug nas gang du 
[\[139b.3\]]'gro ba der nam mkha' de las lha'i btung bas gang ba'i lha'i snod dag lag tu 'ong ste/_btung ba de dag lha dang lha mo de dag dang lhan cig 'thung zhing dga' bar byed/_glu dbyangs len/_yongs su spyod par byed la/_phyogs gzhan gang du 'dong bar yang 'gro'o/_/de nas gzhan 
[\[139b.4\]]yang shing gseb na gnas pa rnams kyi las kyi mthu ni lha rnams gang dang gang 'dod pa de dang de thams cad 'byor bar 'gyur zhing /_lha'i 'jig rten gyi gnas nas gnas gzhan du rnam pa gang gzhan gyis 'gro 'dod pa'i ri dang ri'i rtse mo de dag tu yang lha'i me tog dang /_'bras bu dang /_
[\[139b.5\]]chu bo phun sum tshogs pa dang tshal dang nye ba'i tshal phun sum tshogs pa dag nam mkha' las 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/lha gnas pa de rnams lha mo dag gis yongs su bskor la lhan cig tu lha'i sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i glu dbyangs nye ba na len cing /_de dag nyid dang yul nas 
[\[139b.6\]]yul du nam mkha' la 'gro ba na/_de nas chos bzang na gnas pa dang blta na sdug pa na gnas pa yid dga' bas gnas mthon po mthong ste/_ji ltar 'dzam bu'i gling na mi rgyu ba dag lha gzhal med khang gsal ba na gnas pas mthong ba bzhin no/_/de ltar chos bzang na gnas pa'i 
[\[139b.7\]]lha de dag dang blta na sdug na gnas pa'i lha de dag phan tshun du kye 'di ltar shing gseb na gnas pa'i lha de dag bde ba mchog dang ldan te/_bdag cag pas khyad ches bde la/_lha'i sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pa dag nye bar len cing gar dga' dgur rgyu ba/_gar 'dod par 'gro ba/_
[\[140a\]]
[\[140a.1\]]ci bder gnas/_thogs pa med par 'gro ba/_yul nas yul du 'gro'o zhes brjod do/_/de nas lha'i rgyal po brgya byin yang pad ma 'dab ma stong la sdong bu lha'i gser dang bai DUr+ya las byas pa'i steng du 'dug nas/_lha mo bzang mo dag dang lhan cig nam mkha' las 
[\[140a.2\]]'gro'o/_/legs par byas pa'i las kyis sprul pa'i pad ma de yang nyams dga' ba 'di lta bu yin te/_'dab ma thams cad la lha mo lha'i phreng ba dang gos gyon pa gser gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa thams cad yid rab tu dga' ba/_thams cad sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i dga' bas myos pa 
[\[140a.3\]]thams cad brgya byin la phyogs pa/_so so gzugs dang lang tsho dar la bab pa'i dregs pas myos pa lnga 'khod de/_de dag thams cad lha'i rgyal po brgya byin dang lhan cig tu shing gseb na gnas pa'i lha rnams ga la ba der nam mkha' las 'dong bar byed do/_/shing gseb na gnas 
[\[140a.4\]]pa'i lha de dag gis kyang brgya byin de mthong nas phyir zhing yid rab tu dga' la/_yang ji ltar bshad pa'i gnas de dag las babs nas/_lha'i rgyal po brgya byin ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do/_/dong nas brgya byin de la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te tshig gis kyang bstod do/_/brgya byin gyi 
[\[140a.5\]]sngon du 'gro ba dang /_shing gseb na gnas pa'i lha snying dga' ba rnams kyis brgya byin de yongs su bskor nas/_brgya byin mngon par 'dod pa'i gnas sam/_skyed mos tshal lam/_ri bo'i steng ngam/_tshal lam/_nye ba'i tshal lam/_pad ma'i rdzing ngam/_gnas gzhan ga la 
[\[140a.6\]]ba der nam mkha' las 'dong bar byed do/_/brgya byin gyi sngon du 'gro ba de rnams der yun ring du rtses nas/_de nas yang rang gi gnas ga la ba der 'dong bar byed de/_brgya byin gyi sngon du 'gro ba rnams ji ltar song ba de ltar slar 'ong bar byed do/_/de nas brgya byin yang lha'i 'dun sa 
[\[140a.7\]]chos bzang ga la ba der 'gro bar byed do/_/gzugs dang /_sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya sdug gus myos pa'i lha de dag kyang ji srid du sdug pa 'dod pa/_yid du 'ong ba byas shing bsags pa'i las de zad par ma gyur pa de srid du dga' bar byed do/_/de phyis lha'i ris de nas 
[\[140b\]]
[\[140b.1\]]'chi bar 'gyur te/_shi nas kyang las nye bar 'gro ba ji lta ba bzhin sems can dmyal ba dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_dud 'gro rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mi'i nang du skyes na/_las de dang rgyu 'thun par de rtag tu bde ba mchog dang ldan zhing rtag 
[\[140b.2\]]tu nad med pa dang /_gnod pa med pa dang /_nor dang shin tu ldan zhing mchog tu bde ba dang /_de bzhin du sde gzhan gyis 'jigs pa med pa'i bar gyi gling dag gi rgyal por 'gyur ba'am rgyal tshab tu 'gyur bar mthong ngo /_/de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de/_
[\[140b.3\]]sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas la rtog par byed de/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas shing rta sna tshogs na gnas pa zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo /_/der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas/_des thos 
[\[140b.4\]]pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/_mchod rten gyi gnas rnams su sngon yo byad sbyar ba rnams rgyal po mi rigs pa'am/_blon po mi rigs pa'am/_mi rigs par chags pa la brkam pa/_las la 'jigs pa med pa/_gang gis gcod par byed pa la skyes bu dam pa yid dang 
[\[140b.5\]]sems bsgoms pa sangs rgyas kyi yon tan mngon par dran pa'am tshig shin tu snyan cing gsal bas sangs rgyas la bstod nas de phyir zlog par byed dam 'tshob par byed na/_de lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi nang shing rta sna tshogs 
[\[140b.6\]]na gnas pa'i sar skye bar 'gyur ro/_/der skyes nas kyang shin tu dge ba'i las byed pa de sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pas dga' bar byed/_rtse bar byed/_dga' dgur spyod par byed/_gnas par byed do/_/sa der las kyi 'bras bu gzhan gyis kyang skye bar 'gyur ba ni/_srog 
[\[140b.7\]]gcod pa dang /_ma byin par len pa spangs pas 'gyur te/_'di lta ste/_khyis 'tsho ba las [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]thar bar byed la/_bdag nyid kyang mi byed/_byed du yang mi 'jug_/gzhan gyis byas pa la rjes su yi rang bar yang mi byed pa dang /_ji ltar ma byin par len pa mi byed de/_ma 
[\[141a\]]
[\[141a.1\]]byin par len pa ji ltar spangs pa yin zhe na/_bdag nyid yul gyi bdag po'am/_rgyal po'am/_blon por gyur pas pha rol la chad pas gcod par mi byed cing /_gzhan byed pa yang zlog par byed la/_chos sam khrims la 'jog par byed pa de dag ni shing rta sna tshogs 
[\[141a.2\]]su skyes par 'gyur ba'i las rnam pa gnyis pa yin no/_/tshal gyi rgyar dpag tshad sum stong yod pa de na/_lha dag shing rta sna tshogs rnams kyis dga' bar byed de/_des na shing rta sna tshogs zhes bya ba'i ming du btags la/_shing rta sna tshogs der gnas pa'i lha rnams rtse bar byed do/_/
[\[141a.3\]]shing rta dang shing rta'i nang na gser dang dngul gyi pad ma 'dab ma bai DUr+ya shin tu blta na sdug pa/_dri mchog tu yid du 'thad pa'i rdzing 'byung la/_bung ba bai DUr+ya'i mdog lta bu'i tshogs lding ba rnams kyis nye bar mdzes par byas pa yin no/_/tshal der bkra ba 'di dag kun 'byung bar 
[\[141a.4\]]'gyur te de brjod pa/_pad ma'i rdzing rnams su pad ma bkra ba 'byung ba ni 'di lta ste/_pad ma la la pad ma'i phyed mthon ka las byas pa/_phyed bai DUr+ya las byas pa yin te bkra ba gcig yin no/_/yang bkra ba gzhan ni phyed bai DUr+ya las byas la/_phyed gser las byas pa yin te 
[\[141a.5\]]bkra ba gzhan yin no/_/yang bkra ba gzhan ni pad ma 'dab ma brgya pa thams cad kyi pad ma la pad ma phyed kyi pad ma'i 'dab ma ni gser las byas la gzhan ni pad ma rA ga'i mdog lta bu yin no/_/yang bkra ba gzhan 'byung ba ni/_pad ma bai DUr+ya'i 'dab ma dag la bung ba gser 
[\[141a.6\]]gyi mdog can rgyu la/_dngul gyi 'dab ma dag la bung ba pad ma rA ga'i mdog can rgyu'o/_/yang bkra ba gzhan 'byung ba ni bai DUr+ya'i pad ma'i sdong bu la ni gser gyis yongs su dkris/_gser gyi pad ma'i sdong bu la ni rin po ches yongs su dkris/_dngul gyi pad ma'i sdong 
[\[141a.7\]]bu la ni spug gis yongs su dkris/_rin po che ma rgad kyi kha dog lta bu'i sdong bu la ni 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser gyis yongs su dkris so/_/bung ba sgra 'byin pa kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs su 'dug pa rnams kyis pad ma'i rdzing bu de dag khebs pa yin te/_'di lta ste/_'dzam bu'i 
[\[141b\]]
[\[141b.1\]]gling na me tog tsu la sa'i dog pa la bung ba rnams kyis rtag tu khebs pa ltar shing rta sna tshogs kyi yang de dang 'dra'o/_/de nas legs par byas pa'i las rnams kyis gnas sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur te/_'di lta ste/_'dzam bu'i gling na lag bzo mkhas pa'am/_lag 
[\[141b.2\]]bzo'i slob ma mkhas pa zhig gis/_rtsig ngos la bkra ba 'dab ma sna tshogs bkod pa/_tshon rtsi sna tshogs kyis bris pa ltar/_tshal gyi gnas de na yang de lta bu yin no/_/yang shing rta sna tshogs kyi tshal gyi bkra ba gzhan ni bya sna tshogs kyi sgro dang /_rkang pa dang /_mgo dang /_
[\[141b.3\]]lto dang /_mig bkra ba dag 'byung ste/_'di lta ste/_bya gang gi lto gser du 'dug pa de'i sgro dngul yin la/_rgyab pad ma rA ga'i mdog dang /_mig rin po che ke ke ru'i mdog_/de bzhin du gang dngul gyi ltor 'dug pa de'i sgro gser la/_mig bai DUr+ya'i mdog dang mig 
[\[141b.4\]]gi 'bras bu pad ma rA ga'i mdog la rgyab bkra bar 'dug ste/_rin po che sna bdun gyi mdog lta bu'i bya sna tshogs rnams kyis nye bar mdzes par byas so/_/'di ni shing rta sna tshogs kyi tshal gyi bkra ba gzhan yin te/_'di lta ste/_ri'i rtse mo 'byung ba dang /_'di lta ste/_mthon 
[\[141b.5\]]ka dang /_bai DUr+ya dang /_spug dang /_rin po che ke ke ru dang gser te/_de rnams kyi 'od kyis tshal de spras shing brgyan pa yin no/_/tshal de phan tshun gyi 'od zer 'khyil pas shin tu gang la/_lha'i 'od zer gyi mthus shin tu mdzes par byas pa yin no/_/yang tshal sna 
[\[141b.6\]]tshogs bkra ba gzhan ni lcug ma 'phyang ba dang /_shing gel ba sna tshogs dag phan tshun 'dzings par 'dug la/_kha dog gsum 'byung ba ni 'di lta ste/_bai DUr+ya'i lcug ma la pad ma rA ga'i mdog gi 'bras bu de 'phyang bar 'gyur zhing /_an da rnyil gyi mdog lta bus lhan 
[\[141b.7\]]cig dkris pa yin/_dngul gyi lcug ma la pad ma rA ga'i mdog gi 'od kyis lhan cig bskor ba yin/_de bzhin du spug dang /_gser gyi lcug ma la gser gyi lcug mas lhan cig dkris pa yin/_'di lta ste/_rin po che ke ke ru'i mdog lta bu'i lcug ma la dngul 
[\[142a\]]
[\[142a.1\]]gyis yongs su dkris pa yin te/_de ltar lcug ma kha dog gnyis pa 'phyang ba yongs su dkris pa yin no/_/lcug ma 'phyang ba kha dog gsum pa rnams la yongs su dkris pa ni 'di lta ste/_bai DUr+ya'i lcug ma la gser dang /_ke ke ru'i mdog lta bus kun du 
[\[142a.2\]]dkris pa yin/_de bzhin du lcug ma ke ke ru'i mdog lta bu la/_/gser dang dngul lta bus yongs su dkris pa yin/_de bzhin du dngul gyi lcug ma la pad ma spug dang /_mthon ka lta bus yongs su dkris pa yin te/_de ltar lcug ma re re la gnyis gnyis kyis kun du dkris 
[\[142a.3\]]pa yin no/_/yang shing rta sna tshogs kyi tshal du bkra ba gzhan 'byung ba ni/_gser gyi lcug ma dag las me tog bai DUr+ya'i mdog lta bu 'byung /_de bzhin du dngul gyi lcug ma dag las me tog mthon ka'i mdog lta bu 'byung /_de bzhin du gser gyi lcug ma dag las me tog ke 
[\[142a.4\]]ke ru'i mdog lta bu 'byung /_de bzhin du spug gi lcug ma dag las me tog bai DUr+ya'i mdog lta bu 'byung ste/_de ltar lcug ma sna tshogs dag las me tog sna tshogs dag 'byung ngo /_/las sna tshogs kyis bskyed pa/_sems sna tshogs kyis bslang ba/_rgyu sna tshogs dang 'thun pa ni yang 
[\[142a.5\]]dag par skyes pa sna tshogs dag yin te/_de ltar las rnams kyi rgyu dang gzhi des/_de ltar shing rta sna tshogs kyi tshal thams cad bkra ba yin no/_/ji ltar sa bon las 'bras bu 'byung ba de bzhin du rgyu dang 'thun par 'bras bu 'byung ste/_gang 'dir las byed pa rnam pa gang ji 
[\[142a.6\]]ltar 'phangs pa dang /_gang gi tshe zhing gi rnam pa ji lta bu dang /_sems pa'i rnam pa ji lta bu nas/_sna tshogs su slong bar byed pa'i bar gyi las rnam pa sna tshogs byas pa'i 'bras bu ni de ltar rgya'i 'bur lta bur 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/mtho ris sam sems can dmyal ba gang rgyu 
[\[142a.7\]]med par 'bras bu 'byung ba de med de/_gzhan gyis byas la rnam par smin pa gzhan la 'byung ba de ni gnas med do/_/de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de/_shing rta sna tshogs kyi tshal bkra ba dang /_'jig rten bkra ba la yang rtog par byed de/_
[\[142b\]]
[\[142b.1\]]sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i shing rta sna tshogs na lha rnams las ci zhig byed cig gu snyam nas/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/_'di ltar dus gang gi tshe/_mi chos dang mi ldan pa chos ma yin pa'i rjes su 'jug pa/_mar mi 'dzin pa/_phar mi 'dzin pa/_dge sbyong 
[\[142b.2\]]du mi 'dzin pa/_bram zer mi 'dzin pa/_rigs kyi rgan rabs la gus par mi byed pa/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen du mi 'dzin pa/_las dang 'bras bu la yid mi ches pa/_yang dag pa'i lta ba med pa/_yang dag pa'i lta ba'i sngon du 'gro ba med pa de'i tshe/_bdud sdig 
[\[142b.3\]]can dag dga' bar 'gyur la/_de'i chos dang chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i 'khor bzhi po de dag 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur te/_'di lta ste/_bdud kyi ris 'jig rten skyong ba 'thab pa zhes bya ba dang /_bdud kyi ris 'jig rten skyong ba g.yeng byed ces bya ba gang chos spyod pa'i 
[\[142b.4\]]sems can rnams kyi sems g.yeng bar byed pa'am/_dam pa'i chos nyan pa gnyid log par byed pa dang /_gsum pa lhag par chags par rmongs pa zhes bya ba sbyin pa dag gtong ba na/_sbyin pa po dang sbyin bdag rnams kyi sems chags pa skyed par byed de/_'di ltar bdag 
[\[142b.5\]]gis gang dge sbyong dang /_bram ze zhing du gyur pa rnams la sbyin du bdag gi bu dang chung ma ci bza' ci bgo snyam du sems par byed de/_bdud kyi ris 'jig rten skyong ba gsum pa dag sems can rnams rnam par rmongs par byed cing /_'jig rten na rgyu bar byed do/_/bdud
