[\[142b.6\]]kyi ris 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi pa 'du shes log pa zhes bya ba de 'jig rten na rgyu zhing /_de rab tu 'byung ba rnams kyi sems rab tu mi 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/dang po ni chags pa dang /_sbyor ba dang /_grong du 'jug pa dang /_tshong zong nyo tshong byed pa dang /_bud med la lta 'dod 
[\[142b.7\]]pa dang /_chang 'tshong gi khyim du 'jug pa dang /_'thab rtsod dang /_dge 'dun 'byed pa dang /_rmi lam gyi gnod pa'i sems skyed par byed do/_/bdud kyi ris 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi po de dag gang gi tshe/_chos dang mi ldan pa'i skye dgu 'dzam bu'i gling du byed par nus pa 
[\[143a\]]
[\[143a.1\]]dang ldan pa 'byung ba de'i tshe/_/bdud sdig can dag la lha dag dam pa'i chos kyi phyogs ni 'grib bo/_/bdud kyi phyogs ni 'phel te dgyes par mdzod cig ces bsnyad do/_/de dag las thos nas bdud sdig can dag gi rjes su 'brang ba de dag la/_bdag 
[\[143a.2\]]cag gi phyogs ji ltar 'phel/_dam pa'i chos kyi phyogs ji ltar 'gribs zhes dris so/_/de dag gis lha 'dzam bu'i gling na mi chos ma yin pa dang ldan pa/_chos ma yin pa'i rjes su 'jug pa/_mar mi 'dzin pa/_phar mi 'dzin pa/_dge sbyong du mi 'dzin pa/_bram 
[\[143a.3\]]zer mi 'dzin pa/_rigs kyi rgan rabs kyi rjes su mi 'jug pa/_bdag cag gi 'dod chags kyi chags pas zil gyis mnan cing /_dam pa'i chos mnyan pa la yang gnod pa bgyid do/_/de nas rab tu 'byung ba'i blos phal cher rab tu byung ba rnams dang /_khyim na 
[\[143a.4\]]gnas pa sdom pa blangs shing /_tshangs par spyod pa rnams kyi rmi lam du yang bud med kyi gzugs su sprul nas/_rmi lam gyi gnod pa bgyid du stsal/_sbyin pa po dang sbyin bdag rnams kyi sbyin pa gtong ba na/_bu dang chung ma la rag las pa'i sems kyis yid chags par 
[\[143a.5\]]gyur pa bgyis/_yid mdza' ba dang 'khrugs par bgyis/_rab tu byung ba yang nyo tshong gi zong la sems brtson par bgyis/_'thab pa dang /_rtsod pa dang /_mtshang 'drud pa la dga' bar bgyis te/_de ltar bdag cag gi thabs 'di rnams kyis bdud kyi phyogs ni 
[\[143a.6\]]spel/_dam pa'i chos kyi phyogs ni bshig go zhes smras so/_/bdud sdig can gyis de thos nas/_lha ma yin sgra gcan dang /_brtan pa dang /_rab dgod dang /_gzhan dag dang /_klu rab 'joms la sogs pa dag la 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ni yongs 
[\[143a.7\]]su dmas so/_/bdag cag gi phyogs ni 'phel te/_khyed dga' bar gyis shig ces bsgo'o/_/de ltar yang 'jig rten skyong ba de dag nyid yang sa'i 'og tu gtong bar byed de/_sa'i 'og tu song nas/_rab dgod dang thags [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ris la snga ma bzhin du bsnyad do/_/de thos 
[\[143b\]]
[\[143b.1\]]nas lha ma yin rnams rab tu dga' ste/_klu rab 'joms la sogs pa chos dang mi ldan zhing /_chos kyi rjes su mi 'jug pa rnams la bsnyad do/_/longs spyod ldan na gnas pa'i klu de rnams kyis thos nas kyang shin tu dga' ste/_de dag mi rnams la snga ma bzhin du bgegs 
[\[143b.2\]]byed do/_/de dag kyang 'phags skyes po la sogs pa 'jig rten skyong ba gzhan dag las/_de dag thams cad snga ma bzhin du thos nas/_lha'i rgyal po brgya byin sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang lhan cig shing rta sna tshogs kyi tshal du 'jug par byed do/_/de zhugs nas 
[\[143b.3\]]lha rnams bos te/_'di ltar 'jig rten skyong ba 'di dag na re/_'di ltar bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams rab tu mthu dang ldan te/_lha ma yin thags [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ris dang rab dgod la sogs pa dang /_klu rab 'joms la sogs pa mthu rab tu che'o zhes zer gyis/_de la lha khyed cag 
[\[143b.4\]]gis lha'i tshogs thams cad 'dir bsdu ba'i rigs so/_/'dus nas kyang bdag cag lha'i tshogs thams cad lha ma yin dang g.yul sprad pa'i phyir/_rin po ches brgyan pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa sna tshogs su 'dong ngo /_/de thos nas lha thams cad kyis de ltar 'tshal lo zhes 
[\[143b.5\]]smras nas/_rang gi gnas ga la ba der 'dong ngo /_/dong nas lha gzhan thams cad bsdus nas/_mdor bsdus te/_shing rta sna tshogs kyi tshal ga la ba der 'dong ngo /_/dong nas skyed mos tshal shing rta sna tshogs kyi gnas nyid du 'khod cing /_sil snyan sgra dbyangs sna tshogs 
[\[143b.6\]]dang glu dag len pa na/_shing rta sna tshogs kyis bkra ba rnams su dga' bar byed do/_/gang shing rta sna tshogs kyi tshal na rtag pa rtag pa nyid du 'khod pa'i lha de dag ni skyed mos tshal gar yang mi 'gro'o/_/de nas lha'i dbang po des lha de dag bsdus nas/_shing rta sna tshogs 
[\[143b.7\]]kyi tshal de nas dong ngo /_/shing rta sna tshogs kyi tshal na gnas pa'i lha de dag kyang ji srid du 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba byas shing /_bsags pa'i las zad par ma gyur pa de srid du de na dga' bar byed do/_/de zad nas lha'i ris de nas 'chi bar 'gyur te/_shi nas kyang nye 
[\[144a\]]
[\[144a.1\]]bar 'gro ba ji lta ba bzhin sems can dmyal ba dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_dud 'gro rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te mi rnams kyi nang du skyes na/_las de dang rgyu 'thun par de rtag tu bde bar 'gyur zhing /_na tshod thog ma nas 'chi ba'i bar du me 
[\[144a.2\]]tog gi phreng ba sdug gu thogs shing /_cha byad sna tshogs dang shing rta sna tshogs la dga' ba dang skye bo kun dga' bar 'gyur/_gal te de rab tu byung na de seng ge'i khri la 'dug nas chos dang gtam sna tshogs smra ba dang /_gtam sna tshogs kyis 'khor kyang kun nas shin tu dga' bar 
[\[144a.3\]]byed pa mthong ngo /_/de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas la rtog par byed de/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas dga' ba na gnas pa zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo /_/der 
[\[144a.4\]]sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/_skyes bu dam pa bsam pa dge bar gyur pa gang gis srog gcod par mi byed cing ma byin par len pa yang mi byed la/_byed du ma bcug_/pha rol byed pa yang bzlog_/
[\[144a.5\]]bdag nyid mi byed/_byed du mi 'jug_/byas na yang 'chags par byed cing skyon du 'grang bar byed la sdig pa'i grogs po de yongs su spong bar byed do/_/de la srog gcod pa dang bral ba ni gang yin/_rnam pa ni du yod cig gu snyam nas/_'di ni bya ne'u bzung ba thar bar byed cing 
[\[144a.6\]]sdom pa len du bcug nas bdag nyid mi byed la so sor 'chags par byed pa'am/_bya pas bya bzung ba nor rdzas kyis bslus te thar bar byed la/_gzhan yang de nyid la rab tu 'jog par byed/_rab tu dga' bar byed/_rab tu spro bar byed pa dang /_ma byin par len pa spangs 
[\[144a.7\]]pa ji lta bu yin/_ma byin par len pa spangs pa gang yin zhig gu snyam na/_'dir sdud pa por gyur nas grong rnams 'dzin tam/_tshong rdal lam/_grong rdal lam/_phyugs kyi lhas 'dzin pa'am/_rgyal pos 'di ltar lug dang ba lang dang bong bu la sogs pa sdus shig ces 
[\[144b\]]
[\[144b.1\]]bsgo ba las/_de yang sdom pa'i 'jigs pas skrag nas ma byin par len pa mi byed na/_de lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nang dga' ba'i tshal du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/las gzhan gyis kyang 'gyur te/_chos 'chad pa yang 
[\[144b.2\]]chos nyan pa po rnams dga' bar bya ba'i phyir tshes grangs dang /_yul dang /_dus dang ldan par byas la de dag kyang dga' bar byas te/_de dag yid rab tu dga' ba sems rtse gcig gis chos nyan na/_dam pa'i chos 'chad pa'i slob dpon de lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 
[\[144b.3\]]'jig rten dga' ba'i tshal du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/sbyin pa thams cad kyi nang na sbyin pa'i mchog 'di yin te/_'di lta ste/_chos kyi sbyin pa zhes bya'o/_/rgyu 'dis kyang lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nang na dga' ba'i tshal du skye bar 
[\[144b.4\]]'gyur ro/_/der skyes nas kyang de lha'i bde ba phun sum tshogs pa dpe med pa brgya phrag stong du ma myong ba na/_'di ltar gang du tshal de'i phyogs kyi cha ni 'di yin te/_dpag tshad sum stong yod la rin po che sna bdun gyi shing ljon pa rnams kyis nye bar mdzes par byas pa yin te/_der lha 
[\[144b.5\]]rnams rtag tu dga' bar byed cing /_gzhan gar yang mi 'gro ste/_de bas na lhan cig skyes pa'i yon tan gyis de dga' ba'i tshal zhes bya'o/_/de na shing ljon pa thams cad 'dod pa dag gang lha rnams kyi yid kyis yang dag par sems par byed pa de dag nyid lha de rnams kyis shing 
[\[144b.6\]]ljon pa las 'thon par 'gyur te/_'di ltar lha rnams kyi yid la bdag khyim zhig 'dod do snyam na/_de nas de ltar lha des yid la byas ma thag tu/_shing ljon pa de'i yal ga'i rtse mo las 'byung bar 'gyur te/_shing ljon pa de'i khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]rin po che sna bdun dang ldan zhing 
[\[144b.7\]]nye bar mdzes par byas pa/_ka ba stong yod pa'i khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/khang pa de'i ka ba so sor de'i phyogs phyogs bai DUr+ya las byas shing /_la la gser las byas/_la la shel las byas/_la la ke ke ru las byas/_la la spug las byas pa yin no/_/
[\[145a\]]
[\[145a.1\]]de nas khyim gyi mchog de shing ljon pa'i rtse mo de la yod pa mthong nas/_de 'di snyam du sems te/_da ni bdag lam 'jam zhing mthon dman du gyur pa nas/_khyim 'dir 'jug par bya'o snyam bsams ma thag nyid du shing ljon pa de nyid la lam mthong ste der 
[\[145a.2\]]'jug par byed do/_/de ltar lam de nyid nas zhugs pa dang /_de 'di snyam du sems te/_da ni bdag gi khyim 'dir khyim nang du pad ma'i rdzing zhig yod na rung ngo snyam mo/_/de sems bskyed ma thag nyid du pad ma'i rdzing rin po che sna bdun las byas pa/_bya ngang pa dang /_
[\[145a.3\]]kA raN+Da ba dang /_ngur pa sna tshogs kyis nye bar mdzes par byas pa 'byung ngo /_/de nas yang lha de 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gi sil snyan dang /_glu dbyangs yan lag lnga dang ldan pa 'byung bar gyur cig snyam mo/_/de sems bskyed ma thag nyid du gang rlung ngad 'jam 
[\[145a.4\]]pa rab tu ldang bar 'gyur te/_rnam pa ji srid du phan tshun reg pa na sgra 'byung ba'i rnam pa de srid du sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pa 'byung ngo /_/lha de 'di snyam du sems te/_shing ljon pa'i nang gi khang par da ni bza' ba dang /_btung ba chu bo ltar 'bab par gyur cig snyam 
[\[145a.5\]]mo/_/de sems bskyed ma thag nyid du shing ljon pa'i yal ga de dag rdol nas/_bza' ba chu bo snyed dang btung ba chu bo snyed kha dog dang /_ro dang /_reg pa phun sum tshogs pa byung ngo /_/de 'di snyam du sems te/_da ni bdag bdud rtsi bza' bar bya'o snyam mo/_/de sems 
[\[145a.6\]]bskyed ma thag nyid du bdud rtsi lha'i ro dang /_dri dang /_mdog phun sum tshogs pa 'byung ste/_de de la za bar byed do/_/de des shin tu tshim pa dang /_de nas yang lha mo de rnams dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/_yongs su spyod par byed de/_de ltar dga' ba'i tshal du lha dag 
[\[145a.7\]]shing gi drung du song ste bde ba nye bar spyod par byed do/_/de gal te yang shing ljon pa'i mchog de las 'bebs par byed de/_de sa'i steng du song nas sa de la 'chag par byed do/_/de 'chag pa na bai DUr+ya'i sdong bu dang ldan pa'i pad ma gser gyi 'dab ma mtho ris su 'os pa/_'jam 
[\[145b\]]
[\[145b.1\]]zhing 'phar ba kun nas mchog tu nyams dga' zhing /_shin tu dri zhim pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/_de dag la rkang pas 'gro zhing lha de 'chag par byed la/_lha'i sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i dbyangs len pa na/_de ltar lha de rkang pas 'chag pa'i bde ba nye bar 
[\[145b.2\]]myong ngo /_/de rnam par rtog pa 'bum snyed du ma dag 'grub cing bde ba myong ste/_dbang po lnga rnams kyi yul lnga rnams la myong bar byed do/_/dbang po kun rang gi yul gyis tshim pa med par 'gyur te/_'di lta ste/_mig gis gzugs gang mthong ba de dag zlos pa 
[\[145b.3\]]med par mthong la/_gang mthong ba de dag sna tshogs pa/_nyams dga' ba mig tu 'ong ba yin no/_/mig dang bas 'dod pa/_sdug pa/_yid du 'ong ba 'dzin cing mthong ste/_de ltar mig gzugs rnams kyis tshim pa med do/_/gang rna bas mnyan pa yang nyams 
[\[145b.4\]]dga' ba gzhan dang mi 'dra ba yin te/_rna ba yang sgra rnams kyis tshim pa med do/_/de ltar snas kyang dri snom par byed de/_gang snom pa de dag kyang 'dod pa/_sdug pa/_yid du 'ong ba rnams la snom ste sna yang dri rnams kyis tshim pa med do/_/de ltar lces kyang ro rnams 
[\[145b.5\]]myong bar byed de/_gang myang bar bya ba de dag kyang shin tu 'dod pa dag la myong bar byed cing yid du 'ong ba dag la myong bar byed do/_/de ltar lus kyis kyang reg bya la reg par byed de gang reg par bya ba de dag kyang 'dod pa/_sdug pa/_yid du 'ong ba dag la myong bar byed do/_/de 
[\[145b.6\]]ltar yid kyis gang bsam par bya ba de yang 'dod pa/_sdug pa/_yid du 'ong ba dag la sems par byed de/_de ltar sred pa'i tshogs drug la lus rnam par chags pa dag tshal de na dgod par byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' dgur spyod par byed/_rtse bar byed kyang 'dod pa rnams kyis 
[\[145b.7\]]tshim pa med do/_/de yul 'og ma dgon pa lta bu la dbang po mthon por byung ba'i rnam par rtog pa rlung lta bus bskyod pa'i dge ba med pa shin tu byung ba'i mes nyin gcig bzhin sreg kyang /_de sred pa'i 'dod pa rnams kyis tshim pa skyed par mi byed do/_/de ltar de dag dga' ba'i tshal na 
[\[146a\]]
[\[146a.1\]]rtse zhing yul du ma la dga' ba myong ba kun du rtse ste/_dga' ba myong ba na lha ma yin las rnam par rgyal ba/_lha'i rgyal po brgya byin yang snga ma bzhin du ri brtsegs pa sna tshogs ga la ba der 'gro bar byed do/_/der song nas kyang lha rnams bos te lha dag dga' ba'i tshal du dga' 
[\[146a.2\]]bar gyis shig_/lha'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga 'byor cing ldan par gyur pa rnams kyis rtses shig_/'di ltar bdag ni bdud kyi sde thags [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ris la sogs pa las rnam par rgyal te/_bdag dga' ba'i tshal du 'gro yis/_de ltar lha thams cad lha mo'i tshogs dang bdag cag rnams kyi dbyar zla 
[\[146a.3\]]ba bzhir gnas pa'i skyed mos tshal du dga' spyod bya ba ga la ba der dong la/_lha'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams kyis nges par dga' bar bya'o zhes bsgo'o/_/de nas lha'i rgyal po brgya byin gyis sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams la bsgo nas/_shin tu dga' ba chen po dang yang dag par ldan pa glang po che 
[\[146a.4\]]sa srung gi bu bos te/_'di ltar glang po che'i mchog chos shig_/nga skyed mos tshal du dga' spyod bya ba'i phyir dga' ba'i tshal na skyed mos tshal gyi dga' spyod ga la ba der 'gro ste/_lha dang lha mo'i tshogs dang bcas pas yongs su bskor la dga' ba'i tshal ga la ba der 'dong gis khyod kyis ji ltar 
[\[146a.5\]]sngon yang yongs su sprul pa byas pa de/_de ltar khyod kyi rgyab tu zhon pa dang /_mgo la zhon pa dang /_so la zhon pa dang /_rtsib logs la zhon pa dang /_gdeg pa dang /_tshal dang /_mtsho dang /_ri dang /_ri rtse dang /_tshal dang /_nye ba'i tshal dag sprul pa gyis shig ces bsgo'o/_/de nas brgya byin 
[\[146a.6\]]gyi tshig thos nas/_glang po che'i mchog sa srung gi bu bdag nyid chen por sprul te lus chen por byas so/_/de mgo brgyar sprul te mgo re re la so bcu bcu'o/_/so re re la pad ma'i rdzing bcu bcu'o/_/pad ma'i rdzing re re la pad ma stong stong ngo /_/pad ma stong stong la ni rin po che sna bdun gyi 
[\[146a.7\]]'dab ma yod do/_/'dab ma stong stong la rin po che sna bdun gyi bung ba yod cing /_'dab ma stong stong la lha rnams 'khod kyang lha mo'i tshogs dang phan tshun nyam nga ba med do/_/de dag glang po che mchog gi mgo la zhon pa/_lha'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga 'byor cing ldan par gyur pa rnams 
[\[146b\]]
[\[146b.1\]]dga' ba'i tshal ga la ba der nam mkha' las 'dong ngo /_/glang po che'i mchog gi rtsib logs la yang tshal gnyis sprul te/_tshal rab tu dga' ba zhes bya ba dang /_tshal gnyis pa 'dod bde zhes bya ba'o/_/tshal gnyis po de na shing ljon pa dang /_'bab chu dang /_lteng ka phun sum 
[\[146b.2\]]tshogs pa dang /_rin po che sna bdun gyi shing ljon pa phun sum tshogs pa dang /_dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pa phun sum tshogs pa yod do/_/tshal de na gnas pa'i lha rnams dga' zhing dga' dgur spyod la/_lha'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams kyis dga' ba na lha dang lha mo'i tshogs 
[\[146b.3\]]kyis gang ba/_glang po che'i rgyal po sa srung gi bu ri rab gnyis pa lta bu dga' ba'i tshal ga la ba der 'gro bar byed do/_/glang po che mchog gi rgyab tu yang grong khyer mnyam zhing 'jam pa'i ngos zhes bya ba blta na sdug gnyis pa lta bu sprul te/_srang dang /_bzhi mdo dang /_sum mdo dang /_
[\[146b.4\]]nye ba'i tshal dang /_shing ljon pa dang /_rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i khang pa rnams kyis nye bar mdzes par byas so/_/de'i dbus su khang pa sprul te rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i ka ba brgya yod pa'i ka ba rnams kyis nye bar mdzes par byas so/_/de'i dbus su mtsho 'byung ste der 
[\[146b.5\]]lha'i rgyal po lha mo'i tshogs rnams dang lhan cig rtse bar byed cing /_sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pas lha'i rgyal po brgya byin dga' bar byed la/_dga' dgur spyod bzhin du dga' ba'i tshal ga la ba der 'gro bar byed do/_/de 'gro ba na yang 'gyur ba med de/_ji ltar ri 
[\[146b.6\]]rab la gnas pa 'gyur bar mi mngon pa de ltar glang po che'i mchog 'gro yang mi mngon no/_/de nas yang glang po che'i rna ba la pad ma'i rdzing gnyis sprul te/_rgyar dpag tshad bcu gcig go/_/gnyis pa yang dpag tshad bcu yod do/_/gcig ni zab pa zhes bya'o/_/gnyis 
[\[146b.7\]]pa ni dang ba zhes bya ste/_chu yon tan yan lag brgyad dang ldan pas shin tu gang ba yin no/_/de na ud pa la bai DUr+ya'i 'dab ma dang /_rin po che'i sdong bu dag skyes la/_kha cig ni pad ma rA ga'i mdog lta bu la bung bas nye bar mdzes par byas shing /_me tog rgyas 
[\[147a\]]
[\[147a.1\]]la lha'i dri phun sum tshogs pa yin te/_ud pa la de dag gi nang gi ze ba'i stan la lha dang lha mo gang dag lhan cig 'khod de dga' bar byed la/_lha kha cig ni chus rtse zhing pad mas rtse bar byed kyang /_lha rnams kyis ci glang po che'i mchog 'di 'gro'am mi 
[\[147a.2\]]'gro mi rig go/_/glang po che mchog gi lag pa'i steng du rdzing ring po sprul te srid du dpag tshad lnga yod pa/_khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]yang tog can gyis yongs su bskor la lha'i shing ljon pa dang ldan pa/_me tog sna tshogs kyis khebs pa/_me tog man dA ra bas khebs pa/_bung ba sgra di ri 
[\[147a.3\]]ri 'byin pa dang ldan pa/_lha'i tsan dan gor shir Sha'i 'dab mas nye bar mdzes par byas pa/_gser gyi shing ljon pa dang me tog rnam pa sna tshogs gzhan rnams kyis shin tu khebs pa yin te/_me tog de rnams kyi nang na 'khod pa'i lha mo me tog gi ze ba'i steng na 'dug pa dag 
[\[147a.4\]]rol mo byed cing de dag glu dbyangs len la/_lha'i rgyal po de la yang tshig dge ba rnams kyis stod par byed de/_de ltar glang po che mchog gi lag pa'i steng du yang rdzing ring po sprul to/_/de nas yang glang po che'i rgyal po'i sna'i thor to la rdzing chen po rgyar dpag tshad tsam yod pa sprul te/_
[\[147a.5\]]pad ma rgya che ba 'bum phrag du ma dri shin tu zhim pa yin la gang lha'i dri de dpag tshad bcur ldang ngo /_/pad ma chen po 'dab mas nye bar mdzes par byas pa'i 'dab ma re re la lha dang lha mo'i tshogs rnams nye bar glu dbyangs len cing rtse bar byed/_dga' dgur spyod par byed kyang lha rnams rtse zhing 
[\[147a.6\]]yongs su spyod pa phan tshun mi mthong la de bzhin du gnod pa dang bral ba yin no/_/de ltar yang sna'i thor to la gnas pa/_sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha de rnams dga' ba'i tshal ga la ba der 'dong bar byed de/_de ltar ri rab kyi steng du 'gro yang glang po che'i mchog 'gyur bar lha rnams 
[\[147a.7\]]kyis mi rig go/_/de nas yang glang po che'i mchog gi sna la ri chen po 'byung khungs kyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba sprul te/_ri de nyid la 'byung khungs sna tshogs kyis brgyan cing /_lha'i shing ljon pas nye bar mdzes par byas pa/_'bab chu dang /_lteng ka dang /_nye ba'i tshal dang /_
[\[147b\]]
[\[147b.1\]]mtsho dang /_pad ma'i rdzing gis brgyan par lha gzhan dag kyang rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dgod par byed de/_glang po che'i mchog me tog gis bkra ba de'i mgo la yang ri sprul to/_/de nas yang glang po che mchog gi so'i thor to zla ba tshes pa lta bu la nye ba'i tshal dag sprul 
[\[147b.2\]]te/_me tog dang mtshos sa gzhi rtag tu gang ba'i thang lta bur bkra bar byas shing 'dab mas kyang nye bar mdzes par byas/_bung ba lang long 'khrigs pa dang /_khu byug gi sgra di ri ri 'byin pa dang /_skam la rgyu ba rin po che sna bdun gyi rma bya dang shang shang te'u shin tu yid du 'ong ba du ma 
[\[147b.3\]]dang /_gzhan yang lha'i bya rnams kyis so la sprul pa nye bar mdzes par byas so/_/glang po che'i mchog lus chen por gyur nas dga' ba'i tshal ga la ba der 'gro bar byed de/_lha'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing ngal ba med la stobs dang ldan pa 'gros mdzes pas rab tu 'gro'o/_/
[\[147b.4\]]de nas yang glang po che'i mchog de'i sna gnyis kyi nang nas sna chu'i rgyun 'dzag ste/_'di lta ste/_'dzam bu'i gling na mtsho gang gA dang ya mu na'i chu 'bab pa/_shin tu dang zhing rnyog pa med pa bsil ba rab tu 'bab pa bzhin no/_/de bzhin du cung zad dper bya na ji ltar mi'i gnas bzhi 
[\[147b.5\]]dag na sman dang /_rtswa dang /_nags khrod dang /_nas dang /_gro tsha bas gdungs shing skams pa rnams de nas yang sos par bya ba'i phyir/_'bru dang lo ma rnams kyi steng na chu 'bab pa mngon pa de ltar glang po che'i rgyal po de'i rab tu dbye ba yang rtag tu de lta bu yin no/_/gal te chu 'bab 
[\[147b.6\]]pa de rlung gis nam mkha' la 'thor bar byed cing /_rlung gis rgyang ring du skams par byed pa de ni zil pa 'di yin te mi'i gnas gsum na snang ngo /_/de nas yang glang po che'i rgyal po'i mchog de'i sna sgra 'bud pas 'byung ba de ni nam mkha'i dbus na lha rgyu ba rnams kyi nang du 'bab pa/_'od 
[\[147b.7\]]dkar por rgyu ba mngon pa 'di yin te/_gang mu stegs pa gzhan dag na re 'di ltar 'di ni dbang po'i lam mo zhes rjod do/_/yang gzhan dag na re 'di ltar 'di ni glang po che sa srung gi bu'i lam yin no zhes brjod kyang de ltar chu dkar po'i ngo bo nyid de mi shes so//_//_
[\[148a\]]
[\[148a.1\]]'phags pa dam pa'i chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa/_bam po sum cu gsum pa/_de dag rlung gis gtor ba dang 'phral la 'bab cing de nyid [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]skom pa lta bur mthong la/_ngo bo gzhan du 'gyur te ngo bo dag ni mi gsal ba'i ngo bor snang ngo /_/
[\[148a.2\]]de nas yang glang po che'i rgyal po'i mchog de'i spyi bo la ri yod pa gang yin pa de'i spyi bo thams cad la rgyal mtshan gyi mchog bai DUr+ya'i gdub kor dang /_gser gyi gdugs sprul te/_ji ltar nyi ma gnyis pa lta bur de de ltar rnam par mdzes so/_/glang po che'i mchog de'i steng na 
[\[148a.3\]]ba dan yang sprul te ring khyad dpag tshad tsam mo/_/ba dan de kun nas 'od dkar po 'byung ste/_gang mthong nas lha ma yin rgya mtsho na gnas pa rnams phan tshun du 'di ltar 'di ni lha rnams 'ongs pa yin te/_lha'i rgyal po brgya byin gyi ba dan rgyal byed ces bya ba snang ngo zhes zer 
[\[148a.4\]]ro/_/de nas glang po che'i rgyal po'i mchog de dga' ba'i tshal ga la ba der 'gro bar byed do/_/tshal de rgyang ring po nyid nas mthong nas lha rnams la smras pa/_khyed cag thams cad du nyams dga' ba chen po de nyid la ltos/_tshal chen po kun nas mthong na dga' ba gang 
[\[148a.5\]]du lha 'di dag lha ma yin las rgyal ba thob pa/_sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang lhan cig tu zla ba bzhir dga' bar gyis shig_/de nas lha dag gis tshig de thos nas lha de dag gis smras pa/_ji ltar bdag cag la brgya byin gyis bka' stsal pa de ltar bdag cag rnams kyis 
[\[148a.6\]]bsgrub par bgyi'o/_/de skad ces smras nas brgya byin gyi glang po che sa srung gi bu dga' ba'i tshal du nye bar phyin no/_/de nas gang lha gzhan dga' ba'i tshal de na rtsed mo byed pa de dag dga' bar byed cing yongs su spyod par byed la/_lha'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga 'byor cing ldan par gyur pa 
[\[148a.7\]]de dag thams cad rgyal mtshan gyi mchog dang glang po che'i rgyal po sa srung gi bu nye bar mthong nas/_dga' ba'i tshal gyi ri la rtse zhing gnas pa'i lha rnams yid rab tu dga' zhing /_lha'i rgyal po brgya byin ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas lha'i rgyal po la mgor thal mo sbyar te mchod nas/_
[\[148b\]]
[\[148b.1\]]brgya byin gyi mdun du sil snyan dang sgra dbyangs dang rol mo sna tshogs kyi dga' ba dang brgya byin gyi mdun na bro gar dag byed bzhin du dga' ba'i tshal chen po de ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do/_/lha'i rgyal po brgya byin yang glang po che sa srung gi bu las babs nas/_lha'i tshogs dang lhan 
[\[148b.2\]]cig tu dga' ba'i tshal ga la ba der 'jug go/_/steng du zhon pa'i lha kun dang de bzhin du mgo la zhon pa dang de bzhin du so la zhon pa dang de bzhin du rtsib logs la zhon pa de dag thams cad glang po che sa srung gi bu las babs nas/_dga' ba'i tshal ga la ba der rtse ba dang dga' ba dang 
[\[148b.3\]]bde bar gnas par bya ba'i phyir dong ngo /_/de nas gang dga' ba'i tshal chen po na snga na 'khod pa'i lha de dag dang gang brgya byin dang lhan cig lha ma yin gyi g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba thob pa de dag thams cad 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga 'byor cing ldan par gyur pa rnams/_dbyar zla ba bzhir 
[\[148b.4\]]bde ba dpe med pa de rjes su myong ngo /_/lha'i rgyal po brgya byin yang lha dang lha mo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor/_de dag kyang lha dang lha mo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor nas/_dga' bar byed dga' dgur spyod par byed do/_/bde ba dpe med pa de rjes su myong ba na/_skabs der 
[\[148b.5\]]ji srid du las byas shing bsags pa de zad par ma gyur pa de srid du de na dga' bar byed do/_/las dang tshe zad pa'i lha gang yin pa de dag phyis lha'i 'jig rten dga' ba'i tshal de nas 'chi bar 'gyur te/_shi nas kyang las nye bar 'gro ba ji lta ba bzhin sems can dmyal ba dang [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]
[\[148b.6\]]dang dud 'gro rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mi'i nang du skyes na/_las de dang rgyu 'thun par rtag tu bde bar 'gyur zhing /_sgyu rtsal gyi blo dri ma med pa dang gzugs mchog tu mdzes pa dang skye bo thams cad kyi yid du shin tu 'thad pa dang tshal 
[\[148b.7\]]dang 'bab chu dang ri dang lteng ka dang nye ba'i tshal yod pa dga' ba rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur la/_der yang skye bo mang po dga' ba dang dbang che ba dang shin tu 'byor ba dang bde bar 'gyur ba mthong ngo /_/de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de/_glang po 
[\[149a\]]
[\[149a.1\]]che'i rgyal po chen po sa srung gi bu'i las dang 'bras bu rnam par smin pa la rtog par byed de/_'di ltar de las kyi rnam pa gang gis rdzu 'phrul che ba dang mthu che bar gyur nas/_lha chen po lha ma yin gyi g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba thob cing las gang dang rnam pa ji lta 
[\[149a.2\]]bu zhig gis dud 'gror skyes snyam nas/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/_'di ltar 'di ni sngon sems can tshe lo bdun khri thub pa na bram ze chen po rig byed dang rig byed kyi yan lag dang sngon byung ba dang sngon gyi rabs shes pa zhig byung ste/_des sbyin pa byin bsod nams byas 
[\[149a.3\]]dman pa dang mgon med pa dang long ba dang sdug bsngal ba rnams la rtag res 'khor yang byas/_sems shin tu dge zhing 'jig rten kun la phan par byed pa yin no/_/de'i tshe rgyal po legs mthong zhes bya ba de'i dga' spyod chen po shin tu nyams dga' ba ji ltar lha rnams dang ji ltar de bzhin 
[\[149a.4\]]gshegs pa'i lta bu byed de/_glang po che brgyad khri bzhi stong gser gyi dra bas g.yogs shing dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba btags pa/_kun nas gser gyi dra bas brgyan pa dang rta brgyad khri bzhi stong kun nas gser gyi dril bu g.yer ka'i sgra 'byung bas brgyan pa dang /_de bzhin du bud med brgyad 
[\[149a.5\]]khri bzhi stong gis yongs su bskor cing rjes su 'brang ba dang /_de bzhin du sil snyan brgyad khri bzhi stong dag gis yongs su bskor te/_nye ba'i tshal gyi phreng ba zhes bya ba gzhal med khang ga la ba der dong bar byed do/_/rgyal po legs mthong gi mchog tu bde ba shin tu rgya che ba'i 'byor 
[\[149a.6\]]pa de dag la bram ze des kun nas mngon par brtags nas/_bram ze'i 'byor pa shin tu phun sum tshogs pas kyang rgyal po chen po de'i dga' spyod byed pa ga la ba der song ngo /_/bram ze de'i ming ni skye bo kun snyoms zhes bya'o/_/de nas bram ze skye bo kun snyoms rgyal po de dang de'i 'byor pa 
[\[149a.7\]]dang ldan pa dang /_rgyal po de'i rtag tu bzhon pa glang po che sprin brtsegs zhes bya ba yod de/_de'i lus de kun nas dril bu g.yer ka'i dra bas brgyan pa mu tig gi phreng ba rnams btags pa/_kun nas bzo mkhas pas rgyan byas pa/_rnam pa sna tshogs kyis nye bar mdzes par byas 
[\[149b\]]
[\[149b.1\]]pa/_sil snyan gyi sgra rnam pa sna tshogs nye bar 'byin pa na/_skyed mos tshal du 'gro ba'i glang po che shin tu rgya che ba mchog tu blta na sdug pa/_rab tu bde ba mthong ba dang bram ze skye bo kun snyoms de/_kye e ma glang po che 'di ni mchog tu bde ba dang ldan pa yin te/_lha de bzhin 
[\[149b.2\]]du bdag kyang da ni lha'i rgyal po brgya byin gyi rtag tu bzhon pa'i glang po che'i rgyal por gyur cig snyam du sems skyes so/_/de sbyin pa de'i mthu dang de'i las kyi mthus lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i ris su lha'i rgyal po brgya byin gyi rtag tu 
[\[149b.3\]]bzhon pa glang po che'i rgyal por skyes so/_/de nas de'i tshe dge slong des 'di ltar tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_las 'di ri mo mkhan lta bu/_/gang dang gang du 'dri byed pa/_/sems kyi dbang phyug chen po yis/_/de dang der ni 'di 'dri byed/_/yongs su 'gyur ba'i bye brag gis/_
[\[149b.4\]]gang dang gang du sbyor byed pa/_/khams gsum 'khor bar rgyu ba rnams/_/de dang der ni sems kyis gtong /_/lus can rnams kyi las kun ni/_/sems la rag las 'jug par 'gyur/_/de ltar rtag tu sems dul ba/_/'chi med gnas su khrid par 'gyur/_/bsnyen 
[\[149b.5\]]par dka' zhing yang ba dang /_/gang yang rung bar ltung ba yi/_/sems ni dul na legs pa yin/_/sems dul bde ba thob par 'gyur/_/gang gis rtag tu sems dul ba/_/de yis rtag tu nyes pa bcom/_/nyes pa bcom pa'i brtan po la/_/sdug bsngal nyid kyis gnod mi 
[\[149b.6\]]'gyur/_/gang zhig 'dir ni sdug bsngal zhing /_/gang zhig gzhan du sdug bsngal ba/_/de dag thams cad mi bzad pa'i/_/sems 'di yang zhing g.yos pa yis/_/lha dang lha min sha za klu/_/lto 'phye srin por bcas pa yi/_/gtso bo mchog gcig sems yin te/_/
[\[149b.7\]]de ni srid gsum rgyal po bzhin/_/sems ni lha yi yul rnams dang /_/sems ni mi yul rnams su khrid/_/sems ni ngan 'gro rnams su khrid/_/sems kyis skye dgu 'khyam par byed/_/phan pa med pa'i yul rnams kyis/_/'khrul zhing nyams par gyur pa'i sems/_/
[\[150a\]]
[\[150a.1\]]sred pa yis ni bdes pa na/_/sdug bsngal mtha' med pa la gnas/_/spyod pa gcig la rtag tu sbas/_/bsnyen par dka' la stobs po che/_/nyams par byed la mi mngon pa/_/de ni mi brtan myur du 'gro/_/de 'dra'i sems ni gang yin pa/_/mkhas pa 
[\[150a.2\]]rnams ni 'dul bar byed/_/de dag bdud kyis bcings las 'das/_/pha rol bde ba 'byung ba thob/_/rnam rtog mi bzad g.yon can te/_/de ni gting dpag dka' zhing g.yo/_/de lta bu la rten pa'i sems/_/dmyal ba'i g.yang sar nye bar ltung /_/nyes pa de dag las grol zhing /_/
[\[150a.3\]]dbang po don gyi dbang mi 'gro/_/sdig pa'i chos kyis ma gos pa/_/'chi med gnas su khrid par 'gyur/_/sems ni rgyu dang rkyen las skyes/_/de ni rnal 'byor mchog la 'jug_/myur du gyur pa'i dbang gis su/_/de bzhin de ni shin tu 'jug_/de ltar las ni byed pa yis/_/'bras bu 
[\[150a.4\]]de ni sna tshogs 'byung /_/gcig tu phra mo gcig spyad pa/_/skad cig gnyis par mi 'dug ste/_/de yi lus dang 'gro ba ni/_/'jig rten mtha' ni gang du khrid/_/lam ni gang nas 'gro 'gyur ba/_/thams cad du ni shes par dka'/_/gang du lus ni 'gro ba dang /_/'dug pa dang ni las 
[\[150a.5\]]byed pa/_/de yi las ni mthong 'gyur na/_/rnal 'byor de ni mi mthong ngo /_/de ni gdul bar dka' ba ste/_/de yi lus kyang mi rig go/_/sems can kun gyi rtog mi bzad/_/yang bar spyod la mig kyang med/_/sdig dang sdig mi byed pa mthong /_/de ni sgyu ma lta bu yin/_/de yi rtog pa mi 
[\[150a.6\]]rig cing /_/'gro ba med pa mi mthong ngo /_/tshe rabs dag ni brgya snyed du/_/skye bo thams cad khrid byed pa/_/'di ni mtshon gyis mi chod cing /_/me yis sreg par mi byed do/_/skye bo mig med thams cad ni/_/gcod par byed cing sreg par byed/_/las kyi thag pa dam po yis/_/skye 
[\[150a.7\]]bo bcings pa sdug bsngal che/_/tshe rabs dag ni stong snyed du/_/khrid par byed kyang mi mthong ngo /_/skad cig tu ni dge byed cing /_/skad cig tu ni mi dge byed/_/dge dang mi dge byed pa yi/_/sems dul ba ni bde bar 'gyur/_/sgo drug nas ni byung ba yis/_/yul rnams la ni rab tu 
[\[150b\]]
[\[150b.1\]]brkam/_/'jig rten mthar ni sems khrid pa/_/nyon mongs pa yang mi rig go/_/de ltar dge slong des legs par byas pa chen po de chung ngur bsgyur ba mthong nas/_yid la legs par byas zhes bya ba'i las gang gis phal lam lha gzhan du 'gyur ba zhig na/_'di ltar de sems gtso 
[\[150b.2\]]bo'i dbang dang /_sems yongs su 'gyur ba'i dbang gis dud 'gror grub pa lta zhes brjod do/_/de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de/_sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas la rtog par byed de/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas sa rnam mdzes na zhes 
[\[150b.3\]]bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo /_/der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/_gang bdag nyid tshul khrims bsrungs shing /_gzhan yang bsrung du bcug_/bdag nyid sdig pa mi byed cing /_gzhan yang zlog par byed/_
[\[150b.4\]]skyon du 'grang bar byed la/_tshul khrims la yang rab tu bkod/_de bdag nyid kyang tshul khrims dri ma med pa brtan pa dang /_nyer bsdogs yongs su dag pa srung bar byed pa dang /_srog gcod pa dang /_ma byin par len pa spangs pa yin te/_srog gcod pa rnam pa du spangs zhe na/_'dir sdom 
[\[150b.5\]]pas bsdams pas sems can mang po dang /_grog sbur mang po dang /_sdig pa mang po dang /_sbal pa mang po dang /_srog chags gnas na gnas pa mang po dang /_ne'u le mang po gnas pa'i sa brkos pa gang gis/_sems can gnod par 'gyur ba rko bar mi byed la/_gzhan sdom pa blangs 
[\[150b.6\]]pa'am/_sdom pa ma blangs pa yang phyir zlog par byed skyon du 'grang bar byed 'gog par byed/_'chags su 'jug par byed pa'o/_/ma byin par len pa spangs pa'i tshul khrims ji ltar 'dzin ce na/_'di la rdza mkhan nam gzhan gyis yongs su bzung ba la rku sems kyis cung zad tsam yang mi 
[\[150b.7\]]len la/_gzhan len na yang phyir zlog par byed cing /_tshul khrims la rab tu 'jog par byed la rjes su yi rang bar mi byed pa yin te/_de ltar srog gcod pa dang /_ma byin par len pa rnam par spangs pa'i skyes bu dam pa tshul khrims spyod pa de/_lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 
[\[151a\]]
[\[151a.1\]]'jig rten rnam par mdzes na gnas pa'i gnas su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/rtag tu dga' zhing glu dbyangs dang /_bgad pa dang /_rtses pa dang /_rab tu rtses pa dang /_dga' dgur spyod pa skye bo rang gi 'od dang ldan pas rtag tu gang ba'i tshal dang nye ba'i tshal dang skyed mos 
[\[151a.2\]]tshal gyi gnas rnams su skye bar 'gyur te/_tshul khrims bzang po bsrung ba mtho ris kyi gnas su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/las bya ba legs par byas pa de'i yul shin tu nyams dga' zhing longs spyod dang ldan pa'i 'byor pa'i 'di yin te 'di lta ste/_tshal de kun nas gser gyi dra ba'i skud pas 
[\[151a.3\]]nye bar sbrel zhing dril bu g.yer ka'i sgra si li li 'byung ngo /_/de la dril bu g.yer ka'i rnam pa ni 'di dag yin te 'di lta ste/_gang las kyis byas pa'i bai DUr+ya'i dril bu g.yer ka rgyang ring po nyid nas mthong nas/_'di ltar las bya ba legs par byas pa zhi ba khyod byon pa lta zhes smra zhing /_'di ltar tshigs 
[\[151a.4\]]su bcad de smras pa/_yid ni shin tu dang ba yis/_/tshul khrims dag ni gang bsrungs pa/_/de ni tshul khrims bsrungs pa yi/_/bde ba 'dir ni nye bar gnas/_/tshul khrims legs par bsrungs pa dang /_/goms pa du ma byas pa yi/_/yongs su 'gyur ba bde ba dang /_/mya ngan 'das 
[\[151a.5\]]pa'ang rtogs par 'gyur/_/tshul khrims ngan 'gro rnams las skyob/_/tshul khrims bzang 'gror khrid par byed/_/de ltar tshul khrims rtag tu srungs/_/yongs su 'gyur ba'i bsil ba yin/_/'chi dus yang dag 'byung ba'i tshe/_/tshul ldan ga las 'jigs pa med/_/ngan 'gro 
[\[151a.6\]]las skyob bdag las med/_/tshul khrims skyob pa mchog yin no/_/de ni khyod de tshul chen gyis/_/thams cad du ni bsrungs pa yin/_/lha yi gnas su 'ongs pa dag_/shin tu bag med ma byed cig_/de ltar lha de legs par byas pa'i las kyis dril bu g.yer ka'i sgra des bag 
[\[151a.7\]]med pa'i nyes pa rnams khong du chud par byed do/_/de nas gang lha yun ring bar tshul khrims bsrungs pa de/_legs par khong du chud nas/_skad cig tsam du yang shin tu bag med pa mi byed do/_/gang gis tshe rabs mang po shin tu goms pa med pa de ni de'i tshe/_sgra rnam par 'byin 
[\[151b\]]
[\[151b.1\]]pa yi khong du mi chud par 'gyur la/_de ltar de phyir zhing shin tu bag med par 'gyur ba zhig na/_de ltar de yang dag par khong du chud nas/_de nas yang gzhan du 'gro bar byed de/_tshal dang nye ba'i tshal rin po che sna bdun gyis nye bar mdzes par byas pa'i gnas rnams ga la ba der 'gro bar 
[\[151b.2\]]byed do/_/rnam mdzes kyi tshal de yang kun nas dpag tshad sum stong yod pa sa bzhi po 'di dag ste tshal chen po'i sa gzhi dang grong khyer chen po blta na sdug pa zhes bya ba thams cad che ba yin la/_sa lhag ma gzhan dag ni chung ba yin no/_/tshal de yang kun nas gru bzhi pa yin te/_
[\[151b.3\]]tshal de'i ngos bzhi la bai DUr+ya shin tu dri ma med pa'i dpag bsam gyi shing chen po bzhi yod de shing de dag gi 'od rgyar kun nas dpag tshad tsam la/_ring du yang dpag tshad lnga stong du 'byung ste/_shing de dag gi 'od nyi ma bzhin du snang ngo /_/shing de dag gi yal ga dang lo ma rnams la lha 
[\[151b.4\]]dang lha mo'i tshogs lhan cig rtse bar byed cing yid la gang dang gang 'dod pa de de dag las 'thob bo/_/shing de dag gi dbus na/_rnam mdzes kyi tshal de kun nas gser dang dngul dang bai DUr+ya'i pad ma'i rdzing rnams kyis nye bar mdzes par byas/_gser btso ma dri ma med pa'i shing ljon pa 
[\[151b.5\]]rnams kyis nye bar mdzes par byas/_kun nas zhing ma rmos pa chen po shin tu dri ma med cing shin tu gtsang ba dang shin tu ro zhim pa dang brtson 'grus chen pos nye bar mdzes par byas/_bya dkar po dri ma med pa lta bu mthong na yid du 'thad pa thos na nyams dga' ba sgra 'byin pa 
[\[151b.6\]]rnams kyis nye bar mdzes par byas so/_/tshal de na gang bya dngul gyi sgro yod pa de dag gi mgo gser la/_lto ba bai DUr+ya/_mchu ke ke ru/_mig pad ma rA ga'i mdog lta bu yin te/_de ltar bya thams cad kyi kha dog rnam par dbye'o/_/gang shing rnams kyi kha dog dngul lta bu de dag 
[\[151b.7\]]gi steng na gser gyi bya rnams gnas/_gang gser gyi shing ljon pa de dag la dngul gyi bya rnams gnas/_gang bai DUr+ya'i shing ljon pa de dag gi yal ga'i gsab gseb na bya pad ma rA ga'i mdog lta bu gnas/_gang shing ljon pa pad ma rA ga'i mdog lta bu de dag la bya mthon ka'i kha 
[\[152a\]]
[\[152a.1\]]dog lta bu rgyu ste/_'bras bu thams cad la za zhing sbrang rtsi dag la yang 'thung ngo /_/gang kun nas rin po che sna bdun gyi shing ljon pa rnams la rin po che sna bdun gyi sgro bkra ba'i bya de dag kyang rtse bar byed/_skad 'byin par byed do/_/de ltar bung ba'i tshogs kyang 
[\[152a.2\]]pad ma mang po rnams kyi nang na/_las sna tshogs byas pa/_lus bkra ba/_dus kyi bsam pa sna tshogs yod pa/_pad ma'i gseb tu zhugs shing ze ba'i gsab gseb na gnas pa rnams dga' bar byed phan tshun rtse bar byed/_yongs su spyod par byed do/_/de ltar shing 
[\[152a.3\]]ljon pa'i rnam pa de lta bu'i grib ma yon tan kun 'byor pa'i steng na/_lha rnams lha mo'i tshogs dang lhan cig tu dga' bar byed/_yongs su spyod par byed do/_/tshal de yang lha thams cad kyi yon tan kun shin tu phun sum tshogs pa yin te/_gang gi tshe lha rnams lha ma yin rnams 
[\[152a.4\]]dang g.yul 'gyed par 'gyur ba de'i tshe/_lha'i rgyal po brgya byin lha rnams la 'di ltar lha rnams sta gon gyis shig_/ri bo zla ba la gnas pa'i lha ma yin 'di dag lha rnams la mngon par gnod pa byed kyis chos shig ces bsgo'o/_/de thos nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams rnam 
[\[152a.5\]]mdzes kyi tshal ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/_lha'i tshogs thams cad dang brgya byin gyi mdun du 'gro ba dag rnam mdzes kyi tshul du 'jug go de rnams zhugs nas kyang phyogs bzhi dag gi phyogs bzhi ga la ba de rnams na/_lha'i bai DUr+ya'i shing ljon pa chen po shin tu dri ma med pa bzhi yod pa de dag gi 
[\[152a.6\]]sdong po gang yin pa de dag la me long bzhin du lha rnams kyi lus mngon no/_/de dag rnam par rgyal ba'i mtshan ma mthong ba dang yang lha gang dag lha dang lha ma yin gyi g.yul 'gyed pa na yan lag dang 'bral ba'am chad par 'gyur ba rang gis spyod pa/_gzugs brnyan gang 'byung ba shing de 
[\[152a.7\]]rnams kyi nang na snang ste/_gang lha yan lag chad par 'gyur ba de dag de nyid du yang phyir skye bar 'gyur la gang de'i mgo gcod pa'am rked pa gcod pa ni ma gtogs te/_de ltar lha de dag phyir skye bar mi 'gyur ro/_/ji ltar lha mgo gcod pa'am rked pa gcod par 'gyur ba de bzhin bdag 
[\[152b\]]
[\[152b.1\]]nyid kyis mthong bar 'gyur te/_de la bdag nyid de mthong nas lha de dag la bsnyad do/_/lha de rnams de 'chi ba'i dus yongs su spang ba'i don du brgya byin la 'di ltar lha 'di dag ni lha ma yin rnams dang /_g.yul 'gyed pa'i tshe 'gum par 'gyur ro zhes bsnyad do/_/de thos nas 
[\[152b.2\]]brgya byin gyis/_grogs po khyod g.yul 'gyed par ma 'gro shig_/khyod kyi tshe'i bar chad du ma gyur cig ces zlog par byed do/_/'bras bu de gang gi yin zhig gu snyam du dge slong de sems par byed de/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/_sems dang yid snying 
[\[152b.3\]]rje dang ldan par 'gyur ba gang gis shen pas gsad par bshams pa las thar bar byas pa'i las kyi rnam par smin pa des rnam mdzes su shing ljon pa'i rnam pa de lta bu skye ste/_me long lta bur gyur pa de la gzugs brnyan snang ngo /_/de nas yang lha rnams rnam mdzes kyi tshal ga la ba der 
[\[152b.4\]]'dong ngo /_/dong nas kyang rnam mdzes kyi tshal de'i dbus na tshal yod de/_de yang 'dod pa thams cad kyi shing ljon pa rnams kyis nye bar mdzes par byas pa yin la der zhugs nas lha rnams gros byed do/_/'di ltar lha dang lha ma yin rnams kyi dpung che chung la sems par byed de/_
[\[152b.5\]]lha ma yin rnams dpung gang dang ldan zhing /_lha rnams dpung gang dang ldan zhig ces lha de rnams phan tshun dpyod par byed do/_/de nas lha'i rgyal po brgya byin gyis lha rnams la smras pa/_chos la rten pa dag ni chos kyis lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur te/_gang gi tshe 'dzam 
[\[152b.6\]]bu'i gling na gnas pa'i mi rnams rtsod pa'i dus su dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gtsor 'dzin cing /_dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par blangs te spyod pa dang pha rol yang spyod du 'jug pa dang lus dang ngag gi tshul khrims rnam pa bdun yang ma ral ba dang ma zhig pa dang ma nyams 
[\[152b.7\]]pa dang brtan zhing tshul 'chos pa med par bsrungs pa de'i tshe/_'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams 'chi ba'i dus byas nas lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur te/_ji ltar sgro ba bye mas bkang ba kha thur du bstan pa'i bye ma'i shugs 'bab pa bzhin du de ltar mi dag lha rnams kyi nang du skye 
[\[153a\]]
[\[153a.1\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/de ltar lha'i dpung mngon par 'phel la/_lha ma yin gyi dpung yongs su 'grib ste/_lha ma yin gyi brtson 'grus zhan par 'gyur ba de'i tshe/_ri bo zla ba la gnas pa'i lha ma yin gyi dpung /_lha rnams kyis zlog pa nyid du byed do/_/de nas 
[\[153a.2\]]dus gzhan du las kyi lam dri ma can spyod pa'i mi rnams dge ba'i las kyi lam ral ba dang zhig pa dang nyams pa dang brtan por mi spyod pa de'i tshe/_'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams 'chi ba'i dus byas nas/_lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur te 'di lta ste/_shing ljon pa a mra rab tu smin pa 
[\[153a.3\]]dag la skyes bu stobs dang ldan pas shin tu sgul bar byed do/_/de shin tu bsgul ba na ji ltar a mra lhung ba de ltar mi dag lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas yang dus dmas pa na/_dge ba shin tu dri ma can spyod pa'i mi 'byung ba rnams lus dang ngag gi tshul khrims mi srung zhing shin 
[\[153a.4\]]tu brtan por mi spyod/_/shin tu dkar ba ma yin/_rtag par ma yin pa de dag 'chi ba'i dus byas nas lha shin tu dman pa rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur te 'di lta ste/_shing ljon pa bil ba sbom po brtan pa 'bras bu ma smin par gyur pa la mi stobs chung ngu'i 'dom gyis 'khyud nas shin tu 
[\[153a.5\]]sgul bar byed pa de tshegs chen pos shin tu sgul bar byed do/_/gang sgul bar byed pa de dag kyang shin tu zhan pa yin te/_de bsgul ba na bil ba'i 'bras bu gang zhig 'bab pa na smin pa nyung zad cig 'bab par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/_da ltar gyi mi tshul khrims dri ma can de lha rnams kyi nang du 
[\[153a.6\]]skye bar 'gyur ro/_/lha khyed cag kyang shin tu bag med pa la gnas la/_shin tu bag med pa la gnas pa de ni bag med pas chog ste/_lha ma yin gyi dpung ni 'phel lo/_/lha'i dpung ni 'grib bo/_/de ltar chos ma yin pa spyod pa'i mi rnams chos ma yin pa'i tshul dang /_lus dang ngag gi 
[\[153a.7\]]tshul khrims rnam pa bdun mi spyod cing ma rungs pa/_pha rol gdung bar byed pa/_mar mi 'dzin pa/_phar mi 'dzin pa/_chos ma yin pa dang ldan pa/_chos ma yin pa'i rjes su 'jug pa de dag 'chi ba'i dus byas nas sems can dmyal ba dang [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang lha ma yin rnams kyi nang 
[\[153b\]]
[\[153b.1\]]du skye bar 'gyur te 'di lta ste/_sgro ba bye mas bkang ba'i kha thur du bstan nas/_skyes bu stobs dang ldan pas ji ltar kha nas blugs te gtong ba de bzhin du da ltar gyi mi rnams sems can dmyal ba dang dud 'gro dang lha ma yin rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te dge 
[\[153b.2\]]ba dang mi dge ba spyod pa'i mi 'byung ba de dag de ltar tshul khrims phyogs gcig pa cung zad dang lus kyi cung zad dang ngag gi cung zad srung ba de'i tshe/_'chi ba'i dus byas nas/_kha cig ni sems can dmyal ba dang [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang lha ma yin rnams kyi nang du skye la/_kha cig ni lha 
[\[153b.3\]]rnams kyi nang du skye ste 'di lta ste shing ljon pa a mra smin pa dag la skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa'i 'dom gyis 'khyud pa dag gang a mra rab tu smin pa'i 'bras bu de dang de dag tu ltung bar 'gyur la/_gang ma smin pa de dag ni ltung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du dge ba 'dres par spyod 
[\[153b.4\]]pa'i mi rnams kha cig ni lha rnams kyi nang du skye la/_kha cig ni sems can dmyal ba dang [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang lha ma yin rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/gang gi tshe thams cad du chos ma yin pa'i skye dgu phal cher 'byung ba/_mar mi 'dzin phar mi 'dzin dge sbyong du mi 'dzin bram 
[\[153b.5\]]zer mi 'dzin rigs kyi rgan rabs kyi rjes su mi 'jug pa/_lus dang ngag gi tshul khrims cung zad kyang mi srung ba de'i tshe/_'dzam bu'i gling gi mi de rnams 'chi ba'i dus byas nas sems can dmyal ba dang [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang lha ma yin rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur te/_de'i tshe lha 
[\[153b.6\]]ma yin gyi stobs ni 'phel lo/_/lha'i stobs ni yongs su 'grib bo/_/de la nga yang lha dang lha ma yin gyi g.yul 'gyed par 'gro ste/_nga nyid kyis rgyal bar nus kyi/_lha gzhan dag gis ni ma yin no/_/de ltar 'di yid la byos la lha rnams chos la 'bad par gyis shig_/chos 
[\[153b.7\]]la yang dag par dga' bas ni 'jig rten 'di dang pha rol kun tu bsrungs par 'gyur ro/_/mthu rnams kyi nang na ni chos mthu che ste gzhan mthur mi snang ngo /_/de ltar yid la bya ba 'di yid la byos te/_lha ma yin pham par bya ba la rab tu 'bod cig_/de skad ces bsgo ba dang brgya 
[\[154a\]]
[\[154a.1\]]byin la 'di skad ces smras so/_/ji ltar khyod kyis bka' stsal pa de bzhin du sgrub cing mchis te/_ji ltar brgya byin gyis bdag cag la bka' stsal pa de bzhin no zhes smras nas/_go cha'i tshal ga la ba der go cha bgo ba'i don du 'dong bar byed do/_/de nas shing de dag 
[\[154a.2\]]las lha rnams kyi go cha mi phyed pa dag rab tu 'byung ste/_gang gyon nas lus mi phyed pa rnams de ltar thams cad rnam par spang ngo /_/ji ltar ri bo'i rtse la gnas pa'i nyi ma 'od dmar po 'char ba de ltar brjid pa na/_ri bo zla ba zhes bya ba ga la ba der g.yul 'gyed pa'i don du 'dong bar byed 
[\[154a.3\]]de/_de nas yang lha dang lha ma yin g.yul 'gyed pa snga ma bzhin du de rnams g.yul 'gyed do/_/de nas gang lha de rnams rnam mdzes su so sor gnas te/_'dod pa'i yon tan lnga 'byor cing ldan par gyur pa rnams kyis de dag phan tshun grogs su gyur pa/_yid 'dod chags kyis rab 
[\[154a.4\]]tu myos pa kun 'di lta ste/_bai DUr+ya'i tshal dang gser gyi shing ljon pa'i tshal dang rin po che ke ke ru'i tshal dang lha'i me tog dang 'bras bu 'byor pa dang bya sgra sna tshogs 'byin pa/_dga' ba rnams kyi nang na dga' bar byed pa mthong ngo /_/de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes 
[\[154a.5\]]pa de/_sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i bya rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa la rjes su sems par byed de/_bya 'di dag las gang gis kha dog dang cha byad sna tshogs su 'dug pa dang sgra sna tshogs 'byin pa dang rin po che'i shing ljon pa sna tshogs kyi nang na bde bar 'khod cing /_tshal dang nye ba'i 
[\[154a.6\]]tshal rnams kyi nang na dga' bar byed rtse bar byed yongs su spyod par byed snyam mo/_/las kyi de kho na zhib mor shes pa de las kyi 'bras bu la rtog par byed de/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/_ri mo mkhan gla za ba sems la g.yo med pa gang gis gzugs sam kun dga' 
[\[154a.7\]]ra ba'am/_skyed mos tshal tshon rtsi kha dog bzang po sna tshogs kyis rnam par 'dri ba 'di lta ste/_kha dog sngon po dang ser po dang dmar po dang 'dres pa rnams kyis rtsig ngos sam gtsug lag khang ngam mchod rten kyi khang pa'i nang du sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis gla za bas shing ljon pa 
[\[154b\]]
[\[154b.1\]]dang /_bya dang /_mi dang /_stag dang /_rta dang /_grong khyer dang /_tshal dang /_nye ba'i tshal dang /_lteng ka dang /_skyed mos tshal dang /_pad ma'i tshal dang /_mtsho dang /_dge sbyong dang /_bram ze dang /_grong dang /_tshong rdal dang /_gzhal med khang la sogs pa bris pa dang sangs rgyas dang 
[\[154b.2\]]chos kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis yon bdag rnams kyi lung bzhin du bzo bo gla ba las byed pa rnams kyis gzhi bsnyams pa dang /_byugs pa dang /_gser dang /_dngul las byas pa'am zangs las byas pa'am de dag la sogs pa gzugs gzhan dag tshon rtsi bzang po dag gis sna tshogs su 
[\[154b.3\]]bris na/_de dag lus dang bral nas bde 'gro lha rnams kyi nang du 'dri 'dri ba de bzhin du byar skye'o/_/tshul khrims spangs pa las sna tshogs byas pa des [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang bung bar gyur nas dga' bar byed do/_/de ltar lha rnams kyi las dang 'bras bu dang 'thun par 'gyur te/_ji ltar blun po 
[\[154b.4\]]de rnams kyis las de dag sems pa bzhin byas pa de bzhin du de dag blun por gyur nas/_lha rnams kyi tshal dang nye ba'i tshal bde ba dang shing ljon pa dang ri'i rtse mo rnams su bde ba de dag myong bar 'gyur ro/_/gang gis ji ltar gzhi sbyangs pa dang byugs pa dang bal glang gi so'am dngul lam 
[\[154b.5\]]gser la sogs pa la gzugs ji lta ba bzhin byas pa ni/_las rnam pa sna tshogs du ma'i gzugs rgya'i 'bur lta bur skye bar 'gyur ro/_/lha de dag kyang rnam mdzes kyi tshal de na ji srid du 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba byas shing bsags pa so sor yang dag par myong bar 'gyur ba'i las zad 
[\[154b.6\]]par ma gyur pa de srid du/_lha dang lha mo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_dga' bar byed dga' dgur spyod par byed/_rtse bar byed de lha'i bde ba sna tshogs myong bar 'gyur ro/_/de zad nas de nas yang 'chi bar 'gyur te/_shi nas kyang las nye bar 'gro ba ji lta ba bzhin sems can 
[\[154b.7\]]dmyal ba dang [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang dud 'gro rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba legs par byas pa'i las mi dang so so yang dag par myong bar 'gyur bas/_mi rnams kyi nang du skyes na/_legs par byas pa'i las de dang rgyu 'thun par de rtag tu so so 
[\[155a\]]
[\[155a.1\]]yang dag par myong bar 'gyur ba/_bde bar gnas pa'i bde bas rgyal po'am rgyal tshab tu yang dag par 'grub la/_skye bo du mas mchod par 'gyur ba dang rtag tu skyed mos tshal la dga' ba dang rtag tu dga' ston la dga' ba dang rtag tu yid rab tu dga' zhing gzugs 
[\[155a.2\]]dang rgyan dang cha byad bzang ba dang rtag tu bza' ba dang btung ba dang kha zas gzhan bca' ba bde ba dang yang dag par ldan pa dang rtag tu mal cha dang skyed mos tshal du gnas pa/_bde ba dang ldan pa dang bran dang bran mo dang las byed pa dang zho shas 'tsho ba dang 'khol ba dag dang ldan par 'gyur 
[\[155a.3\]]ba mthong ngo /_/de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de/_sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi sa la rtog par byed de/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas lha rnams kyi sa yongs 'du na gnas pa zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo /_/der sems can dag 
[\[155a.4\]]las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na skyes bu dam pa shes pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba gang gis pha ma la gos dang zas dang mal cha dang na ba'i gsos sman gyi rkyen gyi yo byad yongs su byin la/_gzhan dag kyang dge ba'i las de nyid la 
[\[155a.5\]]'jog par byed cing /_yang dag par 'jog par byed la so sor 'jog par byed de/_rnam pa de lta bu'i sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa dang srog gcod phra mo yang srung ba yin te/_'bras bu smin pa rul bar gyur pa'i nang na srin bu yod par bag tsha nas za bar mi byed la/_gzhan dag za 
[\[155a.6\]]na yang zlog par byed cing smod par byed la/_de bdag nyid kyang tshul khrims srung gzhan dag kyang tshul khrims la rab tu 'jog par byed do/_/ji ltar na ma byin par len pa spangs zhe na/_'di la ma byin pa len pa 'di lta ste/_mtshams su byas par bya ba dang 'bras bu sar pa shugs 
[\[155a.7\]]kyis khyer te bor ba'am kun dga' ra bar lhung ste bor ba yang spong bar byed la/_gzhan yang zlog cing len pa la smod par byed/_dge ba'i lam la rab tu 'jog par byed pa/_bdag dang gzhan la phan par zhugs pa'i skyes bu dam pa de lus dang bral nas shi ba'i 'og tu sum cu 
[\[155b\]]
[\[155b.1\]]rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi sar skye bar 'gyur te/_yongs 'du na gnas pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/shing ljon pa gcig pu de lhag par mdzes pa yin te/_gang gi tshe chos dang ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i mi 'byung ba na/_'di ltar yang lha'i rgyal 
[\[155b.2\]]po lha thams cad kyi bya ba legs par byas pa dang nyes par byas pa dang 'dzam bu gling gi mi rnams kyi spyad pa legs par byas pa dang nyes par byas pa'i nang na de'i dri dang mdog dang me tog dang lo ma dang 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa yin no zhes de rjod par byed do/_/gang 
[\[155b.3\]]gi tshe 'dzam bu'i gling du chos dang ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i mi 'byung ba de'i tshe/_shing yongs 'du sa brtol me tog rgyas par 'gyur zhing /_dpag tshad brgyar dri 'byung la/_'od kyis rnam par mdzes te/_gzi brjid kyis kyang 'bar ba de'i tshe/_sum cu rtsa 
[\[155b.4\]]gsum pa'i lha rnams yid dga' nas/_shing yongs 'du sa brtol yongs su bskor te 'khod la/_e ma 'di ltar yongs 'du sa brtol rnam pa thams cad du me tog rgyas pa 'di/_gor ma chag par 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams dge sbyong du 'dzin/_bram zer 'dzin rigs 
[\[155b.5\]]kyi rgan rabs la mchod pa byed/_rigs kyi rgan rabs kyi rjes su zhugs pa lta zhig ste/_'di ltar bdag cag gi shing ljon pa 'di rnam pa thams cad du me tog rab tu rgyas so snyam sems so/_/lha de dag de dang nye bar dbyar zla ba bzhir lha'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga 
[\[155b.6\]]'byor cing ldan par gyur pa rnams kyis gnas par byed do/_/gang gi tshe shing yongs 'du sa brtol gyi me tog gi rnam pa phyed rgyas pa de'i tshe/_sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams shin tu dga' bar 'gyur te/_e ma 'dzam bu gling gi mi rnams gor ma chag par tshul khrims 'dres par 
[\[155b.7\]]spyod pa la zhugs pa de'i tshe/_shing yongs 'du sa brtol gyi me tog gi rnam pa 'dres par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/gang gi tshe thams cad du chos ma yin pa'i skye dgu phal cher 'byung ba de'i tshe/_shing yongs 'du sa brtol thams cad du lo ma dang 'dab ma rnyis par 'gyur zhing /_de bzhin 
[\[156a\]]
[\[156a.1\]]du mdog kyang mi sdug_/de bzhin du dri yang mi zhim/_de bzhin du 'od kyang mi gsal te/_dper na dgun khug rna dang sprin gyis 'khrigs na/_nyi ma'i 'od rab tu dro ba dang ldan pa med la/_'od kyi mthu nyams pa sems can rnams kyis mthong bar 'gyur ba de 
[\[156a.2\]]bzhin du/_shing yongs 'du sa brtol gyi 'od chung la dri'i rnam pa de lta bu dang ldan par mi 'gyur zhing /_'od kyis gnas par mi 'gyur ba de'i tshe/_shing yongs 'du sa brtol na gnas pa'i lha rnams brgya byin la/_lha kye ma shing yongs 'du sa brtol 'od chung zhing dri mi bda' la/_ji 
[\[156a.3\]]ltar sngon mdzes pa dang ldan pa de da ltar mdzes pa ma lags te/_gor ma bkum par 'dzam bu'i gling na skye dgu chos ma lags pa bgyid pa/_dge sbyong du mi 'dzin pa/_bram zer mi 'dzin pa/_rigs kyi rgan rabs kyi rjes su mi 'jug pa dag mchis so zhes bsnyad do/_/
[\[156a.4\]]lha'i rgyal po brgya byin gyis de thos nas/_sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs blangs te/_shing yongs 'du sa brtol ga la ba der lha'i tshogs dang lhan cig yongs su bskor nas 'dong bar byed de/_sangs rgyas la shin tu gus pa skyes shing /_sangs rgyas kyi yon tan mngon par dran pa 
[\[156a.5\]]na/_lha rnams la 'di ltar shing yongs 'du sa brtol 'di thams cad du lo ma rnyis par gyur pa'i shing yongs 'du sa brtol ga la ba der kho bo 'gro yis lha gzhan de dag chos shig_/'di ltar bdag ni shin tu gsal bar gnas pa'i mchod rten khyer/_bcom ldan 'das kyi sku 
[\[156a.6\]]gzugs thogs te shing gi rgyal po de dag ga la ba der song la shing de'i drung du bdag bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dri dang phreng ba dang byug pas mchod pa bya'o de skad ces smras so/_/de nas brgya byin gyi tshig lha rnams kyis thos nas lha brgya phrag stong du ma dag lha'i rgyal po brgya byin ga la 
[\[156a.7\]]ba der 'dong ngo /_/brgya byin yang sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs spyi bo la khyer nas/_shing yongs 'du sa brtol ga la ba der dong ba dang shing yongs 'du sa brtol gyi drung na gnas pa'i lha gzhan dag gis rgyang ring po nyid nas mthong ste/_shing yongs 'du sa brtol gyi lo ma rnyis 
[\[156b\]]
[\[156b.1\]]par 'gyur cing 'od mi gsal la dpal dang ldan pa med nas yid shin tu lhag par mi dga'o/_/de nas brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das de shing gi drung du gser btso ma lta bu'i sa gzhi la bai DUr+ya'i gdan gyi steng du bzhag nas/_lha'i tshogs dang bcas pa dad pa 
[\[156b.2\]]skyes pa dang bcas pa'i rim gro thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das la dri dang tshal gyi me tog ma li ka dang man dA ra ba dang pad ma dag ste/_rnam pa de lta bu'i spos dang me tog rnams kyis bkrus shing mchod pa byas nas/_brgya byin gyis lha rnams la ji ltar lha dag 
[\[156b.3\]]dad pa yang dag par skyes pa ni ser sna dang bral zhing bag med pa dang bral ba la gnas par dga' ba yin te/_de ltar sangs rgyas dang chos dang 'phags pa'i tshogs ni khams gsum pa'i bla ma yin la/_bdag cag gi bla ma yang yin no zhes smras so/_/de nas lha dad 
[\[156b.4\]]pa skyes pa thams cad sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal bar byed do/_/de nas de'i tshe brgya byin gyis 'di ltar tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_sems can kun gyi gnyen gcig pa/_/sred pa'i dug las rnam grol zhing /_/srid pa'i pha rol yang dag rgal/_/thams cad mkhyen 
[\[156b.5\]]la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de nas brgya byin thal mo sbyar nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas lha'i tshogs dang lhan cig yongs su bskor cing pus mo btsugs nas 'di ltar tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_sems can kun gyi gtso gcig pa/_/'dod 
[\[156b.6\]]chags zhe sdang gti mug bcom/_/rims nad med cing mtshungs med pa/_/thams cad mkhyen la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de nas lha'i tshogs de dag thams cad kyang /_shing gi rgyal po de yongs su bskor nas 'khod de/_thams cad dad pa yang dag par skyes pa/_thams 
[\[156b.7\]]cad dbang po gzhol ba'i lha kun ji lta ji ltar sems dang la yid dge zhing /_sangs rgyas dang chos la phal cher mchod pa byed pa de lta de ltar shing de 'dab ma bye nas/_kha 'bye bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas de mthong nas de ltar phyir zhing shing yongs 'du sa brtol rim gyis sngon 
[\[157a\]]
[\[157a.1\]]bzhin du me tog rnam pa thams cad du rgyas par 'gyur la/_shing yongs 'du sa brtol gyi 'od kyis dpag tshad brgya dag tu mdzes te/_dris ni khyab 'dab ma ni sprin gyi mdog ltar dkar bung bas ni nye bar mdzes par byas/_grib ma ni bde/_kun nas lha'i tshogs 
[\[157a.2\]]kyis ni gang /_nyi ma gnyis pa ltar ni mdzes te de'i sngon gyi dpal de dag mthong nas lha rnams dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/dpag tshad brgya dag tu dri 'byung ba ldang la rlung yang dpag tshad brgya dag tu rab tu ldang ste/_dri yid du 'ong bar 'gyur zhing shing gi rgyal po 'od kyis mdzes pa 
[\[157a.3\]]yin no/_/dper na ri bo stong phrag drug cu thams cad kyi nang na ri'i rgyal po ri rab mdzes pa de bzhin du/_shing ljon pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi nang na shing yongs 'du sa brtol de bzhin du rnam par mdzes shing kun du snang la lhan ne ba yin no/_/de nas yang dpal rdzogs shing dpal 
[\[157a.4\]]shin tu rgyas la/_dpal 'bar te kun nas kyang 'od 'bar ba na/_sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams yid rab tu dga' bar gyur te phan tshun du 'di ltar lha rnams sangs rgyas kyi spyan mtshungs pa med pa'i mthu la ltos/_gang du sangs rgyas kyi mthus shing yongs 'du sa brtol 
[\[157a.5\]]'di sngon gyi mdog dang dri dang phreng ba dang lo ma dang 'od rnams yod de/_ji ltar 'di 'phel ba de ltar sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyang gor ma chag par stobs dang mthu dang rdzu 'phrul byas pa yang che bar 'gyur/_'dzam bu'i gling gi chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa rnams kyang 
[\[157a.6\]]chos la blo gros 'jug ste/_chos dang ldan pa'i bsam pa de dag da ltar nye bar 'jug pa ni/_bdud kyi sgrub pa'i stobs rab tu med par 'gyur zhing bdud kyi ris kyi lha ma yin dang klu 'jig rten skyong ba chos ma yin pa dang ldan pa dag chos la bgegs byed par mi 'gyur/_chos 
[\[157a.7\]]la smod pa byed par mi 'gyur la/_lha mo rnams kyi nang du lha bdag cag zil gyis gnon par mi 'gyur te/_shing gi rgyal po 'di mthong bas bdud kyi stobs ni nyams shing /_lha'i stobs ni rab tu 'phel bar khyed cag gis shes par gyis shig ces smras so/_/de nas brgya byin 
[\[157b\]]
[\[157b.1\]]gyi sngon du 'gro ba'i lha rnams de ltar phan tshun gtam yang dag par rjod pa na/_de nas yang chos dang ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dag 'dzam bu'i gling nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi 'dun sa ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do/_/de 
[\[157b.2\]]nas shing yongs 'du sa brtol gyi drung na lha'i gtso bo brgya byin la sogs pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la sems rab tu dang ba dang yid rab tu dang ba dang rang gi 'od zer 'bar ba gsal bas mchod pa byed pa na 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dag gis rgyang ring po nyid nas mthong ngo /_/de 
[\[157b.3\]]nas de dag gi drung du phyin nas 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dag gis lha'i rgyal po brgya byin la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te smras pa/_'di ltar lha'i gtso bo brgya byin la sogs pa dgyes par mdzod cig_/da ltar chos dang ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i mi rnams chos ni spyod/_chos 
[\[157b.4\]]ma yin pa ni mi spyod de/_mar 'dzin pa phar 'dzin pa dge sbyong du 'dzin pa bram zer 'dzin pa rigs kyi rgan rabs kyi rjes su 'jug pa rnams chos spyod kyis dgyes par mdzod cig_/de nas de dag las thos nas lha'i gtso bo brgya byin la sogs pa yid rab tu dga' ba mchog tu 
[\[157b.5\]]dga' ste/_de nas yang 'jig rten skyong ba dag la mchod nas/_'di ltar mi'i 'jig rten na mi chos pa dang ldan pa rnams 'jig rten skyong ba dag gi kun dga' ba'i skal bar gyur cig_/de nas lha de dag thams cad kun dga' ba skyes par rig nas/_shing yongs 'du sa 
[\[157b.6\]]brtol gyi drung du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das blangs pa de nas yang mchod nas/_lha'i 'dun sa chos bzang ga la ba der sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das khyer ro/_/lha gzhan lhag ma gang yin pa de dag ni shing yongs 'du sa brtol ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas brgya byin gyi mdun 
[\[157b.7\]]du 'gro ba yid rab tu dga' ba rnams shing yongs 'du sa brtol ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/_shing gi rgyal po de'i drung du dbyar zla ba bzhi'i bar du lha'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga 'byor cing ldan par gyur pa rnams kyis dga' bar byed/_yongs su spyod par byed do/_/lha yid 
[\[158a\]]
[\[158a.1\]]rab tu dga' ba lha mo'i tshogs rnams kyis yongs su bskor ba dag dga' bar byed/_yongs su spyod par byed cing /_bde ba dpe med pa nye bar myong bar byed do/_/de ltar de nyid na gnas pa dbyar zla ba bzhi 'das pa dang de dag gi nang nas las dang tshe zad pa'i lha gang 
[\[158a.2\]]yin pa de dag lha'i 'jig rten de nas 'chi bar 'gyur te/_shi nas kyang las nye bar 'gro ba ji lta ba bzhin/_sems can dmyal ba dang [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang dud 'gro rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las mi dang so so yang dag par 
[\[158a.3\]]myong bar 'gyur bas/_mi dag dang skal ba mnyam par mi rnams kyi nang du skyes na/_las de dang rgyu 'thun par de rtag tu gzugs bzang zhing shin tu blta na sdug pa dang yid rab tu dga' bar 'gyur/_rtag tu bde zhing byad bzhin kun gyis blta bar mngon par dga' ba dang rtse ba 
[\[158a.4\]]la dga' bar 'gyur/_rtag tu dgod pa dang dga' ba dang rtse ba la dga' zhing bud med thams cad kyis blta bar mngon par dga' ba dang shin tu bde ba dang ldan te/_rgyal po'am rgyal tshab tu 'gyur bar mthong ngo /_/de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa 
[\[158a.5\]]des/_sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi sa la rtog par byed de/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas/_sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha 'dres pa'i 'gram na gnas pa zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo /_/der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas/_
[\[158a.6\]]des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na tshul khrims dang ldan par gyur cing /_sems can gzhan la phan par 'dod pa'i sems yongs su bsgoms pa'i snying dang ldan pa gang gis/_yon tan mchog dang ldan pa'am/_tshul khrims dang ldan pa'am/_shes rab 
[\[158a.7\]]dang ldan pa'am/_nad pa la zan gcig tsam byin pa'am/_bdag nyid kyang srog gcod pa mi byed la/_shing ljon pa'i gseb na grog sbur ram srog chags mar ko ta ka'am/_sems can gyi rnam pa de lta bu gzhan dag la ba lang rdzi'am/_phyugs rdzi'am/_rnga mo'i rdzi'am/_
[\[158b\]]
[\[158b.1\]]glang po che'i rdzi'am/_de bzhin du gzhan bong bu'i rdzi'am/_rta rdzi dgun gyi dus sam/_dgun smad kyi dus su grang bas nyen te 'brog dgon pa dag tu phyin nas me bus na/_skyes bu dam pa sems can la phan par zhugs pa des me de chu'am thal bas zhi bar byas nas/_srin bu de dag 
[\[158b.2\]]thar bar byed pa dang gzhan srog gcod pa byed pa yang phyir zlog par byed/_bdag nyid kyang mi byed la gal te byas pa zhig yod na yang de smod par byed/_so sor 'chags par byed/_gzhan la yang rjes su yi rang bar mi byed/_skyon du 'grang bar mi byed 'jog par mi byed/_lam bde 
[\[158b.3\]]ba la rab tu 'jog par byed de/_de ltar rnam pa de dag dang tshul de dag gis srog gcod pa spangs pa yin no/_/ma byin par len pa spangs pa ji lta bu yin snyam na/_'di la ma byin par len pa mi byed pa yin no/_/ma byin par len pa mi byed pa'i rnam pa du yod snyam na 'di lta ste/_
[\[158b.4\]]dgun dang dgun smad grang ba'i dus su shing skam po med pa/_shing ljon pa med pa'i dgon par lam du zhugs pa de na/_ba lang rdzi'am/_glang po che'i rdzi'am/_rnga mo'i rdzi grang bas nyen pa dag gis me bud pa'i phyir ram/_mtshan mo bsro bar bya ba'i phyir/_ba lang gi lci ba'am/_
[\[158b.5\]]glang po che'i lci ba'am/_lo ma'am/_'dab ma'am/_shing bur dag spungs te/_bzhag pa de dag la lam du zhugs pa de grang bas shin tu nyen par gyur kyang pha rol gyi yin no snyam du bsams nas/_rku ba'i sems kyis len par mi byed/_pha rol len pa yang zlog par byed/_
[\[158b.6\]]gal te bdag gis blangs na/_de 'chags par byed la phyir zhing mi byed/_gzhan dag kyang lam dge ba la rab tu 'jog par byed/_gzhan gyis blangs pa la yang rjes su yi rang bar mi byed de/_las kyi nyer bsdogs dang las kyi mjug ma byin par len pa las byung ba zlog par byed 
[\[158b.7\]]cing /_bdag nyid kyang mi byed pa yin te/_sdig pa'i las rdul phran tsam gyis kyang 'jigs par lta ba'i skyes bu dge ba de/_lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha 'dres pa'i 'gram na gnas pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/'dres 
[\[159a\]]
[\[159a.1\]]pa'i 'gram na gnas pa'i sa de yang 'di lta ste/_dngul gyi sa gzhi la gser rnams kyis bkra bar brgyan/_gser rnams kyis 'gram de yang bkra bar brgyan dngul gyis bkra bar brgyan pa yang de bzhin bkra bar brgyan/_de bzhin du ke ke rus bkra bar brgyan pa dang /_
[\[159a.2\]]de bzhin du rdo rje mang pos bkra bar brgyan pa yin te/_de ltar sa de las kyi 'bras bu dang 'thun par rnam par mdzes pa rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa/_shing ljon pa rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa rnams kyis nye bar mdzes par byas shing sdug par byas pa/_kun nas 
[\[159a.3\]{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang bya sdug pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang bya'i kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs kyis 'gram khebs pa/_tshal dang nye ba'i tshal yang rin po che sna bdun rnam pa du ma dag gis nye bar mdzes par byas pa yin no/_/de nas tshal de na 'dres pa'i 'gram 
[\[159a.4\]]na gnas pa'i lha shing gseb na 'khod pa rnams lus kun gser btso mas brgyan cing /_lha mo brgya phrag stong gis yongs su bskor ba/_lha'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga 'byor cing ldan par gyur pa rnams kyis dga' bar byed de/_de dag rnam pa ji srid du 'gram gang dang gang 
[\[159a.5\]]du gnas shing rin po che'i 'od gang gis brgyan pa'i rnam pa de srid du/_lus thams cad kyi kha dog tu 'gyur te/_rin po che'i shing ljon pa de rnams kyi 'od kyis lus thams cad brgyan pa nyid yin no/_/shing ljon pa de dag gi drung du song nas bde ba sna tshogs dang ldan pa rnams 
[\[159a.6\]]dga' bar byed yongs su spyod par byed do/_/de ltar de dag gis dga' bar byas nas/_lha mo de rnams dang lhan cig tu 'bab chu'i tshal ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do/_/'bab chu'i tshal de yang kun nas gser gyi shing ljon pa 'gram nas skyes pa rnams kyis khebs pa yin te/_shing 
[\[159a.7\]]ljon pa de rnams kyi lo ma ser pos khebs pa'i 'od kyis 'bab chu kun nas chu ser por gyur te/_de dag drag tu 'bab kyang de dkar po nyid du mi mngon no/_/shing ljon pa rnams kyi gsab gseb na/_lha gang dag lha mo dang lhan cig dga' bar byed/_yongs su spyod par byed pa de 
[\[159b\]]
[\[159b.1\]]dag 'di snyam du sems te/_'di ltar shing ljon pa rnams kyi yal ga dag rdol nas/_bdag cag rnams kyi chang zhim po 'byung bar gyur cig ces snyam mo/_/de nas sems bskyed ma thag tu shing ljon pa de dag rdol nas/_lha rnams kyi dge ba'i las des chang ro dang mdog dang /_
[\[159b.2\]]dri sna tshogs dang ldan pa dag byung nas/_shing ljon pa'i yal ga dag las 'bab bo/_/de 'bab pa na lha dag gis mngon par mthong nas/_snod rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bcus te/_rin po che'i snod rnam pa sna tshogs thogs nas/_de dag 'thung bar byed de/_lha'i chang 
[\[159b.3\]]bde ba des brgya snyed du myos so/_/chang des myos pa rnams bud med mthong ba'i bde ba sred pa'i mes kun nas sreg par byed kyang /_bsregs so snyam du mi sems te bde bas bsgribs pa rnams sems pa med do/_/de nas yang lha de rnams 'di snyam du sems te/_ji lta 
[\[159b.4\]]ji ltar lha'i thos pa nyams dga' ba rtag tu dga' bar byed pa'i rol mo rnam pa sna tshogs bdag cag gis mnyan par bya'o snyam mo//_//'phags pa dam pa'i chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa/_bam po sum cu bzhi pa/_de ltar sems bskyed ma thag nyid du dge 
[\[159b.5\]]ba'i las des rol mo'i sgra shing ljon pa rnams las 'byung ste/_shing de dag rlung gis skyod par byed do/_/de dag bskyod pa na lo ma de dag las rnam pa 'di lta bu'i sgra 'byung ste/_ji ltar sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i sgra snyan sim/_zhes byed pa dang yang dag par ldan pa de 
[\[159b.6\]]lta bu'i sgra shin tu thos par 'gyur ro/_/sgra de dag thos nas kyang lha de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_'di ltar da ni shing dag las bdud rtsi 'byung bar gyur cig snyam mo/_/de ltar sems bskyed ma thag nyid du ji ltar zo ba kha thur du bstan pa rnams kyi nang nas kha ra 'am kha ra'i 
[\[159b.7\]]dum bu kha dog dpe med pa dang ldan pa 'byung ba de bzhin du shing ljon pa rnams las bdud rtsi 'byung ste de dag lha rnams za bar byed do/_/des tshim nas glu dbyangs dang /_sil snyan gyi sgra 'byung ba rnams nye bar len bzhin du rin po che'i sa ga la ba der lha mig mi 'dzums par rgyu ba 
[\[160a\]]
[\[160a.1\]]rnams 'dong bar byed do/_/de dag rin po che'i sar dong nas phan tshun grogs su gyur pa/_'dod chags lhur 'dzin par sems pa yin te/_der yid zhugs pa der dga' bar gyur pa de dang 'thun pa'i spyod pa dang dga' ba'i lha'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga 'byor 
[\[160a.2\]]cing ldan par gyur pa rnams kyis dga' bar byed/_dga' dgur spyod par byed do/_/tshal de nas yang kun nas tshal zhes bya ba der 'gro bar byed 'dong bar byed do/_/tshal de na bya'i rigs bdun la 'di lta ste/_gser gyi ngang pa kha cig rin po che sna bdun lta bu dang /_ne tso kha dog 
[\[160a.3\]]sna tshogs su 'dug pa/_kha cig an da rnyil lta bu dang /_bya kA raN+Da ba kha cig ke ke ru'i mdog lta bu dang /_kha cig bai DUr+ya lta bu dang /_ngur pa kha cig an da rnyil lta bu yin la/_kha cig spug lta bu dang rma bya kha dog rin po che sna bdun lta bu yin la/_kha cig mthon ka lta bu dang /_
[\[160a.4\]]shang shang te'u yang sna tshogs su 'dug ste/_kha cig byi ru lta bu dang /_bya ka la ping ka rin po che sna bdun lta bu yin la/_kha cig dngul gyi mdog lta bu yin no/_/de dag thams cad mthong ba bde ba/_sgra snyan cing 'jebs pa 'byin pa la mkhas pa yin te/_kha cig nam mkha' 
[\[160a.5\]]la bdag nyid phan tshun 'khor lo bzhin byas nas rtse bar byed de/_ji ltar lha rnams kyi rol mo'i sgra 'byung ba de ltar yongs su 'byin par byed cing /_ji ltar lha mo'i tshogs yan lag lnga dang ldan pa la shin tu chags par 'gyur ba de ltar sgra gzhan dag 'byung bar byed do/_/gzhan kha 
[\[160a.6\]]cig pad ma'i tshal bung ba'i tshogs kyis nye bar mdzes par byas pa rnams su bya mo rnams dang lhan cig bcas par dga' bar byed skad 'byin par byed do/_/gzhan dag skam sa la 'dug nas bya mo rnams dang lhan cig bcas par dga' bar byed dga' dgur spyod par byed do/_/gzhan 
[\[160a.7\]]dag gser dang dngul gyi shing ljon pa 'dab ma sna tshogs kyis nye bar mdzes par byas pa rnams kyi nang na de'i grib mas lus mngon par brgyan pa rnams rtse bar byed dga' dgur spyod par byed de/_de ltar bya de dag dga' bar byed do/_/de nas bya de rnams yongs su rtse ba na lha de rnams kyis 
[\[160b\]]
[\[160b.1\]]mthong nas/_de nas yang rab tu dga' ba'i yid dang rnar snyan pa'i yid kyis bya'i sgra rnam pa sna tshogs 'byin pa bde bar thos so/_/de nas lha de dag dang lha mo de dag kyang nam mkha' la rgyu ba de dag gi nang du zhugs nas/_nam mkha' la rgyu zhing rtse bar byed do/_/de bzhin du bya chu la 
[\[160b.2\]]rgyu ba rnams dang lhan cig chu'i nang na rgyu/_skam la rgyu ba rnams dang lhan cig skam la rgyu zhing rtse bar byed do/_/lha de dag kyang lha mo rnams dang lhan cig bya de dag dang de bzhin rtse bar byed/_dga' dgur spyod par byed do/_/de nas dge slong des lha de dag dang bya de dag mtshungs par 
[\[160b.3\]]'dod pas sems phrogs shing myos pa rnams la 'di ltar tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_dud 'gro 'dod pa spyod pa dag_/gti mug gis ni bskyod pa yin/_/de lta bas na lha rnams ni/_/lha dang dud 'gro mtshungs pa yin/_/skal ba bzang po thob pa'i mi/_/bag med rnams la mi spyod 
[\[160b.4\]]na/_/de ni mkhas pa zhes brjod de/_/de las zlog pa gzhan yin no/_/lha rnams bag med pa yis phrogs/_/sems can dmyal bar rab tu 'gro/_/de lta bas na mkhas pa rnams/_/bag med dug dang 'dra bar brjod/_/blo zhan bag med rnam dag gis/_/sngar ni bde ba lta 
[\[160b.5\]]bur mthong /_/bag med las byung 'bras thob nas/_/don med de ni phyis gdung ngo /_/skye bo mkhas pas bag med pa/_/don kun med par byed mthong nas/_/de ltar de las gzhan dge ba/_/gang yin bag med mi sten to/_/bag med gzhan du sdug bsngal zhing /_/bag yod gzhan 
[\[160b.6\]]du bde ba ste/_/bag med pa dang bag yod da dag_/mtshan nyid bsdus te bshad pa yin/_/gang zhig sdug bsngal 'dod 'gyur ba/_/de ni bag med sten par byed/_/gang zhig shin tu bag med pa/_/nam yang bde ba mi 'thob bo/_/bag med bral ba dam pa ni/_/'chi ba med pa'i 
[\[160b.7\]]gnas su 'gro/_/gang zhig shin tu bag yod pa/_/dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal mi myong ngo /_/gal te blo zhan lha rnams dang /_/dud 'gro mtshungs par rtse byed na/_/lha rnams dang ni dud 'gro dag_/khyad par med pa nyid yin no/_/lha dang lha ma yin dang ni/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]de bzhin dmyal ba rnams/_/
[\[161a\]]
[\[161a.1\]]ris 'thun blo dang 'gro ba dag_/kun du mi 'thun tha dad do/_/blo mi 'thun pas las mi 'thun/_/las mi 'thun las de bzhin 'gro/_/las mi 'thun pa sna tshogs las/_/'gro ba rnams kyang snang ba yin/_/las rnams sna tshogs tha dad pas/_/lha rnams shin tu bag 
[\[161a.2\]]med de/_/lha yi 'jig rten las ltung ba/_/khong du chud par mi 'gyur ro/_/gang tshe lha yi 'jig rten las/_/ltung bar 'gyur ba de tshe lha/_/khyed kyi sdug bsngal nye ba yin/_/bdag nyid bde ba shes par gyis/_/de ltar rtog pas rnam par nyams/_/bag med pas kyang bslus pa 
[\[161a.3\]]yin/_/sred pas gdungs pa'i lha rnams ni/_/sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur/_/lha dag dmyal bar gang song ba/_/'di ni shin tu dpya ba yin/_/rtse mo nyams su len 'gyur rnams/_/gnod pa mi bzad nyams su myong /_/srog chags sems ni rmongs pa dag_/'khor ba las ni 
[\[161a.4\]]yid mi 'byung /_/sred pas yongs su bslus pa rnams/_/sdug bsngal las ni sdug bsngal 'thob/_/de ltar dge slong des lha de rnams ni shin tu bag med pa khong du chud nas rjes su ston par byed do/_/de nas lha de rnams yul gyi bde ba thams cad nye bar myong yang /_ji ltar me shing la 
[\[161a.5\]]mched pa ltar yul rnams kyis tshim pa nyid med de/_ji srid du las byas shing bsags pa de zad par ma gyur pa de srid du dga' bar byed la/_de'i 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba'i bde ba rjes su myong bar byed do/_/de zad nas de nas yang lha'i 'jig rten de nas 'chi bar 'gyur te/_shi nas 
[\[161a.6\]]kyang las nye bar 'gro ba ji lta ba bzhin sems can dmyal ba dang [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang dud 'gro rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyis mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mi'i nang du skyes na las de dang rgyu 'thun par de rtag tu shin tu bde bar 'gyur/_
[\[161a.7\]]zas dang skom mang ba'i yul du nor dang 'bru'i bang mdzod mang po 'byor pa dang rgyal po'am blon po chen po byed par 'gyur ba mthong ngo /_/de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de/_sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi sa la rtog par byed de/_des thos pa las 
[\[161b\]]
[\[161b.1\]]byung ba'i shes pas lha rnams kyi gnas tshang tshing gi 'gram na gnas pa zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo /_/der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/_sems can skyes bu dam pa sems dge bar bsgoms 
[\[161b.2\]]pa'i snying dang ldan pa gang gis bsam gtan dang po thob pa'i dge slong dag la bsod snyoms byin zhing gzhan dag kyang sbyin du 'jug_/byin pa la rjes su yi rang bar byed/_gzhan dag kyang de nyid la rab tu dga' bar byed/_rab tu 'dzud par byed rab tu 'jog par byed de/_de ltar sbyin 
[\[161b.3\]]pa la bdag nyid mngon par dga' ba yin/_srog gcod pa dang ma byin par len pa dag dang bral ba ji lta bu zhig yin/_'di la ma byin par len pa spangs pa rnam pa du yod rnam pa ji lta bu yin zhe na/_'di ni lam du zhugs pa na khron pa dang lteng ka dang 'bab chu dag tu 'gron po rnams la phan 
[\[161b.4\]]par bya ba'i phyir chu rdza'am kham phor sbyar ba gang yin pa de dag la gzhan gyis 'di ltar dbye 'di ni rgya che zhing phyogs gzhan na yang chu med la bdag cag la yang chu snod chu rdza'am phru ba khyer ba med de/_de gal te bdag cag gis khron pa'i phyogs de nas ma khyer na skom pas bdag cag gi srog 
[\[161b.5\]]chad par 'gyur ro/_/zhes bskul kyang de len par mi byed pa yin te/_bdag nyid skom par shes kyang ma byin par len pa'i 'jigs pas chu rdza'am kham phor len par mi byed la gzhan len pa la yang rjes su yi rang bar mi byed/_phyir zlog par byed/_dge ba'i lam la rab tu 
[\[161b.6\]]'jog par byed de/_de ltar ma byin par len pa spangs pa yin zhing rnam pa de dag yin te srog chad par 'gyur yang ma byin par len pa mi byed pa yin no/_/srog gcod pa spangs pa ji lta bu yin rnam pa du yod ce na/_'di la bdag nyid srog gcod par mi byed gzhan byed pa yang 
[\[161b.7\]]phyir zlog par byed/_rab tu mi 'jog par byed/_byas na yang skyon du 'grang zhing mang du smod par byed pa yin no/_/'di ni skar khung nas 'ong ba'am g.yogs pa'i steng na 'dug pa'am nyi ma'am dud pas gdungs pa na srin bu phre'u'am grog sbur phra mo dag la yang kun nas gnod 
[\[162a\]]
[\[162a.1\]]pa'i sems kyis gnod par mi byed/_srog dang bral bar mi byed/_/gzhan byed na yang phyir zlog par byed/_skyon du 'grang bar byed/_dge ba'i lam la rab tu 'jog par byed/_dge ba'i mi bdag nyid dge ba byed cing gzhan yang rab tu 'jog par byed pa de lus dang bral nas 
[\[162a.2\]]bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi nang 'dres pa'i 'gram na gnas pa'i sar skye bar 'gyur ro/_/der skyes nas kyang legs par byas pa'i las kyi mtha' spyad pa de dge ba'i las la spyod pa/_las byas pa'i rnam par smin pa las 'byung ba ni 'di lta ste/_dus kyi 
[\[162a.3\]]tshal rgya che zhes bya ba 'byung ste/_tshal de na rin po che sna tshogs kyi 'od gsal ba rin po che an da rnyil dang /_bai DUr+ya'i 'od dri ma med cing gsal la bya sna tshogs sgra 'byin pa rnar snyan pa dus tshigs drug tu rtag par shing ljon pa me tog mchog rab tu rgyas pa 'bab chu dang chu klung dang lteng 
[\[162a.4\]]kas brgyan pa rin po che an da rnyil dang bai DUr+ya'i pad ma nyams dga' ba gser btso ma'i ri bo mthon pos brgyan pa chu na rgyu ba dang skam la rgyu ba'i bya ri bo mthon po'i gsab gseb dang 'gram na gnas pa/_gzugs dang cha byad sna tshogs su 'dug pa/_sgra skad chen po 'byin pa rnams 
[\[162a.5\]]kyis brgyan pa dge ba'i las kyi 'bras bus sprul pa na/_lha de dge ba'i las kyi 'bras bu la spyod de yun ring du bde ba rgyun mi 'chad par spyod do/_/lha mo'i tshogs rnam pa sna tshogs stong snyed kyis yongs su bskor cing /_lha'i phreng ba dang gos gyon la dpal rnam pa sna tshogs kyi gzugs 
[\[162a.6\]]dang ldan pa de/_lha mo de dag nye bar glu dbyangs len cing yongs su spyod pa na/_tshal der rnam par rgyu bar byed do/_/de rgyu ba na dge ba'i las des bskul ba'i bya rnams kyis 'di ltar tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_dge ba'i las kyis skye bo dag_/lha yi yul du mchod par 'gyur/_/
[\[162a.7\]]de ltar mi dges dmyal bar khrid/_/las kyi 'gyur ba de 'dra'o/_/lha yi 'jig rten thob nas su/_/lha gang khyad du gsod mi byed/_/gang du sred pas mi gnod pa/_/de ni bde las bde bar 'gro/_/las kyi thag pa ring po yis/_/srid par rgyu ba bcings pa rnams/_/dgra dag 'khor 
[\[162b\]]
