[\[181b.4\]]kyis tshal de brgyan to/_/gzhan yang rnam pa gzhan gyis tshal de nyid brgyan pa yin te 'di lta ste/_bai DUr+ya'i shing ljon pa'i sdong po la gser gyi lo ma dang ke ke ru'i 'dab ma dang 'bras bu dngul mdog dang spug gis rnam par phye ba yin no/_/yang shing ljon pa rnam pa gzhan 'byung ste 'di lta ste/_
[\[181b.5\]]sdong po nyer nyer pos rnam par phye zhing thams cad du rin po che sna bdun las byas pa yin no/_/'di lta ste/_gser las byas pa dang thams cad bai DUr+ya las byas pa dang /_thams cad ke ke ru las byas pa dang /_thams cad dngul las byas pa dang /_thams cad spug las byas pa yin te 
[\[181b.6\]]shing ljon pa'i sdong po thams cad shin tu rnam par phye ba yin no/_/yang shing ljon pa de dag gi mtha' dang yal ga rnams kyang de bzhin du thams cad rin po che sna bdun las byas pa yin te 'bras bu dang me tog phun sum tshogs pa dag lha'i me tog rnams kyis brgyan pa yin no/_/me tog de dag las 
[\[181b.7\]]kyang kha dog sna tshogs dang dri rnam pa sna tshogs dag 'byung ste me tog de rnams kyi dri dpag tshad drug tu 'byung ngo /_/bung ba kha dog sna tshogs rnams kyang me tog gi ros myos nas shing ljon pa de rnams kyi nang na rgyu bar byed de/_de ltar las dkar po rnam pa sna tshogs kyis kun mthong yid 'ong gi 
[\[182a\]]
[\[182a.1\]]shing ljon pa rnams mdzes pa yin no/_/yang pad ma dang ud pa la'i tshal dag mdzes pa ji lta bu yin zhe na 'di lta ste/_tshal de kun nas bai DUr+ya'i sdong bu dang gser gyi 'dab ma dang ke ke ru'i ze ba dang an da rnyil gyi mdog lta bu'i bung ba rnams kyis brgyan pa'i bung ba thams 
[\[182a.2\]]cad sgra snyan pa 'byin te/_ji ltar lha rnams kyi thos pa nyams dga' ba de bas kyang rab tu stobs che bar yid bde ba skye'o/_/yang tshal de nyid kun nas gsal zhing mdzes pa yin te/_'di lta ste/_tshal gyi kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mdzes pa dag ni/_'di lta ste/_kha dog sngon po dang 
[\[182a.3\]]ser po dang btsod ka dag yin no/_/ji ltar 'dzam bu'i gling nas phyogs shin tu sdug par byas pa ltar tshal rnam par mdzes zhes tshal gsal ba de na stegs dang /_lteng ka dang tshal bu dang pad ma'i 'dab ma dag gis brgyan pa de kun nas rnam par mdzes pa yin no/_/tshal yon tan 
[\[182a.4\]]de lta bu dang ldan pa de na lha de rnams rtse ba na mngon par mthong nas yid rab tu dga' ba'i lha de dag lha mo'i tshogs des yongs su bskor ba dang lhan cig bde bar 'dong bar bya ba'i phyir nam mkha' la gar bab bab tu 'dong bar byed pa dang /_lha gzhan dag lha sngon ma byung ba 'di dag 
[\[182a.5\]]bdag cag gi drung du 'ongs so zhes shes nas lha de dag nyid kyi drung du 'dong bar byed de/_phan tshun tshig snyan pa nyid kyis bos nas phan tshun grogs su gyur pa pad ma'i tshal rnam pa sna tshogs la dga' ba dag sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pas rtse bar byed dga' dgur spyod par 
[\[182a.6\]]byed do/_/de nas lha de rnams de ltar yun ring du kun mthong gi tshal der lha'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams kyis rtses nas/_skyed mos tshal myos gnas zhes bya ba ga la ba der 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga 'byor cing ldan par gyur pa rnams 'dong bar byed do/_/skyed mos tshal de yang 
[\[182a.7\]]kha khyer rnam pa sna tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing khron pa dang 'bab chu dang rdzing ring po nyams dga' ba yin no/_/de na rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dkrigs pa gser gyis phye ba dang yang dag par ldan pa/_sa du ma shin tu rnam par phye ba nyams dga' ba yin no/_/
[\[182b\]]
[\[182b.1\]]bya sna tshogs sgra snyan pa 'byin cing gar byed pa dag nyams dga' ba yin no/_/rtag tu 'bab chu dang chu bo'i sgra khru lu lu snyan par 'byin pa nyams dga' ba yin no/_/rtag tu bza' ba dang btung ba mdog dang ro dang dri phun sum tshogs pa chu bo ltar 'bab bo/_/de nas yul der dong 
[\[182b.2\]]nas lha de rnams lha mo'i tshogs cha byad dang rgyan sna tshogs kyis rnam par brgyan pa rang gis legs par byas pa'i las la spyod pa rnams dang lhan cig 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga 'byor cing ldan par gyur pa rnams kyis rtse bar byed do/_/de ltar lha de rnams kyi rtse ba dang dga' dgur spyod pa 
[\[182b.3\]]dag yun ring du 'das kyang lha bag med pa la gnas pa des khong du mi chud do//_//'phags pa dam pa'i chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa/_bam po sum cu drug pa/_de ltar yul lnga la rnam par chags shing bde ba la gnas pa de rnams kyi las legs par byas pa gang yin pa 
[\[182b.4\]]de dag zad par 'gyur ro/_/de zad nas de nas yang 'chi ba 'byung yang sems bag med pa'i dbang du gyur pa sred pas bslus pa kun nas sred pas bdas shing 'dod chags kyi mes gdungs pa na bde bas myos pas snying myos pa rnams mi mthong ngo /_/gang gi tshe bde ba'i rtse ba thams cad kyi 
[\[182b.5\]]gzhi yongs su btang ba/_'jigs pa'i grong khyer chen po'i mi rtag pa nyid mthong bar gyur pa ma nor cing nges par 'gro ba'i ngo bo 'chi ba mngon du 'ongs pa de'i tshe sdug bsngal chen po yang rig par 'gyur te/_de'i tshe lha rnams kyi sems khong du chud pa'i dus yin no/_/de ltar bag med 
[\[182b.6\]]pa'i yul la dga' ba de rnams ji srid du 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba nges par myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad par ma gyur pa de srid du bde ba de dag myong bar 'gyur ro/_/de zad nas yang lha'i 'jig rten de nas 'chi bar 'gyur te/_shi nas kyang las nye bar 'gro ba ji lta ba bzhin 
[\[182b.7\]]sems can dmyal ba dang [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang dud 'gro rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te nges par myong bar 'gyur ba'i las mi dang so so yang dag par myong bar 'gyur bas mi rnams kyi nang du skyes na/_las de dang rgyu 'thun par de shin tu bde bar 'gyur zhing /_nor dang 'bru phun sum 
[\[183a\]]
[\[183a.1\]]tshogs pa dang drang zhing drang po'i rang bzhin can yul dbus su skye bar 'gyur te/_gang du bya ba dang mi bya ba shes shing chos dang chos ma yin pa shes par 'gyur ba dang /_gang du mi tshogs pa thams cad kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ba dang gang du chos dang ldan zhing chos kyi 
[\[183a.2\]]rjes su 'jug pa'i rgyal por 'gyur ba dang gang du 'jig rten gyi spyod pa smad pa med par 'gyur ba der skye bar 'gyur la/_skye bo kun gyi mig dga' zhing byis pa dang rgan po thams cad kyang dga' bar 'gyur/_lus rtag tu nad med pa dang gzugs bzang po dang ldan pa dang stobs 
[\[183a.3\]]dang ldan pa dang /_gang las kyang 'jigs pa med pa dang sems can thams cad dbugs 'byin pa dang bu dang chung ma dang ldan pa dang 'dod pa thams cad yang dag par 'byor pa dang /_nor rdzas kyi rnam pa la rgyal po'am chu'am me'am chom rkun gyi 'jigs pa dang dogs shing 'jigs 
[\[183a.4\]]pa gang nas kyang mi 'ong bar 'gyur ba mthong ngo /_/de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas la rtog par byed de/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas lha rnams kyi gnas sbyor ba la 'jug pa zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa 
[\[183a.5\]]mthong ngo /_/der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/_sems can dge bar gyur pa lta ba ma nor ba mang pos rtag tu las kyi 'bras bu'i de kho na nyid mthong ba rtag tu yang dag pa'i lta ba la yid zhen pa/_rtag tu 
[\[183a.6\]]drang po'i rang bzhin can gzhan la gnod pa mi byed pa/_rtag tu pha ma la gus pa rtag tu chos la phyir mi ldog cing spro ba/_sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la gus pa skyes pa gang gis srog gcod pa dang ma byin par len pa mi byed cing byed du mi 'jug la/_rjes su yi rang bar mi byed/_
[\[183a.7\]]pha rol byed pa yang phyir zlog par byed/_gzengs mi stod/_byas na yang smod par byed/_las kyi 'bras bu yang dag par ston par byed/_gzhan la de kho na nyid bstan pas gang legs par bya ba byas pa de rab tu gzengs stod par byed/_dge ba'i lam la rab tu 'jog par byed/_de 
[\[183b\]]
[\[183b.1\]]nas yang byed du 'jug/_byas pa la yang rjes su yi rang bar byed/_bdag nyid kyang srog gcod pa dang ma byin par len pa dag spangs la gzhan dag kyang de nyid la rab tu sbyor bar byed do/_/legs par byas pa'i lam rnam pa gnyis kyis gang sdom pa ma blangs pa de ni len du 'jug par byed la/_
[\[183b.2\]]gang blangs pa de ni brtan por byed du 'jug ste/_gnyi ga legs par bya ba byas pa bdag nyid dang gzhan nyid la phan pa byas pa de ni mtho ris su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/srog gcod pa spangs pa rnam pa du yod cig gu snyam na/_'di la srog gcod pa mi dge ba mi byed pa yin no/_/rnam pa ji 
[\[183b.3\]]lta bu/_rnam grangs du yod ce na/_'di la sems can gzhan la sems can du 'du shes nas srin bu phre'u dang grog sbur la sogs pa la 'tshe bar mi byed cing srog gcod par mi byed pa yin no/_/'di la srog gcod pa mi byed pa ni gang /_byi ba'am skyin gor ram 'ol pa'am [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]
[\[183b.4\]]dag g.yo thabs kyis 'dzin pa de dag phyir zlog par byed pa yin no/_/g.yo thabs kyi rnam pa du yod ce na/_'di la 'dzin par byed pa rnyong lta bus sam/_bu gar rgyas 'gebs pas sam rtswa'i dra bas sam rnyis sam 'brel bas sam rlubs kyis sam gdos kyis 'dzin par byed la/_bzung 
[\[183b.5\]]nas kyang srog gcod par byed pa de dag zlog par byed cing yang dag par dga' bar mi byed gzengs stod par mi byed 'di ltar srog chags dag gi srog gcod par ma byed cig ces zlog par byed cing chos la yang rab tu 'jog par byed de/_rnam pa de dag ni srog gcod pa la yang dag par 
[\[183b.6\]]chags pa'i srog chags zlog par byed pa yin no/_/ma byin par len pa spangs pa ji lta bu yin zhe na 'di la rtswa tsam la yang rku sems kyis mi rku la gzhan dag kyang zlog pa yin no/_/rnam pa du zhig ce na/_'di la ma byin par len pa'i mi kha cig de nyid la dga' ba'o/_/rnam pa du 
[\[183b.7\]]zhig yod snyam na/_'di la mchod rten la bud med dag dang lhan cig rol mo'i sgra byed pa dang gzhan dag bro gar byed gzhan dag glu dbyangs len gzhan dag yongs su spyod par byed dgod par byed rtse bar byed dga' dgur spyod par byed/_rab tu dga' bar byed pa dag la 
[\[184a\]]
[\[184a.1\]]chos dang mi ldan pa'i mi dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba dang gnas srung ba'am rol mo byed pa'am mchod rten las 'tsho ba dag_/rol mo'i sgra byed pa de dag las len tam ma byin par len pa gzhan byed dam yang rnam pa gzhan gyis ma byin par len pa byed pa'o/_/
[\[184a.2\]]'di la gla ni de la bud med rnams gla len pa yin te/_gla sbyin par byas nas/_'khrig par bya bar bos te/_'khrig pa dag byas nas ji ltar sngar dam bcas pa bzhin de ltar mi ster ba yin no/_/yang rnam pa gzhan gyis ma byin par len pa byed de/_'di ltar nya pa'am rngon 
[\[184a.3\]]pa'am shen pa dag las 'tsho ba rin sbyin par byas pa las mi ster ba yin te/_rin gyi rnam pa 'dis srog gcod pa dang ma byin par len pa yin na/_las de dag mi byed cing byed na yang rjes su yi rang bar mi byed la yid kyis kyang rtog par mi byed pa yin no/_/sbyin pa sbyin pa ji lta bu 
[\[184a.4\]]yin zhe na/_'di la tshegs chen pos 'tsho bar gyur kyang bsam gtan gsum pa 'thob pa'am gzhan dag la sbyin pa sbyin zhing bsod nams dag byed pa yin te/_rnam pa de lta bur phongs par gyur kyang gzhan la sbyin par byed pa ni/_ji ltar gzhan dag la sbyin par byed pa de ltar rang 
[\[184a.5\]]gi bu la yang yid kyi shes pa gus pas sbyin par mi byed de/_de ltar sbyin pa sbyin par byed do/_/srog gcod pa spangs nas tshul khrims la rab tu zhugs pa ji lta bu yin zhe na/_'di la ljan ljin phyags pas sems can dag srog chad par byed pa na phyir zlog par byed cing de nyid du chu 
[\[184a.6\]]ldugs par byed skam sa la phyung ba de dag kyang ljan ljin de nyid du phyir 'jug par byed pa yin te/_de dag ni srog gcod par mi byed pa dang dge ba la rab tu zhugs pa yin no/_/dge ba'i las 'di gnyis byas pa'i skyes bu dam pa de lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten 
[\[184a.7\]]sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/der skyes nas kyang las kyi mtha' spyad pa legs par byas pa 'dod pa thams cad la rnam par chags pa de lha'i sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i dbyangs nye bar len pa na/_lha mo'i tshogs sna tshogs kyis yongs su 
[\[184b\]]
[\[184b.1\]]bskor ba bde ba dpe med pa rjes su myong ngo /_/de'i dpe 'dir cung zad cig bya na 'di ltar gang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po gser gyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i shin tu bde bar gyur pa dag lha'i stan la gnas la lha'i bde ba de'i bcu drug gi char yang mi phod do/_/'di la lha sha dang rus pa dang 
[\[184b.2\]]chu ser dang bral ba ser sna dang bral ba mig 'dzums pa dang phye ba dang bral ba gos kyi rdul dang bral ba du ba dang khug rna 'dres pa dang bral ba bshang ba dang gci ba dang bral ba rang la 'od yod pa yin te/_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ni de lta bu ma yin no/_/rang gi bu dang chung ma la 
[\[184b.3\]]'dzin pa dang bral ba phrag dog dang bral ba rang gi bza' ba dang btung ba dang bral ba gnyid dang snyom pa dang bral ba yin la 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ni de lta bu ma yin te/_rnam pa 'dis 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po lha rnams kyi bcu drug gi char yang mi phod de/_de ltar mi'i 
[\[184b.4\]]rim pa mngon sum gyi cung zad cig dper bya ba yin no/_/de ltar lha rnams 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga 'byor cing ldan par gyur pa rnams kyis rtse zhing gnas so/_/der skyes pa'i lha de rnams kyi tshal kA bI ra zhes bya ba srid du dpag tshad bcu yod la zheng du dpag tshad lnga yod de/_kun 
[\[184b.5\]]nas gser gyi bya rnam pa sna tshogs du ma rnams kyis yongs su bskor ba/_kun nas gi wang gi thig les bkra bar brgyan to/_/de nas tshal de me tog bzang po rnams kyis shin tu rnam par mdzes par brgyan cing /_rin po che sna bdun gyi shing ljon pa rnams kyis brgyan pa yin 
[\[184b.6\]]te/_shing ljon pa de rnams kyi nang na bya gnas pa de dag shin tu rnam par mdzes pa yin no/_/dper na gser mgar dag gis rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs dang shing ljon pa sna tshogs kyi ri mo rnams kyis mi rnams kyi rgyan sdug gur byed pa de ltar lha de rnams kyi tshal de dang shing ljon pa 
[\[184b.7\]]de dag rnam par mdzes pa yin la bya'i gzugs dang kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs de rnams kyis brgyan pa yin te 'di ni cung zad cig 'dra ba'i dper bya ba yin no/_/de nas yang lha de rnams tshal de nyid na phan tshun pad ma rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis rtse bar byed de 'di lta ste/_kun 
[\[185a\]]
[\[185a.1\]]nas bai DUr+ya'i 'dab ma dang sbu gu dang ze ba dang lo ma rnams kyis rtse bar byed do/_/gang 'dab ma rnams kyi nang de dag na pad ma rA ga'i mdog lta bur shin tu dmar zhing shin tu dri zhim pa me tog de dag thams cad brtol nas dpag tshad brgyar 'byung la/_dri gang gis 
[\[185a.2\]]myos pa'i lha de dag kyang pad ma'i lo ma'i dris bcu 'gyur du lhag par myos par 'gyur ro/_/de nas yang kA bI ra'i tshal na lha dag lha mo'i tshogs dang lhan cig dga' bar byed dga' dgur spyod par byed do/_/de nas sems bskyed ma thag nyid du da ni bdag cag bza' ba chu ltar 
[\[185a.3\]]'bab pa dang btung ba chu ltar 'bab pa'i drung du 'dong ngo snyam sems so/_/de nas de dag sems bskyed ma thag nyid du gzhal med khang chen po pu shu dang rta babs sna tshogs dang dril bu g.yer ka 'khrol ba'i dra ba rnam pa sna tshogs dkrigs pa/_rin po che'i 'phan btags pa'i rta 
[\[185a.4\]]babs rnam pa sna tshogs dang gser dang shel dang rin po che dang ke ke ru'i ka ba sna tshogs btsugs pa dag bya ngang pas khyer ro/_/kha cig ni bya kA raN+Da bas khyer ro/_/kha cig ni phug ron gyis khyer ro/_/kha cig ni shang shang te'us khyer ro/_/kha cig ni bya tsa ko ras khyer ro/_/kha cig 
[\[185a.5\]]ni bya sna tshogs lhan cig gis khyer te/_rgyal mtshan de dag gi steng du 'dug pa/_las kyi mtha' spyad pa legs par byas pa'i lha rnams kA bI ra'i tshal chen po'i bza' ba dang btung ba chu bo ltar 'bab pa ga la ba der 'dong bar byed de/_rgyags par gnas pa rtse ba'i don du lha mo'i 
[\[185a.6\]]tshogs dang lhan cig zas dang skom chu bo ltar 'bab pa/_ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do/_/de nas zas dang skom gyi yul der phyin te/_lha de dag rin po che'i gzhal med khang de dag nas 'thung bar byed dga' bar byed yongs su spyod par byed de/_sil snyan dang rol mo'i sgra dang glu rnam 
[\[185a.7\]]pa sna tshogs kyis dga' bar byed do/_/de ltar de rnams yongs su spyod pa na yun ring du 'das kyang lha de rnams bde bar gnas pa des mi tshor ro/_/de dag gal te yun ring zhig lon nas kun dga' ra ba kun mthong mtho zhes bya ba ga la ba der lha'i tshal blta ba'i phyir 'dong bar byed de/_gzhal 
[\[185b\]]
[\[185b.1\]]med khang de rnams kyi nang na 'khod pa de dag lha gzhan dag dang lhan cig mtho bar phyin no/_/kun dga' ra ba kun mthong mtho zhes bya ba de na glu rnam pa sna tshogs len zhing rol mo'i sgra 'byin par byed/_bro rdung bar byed dgod par byed de phan tshun grogs su gyur pa rgyags pa gcig pu don du byed 
[\[185b.2\]]pa dag rtse bar byed do/_/de nas kun dga' ra ba kun mthong gi tshal de na lha gnas pa rnams mthong ste/_ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi phyogs gcig na gang tshal dang nye ba'i tshal gyis brgyan pa/_gser btso ma'i rdo leb 'bar ba spungs pa/_'bab chu dang chu bo dang stegs dang lteng 
[\[185b.3\]]ka dang zas dang skom chu bo ltar 'bab pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/_lha mo'i tshogs rnam pa sna tshogs grangs med pas kun du gang ba/_thams cad dang 'thun pa'i las kyi 'jig rten gyis bzung ba/_ri bo stong phrag drug cus yongs su bskor ba/_brtsegs mtho chen po na 
[\[185b.4\]]lha dang lha ma yin dang mi'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po gnas pa/_dge ba du ma'i las kyi mtha' spyad pa'i lha rnams gnas pa/_dge ba'i las rnam pa sna tshogs mngon du gyur pa/_rtse mo rin po che sna bzhis brgyan pa/_gnas dang gnas dag tu lha rnams 'dong ba na cha byad dang rgyan sna tshogs 
[\[185b.5\]]dang gzugs snying du sdug cing yid du 'ong ba dang ldan pa/_lha rnams phan tshun grogs su gyur cing sems shin tu 'dod chags dang ldan pa/_phan tshun bag med par gnas pa'i sa phan tshun gtam shin tu snyan pa nyams dga' ba sna tshogs zer ba na/_cha byad dang gzugs dang kha zas 
[\[185b.6\]]dang gnas pa tha ma dang 'bring dang khyad par du 'phags pa dag mthong ngo /_/de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag cag 'ba' zhig la bde ba yod pa ma yin gyi/_lha gzhan dag la yang shin tu nyams dga' ba'i ngo bo lha mo rnams kyi tshogs dang rtse bar byed dga' dgur spyod par byed 
[\[185b.7\]]do snyam ste/_de ltar sna tshogs lha rnam pa du ma dang dpag bsam gyi shing mdog dang ro dang gzugs dang dri rnam pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa dang gzhan yang tshal dang nye ba'i tshal dag mthong ngo /_/de nas yang lha rnams gnas gzhan du dong ste phyin nas lha gzhan ri brtsegs mtho 
[\[186a\]]
[\[186a.1\]]ba dang brtsegs pa chen po 'bab chu dang chu bo dang lteng ka sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa dag mthong ste/_ri gang gi rtse mo dag la nyi zla 'khor zhing 'gro ba de dag la yang rtog par byed do/_/de nyi ma rab tu snang ba'i gzugs brnyan brgya'am yang na stong du snang ste gang du 
[\[186a.2\]]sgra gcan zin gyi lag gis bzung ba ni snga ma bzhin no/_/de nas yang gzhal med khang na gnas pa'i lha de dag nam mkha'i steng nas 'gro zhing yid la ngo mtshar skyes pa de bzhin du lha mo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing bro gar dang sil snyan dang bcas pa/_sil snyan 
[\[186a.3\]]yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i glu dbyangs len cing ri'i rgyal po de thams cad skor bar byed do/_/de dag gis ri'i rgyal po tshal dang nags tshal dang ri khrod dang bcas pa de thams cad mthong nas/_de nas yang rang gi gnas de dag nyid du dong ste phyin pa dang sil snyan yan 
[\[186a.4\]]lag lnga dang ldan pas bro rdung bar byed/_dgod par byed dga' dgur spyod par byed do/_/bde ba'i rnam pa'i myos pas myos pa dus du ma rnam par chags pa la dga' ba dag tshal dang nags tshal dang lteng ka rnams su 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga 'byor cing ldan par gyur pa dag gis 
[\[186a.5\]]rtse bar byed do/_/de ltar de dag yun ring du yongs su 'das kyang dus tshod mi shes te thams cad du yid bag med pa'i dbang du gyur pa dag khong du mi chud do/_/yang de dag rtse ba na/_ri kun nas dga' ba zhes bya ba rgyar dpag tshad lnga la 'phang du dpag tshad bcu yod pa de la kha cig gzhal 
[\[186a.6\]]med khang gi steng du 'dug/_kha cig bya'i steng du zhon nas 'dzeg par byed do/_/ri kun nas dga' ba de rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/_stegs dang nye ba'i tshal dang lteng kas brgyan pa/_stegs kyi rim pa 'bum snyed dang pad ma'i tshal brgya snyed kyis brgyan pa/_ri 'byung 
[\[186a.7\]]khungs sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/_rin po che sna bdun 'od 'byung bas brgyan pa/_dpag bsam gyi shing dag 'bar ba de na lha de dag rtse bar byed dga' dgur spyod par byed de/_cong dang rnga dang sil dkrol dang gling bu dang glu dag gis myos pa phan tshun grogs su gyur pa/_rang gis byas pa'i 
[\[186b\]]
[\[186b.1\]]las kyi 'bras bu la spyod pa rnams rtse bar byed yongs su spyod par byed do/_/de dag dus yun ring du rtse bar byed kyang bag med pa la gnas pa dag khong du mi chud de/_yul gyis kun nas bslang ba de dag nyid kyis tshim pa med cing shin tu sdug pa'i bde bas rnam par rmongs pa de dag me tog ku ba 
[\[186b.2\]]la'i tshal du 'dong bar byed do/_/me tog ku ba la'i pad ma rnams kyi kha rab tu bye ba de yang bung ba 'bum snyed kyis gang ba yin te/_bung ba de dag nyid dang lhan cig 'dod pa'i bde ba tshim pa med pas chang 'thung zhing glu len no/_/'dod pa dag gis brgya'am yang na stong du tshim pa med 
[\[186b.3\]]pa la lag na rol mo'i sgra sna tshogs thogs shing rtag tu myos par gnas pa/_phan tshun rgyags pa du ma don du byed pa de dag skyed mos tshal chen po 'dod pa nges par thob ces bya ba ga la ba der 'dong ngo /_/tshim pa med pa de dag ji srid du 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba byas shing 
[\[186b.4\]]bsags pa'i las de zad par ma gyur pa de srid du/_bag med pa la gnas pa dag phan tshun rtse bar byed dga' dgur spyod par byed do/_/de phyis lha'i 'jig rten de nas 'chi bar 'gyur te/_shi nas kyang las nye bar 'gro ba ji lta ba bzhin sems can dmyal ba dang [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang dud 'gro 
[\[186b.5\]]rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyis mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mi'i nang du skyes na/_las de dang rgyu 'thun par de rtag tu na ba med cing bzhin gyi mdog bzang bar 'gyur/_rgyal pos bkrabs pa'am tshong pa'am khyim 
[\[186b.6\]]bdag rnams kyis brdung bar mi 'gyur/_shin tu bde zhing yid la rig pa'i blo gsal bar 'gyur ba mthong ngo /_/de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas la rtog par byed de/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas 
[\[186b.7\]]lha rnams kyi gnas zhib tu dpyod pa zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo /_/der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na skyes bu dge ba bdag dang gzhan la phan par zhugs pa g.yo med pa/_gzhan la gnod pa 
[\[187a\]]
[\[187a.1\]]mi byed pa/_mi drang po'i rang bzhin can/_mi'i las su gyur pa/_gang gis dge ba'i las kyi ngo bo nyid byas pa/_rnam par smin pa bde ba/_bsil ba/_rnam par smin pa bsil ba/_bde ba/_bkra shis pa/_rnam par smin pa bkra shis pa/_skye bo thams cad kyis 
[\[187a.2\]]mchod pa/_skye bo thams cad kyi sdug pa/_'jig rten 'di dang 'jig rten pha rol tu bde ba byed pa/_skyes bu gang 'jig rten 'di nas 'gro zhing 'jig rten pha rol tu pha mar gyur pa/_skyabs su gyur pa/_bde ba du ma 'byung bar gyur pa/_bde ba byas pa skye bar gyur pa ni legs par byas pa 
[\[187a.3\]]de'i las kyis byed par 'gyur te/_'di lta ste srog gcod pa dang ma byin par len pa mi byed cing byed du mi 'jug la/_byed du mi gnang nyes par byas pa'i tshul khrims la dad pa dang thad kar lhan cig gnas shing 'dre bar mi byed dga' bar yang mi byed tshul khrims 'chal pa de dang lhan cig 
[\[187a.4\]]rnam par byang ba 'thun par mi sgrub la/_'di ltar tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang lhan cig rtag tu dga' bar byed/_de dang lhan cig 'dre bar byed/_de dang rnam par byang ba 'thun par sgrub/_de dang thad kar 'dug par yang byed/_de dang lhan cig rtse zhing 'jig rten gyi spyod pa byed/_chos 
[\[187a.5\]]dang chos ma yin par sems par byed de/_skyes bu dge ba de bdag nyid sdig pa dag mi byed la/_sdig pa'i grogs po dang lhan cig dga' bar mi byed/_thams cad kun nas yongs su dag par byed pa'i skyes bu dam pa/_shin tu tshul khrims 'chal pa dag kyang dge ba'i lam la rab 
[\[187a.6\]]tu 'jog par byed cing yang dag pa'i lam ston par byed 'gro ba'i zhing bzang po la dge ba'i las kyi sa bon 'debs par byed/_de kun nas sems gser ltar sbyangs shing dri ma med pa'i sems dge ba'i las kyi mtha' spyad pa'i bde ba ni/_tshe 'di dang pha rol la 'thob cing so so yang 
[\[187a.7\]]dag par myong bar 'gyur ro/_/srog gcod pa spangs pa ji lta bu rnam pa ni du zhig yod ce na/_'di la kun nas 'dod par bya ba me tog gi rgyu dag bskyed par bya ba'i don du/_du ba dang dug bsres pa bzhag nas srog chags dun du ba'am 'ol ba'am sha sbrang chen po'am rkang brgya pa 
[\[187b\]]
[\[187b.1\]]dag la reg par byas nas gsod par byed pa ni/_'di ltar bdag gi me tog gi rgyu'am lcug ma gzings pa'am me tog gam 'bras bu dag mi nyams par bya'o snyam nas/_srin bu gsad pa'i phyir du bas gsod pa dang 'bra go dang rgun 'brum rnyis pa'i nang na srin bu'i rnam pa yod pa lag 
[\[187b.2\]]gis gnod par mi byed la/_btung ba ma brtags par 'thung zhing de las skyes pa'i srin bu yang gsod na de ltung bar 'gyur te/_srin bu de rnams dang srog chags de dag kyang so sor brtags nas 'thung bar byed la yun ring du bzhag pa/_drod gsher las chung ngur skyes pa'i 
[\[187b.3\]]'jigs pa dang myos byed las skyes pa'i 'jigs pas kyang 'thung bar mi byed pa yin te/_rnam pa phra mo de dag ni srog gcod pa spangs pa yin no/_/ma byin par len pa spangs pa ji lta bu/_rnam pa du/_rnam pa ni ji lta bu yin zhe na/_'di la rtag tu lo nyes byung bar 'dod pa de lo nyes byung 
[\[187b.4\]]na bdag gis 'gron bu'i khe brgyad 'gyur du thob par bya'o/_/yul ma ga d+hA'i gzhal bre yang shin tu chung bar 'gyur/_gang gi nas dang gro la sogs pa dang 'bru zhag drug cus smin pa la sogs pa yang mi 'byung la bdag gcig pu'i yod par gyur cig snyam du de ltar sems so/_/
[\[187b.5\]]sems can rnams kyi bar chad bya bar sems te/_de ltar bdag gis srog chags rnams gtse bar bya'o/_/bsdu bar bya'o snyam ste de yang dang yang du de ltar bsams pa dang gal te sems can rnams kyi skal ba chung ba des/_dus ngan pa zhig byung ba dang dga' la yid shin tu 
[\[187b.6\]]dga' nas ji ltar bdag gis bsams pa de ltar bdag dga' bar byed pa 'ongs so snyam nas/_de bre mi 'thun pa dang yon tan dang bral ba brtson 'grus nyams pa'i yon tan mi 'thun pas nas dang gro dang 'bras sA lu dag gis gzhan la slu bar byed do/_/de ltar gang gi tshe 
[\[187b.7\]]sems par byed pa las kyi nyer bsdogs yin no/_/gang gi tshe slu bar byed pa de'i tshe las yin no/_/gang gi tshe srog chags dag bslus nas sems la 'dod par byed la dga' bar byed pa de'i tshe las kyi mjug yin te/_ji skad bshad pa'i nyes pa dag spangs shing mi byed pa 
[\[188a\]]
[\[188a.1\]]yin no/_/'byor pa nyung bar gyur kyang gzhal blugs kyi g.yo dag gis gzhan la slu bar mi byed la gzhan byed na yang rjes su yi rang bar mi byed/_gal te lo nyes byung ba'i tshe bdag nyid tshong pa zhig byed na yang de ji lta ba bzhin de ltar 'tshong bar byed la/_chos dang 
[\[188a.2\]]ldan zhing chos kyi bsam pas rnyed pa'i rin thob par byed de/_de ltar de srog gcod pa dang ma byin par len pa spangs pa yin no/_/mi dge ba la zhugs pa dge ba la rab tu 'jug pa ji lta bu yin zhe na/_'di la skyes bu dam pa legs par spyod cing dge ba spyod pa rtag tu bdag la phan 
[\[188a.3\]]pa dang gzhan la phan par byed pa/_'byor pa nyung bar gyur pa/_tshegs chen pos 'tsho ba/_tshegs chen pos 'byor pa dag sbyin pa po dang sbyin bdag gi drung du 'dug ste/_de dag la slob par byed/_sbyin pa'i 'bras bu dag kyang shes la/_sbyin pa'i 'bras bu de kun du ro myong bar byed/_
[\[188a.4\]]kun du myangs nas kyang yang dang yang du mgon med cing nyon mongs sdug bsngal ba'am bsam gtan gsum pa thob pa'am de dang 'thun pa'am de la zhugs pa la sbyin pa byed pa yin te/_de ni legs par byas pa'i las kyi mtha' spyad pa rnams kyis chos dang 'thun pa'i longs spyod bsgrubs 
[\[188a.5\]]nas de gsum gyis sbyin par byed do/_/gsum ni gang gi tshe sbyin pa sbyin par bya'o snyam du sems pa de'i tshe las kyi nyer bsdogs yin no/_/gang sbyin par byed pa de las yin no/_/gang gi tshe byin nas yid kyis ro myong bar byed cing de ltar yid la sems pa de'i tshe las kyi mjug yin no/_/
[\[188a.6\]]de ltar dge ba stong nyis brgya bya ba byas pa de lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten zhib tu spyod pa'i gnas su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/der skyes nas kyang dge ba'i las kyi mtha' spyad pa de las zhib mo des yid la ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin bdag nyid kyi ngo bo che ba'am chung bar 
[\[188a.7\]]'gyur ro/_/lha'i gnas de dag kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi shing ljon pa rnams mdog shin tu gsal zhing rang gi dge ba'i las kyis dri ma med pa yin no/_/tshal de yang srid du dpag tshad nyi shu la zheng du dpag tshad bcu yod de/_chu bo dang 'bab chu dang lteng ka dang tshal dang nye ba'i 
[\[188b\]]
[\[188b.1\]]tshal dang nang gi tshal rnams kyis shin tu gang ba shin tu blta na sdug pa yin la/_shing ljon pa rnams kyis tshal gang yin pa 'di dri ma med pa dang gsal ba yin te/_de yal ga dang lo ma dang 'dab ma rnams kha dog dang me tog sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/_gser btso ma'i mdog 
[\[188b.2\]]dang mtshungs pa kha cig dngul gyi mdog lta bu dang gzhan dag bai DUr+ya'i mdog lta bu yin no/_/tshal dang tshal gyi shing ljon pa de rnams kyi lo ma dang 'dab ma dang shing gzhon nu dang yal ga dang yal ga phra mo me long lta bu'i nang dag tu lha de rnams kyi ngo bo gsal bar snang ste/_'di lta ste shing 
[\[188b.3\]]gcig gi nang du snang ba de bzhin du shing ljon pa 'bum rnams kyi nang du yan lag dang nying lag thams cad snang ste/_lha'i lus de gcig pu las kyi gzugs brnyan dang 'thun par shing ljon pa 'bum phrag du ma dag gi nang na snang ngo /_/yang shing ljon pa de rnams kyi ngo mtshar ba gzhan ni/_
[\[188b.4\]]ji tsam du las kyi rnam pa dman pa dang 'bring dang khyad par du 'phags pa gang dag gis lha de dag las kyi rnam par smin pa dang bcas pa yin te/_de yang las byas pa ji lta ba bzhin shing ljon pa de rnams kyi shun pa dang rtsa ba dang yal ga dang lo ma dang 'dab ma'i nang na thams cad snang 
[\[188b.5\]]ngo /_/de nas lha'i rgyal po brgya byin lha dang lha mo'i tshogs 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor ba/_lus thams cad me tog gi phreng ba dang byug pas rnam par brgyan pa/_nyi ma 'bum pas lhag pa'i 'od 'bar ba/_tshal der 'dong bar byed do/_/de nas zhib tu spyod pa'i lha 
[\[188b.6\]]rnams brgya byin de 'ong ba mngon du mthong nas gus pa dang bcas pa'i sems kyis lha'i rgyal po brgya byin ga la ba der dong ste/_phyin nas brgya byin la gsong por smras shing spyi bor thal mo sbyar te mchod nas yid la gus pa dang bcas pa thams cad tshal ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do/_/
[\[188b.7\]]de nas lha'i rgyal po brgya byin la snyan pa dang phan pa'i sems thams cad kyis mchod de/_lha dang lha mo'i tshogs dge ba'i las kyi mtha' shin tu rgya che ba spyad pa de dang lhan cig yongs su bskor nas bde bar gnas par bya ba'i phyir tshal ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do/_/de bya sna tshogs 
[\[189a\]]
[\[189a.1\]]skad 'byin pas shin tu gang ba/_gser gyi shing ljon pa rnams kyis brgyan pa'i tshal der phyin te/_las 'thun pa mngon sum du gyur pa de dag kyang las kyi chos kyi rnam par smin pa mngon par mthong nas brgya byin des 'di ltar tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_ljon pa 
[\[189a.2\]]sna tshogs 'di rnams ni/_/dge ba'i las kyis mngon du gyur/_/yi ge med kyang shin tu 'thun/_/mkhas pa rnams ni rjod par byed/_/rnam par smin pa gang gang gis/_/gang dang gang du skye 'gyur ba/_/mi yis de dang de dag tu/_/dge ba'am yang na mi dge 'thob/_/skye bo dge ba'i 
[\[189a.3\]]las kyis su/_/rtag par lha rnams nang du skye/_/de bzhin mi dges mi tha ma/_/sems can dmyal bar lhung bar gyur/_/dge dang mi dge dag la chags/_/'dod can 'dod pas rmongs pa rnams/_/gang dag nges par 'byung 'gyur ba/_/'chi ba khong du mi chud do/_/ljon pa rnams la mngon 
[\[189a.4\]]pa gang /_/'di ni dge ba'i rnam smin te/_/bde bas yid ni rmongs pa dag_/bde las dga' ba 'bral mi nus/_/yul 'dod pa yi srog chags rnams/_/'dod pa'i ro yis rab myos pa/_/gang gis bcings pa'i lus can ni/_/dra ba ldan pas rtag tu gnod/_/ji ltar 'jig rten dag 
[\[189a.5\]]gi me/_/tsha dang lhan cig skye ba ltar/_/bud med mi bzad 'dod chags dang /_/nges par lhan cig skye bar 'gyur/_/ji ltar bud med las byung me/_/lus can rnams kyi snying 'jug pa/_/me 'di gang zhig byung ba ni/_/de ltar tsha bar mi 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten thams cad rnam 'jig cing /_/
[\[189a.6\]]chos ni thams cad zad byed la/_/sems can dmyal ba 'di yi rgyu/_/bud med yin zhes drang srong gsung /_/bud med khar ni tshig snyan smra/_/snying ni gdug pa'i dug dang mtshungs/_/yid du 'ong la'ang 'dug mi byed/_/de la mi ni su zhig dga'/_/yud tsam gyis ni dga' byed la/_/de bzhin yud 
[\[189a.7\]]kyis dga' mi byed/_/snying du sdug pa'ang gnas mi byed/_/brtan pa med de glog dang mtshungs/_/slu bar byed pa'i sgyu la mkhas/_/rtag tu bya ba lhur byed cing /_/rtag tu yid la phrad par 'dod/_/rtag tu nga rgyal 'ba' zhig sems/_/lha dang mi dang sha za dang /_/lto 'phye rnams dang srin po yi/_/
[\[189b\]]
[\[189b.1\]]'ching bar gyur pa bud med de/_/shin tu mi bzad dug dang mtshungs/_/phan pa med dang rigs med dang /_/mthu rtsal che ba'ang dran mi byed/_/sems ni gnas pa med pa ste/_/bud med rlung gi shugs dang mtshungs/_/gang du phun sum tshogs gyur pa/_/der ni bud med chags byed la/_/
[\[189b.2\]]dbul bar gyur dang 'dor byed de/_/skyes pa nges par gtong bar byed/_/skyes pa gang dang gang phrad pa/_/de la bud med chags 'gyur zhing /_/de ni myur zhing ches myur bar/_/gtong ste mi 'thun gnas par byed/_/ji ltar bung ba me tog dag_/skams na thams cad gtong bar byed/_/de 
[\[189b.3\]]ltar nor dang bral ba yi/_/mi ni bud med rnams kyis gtong /_/snying ni mi bzad ral gri 'dra/_/mun pas khebs pa brtan pa med/_/gang gi rgyu yis bud med rnams/_/skyes pa 'jig pa'i phyir skyes so/_/ji ltar bud med 'ching byed pa/_/lha rnams la ni 'ching gzhan med/_/bud med 
[\[189b.4\]]'ching bas bcings pa dag_/sems can dmyal bar ltung bar byed/_/bud med las byung 'dod chags gang /_/'dod chags nang na 'di che ste/_/bud med 'dod chags yid bsregs pa/_/phyi nas me yis sreg par byed/_/'dod chags kyis ni nyams pa'i mi/_/las rnams kyang ni 
[\[189b.5\]]mngon sum ste/_/bud med 'dod chags rnam rmongs pa/_/rmugs pa'i snying gis mi rig go/_/skyes pa dang ni yid gcugs shing /_/dga' ba du ma byas nas su/_/sbrul gyi pags pa 'dor ba ltar/_/bud med kyis ni glo bur 'dor/_/thabs kun gyis ni bud med bsgrubs/_/thams 
[\[189b.6\]]cad du ni yongs bskyangs kyang /_/bud med shin tu mi bzad pa/_/bdag gir bya bar mi nus so/_/de ltar rang bzhin de yin te/_/bud med rnams ni sems mi brtan/_/skyes pa brtan pa'i sems kyis su/_/de la nam yang yid mi rton/_/de nas lha'i dbang po de'i kha nas thos shing las 
[\[189b.7\]]legs par byas pa gang yin pa'i lha de dag gis/_brgya byin gyi tshig de thos nas yid la byed pa dang bral zhing skyo ba skyes pa rnams/_skyo ba skyes nas 'di ltar tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_ji ltar brgya byin de bzhin te/_/de nyid mtshan nyid khyod kyis gsungs/_/bud med zhags par gyur 
[\[190a\]]
[\[190a.1\]]pa'i sems/_/bdag cag gis ni ma rtogs so/_/de nas brgya byin gyis lha de dag las tshigs su bcad pa de thos nas/_tshal de bya sgra snyan pa 'byin cing nyams dga' ba gzhal med khang du mas brgyan pa 'bab chu dang chu bo dang lha'i rol mo'i sgra rnar snyan cing yid du 'ong ba/_gser 
[\[190a.2\]]btso ma lta bu'i [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyis rnam par brgyan pa lha dang lha mo'i tshogs kyis kun tu gang ba ga la ba der/_lha'i rgyal po kau shi ka de lha'i tshogs dang lhan cig bde ba la gnas par bya ba dang lha'i bde ba nyid la yang dang yang du spyad par bya ba'i phyir 'dong bar byed de/_de tshal de na 'dod pa'i 
[\[190a.3\]]yon tan lnga rnams dang yang dag par ldan zhing shin tu nyams dga' ba/_dbang po mchog thams cad yul thams cad la rnam par dga' ba'i bde ba myong bar byed do/_/de dag kyang spyad nas ri rab kyi rtse mo spos brtsegs zhes bya ba rin po che sna bdun 'bar ba lha'i 'byung khungs mu tig gi phreng 
[\[190a.4\]]ba rnams kyis rnam par brgyan pa ltar 'bab chu dang chu bo bye ma mu tig lta bu rnams kyis nye bar brgyan pa/_chu bo de dag gi 'gram gnyi ga na lha'i bya sgra 'byin cing shin tu blta na sdug pa/_yid du 'ong zhing nyams dga' ba de dag na lha'i rgyal po brgya byin de lha mo'i tshogs kyis yongs su 
[\[190a.5\]]bskor nas/_lha cha byad dang gzugs sna tshogs dang ldan pa rnams rjes su 'brang zhing rtse bar byed do/_/de der yang yun ring du sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pas rtses nas/_gzhal med khang skyed mos tshal gyis brgyan pa spyi bo zhes bya ba ga la ba der 'dong bar byed de/_lha dang lha mo'i 
[\[190a.6\]]tshogs yid rab tu dga' ba dang lhan cig der dong ste phyin pa dang gang lha gzhan 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas yid phrogs pa dag gnas gzhan dag na rtse bar byed la/_de dag skyed mos tshal spyi bo ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do/_/gzhal med khang dang skyed mos tshal phun sum tshogs pa de 
[\[190a.7\]]yang ri bo thams cad bas 'phang mtho la/_'di ltar 'thab bral ba'i lha rnams kyi drung nas 'od gsal ba cung zad 'byung ste/_ji ltar mi'i gnas bzhi rnams su ri rab las 'od gsal ba 'byung ba de ltar 'thab bral ba'i lha rnams kyi drung nas 'od gsal ba phyis 'byung ngo /_/'jig rten 
[\[190b\]]
[\[190b.1\]]spyi bo pa la 'od cung zad kyang med kyang 'jig rten spyi bo pa de stong gyur du mdzes pa yin no/_/de nas der yang brgya byin gyis dus yun ring du rtses nas de nas yang de bzhin du lha dang lha mo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor te lha'i 'dun sa chos bzang ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do/_/zhib tu spyod 
[\[190b.2\]]pa'i lha de dag kyang lha'i gnas de dag na/_ji srid du 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba byas shing bsags pa'i las de zad par ma gyur pa de srid du 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga 'byor cing ldan par gyur pa rnams kyis rtse bar byed dga' dgur spyod par byed do/_/de phyis lha'i 'jig 
[\[190b.3\]]rten de nas 'chi bar 'gyur te/_shi nas kyang las nye bar 'gro ba ji lta ba bzhin sems can dmyal ba dang [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang dud 'gro rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyis mi rnams kyi nang du skyes na/_las de dang rgyu 'thun par 
[\[190b.4\]]de rtag par mchog tu bde ste rgyal po'am blon po chen por 'gyur/_rtag tu skra zhib mo sdug gur 'khyil ba dang rtag tu yid shin tu zab pa dang thams cad kyis dka' bar bya ba rnams la don dang ldan par shes pa dang rab tu mang por mi smra zhing nyung ngur smra ba dang rtag tu shin tu gos 
[\[190b.5\]]gtsang zhing dkar ba dang /_chung ma mi g.yem pa dang /_khyim thab kyi gnas la dga' zhing khyim thab la dga' la phyi rol du mi 'khyam pa dang /_rtag tu sbyin pa la dga' zhing sems shin tu drang ba dang /_rang gi 'khor dang mdza' bshes dang /_rtsa lag la dga' ba dang /_bla ma la 
[\[190b.6\]]dga' ba dang /_tshes grangs la dga' ba dang /_rang gi bud med la dga' ba dang /_tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang gzhan gyi bud med la mi dga' ba dang /_spos dang phreng ba la dga' ba dang /_sdig pa'i grogs po la mi dga' ba dang /_rigs dma' bar mi skye ba dang /_gzugs 
[\[190b.7\]]dang cha byad dang rgyan bzang por 'gyur ba mthong ngo /_/de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas la rtog par byed de/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas lha rnams kyi gnas glu'i sgra la shin tu dga' zhing mngon par 
[\[191a\]]
[\[191a.1\]]chags pa zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo /_/sa der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/_bdag la phan pa dang gzhan la phan pa'i phyir sems dge ba las dge ba sems dri ma dang bral zhing gsal 
[\[191a.2\]]ba/_lus dang ngag gi las kyi mtha' dge ba/_las kyi mtha' spyad pa dge zhing 'dod pa/_gtan du phan par 'dod pa/_snying rje'i bdag nyid can las dang 'bras bu la dad pa/_yang dag pa'i lta ba dang yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang /_tshul khrims kyi yon tan gnyis la rab tu zhugs 
[\[191a.3\]]pa/_rkog ma yin par byed pa/_sems ma g.yengs pa/_spyod pa ma g.yengs pa/_sdig pa'i grogs po'i ngang tshul can ma yin pa/_mar 'dzin pa/_phar 'dzin pa/_dge sbyong du 'dzin pa/_bram zer 'dzin pa/_gang gi las kyi nyer bsdogs dang las dang las kyi mjug dang gsum ste/_
[\[191a.4\]]tshul khrims de dag kun kyang shin tu yongs su dag par byas/_tshul khrims kyi yon tan gnyis kyang bsrungs/_srog gcod pa dang ma byin par len pa yang rnam par spangs pa yin no/_/srog gcod pa shin tu bsrungs pa rnam pa du yod ce na/_'di la nas dang gro dang 'bras sA lu rnams 
[\[191a.5\]]kyi nang na sems can srin bu phra mo skyes pa dag rang thag la mi 'thag la/_de ltar srog chags de dag shin tu bsrung ba'i phyir ram/_ma byin par len pas 'jigs pa'i phyir/_nas dang gro de dag kyang 'tshong bar mi byed/_ba lang dang rta dang rnga mo dang /_bong bu dag la khur bkal bas rgyab 
[\[191a.6\]]snad pa dang de dag la srin bu byung ba rnams chu'am rtsab mos 'khru zhing srin bu mi shi ba'i cho ga yang byed de/_'di ltar bya sgro rnams kyis blangs nas/_sha nyams pa gzhan la srin bu de dag 'jog par byed/_chos ma yin pa'i 'jigs pas 'di ltar ba lang dang rta dang rnga mo dang bong bu dag 
[\[191a.7\]]la gnod par ma gyur cig_/srin bur gyur pa'i srin bu rnams kyang 'chi bar ma gyur cig ces de ltar gnyi ga'i srog srung bar byed/_srog chags phre'u dang grog sbur la sogs pa yang shin tu srung bar byed/_rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du kun la phan par 'dod pa/_nyin mo dang 
[\[191b\]]
[\[191b.1\]]mtshan mo yid la bag med par mi byed/_srog chags rnams la yid kyis kyang 'khu bar mi byed/_sems can pha rol la dang po nas sems can gyi 'du shes bskyed de/_srog chags phre'u dang grog sbur la sogs pa de dag kun du srung bar byed cing gnas skabs thams 
[\[191b.2\]]cad du dge ba'i las kyi mtha' spyod pa yin te/_de dag ni srog gcod pa srung ba yin zhing de dag ni srog gcod pa spangs pa yin no/_/ma byin par len pa spangs pa ji lta bu yin/_rnam pa ni du yod ce na/_'di la de ltar dge ba'i las kyi mtha' spyod pa de sems can sbal ba'am sre mo'am 
[\[191b.3\]]khyi'am wa bzung ba de dag zas gzhan gyis thar bar byed do/_/thar bar byas nas kyang sha rjen za ba de dag la zas de dag sbyin par byed do/_/bkres pa de dag kyang de dag nyid za bar byed de/_de ltar srog chags de dag kyang shin tu bsrungs pa yin no/_/de ni lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 
[\[191b.4\]]'gyur la de ltar ma byin par len pas ni lha rnams kyi nang nas shi nas dud 'gro rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur te rnam pa de dag ni ma byin par len pa spangs pa yin no/_/bdag nyid kyis kyang spangs la gzhan dag kyang dge ba'i lam la rab tu 'jog par byed/_dge ba la ma zhugs 
[\[191b.5\]]pa yang dge ba'i lam la rab tu 'jog par byed/_zhugs pa'ang yang dang yang du gzengs stod par byed/_las kyi 'bras bu nye bar ston par byed/_rgyur byed/_khong du chud par byed de/_rnam pa de dag ni srog gcod pa dang ma byin par len pa spangs pa yin no/_/legs pa la 
[\[191b.6\]]'jug pa ji lta bu yin zhe na/_'di la 'byor pa nyung bar gyur kyang chos rtogs pas 'tsho ba/_sbrang rtsi dang sbrang bu'i sbrang rtsi'i phyir sems can gsod pa dag nor zas byin nas sbrang bu rnams kyi srog skyob pa yin te/_de ni sems can rnams kyi srog sbyin pa yin no/_/ma byin par len 
[\[191b.7\]]pa spangs shing /_sbyin pa la mngon par dga' ba ji lta bu yin zhe na/_'di la de ltar tshegs chen pos 'tsho ba chos dang ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa de/_bsam gtan bzhi thob pa'am gzhan dag la zas sbyin pa dang de bzhin du tshegs chen pos 'tsho bas srog chags dag dgra'i 
[\[192a\]]
[\[192a.1\]]lag tu song ste/_mtshon gyis 'khrug cing bsad du dogs pa na de thar bar byed pa yin no/_/sbyin pa rnams kyi nang na mchog ni 'di yin te 'di lta ste/_chos sbyin pa'am srog sbyin pa yin la de gnyi ga'i sbyin pa dag tu gyur pa/_skyes bu dam pa de gzhan dag kyang de 
[\[192a.2\]]ltar byed du 'jug_/byas pa la yang rjes su yi rang bar byed pa de ni dge ba'i tshul khrims la rab tu zhugs pa yin no/_/tshul khrims dang ldan pa de lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du glu'i sgra la shin tu dga' zhing mngon par chags 
[\[192a.3\]]pa'i gnas su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/der skyes nas kyang dge ba'i las kyis sprul pa de la mchod pa byed de/_'di ltar gang shin tu rgya che ba thams cad dang ldan pa'i tshal 'di thams cad mngon par brgyan pa/_'di thams cad legs par byas pa'i las kyis bskyod pa yin te/_lha'i 
[\[192a.4\]]gnas 'di gom gang tsam yang gang legs par byas pa'i las kyis ma sprul pa'am gang du lha rnams kyis ma rtses pa'am der bde ba'i rnam pa spyad nas ma shi ba'am rang gis byas pa'i las kyi 'bras bu zad nas nyams par ma gyur pa med de/_gang du bdag cag gi lus mngon sum du 
[\[192a.5\]]gyur kyang sred pa'i zhags pas bcings pa/_sred pas rnam par bsgyur ba/_yang dang yang du rnam par bslus pa rnams yid 'byung bar mi byed do/_/de ltar de brgya byin gyis mthong nas yang dang yang du tshal de dag nyid ga la ba der bde bar gnas par bya ba'i phyir 'dong bar byed do/_/
[\[192a.6\]]de skal ba nges par myong bar byed pa/_me tog dang 'bras bu dang lcug ma 'phyang bas khebs pa'i shing ljon pa sna tshogs dang bza' ba dang btung ba chu bo ltar 'bab pa phun sum tshogs pa ga la ba der lha'i tshogs dang lhan cig 'dong bar byed do/_/tshal gyi phyogs der yang lha mo'i 
[\[192a.7\]]tshogs dang lhan cig rtses nas/_skyed mos tshal myos 'gro 'dul zhes bya ba ga la ba der bde bar gnas par bya ba'i phyir 'dong bar byed do/_/de nas brgya byin lha de dag dang lha gzhan rnams dang yang lhan cig tu gzhal med khang myos 'gro 'dul zhes bya ba ga la ba der 'dong bar byed 
[\[192b\]]
[\[192b.1\]]do/_/de nas brgya byin gyis skyed mos tshal de mngon par mthong nas khyed cag skyed mos tshal 'di ltos shig ces smras so/_/lha rnams kyis brgya byin mthong lags so zhes smras so/_/de nas yang brgya byin gyis lha rnams la sngon byung ba'i rabs rjod par byed de/_'di ltar bdag gis 
[\[192b.2\]]tshal 'dir lha rnams kyi nang du sngon gyi rabs thos te/_bcom ldan 'das 'khor ba 'jig gis lha rnams la chos bshad pa 'di lta ste/_thog mar yang dge/_bar du yang dge/_tha mar yang dge ba/_don bzang po/_tshig 'bru bzang po/_yongs su rdzogs pa/_yongs su byang 
[\[192b.3\]]ba'i chos bstan te 'di lta ste/_'di yod pas 'di 'byung /_'di skyes pa'i phyir 'di skye/_'di 'gag pa'i phyir 'di 'gag go/_/gang zhig yod na ci zhig 'byung zhe na 'di lta ste/_'dod pa rnams yod na nyes dmigs 'byung la/_'dod pa rnams med na nyes dmigs mi 'byung ste/_lha 
[\[192b.4\]]dag 'di ni yod pas 'di 'byung ba yin no/_/gang zhig med na ci zhig mi 'byung zhe na/_lha dag 'di lta ste/_'dod pa rnams med na 'dod pa'i nyes dmigs rnams mi 'byung ste 'di ni 'di med pas 'di mi 'byung ba yin no/_/gang zhig 'gag na ci zhig 'gag ce na/_sred pa 'gags 
[\[192b.5\]]pas 'dod pa'am 'dod pa'i nyes dmigs 'gags te/_lha dag 'di ni 'di 'gags pas 'di 'gag pa yin no/_/lha dag gzhan yang 'di yod pas 'di 'byung la/_'di med pas 'di mi 'byung ba ni 'di lta ste/_sred pa'i rkyen gyis 'dun pa sngon du 'gro ba 'byung la/_'dun pa'i 
[\[192b.6\]]rkyen gyis 'dun pa skyed pa yid la byed pa mi 'thun pa 'byung ngo /_/de la 'dun pa gang yin pa de ni bya ba'i bsam pa yin no/_/rmongs pa tshol ba gang yin pa de ni ma rig pa yin no/_/ma rig pas rmongs pa yang dang yang du yul rnams la tshim pa med pa gang yin pa de ni sred pa yin no/_/
[\[192b.7\]]gang tshim pa med pa'am tshol ba gang yin pa de ni 'dod chags yin te/_lha dag 'di yang 'di yod pas 'di 'byung ba yin no/_/gang zhig med na ci zhig 'byung zhe na 'di lta ste/_sred pa med na tshim pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid mi 'byung ste/_'di yang 'di 'gags pas 'di 'gag pa yin no/_/lha dag 
[\[193a\]]
[\[193a.1\]]gzhan yang 'di yod pas 'di 'byung la 'di med pas 'di mi 'byung ba ni 'di lta ste/_byas shing bsags pa'i las rnam par smin pa 'byung la/_byas shing bsags pa'i las med na rnam par smin pa mi 'byung ste/_lha dag 'di yang 'di yod pas 'di 'byung la 'di med pas 'di 
[\[193a.2\]]mi 'byung ba yin no/_/lha dag gzhan yang 'di yod pas 'di 'byung la 'di med pas 'di mi 'byung ba ni 'di lta ste/_mig la yang brten gzugs la yang brten nas yid la byed pa sngon du 'gro ba'i mig gi rnam par shes pa 'byung ste lha dag 'di yang 'di yod pas 'di 'byung ba yin no/_/
[\[193a.3\]]gang zhig med na ci zhig mi 'byung zhe na 'di lta ste/_gzugs kyang med mig kyang med yid la byed pa yang med na mig gi rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ste/_lha dag 'di yang 'di med pas 'di mi 'byung ba yin no/_/lha dag gzhan yang 'di yod pas 'di 'byung ba ni 'di lta ste/_bye ma dang 
[\[193a.4\]]'jim pa dang 'khor lo dang skud pa dang chu la sogs pa rgyu la brten nas bum pa 'byung bar 'gyur te/_lha dag 'di yang 'di yod pas 'di 'byung ba yin no/_/yang gang zhig med na ci zhig mi 'byung bar 'gyur zhe na 'di lta ste/_bye ma dang 'jim pa dang 'khor lo dang skud pa dang chu la 
[\[193a.5\]]sogs pa rgyu rnams med na bum pa mi 'byung ste/_'di yang med na 'di mi 'byung ba yin no/_/lha dag gzhan yang 'di yod na 'di 'byung ba ni 'di lta ste/_'du ba yod na 'bral ba 'byung ste/_'di yang 'di yod na 'di 'byung ba yin no/_/gang zhig med na ci zhig mi 'byung zhe na 'di lta 
[\[193a.6\]]ste/_'du ba med na 'bral ba'i sdug bsngal mi 'byung ste/_lha dag 'di yang 'di med pas 'di mi 'byung ba yin no/_/lha dag gzhan yang 'di yod pas 'byung ba ni 'di lta ste/_skye ba yod na 'chi ba 'byung la/_skye ba med na 'chi ba mi 'byung ste/_lha dag 'di yang 
[\[193a.7\]]yod pas 'di 'byung la 'di med pas 'di mi 'byung ba yin no/_/lha dag gzhan yang 'di yod pas 'di 'byung ba ni 'di lta ste/_'dod chags kyi me yod na nges par gdung bar 'gyur te/_ji ltar me yod na nges par sreg pa yod pa bzhin no/_/lha dag 'di yang 'di yod pas 'di 
[\[193b\]]
[\[193b.1\]]'byung ba yin no/_/gang zhig med na ci zhig mi 'byung zhe na 'di lta ste/_'dod chags med cing 'dod chags kyi me med na 'dod chags kyi gdung ba mi 'byung ste/_ji ltar me med na sreg pa mi 'byung ba bzhin no/_/lha dag 'di yang 'di med na 'di mi 'byung ba yin no/_/lha dag 
[\[193b.2\]]gzhan yang 'di yod na 'di 'byung ba ni 'di lta ste/_pha ma dang khu chu dang khrag dang nges par 'byung ba skye ba dang mngal du skye bar 'gyur ba'i las nges pa dang dri za nye bar len pa yod na skye ba 'byung ba yod de/_lha dag 'di yang 'di yod pas 'di 'byung ba yin no/_/gang zhig med na 
[\[193b.3\]]ci zhig mi 'byung zhe na 'di lta ste/_pha ma yang med khu chu dang khrag kyang med yang dag par myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyang med na mngal du nye bar len pa sngon du 'gro ba mi 'byung ste/_lha dag 'di yang 'di med pas 'di mi 'byung ba yin no/_/lha dag gzhan yang 'di yod pas 'di 'byung la 'di 
[\[193b.4\]]med pas 'di mi 'byung ba ni 'di lta ste/_tshu rol yod na pha rol yod pa yin no/_/gang zhig med cing ci zhig mi 'byung zhe na 'di lta ste/_tshu rol med na pha rol med de lha dag 'di yang yod na 'di 'byung la/_'di med na 'di mi 'byung ba yin no/_/de ltar phan tshun rkyen dang bcas pa nye 
[\[193b.5\]]bar bzung nas brtags pa yin te/_phan tshun rkyen dang bcas pas 'dus byas thams cad 'byung zhing 'brel bar 'byung ba la brten nas 'byung ste 'di lta ste/_ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams/_'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa ste/_de ltar rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba 
[\[193b.6\]]thams cad rgya cher khong du chud par bya'o/_/lha dag de yang bcom ldan 'das des myos 'gro 'dul gyi gzhal med khang chen po der mi'i nyin zhag bgrang ba'i tshul gyis lo lnga stong du chos bshad do/_/'dir bdag gis khyed la phyogs gcig tsam zhig bshad pa 'di yin te/_de ltar gang 
[\[193b.7\]]gA'i klung gi bye ma ltar rgya che ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'thun te chos kyi lus ni gcig yin no//_//'phags pa dam pa'i chos dran pa nyer bar bzhag pa/_bam po sum cu bdun pa/_de nas bcom ldan 'das des lha dung phyur phrag_
[\[194a\]]
[\[194a.1\]]bdun dag gi zag pa zad par mdzad cing mig dri ma dang bral ba bskyed nas/_de nas yang 'dzam bu'i gling ga la ba der gshegs so/_/der gshegs nas mi rnams la yang thugs rje dam pas chos ston te 'di lta ste/_ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams zhes 
[\[194a.2\]]rgya cher khong du chud par bya'o/_/der yang sems can la phan par bzhed pa des mi rnams kyi zag pa du ma zad par mdzad de/_de ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das lha dang mi rnams la chos 'chad pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa yin no/_/de bzhin du brgya byin des lha de rnams 
[\[194a.3\]]la smras nas/_gzhal med khang chen po myos 'gro 'dul zhes bya ba ga la ba der dong ste phyin pa dang pad ma'i rdzing bya kha dog sna tshogs dag dang rin po che sna bdun gyi pad ma rnams kyis nye bar bskor ba mthong ngo /_/rin po che sna bdun gyi pad ma yang 'dab ma kha dog sna tshogs dang cha 
[\[194a.4\]]byad sna tshogs dang dbyibs dang cha byad dang ldan pa dang /_nyi ma shar ba lta bu'i mdog rnams kyis brgyan pa yin no/_/gang du pad ma dang bai DUr+ya'i shing ljon pa'i 'od kun du 'byung ba rnams kyis gzhal med khang chen po de nye bar brgyan te/_rab tu gsal ba yin no/_/gzhal med 
[\[194a.5\]]khang chen po de 'od sngon pos rnam par mdzes shing gser gyi lo ma rnams dang 'od dmar pos kyang rnam par mdzes pa yin no/_/de nas yang gzhal med khang chen po de nyid na khyim dang nye ba'i tshal rnam pa gzhan gyis mdzes pa yin te/_khyim dang nye ba'i tshal de ni rab tu dbye ba 
[\[194a.6\]]du mas brgyan pa/_rin po che sna tshogs kyis bkra bar byas pa/_rin po che sna bdun gyi shing ljon pa rnams dang /_khyim dang tshal rnams kyis brgyan pa/_shin tu nyams dga' zhing mthong na yid du 'thad pa gang yin pa dag mthong nas/_brgya byin yang ngo mtshar cher skyes 
[\[194a.7\]]so/_/de'i dbus na mtsho chen po yod de/_gser btso ma lta bu'i chu rnams kyis mdzes par byas pa/_phye ma du mas bkra bar byas pa/_bya kha dog sna tshogs can rnams kyis brgyan pa yin no/_/de nas lha de dag sil snyan sna tshogs kyi sgra 'byin cing 'gro ba na bro rdung /_glu len 
[\[194b\]]
[\[194b.1\]]rtse dgod/_phan tshun yid gcugs pa dag mtsho rnam par rgyal byed ces bya ba der dong ngo /_/de nas lha dag shin tu bag med pa de dag rnam par rgyal byed na gnas pa'i bya rnams kyis mthong nas 'di ltar tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_ji ltar pad ma'i tshal dag tu/_/rjen za bya 
[\[194b.2\]]rgod mdzes ma yin/_/de bzhin zhi ba'i dgon pa ru/_/mi dge spyod pa mi mdzes so/_/ji ltar nyi ma 'od grang na/_/log par gyur te mi 'thun ltar/_/bag med lha rnams ga la zhig_/zhi ba'i tshal du ga la dga'/_/sred dang bral ba'i bde ba dang /_/sdug bsngal grol ba'i 
[\[194b.3\]]skyob pa gang /_/bde ba de yi khyad par las/_/bde ba'i grangs su mi rtsi'o/_/rab tu myos med bsam gtan pa/_/kun tu zhags las grol ba yi/_/bde gang de ni bde mchog ste/_/sred pas bslu ba 'di ma yin/_/tshal 'di thub pas bstan pa ste/_/shin tu bsgoms 
[\[194b.4\]]pa rnams kyis bstan/_/lha mchog 'dod chags yid byed kyi/_/bsten par 'os pa ma yin no/_/khyod kyi bde ba gang yin 'di/_/de ni rtag par ma yin te/_/sred pa med pas bsten pa gang /_/de ni zhi mchog bde ba yin/_/gang zhig thob nas sdug bsngal kun/_/thams cad du ni 
[\[194b.5\]]gcod par 'gyur/_/gnas mchog rtog pa gang yin pa/_/tshal 'di nges par sten pa yin/_/ngan g.yo spyod cing zhim za la/_/brkam chags kyis ni sems bslus pa/_/shin tu bsgoms pa zhi ba'i tshal/_/dga' ba bsten par mi 'os so/_/dge ba'i yul du zhi ba nyid/_/
[\[194b.6\]]bsgoms pa'i sems ni dga' byed kyi/_/'dod chags spyod pa rnams kyi sems/_/tshal gyi gnas su mi dga'o/_/gang zhig rtag tu sems zhi ba/_/mi de tshal du dga' 'gyur gyi/_/'dod chags kyis ni sems dkrugs pa/_/tshal rnams su ni dga' mi 'thob/_/dmigs 
[\[194b.7\]]pa lnga yis 'jigs byed pa/_/sred pa nyid kyis sreg mi 'gyur/_/sred las rnam grol dri med pa/_/ngan song grong khyer mi 'gro'o/_/skye ba yod na rtag tu 'chi/_/nad med med na nad yod cing /_/phun sum sdug bsngal lhan cig skye/_/gzhon nu dag kyang rtag tu rgas/_/sdug 
[\[195a\]]
[\[195a.1\]]pa kun dang bral 'gyur zhing /_/rtag tu 'du ba med par shes/_/'di ni rtag tu 'jig rten chos/_/yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bshad/_/rtag tu srid gsum nyam nga bar/_/gang gi blo ni mi rmongs pa/_/skyes bu dam pa de yis ni/_/zhi ba'i tshal du dga' ba 
[\[195a.2\]]'thob/_/kun rtog 'dod chags mi brtan pa/_/rtag tu 'dod chags la sogs bsgribs/_/bde ba 'byung ba zhi ba'i tshal/_/zhi ba de nyid 'thob mi 'gyur/_/gang zhig rtag tu yid zhi zhing /_/tshal du rnal 'byor bsam gtan pa/_/de dag rtag par tshal du dga'/_/'dod 
[\[195a.3\]]chags tshol ba ma yin no/_/tshal rnams su ni bsgoms pa'i sems/_/grong dag tu yang g.yo mi 'gyur/_/de bas rtag tu tshal bsten bya/_/grong khyer gyis ni gnod mi 'gyur/_/mi yi 'dod chags la sogs 'di/_/grong khyer dag tu rnam par g.yeng /_/rmongs pa mi brtan 
[\[195a.4\]]g.yengs pa de/_/tshal du phyir zhing dong bar byed/_/gang phyir sdig dang bral ba de/_/bral ba'i yid kyis bsten bya ste/_/de bas mchog tu zhi ba'i tshal/_/rnal 'byor rnams kyi gnas chen yin/_/sems dang dbang po rab zhi ba/_/rnal 'byor snying la dga' ba gang /_/de ni brgya 
[\[195a.5\]]byin stong snyed kyi/_/shin tu dga' bar mi 'gyur ro/_/thams cad du ni rnam byang ba/_/rnal 'byor pa yi dga' mthong gang /_/rtag tu 'dod chags rjes 'gro ba/_/'thab bral ba yang de ma mthong /_/'dod pa'i dbang song dga' ba gang /_/de ni rtag tu sdug bsngal 'byung /_/nyon 
[\[195a.6\]]mongs bcom pa'i dga' ba gang /_/de ni rtag tu dga' ba yin/_/'khor ba thog ma med pa nas/_/dgra rnams su ni sems 'byung ste/_/de ni bcom nas dga' 'byung gang /_/de la 'dod pas ga la gnod/_'dod pa las byung dga' ba ni/_/sdig bcas sdug bsngal 'bras bu 
[\[195a.7\]]tsha/_/gang zhig 'dod las rnam grol ba/_/de ni dga' ba mchog yin no/_/de la brten nas rnal 'byor pa/_/'gro ba mchog tu 'gro bar 'gyur/_/'dod pas byas pa'i dga' ba yis/_/'chi med gnas su khrid mi 'gyur/_/sten pa'i tshe na mngar la dga'/_/rnam par smin pa me 
[\[195b\]]
[\[195b.1\]]dang mtshungs/_/'dod las byung ba'i dga' ba ni/_/rtag tu sems can dmyal bar 'gro/_/sten pa'i tshe na mngar la dga'/_/bar du kun nas dga' 'gyur te/_/mthar yang zhi zhing dri med pa/_/'chi ba med pa'i gnas su 'gro/_/thog ma bar dang mthar dge gang /_/rtag 
[\[195b.2\]]tu ma ltar sdug pa yin/_/de ni spangs nas byis pa dag_/'dod pa'i yul la ci phyir chags/_/bar dang mtha' ngan sdug bsngal dang /_/rtag tu skyon gyi glong gis bsgribs/_/bde ba 'byung ba ma mthong gang /_/de ni byis pas ci phyir bsten/_/ji ltar dug gi snye ma la/_/
[\[195b.3\]]dga' ba reg na 'bar ba 'byung /_/de ltar 'dod pas dga' byas pa/_/yongs su byung na dug dang mtshungs/_/ji ltar me yis sreg pa na/_/'bar bar 'gyur te zhi med cing /_/sreg pas kyang ni gzhan gsod de/_/'dod byas dga' ba de dang mtshungs/_/phye ma leb kyis 
[\[195b.4\]]'bar ba mthong /_/tshig pa'i nyes pa mi mthong ste/_/de ltar 'dod bskyed dga' ba ni/_/blo med rnams kyis mthong bar 'gyur/_/'dod chags bskyed pa'i gdung ba gang /_/'dod pa pa rnams rtag tu sreg_/phye ma leb ni 'tshig pa ltar/_/thams cad du ni mi mthong ngo /_/de bas 
[\[195b.5\]]'dod pa'i dug spangs te/_/lha rnams ye shes rtag dga' zhing /_/tshe ni don med mi bya la/_/khyed cag bag med ma 'gro zhig_/bag med pa yis rnam rmongs pa/_/skyes bu thams cad chags par 'gyur/_/de ni phyi nas bral ba na/_/de tshe gdung bas gdungs par 'gyur/_/rtag 
[\[195b.6\]]tu 'dod pas rnam rmongs pa/_/de ni dge ba'i las mtha' zad/_/'dod pa rmongs pas bslus pa ni/_/sum cu gsum nas dmyal bar 'gro/_/ji srid 'chi ba mi 'ong dang /_/ji srid sems nyid rdzogs pa ni/_/de srid chos la yid kyi don/_/nye bar zhi ba dag tu 'gyur/_/sred chu shin tu 
[\[195b.7\]]mi bzad pa/_/mtho ris kyi ni yul du 'bab/_/rnam rtog shugs ltar mi brtan zhing /_/nyes gsum bro ba lta bu 'byung /_/bag med pa ni chu ltar zab/_/bud med 'dod chags nya lcibs 'dra/_/glu dang sil snyan sgra myur mtshungs/_/de ni rdo ltar mi brtan no/_/sbrul lta bu yi yul gyis 
[\[196a\]]
[\[196a.1\]]khebs/_/yid ni myur ba'i rlabs dang 'dra/_/lha rnams 'dod chags kyis bslus pa/_/rmongs pa de dag 'jug par byed/_/'di ltar de ni mi mthong ste/_/blo med pa dag 'jug par 'gyur/_/ji ltar dug gi ljon shing gi/_/me tog bung ba rnams 'jib pa/_/de ltar 'di 
[\[196a.2\]]ni dug 'dra ste/_/rmongs pa rnams ni bde la spyod/_/bung bas dug ni 'thungs pa dag_/gal te kha cig 'tsho 'gyur gyi/_/'dod pa'i dug ni 'thungs pa yis/_/'tsho ba rnyed pa dka' bar 'gyur/_/nyes gsum skum shing lta bu byung /_/bag med rlung shugs ldan pa 'dra/_/sreg pa 
[\[196a.3\]]me 'drar lha yi tshogs/_/sreg par byed kyang mi rig go/_/nyes pa las byung sa 'di ni/_/bag med pa yi gsing mas bsgribs/_/rang gis byas pa rmongs pa'i lha/_/rmugs pa rnams ni rtag tu rgyu/_/bag med pa rnams 'dod pa'i rgyu/_/yul dag mi brtan mi bzad de/_/brtan po de 
[\[196a.4\]]la yid ma rton/_/'di ltar de ni rmi lam 'dra/_/rmi lam dmyal ba'i rgyu ma yin/_/'dod pa'i rmi lam rgyu yin te/_/de bas 'dod pa 'di spongs la/_/rtag tu legs par spyad pa spyod/_/tshal ni legs pa shin tu spyad/_/nyes par spyad pa'i mi yis min/_/'di ltar de dang 'brel ba 
[\[196a.5\]]ni/_/legs pa'i gnas zhes brjod pa yin/_/'dod pa tshol ba'i lha kun gyis/_/gnas ni gang zhig ma thob pa/_/brtan po bag yod pa la dga'/_/mi yis gnas de 'thob par 'gyur/_/de ltar brgya byin de tshal myos 'gro 'dul du 'jug pa na tshigs su bcad pa smras nas/_
[\[196a.6\]]yang tshal de nyid ga la ba der dong ste phyin pa dang tshal de dge ba spyad pa du ma dang slob pa dang mi slob pa'i skye bo bsod nams sna tshogs byas pas gtsang ba/_drang srong chen po bcom ldan 'das 'khor ba 'jig gi drung du gang byung ba legs par byas pa'i las kyi mtha' spyad pa de 
[\[196a.7\]]rnams kyis bsten pa yin no/_/de nas lha'i rgyal po brgya byin lha'i tshogs dang lhan cig yongs su bskor te/_lha'i sil snyan rnam pa sna tshogs kyi sgra rnams kyis dga' bzhin du 'jug par byed do/_/de la 'jug pa na tshal des tshal de dag thams cad kyi mdzes pa zil gyis 
[\[196b\]]
[\[196b.1\]]mnan nas/_rnam par gnas pa de mthong ste/_ji ltar ri bo stong phrag drug cu rnams kyi nang na ri'i rgyal po ri rab rnam par mdzes pa de ltar ches shin tu mdzes pa yin no/_/ji ltar lha'i dbang po brgya byin de lha de rnams kyi nang na ches shin tu rnam par mdzes pa de lta bu'i rim pa kun 
[\[196b.2\]]gyis tshal de dag zil gyis mnan cing sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i tshal dang nye ba'i tshal de dag thams cad zil gyis mnan nas mdzes pa bzang ba yin no/_/brgya byin de lha'i tshogs thams cad kyis yongs su bskor nas 'dzam bu'i gser gyi tshal/_gser gyi lan kan gyi dra bas 
[\[196b.3\]]yongs su bskor ba dang gser gyi shing ljon pa thams cad kyis yongs su bskor ba ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do/_/de nas brgya byin gyis lha de dag la smras pa/_kye lha dag sdug pa thams cad zil gyis mnan nas rnam par gnas pa/_lteng ka dang 'bab chu'i dngo dang tshal 
[\[196b.4\]]dang chu bo du ma phun sum tshogs pa'i tshal 'di la ltos/_kye lha yon tan kun gyis yongs su bskor ba mthong lags te/_drang srong chen po de'i thugs dang zhing sku gsal ba mtshungs pa med pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang 'thun pa/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis yongs su 
[\[196b.5\]]bsgoms pa'i shing ljon pa'i tshal dang nye ba'i tshal 'di dag la bdag cag kyang ngo mtshar cher gyur to/_/gang du lha'i tshogs kyi shin tu ches bde ba lhag par bde ba dpe med pa/_rnam pa du ma dag kyang mngon par zil gyis mnan te/_skyes bu kha lo sgyur ba dam pa 'di zhi ba mchog tu 
[\[196b.6\]]'das kyang da dung du 'bras bu'i lhag ma 'di de ring gi 'bras bu lta bur mchis so/_/de nas yang lha'i rgyal po brgya byin tshal khang pa brtsegs pa'i tshal zhes bya ba tshal chen po de nyid kyi phyogs gang du/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhugs bzhugs pa de ga la ba der 'gro bar byed do/_/de nas khang 
[\[196b.7\]]pa brtsegs pa bzhi 'bum gyis yongs su bskor ba/_rin po che sna bdun la 'di lta ste/_an da rnyil dang /_rdo rje dang /_ma rgad dang /_spug dang /_bai DUr+ya rnams las byas pa/_kha khyer bye ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_rgyal mtshan dang ba dan rnam pa sna tshogs bsgreng ba/_
[\[197a\]]
[\[197a.1\]]ba dan dmar po phra mo sna tshogs kyis bskor ba/_kun nas tshal de rab tu bro rdung ba lta bur rnam par mdzes pa yin te/_khang pa brtsegs pa de rnams kyi nang na thams cad mkhyen pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa de de ltar mdzes pa yin no/_/ji ltar 'dzam bu'i gling na dbyar gyi 
[\[197a.2\]]dus sam ston gyi dus su nam mkha' la sprin med pa na nyi ma dang zla bas gza' dang skar ma'i tshogs thams cad kyi 'od zil gyis mnan nas/_dbus na mdzes pa de ltar khang pa brtsegs pa de dag thams cad kyi 'od zil gyis mnan nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi khang pa brtsegs pa de rnam 
[\[197a.3\]]par mdzes pa yin no/_/de la yang dang yang du rnam pa de lta bu'i 'od 'byung ste/_'di ltar brgya byin 'ba' zhig ma gtogs par khang pa brtsegs pa'i 'od rab tu 'bar ba de la lha gang yang yun ring du lta bar mi nus te/_dper na 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams so ga rab tu tsha ba'i nyi ma'i 
[\[197a.4\]]gung la nyi ma yun ring du blta bar mi nus pa ltar/_khang pa brtsegs pa 'di yang de lta bu yin no/_/de nas brgya byin khang pa brtsegs pa der song ste phyin nas lha rnams la smras pa/_lha dag khang pa brtsegs pa'i 'od la ltos/_lha'i mchog mthong lags so/_/'di ltar bcom 
[\[197a.5\]]ldan 'das skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa de nyan thos som nyi dang bral ba/_bden pa mthong ba/_gnyi ga'i cha las rnam par grol ba/_mngon par shes pa drug dang ldan pa/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi bsgoms pa 'bum phrag bzhi rnams dang thabs cig tu lha rnams la phan pa dang 
[\[197a.6\]]bde ba'i phyir tshal dang gzhal med khang myos 'gro 'dul ba 'dir gshegs so/_/de dbyar zla ba bzhir gnas 'dir bzhugs nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams la chos bshad de/_'di ltar 'di ni gzugs so/_/'di ni gzugs kun 'byung ba'o/_/'di ni gzugs 'gag 
[\[197a.7\]]pa'o/_/'di ni gzugs 'gag par 'gyur ba'i lam mo/_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams la kun 'byung ba/_rtag tu nyes dmigs 'byung ba rim bzhin du bshad do/_/de ltar bcom ldan 'das des rim gyis lha rab tu myos shing /_/rab tu bag med par gnas pa/_
[\[197b\]]
[\[197b.1\]]'chi ba'i sdug bsngal la mi lta ba/_rgyags pa 'ba' zhig don du byed pa'i lha rnams la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir rang gi mtshan nyid dang spyi'i mtshan nyid kyis chos ji lta ba bzhin bshad do/_/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das des rnam pa gzhan gyis lha bag med par gnas pa rnams la 
[\[197b.2\]]rjes su bstan pa 'di ltar tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/_bag med 'khor ba'i rtsa ba ste/_/de bzhin lha yi gnas kyang yin/_/bag med dug gis myos pa gang /_/de dag srid pa nyam ngar bying /_/bag med rnams las grol ba gang /_/de ni srid pa'i mtsho las rgal/_/
[\[197b.3\]]bag med mun pa'i rtsa ba ste/_/ma rig mun pa byed pa yin/_/mun pa yis ni rmongs pa gang /_/de dag la ni mig med do/_/'di ltar snang ba'i gzhi po ni/_/me dang nyi ma yin par brjod/_/de ltar rmongs pa rnams kyi gtso/_/bag med yin par yongs su brjod/_/bag med 
[\[197b.4\]]pa yi mes gdungs pas/_/de yid ni rnam par g.yo/_/gang gis rmongs pa'i byis pa dag_/sems can dmyal bar rab tu 'gro/_/bag med pa yis rmongs pa'i lha/_/bud med dbang gyur mi brtan pa/_/'bral dang sdug bsngal brjed nas su/_/'du ba dang ni bde 
[\[197b.5\]]ba 'dod/_/sdug bsngal che la nye bar gnas/_/'tsho ba'i mtha' ni 'chi ba yin/_/bde ba'i mtha' ni mi brtan ltung /_/'du ba'i mtha' yang 'bral bar 'gyur/_/bde mtha' rtag tu ltung ba dang /_/lang tsho'i mtha' ni rga ba ste/_/lus can kun ni las kyi mtha'/_/dge dang mi dge 
[\[197b.6\]]las kyis su/_/lus can thams cad bcings gyur pa/_/phyi nas ro bro med par shes/_/'di dag 'gro ba tha dad par/_/gar mkhan bzhin du gar byed de/_/las kyi gar gyis bcings pa dag_/'di ni 'khor bar rtag tu 'khyam/_/brtan po de la yid ma rton/_/las 'gror rtag tu 
[\[197b.7\]]ma 'gro shig_/thabs rnams kun gyis dug lta bur/_/bag med yongs su spang bar gyis/_/bag med pa las grol ba ni/_/srid gsum mtsho las rgal ba yin/_/de ltar bcom ldan 'das 'khor ba 'jig des lha khri phrag dgu btul cing /_bag med par ro bro ba dang bral ba 
[\[198a\]]
[\[198a.1\]]mtho ris thams cad du bstan te/_lha'i bya ba chen po yang mdzad/_gnas 'di yang rjes su bzung nas de nas yang slob ma de dag nyid dang lhan cig tu 'dzam bu'i gling ga la ba der gshegs so/_/de nas brgya byin gyis de ltar ma lus par de thams cad lha de dag la bsnyad 
[\[198a.2\]]nas khang pa brtsegs pa de ga la ba der dong ngo /_/de nas khang pa brtsegs pa rin po che du mas rnam par brgyan pa/_ji tsam du rin po che'i rnam pa shin tu khyad par du 'phags pa'i rnam pa de snyed kyis brgyan pa der zhugs so/_/lha de rnams kyis kyang sngon ma mthong ste/_de nas lha 
[\[198a.3\]]de dag ngo mtshar du gyur par rig nas/_de nas yang brgya byin des lha de dag la 'di skad smras so/_/khang pa brtsegs pa rin po che rnams kyis mdzes par byas la sngon ma mthong ba 'di la khyed cag ltos/_brgya byin mthong lags so/_/rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa 'di dag ni/_
[\[198a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das de la 'thab bral gyi lha dad par gyur pa rnams kyis 'dir phul ba yin la de dag gi mthus 'di blta bar mi nus te lha de dag gi mthu ni de lta bu yin no/_/de dag kyang ji ltar khyed cag bzhin shin tu bag med pa yin no/_/de nas smad par bdag nyid kyis rig cing legs 
[\[198a.5\]]par byas pa'i las kyang nyams par rig par lha de dag kun gyis rgyags pa bcom ste/_gus pas mgo bo smad thor tshugs rab tu g.yos/_mig dang bzhin rab tu dga' bar gyur pa thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyi khang pa brtsegs pa de la phyag 'tshal bar byed do/_/de ltar 
[\[198a.6\]]yid la skyo ba skyes pa rnams kyi las nyams par bdag nyid kyis rig nas/_skyo ba skyes pa gang kha cig gis ni byang chub tu sems bskyed/_kha cig gis ni rang sangs rgyas su/_kha cig gis ni nyan thos kyi byang chub tu/_kha cig ni bcom ldan 'das de la dad pa cher skyes so/_/de 
[\[198a.7\]]nas brgya byin gyi sngon na 'dug pa'i lha de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das la yid dad pa skyes so/_/de nas lha'i rgyal po brgya byin yang rang gcig pu gang du bcom ldan 'das de bzhugs shing gnas la chos kyang bstan pa'i gzhal med khang de nyid du song nas/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[198b\]]
[\[198b.1\]]'khor ba 'jig de'i gzims cha rdo rje lta bu dang yo byad phun sum tshogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs rmad du byung ba gang yin pa de dag la dpyod par byed do/_/'di ltar gzims cha 'di dag gi nang na bcom ldan 'das bzhugs bzhugs pa yin no/_/snyam nas de dag la yang brgya byin de 
[\[198b.2\]]gus pas mgo btud de lus thams cad kyis phyag 'tshal zhing /_bcom ldan 'das de la gus pa chen pos gzims cha'i gdan gyi gzhi de la phyag 'tshal bar byed do/_/des de la phyag 'tshal te langs pa dang rtsig ngos dag la 'di ltar tshigs su bcad pa de bris pa mthong ba/_
[\[198b.3\]]g.yang sar lhung ba'i gang zag ni/_/gal te 'tsho bar 'gyur yang srid/_/bag med par ni ltung ba dag_/nam yang bde skal mi 'thob bo/_/gal te las rnams thams cad la/_/gang zag shin tu bag med pa/_/de ni nyin dang mtshan dag tu/_/nam yang dge bar mi 'gyur ro/_/
[\[198b.4\]]'jig rten cung zad bde gang dang /_'jig rten 'das pa'i 'dod pa gang /_/de dag bag med pa yis 'jig_/de bas de ni yongs su spongs/_/bag yod bdud rtsi'i gzhi yin la/_/bag med 'chi ba'i gzhi yin te/_/bag yod pas ni mi 'chi zhing /_/bag med pas ni rtag tu 
[\[198b.5\]]'chi/_/bag yod pas ni lha rnams kyi/_/gtso bo mchog dang ldan par 'gyur/_/bag med 'khor ba'i gzhi yin la/_/bag yod 'khor ba'i pha rol 'gro/_/de lta bas na bag med spongs/_/thams cad du ni bde ldan 'gyur/_/gang zhig rtag tu bde 'dod cing /_/sdug bsngal 
[\[198b.6\]]las ni 'jigs pa gang /_/bag med mi la dug dang 'dra/_/de yis bag med rnam par spongs/_/skye bo bya ba ngan byas pa/_/bag med nyid la mngon dga' ste/_/bag med dug gis rmongs pa rnams/_/g.yang sar rab tu ltung bar 'gyur/_/bag yod gzhan du legs par 'gyur/_/
[\[198b.7\]]bag med pa lta ga la zhig_/bag yod pa yis bde 'gyur la/_/bag med pas ni sdug bsngal te/_/bde dang sdug bsngal gzhi 'di dag_/thams cad bsdus te bshad pa yin/_/yon tan skyon dag rnam shes gang /_/de ni gang bzang len par byed/_/de nas brgya byin gyis tshigs 
[\[199a\]]
[\[199a.1\]]su bcad pa de dag smras nas/_de nas yang gus pa chen po skyes pa'i yid rab tu gsal bas bcom ldan 'das de nyid la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de nas yun ring du bag yod pa bsngags shing bag med pa smad nas yang lha de dag ga la ba de nyid du song ngo /_/de nas lha rnams kyang 
[\[199a.2\]]brgya byin de mthong nas/_de dag gus pas [{]rings [,]ring [}]thabs su brgya byin ga la ba der dong ngo /_/de nas brgya byin gyis kyang de dag gi nang du tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras te/_'di ltar tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag ni bdag cag la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir/_bcom ldan 'das don mdzad 
[\[199a.3\]]par bzhed pa des bris pa yin no/_/de dag thos nas yid rab tu dang ba'i lha de dag kun kyang bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal zhing 'di skad kyang smra ste/_'di ltar bcom ldan 'das de nges par skye bo'i mig yin te/_des bdag cag gi don du tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs 
[\[199a.4\]]pa lta zhes smras nas/_de dag de na yun ring zhig tu shin tu bag yod par gyur to/_/de nas gzhan yang lha dag gis sil snyan dang rol mo'i sgra dbyangs rnam pa shin tu mang po dag blangs pa dang de nas lha de dag gis 'di ltar 'di dag ni zhib tu spyod pa'i lha dag skyed mos tshal du dga' 
[\[199a.5\]]spyod byed du 'dong ste/_gnas 'dir dong zhing sil snyan dang rol mo'i sgra dbyangs sna tshogs nye bar len la/_lha mo'i tshogs rnam pa du ma glu dbyangs len zhing 'dir 'ong ngo snyam du de dag rig nas/_gang lha de dag skyed mos tshal du dga' spyod byed du 'dong bar bdag cag kyang de dag gi 
[\[199a.6\]]drung nyid du nges par 'dong bar bya'o snyam mo/_/de nas de ltar rig nas bag med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis phrogs pa rnams/_de nas yang sil snyan gyi sgra dang glu dbyangs dang rol mo'i sgra sna tshogs phyung nas/_zhib tu spyod pa'i lha de dag ga la ba der phan tshun shin tu mthong bar 'dod pa rnams 
[\[199a.7\]]dong ste/_yid rtag par rab tu dga' ba'i tshal dang nye ba'i tshal rin po che sna tshogs dang ldan pa/_gser gyi lcug ma 'phyang bas khebs pa rnams su ji srid du 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba byas shing bsags pa'i las de zad par ma gyur pa de srid du phan tshun dga' bar byed rtse bar byed 
[\[199b\]]
[\[199b.1\]]dga' dgur spyod par byed do/_/de zad nas rab tu ltung ste las nye bar 'gro ba ji lta ba bzhin 'khor bar sems can dmyal ba dang [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang dud 'gro rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/ngan song gi sgo bcad pa gang yin pa de dag gal te mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mi'i nang du 
[\[199b.2\]]skyes na/_las de dang rgyu 'thun par yul shin tu rgyas pa 'bab chu dang chu bo dang lteng ka rab tu mang ba phun sum tshogs pa/_rtag tu legs par byas pa'i las kyi mtha' rnams su shin tu rgyas par 'gyur te/_mchog tu rgya che ba'i rgyal po'am blon po chen po skye bo kun dga' ba/_
[\[199b.3\]]blo gros rgya che zhing sbyin pa dang tshul khrims la mngon par dga' la rtag tu dge ba byed par mngon par 'gyur ba mthong ngo /_/de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi sa la rtog par byed de/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas lha 
[\[199b.4\]]rnams kyi gnas gzi brjid 'bar ba zhes bya ba/_ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo /_/der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/_'di ltar skyes bu dam pa dge ba dang ldan pa/_skyes bu dam pa rtag tu bag yod pa dang ldan par 
[\[199b.5\]]gyur pa/_sems can rnams la phan par 'dod pa/_las kyi 'bras bu la dad pa/_skyes bu dam pa 'du ba gang gis srog gcod pa dang ma byin par len pa spangs pas 'gyur te 'di lta ste/_shing sha ba skye ba'i nang ngam a mra skye ba'i nang ngam/_nA Di ke ra skye ba'i nang na sgo nga yod pa dag bya'am 
[\[199b.6\]]sbrul dag gis bzung na/_de dag gzhan la phan par zhugs pa snying rjes brlan pa'i yid kyis thar bar byed pa yin te/_de ltar srog chags dag thar bar byed pa yin no/_/ma byin par len pa spangs pa ji lta bu yin zhe na/_'di la shing ba la sha'i tshal du ba la sha'i lo ma yang len par 
[\[199b.7\]]mi byed la/_gzhan gyis blangs par shes nas kyang zlog par byed/_lam du zhugs pa na 'bra go sa la lhung ba yang len par mi byed la/_gzhan gyis blangs par shes nas kyang zlog par byed pa yin te/_de ltar ma byin par len pa spangs pa yin no/_/dge ba spyod pa ji lta bu yin zhe na/_'di 
[\[200a\]]
[\[200a.1\]]la sbyin pa la mngon par dga' ste/_lo nyes byung ba'i tshe dge sbyong dag la lo lnga pa'i gzhal ba phyed sbyin nam sdom pa blangs pa'i nad pa dag la zas sbyin par byed cing /_gzhan dag kyang de nyid la rab tu 'jog par byed dga' bar byed rab tu dga' bar byed las kyi 
[\[200a.2\]]'bras bu ston par byed/_sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun rtag par rjes su dran par byed/_pha ma 'am dge bsnyen sdom pa blangs pa phal pa la yang na ba'i gsos sman gyi rkyen gyi yo byad sbyin par byed/_gzhan dag kyang de nyid la de ltar rab tu 'jog par byed/_las kyi 'bras bu 
[\[200a.3\]]yang ston par byed/_yang dang yang du gzhan la phan par rab tu zhugs shing /_sdig pa'i grogs po dang spyod par mi byed/_thad kar zur tsam yang mi gnas/_de dang lhan cig smra bar mi byed/_de la tshig tsam yang mi smra/_lus dang ngag gi las kyi mtha' rtag tu legs par 
[\[200a.4\]]bsdams pa/_bdag la phan pa dang gzhan la phan par zhugs pa de lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha gzi brjid 'bar ba'i lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/der skyes nas kyang legs par byas pa'i las kyi mtha' spyad pa de/_
[\[200a.5\]]rang gi 'od zla ba'i 'od dang mtshungs pa yin no/_/sa gzhi de yang nyams dga' ba 'di lta bu yin te 'di lta ste/_tshal dang nye ba'i tshal rin po che sna bdun gyis shin tu gang ba yin/_chu bo yang chu 'bab pa sna tshogs 'byung zhing /_pad ma sdong bu bai DUr+ya rnams kyis yongs su bskor 
[\[200a.6\]]ba yin/_pad ma gser gyi 'dab ma rnams kyis kyang chu bo de dag khebs pa yin la/_chu rab tu gsal ba gser gyi rdo sna tshogs pa rnams kyis sgra mthon dman du 'byin pa/_gar byed pa lta bur 'bab pa/_bya sna tshogs sgra 'dres par 'byin pa rab tu dga' ba mang ba dang /_lha 
[\[200a.7\]]dang lha mo'i tshogs rab tu dga' bas gang zhing gser gyi ri bo'i rtse la rgyu ba gzhan dag bai DUr+ya'i ri la rgyu ba bya ngang pa dang kA raN+Da ba dang ngur pa'i tshogs myos pa sgra sna tshogs 'byin pa/_pad ma'i tshal gyi gsab gseb na lha dang lha mo'i tshogs rab tu dga' zhing dgod pa 'gram gnyi ga 
[\[200b\]]
[\[200b.1\]]lha'i tshogs rnams kyis kun du gang ba yin te/_chu bo de dag thams cad kyi rlabs rab tu 'byung ba'i sgra yid du 'ong ba 'byung ba yin no/_/gzhan yang pad ma'i rdzing dag yod de/_pad ma'i gsab gseb de dag na yang rin po che sna tshogs kyi bung ba 'od gsal zhing mdzes pa 
[\[200b.2\]]sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa yin no/_/lha dag de dag la yang rtog par byed de lha'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_lus rin po che sna tshogs kyis rnam par brgyan pa/_'od kyi phreng ba rgya che ba dag chu bo de dag na rtse bar byed cing dus yun ring du dga' ba nges par mthar byed ces bya ba'i 
[\[200b.3\]]tshal der 'dong bar byed de rtse ba'i phyir nye bar 'dong ngo /_/sil snyan dang rol mo'i sgra sna tshogs 'byin pa rjes su 'brang zhing phan tshun grogs su gyur pa rgyags pa 'ba' zhig don du byed pa de dag tshal der dong nas/_pad ma'i tshal pi wang gis rtse ba zhes bya ba kun nas dpag tshad lnga brgyar 
[\[200b.4\]]mtshungs par gang ba der dga' bar gnas pa dag 'jug par byed do/_/pad ma de dag kyang mdog dang ro dang dri mchog dang ldan zhing mtho ris dang 'thun pa'i chang gis shin tu gang ba yin no/_/de nas lha shin tu bde ba de dag chang zhim po de dag la 'thung zhing glu len to/_/de nas bag med 
[\[200b.5\]]par gnas pa de dag bya bgegs mi byed par 'gro ba zhes bya bas mthong ste/_de dag gis lha bag med par gnas pa de dag la mngon par brtags nas 'di ltar tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_khrel med ngo tsha med pa dang /_/le lo'i sdig pa'i grogs po rnams/_/'di dag mtho ris sa 
[\[200b.6\]]bon min/_/mkhas pas de dag bsrung bar gyis/_/khrel med ngo tsha med pa dang /_/rtag tu sdig pa rjes su spyod/_/mi ni g.yang sa las ltung ste/_/de ni phyi nas rig par 'gyur/_/ma dad pa dang rmugs dang gnyid/_/de bzhin gar yang 'jigs mi byed/_/'chab dang 'tshig dang 
[\[200b.7\]]rmongs pa ni/_/de dag mtho ris rgyur mi 'gyur/_/chang 'thung [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]tshig rab tu smra/_/gnod sems de bzhin lhag par brkam/_/las 'bras la ni dad med pa/_/kun du sems can dmyal ba'i rgyu/_/yid kyi skyon dang gnod sems dang /_/sdang ba'i las rnams bsrung bar gyis/_/
[\[201a\]]
[\[201a.1\]]mi kun sdang ba'i las kyis su/_/sems can dmyal ba nye bar rtog_/brtan pa med pa sdig spyod cing /_/rtag tu 'dod pa'i dbang du song /_/le lo khor mor [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]smra ba/_/de ni dge ba'i 'os min no/_/gang gi tshul khrims 'ching bu dang /_/sprin gyis khebs ltar 
[\[201a.2\]]smad pa dag_/de ni smad pa'i tshul khrims kyis/_/mi ni smad par skye bar 'gyur/_/gang dag sdig la blo gnas pa/_/de dag mun pa mtha' med la/_/gang dag sangs rgyas blo gnas pa/_/de dag mun pa bsal ba yin/_/de bzhin du chos dang dge 'dun la yang brjod par bya'o/_/
[\[201a.3\]]bag med rmongs pa'i lha rnams ni/_/yang dang yang du chang gis rmongs/_/bag med gnyid kyis rmongs pa de/_/mi rnams sems can dmyal bar rgyu/_/ji ltar skyes na nges par ni/_/'chi ba yod pa de lta bur/_/skye bo skye ba yod pa yi/_/steng na 'jig pa yod par 'gyur/_/
[\[201a.4\]]bag med rgya lta bu yis bzung /_/rgya mtsho lta bu'i yul du brlubs/_/sred pa'i lcags sgrog dag tu bcug_/lha rnams du mar rtse bar byed/_/skyes ma thag tu lha dag gi/_/skad cig de la bde zad 'gyur/_/bag med pa yis bsgribs pa'i sems/_/dbang med pa dag shes mi 
[\[201a.5\]]'gyur/_/bag med pa yis 'khrul pa'i yid/_/rtag tu yul la 'dod par byed/_/'dod pa'i bde bas tshim med pa/_/lha rnams dag ni sdug bsngal lo/_/gang zhig sred pa'i dbang song ba/_/lha de skad cig thang cig dang /_/nam yang yud tsam dag tu yang /_/nye bar spyod par 
[\[201a.6\]]mi 'gyur ro/_/gang du lha dag dbang med cing /_/'dod pa'i dbang song rtse byed pa/_/sa 'di sred pas nyon mongs te/_/rnam par rtog pa brgya yis bsgribs/_/ji ltar dmyal bar rgyu ba rnams/_/de yi me yis sreg par byed/_/de ltar 'dod pa las byung mes/_/lha rnams
