[\[201a.7\]]dag ni sreg par byed/_/bkres dang skom las byung ba'i mes/_/de ltar [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams kyang sreg_/gsod pa'i me yis dud 'gro rnams/_/mi rnams kun du tshol bas so/_/de ltar kun nas byung ba'i mes/_/sems can 'jig rten ma lus par/_/kun nas yongs su 
[\[201b\]]
[\[201b.1\]]bskor nas su/_/sreg par byed kyang mi rig go/_/de ltar bya de dag gis lha de rnams la mngon par brtags nas/_yang dang yang du rab tu go bar byed do/_/de nas de na lha gang dag sngon las dge ba byas shing spyad pa de dag gal te yang bya de dag gi sgra rnar thos nas 'thung 
[\[201b.2\]]bar mi byed de/_yud tsam zhig bag yod pa dang ldan nas/_de nas yang yul sgra dang reg pa dang gzugs dang ro dang dri sdug pa dpe med pa rnams kyi dbang du song ste/_de'i ngo bo nyid kyi dbang du song ba'i yid dag de nas yang sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pas tshal dang nye ba'i tshal 
[\[201b.3\]]rnams su lha dag rtse zhing gang dang gang myong bar 'dod pa de dang de shin tu myong ngo /_/lha dang lha mo 'bum snyed kyis yongs su bskor cing rang gis byas pa la spyod pa kha cig ni bai DUr+ya dang /_an da rnyil dang spug las byas pa'i ri rab kyi ri'i rtse mo dang tshal dang nye ba'i tshal gyi sa dang 'bab chu 
[\[201b.4\]]dang lteng ka pad mas rnam par brgyan pa ri'i rtse mo bya sdug gu sna tshogs kyis rnam par brgyan pa/_bai DUr+ya'i 'dab ma dang gser gyi ze ba dang shel gyi sdong bu'i pad ma'i rdzing dag tu bung ba'i tshogs kyis shin tu gang ba'i yul dpe med pa chu bo'i klung lta bu rnam pa sna tshogs kyi dbang du song ba na yang 
[\[201b.5\]]dang yang du rtse bar byed kyang nges par myong bar 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal gang yin pa de dag mi rig ste/_de ltar ji srid du byas shing bsags pa'i las de zad par ma gyur pa de srid du phan tshun grogs su gyur pa dag dga' bar byed rtse bar byed do/_/de zad nas ltung bar 'gyur te/_ji ltar nyi 
[\[201b.6\]]ma nub na nyin mo zad pa de ltar lha rnams legs par byas pa zad na mtho ris kyi mtha' nas ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/lhung nas kyang las nye bar 'gro ba ji lta ba bzhin sems can dmyal ba dang [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang dud 'gro rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te mi rnams dang skal ba 
[\[201b.7\]]mnyam par mi'i nang du skyes na las de dang rgyu 'thun par de shin tu bde bar 'gyur te/_nor mang ba dang mchog tu rgya che ba la dga' ba dang /_dam pa'i chos la dga' ba dang /_rtag tu shes pa la dga' ba dang /_dge sbyong dang bram ze la dga' ba dang /_tshe ring por 'gyur ba yang 
[\[202a\]]
[\[202a.1\]]mthong ngo /_/de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas la rtog par byed de/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas zla ba'i gnas ltar rgyu ba zhes bya ba ji ltar 
[\[202a.2\]]'dug pa mthong ngo /_/der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na dge ba'i las kyi mtha' spyod pa sems dri ma dang bral ba/_sems shin tu bsgoms pa/_yid shin tu bsgoms pa gang gis sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[202a.3\]]sku gzugs bya ba skyon med par byas pa dang /_de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gzugs gser ram dngul lam zangs sam lcags las byas pa la yid dang bas pir ram rab tu gsal bar byed pas sdug par byed cing sku gzugs dri ma dang bral ba mchog tu sdug pa de dag 
[\[202a.4\]]mthong nas sbyin bdag de shin tu snying dga' la sems kyis kyang yang dang yang du byed na/_de sems kyi zhing yon tan bzang po dang sems kyi rgyu sems bsgoms pas dge ba spyod pa bde ba dang ldan par 'gyur/_gzhan yang srog gcod pa dang ma byin par len pa spong ba yin te/_
[\[202a.5\]]srog chags rnams la yid kyis kyang gsod par mi byed cing gnod par mi byed la/_gzhan byed na yang rjes su yi rang bar mi byed phyir zlog par byed/_dge ba'i lam la rab tu 'jog par byed pa bdag dang gzhan la phan pa byed pa'i skyes bu dam pa de ni bde ba myong bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[202a.6\]]srog gcod pa spangs pa rnam pa du yod ce na/_'di la shin tu gus pas bsams nas yid kyis kyang gsod par mi byed cing /_gsod par byed du mi 'jug_/legs par byas pa'i las byed pa de drod gsher las skyes pa'i sems can mal gzhi'i 'og tu skyes nas za bar byed 
[\[202a.7\]]pa de dag kyang bzung nas gsod par mi byed la/_srin bu phre'u dang grog sbur yang gsod par mi byed pa yin te/_rnam pa de dag ni srog gcod pa spangs pa yin no/_/ma byin par len pa spangs pa ji lta bu yin zhe na/_yang skyes bu dam pa dge ba legs par byas pa'i las la 
[\[202b\]]
[\[202b.1\]]tshim pa med pas thams cad du ma byin par mi len te de lta bas na ma byin par len pa spangs pa yin no/_/rnam pa ji lta bu yin rnam pa du yod ce na/_'di la grang bas nyen pa'am dro bas nyen kyang gzhan gyis yongs su bzung ba'i shing skam mam/_bong ba'am/_gdugs kyi grib ma tsam 
[\[202b.2\]]gyis kyang 'tsho bar mi byed/_grib mas 'tsho ba'i mi rnams kyi grib ma 'phrog par mi byed/_'gron po dag shing ljon pa'i grib ma dag la ngal so zhing 'dug pa dbang gis bskrad nas/_grib ma de dag la bsil bar 'dug cing de dag kyang gdung bas gdungs la shin tu sdug bsngal bar 
[\[202b.3\]]gyur pa rnam pa de lta bu'i ma byin par len pa yang yongs su spong zhing mi byed la/_grib ma ma byin par len pa gzhan byed pa yang phyir zlog par byed pa yin te/_ma byin par len pa shin tu chung ngu yang spong zhing srog gcod pa yang spong ba ni lus dang bral nas shi ba'i 'og tu bde 'gro mtho ris 
[\[202b.4\]]kyi 'jig rten sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nang zla ba'i gnas ltar rgyu ba'i lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/der skyes nas kyang legs par byas pa'i las kyi mtha' spyad pa/_rgyu rkyen dang 'thun par spyad pa de 'bras bu de dang 'thun par 'byung ste 'di lta ste/_zla ba nya ba bcu'i 'od kyi 
[\[202b.5\]]rnam pa ji snyed yod pa'i rnam pa de snyed kyi 'od lha'i lus de thams cad las shin tu dri ma med pa 'byung ngo /_/lha de'i 'od gang yin pa'i 'od des mtho ris kyi phyogs dang bcas pa brgya 'gyur du gsal ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/'od de yang tsha ba dang bsil ba med de lha thams cad kyi mig tu 
[\[202b.6\]]sdug pa yin no/_/lha de dag kyang gnas gzhan du skyes pa'i lha de dag gi 'od pas khyad par du 'phags pa yin te/_de'i las dge ba'i mthus kun nas dpag tshad bcur rin po che dang rin po che'i 'od thams cad kyang zil gyis mnan nas lha de'i 'od mngon par gsal lo/_/de 
[\[202b.7\]]nas lha de lha'i tshogs du mas yongs su bskor cing sil snyan dang rol mo'i sgra sna tshogs 'byin la/_glu dbyangs nye bar len bzhin du skyed mos tshal dga' ba lnga zhes bya ba ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do/_/tshal de na gang sum cu rtsa gsum pa thams cad pas khyad par du 'phags pa shin 
[\[203a\]]
[\[203a.1\]]tu dga' ba lnga 'byung ste 'di lta ste/_shing ljon pa rnams kyi gzi brjid dang 'bras bu dang bya blo gros rgya che ba dang pad ma'i rdzing gi chu dang 'bab chu rab tu mang ba dang nam mkha' la rlung dri dang ldan pa dril bu g.yer ka'i sgra lta bu du ma ldang ba'o/_/de nas lha de lha'i tshogs kyis 
[\[203a.2\]]yongs su bskor nas dga' ba lnga'i tshal de ga la ba der 'dong bar byed de/_sil snyan dang rol mo'i sgra dang glu sgra rnam pa sna tshogs kyis dga' ba dang lha mo gzugs bzang mo dang ldan zhing cha byad dang rgyan sna tshogs thogs pa rjes su 'brang ba dang lha'i tshogs rnam pa sna tshogs kyis yongs su 
[\[203a.3\]]bskor cing sil snyan dang rol mo'i sgra yan lag lnga dang ldan pa nye bar len pa na bde ba shin tu rgya che ba dag myong ngo /_/shing gi yon tan shin tu rgya che ba mngon du gyur pa gang yin pa'i las byas pa des dri thams cad zil gyis mnan nas dpag tshad lngar 'byung ngo /_/'di ltar mtho ris 
[\[203a.4\]]pas kyang bzang ba'i mtho ris kyi shing ljon pa kha cig gi 'od ni nyi ma bas lhag par gsal te 'od shin tu bzang po mi tsha mi grang ngo /_/'bras bu yang dri dang ro dang reg pa dang ldan te dri de dag gis dri thams cad zil gyis mnan nas dpag tshad lngar 'byung ngo /_/'bras bu gza' dang skar ma'i 
[\[203a.5\]]tshogs lta bu de dag las chang zhim po myos pa'i skyon dang bral ba rnam pa sna tshogs dag rtag tu 'byung la/_chang gi mdog dri dang ro sna tshogs su 'gyur te de dag gi dri dpag tshad lngar 'byung ngo /_/ro yang rnam pa ji snyed du 'dod pa'i rnam pa de snyed du chang de'i ro 'grub par 'gyur te yon 
[\[203a.6\]]tan de snyed dang ldan pa yin no/_/bya yang bag med pa yang dag par khong du chud par bya ba zhes bya ste/_de dag gis ni lha shin tu bag med pa rnams la 'di ltar yang dang yang du tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_skyes bu mchog dag chos 'dul ba/_/rtab rtab por ni byed pa de/_/
[\[203a.7\]]legs par byas pa'i las zad cing /_/tshe yang skad cig byed pa'i rgyu/_/dar la bab pa shin tu 'joms/_/srog kyang thams cad bral bar byed/_/phun sum tshogs pa thams cad 'jig_/bag med yid la ma byed cig_/mtho ris rtag tu mi 'thob la/_/dal ba rtag tu mi ldan 
[\[203b\]]
[\[203b.1\]]pas/_ji srid de ni mi ltung bar/_/de srid dge la brtson par gyis/_/chos la shin tu bsdams pa dang /_/sems kyang bsrung ba byas pas ni/_/gang na skyon dag med pa yi/_/sngon ma mthong ba'i gnas 'thob 'gyur/_/gang dag rtag tu yid g.yengs shing /_/chos 
[\[203b.2\]]la'ang gzhol bar mi byed pa/_/de dag gi ni bde ba 'di/_/don med 'gyur te mi ldog go/_/tshul khrims gzhis ni lus can gyis/_/mtho ris rnams su de 'di thob/_/tshul khrims de la mi sten gang /_/de ni phyi nas yongs su gdung /_/de bas tshul ldan rtag par ni/_/tshul 
[\[203b.3\]]khrims nyid la bsten par bya/_/tshul khrims med pa rmongs pa'i mi/_/mtho ris su ni 'gro mi 'gyur/_/lha yi 'dod pa lnga ldan pa/_/bde ba spyod pa gang yin 'di/_/de ni tshul khrims dag pa yi/_/'bras bu chen po thob pa yin/_/bag med dug gis shin tu rmongs/_/'dod pa spyod pa'i 
[\[203b.4\]]lha gang dag_/'tsho ba'i mtha' ni 'jig pa dang /_/g.yo ba thams cad mi rig go/_/bag med pa yis rnam rmongs pa/_/lha rnams dag ni stong phrag dang /_/'bum phrag dag ni du ma rnams/_/'dod pa'i me yis rnam par bsregs/_/bag med rnam par rmongs pa yis/_/mi rnams 
[\[203b.5\]]thams cad dbang du byed/_/de ni phyi nas nyon mongs 'thob/_/'bras bu gang yin de rig go/_/yul rnams la ni rtag par sems/_/g.yo ba chen po rgyug byed pa/_/nyon mongs rmongs pa skyed pa gang /_/'byung bar 'gyur ba de mthong ngo /_yul rnams la ni chags pa'i sems/_/nyon 
[\[203b.6\]]mongs khong du mi chud de/_/nyon mongs glong du skyes pa dag_/de ni phyi nas yongs su gdung /_/kun tu sbyor ba phra rgyas bcas/_/yul la rnam rtog 'byung ba ni/_/'khor 'dra sems ni rgyal po bzhin/_/de dag lhan cig spyod par 'gyur/_/gang dag tu ni yid 'jug pa/_/mi shes pa 
[\[203b.7\]]rnams der 'jug ste/_/mthu yis phan tshun myos pa dag_/srid pa gsum na 'khyam par 'gyur/_/brtan po gang dag de nyid rig_/mi brtan sdug bsngal stong la sogs/_/'gro ba'i gnas pa mthong 'gyur te/_/de dag la ni sdug bsngal med/_/rtag tu 'dod pa tshol byed pa/_/
[\[204a\]]
[\[204a.1\]]bud med rag las rmongs pa gang /_/de dag lha yi 'jig rten du/_/tha ma dag ni mthong bar 'gyur/_/ri 'di ljon shing tshal du bcas/_/rin chen sna tshogs rnam par brgyan/_/lcug ma tshang tshing dag gis khebs/_/pad ma'i rdzing gis rnam par brgyan/_/'bab chu rnam 
[\[204a.2\]]pa sna tshogs dang /_/'khri shing rnams kyis mdzes par byas/_/skye bo'i las kyi mngon sum 'di/_/brtol nas mkha' la byung gyur pa/_/ri rab bskal pa'i mes bsregs te/_/thams cad du ni mi 'byung na/_/bag med rgyags pas rmongs pa yi/_/skye ba dang ni 'jig 'gyur 
[\[204a.3\]]ba/_/dbu ba chu bur lta bu yin/_/de ni lha gang smos ci dgos/_/de nas de na lha sngon dge ba'i las kyi mtha' spyad pa la goms pa gang yin pa de dag bya'i sgra de thos nas/_'di ltar bya 'di dag rnam par sgra 'byin pa de bzhin yin no snyam nas de nas yud tsam zhig khong du chud do/_/
[\[204a.4\]]khong du chud nas de nas yang yul la rnam par rmongs pa/_yul rnams kyis dbang du byas pa nyid sgra dang reg pa dang ro dang gzugs dang dri sdug pa rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis dbang du byas pa dag ji ltar tshe rabs gzhan du bya ba dang mi bya ba dag byas pa ltar bya'i sgra de dag cung zad kyang yid 
[\[204a.5\]]la mi 'jog go/_/de ltar sems 'di da ltar byung ba'i yul la brkam zhing ma 'ongs pa'i nyon mongs pa khong du mi chud la shin tu mi dran no/_/da ltar byung ba'i yul la mngon par 'dod pas rmongs pa/_sems can dmyal ba dang [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang dud 'gro rnams sam gal te yang lha 
[\[204a.6\]]dang mi rnams kyi nang na 'khyam mo/_/de ltar thog ma med pa'i dus nas nyon mongs pa rtsub mo byas pa mi dran la sdug bsngal rjes su myong ste/_sems can dmyal ba dang [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang dud 'gro rnams kyi nang du sdug bsngal mi bzad pa shin tu tsha ba 'byung ngo /_/thog ma med 
[\[204a.7\]]pa'i dus nas bcos dka' zhing gdul ba dka' ba de dag yid shin tu rgya che ba ma gtogs par gdul bar mi nus so/_/de nas dge slong de dpyod par byed de bya rnams las gang gis bag med par gnas pa'i lha rnams la yang dag par gyur pa/_snying po med pa ma yin 
[\[204b\]]
[\[204b.1\]]pa'i chos khong du chud par byed snyam nas/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pa'am lha'i mig gis brtags na/_mi'i 'jig rten na gyad dam sil dkrol ba'am gar mkhan rab tu myos par gnas pa gang yin pa de dag gos ngur smrig bgos te gar byed dam/_de nas 
[\[204b.2\]]sangs rgyas kyi yon tan glu dbyangs su len la/_de las nor rdzas kyi rnam pa'am gos sam 'bras bu b+ha la lA ta ka thob pa de dag dge slong dang bram ze dag la sbyin par mi byed kyi/_gzhan du na shin tu mgu nas spyod par byed pa de dag gos ngur smrig bgos pa tsam nyid kyis de 
[\[204b.3\]]lus dang bral nas shi ba'i 'og tu de'i las kyi mthus lha rnams kyi bya shin tu bde bar 'gyur ba mthong ngo /_/de nas yang lha phan tshun grogs su gyur pa rgyags pa 'ba' zhig don du byed pa dag bai DUr+ya'i shing ljon pa gser gyi 'dab ma dang shel gyi lcug mas dkrigs pa'i lo ma dang /_
[\[204b.4\]]gzhan yang lcug ma dang /_shing gis khebs pa dang byi ru mdzes pa sna tshogs dang /_bung ba 'bum snyed kyis yongs su bskor ba dang /_gser dang /_mu tig gi ldum bu sngon po nyams dga' ba rnams na bro rdung glu len to/_/gzhan yang ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi rtse mo rin po che sna 
[\[204b.5\]]bdun gyis rnam par brgyan pa/_'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrugs pa lta bu dang /_gzhan yang gser dang /_dngul dang /_shel dang /_bai DUr+ya'i pad ma'i rdzing rnams su rtse bar byed do/_/yang phyogs gzhan na gzhal med khang ba gam gyi phreng ba gsal zhing mdzes pa rnams 
[\[204b.6\]]na rtse bar byed yongs su spyod par byed de/_lha mo dang lhan cig 'thab mo dang phrag dog gi rnam pa 'jigs pas skyo ba med pa phan tshun gnod pa med pa/_gus pa skye shing de la yid dad par gyur pa rnams bde ba shin tu dpe med pa myong bar byed do/_/de nas yang lha de 
[\[204b.7\]]rnams dpag bsam gyi shing gi phyogs su bro rdung zhing 'jug par byed la/_der zhugs nas kyang rtog pa dang bcas pa'i blo yid la 'dod pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad mtho ris dang 'thun par 'thob ste/_de dag dpag bsam gyi shing zhes bya ba'i ming 'thob bo/_/
[\[205a\]]
[\[205a.1\]]der yang de dag yun ring du yul gyi bde ba 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba nye bar spyad nas/_gser las byas pa'i ri rab mtho ba de ga la ba der 'dong bar byed de/_'bab chu sna tshogs kyis brgyan par de dag 'dzeg par byed do/_/lha'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor 
[\[205a.2\]]cing glu dbyangs dang sil snyan dang rol mo'i sgra 'byin pas rna gung g.yer ba de la yid zhugs pa yul gyi bde ba lha'i rna bar sgra snyan pa thos so//_//'phags pa dam pa'i chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa/_bam po sum cu brgyad pa/_lha rnams kyi mig gi yul du 
[\[205a.3\]]byas pa yang bde ba dpe med pa shin tu rgya che ba myong ste 'di lta ste/_lha'i gzugs dang cha byad dang rgyan sna tshogs dang rang gi las kyis sprul pa'i gzugs dang cha byad dang rgyan gong nas gong du rnam pa sna tshogs dag mthong ngo /_/ri rab la yang tshal dang nags tshal dang lteng ka dang 
[\[205a.4\]]pad ma'i gzugs rnam pa du ma dang de bzhin du me tog gi tshal dang nye ba'i tshal rnam pa sna tshogs dmigs pa du ma yod pa'i dri zhim po mngon par 'byung ba dag la lha rnams snom par byed de/_shin tu yid du 'thad cing yul gyi reg pa la rnam par chags par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[205a.5\]]lha rnams gang reg par 'dod pa de nyid ka tsa lin di ka lta bur 'jam pa yin te/_rdul dang bral ba dri ma dang bral ba thags su ma btags pa/_tshon du ma gsal ba/_dri mngon par zhim pa/_mthong na shin tu yid 'phrog pa yin te/_de ltar reg pa'i yul gyis lha rgyags 
[\[205a.6\]]pa rnams myos shing gnas so/_/gzhan yang yid la sems pa gang yin pa de de nyid yon tan du ma dang ldan pa/_thun mong ma yin pa/_gzhan gyi mthus nyams pa ma yin pa/_gdug pa ma yin pa dag 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/de ltar bde ba'i myos pa rnam pa du ma la 
[\[205a.7\]]gnas pa rang gi 'od dang ldan zhing lha mo'i tshogs du mas yongs su bskor ba'i lha de dag gnas de rnams su skye bar 'gyur te/_ji srid du 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba byas shing bsags pa'i las de zad par ma gyur pa de srid du rtse bar byed dga' dgur spyod par byed bde 
[\[205b\]]
[\[205b.1\]]ba myong bar byed do/_/de phyis lha'i 'jig rten shin tu yid du 'ong ba de nas 'chi bar 'gyur te/_shi nas kyang las nye bar 'gro ba ji lta ba bzhin sems can dmyal ba dang [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang dud 'gro rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mi'i 
[\[205b.2\]]nang du skyes na/_las de dang rgyu 'thun par de skyes phan chad nas rtag tu bde bar 'gyur zhing /_bong skyed che ba dang gang na chos dang 'thun pa dang yang dag pa'i lta ba dang ldan pa'i yul bzang por rgyal po'am blon po chen por skye bar 'gyur te/_skyes bu dam pa sdig pa'i grogs po dang 
[\[205b.3\]]phrad par mi 'gyur ba mthong ngo /_/de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi sa la rtog par byed de/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas shing sA la zung zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug 
[\[205b.4\]]pa mthong ngo /_/der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/_yang dag pa'i lta ba la zhugs pa tshul khrims dang ldan par gyur cing /_sems can rnams la phan par 'dod pas rtag tu tshul khrims dang ldan par 
[\[205b.5\]]gyur la/_yang dag pa'i lus dang ngag la zhugs par gyur pa gang gis 'di ltar 'brog gi sems can skom pa rnams srog chad par mi bya'o snyam nas/_de yang de ltar sems pa yongs su bsgoms pas sems sgom par byed de ri 'or dang 'brog dag tu yur chu dang 'bab chu dang 
[\[205b.6\]]lteng ka dang rdzing bu dag byas par chu chen po dag las 'bebs par byed/_srog chags rnams kyi lam nor ba dang lam nor nas 'brog dgon pa dag tu zhugs te/_'jigs nas bzhin mog mog por gyur pa lam gol ba dgon pa chen por zhugs pa de dag la lam ston par 
[\[205b.7\]]byed cing /_nyon mongs pa chen po de las sgrol bar byed kyang de dag gis 'tsho bar mi byed la sems can la phan par zhugs pa kho na yin te/_de dag ni sbyin pa sbyin zhing srog skyob pa yang yin no/_/yang srog gcod pa dang ma byin par len pa spangs pa ji lta bu yin zhe na/_'di la 
[\[206a\]]
[\[206a.1\]]de dag nyid dam gzhan zhig bsam pa de dang 'thun par zhugs pa dge ba'i las kyi mtha' spyad pa dag/_de ltar srog chags gsad pa'i rgyu yod kyang gsod par mi byed pa yin te 'di lta ste/_khyim na srog chags drod gsher las skyes pa'am mngal nas skyes 
[\[206a.2\]]pa phra mo'am sbom por 'byung ba dag khyim de'i rdzas 'jig par byed pa'am de bzhin du nyal ba'i steng du lhung nas gnyid 'drogs par byed kyang sems can rnams la phan par 'dod pa de gsod par mi byed/_sbal pa dang sdig pa yang gsod par mi byed/_srog yongs su chad 
[\[206a.3\]]la thug kyang de dag la gsod par mi byed cing gdug pa la yang bzod par byed do/_/de ltar de dag gsad pa'i rgyu yod kyang srog chags rnams la 'tshe bar mi byed cing srung bar byed pa yin te de dag ni srog gcod pa spangs pa yin no/_/ma byin par len pa spangs pa 
[\[206a.4\]]ji lta bu yin rnam pa ni du yod ce na/_de ltar legs par byas pa'i las kyi mtha' spyod pa de'i 'brog dgon par zhugs pa'i dpon por gyur kyang /_tshong pa rnams kyis tshong pa'i phyir chu dang lan tshwa nag por bsres pa gang yin pa de dag kyang srung bar byed la skom pas 
[\[206a.5\]]gdungs te/_srog chad la thug kyang chu de dag tshong pas ma blud kyi bar du 'thung bar mi byed la/_gang gi tshe tshong pas blud pa de'i tshe chu de la 'thung bar byed cing gzhan dag la yang ldud par byed de/_de ltar dbang yod par gyur kyang rin ma byin par mi len te/_'di yang ma 
[\[206a.6\]]byin par len pa spangs pa yin no/_/las kyi 'bras bu shin tu phra mo mthong ba/_rtag par sangs rgyas dang chos kyi rjes su zhugs pa/_de'i yon tan dran pa lhur byed la/_sems pas sems bsgoms pa ni sdig pa'i grogs po dang yud tsam yang mi sten/_kun du smra 
[\[206a.7\]]ba'i tshig tsam yang mi smra/_de dang lam du yang 'grogs par mi byed/_gang dge ba'i chos thams cad kyi bar chad byed pa'i gtso bo ni 'di yin te 'di lta ste/_sdig pa'i grogs po dang 'du ba zhes bya ba yin la/_de dang smra ba'am de dang lhan cig 'ong zhing 'gro ba'am de'i grib 
[\[206b\]]
[\[206b.1\]]ma dang phrad par yang mi byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug rnams kyi gzhir gyur pa ni sdig pa'i grogs po dug gi shing ljon pa lta bu yongs su spang bar bya ba yin te/_de ltar skyes bu dam pa kun nas gser btso ma lta bur gyur pa de lus dang bral nas 
[\[206b.2\]]bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nang shing sA la zung gi gnas su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/der skyes nas kyang legs par byas pa'i las kyi mtha' spyad pa de/_legs par byas pa kha na ma tho ba med pa/_skye bo dge ba kun gyis mchod pa/_de'i legs 
[\[206b.3\]]par byas pa'i las nges par myong bar 'gyur ba/_lha'i nang du skye bar 'gyur ba'i 'bras bu la nye bar spyod par 'gyur te 'di lta ste/_lha de rang gi 'od 'byung bar 'gyur la de'i 'od ji ltar mi'i grangs kyi tshul gyis nyin gcig bzhin bgrangs pa dang zhag dang zla bar 'phel bar 'gyur ba de 
[\[206b.4\]]ltar rgyu gang gis 'od de/_lha rnams kyi nyin mo dang mtshan mo med par rang gi 'od kyis gsal bar 'gyur te/_de ltar lha'i 'od de 'phel ba yin no/_/'di ltar lha gzhan dag kyang /_'di ni bdag cag gi gnas gzhan du skyes pa'i lha thams cad pas 'od lhag par bzang ngo 
[\[206b.5\]]snyam nas/_lha mo dag gi mdun du shin tu ngo tsha ba skye'o/_/de nas lha rnams brgya byin gyi drung du song nas dris pa/_kye brgya byin 'di ltar lha gsar du skyes pa zhig mchis te/_de'i 'od kyis bdag cag thams cad zil gyis mnan nas mchis so/_/de nas brgya byin gyis 
[\[206b.6\]]de'i tshe 'di ltar tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_gser gyi ri bo ri rab 'di/_/'od kyi phreng ba gang yin pa/_/'od de tshul khrims las byung 'di'i/_/bcu drug char yang mi phod do/_/tshul khrims rtag tu 'bar ba na/_/gser ni btso ma lta bu ste/_/rang gi las kyis yang dag 
[\[206b.7\]]ldan/_/sum cu rtsa gsum brgyan par 'gyur/_/dman dang 'bring dang khyad par 'phags/_/tshul khrims rnam pa gsum rnams kyi/_/'bras bu de bzhin rnam gsum ste/_/dman dang 'bring dang mchog tu mthong /_/bag med spangs pa'i tshul khrims ni/_/bag yod pa yis 
[\[207a\]]
[\[207a.1\]]'phel ba yin/_/de ni rtag tu bde sbyin mthong /_/'di ni chos nyid rnam par gnas/_/lus can tshul khrims las byung ba'i/_/dri med 'od ni gang yin pa/_/de ni nyi ma stong snyed dag_/'dus pa'i 'od kyis thub mi 'gyur/_/tshul khrims rnam bdun 
[\[207a.2\]]dga' ba dag_/mi mchog dam pa gang srung ba/_/sangs rgyas kyis ni bshad pa gang /_/de ni las kyi 'bras bu spyod/_/lus can legs par byas pa yi/_/las rnams 'dir ni chud mi za/_/de bzhin las rnams ma byas pa'i/_/'ong bar ma mthong 'jig pa'ang med/_/
[\[207a.3\]]byis pa rgyu la ma chags la/_/rnam par smin la chags par byed/_/bye ma rnams la mar med ltar/_/rgyu med na ni 'bras bu med/_/ser sna med cing dge ba yi/_/skyes bu dge ba spyod pa yin/_/sdig pa'i bdag nyid rmongs pa gang /_/de ni rtag tu khro la spyod/_/de ltar 
[\[207a.4\]]lha de dag la brgya byin des legs par byas pa'i las kyi 'bras bu khong du chud par bsnyad do/_/de nas lha rnams brgya byin gyi tshig de spyi bos blangs nas yang shing sA la zung gi gnas ga la ba de nyid du 'dong bar byed do/_/dong nas de lha dang lha mo'i tshogs dang lhan cig 
[\[207a.5\]]dga' bar byed/_dga' dgur spyod par byed cing sil snyan sna tshogs kyi sgra 'byin pa rjes su 'brang bzhin du shing sA la de gnyis kyi gnas ga la ba de nyid du 'dong bar byed do/_/shing sA la de gnyis kyang sum cu rtsa gsum du gtogs pa'i tshal dang nye ba'i tshal thams 
[\[207a.6\]]cad pas tshad dang mdog dang me tog dang 'od dag gis lhag pa yin no/_/shing sA la de gnyis kyang dril bu g.yer ka sgra 'byung ba'i dra ba 'phyang ba dang /_lo ma las kyang ji ltar sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i sgra 'byung ba de ltar de gnyis la sgra 'byung ngo /_/de 
[\[207a.7\]]dag lo ma'i sgra de thos nas yang dga' bar gnas par bya ba'i phyir shing sA la de gnyis ga la ba de nyid du 'dong bar byed do/_/de nas nye bar dong nas lha de dag shing sA la de gnyis la 'dzeg par byed do/_/shing sA la de gnyis kyi steng na yang pad ma'i rdzing chu rab tu dga' 
[\[207b\]]
[\[207b.1\]]ba zhes bya ba yod de/_bya ngang pa dang kA raN+Da ba dang ngur pa sgra snyan pa 'byin cing rtag tu chu yan lag brgyad dang ldan pas shin tu gang ba yin no/_/de la 'dzegs nas lha rnams kyis 'di ltar shing sA la 'di gnyis ma gtogs par shing ljon pa gang gi steng na yang /_pad ma'i rdzing med 
[\[207b.2\]]pa shin tu ngo mtshar che ba 'di mthong ste/_kye ma shing sA la 'di gnyis ni shing yongs 'du sa brtol ma gtogs par shing ljon pa thams cad kyi nang na kun gyi gtso bo yin zhing thams cad du dga' ba yin no snyam mo/_/de nas de dag rig nas de gnyis kyi steng na lha de dag lha mo'i tshogs 
[\[207b.3\]]dang lhan cig bde ba nye bar sbyar ba dang yul gyi bde ba sna tshogs kyis dga' bar byed rtse bar byed dga' dgur spyod par byed do/_/de dag der yun ring du bde ba dag myong nas rtag tu rtse ba zhes bya ba ga la ba der mgo la pad ma'i phreng ba thogs pa thags su ma btags pa'i gos kha dog rnam pa 
[\[207b.4\]]sna tshogs bgos pa/_kha dog sna tshogs las lus kyi 'od 'byung ba rnams 'dong bar byed do/_/lha de rnams kyi lus las 'od 'byung ba gang yin pa de cung zad cig dper bya na/_ji ltar mi'i 'jig rten na dbyar gyi dus su 'ja' kha dog can kha dog sdug gu gsum dang ldan pa 
[\[207b.5\]]'byung ba de ltar lha de rnams kyi pad ma de dag las 'od sngon po dang ser po dang dmar po 'byung ngo /_/de nas lha de dag dga' bar gnas par bya ba'i phyir skyed mos tshal du dga' spyod byed du 'dong ste/_'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan zhing yul gyi bde ba la nye bar spyod pa ni/_ri bo'i 
[\[207b.6\]]chu bo'i shugs ltar thams cad du yul gyi bde ba rjes su myong ngo /_/de nas lha'i rgyal po brgya byin shing sA la zung gi lha rnams kyi sa ga la ba der chos bzang na gnas pa'i lha'i tshogs kun dang lhan cig skyed mos tshal du dga' spyod bya ba'i phyir 'dong bar byed de/_sil snyan dang 
[\[207b.7\]]rol mo'i sgra sna tshogs 'byin cing /_lha mo'i tshogs rnam pa sna tshogs dag mdun na glu dbyangs len bzhin du 'dong bar byed do/_/de nas brgya byin gang nas 'ong ba der shing sA la zung gi lha rnams 'ong bar byed do/_/'ongs nas de dag kyang sil snyan dang rol mo'i sgra sna 
[\[208a\]]
[\[208a.1\]]tshogs 'byin cing /_lha mo'i tshogs kyis bskor ba rnams thal mo spyi bor sbyar te/_brgya byin la mchod nas lha mo dang lha de dag kun kyang phan tshun 'dres shing chos bzang na gnas pa dang shing sA la zung gi sa na gnas pa de dag phan tshun grogs su gyur 
[\[208a.2\]]pa/_shin tu snying du sdug par gyur pa phan tshun yid la gnod pa med pa phan tshun 'thun par gyur pa rnams sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pa chags su rung ba snyan pa 'thun pa 'thun pa nyid dang rjes su ldan pa skye bo thams cad kyi snying 'dzin par gyur pas bro rdung la dgod bzhin 
[\[208a.3\]]du shing sA la zung de gnyis ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do/_/dong nas kyang lha de rnams kun gyi sngon du 'gro ba brgya byin yongs su bskor nas bro rdung bar byed dgod par byed chang zhim po dag kyang 'thung bar byed do/_/de nas lha'i rgyal po brgya byin gyis lha de dag la 'di 
[\[208a.4\]]skad smras so/_/lha dag shing yongs 'du sa brtol ma gtogs par sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i tshal dang nye ba'i tshal shing ljon pa thams cad kyi nang na kun tu gtso bor gyur pa shing sA la zung 'di gnyis la ltos/_lha'i rgyal po mthong lags so/_/de nas brgya byin gyis 
[\[208a.5\]]de dag la 'di skad smras so/_/kye lha khyed cag gis shing sA la zung 'di'i mthu ma shes kyi lha khyed rnams kyis gzugs 'ba' zhig shes par zad de/_shing sA la 'di gnyis kyi mthu ltos shig/_de nas lha'i rgyal po brgya byin shing rta las babs nas/_rdo rje'i 
[\[208a.6\]]phyogs gcig gis shing sA la zung ya gcig la bsnun pa dang /_de nas sdong po las sgo bye ste shing sA la de'i nang na stegs dang 'bab chu dang lteng ka dang tshal dang nye ba'i tshal nyams dga' ba sna tshogs dang 'bab chu yang shin tu bsil zhing pad ma'i tshal gyis khebs 
[\[208a.7\]]pa/_stegs dang ri rtse dag gis brgyan pa/_kha cig ni nor bu las byas/_kha cig ni dngul las byas/_kha cig ni shel las byas/_kha cig ni bai DUr+ya las byas pa yin te/_'bab chu dang chu bo dang ri bo nyams dga' ba sna tshogs pa dag mthong ngo /_/de nas 
[\[208b\]]
[\[208b.1\]]gzhan yang lha de rnams shing sA la zung de ya gcig gi nang du zhugs pa dang pad ma'i rdzing rin po che sna bdun gyi pad ma rnams kyis brgyan pa/_bung ba 'bum snyed kyis yongs su bskor ba dag mthong ngo /_/gser dang dngul dang bai DUr+ya dang an da rnyil gyi shing ljon pa 'od gsal ba'i 
[\[208b.2\]]tshal bya'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba dag kyang mthong ngo /_/bya de dag kyang 'dab gshog gi mtha' rin po che sna bdun las byas shing rgyas pa yin te/_ji ltar sgra 'byin pa thos nas lha dag kyang sngon ma byung ba ngo mtshar che ba mthong nas shin tu dga' ba myong zhing /_gzhan la yang ngo 
[\[208b.3\]]mtshar skyed pa de lta bu'i sgra snyan pa rnam pa du ma 'byin to/_/de nas lha'i rgyal po brgya byin yang lha'i tshogs dang lhan cig yongs su bskor te/_tshal dang nye ba'i tshal legs par mthong bar 'dod pa shing sA la zung ya gcig gi nang na gzhal med khang dkrigs pa ga la ba der dong ngo /_/
[\[208b.4\]]der yang lha rnams kyis khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]rnam pa sna tshogs dkrigs pa dag na ka ba nyams dga' ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/_ka ba dang ra ba rin po che sna bdun gyis rnam par brgyan pa la 'di lta ste/_an da rnyil dang bai DUr+ya dang gser dang dngul dang spug dang shel dang mu 
[\[208b.5\]]tig rnams kyis ka ba rnam pa du mar phye zhing sna tshogs su brgyan pa/_stan khra bo rnam pa sna tshogs legs par bting ba/_rin po che'i gos sna tshogs kyis mdzes par byas pa/_'dug khri de dag kyang sdug par byas shing rkang pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mdzes par 
[\[208b.6\]]byas pa'i 'dug khri'i rkang pa de la nye bar brgyan pa 'di lta ste/_rdo rje dang an da rnyil dang shel dang gser dang dngul gyis rnam par brgyan pa dag mthong ngo /_/de nas gzhan yang brgya byin sngon du 'gro ba'i lha shing sA la zung gi nang du zhugs pa rnams ri'i rtse mo kun nas mthong na 
[\[208b.7\]]yid du 'ong ba/_bya sna tshogs 'bum snyed kyis yongs su bskor cing skad 'byin pa dag mthong ngo /_/de nas lha rnams la brgya byin gyis 'di skad smras so/_/shing sA la zung gi nang na nyams dga' ba 'di la khyed cag ltos/_lha'i rgyal pos de skad smras pa dang /_lha rnams 
[\[209a\]]
[\[209a.1\]]kyis 'di skad smras so/_/brgya byin ji lta ba bzhin mthong lags so/_/de nas lha'i 'khor de na 'di ltar lha bag med pas yid shin tu lhag par dbang du byas pa gang yin pa de dag mthong ba dang de dag bkar nas las kyi 'bras bu shin tu bstan pa'i phyir 
[\[209a.2\]]las kyi me long gi khang pa zhes bya ba der 'jug par byed do/_/de nas las kyi me long gi khang pa der zhugs nas brgya byin des bai DUr+ya'i rtsig ngos shin tu dri ma med pa/_me long g.ya' med pa ltar kun nas gsal ba de dag ston par byed do/_/de nas gzhan yang brgya byin 
[\[209a.3\]]des lha rnams la ston par byed de/_lha dag las kyi 'bras bu la nye bar spyod pa rtsig ngos me long lta bu la bris pa sna tshogs snang ba 'di yin te/_gang dang gang gis las gang byas pa dang rnam pa gang dang gus pa gang gis gang gi tshe/_zhing gang la dngos po gang byin pa 
[\[209a.4\]]ji ltar byin pa dang dad pa gang gis sbyin pa dang dus gang gi tshe byin pa de ltar yongs su bsngos pa dang /_gang gi tshe yongs su bsngos pa dang 'bras bu gang du skye bar yongs su bsngos pa dang rnam pa gang gis yongs su bsngo ba'i sbyin pa'i 'bras bu snang ba de dag la khyed cag 
[\[209a.5\]]ltos/_de nas gzhan yang brgya byin des lha de dag la rab tu ston par byed de/_'di ltar tshul khrims shin tu bsgoms pa/_'gro ba thams cad du pha ma lta bur gyur pa/_slu ba med pa/_rnam par smin pa mchog tu nyams dga' ba/_mtsho ltar rnyog pa med pa/_mtho ris su 
[\[209a.6\]]'gro ba'i sa bon gang gis gang gi tshe ji ltar gang zhig gang rnams la rnam pa gang gis tshul khrims rnam pa bdun srung ba de/_de'i tshe rnam pa des gnas skabs der skyes pa de'i tshul khrims kyi 'bras bu de/_lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du smin pa la khyed cag ltos/_de nas gzhan 
[\[209a.7\]]yang brgya byin des lha de dag nyid la der las kyi me long nyid rab tu ston par byed de/_'di ltar 'di dag kun ni las kyi 'bras bu'i tshogs yin te/_ye shes kyi sgron ma'i skyes bu gang gis gang gi tshe 'di ltar ye shes la goms shing /_yang dag pa'i lta bar gyur pa ye shes 
[\[209b\]]
[\[209b.1\]]de'i tha ma dang 'bring dang mchog zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa med pa'i 'bras bu la khyed cag ltos/_de nas gzhan yang brgya byin des lha de dag nyid la sbyin pa dang tshul khrims dang ye shes rnam pa dgu'i gnas skabs rab tu ston par byed de/_sbyin pa tha ma dang 'bring dang 
[\[209b.2\]]mchog gis mtho ris rnams su 'bras bu rnam par smin pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de la sems bsgoms shing /_zhing yon tan dang ldan la slu ba med pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan yang dngos po phun sum tshogs pa ma yin na 'bras bu de nyid chung la/_'bras bu [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]mthu 
[\[209b.3\]]bo cher 'gyur te/_dud 'gro zhig na yang 'bras bu bde ba 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/lha dag las kyi me long 'di nyid kyi nang na 'bras bu gzugs brnyan snang ba sbyin pa 'bring 'di la ltos/_las kyi 'bras bu sna tshogs bris pa'i rtsig ngos la sbyin pa'i 'bras bu 'bring ni/_
[\[209b.4\]]sems ma bsgoms shing dngos po yon tan dang yang mi ldan la/_zhing yon tan dang ldan pa kho na la sbyin pa'i 'bras bu ni/_nub kyi ba lang spyod dam shar gyi lus 'phags gling gi mi rnams kyi nang ngam dud 'gro'am gnod sbyin nam lha ma yin rnams kyi nang du 'bras bu 'thob par 
[\[209b.5\]]'gyur te/_'bras bu 'bring po thob pa de yang de ltar me long lta bur lha de dag nyid kyi mngon sum du snang ngo /_/de nas gzhan yang brgya byin gyis las kyi me long de nyid kyi nang na gzugs brnyan gyi ngo bor gyur pa/_'di ltar sbyin pa'i 'bras bu rnam pa gsum po 'di yang 
[\[209b.6\]]rab tu ston par byed do/_/gzhan yang lha khyed cag tha ma dang 'bring dang mchog la ltos shig/_de la tha ma ni rnam pa gzhan gyis mi 'gyur te/_'di ltar sems ma bsgoms la zhing phun sum tshogs pa yin no/_/de la sems ma bsgoms pa ji lta bu yin zhe na/_sbyin 
[\[209b.7\]]bdag gang srog chags la shin tu phan pa byas shing /_zhing dang dngos po rnyed kyang sems dang ba ma yin te/_lus kyis mngon par ldang ba dang /_phyag 'tshal ba la sogs pa gus par mi byed pa 'di ni zhing yon tan dang ldan zhing /_dngos po yon tan dang ldan pa yin 
[\[210a\]]
[\[210a.1\]]yang sems yon tan dang ldan pa ma yin te/_sbyin pa slu ba med pa byas pas/_ri brags sam kla klo rnams kyi rgyal po'am blon po chen por 'gyur ba las kyi me long gi sa gzhi nyid la khyed cag ltos shig ces de ltar brgya byin de lha rnams la rab tu ston 
[\[210a.2\]]par byed do/_/gzhan yang sbyin pa'i mchog 'di ni sems dang ldan pa dang /_zhing yon tan phun sum tshogs pa dang dngos po yon tan phun sum tshogs pa dang sems bsgoms pa yon tan phun sum tshogs pa yin no/_/de la zhing dam pa ni sangs rgyas la sogs 
[\[210a.3\]]pa'o/_/dngos po ni bza' ba la sogs pa'o/_/sems bsgoms pa ni sems dang ba dang gus pa yin te sbyin pa 'bras bu chen po 'di ni lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de la lha rnams kyi nang du ni lha chen por 'gyur la/_mi rnams kyi nang du ni gling 
[\[210a.4\]]bzhi pa 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rdzu 'phrul che ba/_rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa/_nye ba'i rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa/_chos dang ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su lta ba/_phun sum tshogs pa thams cad spyad nas de la brten te tshul khrims spyod cing ye shes kyang shes par 
[\[210a.5\]]byed do/_/de mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer du 'jug par byed de/_sbyin pa 'di ni bla na med cing sbyin pa 'di nyid bla na med pa yin no/_/gzhan yang sbyin pa'i 'bras bu bai DUr+ya shin tu dri ma med pa'i las kyi rtsig ngos la snang ba 'di brgya byin des lha de dag nyid la rab tu ston 
[\[210a.6\]]par byed de/_'di ltar rnam pa gzhan rnam pa gsum gyis sbyin pa'i 'bras bu gzugs brnyan snang ba 'di la ltos/_de nas yang brgya byin des lha dag la rab tu ston par byed de/_'di ltar zang zing sbyin pa dang mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa dang chos sbyin pa'o/_/de la zang zing sbyin 
[\[210a.7\]]pas ni snga ma bzhin longs spyod chen por 'gyur/_mi 'jigs pa byin pas ni yul bzang po'i rgyal por 'gyur te/_mtshon cha dang lo nyes dang dgon pa dang bral ba/_dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa dang bral ba/_'gran zla'i 'jigs pa dang bral ba/_nad kyi 
[\[210b\]]
[\[210b.1\]]'jigs pa dang bral ba/_me'i 'jigs pa dang bral ba/_chu'i 'jigs pa dang bral ba/_'chi ba'i 'jigs pa dang bral bar rgyal po'am blon po chen po yun ring du gnas par byed do/_/'di ni mi 'jigs pa byin pa'i 'bras bu las kyi me long gi nang du sbyin pa 'bring po 'di ji lta 
[\[210b.2\]]ba bzhin snang ngo /_/gzhan yang sbyin pa rnams kyi nang na sbyin pa mchog las kyi me long gi rtsig ngos la snang ba/_sbyin pa 'di dag gi nang na dam pa ni 'di lta ste/_'khor ba thams cad las nges par 'byung ba'i sa bon/_chos sbyin pa yin te/_sbyin pa mchog 'di sbyin pa'i 'bras bu ni 
[\[210b.3\]]byang chub gsum smin par 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang chos sbyin pa de nyid kyi 'bras bu snang ste/_nye bar 'tsho ba'i rgyu dang grags pa'i rgyu dang 'gran zla gzhan zil gyis gnon pa'i rgyu dang gzhan la phan gdags pa'i rgyu kho na yin no/_/de la nye bar 'tsho ba'i rgyu ni gang gzhan la 
[\[210b.4\]]phan gdags par zhugs pas ma yin gyi/_nye bar 'tsho bar bya ba'i don du chos ston par byed pa 'di ni tha ma yin te/_'di ltar gzhan la phan gdags par sems bsgoms pa'i snying gis 'chad par mi byed pa yin la nor rdzas kho na'i phyir 'chad pa yin no/_/ji 
[\[210b.5\]]ltar gzhan dag la 'chad pa de ltar sgrub pa mi byed pa 'di ni sbyin pa tha ma yin no/_/de lta bas na nor rdzas thob pa gang yin pa de dag chang gis zad par byed dam bud med dang lhan cig zad par byed pa tshul khrims rnam par spangs pa 'di ni gar mkhan lta bu'i chos nyid kho nar 
[\[210b.6\]]zhugs pa yin te chos kyi sbyin pa 'di ni 'bras bu chung ba yin no/_/de'i rnam par smin pa gar skye zhe na/_des las kyi me long la mthong ste lha rnams kyi nang du bya mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can du 'gyur la/_de bzhin du tshigs su bcad pa ston par 'gyur te 'di ni chos kyi 
[\[210b.7\]]sbyin pa tha ma yin no/_/chos kyi sbyin pa 'bring ji lta bu yin zhe na/_grags pa 'dod pa'i phyir chos 'chad pa'am chos smra ba gzhan zil gyis gnon pa'i phyir zhe sdang gi tshul gyis 'chad pa de'i chos kyi sbyin pa ni 'bras bu chung ba yin la/_de'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pas ni 
[\[211a\]]
[\[211a.1\]]lha'am mi 'bring po rnams kyi nang du smin par 'gyur te/_de ltar brgya byin des las kyi me long gi gnas dag tu lha rnams la ston par byed mthong bar byed do/_/gzhan yang chos sbyin pa mchog ni sems bsgoms pa/_skyon med pa blo gdul bar bya ba'i 
[\[211a.2\]]phyir ston pa yin la 'tsho bar mi byed log par lta ba gzhan dag kyang chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'jog par byed la 'tsho bar mi byed pa yin te/_de ltar bdag dang gzhan la phan par zhugs pa mthar mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos sbyin pa mchog yin no/_/yang brgya byin des chos 
[\[211a.3\]]kyi sbyin pa de nyid kyi 'bras bu rnam pa gzhan gyis lha rnams la ston par byed yang dag par 'chad par byed de/_shes rab kyis ma grol ba ni tha ma yin no/_/tshul khrims la zhugs pa ni 'bring yin no/_/shes rab kyis rnam par grol ba ni mchog yin no/_/de la shes rab tha 
[\[211a.4\]]ma ni de sbyin pa'i gtam dang yang dag par ldan pa shin tu khong du chud par chos ston pa ma yin la sbyin pa'i 'bras bu 'ba' zhig ston pa yin te de rgyu de dang gzhi de la brten nas sbyin pa la gnas shing tshul khrims dang shes rab la yang gnas so/_/de dad pa 'ba' zhig gi rjes su 
[\[211a.5\]]'brang ba yin la/_dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa gnyi ga'i cha las rnam par grol ba 'di chos sbyin pa tha ma yin te/_'di ltar sbyin pa'i gtam dang ldan pa 'di ni chos sbyin pa yin no/_/chos sbyin pa 'bring ni tshul khrims kyi gtam dang rab tu ldan zhing sems yongs su bsgoms pas 
[\[211a.6\]]ston pa shes rab 'bring yin la/_de'i las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa ni las kyi me long gi rtsig ngos kyi nang na snang ste/_'di ltar shes rab kyi rjes su 'brang ba dgra bcom pa'am shin tu myur bar zag pa zad par byed na rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur te/_chos sbyin pa 'bring de'i rgyus 
[\[211a.7\]]las kyi rnam par smin pa las kyi me long gi nang na snang ngo /_/gzhan yang chos sbyin pa mchog ni 'di lta ste/_sems shin tu yongs su bsgoms pa/_'dod pa med par shes pa sbyin zhing yon tan 'ba' zhig mngon par rjod par byed/_gzhan la phan gdags par zhugs pa chos 
[\[211b\]]
[\[211b.1\]]ston pa yin te 'di lta ste/_'dod pa'i nyes dmigs kyi ro myang ba las nges par 'byung ba'am/_gzhan log pa'i lta ba la zhugs pa yang chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'jog par byed cing /_chos 'dul ba skyon med pa yang ston par byed pa yin te 'di ni chos sbyin pa mchog yin no/_/
[\[211b.2\]]de'i 'bras bu ni byang chub tu 'gyur te yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bla na med pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_chos 'dul ba bla na med pa/_thog ma dang bar dang tha mar dge ba/_de ni chos sbyin pa mchog 
[\[211b.3\]]yin no/_/de ltar brgya byin des las kyi me long gi rtsig ngos la rnam pa du ma yod pa lha rnams la ston par byed de/_de ltar thams cad ston par byed do/_/'di ltar lha gzhan gang yin pa de dag la mngon par brtags na/_lha de dag kun nas shin tu ngo tsha bar gyur pa dang de dag 
[\[211b.4\]]la de ltar ma byed cig_/'di ltar srid pa dang srid par rgyu dang 'thun par 'bras bu mngon par 'grub bo zhes bstan te/_de ltar zla ba bas lhag pa'i lus gang yin pa de dag mthong nas/_bdag gi drung du lhags pa de dag nyid la bstan pa'i phyir/_las byas pa 'dis/_las 
[\[211b.5\]]tha ma dang 'bring dang mchog dang gsum po 'di dag lha rnams la bstan pa yin te lha dag ngo tsha bar byas pas des chog chog_/de nas lha de rnams kyis ma mthong ba ngo mtshar che ba de la mngon par brtags nas 'khor ba la shin tu yid skyo ba rnams kyis 'di ltar tshigs su bcad de smras 
[\[211b.6\]]pa/_'dod pa don med rgyags pas myos/_/lha rnams rang bzhin stobs chung ba/_/'dod pa rnams kyis 'khyam zhing rtse/_/'jigs pa chen po mi mthong ngo /_/'dod pa mi phan byed rnams la/_/lha gang yid ni rton byed pa/_/legs byas zad nas blun po dag_/phyi nas 
[\[211b.7\]]so sor rig par 'gyur/_/lha rnams la ni bye brag tu/_/phun sum ldan pa mod la 'jig_/ji lta ji ltar bde dang dga'/_/de 'jig de ltar nyon mongs so/_/gang tshe lha yi 'jig rten nas/_/sems can dmyal bar lha ltung ba/_/lus dang yid kyi sdug bsngal gyis/_/
[\[212a\]]
[\[212a.1\]]thams cad du ni gnod par 'gyur/_/de yi sdug bsngal shin tu tsha/_/de ni tshad gzung mi nus so/_/sdug bsngal rnams kyi nang na mchog_/'bral ba sdug bsngal yongs su rjod/_/de yang lha yi tshogs nang na/_/gtso bor rtag tu yang dag 'jug_/sems 
[\[212a.2\]]kyis yongs su bslus pa yi/_/lha rnams kyis kyang mi mthong ngo /_/'dod pas shin tu bslus pa rnams/_/da ltar bzang ba skad cig ste/_/brgya dang 'bum dang de bzhin du/_/bye ba ther 'bum phrag brgya yi/_/'dod pa thob kyang 'jig 'gyur ba/_/de la mi dag yid ma rton/_/legs 
[\[212a.3\]]par byas pa'i las kyi rgyus/_/de yi 'bras bu rtag tu bde/_/shing nyams 'bras bu med pa ltar/_/rgyu zad nas ni 'bras bu med/_/bag med de nyid mthong rnams kyis/_/srog zad byed pa dug ltar mthong /_/rtag tu me ltar sreg byed cing /_/mtshon cha ltar ni gcod par byed/_/
[\[212a.4\]]sngon ni mdza' bshes lta bur mthong /_/phyi nas dgra lta bur mthong ngo /_/lus can kun la bag med pa/_/mchil pa lta bur rab tu 'jug_/lha dang lha min mi dag dang /_/klu rnams la yang khyad par du/_/don rnams thams cad med byed pa/_/de yis bag med rgyu mthong ngo /_/
[\[212a.5\]]brgya byin bdag cag bsod nams kyis/_/legs par bgyis pa dag kyang bsrungs/_/khyod kyis srid pa'i btson ra gang /_/'di dag thams cad bstan pa las/_/de ltar brgya byin lha de la/_/smras nas de la 'di skad smras/_/brgya byin khyod la ngo mtshar rmad/_/chen po 'di 
[\[212a.6\]]ni su yis bstan/_/de la brgya byin des smras pa/_/gang gis bstan 'di nga las nyon/_/bdag skyes pa na sngon gyi lha phreng bzang zhes bya ba zhig yod de/_de dang bdag shin tu bshes par gyur to/_/des brgyud pa las thos la 'ga' zhig gi phyir yang 'di ltar bcom ldan 
[\[212a.7\]]'das 'od srung zhes bya ba zhig gdul ba'i dbang gis mtho ris 'dir gshegs zhes thos so/_/des kyang lha shin tu bag med par gnas pa rnams rtag tu gzigs nas/_de dag la phan par mdzad pa'i phyir shing sA la zung 'di bskrun to/_/las kyi me long sprul pa'i nang de 
[\[212b\]]
[\[212b.1\]]yang bdag cag rab tu bag med par gyur pa dang khyod bag med par ma gnas shig ces lha des shin tu bstan te 'di ltar 'dus byas thams cad ni log par ltung ba yin la/_gang gi tshe khyod dam lha bag med par gnas pa gzhan dag phan tshun gzugs tha ma dang 'bring dang mchog 
[\[212b.2\]]la ngo tsha dang bcas par gyur pa de'i tshe/_khyod kyis lha dad pa can bag yod pa la gnas pa ma yin pa gang yin pa de dag nang du bcug ste/_'di dag bstan cing de rnams la rmad du byung ba 'di yang dag par bstan par bya'o/_/'di ltar bcom ldan 'das des kyang lha rnams la 
[\[212b.3\]]phan par mdzad pa'i phyir 'di bstan cing /_lha dag kyang btul la las kyi me long gis rgyags pa dang phral nas dge ba'i lam la rab tu bkod de/_de nas yang slar 'dzam bu'i gling du gshegs so zhes bstan to/_/lha de las bdag gis de skad thos te thos nas kyang gcig tu 
[\[212b.4\]]'ga' la lha de dag ngo tsha ba dang bcas te lhags so/_/de dag gi ngo tsha ba bsal ba'i phyir dang bag med pa dang dregs pa bsal ba'i phyir las kyi me long gi rtsig ngos la bris pa tha ma dang 'bring dang mchog 'di khyed cag la rab tu bstan pa yin no/_/gzhan yang shing sA la zung gnyis pa 'di 
[\[212b.5\]]nyid du 'jug par bya'o/_/de yang de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das 'od srung de nyid kyis lha rnams la phan par mdzad pa'i phyir/_las kyi dra ba skye ba dang 'chi ba lta bur sprul pa mdzad pa de yang bdag gis khyed cag la rab tu bstan par bya'o/_/de nas de skad smras nas/_yang brgya byin 
[\[212b.6\]]gyis lha de dag la 'di skad du/_bcom ldan 'das 'od srung de la spyi bos phyag 'tshal lo zhes smras nas/_de nas yang de ltar sgo de nyid nas phyir byung ba dang sgo yang de bzhin du bcad do/_/de nas lha yid rab tu dga' ba/_phyi rol gyi skyed mos tshal na dga' spyod byed par zhugs pa/_
[\[212b.7\]]sil snyan gyi sgra rnam pa sna tshogs 'byin pa rab tu myos pa bro rdung zhing dgod pa gang yin pa de dag gis brgya byin nye ba na 'dug par rig nas mgo bos so sor phyag 'tshal nas/_yang yid shin tu chags pa dag bro rdung bar byed dgod par byed phan tshun pad ma dag blangs nas rdeg par byed do/_/
[\[213a\]]
[\[213a.1\]]de nas brgya byin dang lhan cig shing sA la zung der zhugs pa'i lha gang yin pa de dag gis lha de rnams la rmad du byung ba de dag ston par byed kyang /_bag med pa'i dbang du gyur pa de dag nyan par yang mi byed la rmad du byung ba de la gang yang dad pa mi skyed do/_/de nas brgya 
[\[213a.2\]]byin yang lha de rnams kyi sems bsrung ba'i phyir spyod pa de dag nyid dang lhan cig pad ma'i tshal de rnams na dga' bar byed cing sil snyan dang rol mo'i sgra sna tshogs 'byin pa/_phan tshun grogs su gyur pa/_rgyags pa 'ba' zhig don du byed pa/_lha'i phreng ba dang rgyan dang ldan pa/_shin 
[\[213a.3\]]tu bde ba dang ldan pa/_'dod pa'i yid la rab tu myos pa rang gi legs par byas pa la chags pa rnams tshal dang nye ba'i tshal dag na yongs su spyod par byed dga' bar byed mchog tu dga' bar byed do/_/de rnams kyi nang na las byas pa'i me long gi gnas rmad du byung ba mthong ba'i lha 
[\[213a.4\]]gang yin pa de dag bya ba byas pa bzhin du rgyags pa'i spyod lam la gnas pa dang bral zhing sems snying rje can du gyur nas lha de dag la mngon par rtog pa na/_kye ma lha rab tu myos par gnas pa 'di dag gis ni 'di ltar nges par ltung bar 'gyur zhing lhung nas kyang /_sems can 
[\[213a.5\]]dmyal ba dang [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang dud 'gro rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur la/_'khor ba'i mthar gtugs pa'i bar du las la rton pa las kyi rang bzhin can dag ji ltar las dge ba'am sdig pa byed pa de de bzhin du las kyi skal bar 'gyur ba dag mi shes so snyam nas/_de ltar lha de 
[\[213a.6\]]rnams lha de dag la snying rje bar byed do/_/de nas chos bzang na gnas pa'i lha phyi ma de dag kyang brgya byin la 'di ltar lha'i rgyal po khyod kyi bka' drin la bdag cag 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga 'byor cing ldan par gyur pa rnams kyis lha'i tshal dang nye ba'i tshal dag na dga' bar bgyid 
[\[213a.7\]]dga' dgur spyod par bgyid na/_lha'i rgyal po bdag cag la dgongs par mi mdzad dam zhes smras so/_/de nas brgya byin gyis 'di ltar tshigs su bcad de 'di skad smras pa/_lha dag bdag ni byed pa mang /_/bag med pa la gnas pa med/_/gang zag bag med dbang 
[\[213b\]]
[\[213b.1\]]gyur pa/_/de nyid rab tu mi mthong ngo /_/rtag tu bag med dbang gyur gang /_/de ni dge ba'i 'os min te/_/dge ba spangs pa'i gang zag ni/_/sems can dmyal bar nye bar 'dren/_/dga' zhing yid du 'ong ba kun/_/rab tu 'bral bar 'gyur srid kyang /_/'tsho ba'i mtha' ni 'chi 
[\[213b.2\]]ba dag_/lha yis shin tu mi mthong ngo /_/'chi ba'i tshe na 'byung ba gang /_/dbang po sems ni blong ba dag_/nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba gang /_/sdug bsngal mi bzad de shes kyi/_/srid gsum 'dus byas thams cad ni/_/mgal me'i 'khor lo lta bu dang /_/dri za'i grong 
[\[213b.3\]]khyer lta bu dang /_/dbu ba chu bur lta bu ste/_/rmongs pa dbu ba'i phung po la/_/mal stan 'ding bar byed pa gang /_/rmongs pa 'dus byas byed pa de/_/mi brtan bdag nyid mngon par chags/_/las kyis yongs su sbrel ba ni/_/'chi ba'i tshe na lha dang mi/_/de bzhin gnod sbyin lha 
[\[213b.4\]]ma yin/_/klu dang mkha' lding skyob mi byed/_/'chi ba'i rgyal po mi bzad pa/_/ji srid ma 'ongs bar du ni/_/de srid legs par byas spyod pa/_/phyi nas gdung bar ma byed cig_/srid pas de dag yang drangs pa/_/yul rnams la ni rgyug par byed/_/khyed la du mar bsgo ba yin/_/
[\[213b.5\]]bag med rnams la ma chags shig_/yul gyis dam du bcings pa ni/_/sems can dmyal ba kun gyi rgyu/_/de bas gtan du spangs nas su/_/nges par legs par yid la byos/_/de ltar brgya byin des lha de rnams la rjes su bstan pa dang 'di ltar bde ba de'i dbang du gyur 
[\[213b.6\]]pa rnams cung zad kyang sems la mi 'jog go/_las kyi me long mngon sum du mthong ba'i lha gang yin pa de dag ni ma gtogs te/_de rnams ni shin tu yi chad nas brgya byin la 'di skad smras so/_/lha'i dbang po 'di ltar shing sA la zung gnyis par gshegs dang /_de nas yang 
[\[213b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das 'od srung des lha bag med pas rmongs pa rnams la phan par bgyi ba'i slad du/_las kyi dra ba skye ba dang 'chi bar 'thun pa'i sprul pa gang lags pa de dag lha'i rgyal pos bdag cag la rab tu bstan du gsol/_de nas brgya byin gyis lha shin tu bag med pas 
[\[214a\]]
[\[214a.1\]]gnas pa dag rig nas tshal dang nye ba'i tshal rnams su rtse bar dong ngo /_/de nas yang lha rnam par g.yengs pa de rnams dang shin tu yi chad pa dag dang yang lhan cig shing sA la zung gnyis pa ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/_de bzhin du des sdong po de nyid kyi 
[\[214a.2\]]sgo 'byed par byed do/_/'byed pa dang de bzhin du sgo phye ste/_brgya byin de lha de rnams dang lhan cig de nyid du zhugs pa dang lha rnams kyis tshal dang nye ba'i tshal nyams dga' ba/_sngon chad gar yang ma mthong ba'i dga' ba gang yin pa de dag dang 'dod pa thams cad 'byor pa/_
[\[214a.3\]]bya rnam pa sna tshogs kun nas long long por 'khod pa/_pad ma'i tshal gyis brgyan pa/_gser btso ma'i shing ljon pas kun nas 'khrigs pa thams cad du mthong na dga' zhing yid du 'ong ba/_'jig rten gyi bde ba'i mchog blta na sdug pa/_rlung bsten na bde ba/_ri'i 
[\[214a.4\]]zom yang rin po che'i rdo sna bdun gyis rnam par brgyan pa/_bya rnam pa sna tshogs skad 'byin pa mthong ngo /_/dpag bsam gyi shing nyi ma ltar gzi che bas kun nas gsal ba yin te/_nyi ma lta bu de rnams kyis shing sA la'i nang de dag thams cad rnam par gsal ba/_
[\[214a.5\]]bza' ba dang btung ba'i chu bo yang dri dang ro dang mdog sna tshogs su 'bab pa rnams mthu rab tu che bar 'bab pa/_de'i nang na dri shin tu mi bzad par zhim po yod de/_yon tan sna tshogs phun sum tshogs pa de rnams snas rim gyis shin tu myong bar byed do/_/de ltar dbang po 
[\[214a.6\]]lnga rnams kyi yul lnga sems dang ldan pa ltar sdug par ston pa/_nyi ma nub pa ltar mi rtag ste 'phral 'phral la byung ba'i stobs kyis/_dbang du gyur pa'i lha gang yin pa de rnams kyi dbang po yang shin tu bde ba nyid yin na/_gang las bar mas nye bar 'gro ba rnams lta 
[\[214a.7\]]smos kyang ci dgos/_de nas lha'i rgyal po brgya byin tshal dang nye ba'i tshal shin tu nyams dga' ba gang yin pa de dag thams cad de rnams la yang dag par bstan te de dag gi khyad par ni phyi rol na gnas pa rnams kyi tshal dang nye ba'i tshal nyams dga' ba gang yin pa de dag 
[\[214b\]]
[\[214b.1\]]de'i bcu drug gi char yang mi phod do/_/de nas lha'i dbang pos thams cad ma lus par bstan nas rdo shin tu gsal ba las sa gzhi byas pa/_lhag par nyams dga' ba bstan par bya ba'i phyir ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do/_/bai DUr+ya'i khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ka ba stong yod la pad ma rA ga'i 
[\[214b.2\]]lan kan bres pa/_sa gzhi gser las byas pa/_tshur dpag tshad lnga yod la/_zheng du dpag tshad gsum yod pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'od srung de'i rdzu 'phrul gyis mdzad pa yin no/_/de nas brgya byin khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]rin po che sna bdun gyi them skas kyis brgyan pa de la lha de rnams 
[\[214b.3\]]dang lhan cig der 'dzegs pa dang khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]de la/_bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyi gzugs brnyan sprul pa gang yin pa de la/_'di ni bcom ldan 'das nyid chos ston pa yin no snyam du sems so/_/de nas brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi gzugs brnyan de la mgo bos phyag 
[\[214b.4\]]'tshal te/_lha'i tshogs rnams dang lhan cig shin tu gus par gyur pa'i yid kyis phyag 'tshal nas/_'di ltar tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_rab tu grol ba skyob mdzad cing /_/zhi ba dang ni thar pa'i sgo/_/'byed par mdzad pa 'jig rten mgon/_/de yi gzugs brnyan 
[\[214b.5\]]'di bzhugs so/_/mi gang zhi ba'i yid kyis su/_/'di la rtag tu phyag 'tshal na/_/de ni srid pa'i 'jigs las thar/_/mya ngan 'das pa'ang rtogs par 'gyur/_/mya ngan 'das grong ston mdzad pa/_/chos 'di gsung ba gang yin pa/_/de ni zhi ba mchog tu dga'/_/de ni 
[\[214b.6\]]mtha' las byung zhes bya/_/skyes bu brtan po rtsal po ches/_/de yi bka' la brten na ni/_/gtan du bde ba 'byung ba gang /_/rtag pa'i gnas ni 'thob par 'gyur/_/skyes bu de nyid sems pa po/_/sgrol byed 'di la brten nas su/_/srid gsum rgya mtsho chu bo'i klong /_/
[\[214b.7\]]mi bzad 'jigs las sgrol bar byed/_/'di ni 'jig rten bcas pa'i mig_/kun nas 'bral ba'i mig rnams yin/_/shing las byung ba me min gyi/_/'di ni me yi nang na mchog_/'dod chags la sogs dri ma yis/_/mi rnams sems la sdig bcas pa/_/khyu mchog 
[\[215a\]]
[\[215a.1\]]de'i bka' ye shes chus/_/dag pa nyid du 'khru bar mdzad/_/mu stegs shes pa'i nga rgyal can/_/kun gyis gnas gang ma mthong ba/_/gnas de khyod kyi dri ma med/_/gsung rnams kyis ni mi la bstan/_/skye bo shin tu bag med pa/_/'di dag mgon 
[\[215a.2\]]po khyod kyis bsgral/_/mgon po rgal nas pha rol gshegs/_/skye bo gzhan yang sgrol bar mdzad/_/skye bo kun la sman slad du/_/khyod nyid gcig pur bzhugs par byas/_/phan med rnams la phan mdzad phyir/_/khyod nyid kho na mi mchog lags/_/de ltar 
[\[215a.3\]]brgya byin des gzugs brnyan de la bstod cing /_gus par phyag 'tshal/_lha thams cad dang bcas pas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi gzugs brnyan sprul pa de la mngon par phyag 'tshal/_na bza' chos gos byin gyis brlabs pa thags su ma btags pa gang yin 
[\[215a.4\]]pa de la yang lha rnams mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_gzugs brnyan de mthong nas yang rgyags pa nyid yongs su nyams par gyur to/_/de'i rdzu 'phrul gyis mdzad pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi rnam pa ji lta bur bzhugs pa de lta bur brgya byin gyis 'bum gyi char yang mi phod na/_
[\[215a.5\]]lha gzhan gyis lta smos kyang ci dgos/_de nas brgya byin gyis rdzu 'phrul mdzad pa'i gzugs brnyan de mthong nas/_de nas yang lha de rnams la phan par bya ba dang lha bag med pas myos pa rnams/_bag med pa dang dbral bar bya ba'i phyir/_las kyi dra ba skye ba dang 'chi 
[\[215a.6\]]ba'i ngo bo rdzu 'phrul byas pa de bstan to/_/de nas lha de rnams kyis brgya byin la smras pa/_lha'i dbang po 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das des shing sA la zung 'di'i nang du las kyi dra ba skye ba dang 'chi ba'i ngo bo 'di sprul pa mdzad la/_slad rol du ci'i slad du ma mdzad/_'di ltar nga 
[\[215a.7\]]yang de la ngo mtshar cher skyes te/_de nas lha des nga rgyags pa dang dbral bar bya ba'i phyir 'di bstan to/_/de nyid la ngas dris pa dang des smras pa/_'di ltar 'di rtag tu mthong ba dang skye bo thams cad ngo mtshar cher skyes te/_de ngo mtshar che bar rig nas 'jigs par bya ba dang 
[\[215b\]]
[\[215b.1\]]dad par bya ba dang dang bar bya ba'i phyir/_rgyu 'dis na bcom ldan 'das des phyi rol du sprul pa ma mdzad do/_/phyi rol du sprul pa mdzad na ni skye bo kun gyis yang dang yang du mthong zhing /_phan mi thogs la gzugs brnyan de zhig par yang 'gyur te/_rgyu 'dis na shing sA la zung gi 
[\[215b.2\]]nang du sprul pa 'di mdzad cing /_shing sA la zung gi nang du ngo mtshar che ba'i sprul pa gnyis mdzad do/_/gang skye bo kun gyis blta bar mi bya ba'i rgyu 'dis na bcom ldan 'das des shing ljon pa'i nang du skye ba dang 'chi ba'i ngo bo las kyi dra ba'i sprul pa 'di mdzad do/_/de nas 
[\[215b.3\]]brgya byin las lha rnams kyis de skad thos nas ngo mtshar che'o snyam pa dang bral nas/_de nas yang skye ba dang 'chi ba'i ngo bo las kyi dra ba de khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dpag tshad lnga pa'i rtsig ngos dag la bris pa de dag rab tu bstan par brtsams so/_/de la re zhig dang por srog gcod pa 
[\[215b.4\]]rnams kyi gnas kyang sngar bstan pa bzhin gnod pa yang sngar bstan pa bzhin du sbyar te/_sems can dmyal ba yang sos 'khor bcu drug pa sprul to/_/de nas thar nas gal te [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams kyi nang du skyes na/_shin tu phrag dog can dang shin tu khro bar 'gyur la/_de 
[\[215b.5\]]gzhan gyis mtshon cha rnam pa du ma dag gis gsod par byed do/_/de nas las kyi dra bas 'brel pa dud 'gro rnams kyi nang du skyes na de sha za ba'i skye gnas su skye bar 'gyur la/_de sha'i don du mtshon cha dag gis bsad nas za bar byed do/_/de bzhin du sha rjen za ba seng 
[\[215b.6\]]ge dang stag dag gi skye gnas su skye bar 'gyur la shin tu mi sdug pa de mtshon chas gsod par 'gyur ro/_/de nas shi nas gal te mi rnams kyi nang du skyes na/_de shin tu thab mo byed pa 'khrug pa la dga' la sems bde bar mi gnas pa kho na yin te/_de mtshon gyis 
[\[215b.7\]]bsad nas tshe thung bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las 'ga' zhig gis lha rnams kyi nang du skyes na/_de bong skyed dang mdog dang dbyibs rnams nyams par 'gyur la tshe thung bar 'gyur te/_lha dang lha ma yin gyi g.yul du gsod par 
[\[216a\]]
[\[216a.1\]]'gyur ba de dag gi rnam pa rtsig ngos dag la snang ngo /_/de nas srog gcod pa dang ma byin par len pa'i rgyu las byung ba'i sems can dmyal ba chen po gzhan thig nag 'khor bcu drug pa sngar bstan pa bzhin mthong ngo /_de nas shi nas gal te [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]
[\[216a.2\]]rnams kyi nang du skyes na/_de snga ma bzhin du mtshon gyis gsod par 'gyur ro/_/gal te res 'ga' yang mi gsod pa'am gzhan zhig gam de dang 'thun pa zhig srog 'tsho ba'i don du rnyed na/_de [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]gzhan gyis yan lag dang nying lag thams cad phye mar brlags 
[\[216a.3\]]nas 'phrog par byed do/_/de rgyu des shi nas gal te dud 'gro rnams kyi nang du skyes na de bya khug rta'am 'brog dgon pa chu dang bral ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/bkres pa dang skom pas gdungs pa'i lus de nas kyang shi nas gal te mi rnams kyi nang du skyes na/_dbul 
[\[216a.4\]]po de yul mtshon gyis 'khrug pa'am lo nyes byung bar skye bar 'gyur te/_mtshon gyis 'chi ba'am ltogs te 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/gang gi tshe res 'ga' yang bza' ba zhig rnyed na de gzhan gyis 'phrog par byed la zos na yang 'ju bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de nas shi nas kyang gal te 
[\[216a.5\]]lha rnams kyi nang du skyes na/_de'i lus dang bong skyed dang mdog dang dbyibs de dag dman par 'gyur ro/_/bdud rtsi yang skyon dang bcas par 'byung ste/_de lha gzhan rnams kyi drung du shin tu ngo tsha bas skyengs par 'gyur ro/_/sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pa yang mi snyan par 
[\[216a.6\]]'gyur la tshe thung bar yang 'gyur te/_de ltar lha rnams kyis las kyis byas pa'i sprul pa de mthong ngo /_/de nas yang brgya byin dang lha rnams kyis/_sems can dmyal ba bsdus gzhom der las kyi rnam pa srog gcod pa dang ma byin par len pa dang 'dod pas log par g.yem 
[\[216a.7\]]pa spyad pas skye bar 'gyur ba 'khor bcu drug pa sngar bstan pa bzhin mthong ngo /_/de nas thar nas gal te [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams kyi nang du skyes na/_de tshe ring bar 'gyur zhing res 'ga' srog gzungs kyi zas rnyed pa gang yin pa de dag kyang gzhan gyis phrogs la/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]skyugs pa 
[\[216b\]]
[\[216b.1\]]za ba rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de'i chung ma gang yin pa de de'i mngon sum du [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]gzhan dag gis 'phrog par byed la/_de mtshon cha blangs nas mtshon gyis btab ste gsod par byed do/_/de nas thar nas kyang gal te dud 'gro rnams kyi nang du skyes na de ma he 
[\[216b.2\]]dang rta dang ba lang dang skyugs pa za ba la sogs pa'i nang du skye zhing tshe ring bar 'gyur/_bdog pa gzhan gang yin pa de dag kyang mthu chung ngur gyur pas gzhan dag gis 'phrog par byed do/_/de nas thar nas kyang gal te mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mi'i nang du skyes na/_de 
[\[216b.3\]]tshe thung zhing dbul ba dang de'i chung ma yang gzhan gyis 'phrog par 'gyur ro/_/de'i las kyi rtsig ngos dag la gzugs brnyan bris pa 'di lta bu yang snang ste 'di lta ste sems can dmyal ba chen po ngu 'bod 'khor dang bcas pa'i las kyi 'bras bu sngar bstan pa bzhin snang ngo /_/de 
[\[216b.4\]]nas thar nas kyang gal te [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams kyi nang du skyes na/_de rtag tu tshe ring ba nyid du 'gyur zhing las de smin par 'gyur ba ji lta ba bzhin dam pa chad pa'i sa'am khab mgrin rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de rang bzhin gyis bkres pas nyam thag cing rang gi chung 
[\[216b.5\]]ma gang yin pa de gzhan dag gis 'phrog par byed do/_/de gal te yang rgyags pa'i tshul dang rgyags pa'i rgyus dug za bar byed la/_de dug gi me mi bzad pas sreg par byed do/_/de las thar nas kyang gal te dud 'gro rnams kyi nang du skyes na/_de phan tshun za 
[\[216b.6\]]ba'i sdug bsngal gyis mngon par nyams par 'gyur/_de nas thar nas kyang gal te lha rnams kyi nang du skyes na/_de las de dang rgyu 'thun par bong skyed dang mdog dang dbyibs dman zhing tshe thung ba dang lha dang lha ma yin gyi g.yul 'gyed par 'chi ba dang de'i lus la rin po 
[\[216b.7\]]che btags pa yang 'od mi gsal ba dang de'i lha mo yang gus par mi nyan cing gzhan du 'gro ba dang de'i bdud rtsi yang ro chung ba dang blo zhan pa dang sems g.yengs pa dang de la lha gzhan rnams kyis gnod par byed do/_/de nas yang brgya byin de dang lha de rnams dang lhan cig 
[\[217a\]]
[\[217a.1\]]las kyi rtsig ngos de dag nyid la rtog par byed de/_'di ltar sems can dmyal ba ngu 'bod 'khor dang bcas pa'i las kyi 'bras bu sngar bstan pa bzhin mthong ngo /_/de nas thar nas kyang gal te [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams kyi nang du skyes na snga ma bzhin du 'gyur la 
[\[217a.2\]]khyad par du 'byung ba ni/_de gang dang gang du 'gro ba de dang der lce bcad cing bcad cing skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas thar nas kyang gal te dud 'gro rnams kyi nang du skyes na/_de bya gong ma sreg dang sreg pa dang ka ra ka b+ha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur la/[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba de 
[\[217a.3\]]dang rgyu 'thun par rang gis skad phyung ba nyid kyis gsod par byed do/_/de nas thar nas kyang gal te mi rnams kyi nang du skyes na/_de'i las kyi 'bras bu snga ma dang 'thun par tshig gzung bar 'os par mi 'gyur ro/_/de nas thar nas kyang gal te legs par byas pa'i las kyis 
[\[217a.4\]]lha rnams kyi nang du skyes na/_de [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smras pa'i las de dang rgyu 'thun par sgra mi snyan pa'am glu blang bar mi nus pa'am skad gag gag po'am lha kun gyi nang na tshig gzung bar mi 'os pa dang ji ltar lha gzhan dag smra ba de ltar mngon par brjod pa legs par sbyar ba shin tu yid du 'ong 
[\[217a.5\]]bar smra mi nus par 'gyur ro/_/de nas yang brgya byin de sems can dmyal ba tsha ba'i las kyi 'bras bu la sngar bstan pa bzhin rtog par byed do/_/de las thar nas gal te [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams kyi nang du skyes na ljan ljin spyod pa rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur te/_de snga ma bzhin 
[\[217a.6\]]du lnga 'gyur gyis sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te dud 'gro rnams kyi nang du skyes na de rgya mtsho'i chu srin du 'gyur ro/_/gal te mi rnams kyi nang du skyes na bzhin mi sdug par 'gyur ro/_/de nas kyang thar nas gal te lha rnams kyi nang du skyes na de snga ma bzhin du smad par 'gyur 
[\[217a.7\]]ro/_/rab tu tsha ba dang mnar med pa'i las kyi rnam par smin pa dag ni lha rnams mthong ba tsam nyid kyis shi bar gyur na mi rung ngo snyam nas/_sems can dmyal ba chen po de gnyis kyi 'jigs pa dag sprul pa ma mdzad de/_lha yul rnams su sems can dmyal ba de 
[\[217b\]]
[\[217b.1\]]gnyis kyi skye ba sprul pa ma mdzad do//_//'phags pa dam pa'i chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa/_bam po sum cu dgu pa/_de nas brgya byin gyis lha de rnams mngon par mthong nas 'di ltar tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_ji ltar phyag dar rnams la rlung /_/bab 
[\[217b.2\]]na yang dag 'thor byed cing /_/dbang med mkha' la 'khyam pa ltar/_/las 'gro skye dgu de bzhin no/_/dbye ba dang ni 'bral ba dang /_/bde dang de bzhin sdug bsngal dag_/las la rag las de med par/_/de bas cung zad 'jug mi 'gyur/_/thub pa de nyid gzigs pa 
[\[217b.3\]]yis/_/las kyi phyogs 'di sprul pa mdzad/_/sems kyi sa bon las rnams ni/_/'di ltar kun nas mtha' med do/_/las rnams kyang ni sna tshogs la/_/de yis 'gro 'di sna tshogs byas/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ma gtogs par/_/sems dang ldan pas shes par 
[\[217b.4\]]dka'/_/gcig dang brgya dang stong dang ni/_/khri phrag dang ni 'bum rnams kyis/_/sna tshogs su ni skyed byed pa/_/las kyi dra ba 'di che'o/_/ji ltar skud pas btags pa yi/_/bya dag thag ring gnas pa yang /_/kun tu drangs nas 'ching byed ltar/_/las skud 'di yang de 
[\[217b.5\]]dang 'dra/_/de ltar brgya byin des/_lha de rnams la sems can rnams kyi tshe 'di la myong bar 'gyur ba dang /_myong bar 'gyur bar ma nges pa dang /_skyes nas myong bar 'gyur ba dang /_lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i ngo mtshar che ba rnam pa du ma de dag bstan cing /_
[\[217b.6\]]de nas yang dge ba dang mi dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa rnam pa mtha' yas pa dang las kyi dra ba mtha' yas pa bstan nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi gzugs brnyan sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa de dag la/_lha de rnams dang lhan cig mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/_de nas yang 
[\[217b.7\]]'khor ba la yid skyo ba'i lha de rnams dang lhan cig shing sA la zung de nas byung ngo /_/de nas sgo de brgya byin des ji ltar sngar bcad pa de ltar bcad do/_/de nas brgya byin phyir byung nas lha de rnams la rtog par byed de/_bag med par gnas pa rnams phan tshun rtse zhing dga' 
[\[218a\]]
[\[218a.1\]]dgur spyod pa mthong ba dang /_lha'i rgyal po de snying rje skyes nas 'di ltar tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_bag med pa yis yongs bslus pa/_/de yi blo la 'khrig pa dang /_/zas la rtag tu dga' ba rnams/_/lha yi lus mdog dud 'gror zad/_/gang tshe 
[\[218a.2\]]legs par spyad pa'i las/_/lha yi gnas nas zad gyur na/_/de tshe phyir yang khyod nyid go/_/bag med pa la spyod par 'gyur/_/bag med dgra yis zin pa dang /_/las kyi rlung gis bdas pa rnams/_/'gro ba de dang de dag tu/_/lha rnams shing bzhin ltung bar 'gyur/_/lha yi 
[\[218a.3\]]gnas nas lan brgya'am/_/khri phrag nyid du skye 'chi yang /_/skyo ba skyed par mi byed pa/_/snying la mya ngan rab tu skye/_/de ltar brgya byin de lha dag gi drung du 'gro bar byed la/_de dag kyang lha'i rgyal po de nyid mthong nas yid rab tu dga' zhing gus pa dang bcas pas rings par 
[\[218a.4\]]dong ngo /_/de nas brgya byin lha de dag nyid dang lhan cig sems gzung bar bya ba'i don du/_sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pa tshal dang nye ba'i tshal nyams dga' ba rnams su bro gar byed dga' dgur spyod par byed do/_/shing sA la zung gi phyi rol dag na gnas pa'i lha gang yin pa 
[\[218a.5\]]de dag kyang 'bab chu dang tshal dang nye ba'i tshal dang ldan pa de rnams na dga' bar byed do/_/brgya byin yang chos bzang na 'khod pa'i lha thams cad dang lhan cig chos bzang de nyid du dong ngo /_/shing sA la zung gi nang na 'khod pa'i lha de dag kyang ji srid du 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba'i 
[\[218a.6\]]las byas shing bsags pa de zad cing mthar thug par ma gyur pa de srid du dga' bar byed do/_/de nas phyis lha'i 'jig rten de nas 'chi bar 'gyur te/_shi nas kyang las nye bar 'gro ba ji lta ba bzhin sems can dmyal ba dang [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang dud 'gro'i nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[218a.7\]]gal te mi dang so so yang dag par myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyis mi'i nang du skyes nas/_de las de dang rgyu 'thun par rtag tu bde ba dang ldan zhing tshal gyi bdag po tshal gyis 'tsho ba dang tshal gyi nang na 'tsho ba'am ri ma la ya na gnas shing rtag tu bde ba dang ldan par 'gyur ba 
[\[218b\]]
[\[218b.1\]]mthong ngo /_/de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de/_sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas la rtog par byed de/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas mig phye zhing 'gro ba dang btsums nas 'gro ba zhes 
[\[218b.2\]]bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo /_/der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/_legs par byas pa'i las kyi mtha' spyad pa/_drang po'i rang bzhin can g.yo sgyu med pa gzhan la mi gnod pa/_las dang 
[\[218b.3\]]'bras bu la dad pa yang dag pa'i lta ba dang yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang ldan pa gang zhig nor rdzas mang po dang ldan par gyur nas sbyin pa sbyin zhing /_rgya mtshor 'jug pa'i tshong pa'i ched du chos kyi stegs gru byin la tshong pa de yang der zhugs te/_shin tu 'byor pa dang ldan 
[\[218b.4\]]pas sbyin pa sbyin/_bsod nams dag byed la de yang de las 'tsho bar mi byed na/_de ltar sbyin pa byin zhing bsod nams byed pa yin no/_/ma byin par len pa spangs pa ji lta bu yin zhe na/_res 'ga' sde gzhan gyis 'jigs sam/_rgyal pos 'jigs nas grong med par lam du zhugs 
[\[218b.5\]]pa gang yin pa de 'jug par byed la/_zhugs nas kyang las kyi 'bras bus 'jigs pa/_dad pa dang ldan pa rgyal po'i chad pas 'jigs pa ma yin pas/_de nas [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]phub ma tsam yang len par mi byed na de ma byin par len pa spangs pa yin no/_/srog gcod pa spangs pa ji lta bu 
[\[218b.6\]]yin zhe na/_'di la srog chags rkang brgya pa kha gnyis yod pa rgyas bzung ba dag gsod par mi byed la/_yid la yang sdig pa sems par mi byed pa dang seng ge dang stag rgyu ba'i sa dag tu de dag gsad par bya ba'i phyir/_rngon pa de rnams kyis rnyi btsugs na rngon pa de rnams la nor 
[\[218b.7\]]rdzas byin nas/_rnyi de dag las thar bar byas la de la rung bar mi rjod kyi/_yid la gcugs par byed cing gzhan dag kyang dge ba de nyid la sbyor bar byed/_rab tu 'jog par byed/_yang dang yang du legs par byas pa gzhan dang gzhan dag shin tu legs par spyad pa byed na/_
[\[219a\]]
[\[219a.1\]]de ltar srog gcod pa dang ma byin par len pa spangs pa'i skyes bu de ni dge ba'i las rnams la dmigs shing /_de'i las kyi mtha' yang 'grub pa dang de'i bsams pa thams cad kyang lha rnams sgrub pa dang de'i bzhin gyi mdog kyang gsal ba dang de la lha rnams 
[\[219a.2\]]kyis kyang mchod par 'gyur te/_de dag ni de'i las kyi 'bras bu tshe 'di la 'byung ba yin no/_/phyis lus dang bral nas shi ba'i 'og tu bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur te/_legs par byas pa'i las kyi mtha' spyad pa sum cu 
[\[219a.3\]]rtsa gsum pa'i lha mig phye ba dang btsums te 'gro ba'i gnas su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/der skyes nas kyang legs par byas pa'i las kyis mtha' shin tu brgyan pa de'i nyams dga' ba'i gnas gang yin pa de ni/_mi thams cad kyi bsam pas bsam par yang mi nus te der skye bar 
[\[219a.4\]]'gyur ro/_/lha de rang gi 'od dang bde ba mchog dang ldan la sha dang rus pa dang chu ser dang bral ba/_'gran zla'i 'jigs pa gzhan dang bral ba/_kun du tshol ba'i 'jigs pa dang bral ba/_ser sna dang bral ba/_mi mdza' ba dang phrad pa dang bral ba/_'chi ba'i dus de ma 
[\[219a.5\]]gtogs par dus de la nad kyi 'jigs pa dang bral ba/_gnod pa'i 'jigs pa dang bral ba/_nad dang 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa dang bral ba/_rga ba'i 'jigs pa dang bral ba/_rab tu bag med pa dus de srid du shin tu nyams dga' ba thams cad mthong ste/_mtho ris kyi bde ba 
[\[219a.6\]]la 'chums pa'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga gcig tu yid du 'ong ba/_yul gyi bde ba rnam pa du ma rnams kyis gzhal med khang gser dang bai DUr+ya dang nor bu'i lan kan bres pa'i gzhal med khang dkrigs pa/_gzhan dag na shing ljon pa dang nye ba'i tshal rnam pa sna tshogs yod pa/_
[\[219a.7\]]rin po che sna bdun gyi pad ma'i rdzing rnams kyi nang na bya ngang pa dang ngur pa dang kA raN+Da pas brgyan cing rma bya myos pa sgra 'byin pa ri'i sman ljongs rnams na bya sna tshogs kyis bsten pa/_ri rab kyi ri'i rtse mo rnams na yang rin po che sna bdun gyi 'byung khungs kyis brgyan pa/_lteng ka 
[\[219b\]]
[\[219b.1\]]rnams kyi nang na gser dang dngul dang mu tig gi bye ma bdal ba/_ri rab kyi sman ljongs rnams kyi nang na yang rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing ljon pa rnams kyis brgyan pa/_shing ljon pa rnams kyang nyi ma ltar gsal ba/_ri khrod tshang tshing dag na yang gser dang bai DUr+ya'i lcug ma'i 
[\[219b.2\]]tshogs 'phyang zhing /_me tog gi lcug ma 'phyang bas brgyan pa/_bung ba 'bum gyis brgyan pa/_ri rab kyi phug pa rnams kyang rin po che bzang pos brgyan pa/_rdo leb dang sa'i phyogs cha mthon dman ran pa/_ri'i zom rnams kyang rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan cing rdo leb 
[\[219b.3\]]kyis brgyan pa/_me tog dri zhim po rgya cher dpyangs pa dang ldan pa/_rang gi bsam pas brgyan pa bas kyang ches lhag cing /_nyams dga' ba'i sa phyogs snying dga' ba rnams dang /_gzhan yang gad ka dang dgon pa dag na shing ljon pa rab tu 'bar ba lta bus brgyan pa/_
[\[219b.4\]]dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pa 'bum gyis mdzes par byas pa/_rang gis byas pa'i las kyi mtha' la spyod pa/_lha dang lha mo 'bum snyed kyis yongs su bskor ba/_rol mo dang sil snyan gyi sgras rna ba tshim par byed cing /_pi bang gi sgra yongs su 'byin par byed pa de rnams 
[\[219b.5\]]na rtse bar byed do/_/des gang dang gang mthong ba de dang de nyid 'thob cing 'gyur ba med la yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa/_thun mong ma yin pa gzhan gyis 'phrog par mi nus pa yin no/_/de nas lha 'bum snyed kyis yongs su bskor ba de/_lha'i tshogs gzhan rnams 
[\[219b.6\]]kyi nang na yongs su spyod pa na/_res 'ga' de dus ston gyi tshigs zhes bya ba 'dod pa kun las byung ba'i shing ljon pa rnams kyis brgyan pa/_'bab chu'i tshogs brgya snyed kyis gang ba/_pad ma'i rdzing du mas rnam par brgyan pa/_lha 'bum snyed du mas bsten bsten pa/_bai 
[\[219b.7\]]DUr+ya'i lcug ma 'phyang bas bskor ba/_gzhal med khang gi rtse mo la bya skad 'byin pa 'bum snyed kyis bskor cing nyams dga' bar byed pa'i ri de la 'dzeg par byed do/_/de nas legs par byas pa'i las kyi mtha' spyad pa de nyams dga' ba'i ri'i zom de na bde ba myong bar byed de/_
[\[220a\]]
[\[220a.1\]]legs par byas pa'i las kyi rin gyis nyos pa rnams ni/_'dod rgyal las ma byung /_gzhan gyis ma byas/_gzhan nas ma 'ongs nyams pa ma yin/_dbang phyug la sogs pa mgu nas byin pa ma yin pa de dag la de 'dzegs nas ri'i zom de na/_bdag 
[\[220a.2\]]nyid dang mtshungs pa'i 'od dang ldan pa'i lha dang lha mo'i tshogs rnam pa du ma 'bum snyed kyis kun du gang zhing /_sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pas/_dga' bar byed pa gang yin pa de dag dga' bar byed cing /_dga' dgur spyod par byed la lha de dag kyang de bzhin du rang gi 'od dang de 
[\[220a.3\]]bzhin gzugs dang dbang phyug gi mthu dang ldan zhing /_de dag kyang de bzhin du mig mi 'dzums par lta ba/_de dag kyang de bzhin du pad ma'i phreng ba thogs pa/_de dag kyang de bzhin du thags su ma btags pa'i gos gyon pa yin te/_de ltar lha mthu bo che de thams cad mthong ngo /_/
[\[220a.4\]]de nas lha'i bu de ri'i zom de la 'dzegs nas sa phyogs dag la rtog par byed de/_legs par byas pa'i las kyi mtha' spyad pa'i lha de'i gnas su gyur pa gnas gnyis na gnas pa/_chu bo dang ri rab 'od kyi phreng ba 'bar ba/_rnam pa sna tshogs kyis yang dag par gang ba'i sa 
[\[220a.5\]]phyogs rnams mngon par mthong nas snga ma bzhin snying shin tu dga' ste/_lha'i bde ba mchog myong ngo /_/lha de rnams kyi mthu ni 'di lta bu yin te/_gang gi tshe lha dang lha ma yin g.yul 'gyed par 'gyur ba na/_de mig phye ba tsam gyis brgyab par 'gyur la/_gang gi tshe lha ma 
[\[220a.6\]]yin mig tshums kyis byas pa de'i tshe/_sum cu rtsa gsum gyi bar du 'gro ste/_de ltar mgyogs pa yin no/_/rgyu dang mtshungs par 'bras bu 'byung ste/_ji ltar rgya mtsho las sgrol bar byed pa'i gru myur du sbyin par bya ba de dag byin pa des/_sems can dag sgrol bar byed pa 
[\[220a.7\]]de ltar de dag gi mgyogs par 'gyur ba de ni mig phye ba tsam gyis 'gro la/_btsums pa tsam gyis slar ldog ste/_sngon byas pa'i rgyu des na myur bar 'gro ba yin no/_/de nas yun ring mo zhig tu lha'i bde ba de myong bar byed do/_/de nas gal te legs par byas pa'i las zad 
[\[220b\]]
[\[220b.1\]]nas lha'i bu 'chi bar 'gyur la/_de'i 'chi ba'i ltas lnga po 'bru mar zad na mar me'i snang ba zad pa 'di lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/_de dang po rdul 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang dbang po thams cad nyams pa dang 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga thams cad du ro mi bro ba myong ste/_lha gzhan dag 
[\[220b.2\]]gis mthong nas ngo tsha ba dang rang gi lha mo lha gzhan gyi drung du 'gro ba dang de yang mthong nas/_phrag dog dang ser snas bskyed pa 'bral ba'i sdug bsngal sna tshogs gang rab tu tsha ba'i me lta bu 'byung ngo /_/gal te gzhan du ma byin par len pa zhig blangs na/_de lan grangs 
[\[220b.3\]]gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyis dus de'i tshe snon du 'gyur te/_de'i rgyan de dag thams cad lha mo de dag gis 'phrog par byed la/_phrogs nas kyang lha'i bu gzhan la 'dogs par byed do/_/gal te [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]smras pa zhig yin na/_de dag gzhan du smra bar byed cing 
[\[220b.4\]]gzhan du 'gro bar byed la/_lha mo de dag gzhan du nyan par byed de/_tshig brlang pos de la mngon par spyo bar byed do/_/gal te skye ba gzhan dag tu sdom pa blangs pa rnams la/_btung ba chang blud dam bdag nyid kyi bslab pa bshig gam chang 'thungs na/_de lan grangs 
[\[220b.5\]]gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyis dus de'i tshe snon du 'gyur te/_de 'chi ba'i dus de na sems 'khrug pa'am dran pa nyams pa'am de bzhin du nyis 'gyur du kun du gdung bar byed la/_de sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te srog gcod pa zhig yin na/_
[\[220b.6\]]de tshe thung ngur gyur nas myur du 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/'dod pas log par g.yem pas ni chung ma gzhan gyi drung du 'gro bar 'gyur te/_de ltar sdom pa lnga dral ba/_lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyi zhags pas bcings pa/_'chi ltas lngas rnam par dkrugs pa/_
[\[220b.7\]]bag med par gnas pa/_de 'chi bdag gi rgyal pos 'dren par byed do/_/de ltar gnas skabs thams cad du tshul khrims kyi mtha' legs par ma spyad de/_mtho ris kyi rgyur spyod pa gang yin pa de ni sred pa yin no/_/de nas las kyi zhags pas bcings pa de sems can 
[\[221a\]]
[\[221a.1\]]dmyal ba dang [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang dud 'gro'i nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/legs pa'i mtha' ma yin pa/_mtho ris kyi bde ba de dag nyid dge slong des mthong ste/_'dus byas kyi chos thams cad kyi nang na phyogs gcig tu gyur pa nyams dga' ba rnams kyi nang na/_nyams 
[\[221a.2\]]par byed cing nyes pa kho nar gyur pa/_nges par gzhan du gyur cing gnas pa ma yin la/_glog ltar 'bras bu mi brtan pa 'dod pa thams cad kyi nang na/_nyes pa dang bcas pa'i g.yo ba nyid rtogs nas/_'di ltar tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_rmongs pa bag med lha yul 
[\[221a.3\]]du/_/mi bzad me yis yongs su bskor/_/btung ba rnyog can 'thungs nas su/_/sems can dmyal bar ltung bar byed/_/dang por 'dod chags nyid kyis bsgyur/_/zhe sdang gis kyang zil gyis non/_/gti mug nyid kyis rmongs byas pa/_/de yis bya ba stongs par byas/_/sil 
[\[221a.4\]]snyan yan lag lnga dag gis/_/kun nas rab tu bslus pa rnams/_/gang dag nges par 'byung 'gyur ba/_/'chi ba'i sdug bsngal mi rig go/_/khyod kyis gang la 'dod chags spyad/_/lha mo 'di dag mi brtan te/_/de dag gis ni khyod spangs nas/_/de nas gzhan du 'gro bar 
[\[221a.5\]]byed/_/skyes pa dar na sten byed la/_/rgud par gyur na spong byed pa/_/bud med lhan cig spyad pa yi/_/'di dag gi ni rang bzhin mthong /_/'dod chags rmongs pa'i skyes pa 'di/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]bzhin du rmongs par byed/_/phyi nas rgud par gyur pa dang /_/yang ba'i sems kyis
