[\[221a.6\]]gtong bar byed/_/de ni nyon mongs mi bzad la/_/nye bar gnas tshe bud med ni/_/phan dang bkur sti dga' ba dang /_/rgyun [{]rings [,]ring [}]bshes pa'ang dran mi byed/_/ji ltar me tog rnyings gyur na/_/bung bas btang ste gzhan du 'gro/_/de ltar nyon mongs gyur pa'i tshe/_/bud med 
[\[221a.7\]]rnams kyis btang nas 'gro/_/dug dang sbrang rtsir 'dres pa ltar/_/bud med thams cad ma brtags na/_/dga' ba rnams kyi rgyur 'gyur zhing /_/snying du sdug kyang brtan pa med/_/mi dag 'dod pa rnams kyis rmongs/_/tshig rnams kyis kyang khyad par du/_/skyes bu brtan 
[\[221b\]]
[\[221b.1\]]po khong brtan pa/_/yid la de dang gcugs ma byed/_/'di rnams kyis ni mi dag rmongs/_/khyad par du ni 'dod pas bsgyur/_/pha rol tu ni 'gro ba gang /_/bdag la phan par mi byed do/_/lha dang mi dang lha ma yin/_/gnod sbyin sha za lto 'phye srin/_/mig 'phrul lta bu'i bud 
[\[221b.2\]]med kyis/_/khyad par du ni slu bar byed/_/'dod las skyes pa'i bde ba gang /_/phal pa yul las byung gyur pa/_/'chi ba'i dus la bab pa na/_/tha chad lha rnams nyams par byed/_/'chi ba'i zhags pas dam bcings pa/_/khyod ni dus su khyer 'gyur gyi/_/sa gzhi 'di dag thams 
[\[221b.3\]]cad dang /_/tshal dang nye tshal brgyan mi khyer/_/kun nas lha yi 'jig rten nas/_/'chi bdag gis ni drangs pa na/_/bud med ci byed gnyen rnams ci/_/bde ba dag gis zhi cig 'gyur/_/de ltar dge slong de lha de'i 'chi ba mngon par mthong nas snying rje bar byed cing yul rnams la yang 
[\[221b.4\]]smod par byed do/_/rang gis byas pa spyad pa'i lha'i bu de yang las kyi zhags pas gang du 'dren pa der khrid par byed de/_lha bag med pa la gnos pa 'dod pa lnga la rnam par chags pa de dag kyang /_de nas yang dga' bar byed dga' dgur spyod par byed de/_yul gnyis kyis kun 
[\[221b.5\]]du drangs pa na/_ji srid du 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba nges par myong bar 'gyur ba'i bde ba de zad par ma gyur pa de srid du/_tshal dang nags tshal thams cad na dga' bar byed/_dga' dgur spyod par byed do/_/de phyis nges par bsgoms pa'i dus byed pa chos dang yang dag par ldan 
[\[221b.6\]]pas las nye bar 'gro ba ji lta ba bzhin/_sems can dmyal ba dang [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang dud 'gro'i nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mi'i nang du skyes na/_de las de dang rgyu 'thun par rtag tu bde ba dang ldan zhing nor bzang po dang ldan pa dang lam du 'gro ba na 
[\[221b.7\]]rkang gis mi 'gro ste/_rta dang glang po che dang dre'u'i bzhon pa la zhon pa dang rgyal po'am blon po chen por 'gyur ba mthong ngo /_/de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de/_sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas la rtog par byed de/_des thos pa las 
[\[222a\]]
[\[222a.1\]]byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/_sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas/_lus kyi mdog bzang zhing che ba zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo /_/der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas 
[\[222a.2\]]brtags na/_skyes bu dam pa sems tshul khrims dang ldan pa gang gis tshul khrims rnam pa bdun dang 'thun pa'am gzhan nam phyogs 'ga' legs par bsrungs na/_de rgyu dang 'thun par 'bras bu myong bar 'gyur la/_sems kyis bsgoms pa kho na'am lta ba dang 
[\[222a.3\]]ldan pa de srog gcod pa dang /_ma byin par len pa dag ni shin tu bsrungs/_sdom pa skyon med pa ni blangs/_gcig tu skyes bu dam pa 'dod cing bde ba nges pa'i rgyur gyur pa/_'jig rten 'di'i sdom pa legs pa zhes bya ba rnam pa de lta bu'i las legs par byas pa/_
[\[222a.4\]]'phags pa ma yin pa'i skyes bu dam pa/_ma byin par len pa nyid spong ba ni/_'di la ma byin par len pa chung ngu yang len par mi byed de 'di lta ste/_rgya mtsho dang nye ba na'am 'bab chu dang nye bar gnas pa na/_gzhan gyis phyogs gang yin pa dag la gzhan gyi rgya mtsho'i 
[\[222a.5\]]rlabs kyis bdas te 'ongs pa/_dung ngam b+hal lA ta ka'am sha b+ha ri ka'am de dang 'thun pa de dag kyang len par mi byed/_gzhan gyi nor rdzas kyi rnam pa gzhan dag kyang len par mi byed la/_nor rdzas kyi rnam pa rtswa yang las kyi 'bras bu la 'jigs la/_rgyal po'i chad pas 
[\[222a.6\]]'jigs pa ma yin pa/_rku ba'i sems kyis len par mi byed pa yin te/_rnam pa de lta bu ni ma byin par len pa spangs pa yin no/_/srog gcod pa spangs pa'i rnam pa ji lta bu yin zhe na/_'di ni legs par byas pa'i las kyi mtha' spyad pa/_'jig rten pha rol la 'jigs par 
[\[222a.7\]]sems pa/_las kyi 'bras bu la sems dad pa drang po drang po'i rang bzhin can/_gzhan la mi gnod pa sdig pa'i grogs po spangs pa bde ba tshol ba de lcug ma'i nang du 'gro ba'am chu rgal ba na grib gnon gyi gdon gyis zin tam srog chags tan tus zin te shi la thug kyang grib gnon 
[\[222b\]]
[\[222b.1\]]gyi gdon de gsad 'dod pa'i phyir dug gis 'thor bar mi byed de/_'di la gang gi tshe grib ma la dug gtor na/_de'i tshe rang gi grib gnon de'i grib ma de la bab pas 'chi bar 'gyur te/_de'i phyir gnod pa bya ba shes kyang grib gnon gyi gdon de gsod par mi byed do/_/srog chags tan tu 
[\[222b.2\]]la slar gnod par bya ba shes kyang gsod par mi byed de/_de la chu med par byas na 'chi bar 'gyur ba'am me long bstan pa'am me long rtag tu bstan pas 'chi bar 'gyur te/_de phyir gnod par bya ba'i rgyu shes kyang gsod par mi byed la/_rang gi srog chad la thug kyang nyes par bya ba mi byed de/_de 
[\[222b.3\]]ltar legs par bya ba'i las kyi mtha' byed pa de/_lus dang bral te shi nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas lus dang mdog bzang zhing che ba'i nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/der skyes nas kyang legs par byas pa'i las kyi mtha' spyad pa de/_rang gi 'od dang 
[\[222b.4\]]ni ldan sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i sgra ni 'byin/_yid shin tu bde ba dang ni ldan/_'dod pa thams cad ni 'byor/_de lha mo stong gis bskor te/_ri rab kyi sa gzhi la ni rgyu/_sa phyogs 'dzam bu nA da'i gser gyis brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams nyams dga' ba dang ri'i zom gyi bar 
[\[222b.5\]]bar dag na dga' zhing bde ba ni myong bar byed do/_/'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad dang ldan pa/_dpag bsam gyi shing la bsams pas 'dod pa thams cad 'grub pa de yun ring du bde ba myong bar byed do/_/'khor dang bcas pa yongs su spyod pa de/_phyi rol gyi grib ma zhes bya ba'i 
[\[222b.6\]]tshal der 'dong bar byed de/_'dzam bu nA da'i gser gyi shing ljon pas brgyan pa/_de bzhin du dngul gyi shing ljon pa la gser gyi 'dab ma dang /_bai DUr+ya'i 'bras bus mdzes pa yin no/_/phyi rol gyi grib ma'i tshal de'i phyogs gzhan du yang /_de res 'ga' yongs su rgyu ba na lus rin po che 
[\[222b.7\]]sna bdun gyis brgyan zhing /_thig le sna tshogs kyis spras pa/_rtog pa sna tshogs can te/_rma bya'i tshogs de dag mthong nas legs par blta zhing rtse ba'i phyir der 'gro bar byed do/_/de de dag gi nang du phyin nas rma bya mthong na yid 'phrog par byed pa de rnams kyi nang na dga' bar byed do/_/rma bya de dag 
[\[223a\]]
[\[223a.1\]]gis de mthong nas sil snyan thams cad pas ches lhag pa'i sgra nyams dga' ba chags su rung ba rnam pa sna tshogs du ma 'byin to/_/rma bya de'i sgra rnam pa de lta bu 'byin pa de'i khyad par ni lha'i rol mo'i sgra dag bcu drug gi char yang mi phod de/_rma bya de'i sgra'i drung na lha mo 
[\[223a.2\]]de'i glu dbyangs dag bong skad 'byin pa dang mtshungs so/_/de nas lha de 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag kyang mthu 'di lta bur gyur pas da ni rma bya de dag la zhon te/_gnas nas gnas dang tshang tshing nas tshang tshing dang ri rab kyi ri'i rtse mo nas/_ri rab kyi ri'i rtse mor lha mo'i tshogs kyis 
[\[223a.3\]]bskor ba dang lhan cig yongs su rgyu zhing de ltar rma bya'i steng du zhon nas/_re zhig 'jig rten gyi dga' ba 'di dag thams cad la blta bar bya'o snyam mo/_/las bya ba legs par byas pa de bsams ma thag tu bong skyed dang mdog dang stobs dang brtson 'grus phun sum tshogs pa/_lus rin 
[\[223a.4\]]po che thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i rma bya bzhon du rung bar rked pa stod pa de dag nye bar lhags so/_/des de dag mthong nas de la zhon pa dang /_rma bya de yang des zhon par rig nas nam mkha'i dkyil na rgyu bar byed do/_/de ltar lha de dag kun gyis kyang so sor zhon nas/_de'i ri rab kyi ri'i rtse mo 
[\[223a.5\]]nas ri'i rtse mo dang pad ma'i tshal nas pad ma'i tshal dang tshal nas tshal te/_ri rab kyi sa phyogs de dag thams cad du de skye bo dang lhan cig mthong na dga' ba rnams la lta bar byed do/_/de nas de ltar de yongs su rgyu ba na res 'ga' 'jig rten skyong ba dag 'dzam bu'i gling gi bya ba/_chos dang chos ma yin 
[\[223a.6\]]pa dag sbran pa'i phyir/_rgyal chen bzhi pa'am sum cu rtsa gsum du gcig nas gcig tu sbron par byed do/_/de nas lha de dang 'jig rten skyong ba de dag nam mkha' la glo bur du 'ongs te phrad pa dang lha des de dag la smras pa/_khyod gang nas 'ongs/_de dag gis lha de la 'di skad smras so/_/bdag 
[\[223a.7\]]cag ni chos dang chos ma yin pa sbran pa'i phyir/_'dzam bu'i gling legs par byas pa'i las kyi gzhi shin tu nyams dga' ba/_chu bo dang 'bab chu dang lteng ka dang nye ba'i tshal dang kun dga' ra ba mang po phun sum tshogs pa nas mchis so/_/de nas lha'i bu des 'jig rten skyong ba de dag las 
[\[223b\]]
[\[223b.1\]]thos nas ngo mtshar skyes te/_mthu chen po dang ldan pa/_rma bya mthu chen po la yang zhon pa/_'gro ba thams cad du stobs thogs pa med pa'i lha/_ngo mtshar skyes pa de 'dzam bu'i gling ga la ba der 'bab par byed de/_nyi ma gnyis pa ltar gsal zhing lha'i phreng ba dang gos gyon pa de 
[\[223b.2\]]'dzam bu'i gling gi tshal dang nye ba'i tshal dang chu bo dang lteng ka dang pad ma'i tshal dang shing ljon pa dang grong dang grong khyer dang tshong 'dus dang ldan pa 'di thams cad la de ltad mo lta bar byed do/_/de nas bram ze de dag gis de rnams mthong nas rtog par byed de/_'di ltar bya khyung la zhon pa 
[\[223b.3\]]'di ni gtogs 'dod yin no/_/gzhan dag kyang rtog par byed de/_'di ltar rma bya la zhon pa 'di ni gzhon nu yin te/_'jig rten dang bram ze dag srung bar byed do/_/gzhan mu stegs pa dag kyang rtog par byed de/_'di ltar khyu mchog la zhon pa 'di ni dbang phyug chen po 
[\[223b.4\]]lha dang bcas pa yin te/_'jig rten skyed par byed srung bar byed/_'dzin par byed skyed par byed cing /_'jig par yang byed do/_/de nas yang 'jig rten rnams skyed pa dang gnas pa dang 'byin par byed pa yin no zhes rtog ste/_de ltar lha de rnams la bram ze dag rnam pa du 
[\[223b.5\]]mar yongs su rtog par byed la/_stod ra dag byed/_bstan bcos dag byed/_de kho na nyid ma yin pa la/_de kho na nyid ltar lta/_tshig 'khyal pa smra ba/_yid shin tu rnam par rmongs pa de dag gzhan dag la yang log pa nyid kyis sbyor bar byed do/_/lha'i bu de rnams kyis ltad 
[\[223b.6\]]mo bltas nas/_de nas yang rang gi gnas de nyid du slar 'dong ngo /_/de ltar lta bar gyur pa'i byis pa rnams de kho na nyid ma yin pa de kho na ltar lta'o/_/lha de rnams la lta ba de yang 'jig pa'i dus su 'byung ba'am res 'ga' cha gnyis ldan pa'am gsum ldan gyi dus na 'byung 
[\[223b.7\]]ste/_lha de rnams la lta ba ni lta ba ngan pa dang mtshungs so/_/de ltar bdag nyid rab tu rtog par byed la/_bdag nyid kyis rab tu brtags na gzhan dag la yang sgrogs par byed de/_'di dag ni bram ze rnams kyi lta bar gyur pa yin no/_/de nas lha de rnams slar 
[\[224a\]]
[\[224a.1\]]'ongs nas lha gzhan de dag la/_kye ma grogs po dag 'di ltar bdag cag sa'i steng du babs te/_sa phyogs shin tu rnam par phye ba nyams dga' ba de dag bdag cag gis mthong ngo zhes smras so/_/de skad thos nas lha gzhan dag kyang bzhon pa sna tshogs la 
[\[224a.2\]]zhon te/_rgyan dang cha byad sna tshogs btags nas 'dzam bu'i gling ga la ba der 'bab par byed de/_kha cig ni glang po che la zhon/_kha cig ni ma he la zhon/_kha cig ni rma bya la zhon/_kha cig ni bzhon pa med par nam mkha' la 'dug ste/_de rnams kyis sa phyogs nyams 
[\[224a.3\]]dga' ba thams cad la lta bar byed do/_/de dag bltas nas sa phyogs nyams dga' ba lteng ka dang nye ba'i tshal dang ne'u gsing ga la yod pa der 'bab par byed do/_/tshal gyi phyogs de dag gi nang na bram ze kha cig dka' thub drag po spyod pa yod de/_de ltar thos pa ngan pa dang 
[\[224a.4\]]mtshungs shing thos pa ngan pa dang 'brel ba dag_/gang gi tshe phan tshun grogs dang bcas pa de dag sa phyogs de la lta ba de'i tshe/_tshal gyi nang na spyod pa'i bram ze de dag gis lha de rnams mngon sum du mthong nas gzhan dag la sgrogs par byed do/_/gang sa phyogs 'dir skyes pa 
[\[224a.5\]]de ni rang dgar kun tu brtags pa zhes bya ba yin la/_sngon thos pa dang 'brel pas rjod par byed de/_'di ltar 'di ni bram ze'o/_/'di ni gtogs 'dod do/_/'di ni dbang phyug chen po'o/_/'di ni gzhon nu'o zhes de ltar so sor rtog par byed do/_/sa phyogs 'di ni lha chen po'i 
[\[224a.6\]]gnas yin no/_/'di ni gtogs 'dod kyi'o/_/'di ni gzhon nu'i 'o/_/'di ni tshangs pa'i yin no zhes de ltar rab tu brtags nas/_gtan tshigs dang nye bar sbyor ba dang mjug bsdu ba lta ba ngan pa dang 'brel ba'i bstan bcos dag kyang byed do/_/de nyid la de dag gis gzhan dang gzhan 
[\[224a.7\]]dag kyang 'jog par byed do/_/de ltar de bdag nyid kyis lta ba ngan pa mngon par brtags nas gzhan dag la yang sgrogs par byed la/_de dag kyang gzhan la sgrogs/_de dag kyang yang gzhan la sgrogs par byed de/_de ltar rim pa de dag gis lta bar gyur pa yin no/_/gang gi tshe lha 
[\[224b\]]
[\[224b.1\]]de rnams mtho ris kyi dga' ba dang 'thun par mtsho dang nye bar 'khod dam/_de bzhin du mtsho'i nang du zhugs pa de la tshal gyi nang na spyod pa rang dgar goms pa de dag gzhan la sgrogs par byed de/_'di ltar mtsho 'di ni tshangs pa'i yin no/_/'di ni skal ldan sred med kyi 
[\[224b.2\]]bu'i yin no/_/'di ni dbang phyug chen po'i yin no/_/'di ni gzhon nu'i yin no zhes de ltar lta ba ngan pa'i dbang du gyur pa'i sems kyis gtan tshigs dang dpe dang nye bar sbyor ba dang mjug bsdu ba dang ldan pa'i bstan bcos dag byed la de ltar gzhan dag la bstan bcos 
[\[224b.3\]]rab tu grags par 'gyur te/_de ltar gzhan dang gzhan du lta bar gyur pa yin no/_/de nas yang rnam pa gzhan gyis rab tu rtog par byed de/_de kho na nyid khong du chud par ni mi 'gyur ro/_/tshal gyi nang na spyod pa de dag gis lha de rnams gsal bar mi mthong ste/_
[\[224b.4\]]byad gzugs ma nor bar shes par mi 'gyur ro/_/de nas kyang lha de rnams me ltar gzi brjid 'bar zhing yul nas yul du 'dong bar byed/_tshal nas tshal du 'dong bar byed pa dang tshal gyi nang na spyod pa'i bram ze gang yin pa de dag gzhan du rtog par byed de/_'di 
[\[224b.5\]]ltar bdag nyid me'i nang du mngon par bcug pa de dag ni rgyu de dang rkyen des lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro zhes de ltar gzhan du brtags nas lta ba'i rnam pa skyed par byed la gtan tshigs dang /_dpe dang nye bar 
[\[224b.6\]]sbyor ba dang mjug bsdu ba ngan pa dang 'brel ba'i bstan bcos dag kyang byed do/_/de nas gzhan dag gis bstan bcos de dag thos nas bdag nyid me'i nang du 'jug par byed de/_de ltar yang dag pa ma yin pa'i lta bar gyur to/_/de rnams ni las kyi 'bras bu 
[\[224b.7\]]spong bar byed pa yin te/_de spangs pas ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal bar skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas gzhan yang yang dag pa ma yin pa'i lta ba'i rnam pa sgrub pa ni tshal gyi nang na spyod pa'i bram ze dag gis/_lha de rnams rgyang ring po zhig na lta 
[\[225a\]]
[\[225a.1\]]ba mi gsal bar mthong ste/_'di ltar ri'i rtse mo me tog dang lteng ka phun sum tshogs pa gang yin pa de dag la lha 'dzegs nas gzi brjid 'bar zhing nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang /_de nas tshal gyi nang na spyod pa'i bram ze dag gis mthong nas rang 
[\[225a.2\]]dgar rtog par byed de/_'di ltar mir gyur pa 'di rnams kyis ri las g.yang du ltung bar byas na rgyu de dang rkyen des bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur bas/_bdag cag kyang ri rtse nas thar bar bya'o zhes de ltar gzhan dag la yang ston par byed 
[\[225a.3\]]la/_bstan bcos ngan pa dag kyang byed cing las kyi 'bras bu la yang skur pa 'debs so/_/las kyi 'bras bu la skur pa 'debs pa bdag dang gzhan log par lta ba rnams ni lus dang bral nas ngan 'gro log par ltung ba/_sems can dmyal ba'i nang du skye bar 'gyur 
[\[225a.4\]]te/_de ltar yang lta ba'i rnam pa gzhan yin no/_/de nas yang tshal gyi nang na spyod pa'i bram ze de dag gis/_lha de rnams gzhan du mthong nas rang dgar gzhan du rtog par byed de/_'di lta ste/_lha rnams ha cang yang mi nye ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na 'khod pa de rnams 
[\[225a.5\]]kyi cha byad gzugs cung zad cig shes pa dang /_de bzhin du mthong nas gzugs de rnams gzhan nyid du rtog par byed de/_'di ltar lha rnams kyi zhal ni me yin pas/_de ltar rnam pa gzhan gyis me'i nang du sbyin sreg byed pa gang yin pa de ni lus dang bral nas de bde 
[\[225a.6\]]'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro zhes de ltar de kho na nyid ma mthong ba rnams ni/_gtan tshigs dang dpe ngan pa dang sbyar ba'i bstan bcos dag kyang byed do/_/de ltar gtan tshigs dang dpe ngan pa dang sbyar ba'i lta ba'i rnam pa gzhan yang byed 
[\[225a.7\]]la/_pha rol dag kyang de nyid la 'dzin du 'jug par byed de/_bdag la phan pa dang gzhan la phan par zhugs pa ma yin pa de lus dang bral nas ngan 'gro log par ltung ba/_sems can dmyal ba'i nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas yang tshal gyi nang na spyod 
[\[225b\]]
[\[225b.1\]]pa'i bram ze gzhan dag gis lha de rnams mthong nas gzugs sam spyod pa ni shes la/_de dag gis de rnams zas za ba ma mthong /_sbyin pa byed pa ma mthong ba dang 'di snyam du sems te/_'di ltar lha 'di rnams zas mi za/_skom mi 'thung ba las na/_
[\[225b.2\]]gor ma chag par bdag cag gis kyang zas ma zos kyang de lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro snyam nas de dag las kyi 'bras bu la skur pa 'debs shing /_'di ltar zas ma zos pa'am zas zhim po ma zos pas mtho 
[\[225b.3\]]ris 'thob par 'gyur ro zhes bstan bcos ngan pa dag kyang byed la/_de gzhan dag kyang gtan tshigs dang dpe ngan pa ston pa'i tshig rnams kyis de nyid 'dzin du 'jug par byed de/_de ltar bdag dang gzhan log par lta ba/_las kyi 'bras bu la skur pa 
[\[225b.4\]]'debs pa ni/_lus dang bral nas ngan 'gro log par ltung ba/_sems can dmyal ba'i nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de ltar de kho na nyid ma mthong ba ni ngan 'gro thams cad kyi sgor gyur pa yin no/_/lha de rnams kyi skad cig tsam mam thang cig tsam mam de 
[\[225b.5\]]tsam gang yin pa de la mi rnams kyi lor bgrangs na yun ring ste/_de la bram ze de dag 'di ltar lha 'di dag ni rtag pa brtan pa ther zug pa mi 'gyur ba'i chos can yin la/_de dag 'jig rten skyed par yang byed la 'jig par byed pa yin no zhes de ltar bstan bcos 
[\[225b.6\]]byed cing gzhan dag kyang de nyid la 'dzin du 'jug par byed pa/_rgyu dang 'bras bu la skur pa 'debs pa de ni lus dang bral nas ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba'i nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de ltar sems kyi dgras yongs su bslus pa'i sems can 
[\[225b.7\]]rnams rnam pa du mar de kho na nyid la mi lta ba/_de kho na nyid ma mthong ba ni lta bar gyur pa'i bstan bcos dag byed do/_/de nas de ltar de kho na nyid ma yin pas sems yongs su bslus pa'i sems can rnams/_dge slong des mngon par mthong nas tshigs su 
[\[226a\]]
[\[226a.1\]]bcad de smras pa/_sems kyi sbrul ni mi bzad dang /_/sred pa'i dug dang rnam 'dres pa/_/mgo lnga pa yis zin pa dag_/don med ci zhig yongs su gdung /_/sred pa'i chu bo chen po 'di/_/mu lnga las ni kun du byung /_/de yi tshu rol 'gram 
[\[226a.2\]]dag na/_/dogs dang bcas la pha rol zhing /_/ma mthong bar ni shi yang sla/_/lta ba ngan pa ga la rung /_/lta ba ngan pas rmongs pa yi/_/mi rnams sems can dmyal bar 'gro/_/log par smra bas bslus pa yi/_/mi rnams log par lta dang ldan/_/rgyu ma yin 
[\[226a.3\]]la rgyu ltar lta/_/mi bzad sems can dmyal bar 'gro/_/rgyu 'bras dag la rmongs gyur cing /_/de nyid lta la rnam rmongs pa/_/sems can sdug bsngal skal ba can/_/srid pa'i btson rar shin tu chags/_/las dang 'bras bu rnam smin dang /_/de bzhin skye dang 
[\[226a.4\]]'chi ba dang /_/'gro ba de nyid mthong ba ni/_/mi de pha rol 'gro ba yin/_/byis pa 'dod pa tshol byed pa/_/phyi phyir 'dod pa rnams kyis rmongs/_/phye ma leb ltar rmongs pa de/_/sems can dmyal ba'i me yis sreg_/dka' thub ngan pa mi spyod cing /_/
[\[226a.5\]]tshul khrims spyod la brten nas su/_/yang dag lta ba lhur len rnams/_/mi yul nas ni lha yul 'gro/_/khyed cag dka' thub ngan pas gdungs/_/log par lta ba lhur len rnams/_/shes pas lhag pa'i nga rgyal rmongs/_/skye bo gzhan yang 
[\[226a.6\]]rmongs par byed/_/gti mug mun rum thibs po yi/_/chu bo chen por 'jug byed pa/_/skye bo 'di dag rgyur gyur te/_/'jig rten rang bzhin sdug bsngal lo/_/lus kyi dka' thub mi bzad zhes/_/mkhas pa rnams ni de skad gsung /_/sems 
[\[226a.7\]]kyi dka' thub nyid kyis ni/_/nyon mongs ri kun sreg par byed/_/yang dag ye shes sngon 'dren pa/_/nyon mongs zad las rnam thar 'di/_/skyes bu de nyid mthong ba'o/_/dgon dang bral bas thob par 'gyur/_/blo gros gzhan dang gzhan rnams kyis/_/
[\[226b\]]
[\[226b.1\]]'jig rten 'di kun rnam par bslus/_/gang la log par smra ba dag_/mchog tu zhi bar 'gro mi 'gyur/_/'jig rten pa la log pa'i tshig_/shin tu mang por rab tu grags/_/'jig rten 'das pa'i bskal pa brgyar/_/nam yang grags par mi 'gyur 
[\[226b.2\]]ro/_/de bas 'jig rten 'das tshig gzung /_/'jig rten pa lta ga la zhig_/'jig rten pa yi tshig dag ni/_/dug 'dra 'khor bar 'chi bar mthong /_/sred la mi dga' rtag bde ba/_/nges par bsod nams byed pa po/_/'jig rten 'das tshig dge 
[\[226b.3\]]ba zhes/_/mkhas pa rnams ni yang dag gsung /_/lta ba dang ni gtan tshigs ngan pas bsgyur/_/gsob dang gsog dang sdig dang 'dres pa yi/_/tshig gis kun nas bslus pa'i mi rnams ni/_/mun gnag chen po'i ngan song rnams su ltung /_/de ltar 
[\[226b.4\]]dge slong des de kho na nyid ma mthong bar 'gyur ba'i sems can rnams la/_de kho na nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_sems can 'di kun de nyid khong ma chud/_/don med dpe dang gtan tshigs ngan pa yis/_/gzhan yang rmongs par 
[\[226b.5\]]byed la bdag nyid kyang /_/dmyal bar ltung byed gzhan yang byed du 'jug_/lha de rnams kyis mi'i 'jig rten 'di thams cad rig nas/_bzhon pa de rnams dang lhan cig tu sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams kyi rang gi gnas ga la ba der dong ste/_lha gzhan rnams la yang 
[\[226b.6\]]snga ma bzhin du bsnyad do/_/sil snyan rnam pa sna tshogs sgra 'byin pa'i tshal dang nye ba'i tshal lha'i yon tan phun sum tshogs pa rin po che thams cad 'bar ba'i 'od kyis brgyan pa rnams na/_ji srid du 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba byas shing bsags pa/_bde ba nges 
[\[226b.7\]]par 'grub pa'i las de zad par ma gyur pa de srid du dga' bar byed/_/dga' dgur spyod par byed do/_/de zad nas lha'i ris de nas 'chi bar 'gyur te/_shi nas kyang las nye bar 'gro ba ji lta ba bzhin sems can dmyal ba dang [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang dud 'gro'i nang du skye bar 'gyur 
[\[227a\]]
[\[227a.1\]]ro/_/gal te mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mi'i nang du skyes na/_de las de dang rgyu 'thun par rtag tu bde ba dang ldan zhing shin tu nad med pa dang ldan pa dang gnod pa thams cad dang bral ba dang yul dang ljongs shin tu lo legs pa rnams su skye la/_
[\[227a.2\]]der skyes nas kyang byad gzugs bzang por 'gyur te/_shin tu byad gzugs bzang po dang ldan pa dang skye bo thams cad yang dag par dga' ba dang dbang po tshang ba dang nor rdzas dam pa dang ldan te/_rgyal po'am blon po chen por 'gyur ba mthong ngo /_/de nas 
[\[227a.3\]]yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de/_sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas la rtog par byed de/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas/_sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas nor bu 'phyang ba zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug 
[\[227a.4\]]pa mthong ngo /_/der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/_blo rgya che zhing tshul khrims dang ldan par gyur la/_legs par byas pa'i las kyi mtha' spyad pa/_rtag tu las dang 'bras 
[\[227a.5\]]bu'i de kho na nyid la lta ba sems dam pa dang ldan pa/_yang dang yang du las dang 'bras bu la dad par gyur pa gang gis/_dge ba'i las byas la mi dge ba spangs pa/_drang po drang po'i rang bzhin can/_sdig pa'i grogs po dag mi sten cing /_de dag dang 
[\[227a.6\]]lhan cig dga' bar yang mi byed la/_lam du 'grogs pa na tshig kyang smra bar mi byed la/_mig zur gyis kyang lta bar mi byed de/_de ltar kun nas dge ba'i las kyi mtha' spyod pa/_gser sbyangs pa dang mtshungs pa de legs par bya ba byas pa des/_tshe 
[\[227a.7\]]'di la gzhan yang dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/legs par bya ba byas pa ji lta bu zhig_/rnam pa ni du zhe na/_'di ni mdo sde dang 'dul ba dang chos mngon pa kha ton slob pa la zhugs pa'i dge slong nyin mtshan du brtson pa gang dag mar me med pa'i gzhis/_sangs 
[\[227b\]]
[\[227b.1\]]rgyas kyi gsung rab slob ma nus pa de mar me med nas kha ton slob pa btang ste/_'dug pa la sangs rgyas kyi gsung rab la gus shing /_dge slong de rnams la yang sems dad pas bsgoms pa'i snying dang ldan pa/_chos dang dge 'dun la gus pa dkon 
[\[227b.2\]]mchog gsum la dad pa skyes pa de dge 'dun zhing chen po de la mar me dag 'bul bar byed la/_gzhan yang dge ba nyis 'gyur du byed du 'jug pa dang /_de ltar dge slong de rnams brtson 'grus bya ba'i don du yul sa tsha bar zhugs pa rnams la bsil yab 
[\[227b.3\]]sbyin par byed do/_/des dge slong rnams dge ba'i phyogs byed de/_tsha ba bsal ba dang mar me byin pas/_de dag mun pa'i mi bde ba dang bral zhing tsha ba'i gnod pa dang bral te/_kun nas shin tu bde ba dang ldan la/_ngal sor yod pa tshangs par spyod pa de/_
[\[227b.4\]]thams cad mkhyen pa'i bka' bde bar slob par byed/_sems par byed la thams cad mkhyen pa'i bka' dri ba dang /_lan glan pa la phan tshun kha ton slob par byed de/_mar me'i yon tan de dang bsil yab kyi rlung bsil ba des dge slong rnams mun pa'i mi 
[\[227b.5\]]bde ba dang bral zhing tsha ba'i gnod pa dang bral te/_sbyin bdag de'i mthus bde blag tu kha ton slob par byed/_yang dag par sems par byed/_yid shin tu brtson par gyur na/_de ltar bdag dang gzhan la phan par zhugs pa'i skyes bu dge ba dang tshul khrims dang 
[\[227b.6\]]ldan par gyur pa de/_lus dang bral nas shi ba'i 'og tu bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten nor bu 'phyang ba'i lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/der skyes nas kyang legs par byas pa'i las kyi mtha' mngon sum du gyur pa de/_shin tu bde ba'i rgyu legs 
[\[227b.7\]]par byas pa'i las kyi 'bras bu'i skal ba la ni spyod/_ji ltar nyi ma rang las 'od 'byung ba de bas bcu 'gyur gyis lhag pa'i 'od kyi phreng ba ni 'byung /_lha'i tshogs thams cad kyis shin tu bkur ba na lha mo du ma 'bum snyed rim gro bya ba'i phyir ni 'ong /_lha 
[\[228a\]]
[\[228a.1\]]mo gus pa skyes pa de rnams ji ltar snga nas bshes pa ltar yid gcugs par gyur cing /_bzhin 'dzum la rgyan thams cad kyis bklubs pas gang ba rnams ni/_byad gzugs dang cha byad dang rgyan lhag par bzang ba dang gzugs bzang ba dang 
[\[228a.2\]]dbyibs legs pa dang lus legs pa yin la/_phan tshun thab mo dang phrag dog dang 'jigs pa'i ngo bo ni med/_gcig la gcig yid gcugs pa ni skyes/_gnod pa med pa'i snying dang ldan pa rnams phan tshun 'bral bar dga' ba skad cig tsam yang med de/_
[\[228a.3\]]de skad cig kyang nyams pa med do/_/yon tan de lta bu dang ldan pa kun yid rab tu dga' bar gyur nas thams cad kyis kyang pad ma dag blangs te lha de'i drung du 'dong bar byed do/_/kha cig gis ni gser gyi pad ma blangs/_kha cig gis ni dngul gyi pad ma/_
[\[228a.4\]]kha cig gis ni bai DUr+ya'i pad ma/_kha cig gis ni shel gyi pad ma/_kha cig gis ni rin po che dang 'dres pa dag blangs te/_'di ltar gang gi lag na dngul gyi pad ma yod pa de'i pad ma'i sdong bu ni gser/_ze ba ni pad ma rA ga'i mdog yin no/_/gang gi pad 
[\[228a.5\]]ma bai DUr+ya'i pad ma yin na de'i sdong bu ni gser yin no/_/gang gi pad ma gser yin na de'i me tog an da rnyil yin no/_/gang gi pad ma spug yin na de'i sdong bu an da rnyil yin no/_gang gi lag na pad ma dmar po thogs na de'i ze ba ni rdo rje'i mdog lta bu yin te/_de ltar lha mo de 
[\[228a.6\]]rnams lha de'i drung du 'dong bar byed do/_/dong nas kyang yid gcugs pa de la kun nas pad ma char ltar 'bebs te/_ji ltar dbyar gyi dus rnams su sprin gyi rgyal po dag las char kyi rgyun mngon par 'bab pa de ltar lha de la lha mo de rnams kyis pad ma'i char 'bebs par byed do/_/
[\[228a.7\]]lha de skyes ma thag nyid du dang por lha mo de rnams mthong nas/_lha rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyi snying g.yo bar byed na yid shin tu dga' bar gyur pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/_de skyes ma thag tu dang por de rnams mthong nas 'dod chags kyis 'phangs pa'i yid dang /_ngo mtshar du gyur pa'i snying 
[\[228b\]]
[\[228b.1\]]rab tu dga' ba dang yan lag dang nying lag thams cad kyang dga' bar gyur nas/_mod nyid la stan de nas lha mo de rnams ga la ba der rgyug par byed do/_/'dod chags skyes pa de dag phan tshun 'dres par gyur nas/_de nas yang lha mo de rnams dang lha de yang dang yang 
[\[228b.2\]]du dga' ba nyid lhag par bskyed par bya ba'i phyir/_shin tu bro gar byed dgod par byed glu len par byed do/_/de nas lha de lha mo de rnams kyis yongs su bskor nas/_tshal dang nye ba'i tshal rin po che sna tshogs 'bar ba/_'dod pa'i yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa/_shing ljon pa rnams dang 
[\[228b.3\]]shing ljon pa'i drung rnams dang ldan pa/_bya sna tshogs 'dres shing sgra 'byin pa thos na snyan pa/_me tog dang 'bras bu'i phyogs ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin 'grub pa chu bo dang 'bab chu dang lteng ka rnams 'bum snyed kyis gang ba'i tshal dang nye ba'i tshal de rnams su/_lha de lha mo de rnams 
[\[228b.4\]]dang lhan cig gnas par bya ba'i phyir 'dong bar byed de/_rang gis byas pa'i las mngon sum du gyur pa des/_bde ba dpe med pa rnam pa du ma dag myong ngo /_/de nas de de rnams kyis yongs su bskor nas sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pas rtse zhing /_'dod pa thams cad bsams 
[\[228b.5\]]na 'grub pa lus kyi mtha' rgya chen po byed pa'i lha de/_'phags pa'i tshul khrims de la brten pa'i 'bras bu la spyod par byed do/_/de nas de ltar lha de de rnams kyis yongs su bskor nas/_lha de rnams dang yang nor bu 'phyang ba'i tshal ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do/_/lha gzhan rnams 
[\[228b.6\]]kyis de dag mthong nas/_yid rab tu dga' ba gus pa dang bcas pa/_lha dang lha mo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba rnams/_lha gsar du byung ba de ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do/_/gus pa dang bcas pa'i yid kyis/_de la gnyen ltar sems shing thams cad yid rab tu dga' bas 
[\[228b.7\]]lha de'i drung du dong ngo /_/lha gsar du byung ba de yang yid dga' ba skyes nas lha de rnams 'ong ba ga la ba der 'gro bar byed do/_/de nas yang lha de rnams dang lha gsar du byung ba de dang nor bu 'phyang ba'i tshal 'dod pa lnga 'grub pa de na dga' bar byed/_dga' dgur spyod par byed cing dga' 
[\[229a\]]
[\[229a.1\]]ba dang 'thun pa'i sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pa/_thos na shin tu yid du 'ong la de bzhin du rnar snyan pa dag gis lha de rnams dga' bar byed rtse bar byed dga' dgur spyod par byed do/_/de nas yang lha rnams nor bu 'phyang ba'i tshal na/_lha mo sgeg mo rab tu dga' ba 
[\[229a.2\]]rnam pa du ma rol mo'i sgra 'byin zhing shin tu nyams dga' bar byed pa'i nang na/_lha rnams lta bas bde ba myong bar byed de 'di lta ste/_tshal gyi nang gi sa gzhi rin po che sna bdun gyis brgyan pa/_kun nas kha dog dang mdog gser gyi gos bgos pa ltar mdzes pa yin te/_de 
[\[229a.3\]]ltar dga' bar byed pa'i shing ljon pa skyes pa rnams phan tshun 'gran pa ltar me tog rab tu rgyas pa/_rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing ljon pa rnams kyis brgyan pa/_tshal dang nye ba'i tshal gyi sa gzhi mthon dman ran pa/_bza' ba'i tshogs dang btung ba'i tshogs mang pos gang ba kun nas 
[\[229a.4\]]blta na sdug cing nyams dga' la lhag par mdzes pa yin no/_/de nas yang lha de lha de rnams dang lhan cig sil snyan sna tshogs dang bcas pas dga' bar byed/_dga' dgur spyod par byed la/_shin tu bde ba dang ldan pa dag 'phyang ba'i tshal la sten par byed do/_/lha dang lha mo'i tshogs kyis 
[\[229a.5\]]yongs su bskor ba de/_bai DUr+ya'i rdo leb ces bya ba'i sa phyogs de la yang sten par byed de/_des sa phyogs de na nor bu las byas pa'i gos kyi ngo bo nyid shing ljon pa rnams las 'phyang ba mthong ste/_nyi ma shar ba lta bur shin tu gzi brjid dang ldan pa/_skye bo thams cad kyis mthong na bde ba yin 
[\[229a.6\]]la rlung gis bskyod na mthon dman du 'phar ba yin no//_//'phags pa dam pa'i chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa/_bam po bzhi bcu tham pa/_bung ba 'bum snyed kyis kyang khyab pa yin la/_bung ba kha dog mdzes pa rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis brgyan pa/_kun nas shing ljon 
[\[229a.7\]]pa 'bum snyed 'od 'bar ba ltar gsal ba yin no/_/lha de rnams kyis shing ljon pa de dag mthong nas ngo mtshar cher skyes pa'i mig phye ste/_shing ljon pa de dag rlung gis bskyod pa'i lo ma 'phyang ba kun nas mdzes pa ga la ba der lha mo'i tshogs thams cad dang lhan cig 'dong bar byed do/_/
[\[229b\]]
[\[229b.1\]]de dag kun nas rgya che ba de rnams kyi nang na sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pas dga' bar byed rtse bar byed dga' dgur spyod par byed do/_/de nas tshal 'phyang ba'i nang de na sems ngo mtshar du dga' ba'i lha de rnams lcang lo 'phrugs pa de dag rtse ba'i don du spyang bar byed do/_/spyangs pa dag 
[\[229b.2\]]la rtse ba na lcang lo 'phrugs pa la lta bas chog nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_da ni lcang lo 'phrugs pa dag las rgun chang yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa 'byung bar gyur cig snyam du sems bskyed ma thag nyid du lcang lo 'phrugs pa de dag las lha de rnams kyi rgun chang byung ngo /_/
[\[229b.3\]]de dag kyang lha de rnams kyis sngon ma mthong ba yin te/_sngon ma byung ba'i btung ba mdog dang dri dang ro dang reg pa byung bar gyur pa dag la de rnams ngo mtshar cher skyes shing mig dang bzhin 'dzum la yid brgya 'gyur du rab tu dga' ba skyes so/_/rgun chang ngo mtshar che ba mdog dang 
[\[229b.4\]]dri dang ro phun sum tshogs pa/_shing lo 'phrugs pa rnams las byung ba de dag 'thungs nas bdag cag bcu 'gyur du rab tu dga' bar bya'o snyam mo/_/de nas lha de rnams bai DUr+ya'i snod thogs te rgun chang de dag bcus nas/_rgun chang 'di ci bder gsol cig ces phan tshun 'brim par byed do/_/
[\[229b.5\]]de ltar de rnams 'thung ba ni gang gis ji srid du sbyin pa byin nam/_tshul khrims bsrungs pa de ni de srid du chang de mdog dang dri dang ro dang ldan pa'i yon tan khyad par che bar 'byung ngo /_/de nas chang de lhag par zhim par rig nas/_de na lha sbyin pa dang tshul khrims chung ngu dang ldan pa gang yin 
[\[229b.6\]]pa de'i chang de dag mi zhim par shes nas shin tu ngo tsha ba skyes so/_/shin tu ngo tsha bar rig nas bya lo ma dang rgun chang gi nang na spyod pa zhes bya ba gang shing ljon pa de rnams kyi lo ma'i nang du song ste/_rgun chang rtag tu 'thung ba dag gis 'di ltar tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_chang 
[\[229b.7\]]'thung rgyags pas myos pa yi/_/sems can gti mug dbang gyur rnams/_/gti mug zhags pas mngon sum du/_/sred pa'i ros ni 'thung bar byed/_/gti mug zhags pa chang yin te/_/'thungs nas gshin rjes skul bar byed/_/mtho ris nas ni dmyal bar ltung /_/
[\[230a\]]
[\[230a.1\]]de bas chang la ma reg cig_/mthong dang reg dang bsnams pa las/_/chang gis mi ni rmongs par byed/_/de bas kun tu zhags pa yin/_/de ni ring bar yongs su spongs/_/mthong ba las ni chags pa skye/_/reg pa las ni dri 'byung la/_/dri las ro la 
[\[230a.2\]]chags pa 'byung /_/ro rnams kyis ni tha mar 'gro/_/ji ltar chang la nges brten na/_/de ltar ming dang gzugs 'jig ste/_/zhags pa'i nang na tha ma ni/_/chang zhes mkhas pa rnams gsung ngo /_/ngag dang mig dang 'gro ba nyid/_/tshabs po cher ni 'khrul byed la/_/
[\[230a.3\]]blo bral rmongs pa 'khrul pa ni/_/ci yang sgrub par mi byed do/_/sa la ltung ba'i mi de la/_/bud med rnams kyang 'phya bar byed/_/'gul ba med pa shing skam 'dra/_/g.yo ba med pa sa la ltung /_/chang 'thung ba la goms pa ni/_/'chi bar 'gyur zhes grags par byed/_/ha la 
[\[230a.4\]]ha la'i dug bas lhag_/'chi zhags pas kyang de lhag go/_/chang 'thung ba la rtag tu ni/_/nyes dmigs sum cu rtsa drug yod/_/de bas nyes dmigs shes pa gang /_/de yis chang ni rnam par spongs/_/rigs btsun mkhas pa dag la ni/_/dri ma chen por byed pa yin/_/skye bo ka 
[\[230a.5\]]sa'i me tog ltar/_/yang ba kho nar byed pa yin/_/de ltar bya de dag dud 'gror gyur gyis kyang lha de dag la smod par byed na/_lha gzhan dag lta smos kyang ci dgos/_de nas las legs par byas pa'i sa bon gyis ji lta ba bzhin gyur pa'i lha rnams/_sbrang rtsi'i 
[\[230a.6\]]chang mdog dang dri dang ro phun sum tshogs pa dang tha ma dang 'bring dang khyad zhugs pa de dag 'thungs nas/_tshal rgyun gyi gnas zhes bya ba ga la ba der gnas par bya ba'i don du 'dong bar byed la/_rna gung du sil snyan gyi sgras 'dir cing yid rab tu dga' la/_me tog 
[\[230a.7\]]ud pa la sngon po'i phreng ba brgyus pas mdzes pa dag dong ngo /_/rgyun gyi gnas de nas kyang lha dang lha mo'i tshogs kyis gang ba rab tu dga' la/_phan tshun shin tu mgu bar gnas pa/_lus gser gyi 'od kyis brgyan pa rnams sprin gyi tshal der myur bar dong ngo /_/de nas sprin gyi 
[\[230b\]]
[\[230b.1\]]tshal du dong ba'i lha dga' ba la gnas pa/_bag med pa de rnams la bskul bar bya ba'i phyir/_brgya byin glang po che sa srung gi bu rnam par rgyal byed ces bya ba de nyid rgyan 'bum snyed kyis brgyan pa la zhon nas/_lha dang lha mo'i tshogs rab tu dga' bas gang ba dang sprin gyi tshal zhes 
[\[230b.2\]]bya ba der dong ngo /_/de nas lha de rnams kyis lha'i rgyal po brgya byin mthong nas/_sems gus pa dang bcas shing thor tshugs dang me tog phreng ba dang rgyan phreng thogs pa thams cad kyis brgya byin la bstod cing /_sil snyan sna tshogs kyi sgra dang dbyangs nye bar 'byin la brgya 
[\[230b.3\]]byin gyi mdun du bro gar dang tshul sdug gus 'gro bar byed do/_/lha'i rgyal po brgya byin yang de bzhin du glang po che sa srung gi bu la zhon bzhin du/_lha de rnams la tshig snyan pa rnams kyis mngon par dga' bar byed do/_/de nas brgya byin lha de rnams kyi nang na cung zad cig 
[\[230b.4\]]dga' bar gnas rtse bar byas nas/_lha de rnams la 'di skad smras so/_/'di ltar legs par byas pa'i las kyi mtha' spyad pa'i lha khyed rnams nga lha ma yin rgyags shing khro bar gyur pa rgyags pa dang dbral bar bya ba'i phyir/_dga' ba'i tshal du 'gro ba'i bar du dga' 
[\[230b.5\]]bar gyis shig_/de nas brgya byin gyi tshig de skad thos nas lha rnams kyis smras pa/_'di ltar lha bdag cag kyang lha ma yin de rgyags pa dang dbral bar bgyi ba'i slad du mchi'o/_/de nas brgya byin gyis lha de rnams zlog par byed de/_don 'di nga 'ba' zhig 
[\[230b.6\]]gis nus kyis khyed spro bar ma byed cig_/de nas lha de rnams bzlog nas/_lha'i rgyal po brgya byin de dga' ba'i tshal ga la ba dang rang gi kun dga' ra ba ga la ba der song ba dang /_gang na nyal mal bcas pa'i nyal mal de na/_lha ma yin sprin gyi phung po lta bur 'phel 
[\[230b.7\]]ba zhugs pa dag la lha mang pos spyo bar byed de/_ji lta ji ltar spyos pa de lta de ltar 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/de ltar de 'phel bar gyur pa mthong nas lha mi bzod par gyur pa de rnams yang spyo bar byed do/_/de nas yang lha ma yin rgyags shing khro bar gyur pa/_rab tu 'phel zhing 
[\[231a\]]
[\[231a.1\]]mngon par 'phel la/_de ltar bzod pa med pa'i gzugs mthong nas/_brgya byin gyis smras pa/_'di ltar khro bas mngon par 'phel ba 'di la ni gang gis de'i rgyags pa bsal ba'i gnyen po bya dgos so snyam nas/_de nas de'i tshe brgya byin gyis 'di 
[\[231a.2\]]ltar tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_khro bas nyams pa'i khro ba ni/_/bzod pas khro ba nyid las rgyal/_/chos min chos kyis nges par rgyal/_/mun pa 'od kyis rnam par rgyal/_/bden pa rnams kyis [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]tshig bcom/_/phra ma'ang ting nge 'dzin gyis bcom/_/tshig 
[\[231a.3\]]rtsub mnyen pa rnams kyis rgyal/_/sdang ba mnyen pa nyid kyis rgyal/_/srog gcod byams pa rnams kyis rgyal/_/rku sems rtag tu sbyin pas rgyal/_/tshul bzhin yid la mi byed pa/_/tshul bzhin gyis ni rtag tu rgyal/_/ma rig pa ni rig pas rgyal/_/de bzhin 
[\[231a.4\]]mun pa snang bas so/_/mun pa'i phyogs kyi de nyid ni/_/snang ba'i phyogs kyis rgyal bar 'gyur/_/log pa'i 'dod pa mi gtsang ba/_/dpyod cing rig pas rnam par rgyal/_/lam ngan zhugs pa'i 'phags pa'i lam/_/yan lag brgyad pas rtag tu rgyal/_/sdar 
[\[231a.5\]]ma 'di ni mi 'jigs pa/_/bzhi rnams kho nas rgyal ba yin/_/brjed ngas pa ni dran pas bcom/_/mi shes pa ni shes nyid kyis/_/'dod chags bdo ba'i mi rnams ni/_/dgon gnas brtson pa rnams kyis rgyal/_/tshal rnams dkrigs pa thams 
[\[231a.6\]]cad ni/_/ri rab ri yis rnam par rgyal/_/sa las byung ba'i chu kun ni/_/rgya mtsho yis ni rgyal bar 'gyur/_/kun nas gza' dang skar ma rnams/_/nyi ma'i 'od kyis rnam par rgyal/_/lugs min de bzhin lugs kyis rgyal/_/dbul ba sbyin pa tshogs pas rgyal/_/ngor sgyu drang po 
[\[231a.7\]]rnams kyis rgyal/_/[{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]zer ba ni bden pas bcom/_/log pa yang dag nyid kyis rgyal/_/grang ba byung ba me yis rgyal/_/skom pa chu yis rnam par rgyal/_/bkres pa de bzhin ston mos rgyal/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]snying stobs yod pa gang /_/thams cad seng ges rnam par rgyal/_/'dod 
[\[231b\]]
[\[231b.1\]]chen che ba chog shes pas/_/rtag tu rgyal bar rab tu grags/_/snying rje rtag tu bsngags pa yin/_/snying rje med pa bsngags pa min/_/shes pa che la rtag tu dul/_/skyes bu de nyid smra rnams kyis/_/las ngan rnams kyi log pa nyid/_/lhag par smra ba'i mi rnams 
[\[231b.2\]]bcom/_/yon por smra ba'i mu stegs kun/_/sangs rgyas kyis ni rnam par rgyal/_/lha ma yin ni lha yis rgyal/_/chos nyid 'di ni rnam par gnas/_/brgya byin ltar ni bcos pa byed/_/kun las ngas kyang rnam rgyal na/_/'og ma khyed cag gang yin pa/_/
[\[231b.3\]]'di dag 'ongs pa smos ci dgos/_/mal gzhi 'di dag thams cad ni/_/chos lhur len pa rnams sten gyi/_/chos min pa la brtson pa yi/_/rmongs pa'i blo yis bsten bya min/_/de nas brgya byin gyi kha nas tshig de dag thos nas gang gi tshe/_ji lta ji ltar 
[\[231b.4\]]spyos pa dang de lta de ltar 'phel ba'i lha ma yin gang yin pa de dag la bden pa'i tshig 'dis phog pa dang 'phel ba med la/_stobs dang mdog dang snying stobs dag bri bar gyur to/_/sems can dman pa de dag mthong nas brgya byin gyi zhabs 'bring ba gang yin 
[\[231b.5\]]pa de rnams kyis/_sems can dman pa'i rkang pa dag nas bzung ste/_phyung nas dga' ba'i tshal de nas bskrad do/_/brgya byin yid rab tu dga' ba yang glang po che sa srung gi bu la zhon nas/_nor bu 'phyang ba'i lha rnams kyi gnas ga la ba der 'gro bar byed de/_
[\[231b.6\]]bya ba byas pa'i lha'i tshogs thams cad kyis yongs su bskor ba shin tu dpe med pa'i lha'i 'dod pa thams cad grub cing ldan pa de nas yang lha de dag gi drung du phyin to/_/nor bu 'phyang ba na gnas pa'i lha de rnams kyang brgya byin dang phrad nas mngon par bstod do/_/
[\[231b.7\]]yang thams cad sprin gyi tshal ga la ba de nyid du dong ngo /_/de ltar brgya byin gyi mdun na 'don pa yid shin tu mgu ba 'dod pa thams cad dang ldan pa rnams/_tshal dang nye ba'i tshal gyi sa gzhi mthon dman ran pa/_sa phyogs shin tu rnam par phye ba me tog mang po bsags pa/_
[\[232a\]]
[\[232a.1\]]tshal dkrigs pa me tog gi ldum bu 'phyang ba'i ljid kyis ldum bu 'phyang ba'i khyim nyams dga' ba/_kun nas shin tu dga' ba rnams su dga' bar byed do/_/brgya byin gyi mdun na lha mo'i tshogs yid rab tu dga' ba rnams kyang pi bang dang rdza rnga dang 
[\[232a.2\]]khar rnga dang gling bu dang pi ldir dag khyer nas glu len par byed dga' bar byed dga' dgur spyod par byed do/_/brgya byin yang glang po che sa srung gi bu la zhon te/_rol mo'i kha dpon gzhan rnams kyis bskor nas bstod cing /_sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pas 
[\[232a.3\]]lhan cig rtse bar byed de 'di lta ste/_jeng dang rnga dang khar dkrol dang gling bu dang glu dbyangs kyis mdun du bskor nas rtse bar byed dga' bar byed do/_/glang po che'i rgyal po de yang gzugs ri bas che ste/_ri chen po 'gul ba lta bur 'dug pa'i glang po che de la zhon pa ni/_
[\[232a.4\]]ji ltar gangs ri kha bas yog pa'i ri'i rtse mo'i steng na sos ka'i dus su nyi ma'i 'od zer sprin dang mun pa dang bral ba shin tu gsal bar shar ba de ltar mdzes pa yin no/_/de ltar brgya byin lha dang lha mo'i tshogs ngan song gi sgo gcod pa yid shin tu mgu ba blo gros bzang 
[\[232a.5\]]po dang 'thun pas yongs su bskor ba dang lhan cig_/bai DUr+ya dang dngul dang shel dang an da rnyil dang mthon ka chen po dang pad ma rA ga dang gser btso ma dang spug pas ches lhag pa'i tshal dang nye ba'i tshal nyams dga' ba rnams na/_rgyu bar byed rtse bar byed dga' bar byed de/_gang de kho na 
[\[232a.6\]]nyid shin tu phun sum tshogs pa lhag par bde ba myong ngo /_/de lta mod kyi des 'dod pa yang dag par grub pa/_'jig rten gyi phun sum tshogs pa 'byung ba 'jig par rig nas/_dga' ba yang med la 'khrug pa yang med do/_/phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyi mtha' ni rgud par 'gyur ro 
[\[232a.7\]]snyam du rig nas/_'di ltar rang gi las la spyod pa/_las kyi rlung gis gtor ba rnams sems can dmyal ba dang [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang dud 'gro rnams kyi nang na 'khyam zhing /_lha dang lha mo'i tshogs 'grogs pa 'di thams cad dang bral ba'i lha rnams shi nas gar 'gro/_/kye ma byis pa so so'i 
[\[232b\]]
[\[232b.1\]]skye bo bslus pa 'di dag thams cad ni las byas pa chen po myong ngo snyam du nang du yid la sems par byed do/_/de nas de'i tshe brgya byin gyis 'di ltar tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_nam mkha' la ni sprin chags pa/_/rlung gis kun du gtor ba rnams/_/'dus pa dag kyang 'gyes pa ltar/_/
[\[232b.2\]]'khor ba'i srog chags de bzhin no/_/ji ltar dus tshigs dus tshigs su/_/me tog byung ba mi yis mthong /_/dus tshigs thams cad thal gyur na/_/ji ltar byung ba so sor 'jig_/de ltar legs par byas pa'i lha/_/dus su byung na dga' byed la/_/dge ba'i dus ni thal gyur 
[\[232b.3\]]na/_/ji ltar byung ba so sor 'jig_/ji ltar dus tshigs dus tshigs su/_/shing lo du ma skye 'gyur ba/_/dus tshigs dus ni thal 'gyur na/_/de dag kun nas 'jig par 'gyur/_/de ltar lha rnams lo ma 'dra/_/srid pa 'di ni shing lta bu/_/bde ba rtag tu 'jig 'gyur te/_/
[\[232b.4\]]brtan pa dang ni rtag pa med/_/ji ltar char pa 'bab dus na/_/mkha' la char 'bab ldog pa med/_/de ltar bde ba 'di dag kun/_/'gro bar 'gyur te log pa med/_/ji ltar rma bya'i sgro dag ni/_/rlung gis kun du khyer gyur pa/_/de ni zad par bya phyir 'jig_/
[\[232b.5\]]bde ba'i gzhi ni de dang 'dra/_/ji ltar mer ni shing bcug na/_/nges par rab tu sreg par byed/_/de ltar dus ni me dang 'dra/_/mi rnams shing skam lta bu yin/_/brgya'am yang na stong dag tu/_/'di dag 'ong dang 'gro 'gyur yang /_/de ltar sred pas rmongs pa 'di/_/
[\[232b.6\]]yang dag rig par mi 'gyur ro/_/sred dang rmongs pa'i mig 'phrul gyis/_/thams cad du ni rnam par gang /_/ji ltar dge skal ma yin pa/_/de ltar lha rnams rab tu bslus/_/de ltar brgya byin des lha de rnams la snying rje bskyed nas/_de nas yang glang po che sa srung gi bu de la zhon te/_lha'i 
[\[232b.7\]]tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_sil snyan dang rol mo'i sgra dbyangs sna tshogs len bzhin du lha'i 'dun sa chos bzang de nyid du 'dong bar byed de/_chos bzang na gnas pa rgyal ba thob pa dag la lha gzhan rnams kyis mchod cing phyin te/_nor bu 'phyang ba na gnas pa'i lha 
[\[233a\]]
[\[233a.1\]]'dod pas tshim pa med pa rnams ji srid du 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba byas shing bsags pa/_so so yang dag par myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad pa dang spangs pa dang /_zhig par ma gyur pa de srid du gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro rnams kyis tshal dang 
[\[233a.2\]]nye ba'i tshal rnams kyi nang na rtse bar byed dga' dgur spyod par byed do/_/de de nas shi nas kyang las nye bar 'gro ba ji lta ba bzhin/_sems can dmyal ba dang [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang dud 'gro'i nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mi'i nang du skyes na/_de 
[\[233a.3\]]las de dang rgyu 'thun par rigs rgya chen po'i nang du skye la/_shin tu bde ba dang ldan pa dang /_bong tshod che zhing bzang ba dang /_yul dbus su skye ba dang /_chos bzang po dang ldan pa dang /_shin tu 'byor pa dang /_bu dang tsha bo dang ldan pa dang /_yun ring du gnas pa dang /_gnod pa med pa'i 
[\[233a.4\]]bran khol bdog pa dang /_skye bo thams cad dga' ba dang /_yang dag par ldan pa dang /_rgyal po'am blon po chen por 'gyur ba mthong ngo /_/de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de/_sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas la rtog par byed de/_
[\[233a.5\]]des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas lha rnams kyi gnas ris 'thun pa zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo /_/der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/_legs par byas pa'i las kyi mtha' spyad pa/_
[\[233a.6\]]lus dang ngag dang yid kyi mtha' yang dag par bsdams pa/_g.yo sgyu med pa/_gzhan la mi gnod pa blo gros rtag tu rgya che ba/_drang po drang po'i rang bzhin can sdig pa'i grogs po spong ba/_gang thabs kun gyis sdig pa'i grogs po spong bar byed la/_de dang lhan cig 
[\[233a.7\]]'dre bar mi byed/_de dang tshig kyang mi smra/_de la mig zur tsam yang mi lta/_lam du yang lhan cig mi 'grogs/_de mthong nas kyang rtag tu spong bar byed la/_de'i grogs po gang yin pa de yang spong bar byed/_btsun pa dag la rten par byed cing /_rtag tu dam 
[\[233b\]]
[\[233b.1\]]pa'i chos nyan pa'i ngang tshul can yin la/_de thos nas dge ba dang mi dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa'i chos rnams kyang rnam par shes/_spang bar bya ba spong bar byed la/_spang bar mi bya ba yang spang bar mi bya ba rab tu shes nas yid la legs par byed pa 
[\[233b.2\]]dang /_shin tu mnyam par bzhag pa dang /_dran pa dang /_sems kyi dbang du mi 'gro bar dran pa nye bar gnas pa dang /_brkam chags med pa dang /_tshul khrims rnam pa bdun rjes su skyong la rdul tsam yang 'khrul pa med pa dang /_kha na ma tho ba phra mo rdul tsam la yang 
[\[233b.3\]]'jigs par lta ba dang /_kun nas las dag la dri ma med pa yin te/_gser btso ma ltar skyon med pa srog gcod pa dang /_ma byin par len pa de dang de dag spong bar byed la/_sbyin pa yang byin/_bsod nams kyang byed do/_/srog chags dag thar par byed pa ji 
[\[233b.4\]]lta bu yin zhe na/_'di ni rgyal po'am/_blon pos skyes pa dang bud med byi ba byed pa lhan cig bzung nas bcings te/_grong khyer gyi lho phyogs kyi sgor khrid la/_rnga brdungs nas ming dang rus kyang bsgrags te/_grogs byed pa su yang med/_mi dga' la 'jigs bzhin mog 
[\[233b.5\]]mog por gyur pa dur khrod logs su kha bstan te/_khrid pa dang des nor rdzas kyis bslus te/_thar bar byed pa dang gzhan yang sbyin pa gtong /_bsod nams dag byed pa yin no/_/dge ba dag ji lta bu yin zhe na/_de ltar de gal te chu nyung ba mya ngam gyi phyogs su dge 
[\[233b.6\]]'dun gnas par gyur la/_de yang dge slong dag skom gyis srog chad la thug ste/_shin tu sdug bsngal bar gyur pa dang /_des gnas pa de rnams kyi don du kun dga' ra ba'i dbus su rdzing bu'am khron pa dag byas la/_chu phyung ba de dag gi nang 'dam rdzab kyis gang 
[\[233b.7\]]ngam srin bu rnams kyis yog pa dang de dag la de las byed de/_srin bu de dag sa skam po dag la 'chi bar mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir/_gsher sa'i phyogs gzhan du 'jog par byed de/_de ltar srog gcod pa chung ngu yang srung bar byed do/_/gzhan du yang 'bab chu dag gi 
[\[234a\]]
[\[234a.1\]]nang na srin bu gnas pa de dag kyang blangs nas de nas yang srog btsa' bar bya ba'i phyir/_chu yod pa'i phyogs rnams su 'jog par byed de/_de ltar kun nas dge ba'i las kyi mtha' spyod pa ni srog gcod par mi byed do/_/ma byin par len pa spangs pa ji lta 
[\[234a.2\]]bu yin zhe na/_'di ni rku sems kyis rtsa ba yang len par mi byed pa yin te/_phyogs dag na shing dang smyig ma'i ldum bu skyes pa yang len par mi byed/_gzhan du 'phos pa'i grong dang kun dga' ra ba rnying pa dag gzhan gyis yongs su bzung ba med la/_da dung du sus kyang 
[\[234a.3\]]'dzin par mi 'gyur gyis kyang /_sngon gzhan gyis bsgrubs pa zhig yin no snyam du yid la sems par byed la/_de bsam pa des len par mi byed de/_de ltar ma byin par len pa spangs pa yin no/_/kun nas legs par byas pa'i las kyi mtha' spyad pa de/_
[\[234a.4\]]lus dang bral nas shi ba'i 'og tu ris 'thun pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/der skyes nas kyang de phyir phyogs pa nyid du skye ste/_gal te gser gyi stan nam/_gal te dngul gyi'am/_gal te shel gyi'am/_gal te gser btso ma'i 'am/_gal 
[\[234a.5\]]te an da rnyil gyi'am/_gal te mthon ka chen po'i 'am/_gal te mu tig gi'am/_gal te spug gi stan gyi steng du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de skyes ma thag tu 'di snyam du sems te/_las dge ba gang zhig gis bdag 'dir skyes snyam mo/_/des sngon gyi las 
[\[234a.6\]]rjes su dran te/_'di ltar dge ba'i rnam pa pha ma ltar byams pa/_rnam par smin pa bsil ba/_bde ba nges par myong bar 'gyur ba'i rnam pa ji snyed pa des lha rnams kyi nang du skyes so snyam ste/_des las de dag rjes su dran zhing las kyi 'bras bu yang mngon sum 
[\[234a.7\]]nyid du mthong nas/_dge ba'i las rnams la ni stod par byed la/_mi dge ba dag la ni smod par byed do/_/tshe rabs dran zhing las kyi gzhir gyur pa/_dge ba pha ma lta bu du ma'i las kyi gzhi mi'i rjes su dran nas/_de nas de'i tshe 'di ltar tshigs su bcad de smras 
[\[234b\]]
[\[234b.1\]]pa/_gang zhig bag yod thob nas su/_/mi yi tshe ni legs par thob/_/legs par bya ba'i las byas na/_/lha yi 'jig rten nye bar 'gro/_/mi yi tshe ni rnyed dka' ste/_/de ni rnyed nas bag med gang /_/mi de bag med mun pa las/_/'khyams nas sems 
[\[234b.2\]]can dmyal bar ltung /_/legs byas rnam pa gsum byas shing /_/rnam pa bdun yang goms byas la/_/dgra gsum bsad pa'i mi dag ni/_/lha rnams kyi ni nang du 'gro/_/nyon mongs nges par sel byed la/_/dga' bas sel bar mi byed gang /_/dga' ba bsal 
[\[234b.3\]]ba'i dag pa de/_/lha rnams kyi ni nang du 'gro/_/sdug bsngal chen po'i sgor gyur pa/_/ser sna nges par bsal byas shing /_/sbyin pa'ang sna tshogs byin pa ni/_/lha rnams kyi ni nang du 'gro/_/srog chags dag ni srog bzhin du/_/snying brtses rtag tu bsrung byas 
[\[234b.4\]]shing /_/byams sems rtag tu dul ba dag_/lha rnams kyi ni nang du 'gro/_/ma byin me ltar rig nas su/_/kun nas byin pa byas gyur zhing /_/sems dang blo gros bsgoms pa ni/_/lha rnams kyi ni nang du 'gro/_/de nyid don la sems pa po/_/gzhan gyi chung 
[\[234b.5\]]ma'ang ma ltar lta/_/'dod skyes nyes pas ma gos pa/_/lha rnams kyi ni nang du 'gro/_/gang zhig rang sems me 'di dag_/lce yi gtsub shing yang dag byung /_/[{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba rjod byed gang /_/de ni bcom na bde 'gror 'gro/_/bshes grogs rtag tu don med byed/_/phra ma rtag tu 
[\[234b.6\]]bcom nas su/_/'jam por smra bar dga' ba ni/_/lha rnams kyi ni nang du 'gro/_/mtshon cha lta bu'i tshig rtsub dag_/brtan pos yong ye spong byed la/_/rtag tu tshig 'jam rab tu smra/_/de ni bde 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur/_/gang gi lce yi rtse mo la/_/'brel med mi smra mi 'gyur/_/
[\[234b.7\]]yang dag smra la dus nyid shes/_/lha rnams kyi ni nang du 'gro/_/sangs rgyas gsungs pa'i rnam pa bdun/_/gang gis tshul khrims 'di bsrungs pa/_/brtan po tshul nyid shes pa de/_/lha rnams kyi ni nang du 'gro/_/de ltar lha gsar du skyes pa de phyir phyogs pa skyes ma thag nyid du tshe rabs dran nas 
[\[235a\]]
[\[235a.1\]]yul rnams kyi dbang nyid blo gros su gyur kyang /_sngon bsgoms shing goms pa'i blos smras so/_/de nas gsar du skyes pa de shin tu gzhon la gtsang gtsang ltar 'dug par mthong zhing rtogs nas/_lha mo de rnams lha de'i drung du rgyug par byed de ji ltar me tog gi ro 'thung bar 'dod 
[\[235a.2\]]pa'i bung ba rnams me tog nyid la rgyug par byed pa de ltar lha mo lag na sil snyan dang rol mo rnam pa sna tshogs thogs pa/_gzhan dag gi lag na gling bu dang rdza rnga thogs pa/_lus la me tog phreng ba dang phye ma dang byug pas bskus pa me tog gi phreng ba rnams thogs pa dang /_gzhan dag ni me 
[\[235a.3\]]tog gi char mngon par 'bebs/_gzhan dag ni glu len zhing gar mkhan ltar mdzes pa de rnams/_lha de'i drung du kun du rgyug par byed do/_/de ltar rgyan dang cha byad rnam pa sna tshogs thogs pa/_gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa/_cho ga rnam pa sna tshogs la mkhas pa/_
[\[235a.4\]]cha byad rnam pa sna tshogs 'chang ba rnam pa sna tshogs bdog pa/_gzugs gcig pas gcig bzang zhing byad gzugs mchog dang ldan pa rnams/_lha gsar du skyes pa de la lan brgya'am lan stong du mngon par brtags nas sngon gyi lha 'chi ba dag bor te/_lha gsar pa gsar du skyes 
[\[235a.5\]]pa yid du sdug pa'i drung du/_lha mo de rnams ji ltar shin tu skom pa dag mtsho skams pa bor nas/_mtsho chu bsil zhing dang bas kun du gang ba'i drung du rgyug pa de ltar gsar du skyes pa la 'dod pa ngoms mi myong ba'i lha mo de dag thams cad kyis rab tu brgyugs so/_/de nas lha gsar 
[\[235a.6\]]du skyes pa des de rnams kyi rgyan gyi sgra nyid thos nas/_sems 'dod chags kyis g.yengs par 'gyur na/_de rnams kyi byad gzugs de dang spyod pa de dag mthong na lta smos kyang ci dgos/_de bzhin du de'i sems sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pa dang yo byad de dag gis g.yengs 
[\[235a.7\]]pa dang ji ltar tshe rabs 'bum lon pa ltar brjed de/_'di ltar lha rnams kyi ngo bo ni 'di lta ste/_lha nyid bag med pa'i gnas yin no/_/de nas lha gsar du skyes pa de lha mo sgeg chos mkhas pa de rnams kyis kun nas 'khor bar bskor nas/_tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i sems 'dod chags 
[\[235b\]]
[\[235b.1\]]kun tu ston pa'i tshig rnams kyis de ltar g.yengs te/_'di ltar de ltar de dag gi dbang kho nar gyur nas shin tu bag med par gnas so/_/de de rnams kyis bskor nas 'dod pa thams cad 'byor pa/_sngon ma myong ba'i bde ba 'thob ste/_yid shin tu mgu bas lha mo de dag ga la ba 
[\[235b.2\]]der 'gro bar byed do/_/de yang de rnams kyis nye bar bsten te/_dgod dgod/_rtse rtse/_smra smra/_'bur 'bur ba'i blos lam de nyid nas 'dong bar byed do/_/bya rnyis bzung ba ltar kun du 'dod chags kyi rnyis bzung ba de/_rnyi de rnams kyis kun nas bzung nas mngon par mdzes pa de dag ga la ba 
[\[235b.3\]]der khrid pa dang /_des sngon ma mthong ba shin tu nyams dga' ba rin po che sna bdun gyi sa phyogs mthong na shin tu yid 'phrogs pa/_rin po che sna bdun 'bar ba'i sa phyogs dag mthong ngo /_/de nas yang de dag tu lha'i phreng ba dang gos rnam pa du ma gyon pa/_bde ba dang nyams dga' ba rnam pa du ma yun 
[\[235b.4\]]ring du myong nas/_tshal dgon pa dga' ba zhes bya ba ga la ba der sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i glu dbyangs len zhing 'dong bar byed do/_/lha de lha mo de rnams dang lhan cig mngon par rtse zhing tshal der phyin pa dang /_bya kha dog dang dbyibs dang 'gros dang gzugs sna tshogs su 'dug pa/_sgra 
[\[235b.5\]]shin tu snyan pa 'byin pa/_byad gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs su 'dug pa dag mthong ngo /_/de dag kyang bya mo rnams kyi dbang du gyur pa yin te/_de rnams gar 'gro ba der bya de dag kyang de rnams kyi dbang du gyur nas 'gro'o/_/de bzhin du ldum bu'i nang ga la ba de rnams 'dug pa dang der yang 
[\[235b.6\]]bya de dag 'dug par byed do/_/me tog gi chang gang na yod par de rnams 'thung ba dang bya de dag kyang de na 'thung bar byed do/_/me tog gi dog pa dag gi nang ga la bar lus zhugs pa dang der yang bya de dag de bzhin du 'jug par byed do/_/yul gang dag btang nas nam mkha' la 'gro ba 
[\[235b.7\]]dang der yang bya de dag 'gro bar byed do/_/'bras bu gang yin pa dag la de rnams kyi mchus za ba dang de dag kyang de bzhin du 'bras bu de nyid la za bar byed do/_/pad ma'i tshal ga la bar de rnams la gnas par bya ba'i phyir 'dong ba dang /_de dag kyang de bzhin du de rnams dang lhan cig 
[\[236a\]]
[\[236a.1\]]phyogs de'i pad ma'i rdzing nyid du 'dong bar byed do/_/lhan cig spyod pa bya mo rnams ri'i rtse mo ga la bar 'dong ba dang de dag kyang mgul du skud pas btags pa bzhin du de rnams kyi dbang du gyur nas 'dong bar byed do/_/de bzhin du bung ba mo dag pad ma'i gsab 
[\[236a.2\]]gseb tu 'dong ba dang bung ba rnams kyang 'dong la [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]mo rnams kyis kyang [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dag dbang du byas/_lha mo rnams kyis kyang lha dag dbang du byas te/_de dag ni dbyar gyi dus su mtsho gcig tu chus gang bar gyur pa ltar shin tu lhod lhod por thar bar dka' ba'i bcing bas bsdams pa/_
[\[236a.3\]]'di dag thams cad ni bud med kyi dbang du gyur par rig nas/_dge slong des 'di ltar tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_zhags pa'i nang na 'di dam ste/_/'di ltar bud med zhags pa dam/_/'di yis bcings pa'i mi rnams ni/_/srid pa'i btson rar rgyug par byed/_/
[\[236a.4\]]zhags pas mgul bcings zhags min gyi/_/snying zhags bud med 'di mi bzad/_/snying gi zhags pas bcings pa yi/_/mi rnams sdug bsngal skal ba can/_/zhags pa bsreg cing gtub tu rung /_/bud med zhags pa bsreg mi rung /_/dmyal ba [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]
[\[236a.5\]]dud 'gro'i nang /_/'gro zhing rjes su 'gro bar byed/_/lus can tshogs su ldan pa la/_/zhags pa chen pos 'ching bar byed/_/de bzhin lus med sems 'di la/_/bud med zhags pas 'ching bar byed/_/gang gis skye bo 'ching byed pa/_/zhags pa de ni tshad 
[\[236a.6\]]gzung rung /_/bud med kyi ni 'ching ba che/_/de ni tshad gzung mi rig go/_/'dis ni re zhig dga' ba dang /_/kun nas thar bar dka' ba yi/_/zhags pas bcings pa'i mi rnams ni/_/srid pa'i mtsho las mi 'grol lo/_/zhags pas mgul lam lus gcig cig_/
[\[236a.7\]]'ching byed gal te 'ching mi byed/_/bud med zhags pa chen po 'di/_/dbang po drug rnams 'ching bar byed/_/lcags sam shing ngam gres ma gang yin pa/_/'ching ba 'di ni dam par 'phags mi gsung /_/blo zhan bud med rnams la lta ba gang /_/kun du chags pa'i sems 
[\[236b\]]
[\[236b.1\]]ni dam zhes gsung /_/de ltar dge slong de 'dod pa la smod par byed do/_/de nas lha de bud med mchog de rnams kyis kun nas dga' ba nyid kyi zhags pas bcings nas/_tshal dang nye ba'i tshal mthong na yid 'phrog pa rnam pa sna tshogs gang dag dpe bya bar yang sla ba ma yin pa de dag tu 
[\[236b.2\]]khrid do/_/de nas de ltar lha de dga' dgur spyod pa na res 'ga' pad ma'i tshal/_ngang pa'i pad ma'i tshal zhes bya ba der de lha mo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor nas 'gro bar byed do/_/pad ma'i tshal de yang lha dang lha mo'i tshogs mang pos yongs su bskor nas dga' bar byed pa/_
[\[236b.3\]]'dod pa'i yon tan lnga 'byor cing ldan par gyur pa rnams kyis dga' bar byed/_rtse bar byed/_dga' dgur spyod par byed do/_/lha mos yongs su bskor ba ris 'thun pa'i lha rnams sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i sgra 'byung ba chags su rung ba snyan pa lha thams cad 'thun 
[\[236b.4\]]par yid 'phrog par byed pa/_shin tu 'dod pa ston par byed pas lhan cig dga' bar byed do/_/de rnams gser gyi ri las gser gyi ri gzhan la 'dzeg par byed de/_thams cad kyang nyams dga' ba rgya che zhing dga' bar byed pa'i yul gyi rjes su 'jug go/_/de dag de ltar 
[\[236b.5\]]dga' ba na blo 'di lta bu skye ste/_bdag cag kun phan tshun grogs su gyur pa yin te/_lha'i 'dun sa chos bzang gi skyed mos tshal du dga' ston bya ba'i phyir 'dong ngo snyam mo/_/de nas lha dang lha mo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba de dag thams cad kha cig ni nam mkha' la 
[\[236b.6\]]'dzegs nas 'gro/_kha cig ni ngang pa'i shing rta la zhon/_kha cig ni rma bya'i shing rta la zhon/_kha cig ni nam mkha' la bkad sa phub pa'i nang du zhugs/_kha cig ni gzhal med khang dang ra ba rnam pa sna tshogs su phye ba'i nang du zhugs nas/_brgya byin blta ba'i phyir lha'i 'dun sa 
[\[236b.7\]]chos bzang ga la ba der dong ngo /_/sil snyan dang rol mo'i sgra dang glu dbyangs rnam pa sna tshogs kyis phyogs thams cad rab tu 'gengs shing brgya byin gyi gnas su phyin to/_/de rnams kyi glu dbyangs kyi sgra snyan pa dpe med pa de thos nas/_lha'i rgyal po brgya byin gyis chos bzang na gnas pa'i lha 
[\[237a\]]
[\[237a.1\]]rnams la smras pa/_kye grogs po dag dga' bar gnas pa'i lha 'di dag gang yin/_gnas ni gang na gnas/_de nas lha de dag gis de skad thos nas/_lha de rnams myur du shes par bya ba'i phyir de nas yang lha de rnams la myur du brtags nas/_brgya byin la 
[\[237a.2\]]smras pa/_brgya byin 'di ltar lha 'di rnams ni gnas ris 'thun pa na gnas pa lags te/_'dir brgya byin gyi zhal mthong bar bgyi ba'i slad du mchi'o/_/de nas brgya byin gyis de dag la 'di skad smras so/_/'di ltar yid rab tu dga' ba sil snyan dang rol mo'i sgra dang yo byad 
[\[237a.3\]]rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i lha khyed rnams kyang ris 'thun pa'i lha rnams gang nas 'ong ba der dga' bar gnas par bya ba'i phyir bsur deng shig_/brgya byin gyis de skad bsgo ba dang /_chos bzang na gnas pa'i lha lag na sil snyan dang rol mo rnam pa sna tshogs thogs pa me tog 
[\[237a.4\]]phreng ba dang phye ma dang byug pa dang do shal dang nor bu dang rgyan phreng 'phyang ba dpung pa rnams la dpung rgyan btags pa/_thor tshugs dang yid g.yos pa/_rin po che 'od gsal ba sna tshogs kyis lus brgyan pa/_ngo bo nyid kyis lus dkar sham nyid du 'dug pa/_rin po che sna 
[\[237a.5\]]tshogs kyis lus gsal bar byas pa rnams ris 'thun pa'i lha dag ga la ba der dong ngo /_/yid lhag par rab tu dga' ba de rnams phan tshun rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gran cing sil snyan dang rol mo'i sgra dang glu dbyangs rnam pa sna tshogs la mngon par dga' ba dag lha'i rgyal po brgya byin ga 
[\[237a.6\]]la ba der 'dong bar byed de brgya byin de'i gnas su dong ngo /_/de nas lha'i rgyal po brgya byin khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ka ba 'bum rnyed yod pa'i nang na rgyal ba thob pa zhes bya ba'i seng ge'i khri la 'dug go/_/bde bar 'dug pa gzi brjid 'bar zhing lha 'bum snyed kyis bskor/_shin tu legs par 
[\[237a.7\]]byas pa rnams kyi las dag la ni nye bar spyod/_gzi brjid ni nyi ma brgya bas lhag_/lha'i rgyal por gyur gyis kyang bag yod pa la ni gnas te/_lha'i rgyal po de lta bu de mthong nas/_lha de dag thams cad yid bcu 'gyur du rab tu dga' nas/_brgya byin la gsong por smra zhing 
[\[237b\]]
[\[237b.1\]]bro gar byed dgod par byed la/_'di ltar brgya byin la mngon par bstod pa'i tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/_chos spyod rtag tu zhi ba dang /_/gang dag yul gyis mi gtse ba/_/lha rnams dang ni 'jig rten bcas/_/lha rgyal brgya byin rtag tu skyongs/_/chos kyis 'jig rten 
[\[237b.2\]]rnams 'chos kyi/_/chos ma yin pa ga la zhig_/chos spyod rtag tu bde dang ldan/_/de las bzlog na bde ldan min/_/chos spyod pa yang ye shes la/_/nges par bsten pa bde ba lags/_/'tshe ba med cing bden tshig smra/_/de yang gcig tu bde ba lags/_/'jig 
[\[237b.3\]]rten yon tan gang lags dang /_/'jig rten 'das pa'i yon tan gang /_/de dag thams cad ma lus par/_/sum cu gsum dbang brgya byin mnga'/_/'jigs pa rnams kyi skyabs mdzad cing /_/sdug bsngal rnams kyi rtag tu rten/_/lha dang lha min mir bcas 
[\[237b.4\]]pa'i/_/'jig rten de yang 'dzin mdzad pa/_/de ni rgyal po brgya byin lags/_/dri ma dang ni skyon rnams bsal/_/bdag nyid sdig pa gsum bsal cing /_/dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su gshegs/_/las 'bras gsum gyi de nyid mkhyen/_/byang chub 
[\[237b.5\]]gsum ni rab tu rtogs/_/bag med gnas su skyes gyur kyang /_/bag med rnams la chags mi mnga'/_/dgra las rgyal zhing mdzad pa tshol/_/brgya byin skye dgu 'dzin par mdzad/_/de ltar lha gang yin pa de rnams kyi nang na blo gros mchog dang ldan pa brgya byin de la ris 
[\[237b.6\]]'thun pa'i lha de rnams kyis mngon par stod par byed do/_/de nas brgya byin gyis lha de rnams mthong nas tshig 'jam po bzang pos stod par byed cing ston par byed de/_'di ltar lha khyed rnams ni bag med pa la gnas pa yin no/_/legs pa thams cad kyi nang na ni bag yod 
[\[237b.7\]]pa ni gter yin la/_bag med pa ni don med pa yin no/_/de nas lha de rnams kyis yun ring mo zhig tu brgya byin la mngon par bstod nas gang nas 'ongs pa de nyid nas nam mkha' la 'gro bar byed de/_sngar ji ltar 'ongs pa bzhin brgya byin snga la lha de rnams phyi nas 
[\[238a\]]
[\[238a.1\]]dong ngo /_/de nas brgya byin 'di snyam sems te/_kye ma bag med pa la gnas pa'i lha rnams ni 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal khong du ma chud de/_'di rnams skyo ba bskyed par bya ba'i phyir/_bdag gi gor ma chag par sprul pa zhig bya'o snyam mo/_/de nas brgya 
[\[238a.2\]]byin gyi rdzu 'phrul gyis srid pa bar ma pa'i sprul pa byas pa gang yin pa de dag lha de rnams la bstan te/_tshal dang nye ba'i tshal dang ri'i zom dang pad ma'i tshal rnams su yo byad mkho ba nye bar bsten pa gang yin pa de dag gis lhan cig rtses glu blangs dga' bar byas shing dga' 
[\[238a.3\]]dgur spyad pa dang byad gzugs che zhing 'od lhag par bzang ba de dag 'chi zhing dbang phyug dang lha mo'i 'khor rnams kyis ni btang /_dbang thang thams cad dang skal ba bzang po thams cad ni zad/_bzhin ni mog mog por gyur/_sems can dmyal bar skye bar 'gyur 
[\[238a.4\]]ba gang dag lig ris ni lag pa rgyab tu bcings/_rtag tu ngus pa'i mig dang bzhin mchi mas ni gsher/_du ba 'thul ba'i mun pa dang mes ni yongs su bskor/_gshin rje'i mi rnams kyis spyo brgyad cing /_shin tu bkres pa dang skom pas gdungs pa'i bzhin 
[\[238a.5\]]'jigs pa nyam nga ba chen por ni bdas/_lus tshal shing bsregs pa lta bu dag_/mi shin tu 'jigs 'jigs ltar 'dug pa rnams kyis ded par byed pa na/_mi sdug par sgyur ba cha byad sna tshogs ni thogs/_lus dang gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs su 'dug 
[\[238a.6\]]pa'i lag pa dag na ral gri dang dbyug pa dang zhags pa ni thogs/_gzhan dag ni lha'i 'jig rten der 'gro bar byed la/_gzhan dag ni 'babs par byed pa de rnams kyis ri rab de la kun nas khyab par lhags nas/_de rnams kun nas 'ong bar byed cing 'jug par byed do/_/
[\[238a.7\]]zhugs pa gang yin pa de dag gis lha rnams bzung nas/_zhags pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bcings te thur du khrid par byed la/_rgya lcag rnams kyis kyang rdob par byed spyo bar byed/_me'i phreng ba 'bar ba 'khrigs pa'i tshogs kyis gdung bar byed pa de bzhin du sems can 
[\[238b\]]
[\[238b.1\]]dmyal ba ga la ba der 'dren par byed do/_/gshin rje'i mi lag na zhags pa thogs shing /_khro ba de dag phan tshun du 'di ltar gshin rje'i pho nya rnams rings par shog rings par shog_/bag med cing bag med par gnas pa'i lha 'di dag ji ltar yang yang bag med par mi 
[\[238b.2\]]'gyur ba'am bag med par mi gnas pa de ltar sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi nang du bdag cag gis gdul bar bya'o zhes smra ste/_de ltar ha ha zhes sgra 'don cing /_ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi nam mkha' las 'bab par byed do/_/de nas steng dang 'og dang ngos kyi gnas de 
[\[238b.3\]]dag thams cad brgya'am stong ngam khri'am bye bar 'joms shing kun gyis nam mkha' de bar mtshams med par khyab par 'khod nas/_'phel ba dang 'grib par byed cing 'di ltar khyed rnams kyis 'dod pa myong ba dang yan lag lnga dang ldan pa gang yin pa de dag gshin 
[\[238b.4\]]rje'i mi'i zhags pa rnams kyis bcings nas/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten du rta'i shugs bzhin du khrid pa na/_khyed la phan pa ci byed ces kun nas spyo bar byed do/_/de ltar sems can dmyal bar skye ba gang yin pa de dag de bzhin du ris 'thun pa'i lha legs par byas pa'i 
[\[238b.5\]]sems dang ldan pa de rnams kyis mthong ngo /_/de nas srid pa bar ma pa'i lha gang yin pa de dag la 'di ltar gshin rje'i mi rnams kyis tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_'dod pa rnams la chags pa'i blos/_/khyed kyis legs byas ma spyad pa/_/gang yin bde dang bral 
[\[238b.6\]]ba de'i/_/'bras bu 'di ni nye bar gnas/_/bag med pa la dga' ba'i lha/_/bya ba rnams la 'jug byed gang /_/de ni phyi nas 'chi ba'i tshe/_/rang gi sems kyis gdung bar byed/_/ji ltar dbang po lnga dag las/_/byung ba'i bag med sreg byed pa/_/de ltar me 
[\[238b.7\]]yis sreg mi byed/_/mtshon chas kyang ni gcod mi byed/_/ji ltar bde gzhi sdug bsngal la/_/de ltar bshes gzhi dgrar 'gyur ba/_/bag med bsten las 'byung 'gyur te/_/de bas de ni yongs su spongs/_/bag med sred dang 'dres pa dang /_/'dod chags de 
[\[239a\]]
[\[239a.1\]]yi rjes 'brel pa/_/dgra gsum 'di ni mi bzad de/_/mi yi bde ba 'jig par byed/_/rgod pa dang ni sdig par 'dre/_/le lo de bzhin brkam chags nyid/_/tshul khrims dag kyang spong byed pa/_/de dag sems can dmyal ba'i rgyu/_/tshul 
[\[239a.2\]]khrims gang zhig bde la bsil/_/yongs su gyur pa'ang bsil ba la/_/rtag tu rmongs pa mi sten na/_/de ni phyis nas yongs su gdung /_/chang 'thung de bzhin 'tshe ba dang /_/gzhan gyi bud med mngon par dga'/_/chags shing blo gros 'thab pa nyid/_/de ni 
[\[239a.3\]]sems can dmyal ba'i rgyu/_/phra ma sdig dang 'dre ba dang /_/yang dag sdom med log par lta/_/sems la cal col mang ba nyid/_/mi ni rtag tu 'jigs par byed/_/brnab sems tshig rtsub bcas pa dang /_/mngon pa'i nga rgyal log par smra/_/de ni 'jig 
[\[239a.4\]]rten 'dir mi phan/_/pha rol tu yang phan mi 'gyur/_/dge ba rnams kyis rtag tu spong /_/mi dge rnams kyis sten byed pa/_/las 'di la ni ma dad na/_/don med rnams kyi gzhi 'di yin/_/sems can rnams kyi bde sdug gang /_/las kyi 'bras bu ma rig 
[\[239a.5\]]la/_/rgyu 'bras la ni rmongs pa de/_/phyi nas gdung bas gdungs par 'gyur/_/gang zhig log par smra la brtson/_/rtag tu mkhas ltar nga rgyal can/_/phyi nas nyon mongs byung ba'i tshe/_/de yis las kyi 'bras bu rtogs/_/gang zhig 'jig rten 'dir 'khyam 
[\[239a.6\]]zhing /_/gang zhig sdug bsngal des bying ba/_/ma rig pa yis de bskyed ces/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams gsung ngo /_/de ltar brgya byin gyis sprul pa'i gshin rje'i mi de rnams srid pa bar ma de dag la gtam rjod cing spyo bar byed do/_/de nas yang brgya byin de lha 
[\[239a.7\]]de rnams la gang dud 'gro rnams kyi nang du skye ba'i sprul pa ston par byed do/_/de rnams kyi srid pa bar ma par de dag dang tshul 'thun pa gzugs brnyan du gyur pa/_de dang 'thun pa rgya'i 'bur ltar gyur pa/_srid pa bar ma pa'i gzugs rnam pa du ma dag byung ste/_de dag gcig 
[\[239b\]]
[\[239b.1\]]la gcig za ba dang gsod pa dang ngo bo yod pa dang ngo bo med par byed pa dang 'jigs pa chen po skyed pa na/_der lha yid rmongs pa gang yin pa de dag gis mthong ngo /_/de nas yang brgya byin de lha de rnams la gang [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams kyi nang du skye ba'i sprul pa ston par byed de 'di lta ste/_
[\[239b.2\]]lus bkres pa dang skom pas gdungs pa/_bzhin rtag tu skras mun par khebs pa/_bzhin shin tu 'jigs 'jigs ltar 'dug pa/_lus tshal shing bsregs pa ltar 'dug pa/_bya rog dang 'ug pa rnams kyis mig dang rna ba dang sna dang lce btogs pa dag lha'i 'jig 
[\[239b.3\]]rten de nas 'og gi nam mkha' de la ltung bar mthong ngo /_/de ltar lha de rnams kyis sprul pa shin tu 'jigs 'jigs ltar 'dug pa/_rab tu dngangs par byed pa de dag mthong ba dang /_de rnams kyis brgya byin de la bltas nas smras pa/_brgya byin sngon ma mthong 
[\[239b.4\]]ba'i lha ma yin nam/_de dang tshul 'thun pa gzhan rnams kyis lha 'di dag la lig ris phyin ci log tu bcings nas khrid na ci ste btang snyoms su bzhugs/_ri rab ma lus par khyab pa lha ma yin gyi gzugs 'di dag ni/_sngon chad lha dang lha ma yin thams cad g.yul 
[\[239b.5\]]'gyed pa na bdag cag gis ma mthong ste/_gnas 'dir ni sngon chad lha ma yin kun lan 'ga' yang ma mchis pa lags na/_brgya byin ci chos nyams lags sam/_'di ltar 'jig rten skyong ba dag sum cu rtsa gsum gyi dbang phyug khyod dang bdag cag la dus dus su sgrol 
[\[239b.6\]]ba lags na/_'jig rten na phar 'dzin pa dang mar 'dzin pa dang dge sbyong du 'dzin pa dang bram zer 'dzin pa dang rigs kyi rgan rabs la ri mor bgyid pa dag ma mchis sam/_brgya byin 'jig rten na sangs rgyas mchod pa ma mchis sam/_chos mchod pa ma mchis 
[\[239b.7\]]sam/_dge 'dun mchod pa ma mchis sam/_rgyu dang 'bras bu'i de kho na nyid 'tshal ba ma mchis sam/_ci na lha 'di rnams shin tu 'jigs par bgyid/_sum cu rtsa gsum gyi dbang phyug glang po che'i rgyal po sa srung gi bu la bcibs la g.yul bsham du gsol/_
[\[240a\]]
[\[240a.1\]]lha mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs pa rnams go bskon du gsol/_rnga bo che brdung du gsol/_khyod dang bdag cag g.yul du cha bar bgyi'o zhes ris 'thun pa'i lha kha cig brgya byin la de skad smra la/_gzhan kha cig ni ngo mtshar che ba 'di dag mthong nas 
[\[240a.2\]]yid shin tu mi dga' la/_rab tu 'jigs pa'i mig dang bzhin mog mog por gyur nas brgya byin nyid la skyabs su song ste/_lha'i dbang po bdag cag gi gnas 'dir sngon ma mthong ba'i lha ma yin rnams mchis kyis bdag cag bskyab tu gsol/_bdag cag bskyab tu 
[\[240a.3\]]gsol zhes smra'o/_/de ltar 'jigs pas dkrugs pa gzhan dag brgya byin gyi drung du dong nas smras so/_/lha gzhan dag phyis dge bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de dag gis sprul pa de mthong nas/_de nas yang snying 'jigs pa rnams lha'i 'dun sa chos bzang ga la ba 
[\[240a.4\]]der brgyugs so/_/yang mtshon cha don du gnyer ba gzhan dag gis ni tshal dang nye ba'i tshal rnams su brgyugs so/_/der mtshon cha don du gnyer ba gang yin pa de dag gis sprul pa de mthong yang brgal ba'am/_gzung bar mi nus te mthong ba kho nar zad de dper na me long 
[\[240a.5\]]gi nang na gzugs brnyan mthong yang gzung ba'am/_brgal bar mi nus pa bzhin no/_/brgya byin des sprul pa gzhan byas pa ni ji ltar lha ma yin gyi gtso bo sgra gcan dang brtan pa la sogs pa de ltar 'dren par byas te/_gtso bo thams cad lig ris lag pa phyin ci log tu 
[\[240a.6\]]bcings nas rgya lcag rnams kyis 'ju bar byed/_mtshon cha rnams kyis gsheg par byed cing spyo bar byed do/_/lig ris lag pa phyin ci log tu bcings pa de dag snying rje rje skad du/_ngu skad 'byin cing smre sngags 'don te/_lha ma yin rnams la yang lha rnams kyis sdug bsngal 
[\[240a.7\]]sprul pa de'i nang na snang ba gang yin pa de dag stong 'gyur du snang ngo /_/de dag gis kyang sprul pa gang yin pa de mthong ba dang /_yang dang yang shin tu 'jigs skrag cing ngo mtshar dang 'dres pa rnams/_de nas yang lha'i rgyal po brgya byin de ga la ba der dong nas/_de dag gis 
[\[240b\]]
[\[240b.1\]]yang brgya byin la smras pa/_brgya byin shin tu dpung che ba 'di dag su lags/_shin tu spro ba che ba 'di dag su lags/_'di ltar lha dang lha ma yin gtso bo gang lags pa de dag lig ris lag pa phyin ci log tu bcings nas khrid par bgyid la/_rdeg par bgyid/_gsod 
[\[240b.2\]]par bgyid/_spyo bar bgyid pa dang shin tu spu zing zhes bgyid pa ngo mtshar che ba 'di dag ci lags/_brgya byin bdag cag dang nye ba na mchis pa 'di dag su lags mkhyen tam/_lha dang lha ma yin gzhig par bgyi ba'i slad du lhags pa 'jig rten thams cad gzhom par bgyi ba 
[\[240b.3\]]la brtson pa/_'di dag bdag cag yong ye glo bar ma chud na su lags/_gal te mkhyen na 'di dag bdag cag la bka' stsal du gsol/_ji ste mi mkhyen na de dag la lan ci bgyi ba dgongs su gsol//_//'phags pa dam pa'i chos dran pa nye bar gzhag 
[\[240b.4\]]pa/_bam po bzhi bcu gcig pa/_de nas brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/_bag med pa la gnas pa'i lha 'di dag ni de kho na nyid khong du ma chud la chos la skyabs su 'gro ba la yang brtson pa ma yin no/_/de rnams kyi dregs pa bsal bar bya ba'i phyir ngas sprul pa 
[\[240b.5\]]'di dag byas par zad de/_da 'di rnams yid byung ba dang sems las su rung bar 'gyur la/_sems shin tu las su rung ba'i lha gang yin pa de rnams la da bdag gis bshad par bya'o snyam mo/_/de nas sems las su rung bar rig nas brgya byin des smras pa/_'di ltar nyon 
[\[240b.6\]]cig_/shin tu dpung che ba gzugs shin tu bzod par dka' ba kun nas gzhan 'joms par byed pa gang yin pa 'di dag ni/_lha 'di dag thams cad kyi dpung rnams kyis phyir gzhil ba'am/_sngags rnams kyis kyang phyir bzlog par mi nus so/_/khyed pas khyad par du 
[\[240b.7\]]'phags pa gzhan gang yin pa de dag gis kyang 'di dag la mi bzod na/_gang byad gzugs dang mdog dang dbang phyug dman pa khyed lta smos kyang ci dgos/_gshin rje'i pho nya 'di dag ni pho nya nag po zhes bya ste/_gang 'chi ba'i dus la nye bar gnas pa las dang nyon mongs pas 
[\[241a\]]
[\[241a.1\]]nye bar sbrel ba'i srog chags rnams bcings nas/_sems can dmyal ba dang [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang dud 'gro rnams kyi nang du khrid par byed do/_/'di ni 'khor ba thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi chos nyid du gnas pa yin no/_/'khor 
[\[241a.2\]]bar gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi chos brgyad yod de brgyad gang zhe na/_skyes nas 'chi ba ni gnas dang po yin no/_/nad med pa na ba ni gnas gnyis pa yin no/_/lang tsho rga ba ni gnas gsum pa yin no/_/ldan pa las mi ldan pa ni gnas bzhi pa yin no/_/'jig rten 
[\[241a.3\]]'di ni las bdag gir bya ba las kyi bgo skal la spyod pa las la rton pa yin te/_ji lta ji ltar dge ba'am/_sdig pa byed pa de lta de ltar las dag la spyod par 'gyur ba ni gnas lnga pa yin no/_/dga' ba dang yid du 'ong ba 'di dag thams cad las dngos po tha dad pa dang dngos po 
[\[241a.4\]]med pa dang dmas pa dang mi ldan pa dang bral ba 'di ni gnas drug pa yin no/_/'jig rten na mi slu ba ni gzhan gyis bsod nams sam sdig pa byas pa gzhan la 'gro bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba 'di ni gnas med la chos nyid 'di ni 'gro ba la mi slu ba yin te/_'di ni gnas bdun 
[\[241a.5\]]pa yin no/_/'gro ba bag med pa dag res 'ga' dge bar 'gyur ro zhes zer ba 'di ni gnas med de/_gnas brgyad po gang rnams kyis 'khor ba 'dir 'jug pa'i gnas ni brgyad po 'di dag yin no/_/'di ltar chos 'di rnams ni ngo bo nyid du gnas pa yin te/_rgyu rkyen las 
[\[241a.6\]]byung ba 'di dag ni mgyogs pas bzlog pa'am dpung gis phyir bzlog par mi nus so/_/de bzhin du gshin rje'i mi 'di dag dpung ngam mgyogs pas bzlog par mi nus la gzung bar yang mi nus te/_'di ni 'khor ba thams cad kyi chos nyid yin no/_/gang dag sdig pa byed pa 
[\[241a.7\]]de dag la 'di dag gis gshin rje'i 'jig rten du chad pas gcod par byed de/_lha dang lha ma yin dang sems can dmyal ba dang gnod sbyin dang srin po dang sha za dang klu la sogs pa sems can dmyal ba dang [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang dud 'gro'i nang du skyes pa'i sems can rnams la 'di 
[\[241b\]]
[\[241b.1\]]dag rnam pa du mar chad pas gcod par byed do/_/de nas lha rnams kyis brgya byin la 'di skad smras so/_/brgya byin 'di ltar thabs kun gyis bdag cag 'di dag gi dbang du mchi bar mi 'gyur ba'i thabs bsgrub pa de mkhyen lags sam/_de nas brgya byin gyis 
[\[241b.2\]]de'i tshe lha de rnams la 'di skad smras so/_/thabs yod de thabs gang gis lha rnams la 'di dag gis cung zad kyang byar mi nus so/_/lha rnams kyi thabs de yang gang zhe na 'di lta ste/_chos gcig cig spang bar bya ste/_'di lta ste bag med pa'o/_/chos gnyis shig 
[\[241b.3\]]bsgom par bya ste/_zhi gnas dang lhag mthong ngo /_/skyon gsum zhig spang bar bya ste 'di lta ste/_'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug rnams so/_/'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi shes par bya ste/_sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung dang lam dang 'gog pa ni sdug bsngal 'gog pa'o/_/
