[\[261a.3\]]'byed pa 'di ni phra ba ste/_phyi rol pa'i shes pa 'jig rten pa'i lta ba dang yang dag par ldan pa gang yang rung ba dag gis de dag shes par mi nus so/_/las mi dge bas [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams kyi nang du skyes pa mi dge ba de zad par 'gyur la/_nyes par byas pa'i las kyi mtha' 
[\[261a.4\]]spyad pa de zad nas 'gro ba gzhan du spyad pa legs par byas pa/_lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba/_pha ma lta bur shin tu yid du 'ong ba/_so so yang dag par myong bar 'gyur bas gang gi tshe lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ba de'i tshe/_mtshan ma 'di ci dag 
[\[261a.5\]]cig 'byung srid pa tha ma'i sems la mtshan ma ji lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur zhe na/_gtso bo dag de la gang gi tshe [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]'chi zhing mtho ris su skye bar 'gyur ba de'i tshe/_de'i lus bkres pa dang skom pas gdungs pa sems rtag tu phrag dog dang ser snas nyams pa/_
[\[261a.6\]]rtag tu kha zas la brkam par gyur pa/_rtag tu btung ba la chags pa gang yin pa de bza' ba dang btung ba la ma gtogs par gzhan du rgyug pa de nyung bar 'gyur/_de'i lus bsil bar 'gyur zhing lhag par sra bar mi 'gyur la/_de'i spu yang ring zhing sdug par 
[\[261a.7\]]mi 'gyur/_srin bus gang ba de dag thams cad zhigs par 'gyur/_de'i bzhin gyi mdog kyang gsal bar 'gyur/_de la rlung bsil zhing bde ba rnams reg par 'gyur ro/_/de'i 'og tu srid pa tha ma pa'i mtshan ma dang nye bar gyur cing /_bkres pa dang skom pa shin tu 
[\[261b\]]
[\[261b.1\]]chung bar gyur pa dang 'phral la dbang po rnams tshim par 'gyur la/_bya rog dang 'ug pa gang dag gis rtag tu mig rnams za bar byed pa de rnams mi snang bar gyur to/_/de'i 'og tu srid pa bar ma la zas dang skom gyi tshogs mthong ba dang de'i blo sngon goms pa'i 'phen pa 
[\[261b.2\]]skyes pas rgyug par byed kyang /_sems kyis mthong bar zad kyi/_za bar yang mi byed la 'thung bar yang mi byed de/_de ni mthong ba kho na tsam du zad do/_/ji ltar rmi lam na dngos po mthong ba la mkho ba med la/_'thungs kyang ngoms pa med pa de bzhin du des de mthong 
[\[261b.3\]]zhing des bltas kyang de tshim par mi 'gyur te/_mthong ba kho nas de snying dga' bar mthong ngo /_/ji ltar sad pa'i dus su gzugs bden pa rnams khong du chud pa de ltar mtho ris kyi ngo bo shin tu nyams dga' ba rnams mthong ba dang de nas yang yid du 'ong ba de rnams la de rgyug par 
[\[261b.4\]]byed do/_/de ltar len pa yang byed de da ni bdag gis yul 'di dag thob par bya'o snyam nas de dag len par byed do/_/nye bar blangs ma thag tu lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/'gro ba bar ma bcu gnyis pa ni de lta bu yin no/_/gtso bo dag gzhan yang gti mug zad nas 
[\[261b.5\]]ngo mtshar che ba'i 'gro ba bar ma bcu gsum pa ji lta bu yin zhe na/_gti mug kun du mang ba dud 'gro rnam pa du ma dag lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyis tshe rabs 'bum phrag bye ba du mar/_sems can dmyal ba dang [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang dud 'gro nyes par byas pa'i 
[\[261b.6\]]las dag nye bar spyad nas/_'di ltar yang bskal pa du mar las kyi 'khor ba mi bzad pa shin tu dpyad par dka' ba thog ma med pa'i dus nas ya yor 'dug pa phan par mi byed pas sems can rnams 'khyam par byed do/_/dud 'gro rnam pa du ma dag ni zas du ma dang 'gro ba du ma dang 
[\[261b.7\]]lus du ma dang gnas du ma dang sems kyi sa bon du ma dang las du ma byed pa gang yin pa de dag gi nyes par byas pa'i las zad pa ni yid ches par dka' ste/_ji ltar chu thigs par bcus pas rgya mtsho skams par 'gyur ba yid ches par dka' ba de ltar las kyi rgya mtsho'i thigs par bcus 
[\[262a\]]
[\[262a.1\]]pa yang ngo mtshar che ba yin no/_/de gang gi tshe dud 'gro dag las yongs su thar na/_de lha'i ris gnyis po rgyal chen bzhi pa'am/_sum cu rtsa gsum pa gang yang rung bar skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de dud 'gro'i nyam nga ba chen po las 'chi zhing thar bar 'gyur ba de'i tshe/_
[\[262a.2\]]bde ba chen po nye bar gnas pa'i mtshan ma rnam pa du ma dang dngos po du ma dang ldan pa'i mtshan ma la dmigs pa bshad par mi nus so/_/sems can dmyal ba pa mtho ris su skye bar 'gyur ba ni ngo mtshar mi che'i/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang dud 'gro dag mtho ris su skye ba ni ngo mtshar che'o/_/
[\[262a.3\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]pas dud 'gro gti mug mang ba'i phyir te/_gzhan la nyes pa mang po byed la/_de dag tshe gcig gis 'bum phrag du ma sbyor ba dang bskal pa'am bskal pa brgya'am bskal pa 'bum phrag tu sbyor bar byed pa/_las kyi lu gu rgyud kyis tshe gcig 
[\[262a.4\]]nas gcig tu brgyud pa de dag pas ni sems can dmyal bar skyes pa ches sla'i/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang dud 'gro rnams kyi nang du skyes pa ni mi rung ste/_rgyu des na sems can dmyal bar skyes pa ches rung gi dud 'gro ni mi rung ngo /_/de ltar de sdug bsngal shin tu mi bzad pa las gal te 
[\[262a.5\]]thar na/_de dag gis 'di dag phal cher mthong nas skye bar 'gyur te 'di lta ste/_'chi ba'i dus su gti mug srabs par 'gyur zhing shes pa chung ngu 'byung bar 'gyur ba ni/_'di ltar sngon byung ba pas de bas khyad par du 'byung ba'am rno bar 'byung ngo /_/de 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe/_
[\[262a.6\]]ri snang bar gyur pa mthong ba dang lcug ma 'phyang ba dang 'bab chus gang ba rnam pa sna tshogs dag mthong ngo /_/kha zas 'byung ba gang yin pa'i kha zas de yang ri de la mthong ngo /_/kun rdzob kyi shes pas de'i 'dod pa bde ba gang yin pa de dag tshal de na'am ri de la mthong ngo /_/de'i 
[\[262a.7\]]tshe de kha zas kyi don du'am der 'gro ba'am de la rten pa'i phyir rgyug par byed pa de yang rmi lam lta bur mthong ste/_de ji lta ji ltar rgyug pa de lta de ltar de'i skye ba'i srid pa nye bar 'gyur ro/_/de gang gi tshe skye ba nye bar gnas par 'gyur ba de'i tshe/_gzugs gu lu lu byed pa 
[\[262b\]]
[\[262b.1\]]dag mthong ngo /_/sngon tshe rabs 'bum du ma mthong ba gang yin pa de dag la 'di ci zhig 'di gang zhig yin snyam du de'i rnam par shes pa la ngo mtshar cher 'byung ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_ngo bo gzhan pa nyid kyis ma goms pa'i phyir ro/_/ngo mtshar du gyur pa de ni bdag 'dir 
[\[262b.2\]]'gro bar bya ba'am/_'gro bar mi bya snyam du de la dmigs par yang byed la/_'di dag thams cad bdag dbang bar bya'o snyam du yang sems te/_legs par byas pa'i las de dang rkyen des de ltar blo skyed do/_/sems bskyed ma thag nyid du lha'i 'jig rten der skye bar 'gyur 
[\[262b.3\]]te/_srid pa bar mar 'gro ba dang 'brel ba bcu gsum pa ni de lta bu yin no/_/gar mkhan rnams kyi nang na shin tu dka' ba shin tu rmad du byung ba shin tu rnam par rig par dka' ba 'di yin te 'di lta ste/_las kyi gar mkhan las gzhi sna tshogs kyi gar chen po sems kyi gar dag 
[\[262b.4\]]ltad mo'i gzhi'i 'khor ba na gar byed do/_/brgya byin des de skad smras pa dang lha rnams shin tu gus pa'i yid skyes nas 'di skad smra'o/_/'di ltar brgya byin bdag cag la/_/'jig rten 'di dang pha rol du/_/skye dgu rnams la phan mdzad pa/_/rgyal po pha dang ma dang mtshungs/_/
[\[262b.5\]]gang gis bag med rnam bral zhing /_/thams cad du ni 'byung mi 'gyur/_/mtha' las byung ba thar bar 'gro/_/bdag cag la ni chos ston mdzad/_/khyod kyi las dang 'bras bur bcas/_/mngon sum yang dag rab tu bstan/_/skye dang 'chi ba'i ngo bo dag_/brgya byin 'jig 
[\[262b.6\]]rten bka' mchid ston/_/khyod kyis de nyid rnam par bstan/_/bdag cag la ni legs par mdzad/_/bdag cag gang dag yid rmongs pa/_/ye shes mkhas pa nyid du mdzad/_/bud med 'dod chags yid zhen cing /_/rtag tu 'dod pa tshol rnams la/_/rgyu dang 'bras bu yang 
[\[262b.7\]]dag 'byung /_/de ni khyod kyis rab tu bstan/_/brgya byin long ba'i mig dang 'dra/_/nad pa rnams la sman pa ltar/_/khyod kyis chos lam bstan pa gang /_/bdag cag la ni sman par mdzad/_/ji lta ji ltar brgya byin khyod/_/phan pa'i chos ni ston mdzad pa/_/de lta de ltar 
[\[263a\]]
[\[263a.1\]]gshin rje'i mi/_/phan med mig can nyams par 'gyur/_/de ltar brgya byin des/_dud 'gro rnams kyi srid pa bar ma bshad nas/_yang srid pa bar mar 'gro ba dang 'brel ba bcu bzhi pa ston par byed do/_/'di ltar sems can dmyal ba pa dag res 'ga' 
[\[263a.2\]]legs par byas pa'i las kyi rkyen dang /_legs par byas pa'i las kyi rgyu lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba/_shin tu bsil ba shin tu phan par 'dod pa/_dma' ba dang mtho bar 'gyur ba'i rgyu gang gis gal te sdug bsngal dpe med pa las grol nas/_bde ba dpe med 
[\[263a.3\]]par ji ltar skye bar 'gyur/_de'i yang sos dang thig nag dang bsdus gzhom dang ngu 'bod dang ngu 'bod chen po dang tsha ba la sogs pa sems can dmyal ba chen po dang /_'di ltar sems can dmyal ba'i 'khor du gtogs pa'i rnam par smin pa shin tu tsha ba spu shin tu zing zhes byed pa me 'bar 
[\[263a.4\]]ba 'khrugs pa dang bcas pa dag nas/_sems can dmyal ba pa 'chi ba rnams dang 'chi ba de dag gi las zad nas 'chi ba rnams kyi mtshan ma ji ltar 'byung bar 'gyur/_srid pa bar ma nas srid pa bar mar ji ltar skye ba dang 'chi bar 'gyur/_ji ltar na las kyi rkyen gyi dbang gis 
[\[263a.5\]]shin tu sdug bsngal dang ldan pa'am shin tu bde ba dang ldan par 'gyur zhe na/_gtso bo dag sems can dmyal ba pa ngan song zad pa de'i 'chi ba ni/_de gang gi tshe rdza ma'i nang du bcug ste 'chi bar byed do/_/de bcug pa tsam nyid kyis dbu ba bzhin du so sor zhu bar byed kyang lus 
[\[263a.6\]]gzhan du skye bar mi 'gyur ro/_/gal te de lan cig kho nar tho bas gsod cing 'chi ba'i dus byed kyang lus gzhan du skye bar mi 'gyur ro/_/gal te lung ba'i nang du 'jug par byed la/_de bcug pa tsam nyid kyis srog 'jig par byed kyang lus gzhan du skye bar mi 'gyur ro/_/gal te 
[\[263a.7\]]ba tshwa'i chu bo'i nang du 'jug par byed la/_de lan cig kho nar rab tu zhu bar byed kyang de'i lus gzhan du skye bar mi 'gyur ro/_/gal te phur bu rnams kyis btab la de phur bu rnams kyis btab ste/_nyams pa nyid kyis 'chi bar 'gyur yang /_de'i lus yang skye bar mi 'gyur ro/_/
[\[263b\]]
[\[263b.1\]]gal te bya rgod dam khwa rnams kyis bzung nas za bar byed kyang de yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/gal te seng ge dang stag dang dred dang gung dang gzig rnams kyis 'dzin par byed la/_bzung nas kyang gal te za bar byed na de yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/_de ltar sems can dmyal ba pa 
[\[263b.2\]]de las rnam par zad nas 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/de 'chi ba'i dus la bab pa'i tshe/_gshin rje'i mi gnod par byed pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/sems can du bgrang ba ma yin pa de dag ji ltar mar dang snying po zad na mar me med par 'gyur ba de bzhin du las zad 
[\[263b.3\]]na/_sems can dmyal ba la gnod pa byed pa gshin rje'i mi rnams 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/ji ltar 'dzam bu gling du nyi ma nub na de'i tshe mun pa yang 'byung ba de ltar las byas pa zad na/_bzhin gyi mdog dang mig mi sdug par bsgyur ba gzugs de dag thams cad kyang mi snang bar 'gyur 
[\[263b.4\]]ro/_/ji ltar gang gi tshe rtsig pa zhig na de'i tshe ri mo yang 'jig par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/_gang gi tshe las kyi rtsig pa zhig na/_de'i tshe sems can du bgrang ba ma yin pa gshin rje'i mi gzugs mi sdug par bsgyur ba de dag kyang 'jig par 'gyur ro/_/de dag ni bcom ldan 'das 
[\[263b.5\]]kyis gsungs pa yin te/_de ltar sems can dmyal ba de dag sems can dmyal ba zad nas thar bar 'gyur ro//_//'phags pa dam pa'i chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa/_bam po bzhi bcu gsum pa/_de nas brgya byin gyis de'i tshe lha de rnams la 'di ltar 
[\[263b.6\]]tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_ji ltar mi dag srog gcod pa/_/dgra rnams las ni thar ba rnams/_/bde ba 'dod pa thabs kun gyis/_/mdza' bshes mang po mngon du 'phrad/_/de ltar dmyal ba stobs po che/_/las 'di dag las nges grol ba/_/lha yul zhi bar 'gro 
[\[263b.7\]]ba yi/_/las rnams legs par byas pas thob/_/de ni yon tan du mas brgyan/_/lha yi gnas su khrid byed la/_/ji ltar legs par byas pa'i las/_/de ma zad par dga' bar byed/_/de ni de nas zad dang phyir/_/dbang med mi dag ltung bar 'gyur/_/mar me'i snying 
[\[264a\]]
[\[264a.1\]]po zad pa gang /_/mar me 'chi bar 'gyur ba ltar/_/las kyi rlung las yang dag byung /_/de ni dma' dang mthon por mthong /_/rlung zhugs dbang gis 'khrul pa yi/_/'jig rten 'di ni yongs su 'khor/_/shes pa'i dbang du gyur pa gang /_/de ni 'khor 
[\[264a.2\]]bar mi 'jug go/_/ji ltar pad ma'i rtsa rgyud kyis/_/ri mchog ri rab mi 'gul ltar/_/de ni las kyi zhags pa yis/_/nam yang 'dren par mi 'gyur ro/_/de ltar de ni mgon bral zhing /_/mya ngan bral la nyon mongs bral/_/ri rab kyi ni rtse mo ltar/_/brtan po dag tu 
[\[264a.3\]]'khor mi 'gyur/_/de ltar brgya byin des lha de rnams la tshigs su bcad pa smras nas/_sems can dmyal ba pa sems can dmyal ba las thar ba de'i srid pa bar ma'i mtshan ma sngon chad ma mthong ba rnams la brtags na/_nam mkha' la rlung shin tu bsil ba lus la reg par 
[\[264a.4\]]byed de reg na shin tu bde ba shin tu dri zhim pa/_brten na shin tu bde ba sgra snyan pa thos te 'di lta ste/_pi bang gi sgra'am de las gzhan pa'i rgyud las byung ba'i sgra de ltar rlung dag gi sgra thos so/_/dri yang shin tu yid du 'ong ba la snom mo/_/gzugs kyang shin tu yid du 'ong ba 
[\[264a.5\]]dag mthong ste/_'di lta ste/_tshal dang nye ba'i tshal dang lteng ka dang 'bab chu'i dngo dang pad ma'i tshal shin tu dri zhim zhing rgya che ba dag mthong ngo /_/rna bas kyang glu dbyangs kyi sgra shin tu yid du 'ong ba dag thos so/_/bdag nyid kyi byad gzugs shin tu che la rab tu gzi brjid dang 
[\[264a.6\]]ldan pa/_lhag par dri zhim pa phreng bas brgyan pa mthong ngo /_/kun tu thogs pa med cing nam mkha' shin tu dri ma med pa thams cad la/_gza' dang skar ma dang rgyu skar gsal ba rnams kyis khyab par mthong ngo /_/mtsho dag na yang bya ngang pa dang kA raN+Da bar 'dres pa'i sgra dag thos so/_/
[\[264a.7\]]de nas yang srid pa bar mar zhugs te/_srid pa 'byung ba'i pi bang dang gling bu dang rnga dang glu dbyangs kyi sgra dag thos pa dang lo bye ba phrag du mar ma myong ba'i de'i yid la rab tu dga' bar 'gyur ba/_thams cad du mtshan ma bzang po rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /_mdza' bshes 
[\[264b\]]
[\[264b.1\]]dang /_gnyen 'dab dang /_rtsa lag dag dang phrad pa lta bur bdag nyid sems la nyin gcig bzhin snying rab tu dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/ji lta ji ltar srid par skye bar 'gyur ba de 'di'am gzhan rgyal chen bzhi'i lha'i rigs su skyes pa dang tshal dang nye ba'i tshal shin tu nyams dga' ba 
[\[264b.2\]]dang dri shin tu zhim pa dang tshal dang rin po che sna bdun gyi tshal dang bud med kyang ngo bo nyid kyis yid du 'ong ba gang yin pa dag mthong ngo /_/de 'di snyam du sems te/_da ni bdag 'dir skye bar bya'am thob par bya'o snyam mo/_/des sems bskyed ma thag nyid du skye bar 'gyur la srid 
[\[264b.3\]]pa'i yan lag gi rim pa ni 'di lta ste/_nye bar len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa 'byung ngo /_/de ltar srog chags dag sems can dmyal ba las thar cing ngan pa byas pa las yongs su thar nas bde ba dpe med pa thob par 'gyur te/_srid pa bar ma'i 'gro ba bcu bzhi pa ni de lta bu 
[\[264b.4\]]yin no/_/srid pa bar mar 'gro ba dang 'brel pa bco lnga pa ji ltar shes par bya/_/gang gi tshe mi dag las shi nas gal te mi rnams kyi nang du skye ba de'i tshe mtshan ma ci dag 'byung /_mngon par 'dod pa de ji lta bu yin zhe na/_'di la gang gi tshe 'chi ba'i dus su mi dag nyid las 
[\[264b.5\]]shi nas gal te mi rnams kyi nang du skye na/_de'i mtshan ma 'di lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/_ji ltar ri brtsegs pa chen po'i grib ma rdo thal gyis bskus pa'i thang la 'bab pa de ltar grib ma lta bu zhig bab pa dang 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gi steng du thams cad 'bab bo snyam 
[\[264b.6\]]nas/_de lag pa gnyi gas ri 'bab pa phyir 'phul bar byed la/_'bab pa na lag pa gnyi gas 'dzin par byed cing lag pa g.yob par byed pa dang de'i gnyen 'dun dag na re 'di ltar nam mkha' la reg par byed do zhes brjod do/_/de'i 'og tu snam bu dkar po zhig mthong nas/_de'i 
[\[264b.7\]]steng na yang snam bu dmar po zhig yod par mthong ngo /_/de'i 'og tu srid pa tha ma pa'i sems la ji ltar snang ba mthong ba de'i mi gsal ba de dag las rmongs par 'gyur te/_ji ltar rmi lam na gzugs dag la blo rmongs pa ji ltar de rmongs par 'gyur ro/_/de pha ma gnyis 'khrig pa'i 
[\[265a\]]
[\[265a.1\]]chos dang ldan par gyur pa na/_gal te skyes par 'gyur na ni de log par mthong bar 'gyur te/_ma la ni chung ma'i 'du shes skye'o/_/pha la ni dgra'i 'du shes skye'o/_/de 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag 'di'i drung du 'gro'o snyam nas/_de ma de la 'khrig pa'i phyir phrad 
[\[265a.2\]]par byed do/_/ji ste bud med du 'gyur na ni de 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gi khyim thab 'di 'dis phrogs so snyam nas/_de la zhe sdang skyed par byed do/_/de ma de skyes pa de dang 'byed par 'dod cing bdag nyid de dang phrad par byed do/_/de'i tshe srid pa bar ma pa'i rnam par shes pa 
[\[265a.3\]]'gag cing skye ba'i srid pa'i rnam par shes pa 'byung ste/_de ma thag pa'i rkyen gyis rgya'i 'bur ltar rnam par shes pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/mi dag las shi nas mi rnams kyi nang du skye ba'i mtshan nyid ni de lta bu yin no/_/gzhan yang 'gro ba dang 'brel pa bcu drug pa ni 'di ltar lha dag nyid las 
[\[265a.4\]]'chi ba na/_gtso bo dag gang gi tshe lha las shi nas lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ba de'i tshe/_de la 'di ltar lha gzhan sems can dmyal ba dang [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_dud 'gro'i nang du skye ba rnams kyi sdug bsngal de dag 'byung bar mi 'gyur la/_chung mas 'dor ba'i sdug bsngal mi 'byung /_
[\[265a.5\]]rgyan 'phrog par mi byed/_lha'i bu gzhan stan de la 'dug par mi mthong ste/_sdug bsngal mi bzad pa de dag mthong bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de shi ba'i stan de la lha gzhan dag skye bar 'gyur la/_de'i 'gro ba lha'i nang du skye ba ches bzang bar 'gyur ro/_/'di ltar gal te rgyal chen bzhi pa 
[\[265a.6\]]dag las shi nas sum cu rtsa gsum du skye bar 'gyur ba de'i mtshan ma shin tu nyams dga' ba bzang po dag mthong bar 'gyur te/_'di ltar des sngon gar yang ma thos pa'i rnam pa gang yin pa'i rnam pa de lta bu'i glu dbyangs thos la/_de bzhin du yul lnga'i mtshan ma bzang po mthong ngo /_/
[\[265a.7\]]de'i 'og tu de'i srid pa tha ma pa'i sems 'byung ste/_des srid pa bar ma la bud med shin tu bzang mo lhag par blta na sdug pa/_byad gzugs rab tu bzang ba rnams kyi lag na rol mo rnam pa sna tshogs thogs pa mthong ngo /_/'bab chu dang skyed mos tshal yon tan sna tshogs dang ldan zhing 
[\[265b\]]
[\[265b.1\]]de ltar yid du 'ong ba sngon gar yang ma mthong ba srid pa bar ma'i gang yin pa de dag des rmi lam lta bur mthong ngo /_/de gang gi tshe skye ba'i srid pa dang nye zhing phrad par 'gyur ba de'i tshe sad pa'i dus ltar 'dod pa/_shin tu nyams dga' ba/_'dod pa'i yon tan lnga 'byor ba des sngon nams 
[\[265b.2\]]kyang ma mthong ba de rnams gsal bar mthong ngo /_/de nas 'di snyam du sems te/_kye e ma ngo mtshar che ba rnam pa 'di lta bu sngon bdag gis gar yang ma mthong ste/_da ni bdag 'dir 'jug par bya'o snyam sems so/_/des sems bskyed ma thag nyid du der skye bar 'gyur te/_srid pa 
[\[265b.3\]]bar mar 'gro ba dang 'brel pa bcu drug pa ni de lta bu yin no/_/gtso bo dag gzhan yang srid pa bar mar 'gro ba dang 'brel ba bcu bdun pa ji ltar 'byung zhe na/_de ltar lha'i ris gzhan gang dang gang dag nas ches dma' bar skye bar 'gyur ba de ni lteng ka dang chu dngo dang 'bab chu chung ba dag mthong ba 
[\[265b.4\]]dang /_ji ltar de la 'dod pa de ltar bkres pas mngon par nyams par 'gyur zhing de der skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de ltar lha rnams kyi srid pa'i yan lag la rnam pa gnyis sam/_rnam pa gcig tu 'gro ba lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang srid pa bar mar 'gro ba dang 'brel ba 
[\[265b.5\]]ni gal te shar gyi lus 'phags po'i mi dag nub kyi ba lang spyod rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ba de'i 'chi ba'i dus gang zhig la mtshan ma rnam pa ji lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur/_gal te nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi mi shar gyi lus 'phags su skye bar 'gyur na/_de gnyis 'chi ba'i dus su mtshan ma rnam pa 
[\[265b.6\]]ji lta bu zhig 'byung bar 'gyur zhe na/_gtso bo dag phan tshun skye ba dag gi mtshan ma ni de bzhin du 'byung ste/_'di lta ste/_srid pa tha ma pa'i dus su phug gi sgo chen po rib rib por bsgribs pa zhig mthong la/_de nas ba dan skar mda' lta bur shin tu bzang ba/_la la ni dmar po/_la la ni dmar 
[\[265b.7\]]skya dag cig byung ba dang /_de lag pa gnyis kyis de la 'dzin par byed do/_/des ji lta ji ltar ba dan de la bzung ba de lta de ltar mi de yang phug gi nang du 'jug par byed la/_srid pa tha ma pa btang ste/_shi nas srid pa bar ma la gnas te/_ba dan de nyid la 'dzin par 'dod pa kun du 
[\[266a\]]
[\[266a.1\]]rgyug par byed do/_/de ji lta ji ltar rgyug pa de lta de ltar de'i skye ba'i srid pa'i nye bar gnas par 'gyur la/_des snga ma bzhin du khyu mchog pa dang lhan cig 'khod pa dang /_gseb dang rgod mar lhan cig 'khod par mthong ba dang /_de der kun du 'dod chags skyed par 
[\[266a.2\]]byed do/_/gtso bo dag 'gro ba dang 'brel pa bcu bdun pa ni de lta bur shes par bya'o/_/de ltar shes pas shin tu bag yod par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_bag med pa ni gang yang 'khor ba las 'grol ba med la/_'jig rten pa'i legs pa gang yang 'thob par mi 'gyur ro/_/bag 
[\[266a.3\]]med pa ni legs pa thams cad don med par byed pa nyid yin te/_de lta bas na legs pa thams cad don du gnyer ba'i lha'am mi shes rab dang ldan par gyur pas yongs su spang bar bya ba bag med pa de rab tu 'bad pas yongs su spongs shig_/gtso bo dag de ltar srid pa bar mar 'gro ba 
[\[266a.4\]]dang 'brel pa bcu bdun pa dag sred pa'i ngo bo nyid la rtog par 'dod cing de kho na tshol bar 'dod pa'i lha'am mis shes par bya/_dpyad par bya/_brtag par bya'o/_/gtso bo dag gzhan yang rim pa brgyad brtsis nas chos nyi shu'i bar du bstan pa gang yin pa de dag gi nang nas bcu bdun gyi bar 
[\[266a.5\]]ni bstan zin to/_/gtso bo dag da ni 'gro ba dang 'brel pa dag las gzhan pa'i khams [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad bstan pa khams de dag gi rim pa la bab pas rim pa de bstan par bya'o/_/de la khams zhes bstan pa gang yin pa de gang zhe na/_de la mos pa rnam pa du ma dag gi khams rnam pa du mar 
[\[266a.6\]]'gyur ro/_/skyon gsum gyis bsgribs pa'i sems can ni phung po gsum la gnas la/_gsum gyis so sor dbang bsgyur to/_/phra mo la mos pa'i sems can byed pa sna tshogs/_rang bzhin sna tshogs/_las sna tshogs 'gro ba sna tshogs bde ba dang sdug bsngal myong ba sna tshogs/_byad gzugs 
[\[266a.7\]]sna tshogs/_dbang sna tshogs pa de dag thams cad ni sems kyi rang bzhin sems kyi khams la rag las pa yin la/_srid pa'i ris su srid pa sna tshogs nyid 'byung ba yin te/_de ltar sems can rnams kyi sems kyi khams ni mtha' yas so/_/lha dang mi dang dud 'gro dang [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang sems can 
[\[266b\]]
[\[266b.1\]]dmyal ba rnams kyi 'gro ba rags rim gyis mdor bsdu na/_bgrang bar gtogs pa'i khams [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad ni sems kyi skyon la rag las pa yin te/_khams [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad du bsdu ba de dag thams cad ni mdor bsdus pa yin no/_/de la khams dang po ni 'dod chags kyi shas che ba'i khams yin no/_/
[\[266b.2\]]de la 'dod chags kyi shas che ba'i khams dag ni/_lha dang mi dang [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang dud 'gro rnams kyi bud med nga rgyal spyod pa kun yin la/_de dag gi zhe sdang de ni chung ba yin te/_'di ni khams dang po yin no/_dud 'gro spyi rnams kyi nang na rma bya dang /_mchil pa dang /_khu byug dang /_
[\[266b.3\]]phug ron dang /_bA na pi ka dang /_pu shud dang /_bung ba dang /_nya dang /_khyim bya dang /_ba lin da ka la sogs pa'i dud 'gror gtogs pa ni 'dod chags kyi khams shas che ba yin no/_/dud 'gror gtogs pa'i 'dod chags kyi khams 'bring po'i shas yod pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_
[\[266b.4\]]rta dang /_byi la dang /_skyugs pa za ba dang /_bong bu dang /_ma he dang /_phag dang /_glang po che dang /_rnga mo dang /_khyi dang /_da ra dang /_bya rog dang /_bya ne'u le dang /_'ug pa dang /_tshad pa bye'u dang /_ya ti ka la sogs pa dag ni 'dod chags 'bring por spyod pa yin te/_sems kyi khams 
[\[266b.5\]]gnyis pa yin no/_/de la dud 'gro de dag gi 'dod chags kyi khams chung ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_seng ge dang /_stag dang /_dred dang /_gung dang /_ra dang /_gla ba dang /_bya ka lan da ka dang /_wa dang /_sa ko'u shi dang /_sa li le dang /_mdzo dang /_chu srin dang /_chu srin d+hun d+hu gsod dang /_tsu 
[\[266b.6\]]lun da la sogs pa dus su 'khrig par byed pa de dag ni/_dus su 'khrig tu 'gro ba yin no/_/dus ma yin par 'dod chags spyod pa chung ba yin te/_de dag ni dud 'gro'i khams gsum pa yin no/_/de dag ma gtogs pa gzhan rnam pa du ma/_tshe du ma/_ming du ma gang yin pa de dag 
[\[266b.7\]]ni bshad par mi nus shing bgrang bar mi nus so/_/yang dud 'gro de dag gi nang nyid na zhe sdang che ba gang yin zhe na/_gang zhe sdang lhag par che ba nyid yin la 'dod chags che ba ma yin te/_'di ni khams bzhi pa yin no/_'di lta ste/_seng ge dang /_stag dang /_gung dang /_sbrul dang /_ne'u le dang /_srog 
[\[267a\]]
[\[267a.1\]]chags rlung 'gam dang /_kab tab bya dang /_srin gyi me da dang /_ka ko da ra da dang /_tsi lin da ka dang /_'ol ba dang /_pra ro hi na dang /_chu srin na kra dang /_chu srin byis pa gsod dang phag la sogs pa ni zhe sdang gi khams lhag par che ba yin no/_/khams lnga pa ni gang yin/_dud 'gro de 
[\[267a.2\]]dag nyid kyi nang na zhe sdang 'bring du spyod pa gang zhe na/_ba lang dang /_yu ba bin da ka dang /_ka pa ling ka dang /_sa lin d+ha ka dang /_kA Do da ra dang /_id t+ya ha ka dang /_rma bya dang /_khyim bya dang /_byi la dang /_byi ba la sogs pa ni zhe sdang 'bring du spyod pa yin no/_/de la khams lnga pa dud 'gro de 
[\[267a.3\]]dag nyid kyi nang na zhe sdang chung ngu spyod pa gang yin zhe na/_'di lta ste/_ngang pa dang /_chu skyar dang /_srog chags kad t+ya dang /_sha ba dang /_khu byug dang /_mchil pa dang /_bzhad dang /_bong bu dang /_rus sbal dang /_ri bong gsod dang /_srog chags sUk+sh+ma tsa ra dang /_u tsa tsa ka dang /_ra sha sha ka 
[\[267a.4\]]dang /_sbal pa la sogs pa ni zhe sdang chung ngu spyod pa yin no/_/de la khams drug pa gang zhe na/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams kyi nang na [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rdzu 'phrul chen po 'dod chags spyod pa gang yin pa de dag yin no/_/khams bdun pa ni dud 'gro'i nang du gtogs pa lha ma yin 'dod chags kyi khams 
[\[267a.5\]]lhag par che ba gang yin pa de dag yin no/_/khams brgyad pa ni 'dod chags 'bring du spyod pa dud pa za ba gang yin pa de dag yin no/_/khams dgu pa ni 'dod chags chung ngur spyod pa gtor ma za ba gang yin pa de dag yin no/_/khams bcu pa ni lha ril ba spyi blugs nas 'thung ba gang yin 
[\[267a.6\]]pa de dag ni lha gzhan dag pas 'dod chags spyod pa chung ba yin la/_zhe sdang che ba yin te/_g.yul 'gyed pa la brkam zhing rtag tu brtson pa/_lha ma yin gyi g.yul 'gyed par 'dod pa de dag ni 'dod chags lhag par chung ba yin no/_/khams bcu pa 'di ltar phreng thogs rnams ni 
[\[267a.7\]]'dod chags 'bring du spyod/_zhe sdang 'bring du spyod pa yin te/_khams 'bring po yin no/_/rtag tu myos gnas pa rnams ni 'dod chags kyi khams lhag par che ba yin/_zhe sdang gi khams chung ba yin te/_thams cad du mngon par brtson pa yin no/_/khams bcu gcig pa kun du rgyu ba 
[\[267b\]]
[\[267b.1\]]dag ni zhe sdang gi khams lhag par che la 'dod chags chung ba yin no/_/khams bcu gnyis pa ni sum cu rtsa gsum pa 'dod chags spyod pa kun yin la/_zhe sdang chung ngu spyod pa rnams yin no/_/khams bcu gsum pa ni byang gi sgra mi snyan pa 'dod chags kyi khams che ba kun yin no/_/
[\[267b.2\]]khams bcu bzhi pa ni nub kyi ba lang spyod pa zhe sdang spyod pa kun yin no/_/khams bco lnga pa ni shar gyi lus 'phags po rnams 'dod chags dang zhe sdang 'dres par che ste/_khams mnyam pa yin no/_/khams bcu drug pa ni 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rang bzhin sna tshogs/_spyod pa sna tshogs/_
[\[267b.3\]]mos pa sna tshogs pa rnams yin no/_/khams bcu bdun pa ni lha gzhan dang sems can dmyal ba 'dod chags spyod pa thams cad yin te/_'di ltar de'i gnas dag na yang sems can dmyal ba pa rnams bud med dag la mngon par 'dod do/_/'di ltar las byas pa'i sems can dmyal 
[\[267b.4\]]ba pa rnams dang /_lha'i gnas bzhi rnams ni 'dod chags lhag par che ba yin no/_/sems can rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de nyid khams yin pa de nyid gnas yin/_de nyid mos pa yin te/_thams cad mdor bsdu na/_de dag nyid khams [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad yin no/_/gang na 
[\[267b.5\]]'dod chags dang zhe sdang spyod pa de na gti mug la gnas la/_de ltar 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dag ni gti mug la rag las pa yin te/_rmongs pa med na chags pa'am g.yo ba med do/_/gtso bo dag de ltar skyon gsum gyi bye brag tha dad pa bzhi'i skyon gyis khams 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[267b.6\]]gtso bo dag yang khams [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad yod de/_'di lta ste/_mig gi khams dang /_gzugs kyi khams dang /_mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /_rna ba'i khams dang /_sgra'i khams dang /_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /_sna'i khams dang /_dri'i khams dang /_sna'i 
[\[267b.7\]]rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /_lce'i khams dang /_ro'i khams dang /_lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /_lus kyi khams dang /_reg bya'i khams dang /_lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /_yid kyi khams dang /_chos kyi khams dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i 
[\[268a\]]
[\[268a.1\]]khams te/_gtso bo dag gzhan 'di dag kyang khams yin no/_/'di dag ni gnod pa thams cad kyi rgyur gyur cing /_byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad rmongs par byed pa yin te/_lha'am mi bag yod pas yul de dag la bsams nas bsrung bar bya'o/_/gang 
[\[268a.2\]]gnyi ga 'dzin pa bag med pa'i mi rnams kyi srid pa bar ma pa bcu dgu ni 'di lta ste/_bsam gtan bzhir nye bar 'gro ba gnas gtsang ma dang bcas pa bcu drug dang /_'dod pa'i khams su nye bar 'gro ba gsum ste/_'di lta ste sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /_mi rnams 
[\[268a.3\]]so/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams ni de dag dang 'brel pa yin te/_sems can dmyal ba myong bar byed pa/_sdug bsngal mang po lhag par myong ba yin no/_/'dod pa'i khams na gnas tha dad pa nyi shu yod de/_kha cig dag rnam pa bcur yang 'chad do/_/gtso bo dag dngos po tha dad pa de dag 
[\[268a.4\]]thams cad khong du chud par bya'o/_/de nas lha de rnams kyis brgya byin gyi kha nas chos de dag thos nas/_yang brgya byin la mngon par bstod cing 'di ltar tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_thams cad mchog tu zhi byed pa/_/brgya byin khyod kyi chos 'di bshad/_/'jigs dang dngangs pa byung 
[\[268a.5\]]ba'i tshe/_/sgrub la bdag cag gnas par bgyi/_/chos gang 'chad par mdzad pa ni/_/gzhan la phan par bzhed pa lags/_/mya ngan 'das 'gro ston pa pa po/_/de ni pha dang de ni ma/_/legs par gsungs pa'i tshig gcig po/_/ston pa gang zhig ston mdzad pa/_/de ni 'gro 
[\[268a.6\]]gzhan lam shes shing /_/lus can rnams kyi mgon du 'gyur/_/legs par gsungs pa'i tshig la ni/_/brgya byin rin thang ma mchis te/_/gang zhig nor gyis mi rnyed pa/_/zhi ba'i tshig de rnyed pa lags/_/nor rdzas thun mong spyod par mthong /_/chos dag gi ni blo mi 
[\[268a.7\]]'phel/_/mi yi nor rdzas zad 'gyur gyi/_/chos kyi nor rdzas rnams mi zad/_/skye ba'i tshe rabs stong dag tu/_/chos gcig rjes su 'gro bar byed/_/gom pa gcig pu 'gro byed kyang /_/nor ni rjes su 'gro mi 'gyur/_/rgyal po chom rkun chu rnams kyis/_/mi rnams kyi 
[\[268b\]]
[\[268b.1\]]ni nor rdzas 'phrog_/chos kyi nor ni de rnams kyis/_/nam yang dbrog par mi nus so/_/de ltar brgya byin de la lha de rnams kyis mngon par mchod do/_/mchod nas kyang de nas yang brgya byin gyi mdun du 'khod do/_/brgya byin gyis kyang snying gi las gya nom pa de dag 
[\[268b.2\]]byas nas/_lha'i bde ba de dag thams cad kyang mi rtag pa dang mi brtan pa dang bdag med pa bstan cing /_sprul pa de yang mi snang bar byas so/_/de nas yang lha yid mya ngan las 'das pa ris 'thun par spyod pa'i gnas de dag nyid du phyin pa de thams cad ji srid du 'dod pa 
[\[268b.3\]]sdug pa/_yid du 'ong ba so so yang dag par myong ba/_bde ba 'grub pa'i las de dag zad pa dang spangs pa dang gtugs par ma gyur pa de srid du dga' bar byed do/_/de phyis lha'i ris de nas 'chi bar 'gyur te/_shi nas kyang las sngar bstan pa de dang rgyu 'thun par/_de dag phal 
[\[268b.4\]]cher ngan song du 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro/_/gang dag mi rnams kyi nang du skyes pa de dag chos bzang po dang ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su 'jug par 'gyur la/_rtag tu dgon par gnas pa dang rtag tu 'jig rten pha rol la 'jigs par lta ba yin no/_/de dag chos thos nas kyang rab tu 
[\[268b.5\]]'byung bar byed do/_/kha cig ni rgyun du zhugs par 'gyur ba nas dgra bcom pa'i bar du 'gyur bar mthong ngo /_/de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de/_sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams la rtog par byed de/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas 
[\[268b.6\]]sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas 'khor na gnas pa zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo /_/der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/_skyes bu dam pa chos dang ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa/_drang 
[\[268b.7\]]po drang po'i rang bzhin can gzhan la gnod pa med pa/_rtag tu las kyi 'bras bu'i de kho na nyid la lta ba/_tshul khrims thams cad du yongs su dag pa/_rtag par shin tu dga' ba/_g.yo sgyu rnam par spangs pa/_gser btso ma ltar kun nas skyon med pa/_yang dag par lta 
[\[269a\]]
[\[269a.1\]]ba/_yang dag par lta bas sngon 'dren pa tshul khrims gtsang ba/_'jig rten pha rol la 'jigs par lta ba gang gis sbyin pa dag byin zhing bsod nams dag byas pas skye bar 'gyur te/_'di lta ste/_dgon pa dag na dge slong mang po bdud kyi 'ching ba rtag tu 
[\[269a.2\]]gcod par 'dod pa rnams bsam gtan byed la/_de dag tsha bas gdungs par gyur te/_tsha bas gdungs pa rnams sam skom gyis gdungs pa rnams la sha kha ra dang /_chu byin nam rnga ma byin nam/_rnga ma'i bsil yab yu ba can sbyin par byed pa de lta bu ni sbyin pa byin pa yin 
[\[269a.3\]]no/_/srog gcod pa spangs pa rnam pa gang yin zhe na/_'di la khyim la sten pa gang gis 'byor pa dang ldan pa dag gi don du 'di ltar de dag rtsed mo byed par 'gyur ro snyam nas/_sten pa pos khu byug gam rma bya tshal na 'dris pa de dag de nas bzung ste/_mi mthong ba dang 'chi bar 
[\[269a.4\]]'gyur ba'i bya de dag zong gis blus nas thar bar byed la/_de dag kyang slar tshal gyi nang nyid du dong ste/_de na gnas la de nas yang 'tsho bar byed cing bde ba dag la nye bar spyod du 'jug pa yin te/_de lta bu ni srog gcod pa spangs pa yin no/_/ji ltar na ma byin par len pa dag las 
[\[269a.5\]]ldog pa yin/_ji ltar na ma byin pa len pa yongs su spong ba yin zhe na/_'di la las kyi 'bras bu chung ngu la 'jigs par lta ba yin te/_'di ltar de ni rdzing ngam lteng ka'am chu klung gi ngogs sam rnam pa de lta bu gzhan gang yang rung ba dag tu tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa sdom brtson can 
[\[269a.6\]]gzhan la phan par bya ba'i phyir/_so shing ngam sbrang rtsi'i chu sbyar ba de dag des spong bar byed cing rku sems dang ldan par gyur nas len par mi byed pa yin te/_rnam pa de lta bu ni ma byin par len pa las ldog pa yin no/_/de lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten sum cu rtsa gsum pa 
[\[269a.7\]]rnams kyi nang du lha 'khor na gnas pa zhes bya ba de rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/der skyes nas 'dod pa thams cad 'byor te/_sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pas tshal dang nye ba'i tshal rnams kyi nang na/_bya rnam pa sna tshogs sgra 'byin pa rnams dang /_pad ma'i rdzing rnams kyi nang na bung ba'i 
[\[269b\]]
[\[269b.1\]]tshogs sgra 'byin pa rnams dang /_bya kA raN+Da ba dang ngang pa sgra skad 'byin pa rnams dang tshal rnams kyi nang na yang rin po che sna bdun gyi shing ljon pas brgyan pa rnams dang /_lteng ka rnams kyi nang na yang bai DUr+ya sngon po bcag 'phro lta bu'i chus shin tu gang ba rnams dang /_ri'i rtse mo rnams kyang rin po che sna 
[\[269b.2\]]bdun gyi rdo rab tu gsal la gser dang dngul dang shel dang an da rnyil gyi ri'i phug rnams kyi nang dang /_bya rnam pa sna tshogs sgra rnam par 'byin pa rnams kyi nang na rtse bar byed do/_/de dag gi kha dog dang sgro gshog kyang rin po che sna bdun ltar 'dug pa yin te/_sgra rnam pa sna tshogs 'byin cing nyams 
[\[269b.3\]]dga' ba rnams rna khung du sgra 'byin pa/_phan tshun 'thun pa rnam pa du ma snyan par 'byin pa/_de dag thams cad rnar snyan par 'byin te/_gang gis tshal dang nye ba'i tshal de dag nyid sgra 'byin pa lta bur 'byin te/_tshal dang nye ba'i tshal de dag kha cig na kun nas sgra di ri rir 'byin te/_shin tu nyams dga' 
[\[269b.4\]]ba yang yin no/_/tshal de rnams kyi nang na zas kyi tshogs dang skom gyi tshogs kun las shin tu zhim pa rab tu 'bab ste/_lha de rnams kyang rab tu dga' ba skyed na mi gzhan dag lta smos kyang ci dgos/_rnam pa de lta bu'i tshal dang nye ba'i tshal de rnams kyi nang na/_byad gzugs sna tshogs cha byad sna tshogs 
[\[269b.5\]]lus la rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs thogs pa rnams lan brgya'am stong du dga' bar byed dga' dgur spyod par byed do/_/de dag gi nang na las bzang po legs par byas pa/_rang gi 'od dang gzi brjid mchog dang ldan pa bde ba sna tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba dga' bar byed dga' dgur spyod par byed la 
[\[269b.6\]]'dod pa rnam pa thams cad myong bar byed do/_/de bde ba'i rnam pa de lta bu'i myos pas myos pa mngon par mthong nas/_yid du dga' ba de rnams kyis lha de yongs su bskor te/_dga' bar byed dga' dgur spyod par byed do/_/de ltar de dag de bzhin du dga' zhing rtse la dga' dgur spyod pa na/_'di snyam du sems te 
[\[269b.7\]]bdag cag bai DUr+ya'i nor bus lan kan bres pa'i tshal/_kun nas nor bu'i ljon shing bkra ba sna tshogs su phye ba rnams kyis yongs su bskor ba bya sna tshogs sgra 'byin pas kun tu gang ba rnams su 'dong bar bya'o snyam mo tshal de na lha rab tu dga' ba/_lha dang lha mo'i tshogs kyis gang ba rnams sil snyan yan lag lnga 
[\[270a\]]
[\[270a.1\]]dang ldan pas dga' bar byed dga' dgur spyod par byed do/_/tshal de'i nang na chu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i rdzing yod de/_shin tu nyams dga' la chu rab tu dang ba yin te/_de'i 'gram na lha de rnams rtse bar byed dga' bar byed do/_/de nas lha'i bu gsar du skyes pa de lha de rnams dang lhan cig 
[\[270a.2\]]rdzing de nyid kyi drung du 'gro bar byed do/_/de nas lha de rnams kyis kyang de rig nas dgod cing rtse la 'gros 'chos pas lha de dag ga la ba der 'dong bar byed de/_de'i rdzing chu gnas pa dag na phan tshun grogs su gyur pa dag dang dga' bar byed dga' dgur spyod par byed do/_/rdzing de la yang mthu 'di lta bu yod 
[\[270a.3\]]de/_ji ltar 'dod pa dang chu'i rnam pa ji tsam du 'dod pa rnam pa de tsam du de 'gyur ro/_/gal te 'dod na de chang mdog dang dri dang ro gsal zhing shin tu zhim la bung ba'i tshogs dang ldan par 'gyur te/_'dod pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'gyur zhing /_bdud rtsi dang 'thun par 'gyur ro/_/mdog dang ro dang dri shin tu 
[\[270a.4\]]zhim po dang ldan pa chu gnas pa'i rdzing de/_bdud rtsi shin tu zhim pa shin tu 'jam pa mdog zla ba lta bus kun tu gang ba yin no/_/de nas 'di snyam sems te/_'di ltar rdzing 'di shing ljon pas gang bar gyur cig snyam na/_de shing ljon pa yon tan mchog dang ldan pa dang shing ljon pa dril bu g.yer ka'i dra bas 
[\[270a.5\]]gtibs shing lo ma las rol mo 'byung ba rnams kyis de bzhin du gang bar 'gyur ro/_/rlung gi shugs kyis rab tu bskyod pa'i shing ljon pa de rnams las sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i rnam pa ji snyed pa/_rnam pa de snyed kyi sgra 'byin par 'gyur ro/_/de nas yang lha de rnams 'di snyam du sems te/_'di ltar bdag 
[\[270a.6\]]cag rdzing de dag gi nang du 'jug par bya'o snyam pa dang /_lha de dag gis sems bskyed ma thag tu der 'jug par byed do/_/de dag zhugs pa dang nang du chu 'byung bar 'gyur la/_nang du zhugs pa rnams kyis rdzing de nyid kyi nang na nor bu'i lan kan rnam pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan cing lo ma rnams kyis khebs pa'i gzhal 
[\[270a.7\]]med khang la la ni bai DUr+ya las byas/_la la ni gser las byas/_la la ni dngul las byas/_la la ni shel las byas/_la la ni an da rnyil las byas/_la la ni 'dren mar byas pa dag mthong ngo /_/khang pa dang tshal de rnams kyi nang na thags su ma btags pa'i stan khra bo shin tu yid du 'ong ba bsams 
[\[270b\]]
[\[270b.1\]]pa bzhin du sdug pa'i mal stan sna tshogs bting ba'i steng na/_lha dang lha mo dang lha'i bu mo'i tshogs de rnams dang lhan cig dga' bar byed dga' dgur spyod par byed do/_/de rnams sa phyogs der yang dga' zhing shin tu sdug pa rnam pa du ma/_'dod pa'i yon tan ngoms mi myong ba 'thab mo dang phrag dog gi 
[\[270b.2\]]skyon rnams kyis skyo ba med pa shin tu snying du sdug cing yon tan dang ldan pa phan tshun grogs su gyur pa rnams dang dga' bar byed dga' dgur spyod par byed de/_'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams kyis lhan cig dga' bar byed do/_/de dag kyang de nas langs nas tshal shin tu sdug pa zhes bya ba ga la ba der 'dong 
[\[270b.3\]]bar byed do/_/tshal de yang bya mad ta din da sgra snyan pa mang po 'byin pa/_'bab chu dang chu klung dang lteng ka dang 'bab chu'i ngos kun tu gang ba bya khri snyed sgra ca co 'byin pas kun nas yongs su gang zhing /_sgra snyan pa'i ca cos kun tu snyan pa yin no/_/tshal gang na shing ljon pa nyi ma'i 'od ltar rnam par 
[\[270b.4\]]gsal ba'i tshal yon tan sna tshogs dang ldan pa/_bya'i tshogs kun nas lang long 'phur ba/_'bab chu 'bum snyed kyis brgyan pa de na/_lha rang gi 'od dang ldan pa de rnams lha mo dag dang lhan cig lha'i yon tan sna tshogs pa'i yul rnams kyis dga' bar byed do/_/mi shes pa rnams kyi dga' 
[\[270b.5\]]ba'i nang na mchog 'di yin te 'di lta ste/_bud med la dga' ba zhes bya la zhags pa des bcings pa'i byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad ni 'khor ba na dga' bar byed do/_/lha de dag de rnams dang lhan cig phan tshun dga' ba rab tu mang po sna tshogs dang ldan pas yun ring du shin tu dga' bar byas 
[\[270b.6\]]nas ri rab kyi rtse mo mad ta ka Ta ma zhes bya ba ga la ba der/_lha mo rang gi 'od dang ldan pa byad gzugs che zhing bzang la rgyan sdug gu thogs pa 'brang ba rnams dang lhan cig gzhal med khang gi nang du zhugs nas nam mkha'i dkyil nas 'dong bar byed de/_nam mkha'i dkyil du zhugs pa gos rlung gis 
[\[270b.7\]]bud pa de rnams ri rab kyi rtse mo mad ta ka Ta ma der gzhal med khang gi dga' spyod byed du 'dong bar byed do/_/de dag na gzhal med khang gi dbyibs sdug pa lha'i pad ma'i rdzing dang lteng kas mdzes par byas pa/_rin po che sna bdun gyi ri'i zom gsal ba/_thags su ma btags pa'i rdzas kyis nye 
[\[271a\]]
[\[271a.1\]]bar mdzes par byas pa/_kun nas mchog tu legs pa dang ldan pa mad ta ka Ta ma de'i gnas dpe med cing shin tu mtho la brtsegs pa dag de rnams kyis mthong la/_de rnams kyi nang na dga' bar byed dga' dgur spyod par byed do/_/de ltar de dag rtse ba na/_re zhig na glo bur du de 
[\[271a.2\]]dag thams cad kyi gzi 'bar la/_nyi ma'i mdog dang 'thun pa'i 'od kyi rnam pa de lta bu zhig byung ste/_de nas yang ji ltar lha rnams shin tu dngangs la khas bub tu gyur/_mig btsums nas lhung ba yon tan 'bum dang ldan pa'i 'od de lta bu zhig byung ste/_'di ltar 'od kyi rnam pa 'di lta bu sngon 
[\[271a.3\]]nam yang ma mthong ngo /_/'od de yang yud tsam zhig tal gyis byung nas nub ste/_ji ltar 'dzam bu gling na skar mda' ltung ba yud tsam zhig tal gyis byung nas nub pa dang /_sems can dag kyang shin tu dngangs par gyur pa de ltar lha de rnams kyis 'od de byung ba mthong nas/_lha'i tshogs rnams dang lhan 
[\[271a.4\]]cig dngangs par gyur la/_de nas yang yun ring zhig lon pa dang dbugs byung ngo /_/dbugs byung ba de dag thams cad yud tsam gyis ngo mtshar cher skyes te/_gang gis bdag cag thams cad dngangs la de nas yang 'od de nyid mi snang bar gyur pa rnam pa de lta bu'i 'od de ci zhig yin snyam mo/_/ngo mtshar 
[\[271a.5\]]cher skyes pa de dag lha'i 'dun sa chos bzang ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas lha dang lha mo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_ngo mtshar skyes shing dngangs pa de dag brgya byin ga la gnas pa der dong nas de dag gis brgya byin mngon par mthong ba dang mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_kun nas yongs su bskor te 'khod 
[\[271a.6\]]do/_/de nas brgya byin gyis mdun na 'don pa'i lha gang yin pa de rnams rtse bar byed dga' bar byed phreng ba dang rgyan dang pad ma'i phreng ba sna tshogs thogs pa/_bzhin 'dzum la nor bus lto sngo bsangs su 'dug pa/_mdog gser btso ma'i 'od ltar gsal ba'i lha'i tshogs de dag thams cad brgya byin 
[\[271a.7\]]gyi mdun na rtse bar byed dga' bar byed dga' dgur spyod par byed do/_/de nas 'khor na gnas pa'i lha gang yin pa de rnams ni dga' bar mi byed dga' dgur spyod par mi byed/_brgya byin la mngon par stod par mi byed/_glu mi len bro mi rdung lha gzhan la tshig cung zad kyang smra bar mi byed do/_/de 
[\[271b\]]
[\[271b.1\]]nas lha'i rgyal po brgya byin gyis 'khor na gnas pa de rnams la 'di skad smras so/_/kye gtso bo dag ci ste glu mi len bro mi rdung dgod par mi byed/_de nas 'khor na gnas pa'i lha rnams kyis brgya byin la 'di skad smras so/_/brgya byin bdag cag gis gang sngon gar yang ma mthong ba mthong sngon ma thos pa 
[\[271b.2\]]thos so/_/de nas brgya byin gyis de dag la 'di skad smras so/_/'khor na gnas pa rnams kyis ngo mtshar zhig mthong ba de ci yin/_de nas 'khor na gnas pa'i lha rnams kyis brgya byin la 'di skad smras so/_/brgya byin 'di ni bdag cag skyed mos tshal du dga' spyod byed du ri'i rtse mo mad ta ka Ta mar 
[\[271b.3\]]mchis pa dang bdag cag rnams kyis nam mkha' las ji tsam du gang gis ri'i rtse mo de rab tu 'bar ba lta bu'i 'od kyi rnam pa de lta bu byung ba zhig mthong ste/_de la bdag cag ngo mtshar skyes na brgya byin de cir 'gyur/_de nas brgya byin gyis de thos nas yud tsam zhig bsams te/_lha de rnams la 'di 
[\[271b.4\]]skad smras so/_/lha dag res 'ga' 'od de lta bu 'byung ba yod de/_bdag gis 'di'i ngo mtshar gnyis pa de thos so/_/gang gi tshe bdag gis ngo mtshar dang po de thos pa des/_bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar ba de ci lags zhes zhus so/_/de nas bcom ldan 
[\[271b.5\]]'das la de skad ces zhus pa dang bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka khyod ni ngan song gi sgo bcad pa yin pas 'jigs par ma byed cig_/'khor bar gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi chos nyid ni 'di yin te 'di lta ste/_mi rtag pa zhes bya ba yin no/_/gang yin pa de ngas khyod la bshad kyis 
[\[271b.6\]]nyon cig_/lha 'thab bral zhes bya ba dag yod de de dag gi drung na sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams kyi bong skyed dang mdog dang dbyibs dang longs spyod rnams 'bum gyi char yang mi phod do/_/de dag gang gi tshe las yongs su zad pa dang de nas ltung bar 'gyur te/_de dag dpag tshad 'bum phrag du ma dag nas 
[\[271b.7\]]ltung ba na 'od de chung ngur 'gyur ro/_/ji ltar mar me zad pa'i dus su 'od chung zhing mi gsal bar 'gyur ba de ltar de nam mkha' la 'chi ba'i dus na/_'od de rnam pa de lta bur chung bar 'gyur ro/_/brgya byin gang gi 'od rab tu gsal ba de dag ni brjod par mi nus shing /_/sum cu rtsa gsum pa 
[\[272a\]]
[\[272a.1\]]rnams kyis blta bar yang mi nus so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rtogs pa'i yul ma yin pa'i phyir 'jug pa'i yul ma yin no/_/kau shi ka de ltar 'thab bral gyi lha'i 'od gang yin pa/_sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lhas gang yang blta bar yang mi nus te/_de ni gzhan gyi las kyi 
[\[272a.2\]]'bras bu sum 'gyur du 'byung la/_sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams kyi 'bras bu ni gzhan gyi nyis 'gyur du 'byung ngo /_/de dag bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa las de skad thos pa 'di dag khyod la bstan pa yin no/_/gtso bo dag de'i tshe skyo ba skyes te/_lha de 'chi ba na nam mkha' de dpag 
[\[272a.3\]]tshad 'bum phrag du ma dag nas 'od 'byung ba gang yin pa de dag lha khyed kyis mthong ba dang /_de la 'jigs par ma byed cig_/de nas brgya byin gyis de'i tshe 'di ltar tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_ji lta ji ltar bde chen dang /_/ji lta ji ltar longs spyod pa/_/de lta de ltar sdug bsngal che/_/
[\[272a.4\]]nges par mthar ni ltung bar 'gyur/_/las dang 'thun par 'bras bu ni/_/rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pas gzigs/_/las kyis lhag par khyad 'jug la/_/'bras bu'ang de bzhin khyad 'jug go/_/ji ltar gong nas gong dag tu/_/las rnams kyi ni 'brel ba mthong /_/de ltar gong nas 
[\[272a.5\]]gong dag tu/_/'bras bu'ang de ltar 'brel pa yin/_/skye bar 'gyur ba 'di rnams kyi/_/las ni nges par gnas pa ste/_/skye las mchog nyid lus dang mdog_/stobs dang tshe rnams 'thob par 'gyur/_/las zad nas ni ltung 'gyur te/_/'di dag thams cad nges par ltung /_/
[\[272a.6\]]sa bon nges par tshig pa la/_/nam yang skye ba yod ma yin/_/mar me rtag tu skad cig ltar/_/sems kyang skad cig 'brel par mthong /_/rgyu ste sems dang 'thun par ni/_/las kyang de bzhin skad cig go/_/mi rtag las las gang skyes pa/_/de ni skye 'jig chos can yin/_/
[\[272a.7\]]zag dang bcas pa'i bde ba de/_/rtag tu sngon med phyis mi 'byung /_/skye med 'jig med bdag nyid gang /_/nyon mongs las grol de bde'o/_/gang zhig thob nas 'khor ba yi/_/yul las gnod med nges par 'gro/_/gang zhig srid bral 'dod med la/_/srid pa'i skyon las 
[\[272b\]]
[\[272b.1\]]rnam grol ba/_/lus can gyi ni bde ba de/_/pha rol gnas pa'i skyob pa yin/_/cung zad zag bcas bde ba gang /_/de dag thams cad skad cig dgongs/_/gang zhig de las rnam grol ba/_/de dag thams cad brtan par bde/_/de ltar brgya byin des/_'khor na gnas pa'i lha 
[\[272b.2\]]de rnams la de kho na nyid ston par byed do/_/bstan nas yang de rnams dbugs phyung ste rang gi gnas su gtong bar byed do/_/chos 'di skad kyang bstan te/_'di ltar dus thams cad du bag yod par bya'o/_/de nas lha de rnams kyang kha cig rang gi gnas der dong ste/_de nas yang yul 
[\[272b.3\]]gyi dbang du gyur pa rnams/_sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pas dga' bar byed dga' dgur spyod par byed do/_/sil snyan dang rol mo'i sgra rnam pa sna tshogs kyis snyan par byas pa'i tshal dang gnas rnams na ji srid du 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba byas shing bsags pa'i las zad par ma 
[\[272b.4\]]gyur pa de srid du/_dga' bar byed dga' dgur spyod par byed do/_/de phyis las de zad nas/_lha'i 'jig rten de nas 'chi bar 'gyur te/_shi nas kyang las nye bar 'gro ba ji lta ba bzhin/_sems can dmyal ba dang [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang dud 'gro rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te kha 
[\[272b.5\]]cig mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mi'i nang du skye bar gyur na/_las de dang rgyu 'thun par de rtag par mchog tu bde ba dang ldan par 'gyur te/_rdzu 'phrul che ba dang skye bo thams cad dga' ba dang nad med pa dang sdug bsngal med pa dang rigs btsun zhing che bar skye ba dang skyes phan chad mchog tu 
[\[272b.6\]]bde la blta na sdug par 'gyur ba mthong ngo /_/de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas la rtog par byed de/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas/_sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas mtho bar spyod pa zhes bya ba ji ltar 
[\[272b.7\]]'dug pa mthong ngo /_/gnas der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/_chos dang ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su lta ba rtag tu las kyi 'bras bu la yang dag par lta ba/_rtag tu yang dag pa'i lta bar sngon du 'dren pa gang 
[\[273a\]]
[\[273a.1\]]gis nor gyi sbyin pa byin pa dang /_bsod nams dag byas pas skye bar 'gyur te/_'di lta ste/_tshul khrims phyogs gcig bsrungs la tshul khrims kha cig srung ba dang de'i 'og tu tshul khrims thams cad srung ba'i dge 'dun lam du zhugs pa dag la lham mam snod spyad dag sbyin 
[\[273a.2\]]par byed pa dang srog gcod pa dang ma byin par len pa dag spangs pa yin te 'di lta ste/_'gro lding ba'am ri khrod pa'am skra 'phyang bas 'brog dgon pa dag tu mi gsad pa'i phyir bzung ba de dag thar bar byed pa dang /_'brog dgon pa dag tu chom rkun pa rnams kyis bcom pa'i nor rdzas khyer te 'ongs pa de 
[\[273a.3\]]dag/_rgyal por gyur gyis kyang ma byin par len pa'i 'jigs pas rgyal po'i skal ba len par mi byed pa yin te/_de ltar 'di ni ma byin par len pa spong ba yin no/_/ji ltar na srog gcod pa spong ba yin zhe na/_'di ni 'di ltar de rgyal por gyur la/_nyes byed byed pa gzhan gyis bzung ste phul 
[\[273a.4\]]ba de yang de las kyi 'bras bu la 'jigs nas gsod par mi byed pa yin te/_de ni lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas mtho bar spyod pa zhes bya bar skye bar 'gyur ro/_/der skyes nas kyang de'i las kyi mtha' legs par byas shing spyad 
[\[273a.5\]]pas lha mo sum stong dag de'i rim gro byed par 'gyur te/_de dag thams cad kyang cha byad dang rgyan btags pa/_lag na sil snyan rnam pa sna tshogs dang /_lag na mkho ba rnam pa sna tshogs dang /_lag na rol mo rnam pa sna tshogs thogs la/_glu dbyangs rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bstod cing lha 
[\[273a.6\]]de ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do/_/des kyang de rnams mthong nas lha mo de rnams ga la ba der 'gro bar byed do/_/de rnams kyang shin tu gus pas de'i drung du 'dong bar byed do/_/de ltar phan tshun snying du sdug pa de dag thams cad skyed mos tshal rtag tu dga' ba zhes bya ba ga la ba der 'dong bar byed 
[\[273a.7\]]do/_/skyed mos tshal rtag tu dga' ba zhes bya ba de yang kun nas bai DUr+ya dang /_dngul dang /_gser gyi shing ljon pas ni brgyan/_'bab chu dang /_lteng ka dang /_pad ma'i tshal gyis mdzes par byas shing /_chu bo du ma brgya snyed ni legs par 'bab/_dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba rnam pa sna 
[\[273b\]]
[\[273b.1\]]tshogs kyis ni gtibs/_kun nas bya'i rigs du ma lding zhing sgra snyan pa'i rnam pa mang po stong snyed ni 'byin/_skyed mos tshal de lha'i rnam pa sna tshogs pa rnams kyis ni khyab ste/_lha de rnams dang tshal de phan tshun mdzes pa yin no/_/tshal de'i dbus na rtse ba'i ri zhes bya ba rin po che sna bdun gyi ri yod 
[\[273b.2\]]de/_de na yang rin po che'i [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]rnam pa du ma yod la/_de dag 'di lta bur mdzes pa yin te 'di lta ste/_rtsib logs ni pad ma rA ga'i mdog ltar dmar la/_rgyab ni dngul ltar dkar/_lto ni gser ltar ser/_rkang pa ni byi ru/_rwa ni shel lta bu yin la/_kha cig ni mdog 'thun te/_
[\[273b.3\]]lus thams cad dngul gyi mdog dang /_de bzhin du gser gyi mdog tu 'dug go/_/de ltar tshal de na [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]rgyu ba rnams kyi lus kyi rnam pa dag gis kun nas mdzes pa yin no/_/lha'i tshogs de rnams dang lhan cig spyod par byed la/[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]de rnams kyang lha mo de rnams dang lhan 
[\[273b.4\]]cig glu len par byed de/_ji ltar glu len pa de ltar lha mo de rnams kyang shin tu 'thun zhing snyan la mchog tu yid du 'thad pa'i glu len no/_/de ni lha de rnams yun ring du rnam pa du ma dga' bar byas nas/_'bab chu 'bab pa gzhan ga la ba der lhan cig rgyu bar byed cing /_ri rab kyi rtse mo 
[\[273b.5\]]chu bo sman ljongs zhes bya ba der shing rta rnam pa sna tshogs la zhon pa/_sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pas glu dbyangs nye bar len zhing 'dod pa dam pa dang ldan la/_shin tu dga' ba skyes pa legs pa mchog dang ldan pa rnams 'dong bar byed do/_/der phyin nas kyang chu klung dang /_'bab chu 
[\[273b.6\]]dang /_chu bo sman ljongs kyi ri rab kyi rtse mo der yang dga' bar byed do/_/chu bo'i nang rnams dang /_'bab chu'i nang rnams dang /_pad ma'i rdzing gi nang rnams na/_rol mo'i sgra rnar grag cing shin tu rgyags par gnas pa/_rtag tu rtse ba rtag tu bde ba rtag tu rgya che ba lha dang lha mo'i tshogs phan tshun 
[\[273b.7\]]'thun pa rnams kyis gang ba/_me tog phreng ba dang phye ma dang byug pas lus bskus pa/_pad ma'i phreng ba sa mgo dkris pa dag dga' bar byed de/_las legs par byas pas bsgyur ba rnams de'i stobs dang de so sor 'brang ba/_lha dang 'thun pa bde ba dpe med pas rtse bar byed do/_/der 
[\[274a\]]
[\[274a.1\]]'di ni phyogs gcig bstan par zad la/_thams cad ni mi kun gyis brjod par mi nus te/_'di ltar lha'i bde ba de brjod par mi nus shing 'di ltar lha'i bde ba de ni gzhan dang mi 'dra ba dpe med pa yin no/_/las legs par byas pa'i rgyu las byung ba/_ris 'thun pa'i dbang 
[\[274a.2\]]gis sten pa dag de ltar bde ba du ma myong ngo /_/'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la dga' ba de rnams ji srid du 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba byas shing bsags pa'i las zad pa dang /_spangs pa dang /_gtugs par ma gyur pa de srid du de na dga' bar byed do/_/de phyis lha'i ris de nas 'chi bar 'gyur 
[\[274a.3\]]te/_shi nas kyang las nye bar 'gro ba ji lta ba bzhin sems can dmyal ba dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_dud 'gro rnams kyi nang na skye bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mi'i nang du skyes na/_de las de dang rgyu 'thun par rtag tu mchog tu bde bar 'gyur zhing dben pa na gnas 
[\[274a.4\]]pa dang /_ri khrod na gnas pa dang /_gzi che ba dang /_rgya che ba dang /_rgyal po'am/_blon po chen por 'gyur ba mthong ngo /_/de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de/_sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas la rtog par byed de/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes 
[\[274a.5\]]pas lha rnams kyi gnas gzi brjid mchog ces bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo /_/der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas ji ltar gnas pa brtags na/_sems can dge ba/_blo gros rgya che ba gang gis sbyin pa byin/_bsod 
[\[274a.6\]]nams byas/_tshul khrims rnam pa bdun yang bsrungs/_sdig pa'i grogs po dang tom col du mi 'dre/_sdig pa dang bcas pa'i tshul khrims mi srung /_bsod nams kyang ji lta ba bzhin du byed/_gcig kho nar 'bad cing yid drang ba'i rang bzhin can/_mdog gser sbyangs pa dang 
[\[274a.7\]]'thun pa yin te/_tshul khrims rnam pa du bsrungs zhe na 'di lta ste/_srog gcod pa dang /_ma byin par len pa dag spangs pa yin no/_/'di la g.yul chen por zhugs pa na/_gang drung du 'ongs pa'i sdom pa'i 'dzem pas de srog kyang btang nas gsod par mi byed do/_/de ltar srog 
[\[274b\]]
[\[274b.1\]]gcod pa spangs pa yin no/_/ji ltar na ma byin pa len pa spangs pa yin zhe na/_'di ni ri'i rtse mo yang snyil bar byed pa/_pha rol gyi dpung 'joms shing /_sems can thams cad gzhan gyi nor rdzas 'phrog pa na/_de bkres shing skom la/_srog chad la thug gis kyang sdom pa blangs 
[\[274b.2\]]pa'i 'dzem pas ma byin par len par mi byed do/_/ji ltar na sbyin pa gtong ba zhing gang la zhe na/_'di ni sangs rgyas mchod cing chos mnyan pa'i don du sems bzang po bsgoms pa'i yid yang dag pa'i lta ba sngon du 'gro ba'i blos mar me 'bul bar byed na/_de lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho 
[\[274b.3\]]ris kyi 'jig rten sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nang na/_gzi brjid mchog gi lha'i gnas su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/der skyes nas kyang gzi brjid kyi phreng ba can byad gzugs che la shin tu sdug pa de las legs par byas pa des rgyu dang 'thun par 'bras bu myong bar 'gyur ro/_/rna bas sil 
[\[274b.4\]]snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pa yang dang yang du thos so/_/snas kyang me tog man dA ra ba dang /_pad ma dang /_ud pa la sngon po dang /_rin po che sna bdun gyi dri yang dang yang du snom mo/_/lces kyang bdud rtsi'i ro zhim po lha'i chang rgyun du 'thung ngo /_/mig gis kyang ri sul gyi ngos sna tshogs 
[\[274b.5\]]dang /_rin po che sna bdun gyi gzugs dag mthong ngo /_/lus kyis kyang lha'i reg bya shin tu dri zhim pa'i thags su ma btags pa'i gos rnams gyon la/_pad ma dang /_ud pa la'i lo ma me tog phreng ba dang /_byug pa sna tshogs dag la reg par byed de/_de ltar de las legs par 
[\[274b.6\]]byas pa dag gi 'bras bu la spyod par byed do/_/lha mo stong snyed kyis yongs su bskor ba de gser btso ma lta bu'i tshal dang /_nags tshal rnams dang /_dril bu g.yer ka'i sgra drag tu 'khrol ba rnams dang /_dngul gyi lcug ma'i tshogs rlung gis bskyod pa'i nang na bde ba mchog rnams myong ngo /_/
[\[274b.7\]]lha dag glu dbyangs len pa na/_rol mo jeng dang /_rnga dang /_gling bu dang /_glu snyan pa dang 'brel pa dag thos so/_/shin tu bde ba dang ldan pa lha'i phreng ba dang /_gos gyon pa gser rnam pa du mas gang ba'i ri sul rnams dang /_ri rab dang /_ri bo'i rtse mo baiDUr+ya dang /_gser dang /_dngul dang /_
[\[275a\]]
[\[275a.1\]]an da rnyil dang /_rin po che mthon ka chen po dang /_shel las grub pa rnams kyang mthong ngo //_//'phags pa dam pa'i chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa/_bam po bzhi bcu bzhi pa/_ri'i rtse mo me long lta bur gyur pa de dag la/_gcig gi gzugs brnyan 
[\[275a.2\]]gcig gi nang du snang ngo /_/lha dang lha mo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba de yang ri me long lta bu de rnams kyi nang na lan brgya 'am stong du snang ngo /_/de gzugs brnyan de rnams la bdag nyid lta bar byed la/_bltas nas kyang brgya 'gyur du rab tu dga' ba skye'o/_/lha mo rnams kyang de 
[\[275a.3\]]bzhin du dga' ba skye ste/_kye ma 'di ltar bdag cag byad gzugs che zhing bzang ba dang ldan par rtag par shin tu bde ba rnams sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pa rnyed nas rtse bar bya'o/_/lha'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas bskyed pa'i bde ba la nye bar spyad par bya'o snyam mo/_/de ltar yid g.yengs 
[\[275a.4\]]pa de dag ri nas ri/_ri 'or nas ri 'or du 'dong ste/_sred pa'i dug gis myos pa'i mi ltar yid rtag tu ma bsdams pa/_bag med pas nyams pa'i lha dang lha mo rnams dang lhan cig ri'i rgyal po de la rgyu bar byed do/_/bza' btung bdud rtsi'i rnam pa sna tshogs kyis myos pa phan tshun dga' 
[\[275a.5\]]ba'i dbang du gyur pa/_phan tshun yid gcugs pa/_phan tshun snying 'brel pa dag_/tshal dang nags tshal bya sna tshogs sgra di ri ri 'byin pa rnam pa du ma rnams kyi nang na dga' bar byed de/_de ltar rtag par rgyu ba cha byad dang /_phreng ba dang gos gyon pa mgo la me tog phreng ba btags pa/_rgyan 
[\[275a.6\]]phreng 'phyang ba de dag dpag bsam gyi shing gi tshal nas/_dpag bsam gyi shing gi tshal rnams kyi nang na rgyu bar byed do/_/de ltar yongs su rgyu ba na shin tu bde ba dang ldan pa de dag_/res 'ga' chu bo chang chu ltar 'bab pa zhes bya bar ud pa la dmar po dang /_pad ma dang /_me tog ku mu das 
[\[275a.7\]]khebs pa/_bya kA raN+Da ba dang /_ngang pa dang ngur pas mdzes pa der 'jug par byed la/_chu bo'i 'gram de dag na lha phan tshun grogs su gyur pa de rnams chang 'thung bar byed cing /_bya ba lta na sdug pa rnams dang yang lhan cig rtse bar byed do/_/de nas srid pas myos pa'i lha de rnams kyang yang 
[\[275b\]]
[\[275b.1\]]dang yang du chang 'thung ba nyid kyis brgya 'gyur du mdangs 'bar te/_yul lnga'i yam sreg shing las byung ba'i sred pa'i mes bsreg par byas kyang /_'dod pa'i sred pas gdungs pa ngoms mi myong ngo /_/kun nas 'dod pa'i zhags pas bcings pa/_rgyal po la gnod pa byed byed pa'i mi 
[\[275b.2\]]btson rar bcug pa lta bu de rnams lha'i 'jig rten 'bum phrag du ma mthong ba nyams dga' ba na rtag tu rgyu bar byed do/_/chang chu ltar 'bab pa'i ngogs de dag na rtse ba'i lha de rnams dang /_bya rtag par rab tu myos shing snying shin tu dga' ba gang yin pa de rnams/_pad ma dang ud pa la'i tshal 
[\[275b.3\]]de dag na dga' bar byed do/_/chu dmar po la spyod pa zhes bya ba phan tshun grogs su gyur cing /_sgro gshog rin po che sna bdun las grub pa lta bur rang gi 'od dang ldan pa de rnams kyis lha rab tu myos pa de rnams mngon par mthong nas/_'di ltar tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_lha rnams rtag par 
[\[275b.4\]]rab tu dga'/_/bdag cag rtag par rab tu dga'/_/lha rnams dang ni bya rnams kyi/_/bye brag dag ni mi dmigs so/_/de dag chos spyod ma mthong ste/_/nams kyang thar pa spyod pa med/_/gal te der gyur lha rnams dang /_/bya gyur de rnams mtshungs pa yin/_/gang zhig bag med rnam 
[\[275b.5\]]grol zhing /_/gang zhig chos la rtag tu dga'/_/'jig rten na ni lha de dag_/bag yod gnas pa dam pas mkhyen/_/gal te lha rnams rtse dga' dang /_/gal te bdag cag rtse dga' na/_/lha dang mkha' la rgyu ba rnams/_/bye brag yod par mi 'gyur ro/_/las rnams kyi ni bye 
[\[275b.6\]]brag gis/_/skye ba'i chos dag bye brag 'gyur/_/chos ma yin par ltung ba dag_/gar yang skye ba legs mi 'gyur/_/gang zhig 'khor ba 'di dag kun/_/mthar ni zad par mi rig pa/_/lha de dang ni blo rmongs pa/_/bya rnams dang ni rtag tu mtshungs/_/skye sdug rga ba'i sdug bsngal 
[\[275b.7\]]dang /_/'chi ba nyid kyi sdug bsngal dang /_/sdug dang bral bar bcas pa yi/_/sdug bsngal 'di dag brgyud pa yin/_/dri med chos kyi spyod yul la/_/gang zhig de ltar blo gnas pa/_/'jig rten na ni lha de dag_/bag yod gnas pa dam pas mkhyen/_/gang zhig skye ba'i rgyu las byung /_
[\[276a\]]
[\[276a.1\]]sdug bsngal yin par legs rig pa/_/'dod pa phan med byed rnams la/_/lha de dag ni chags mi byed/_/mdza' bshes gnyen 'dun rang gi 'khor/_/mang po rnams dang bral ba na/_/gang zhig 'khor bar skyo mi byed/_/lha de dag ni bya dang mtshungs/_/bag med 
[\[276a.2\]]de nyid gzigs pa yis/_/chang 'thung cung zad tha gir gzigs/_/chang 'thung ba ni 'ju 'gyur gyi/_/bag med 'ju bar mi 'gyur ro/_/bag med nyams pa'i mi dag ni/_/'khor ba lngar ni 'khyam par byed/_/de bas chang gi bag med las/_/rnam pa kun gyis khyad par che/_/
[\[276a.3\]]chang zhim gyis ni nyin gcig tu/_/lus can rnams ni bag med byed/_/bskal pa bye bar 'khyam pa na/_/bag med byang bar mi 'gyur ro/_/bag med pa dang bral ba gang /_/de dag 'chi med gnas su 'gro/_/gang zhig bag med dbang du song /_/mi de srid par rtag tu 'gro/_/
[\[276a.4\]]phan par byed pa mi yis ni/_/bag med pa dag spang bar gyis/_/'di ltar nyon mongs bag med pa/_/sangs rgyas kyis ni mi bzad bsgrags/_/'di ltar sems yang bya dag kyang /_/bag med pa la mi dga' na/_/ci phyir lha rnams bag med pa/_/de ni khyad par spong mi byed/_/de ltar 
[\[276a.5\]]legs par byas pas bskul bas/_lha rnams la phan par bya ba'i phyir de khong du chud par bya ba'i don du bya gang yin pa de dag pha ma ltar 'doms par byed kyang bag med pas sems phrogs pa'i lha de rnams bdag la phan par ston pa 'dzin par mi byed do/_/de nas yang rtse ba la gnas pa'i 
[\[276a.6\]]lha shin tu skyid par gnas pa/_rtag tu yid rab tu dga' ba/_sil snyan dang /_rol mo'i sgra 'byin pa/_yid chags su rung ba sna tshogs dang chas te/_tshal gzhan ma ta la zhes bya ba ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do/_/de nas tshal ma ta lar phyin nas lha phan tshun grogs su gyur la/_
[\[276a.7\]]shin tu skyid cing yid rab tu dga' ba de rnams rin po che sna bdun gyi lcug ma dang /_lo ma phan tshun 'brel cing me tog gi snye ma 'phyang la/_bung ba 'bum snyed 'khod pa'i nang dang /_rin po che sna bdun gyi tshal rnams kyi nang na rang gi lha mo rnam pa du mas gang ba rnams dang lhan cig glu dbyangs 
[\[276b\]]
[\[276b.1\]]shin tu snyan pa gang gi tshal dang /_nye ba'i tshal thams cad glu len pa lta bu'i brag ca'i sgras dga' bar byed/_dga' dgur spyod par byed do/_/glu dbyangs len pa'i sgra dang /_bung ba sgra 'byin pa dang /_bya rnams kyang sgra 'byin pa rnam pa de lta bur snyan cing 'thun pa'i sgra de dag nyid 
[\[276b.2\]]gcig tu 'dus te 'byung ba des/_ri rab shin tu nyams dga' ba de yang rnas 'thad pa'i glu dbyangs dang /_mthong na dga' ba des yang nyis 'gyur du dga' bar gyur la/_de la lha rnams lha mo'i tshogs byad gzugs dang /_cha byad dang 'dzum pa dang g.yer bag can dang /_lhan cig 
[\[276b.3\]]'dod pa'i tshogs la nye bar spyod/_rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' dgur spyod par byed do/_/de rnams gnas de dag na ji srid du 'dod pa/_sdug pa yid du 'ong ba byas shing bsags pa so so yang dag par myong bar 'gyur ba'i las zad pa dang /_spangs pa dang /_gtugs par 
[\[276b.4\]]ma gyur pa de srid du dga' bar byed/_rtse bar byed do/_/'di lta ste/_zad par gyur na/_de phyis lha'i ris 'dod pa dang /_bde ba'i tshogs du ma de nas 'chi bar 'gyur te/_shi nas kyang las nye bar 'gro ba ji lta ba bzhin sems can dmyal ba dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_dud 'gro rnams kyi nang 
[\[276b.5\]]du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mi'i nang du skyes na/_de las de dang rgyu 'thun par shin tu bde bar 'gyur te/_yid rtse bar dga' ba dag thams cad mgu zhing rab tu dga' ba dang /_byad gzugs sdug pa dang /_ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo /_/de nas yang 
[\[276b.6\]]dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de/_sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas la rtog par byed de/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas gzi phreng 'bar ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo /_/der sems can dag las gang gis skye 
[\[276b.7\]]bar 'gyur snyam nas/_des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/_dge zhing legs pa'i skyes bu gang gis lha'i nang du nges par skye bar 'gyur ba'i bsod nams dag byas pas 'gyur te/_'di lta ste skyes bu dge ba/_g.yo sgyu med pa/_gzhan la gnod pa med pa/_dam pa'i chos rtogs pa/_
[\[277a\]]
[\[277a.1\]]sems can thams cad la phan par 'dod pa yang dag pa'i lta bas sngon du 'dren pa sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la rtag tu sems gus par gyur pa/_rtag tu yid brlan pa gang gis bsod nams byas pas 'gyur ro/_/de rnam pa du zhe na/_'di ni dge 'dun gyi gnas khang 
[\[277a.2\]]ngam mchod rten nyams pa bcos te/_gnas khang ngam mchod rten gang yin pa de dag brtan par byed pa'am de bzhin du rtsig rmang 'chos sam/_de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi'am mchod rten gyi'am dge 'dun gyi nor rdzas la me shor na srog la mi lta bar me'i nang du zhugs te zhi bar byas nas me de las 
[\[277a.3\]]thar bar byed pa'am de bzhin du mi dag la mes sreg pa na/_sems can la brtse ba'i snying rjes thar bar byed pa rnam pa de lta bu ni bsod nams byed pa yin no/_/srog gcod pa dang ma byin par len pa dag las ldog pa rnam pa du zhe na/_gang zhig lam du zhugs pa na/_gser ram dngul 
[\[277a.4\]]lam/_rin po che'am gzhan de dang 'thun pa lhung ba gang yin pa dag lam du rnyed pa dang /_kye su'i yin/_kye 'di su'i yin zhes de sgrogs par byed la/_de gal te la la zhig gis 'di ni bdag gi yin no zhes smras te/_de yang rang gi yin par gyur na/_de la sbyin par byed do/_/ji ste 
[\[277a.5\]]su yang 'dod pa med la su yang smra ba med na/_'di ltar 'di ni bdag gis zhag bdun gyi bar du bcangs la/_de nas yang yul phyogs de na 'dug pa/_rgyal po'am blon po chen po dag la sbran nas 'phrog par mi byed la/_sgrogs par byed do/_/de'i tshe chos dang mi ldan pas 'phrog 
[\[277a.6\]]par byed na/_de dag la sbran par mi bya zhing phyis sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun dag la dbul bar bya/_de bzhin du bstabs par bya ste/_de lta bu ni ma byin par len pa mi byed pa yin no/_/srog gcod pa spangs pa ji lta bu yin zhe na/_'di ni lam du zhugs nas 'gro ba'i lam dag 
[\[277a.7\]]na/_srin bu mar ko ta ka dang /_sbal pa dang sdig sbrul dag gis khebs na/_sems can la snying brtse bas de dag gi steng du 'gro bar mi byed de/_las kyi 'bras bu'i de kho na la lta ba/_'khor ba'i nyes dmigs shes pa/_skye ba dang 'chi ba la spyod pa des/_don gyi 'bras bu mang po 
[\[277b\]]
[\[277b.1\]]dag kyang dang du blangs nas/_lam gzhan nas bskor te 'gro ba yin te/_de lta bu ni srog gcod pa spangs pa yin no/_/sdom pa blangs pa'i mi de ni lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas gzi phreng 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i nang du skye bar 'gyur 
[\[277b.2\]]ro/_/der skyes nas kyang shin tu bde ba la rten cing bde ba dang ldan pa/_rang gis byas pa'i las la spyod pa de'i bde ba gang yin pa de dag ni brjod par mi nus so/_/phyogs 'ga' zhig brjod na 'di ltar gnas de ni kun nas 'od 'bar ba yin te/_de'i khyad par nyi ma'i 'od dang 
[\[277b.3\]]'thun la mthong ba 'thun yang 'od de mi bzod pa ma yin pa de ltar de'i las bde ba'i rgyur gyur pa'i mthus 'bar ba yin no/_/de na rang gi 'od dang ldan pa de dga' bar byed de/_lha mo 'bum snyed kyis yongs su bskor ba de/_gser dang /_bai DUr+ya dang /_shel dang /_an da 
[\[277b.4\]]rnyil gyi gzhal med khang bzang po rnams kyi nang na/_'dod pa du ma la sems gtad pa rnams dga' bar byed de/_rtse bar byed dga' dgur spyod par byed do/_/de shing ljon pa rtag tu me tog dang /_lo ma rgyas pa dang /_rtag tu bya'i tshogs sgra snyan pa 'byin pas mdzes par byas 
[\[277b.5\]]pa'i tshal gyi nang dag na/_rna ba dang /_mig gis bsten pa'i yul nyams dga' ba dag mthong zhing thos so/_/de ltar de tshal gyi nang mig btsums pa dang phye ba lta bu zhes bya ba shing ljon pa de dag mig btsums pa dang phye ba lta bu mthong ste/_mthu dang stobs shin tu che ba des rnam pa de lta 
[\[277b.6\]]bu'i tshal gyi nang rnams na dga' bar byed do/_/de nas yang lha dang lha mo'i tshogs du mas yongs su bskor cing /_mig dang snying ltad mos g.yengs pa dag tshal glu dbyangs len pa'i kun dga'i ra ba zhes bya ba der 'gro bar byed do/_/de'i phyi bzhin du yang lha 'bum phrag du ma ri rab kyi 
[\[277b.7\]]gshong dag na sil snyan dang sgra dbyangs sna tshogs 'byin cing 'dong bar byed do/_/phan tshun brag ca 'byung ba'i sgra 'byin pa de dag ri rab kyi nang gi khrod nas kun nas glu dbyangs 'byung ba lta bur byed cing 'gro bar byed do/_/de ltar de 'gro ba na lha gzhan tshal dang nye ba'i tshal rnams kyi nang 
[\[278a\]]
[\[278a.1\]]na rtse zhing dga' bar byed pa gang yin pa de dag sgra shin tu snyan zhing yid 'phrog pa de thos nas/_brgya byin gnyis pa lta bu gzhan 'di su zhig yin snyam nas 'gro bar byed do/_/shin tu mgu ba des de mngon par mthong nas yid ngo mtshar cher skyes pa de'i drung du rgyug par byed 
[\[278a.2\]]do/_/lha phan tshun dga' ba skyes pa de rnams kyis de mngon par mthong nas khyed tshur sheg khyed tshur sheg 'di ni bdag cag thams cad pas lus shin tu che la/_brgya byin lta bu gzhan zhig bdag cag gi gnas 'dir byung ngo zhes brjod do/_/de nas lha gzhan dag kyang rings par lha de dag 
[\[278a.3\]]ga la ba der dong ste/_lha rnams kyis yongs su bskor nas bkur sti byas/_bro dang glu dang /_dgod pa dang sgeg pa dang rab tu dga' ba'i yid dang /_de la mchod pa byas pa'i yid kyis tshal rab tu dga' ba zhes bya ba ga la ba der skyed mos tshal gyi dga' spyod byed du 'dong bar byed do/_/
[\[278a.4\]]lha dang lha mo'i tshogs rab tu dga' ba rnams/_dgod cing bro rdung bzhin du/_de nas yang snying bsnyen bkur bya ba la zhugs pa de dag slar log ste de nyid la lta bar byed do/_/de nas des kyang de rnams mngon par mthong nas yid rab tu dga' bas smras pa/_snying gcugs par sdug pa khyed rnams 
[\[278a.5\]]kyis bdag drangs te/_khyed kyis bdag gi mdun du dga' ba 'di lta bu sbyar na/_kye bdag cag gang du 'dong /_de nas lha de rnams kyis gsar du skyes pa'i lha de la 'di ltar bdag cag 'di rnams ni tshal rab tu dga' ba'i kun dga' ra ba zhes bya ba lha'i mchog tu nyams dga' ba'i tshal der bdag cag 
[\[278a.6\]]'dong bar bya ste/_der 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga lhag par spyad par bya'o/_/de nas lha des sngon ma mthong ba'i tshal der yang yid ltad mo la zhugs par yang dang yang rings par gyur pa'i yid nyid kyis tshal rab tu dga' ba'i kun dga' ra ba zhes bya ba ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do/_/de nas tshal de rgyang 
[\[278a.7\]]ring po zhig na nyi ma'i tshal lta bu kun nas 'od zer bzang pos rab tu 'bar ba lta bur mthong ngo /_/de nas lha gsar du skyes pa des tshal de mngon par mthong nas yang dang yang mchog tu dga' ba skyes par gyur pa'i yid kyis tshal de ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do/_/de nas dga' ba rnam pa du ma yod pa 
[\[278b\]]
[\[278b.1\]]tshal bzhi dag dang 'thun pa/_legs par 'byung ba'i tshal der phyin pa dang bya 'bum snyed rnam par sgra si li li 'byin te/_kha cig ni sgra 'byin par byed/_kha cig ni 'bod par byed/_kha cig gis ni rnam pa du mar yongs su bskor nas yid rab tu dga' bas sgra 'byin par byed de/_de ltar tshal de 
[\[278b.2\]]rnams na sgra 'byin par byed do/_/yang phyogs gzhan zhig na ri sul rnam pa sna tshogs yod par gser gyi rdo leb rnam pa du ma la chu 'bab pas phog pa'i chu sgra de dang /_bya ngang pa dang /_ngur pa dang /_kA raN+Da ba dag chu 'gram rnams na sgra 'byin te/_chu bo de rnams kyi bya dag de ltar rnam pa du mar sgra 
[\[278b.3\]]'byin pa thos so/_/de nas de dag gis kyang chu 'bab pa'i sgra mngon par brtags nas chu 'gram de dag na lha dang lha mo'i tshogs kyis bskor ba'i lha de dag dga' bar byed/_rtse bar byed dga' dgur spyod par byed la/_tshal dang nye ba'i tshal dag na yang mchog tu bde ba myong bar byed do/_/de nas 
[\[278b.4\]]yang 'dod pa lnga las byung ba'i bde ba myong bar byed la/_yang dpag bsam gyi shing gi drung du rgyug par byed do/_/shing de dag kyang mngon par mthong ste/_kha cig ni zla ba'i 'od ltar lhan pa dang kha cig ni nyi ma'i 'od ltar gsal ba yin te/_shing de rnams kyi drung dag tu yang lha de lha rnams 
[\[278b.5\]]kyis bskor nas dga' bar byed/_dga' dgur spyod par byed yul lnga'i bde ba rnam pa du ma myong bar byed de/_'dod pa'i bde ba gang brjod par yang mi nus so/_/de dpag bsam gyi shing gi tshal der yang bde ba rnam pa mang po du ma myong nas pad ma'i tshal bya ngang pa dang /_ngur pa dang kA raN+Da bas brgyan pa 
[\[278b.6\]]ga la ba der brgya byin bzhin du mchog tu dga' ba'i lha thams cad kyis yongs su bskor ba'i lha de yang yid rab tu dga' bas 'dong bar byed do/_/de nas der yang lha'i 'dod pa'i bde ba spyad nas/_ri bo'i rtse mo mtho brtsegs zhes bya ba'i ri bo'i rtse mo ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do/_/glu len bro rdung 
[\[278b.7\]]'dzum zhing sgeg par lha dang lha mo grogs su gyur pa phan tshun yid gcugs pa/_gcig la gcig gnod pa mi byed cing snying du sdug pa rnams shin tu bde ba myong bar byed do/_/ri bo'i rtse mo mtho brtsegs zhes bya ba rtse mo sna tshogs pa de la 'dzegs nas/_yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa/_'bab 
[\[279a\]]
[\[279a.1\]]chu dang mtshe'u dang lteng ka sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa dang lha'i pad ma'i tshal dang ldan zhing des kyang brgyan pa/_pad ma'i tshal de na yang pad ma mang pos mdzes par byas pa/_bya'i tshogs 'bum phrag du ma lding ba/_shin tu bde ba dang ldan zhing yid shin tu bde la mchog tu dge ste/_
[\[279a.2\]]legs pa mchog gis shin tu 'bar ba rnams mthong nas/_lha de rnams dang lhan cig skyed mos tshal dang /_nye ba'i tshal dang /_bung ba sbrang rtsi 'byung ba'i tshal dang dpag bsam gyi shing gi tshal dang bya sna tshogs sgra 'byin par byed pa rnams kyi nang na dga' bar byed/_rtse bar byed dga' dgur 
[\[279a.3\]]spyod par byed do/_/ri bo'i rtse mo mtho brtsegs ri zom sna tshogs yod pa de na las legs par byas pa de der yang yun ring du rtses na/_de nas yang lha de rnams dang lhan cig skyed mos tshal gyi dga' spyod byed du rang gi gnas de nyid la rtog par byed de/_gsar du skyes pa'i yid ltad mo la zhugs pa 
[\[279a.4\]]lha phyi bzhin 'brang ba stong snyed kyis bskor cing /_thams cad du yang de dag nyid kyis yongs su bskor ba rnams brgya byin blta ba'i phyir lha'i 'dun sa chos bzang ga la ba der 'dong bar byed do/_/de nas rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/_rin po che'i khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]lan kan sna tshogs kyis bskor ba sngar bstan 
[\[279a.5\]]pa dang 'thun pa chos bzang du phyin pa dang /_de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/_lha de mngon par mthong nas rim gro byas shing 'di ltar tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_'di dag legs byas 'bras bu ste/_/da ltar legs par gnas pa yin/_/de ni zad nas lha yul nas/_/khyod ni log par ltung bar 
[\[279a.6\]]byed/_/las kyis nyams te ltung ba dag_/gang dang gang du skye 'gyur gang /_/de ni phyis ni gdung med par/_/khyod kyis de ltar bya ba yin/_/bde la sems ni chags gyur cing /_/bag med pa yis nyams gyur nas/_/ma byas bdud kyi dbang gyur pa/_/lha rnams sems can dmyal bar 'gro/_/gcig 
[\[279a.7\]]gis ltung ba mthong nas su/_/skye bo ji ste yid mi 'byung /_/bdag kyang ltung ba 'di dag gis/_/rnam pa kun du ltung du dogs/_/gang zhig ring nas 'jigs mthong ste/_/sgrub pa dag la 'bad byed pa/_/de ni 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe/_/gnod dang bral te 'jigs pa med/_/gang zhig ring nas bag med pas/_/
[\[279b\]]
[\[279b.1\]]blo ngan 'jigs par mi sems pa/_/phyi nas nyon mongs byung tshe de/_/phyi nas gdung bas sreg par 'gyur/_/lha yul nas ni nges par go/_/kun nas dngos po lhung bar 'gyur/_/'dod pa'i dbang gyur de rig na/_/'di la nams kyang ltung ba med/_/sems can 'dod pas bslus pa dang /_/'dod pas 
[\[279b.2\]]rnam par rmongs pa dang /_/'dod pa'i zhags pas drangs gyur pa/_/de dag rtag tu dmyal bar ltung /_/rtag tu nyon mongs 'di rig nas/_/bdag la phan par byed pa'i yid/_/shin tu dul ba'i yid kyis ni/_/lha rnams gdung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/yid kyi dug dang 'dod shugs kyis/_/rnam pa kun du 
[\[279b.3\]]zin pa gang /_/'chi bdag dbang gyur rmongs pa de/_/skye bo 'dod pa'i me yis nyams/_/'chi ba'i tshe na gnyen 'dab dang /_/mdza' bshes rtsa lag gnyen 'dun dang /_/'bral ba'i sdug bsngal gang byung ba/_/de ni bshad par mi nus so/_/de ni 'chi bar nye gyur te/_/ri bo bzhin du ltung ba na/_/bzlog par 
[\[279b.4\]]mi nus stobs ldan pa/_/mi rnams kyis ni 'dren par byed/_/sdug pa dang ni 'du gyur la/_/rnam pa kun du'ang 'bral bar gyur/_/de ni rig nas lha mchog gis/_/bag med rnams la chags ma byed/_/dbang po rtag tu 'dod rnams kyis/_/'dir ni nams kyang ngoms mi myong /_/ji ltar mer ni 
[\[279b.5\]]mar blugs bzhin/_/sred pa rtag tu 'phel bar gyur/_/'di ltar sgo rnams sna tshogs kyis/_/sred pa'i 'jig rten 'jig byed pa/_/mi rnams rtag tu sems dmyal dang /_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dud 'gro'i nang du 'khyam/_/'chi dang skye bo'i 'phyang mo la/_/mi mkhas skye bo nyon mongs pa/_/de ni rig 
[\[279b.6\]]nas sred bral te/_/'gro ba mchog tu de 'gro'o/_/brtan po bcings las nges grol ba/_/mya ngan bral zhing gnod dang bral/_/gang zhig sred pa'i dbang mi 'gro/_/de ni rtag tu bde bar 'dug_/gang dag gnas skabs thams cad du/_/ye shes la ni yid nye ba/_/mkhas pa de ni skye ba 
[\[279b.7\]]yin/_/sdug bsngal zhags pas de mi 'ching /_/gang dag yid la mtshan ma med/_/gang dag sred pas yid byung ba/_/de ni dgon pa'i dri ma bral/_/bde ba 'byung ba'i mchog cig thob/_/gang dag sdug bsngal mi skyo zhing /_/gang dag bde la chags mi byed/_/bde sdug las ni grol ba de/_/mya 
[\[280a\]]
[\[280a.1\]]ngan 'das pa'i grong khyer 'gro/_/byams pa dang ni snying rje yis/_/mi rnams rtag tu sems ldan pa/_/rgyu 'bras de nyid shes pa de/_/sdug bsngal zhags las nges par 'byung /_/gang dag kun tu rtog pa la/_/yid mi dga' ste skyon spangs pa/_/de dag skyon gyi 'jigs las grol/_/
[\[280a.2\]]gnas mchog dam par 'gro bar 'gyur/_/'du ba dag la 'bral ba yod/_/lang tsho la yang rtag tu rga/_/'tsho ba la yang rtag tu 'chi/_/gzhi 'di dag ni rtag tu gnas/_/lha yul nas ni ltung ba de/_/mi bzad khad kyis mngon du 'ong /_/de ni bsams te bag med pa/_/khyod kyis nams kyang bsten mi bya/_/
[\[280a.3\]]rmongs pa gang zhig thabs med pas/_/bde ba rtag tu tshol byed pa/_/bye ma rnams las 'bru mar ltar/_/de ni rtag tu rnyed mi 'gyur/_/bag med rtag tu dga' ba gang /_/de la bde ba'i skal ba med/_/sdug bsngal shing gi drung gcig po/_/shin tu mi bzad bag med yin/_/chos dang chos min 
[\[280a.4\]]nges pa nyid/_/'di ste bdag gis khyod la bstan/_/khyod kyi yid kyis de zung shig_/phyis ni gdung bar ma byed cig_/rmongs pa gang zhig bla ma'i tshig_/phan pa nyid ni 'dzin mi byed/_/phyis de nyon mongs byung ba'i tshe/_/rang gi sems kyis gdungs par byed/_/bye ba ther 'bum stong phrag dang /_/sa
